40001001	Iyan heini kes guǥud te kepuun ni Jesu Kristu. Kevuwazan si Jesu Kristu ni Hadì David dengan. Ne si David, kevuwazan ni Abraham.
40001002	Ne si Abraham, amey ni Isaak, ne si Isaak, amey sikandin ni Hakub. Ne si Hakub, anak din si Huda wey is menge suled din.
40001003	Ne si Huda, iyan esawa zin si Tamar, ne iyan menge anak dan si Piris wey si Sara. Ne si Piris, amey ni Isrum, ne si Isrum, amey ni Aram,
40001004	ne si Aram, amey ni Eminadab, ne si Eminadab, amey ni Nasun. Ne si Nasun, amey ni Salmun,
40001005	ne si Salmun, iyan esawa zin si Rahab, ne iyan anak dan si Buus. Ne si Buus, ne amey ni Ubid. Ne iyan iney ni Ubid si Rut. Ne si Ubid, amey ni Isai.
40001006	Ne si Isai, ne amey ni Hadì David. Ne si David, amey ni Sulumun (iyan iney ni Sulumun kes esawa zengan ni Uriya).
40001007	Ne si Sulumun, amey ni Rubuam, ne si Rubuam, amey ni Abyas. Ne si Abyas, amey ni Asa.
40001008	Ne si Asa, amey ni Husepat. Ne si Husepat, amey ni Huram, ne si Huram, amey ni Usyas,
40001009	ne si Usyas, amey ni Hutam. Ne si Hutam, ne amey ni Akas. Ne si Akas, amey ni Isikyas.
40001010	Ne si Isikyas, ne amey ni Menasis. Ne si Menasis, ne amey ni Amun. Ne si Amun, iyan amey ni Husyas;
40001011	ne si Husyas, iyan anak din si Hikunyas wey is menge suled din. Iyan haazà timpu he mid-uwit te menge tigBebilunya is menge tig-Israyil pehendiyà te Bebilunya.
40001012	Ne hein mid-uwit en is menge tig-Israyil ziyà te Bebilunya nevuwad si Hikunyas ne iyan anak din si Selatyil. Ne amey si Selatyil ni Surubebil.
40001013	Ne si Surubebil, amey ni Abyud, ne si Abyud, ne amey ni Iliyakim. Ne si Iliyakim, amey ni Asur.
40001014	Ne si Asur, amey sikandin ni Saduk. Ne si Saduk, amey ni Akim. Ne si Akim, amey ni Ilyud,
40001015	ne si Ilyud, amey ni Iliasar. Ne si Iliasar, amey ni Matan, ne si Matan, iyan amey ni Hakub.
40001016	Ne si Hakub, iyan amey ni Jose he iyan esawa ni Maria. Ne si Maria, iyan iney ni Jesus he migeraran he Misiyas, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kes mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì.
40001017	Sepulù wey heepat he lapis te kevuwazan ebpuun dà te kegkevuwad ni Abraham taman ki David. Ne ebpuun maan te kegkevuwad ni David taman te ked-uwita te menge tig-Israyil pehendiyà te Bebilunya, sepulù wey heepat daan he lapis. Ne puun dutun taman te ked-enaka ki Jesu Kristu, sepulù ded daan wey heepat he lapis.
40001018	Iyan heini ǥuǥud te keaǥi te ked-enaka ki Jesu Kristu. Nekeǥunan is iney zin si Maria te maama he egngezanan ki Jose. Iyan, te wazè dan pa meked-esawa, netuenan ni Maria he meǥingey sikandin pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
40001019	Ne si Jose, kenà sikandin edsuwey te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne tenged kayi, kenè din edleusen te ed-esawa si Maria, iyan, kenè din daan egkesuatan he meeled-eled si Maria, umba ed-isipen din he edhusayen dà heini te meeles.
40001020	Ne zutun te kemulu zin pa ed-isipa is iring kayi, mibpeteǥeinep kandin is belinsuǥuen te Nengazen. Ne ke sikandin te, "Sikew Jose, is kevuwazan ni Hadì David, kenè ka melenew he ebpengesawa ki Maria su meǥingey sikandin pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
40001021	Maama is id-anak din ne ngezani nu ki Jesus, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, Menluluwas, su iyan sikandin edlibri te menge etew he edsunud kandin wey kenè en sikandan siluti tenged te menge salè dan."
40001022	Umba nehitavù heini is langun diyà te ki Maria wey si Jose su egketuman is migkaǥi zengan te Nengazen pinaaǥi te ebpeneuven din he migkaǥi te,
40001023	"Ebmeǥingey is raǥa ne id-anak din is maama, ne iyan ngazan te vatà si Imanwil," he ke và dà egkeǥiya, nekeamur is Megbevayà kenitew.
40001024	Ne zutun nepukew si Jose. Ne midtuman din haazà is sambag kandin te velinsuǥuen te Nengazen ne mid-esawa zin si Maria.
40001025	Iyan, wazè din si Maria uvayi taman te wazè pa mekeanak. Ne hein in-anak en haazà is batà, migngezanan ni Jose ki Jesus.
40002001	Diyà si Jesus ianak te inged he Bitlihim, te prubinsya he Hudiya zutun te timpu te kedhadì te aney en he hadì he egngezanan ki Hirudis. Ne zutun te vatè pa utew si Jesus, nekeuma ziyà te Hiruselim is menge memimituen. Diyà sikandan ebpuun te meziyù he inged diyà te edsilaan.
40002002	Ne in-insè dan ke, "Hendei ianak kes midtagnà he vatà he ebpekehadì te menge etew he Hudiyu? Neehè dey is kedlepew te vituen he iyan tuus te ked-enaka kandin ne tenged kayi midhendini key su ed-ezapen dey sikandin."
40002003	Ne hein nezineg heini ni Hadì Hirudis nesemukan is gehinawa zin wey is tivuuk he tigHiruselim.
40002004	Ne midtiǥum ni Hirudis is langun he pengulu te menge memumuhat wey is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne mid-insaan din sikandan ke, "Hendei id-anak kes mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì sumalà is kedtegnaa zengan?"
40002005	Ne midtavak dan te, "Diyà sikandin id-anak te inged he Bitlihim, te prubinsya he Hudiya. Egketuenan ta heini su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te ebpeneuven dengan he egkaǥi te,
40002006	'Sikiyu is menge tigBitlihim he ziyà ed-ubpà te prubinsya he Hudiya, egkevantug daan is inged niw iring te zuma he menge inged diyan te Hudiya su ziyà te keniyu ebpuun is edhadì te menge sakup ku he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.'"
40002007	Ne si Hirudis, hein nezineg din haazà midtawag din kes nemekeuma he memimituen. Ne hein iyan dà duma zin haazà is menge memimituen, mid-insaan din ke keenu medlepew is bituen he neehè dan.
40002008	Ne hein netuenan ni Hirudis, midteleenan din te ibpeey-eyazan kandan te ebpen-ahà is batà ne ke sikandin te, "Emun egketuredu niw, ipetueni niw kediey su wey ku meturedu su ed-ezapen ku zaan." Ne zutun, impelaus sikandan diyà te Bitlihim. Ne zutun migenat haazà is menge memimituen ne hein diyè dan en te zalan neehè dan en maan kes bituen he iyan kes bituen he neehè dan he midlepew ziyà te edsilaan. Ne nelipey zan utew hein neehè dan en maan. Ne mibpetundug kandan haazà is bituen, ne zutun medteren te renged te valey he zutun kes batà.
40002011	Ne hein midseled dan dutun te valey neehè dan haazà is batà wey is iney zin he si Maria. Ne midluhud dan su ed-ezapen dan haazà is batà. Ne zutun impelepew zan is menge kavan he zutun itagù is ketiǥeyunan dan ne mibeǥayan dan sikandin te vulawan wey menge mahal he mehemut he beyewà wey mira.
40002012	Ne impesavut kandan te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te teǥeinep he kenè dan en medlikù diyà te ki Hirudis. Ne tenged kayi, wazè dan en med-ikul zuen te imbayè dan dutun te ked-ulì dan.
40002013	Ne hein migenat en kes menge memimituen, mibpeteǥeinep en maan ki Jose is belinsuǥuen te Nengazen he egkaǥi te, "Enew kad, Jose. Ne uwita nu heeyan is batà wey iney zin ne pelaǥuy kew pehendiyà te Ihiptu. Ne zutun kew taǥad taman te kenè ku pa sikew egkeǥiyan. Su ebpen-ahaan ni Hirudis heeyan is batà su edhimetayan din."
40002014	Ne zutun mid-enew si Jose, ne mid-uwit din haazà is batà wey si Maria, ne migenat dan dutun te mezukilem pehendiyà te Ihiptu.
40002015	Ne zutun dan med-ubpà taman te minatey en si Hirudis. Egkeulaula zan heini su egketuman kes netagnà he migkaǥi te Nengazen pinaaǥi te ebpeneuven dengan he ke sikandin te, "Mid-umew ku is Anak ku he ibpaawà puun te Ihiptu."
40002016	Ne hein netuenan ni Hirudis he mid-akal zà kandin kes menge memimituen, nepauk utew. Ne insuǥù din he ibpepenhimetayan is langun he menge vatà he maama he ebpenuiǥen te zezuwa he tuig wey minus pa zutun te tivuuk he inged te Bitlihim wey is menge siringan dutun he inged. Midhimu zin heini su wey mepatey si Jesus su zezuwa en he tuig is keluǥayad puun te kegkeahaa te menge memimituen duen te vituen.
40002017	Ne pinaaǥi zutun netuman kes netagnà dengan ni Jeremias, kes ebpeneuven te Megbevayà su migkaǥi si Jeremias te,
40002018	"Duen meǥurub he egkezineg ta ziyà te inged he Rama. Egkezineg ta is edsineǥew wey ebpemenderawit su edlendaǥan ni Rakil is menge anak din. Edsineǥew ne wazè en ebpekelangan kandin su is menge anak din naawè en."
40002019	Ne hein minatey en si Hirudis, mibpeuman mebpeteǥeinep ki Jose is belinsuǥuen te Nengazen he migkaǥi te,
40002020	"Enew kad, Jose, ne uwita nu heeyan is batà wey is iney zin ne ulì kew ziyà te tanà he Israyil su minatey en sikan is edhimatey pezem keniyan te vatà."
40002021	Ne mid-enew si Jose ne miduma zin haazà is batà wey si Maria is iney te vatà ne mid-ulì dan diyà te tanà he Israyil.
40002022	Ne hein netuenan ni Jose he iyan hadì diyà te Hudiya si Ergilau he nekesunud te amey zin he si Hirudis, midlevayan dan is prubinsya he Hudiya su nahandek dan. Ne tenged te mibpeteǥeinep is Megbevayà he edsambag ki Jose, midlaus dan diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
40002023	Ne ziyè dan med-ulì te inged he egngezanan te Neserit. Umba neulaula zan heini su egketuman is netagnà dengan te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà su nekaǥi zan he egngezanan si Jesus he tigNeserit.
40003001	Mibpenlavey is menge tuig dutun ne zuen etew he egngezanan ki Juan Megbebewtismu. Diyà sikandin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew seled te prubinsya he Hudiya. Ne impesavut din te menge etew is Lalag te Megbevayà.
40003002	Ke sikandin te, "Iniyuǥi niw is memezaat he ulaula su meǥaan en edhadì kenitew is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit."
40003003	Ne si Juan, iyan sikan is netagnà dengan ni Esaias he migkaǥi zin he, "Duen keuzemà etew ziyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew. Ne zutun egkezineg sikandin te menge etew he edangep kandin is egkaǥi te, 'Meǥaan ebpekeuma is Nengazen. Hiǥewani niw is ibayè din; tendanga niw is dalan he ed-ikulen din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, endami niw is kebpekeuma zin.'"
40003004	Ne si Juan, kukumbalà te midhavel he vulvul te kemilyu ne vevakes te lundis he neǥangu. Ne terapan dà wey teneb is keuyaǥan din.
40003005	Ne mezakel he etew is midangep kandin he ebpemuun te inged he Hiruselim wey ziyà te zuma kayi he inged te tivuuk he prubinsya he Hudiya wey zuen daan mezakel pa he etew he ziyà ebpememuun te menge inged he uvey te wahig he Hurdan.
40003006	Ne haazà he menge etew, intangdù dan is menge salè dan ne mibewtismuwan din sikandan diyà te wahig he Hurdan.
40003007	Ne naahà ni Juan is mezakel he etew he menge Perisiyu wey menge Sedusiyu he edhendiyà te kandin su ebpebewtismu. Ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Iring te ulaula te uled is ulaula niw su teruen kew. Maan is edhendini kew? Kunaan niw vuwa ke ebpekeǥawas kew te silut te Megbevayà.
40003008	Emun tutuu he mid-iniyuǥan niw en is ulaula niw he mezaat, ipeehè niw pinaaǥi te menge meupiya he vaal niw.
40003009	Ne kenè niw iyan seriǥi is kevuwazan kew ni Abraham su wazà dutun pulus diyà te Megbevayà. Su egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu he emun iyan egkinehenglanen te Megbevayà, egkehimu he ebeelan din heini is menge vatu he kevuwazan ni Abraham.
40003010	Is ebpiley te kayu, migkayew en su ebpemilayen din en is minsan hengkey he kayu he kenà meupiya is beǥas din su wey mevinsuli, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is etew he kenà meupiya is ulaula zin, edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà.
40003011	Wahig is ibewtismu ku keniyu," ke si Juan, "he tuus te mid-iniyuǥan niw is mezaat he ulaula, iyan, duen etew he ed-ilis kediey ne iyan ibewtismu zin keniyu is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne emun kenà, ne hapuy. Lavew sikandin kedì, ne minsan is ked-uwit dà te sepatus din, kenè e pa zait he suluǥuen din.
40003012	Geina te ibpedsivey zin te edtapid is menge metazeng wey is menge lalung he etew, iring sikandin te ebpalid te parey he id-awè din is ukap. Ne haazà is parey, ederengdengen, iyan, is ukap, edtutungen din diyà te hapuy he kenà egkeevukan," ke si Juan.
40003013	Ne zutun te timpu te kebpemewtismu ni Juan, migenat si Jesus ebpuun diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya pehendiyà te wahig he Hurdan su ebpebewtismu ki Juan.
40003014	Ne si Juan, kenà dutun egkesuat, ne ke sikandin te, "Iyan a zait he ebewtismuwan nu kenà te iyan ka ebpebewtismu kedì."
40003015	Ne midtavak si Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Kenà, su kinahanglan he ebeelan ta is iring kayi wey ta meveeli is langun he egkesuatan te Megbevayà." Ne zutun human mebpezumazuma si Juan, ne mibewtismuwan din si Jesus.
40003016	Ne si Jesus, hein nebewtismuwan en, migaun dutun te wahig. Ne zutun nepuwasan is langit ne naahà ni Jesus is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he Megbevayà he iring te merepatik he edlugtanà diyà te kandin ne midlatun diyà te kandin.
40003017	Ne zutun nezineg is Megbevayà diyà te langit he egkaǥi, ke sikandin te, "Iyan heini Anak ku he utew ku minahal. Utew ku sikandin igkelipey."
40004001	Ne zutun mid-aǥak si Jesus te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin pehendiyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew wey sikandin meǥezami ni Setanas.
40004002	Ne hein kepatan en he andew ne wazà si Jesus mekekaan ne utew sikandin nevitil.
40004003	Ne zutun mid-uvayan ni Setanas si Jesus ne mibpenuley zin he egkaǥi te, "Emun tutuu iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà pengelinteuwi nu he mevaluy he egkeenen heini is menge vatu."
40004004	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Kenà iyan dà igkeuyag te menusiyà is egkeenen, kekenà, elin daan egkinehenglanen din is minsan hengkey he lalag he egkeǥiyen te Megbevayà.'"
40004005	Ne zutun mid-uwit si Jesus ni Setanas diyà te inged he Hiruselim ne miduma zin diyà te utew metikang he limbuvungan te simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà.
40004006	Ne migkeǥiyan din te, "Emun tutuu iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà, umpak ka su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Ebpetevangan ka te Megbevayà te menge velinsuǥuen din ne edtemukan ke zan su wey kenà egkerudruzan is minsan paa nu te vatu.'"
40004007	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen daan insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Kenè kew mebaal te paaǥi he igezam niw te ǥehem te Nengazen he iyan Megbevayè niw.'"
40004008	Ne zutun mid-uwit en maan si Jesus ni Setanas diyà te metmetikang he vuntud ne impeehè din ki Jesus is langun he menge ǥinhedian dini te kelibutan wey ke sengemenu is kezekelà wey ketiǥeyunan te kada sevaha zutun.
40004009	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Setanas te, "Is langun he egkeehè nu, kenikew en, su ibeǥey ku kenikew emun edluhuzan a wey ed-ezapen a kenikew."
40004010	Ne mibensaǥan ni Jesus te, "Setanas, ewai a kenikew! Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Iyan niw zà ezapa is Nengazen he Megbevayè niw. Ne is duma pa he ngazan he megbevayà, kenè niw tumana is suǥù din.'"
40004011	Ne zutun mid-awà si Setanas ne nekeuma is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ne imbeǥey zan ki Jesus is egkinehenglanen din.
40004012	Ne hein netuenan ni Jesus he nepirisu si Juan Megbebewtismu, mid-ulì diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
40004013	Nekeuma sikandin diyà te Neserit ne zutun diyà med-ulì te inged he Kepirnaum he ziyà te veyvey te ranew he Geliliya, he sakup te tanà he Sebulun wey Neptali.
40004014	Neulaula zin heini su egketuman kes netagnà dengan ni Esaias he ke sikandin te,
40004015	"Is TigSebulun wey is tigNeptali he kenà menge Hudiyu he ziyà mekeubpà te uvey te ranew ziyà te zapit te edsenlepan te Wahig he Hurdan, sakup te tanà he Geliliya he ed-ubpaan te kenà menge Hudiyu.
40004016	Is langun kayi he menge etew, henduen be te ziyà mekeubpà te merusirem wey henduen be te ziyè dan en te Iveyaan su ǥeine te nekesuwey zan te Megbevayà. Iyan, diyà te huziyan he timpu egketeyawan en sikandan su ebpekeuma ziyà te kandan is ebpeketayew te isip dan."
40004017	Ne puun dutun midweliyan ni Jesus is menge etew. Ke sikandin te, "Iniyuǥi niw is memezaat he ulaula niw, su meǥaan en edhadì keniyu is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit."
40004018	Sevaha he andew te edhipanew si Jesus diyà te veyvey te ranew he Geliliya, neehè din is dezuwa he maama, si Simon (kes mid-umanan din ngezani ki Pedro) wey is hazi ni Simon he si Andres. Ebpenlaya sikandan diyà te ranew su menlelaya sikandan.
40004019	Ne migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus te, "Menunuǥes kew ves te pait? Duma kew kedì ne etew mulà is egkekuwa niw wey zan mekesundan kedì."
40004020	Ne zutundutun mid-engked dan is ebpenlaya ne miduma zan kandin.
40004021	Ne midlaus dan dutun ne neuma ni Jesus is selakew pa he zezuwa he telehazi zaan, si Santiago wey si Juan, he menge anak ni Sibidiyu. Diyà sikandan te avang duma te amey zan su ebpurungan dan is menge laya zan. Mid-umew sikandan ni Jesus ne
40004022	zutundutun mid-ewaan dan is amey zan dutun te avang ne miduma zan ki Jesus.
40004023	Ne neeneb ni Jesus is tivuuk he prubinsya he Geliliya te ebpenurù te menge etew ziyà te menge simbahan dan. Impesavut din te menge etew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te kedhadì te Megbevayà ne nengeulian din is egkengesekitan te migkelingulingu he varang te zaru.
40004024	Ne nevantug si Jesus diyà te tivuuk he nasyun he Sirya. Ne tenged kayi mibpen-uwit dan diyà te kandin is langun he egkengezeruwan wey is egkengesekitan te ebarangbarang en he egezamen, iring te menge edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, menge ebevuyen, wey menge etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa, ne nengeulian ni Jesus heini is langun.
40004025	Ne tenged dutun mezakel utew he menge etew is ebpemenduma kandin. Duen dutun menge tigGeliliya, duen menge etew he ebpuun te prubinsya he Dikepulis, duen tigHiruselim, tigHudiya, wey menge etew he ziyà ebpemuun te tanà he ziyà te zapit te edsilaan te wahig he Hurdan.
40005001	Ne naahà ni Jesus is mezakel he menge etew ne zutun midtekezeg sikandin te vuvungan ne zutun mebpinuu. Ne mid-uvey ziyà te kandin is menge sumusundan din,
40005002	ne mibpenurù din sikandan.
40005003	Ne ke sikandin te, "Utew zeyzey is nengesayud he kenà sikandan ebpekeulaula te meupiya ke kenà sikandan edtevangan te Megbevayà su iyan sikandan egkehedian te Megbevayà.
40005004	Utew zeyzey sikandan is ibmesakit te ǥehinawa zan is mezaat he ulaula su edlenganen sikandan te Megbevayà.
40005005	Utew zeyzey sikandan is kenà mepelevawen su egkezawat dan kes tuvad he impenaad te Megbevayà.
40005006	Utew zeyzey sikandan is iyan dekelà te ǥehinawa zan is kedtumana zan te egkesuatan te Megbevayà su is Megbevayà edtavang kandan te kedtumana kayi.
40005007	Utew zeyzey sikandan is hihizuwen te menge zuma zan su is Megbevayà egkehizu kandan.
40005008	Utew zeyzey sikandan is kenà egkezuwazuwa is gehinawa zan te kedtumana zan te meupiya he ulaula su iyan sikandan ebpekeahà keuzemà te Megbevayà.
40005009	Utew zeyzey sikandan is ebpen-ahà te melinew he kebpekesavuk te menge etew su ed-engkenen sikandan te Megbevayà he menge anak din.
40005010	Utew zeyzey sikandan is ed-antus te kegkepeuki kandan te menge etew tenged te edtumanen dan is egkesuatan te Megbevayà su iyan sikandan egkehedian te Megbevayà.
40005011	Su utew kew zeyzey emun tenged te sumusundan ku sikiyu edsulaan kew wey ebpesipelahan kew te menge etew, ne ebpenudtul zan te tarù he mezaat is menge vaal niw.
40005012	Iyan daan heini kes mid-ulaula te menge etew zengan diyà te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Medlipey kew utew su utew zekelà is idsuhul keniyu keuzemà diyà te langit.
40005013	Sikiyu is menge sumusundan ku, iring kew te timus he ibmeupiya te egkeenen su iyan kew ibmeupiya te tivuuk he menusiyà. Iyan, emun egkeawà diyà te timus is taam din wazè en paaǥi he egkehimu te kebpelikua te taam din. Ne wazè en pulus dutun te timus he wazà taam; idtimbag dà ne egketekutakan te menge etew.
40005014	Iring kew te sulù he ebpeketayew te tivuuk he menusiyà. Is inged he ziyà benguna te puntur te vuvungan, kenà ebpekeeles.
40005015	Ne wazà daan etew he edtemteman din is sulù ne ebpelengkevan din te vinevey, kekenà, idsavuk din diyà te sevukà wey meteyawi is tivuuk he seled te valey.
40005016	Ne iring din ded daan is menge ulaula niw he meupiya; kinahanglan he kenè niw ieles. Ipeehè niw te menge etew is menge ulaula niw he meupiya ne tenged kayi ebpekezalig dan te Amey tew he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
40005017	Kenè niw isipa he iyan inhendini ku te kelibutan is id-awè ku kes kesuǥuan he imbeǥey kenitew pinaaǥi ki Moises wey kes menge penurù dengan he imbeǥey pinaaǥi te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Umba nekehendini a su wey mepurungi te edtuman.
40005018	Su taman te kenè pa egkehanew is langit wey tanà, kenà egkehimu he id-awà is minsan sengetaǥè dà he lalag duen te kesuǥuan. Taman te kenè pa egketuman is langun, kenà daan egkeawà is kesuǥuan. Kenè niw lipati heini.
40005019	Umba ke zuen minsan hentei he edlegkawen din is minsan utew zà deisey zuen te kesuǥuan ne ibpenurù din te zuma zin he kenà tumana haazà is midlagkew zin, iyan sikandin utew minus is pid-etawan din ke edhadì is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit. Ne iring din daan ke zuen etew he edtumanen din ebpurungi is kesuǥuan ne ibpenurù din diyà te zuma is kedtumana kayi, iyan sikandin lavew te langun he etew ke edhadì keuzemà is Megbevayà.
40005020	Egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu he wey kew zà egkehedii te Megbevayà ke edtumanen niw is egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne kinahanglan daan he lavew kew pa he metinumanen kenà is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey is menge Perisiyu.
40005021	Netuenan niw kes impenurù dengan diyà te menge lukes tew he indawey is kebpememunù; su is ebunù ne edhukuman te silut.
40005022	Ne iyan kedì he penurù is: minsan sikan is egkepauk dà te zuma zin, edhukuman daan sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne sikan is edsulà te zuma zin te, 'Wazè nu pulus he etew!' ne egkeuwit sikandin diyà te husayen. Ne sikan is edsulaan din is duma zin he egkaǥi te, 'Tulebung ka he wazè nu pulus,' ne zait sikandin he egkeuwit diyà te hapuy te Impirnu.
40005023	Umba ke ziyè ke en te lama te Valey te Megbevayà su ebpemuhat ka ziyà te Megbevayà ne egketenuzan nu he zuen salè nu te zuma nu,
40005024	itaǥak nu zè pa haazà is ibpemuhat nu ne beyai nu haazà is duma nu wey kew medhusey. Ne zutun ke ebpeked-uliey kew en te meupiya he ǥehinawa, likù ka human ne leusa nu haazà is kebpemuhat nu ziyà te Megbevayà.
40005025	Ne emun duen etew he insumbung ke zin ne egkeuwit ka ziyà te hukmanan, meupiya ke ebpekidhusey ka kandin te kenè kew pa ebpekeetuvang te huwis. Su emun ebpekeetuvang kew en te huwis kela ke ipalad ka zutun te huwis diyà te pulis ne egkepirisu ka.
40005026	Ne kenà duwazuwa he zutun ka ebpekeubpà taman te egkeǥempusan nu is multa kenikew.
40005027	Nezineg niw kes impenurù dengan he, 'Kenè nu selselai is esawa nu.'
40005028	Ne iyan kedì he penurù is: ke zuen minsan hentei he maama he edtengteng dà te vahi he kenè din esawa ne egkeeriǥan en dutun, ne haazà is maama, nekesalè en dutun te esawa zin.
40005029	Ne emun iyan nu igkepenulayi is kewanan he mata nu, luǥita nu wey itimbag! Meupiya pa ke wazè nu mata, kenà ke igkeagbur ka ziyà te hapuy he Impirnu is tivuuk he lawa nu.
40005030	Emun iyan nu igkepenulayi is kewanan he velad nu ne tempeza nu wey itimbag. Meupiya pa ke wazè nu velad, kenà ke igkeagbur te Impirnu is tivuuk he lawa nu.
40005031	Impenurù daan dengan he emun duen maama he ed-engkezan din is esawa zin ne kinahanglan he veǥayi zin haazà is bahi te kemetuuzan he iyan tuus te kebpesuwayè dan.
40005032	Ne iyan kedì he penurù is: emun ed-engkezan te maama is esawa zin he wazà sikandin is maama selselai zutun te esawa zin, heini he maama, ne ebpekesalà su pinaaǥi kayi ibpesavut din he nekesalà kandin is esawa zin. Ne ebpekesalà daan is maama he ebpengesawa zutun te vahi he mid-engkezan te esawa zin.
40005033	Netuenan niw zaan kes impenurù dengan diyà te menge lukes tew he emun duen ibpenaad niw ziyà te Nengazen kenà egkehimu he kenè niw edtumanen. Kinahanglan he tumana niw.
40005034	Ne iyan kedì he penurù is: emun duen ibpenaad niw ziyà te minsan hentei, kenè niw ipengeluambit he medlanggà is renged niw he langit wey tanà ke kenè niw egketuman is lalag niw su is langit, iyan pinuuwà te Megbevayà
40005035	ne is tanà, iyan nesevukan te paa zin. Ne kenè niw zaan ipengeluambit he mezeeti is inged he Hiruselim ke kenè niw egketuman is lalag niw su iyan ed-ubpaan te lavew he hadì.
40005036	Ne minsan is ulu niw, ke zuen ibpenaad niw, kenè niw keǥiya he mebmeputì is bulvul niw ke kenè niw egketuman haazà is impenaad niw su wazè niw ǥehem wey mehimu is minsan sevaha zà he vulvul niw he mebmeputì, ne emun kenà, ne mebmeitem.
40005037	'Uya' zà ne emun kenà, ne 'Wazà' is keǥiya niw. Su is minsan hengkey he lalag he egemiten niw te kedheǥeta te menge penaad niw, diyà ebpuun te ki Setanas.
40005038	Netuenan niw zaan kes penurù dengan he ke zuen etew he nezeetan din is mata te zuma zin egkehimu he edèdeetan daan is kandin he mata. Ne emun duen nekezezaat te ngipen te zuma zin, egkehimu he edèdeetan daan is kandin he ngipen.
40005039	Ne iyan kedì he penurù keniyu is: kenà egkehimu he ebelesan ta is ebpesipala kenita, kekenà, ebpurungan ta. Ne emun edtebpien din is kewanan he enaping ta, egkeǥiyan ta he egkehimu pa ke elin din edtebpien is divaluy.
40005040	Ne emun duen ebpenukut kenita ne edluwasen din is kemising ta, su iyan din ibpevayad, elin ta ibeǥey kandin is kumbalè ta.
40005041	Ne ke zuen sundaru he edteǥelen ki zin ibpeuwit te uwiten din te sengekilumitru, ed-uwiten ta te zezuwa he kilumitru.
40005042	Ke zuen ebuyù, ebeǥayan ta; ne ke zuen edsambey, edsembayan ta.
40005043	Netuenan ta kes penurù dengan he is menge zuma ta, ebpurungan ta. Ne is menge kuntada ta, edtebeken ta.
40005044	Ne iyan mulà kediey he penurù is: ebpurungan ta is menge kuntada ta wey ebpenubtuvazan ta te meupiya is ebpesipala kenita.
40005045	Ne emun ebeelan niw heini ebpekeiring kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit. Su is Megbevayà, kenà iyan dà ebpesilaan din te andew is menge metazeng he menge etew, kekenà, elin daan is menge kenà metazeng. Ne kenà iyan dà is meupiya is ulaula zin ebeǥayan din te uzan, kekenà, elin daan is mezaat is ulaula zin.
40005046	Kenè niw isipa he edsuhulan kew te Megbevayà ke iyan dà ebpurungan niw is ebpurung daan keniyu; su minsan is menge menunukut te vuhis he limbung is ulaula zan, ebpurungan dan daan is ebpurung kandan.
40005047	Ne emun iyan niw zà idtetepian is menge emiǥu niw, hengkey is igkezeliǥi keniyu? Wazà, su minsan is menge etew he wazà med-azap te Megbevayà, ed-ul-ulahan dan is iring kayi.
40005048	Kinahanglan he meheǥet is kebpurungi niw te minsan hentei. Su kes Amey tew ziyà te langit, utew meheǥet is kebpurungi zin te menusiyà."
40006001	"Kinahanglan he kenà iyan idsimbaha niw te Megbevayà su wey mezalig kew te menge etew. Su emun iyan heini ulaula niw, kenè kew edsuhulan keuzemà te Megbevayà he Amey tew ziyà te langit.
40006002	Ne emun duen ibeǥey niw ziyà te egkeayuayu kinahanglan he kenà iyan id-ul-ulaha niw zutun su wey mezalig kew te menge etew. Su iyan haazà baal te menge etew he tarù is kedtuu zan. Ed-ul-ulahan dan haazà diyà te menge simbahan wey ziyà te kersada su wey mezalig sikandan te menge etew. Kenè niw lipati he tenged te nezawat dan en is kedeliǥa kandan te menge etew, wazè en egkezawat dan he ebpuun diyà te Megbevayà.
40006003	Iyan, sikiyu mulà, ke zuen idtavang niw ziyà te egkeayuayu kinahanglan he kenà egketuenan te minsan menge zuma niw.
40006004	Kenè niw petueni te menge etew haazà is kebeǥey niw te tavang dutun te egkeayuayu, ne is Amey tew ziyà te langit, iyan dà ebpekeahà dutun ne iyan daan edsuhul keniyu.
40006005	Ne emun ed-ampù kew kenè niw iringi is menge etew he tarù is kedtuu zan. Egkesuatan dan he mekehitindeg dan is ed-ampù diyà te menge simbahan wey ziyà te kersada wey maahà sikandan te menge etew. Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he nezawat dan en is kedeliǥa kandan te menge etew. Ne wazè en duma pa he suhul he egkezawat dan he ebpuun te Megbevayà.
40006006	Iyan, sikiyu, ke ed-ampù kew, med-ulì is kada sevaha ziyà te valey zin, ne medlelekeb wey kenà maahà, ne zutun med-ampù te Amey tew he Megbevayà he kenà egkeahà. Ne is Amey tew he Megbevayà, iyan dà ebpekeahà kandin ne iyan edsuhul kandin keuzemà.
40006007	Emun ed-ampù kew kenè niw ǥemita is mezakel he menge lalag he wazà menge pulus su iyan heini ulaula te menge etew he wazà med-azap te tutuu he Megbevayà. Iyan diyà te ǥehinawa zan is: ebpemineǥen te Megbevayà is ked-ampù dan emun utew meluǥayad.
40006008	Kenè niw iringi sikandan su netuenan he zaan te Amey tew is egkinehenglanen te uman sevaha te sikitew te wazè tew pa vuyua.
40006009	Iringi niw heini ke ed-ampù kew: 'Amey zey ziyà te langit, berakat he tehuza te menusiyà is ngazan nu,
40006010	berakat he medhadì ka te menusiyà, berakat he tumana is egkesuatan nu zini te tanà iring te layun edtumana ziyà te langit.
40006011	Beǥayi key te egkeenen he egkinehenglanen dey ǥuntaan;
40006012	peseyluwa key te menge salè dey iring te nekepesaylu key te nekesalà kenami.
40006013	Ipekeziyù key kenikew te mezesen he penuley ne ilikey key kenikew ki Setanas.'
40006014	Su sikiyu is menge etew, ke ebpeseyluwen niw is nekesalà keniyu, ebpeseyluwen kew zaan te Amey tew he ziyà te langit.
40006015	Iyan, emun kenè kew ebpesaylu te menge zuma niw he etew, kenè kew zaan ebpeseyluwen te Amey tew he ziyà te langit.
40006016	Ne emun edsalang kew egkaan su ebpengampù kew ziyà te Megbevayà, kenè niw ipetuusi pinaaǥi te kebuvuked niw iring te menge etew he egkesuat he mezalig sikandan te menge zuma he etew. Edriǥuriǥu zan, ne kenè dan ebpendapug wey kenè dan ebpenuwat su wey metueni te menge etew he edsalang dan egkaan. Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he nezawat dan en is kedeliǥa kandan te menge etew. Ne wazè en duma pa he suhul he egkezawat dan he ebpuun te Megbevayà.
40006017	Ne sikiyu mulà, emun edsalang kew egkaan, pendapug kew wey penuwat kew
40006018	su wey kenà metueni te zuma he edsalang kew. Iyan dà egkesayud is Amey tew he Megbevayà he wazà duen ebpekeeles. Iyan sikandin ebpekeahà te ulaula nu minsan sebsevaha nu, ne iyan daan sikandin edsuhul kenikew.
40006019	Kenè niw tipiǥi is ketiǥeyunan dini te kelibutan su zini egkeketket te ipes wey edtengisen. Ne egketakew su egkeselezan is baley niw te tekawen.
40006020	Tipiǥi niw ziyà te langit kes ketiǥeyunan he iyan kes idsuhul te Megbevayà keniyu su zutun kenà egkeketket te ipes, wey kenà edtengisen ne kenà daan egketakew.
40006021	Ne zutun ke hendei is egketeǥuan te ketiǥeyunan niw, dutun daan is gehinawa niw.
40006022	Is mata ta, ne iring te sulù kayi te lawa ta su emun merayag is ked-ehè ta, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, metazeng is ulaula ta, ne henduen be te egketeyawan is tivuuk he lawa ta.
40006023	Iyan, emun lakap ki, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, emun lalung ki, ne henduen be te egkezukileman ki. Ne emun nelakap ki tenged te kelelalung ta ne utew merusirem iyan is ibayè ta.
40006024	Is uripen, kenà egkehimu he zezuwa is teǥiuripen kandin. Su emun dezuwa is ebayàbayà kandin, edtehuzen din is sevaha ne egkepeukan din is sevaha. Ne emun kenà, ne egkeepesan din is sevaha, ne ebmahalen din is sevaha. Ne iring din ded daan emun iyan mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa nu is ketiǥeyunan, su kenà egkehimu he mahal zaan diyà te ǥehinawa nu is Megbevayà.
40006025	Ne tenged kayi, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu te menge sumusundan ku he kenè kew meseeng te egkeenen wey ed-inumen he igkeuyag niw. Kenè kew zaan meseeng te ugelingen he idsun-ud te lawa niw. Su mibeǥayan kew te Megbevayà te ǥehinawa niw wey lawa niw he mahal utew; ne wey pe be kenà mehimu he ebeǥayan kew zin daan te egkeenen wey ugelingen?
40006026	Isipa niw is menge tagbis he ebpemenlayang. Kenè dan ebpemula; kenè dan edraǥun; kenè dan daan ederengdeng. Ne minsan pa zutun ebpengelintau is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit te egkekaan dan. Ne iyan kew pe be is etew he lavew pa he mahal ziyà te kandin kenà is menge tagbis.
40006027	Ne minsan sengemenu is kegkenuǥuni te etew te untung din, wazà minsan hengkey he paaǥi he egkesumpatan din te minsan deisey zà.
40006028	Ne maan is egkeseeng kew te ugelingen? Ahaa niw is menge kevukazan te sagbet. Kenè dan edterebahu; kenè dan daan ebpengavel.
40006029	Ne venar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he minsan pa si Hadì Sulumun dengan is sepian utew wey nevantug, ne wazà mekesusuluwan is kezagwey te menge bisti zin te kezagwey kayi te menge kevukazan.
40006030	Is sagbet, wazè din bali; egkeehè ta ǥuntaan, ne kenè en utew egkeuǥet ne egkeǥangu ne ebinsulan. Iyan, ke edhimuwen te Megbevayà he mekempet minsan heini is menge sagbet, iyan kew pe be kenè din daan meveǥayi te igkevisti. Maan is utew zeisek is kedsarig niw kandin.
40006031	Ne tenged kayi, kenè kew meseeng wey megkaǥi te, 'Hengkey is egkekaan tew, ne hengkey is ed-inumen tew, ne hengkey zaan is igkevisti tew?'
40006032	Iyan heini igkeseeng te menge etew he wazà medtuu te tutuu he Megbevayà. Iyan, is Amey tew he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, netuenan din he zaan he egkinehenglanen niw is iring kayi.
40006033	Iyan, sikiyu mulà, kinahanglan he iyan mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa niw is kebpahadì niw kandin wey is metazeng he ulaula he ebpeveelan din keniyu ne zutun ibeǥey zin keniyu is langun he egkinehenglanen niw.
40006034	Kenè kew meseeng ke hengkey is menge mereǥen he egkeulaula niw te huziyan he andew su wey niw en heeyan isipa zutun te andew he egkehitavù en. Iyan dà isipa niw is guntaan en he egkehitavù keniyu."
40007001	"Kenè kew medsawey te zuma niw ne kenè kew zaan edsewayen te Megbevayà.
40007002	Su is idsawey niw te zuma niw ne iyan daan idsawey keniyu te Megbevayà. Is kezekelà te idsawey nu te zuma nu, iyan daan kezekelà te idsawey kenikew te Megbevayà.
40007003	Sikew is layun edsawey te zuma nu, maan is edsawey ka te salà te zuma nu he iring dà te pesek he nekeahuk diyà te mata zin? Ne sikew, duen nu salà he iring kezekelà te vatang he nekevuta te mata nu ne ebpesegdanen nu.
40007004	Ne egkeǥiyan nu pa sikandin he id-awè nu haazà is nekepesek kandin, iyan, nepesek mulà is kenikew he mata te vatang ne ebpesegdanen nu!
40007005	Utew tarù is ulaula nu! Ihuna nu iawà is batang he nekepesek kenikew ne human ka ebpekeahà. Ne zutun melemu nu zà igkeawà haazà is nekepesek te zuma nu."
40007006	Ne zutun insempità ni Jesus is menge etew he kenà egkesuat he ebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà. Ke sikandin te, "Kenè niw iveǥey te asu is butang he mahal ziyà te Megbevayà su kela ke keǥata kew zin. Ne kenè niw zaan isawed is menge mahal he ebelieǥen diyà te etuvangan te menge vavuy su egketekutakan dan dà.
40007007	Penigudu kew vuyù diyà te Megbevayà ne ebeǥayan kew zin; penigudu kew pen-ahà ne ibpeturedu zin keniyu is ebpen-ahaan niw. Penigudu kew penelehuzan ne ebpuwasan kew zin.
40007008	Su is langun he ebuyù diyà te Megbevayà ebpekezawat. Ne sikan is ebpen-ahà, ebpeketuredu; ne sikan is ebpenelehuzan, ne ebpuwasan daan te Megbevayà.
40007009	Ne sikiyu is menge ǥinikanan, ke zuen ebuyuen te anak niw he egkeenen kenà egkehimu he vatu is ibeǥey niw.
40007010	Ne emun ebuyù keniyu te pait, kenà daan egkehimu he uled is ibeǥey niw.
40007011	Ne sikiyu is menusiyà he kenà memetazeng, emun meupiya is ibeǥey niw ziyà te menge anak niw, iyan pe be is Amey tew he Megbevayà diyà te langit kenà meupiya is ibeǥey zin diyà te minsan hentei keniyu ke ebuyù ziyà te kandin.
40007012	Is egkesuatan niw he ed-ul-ulahan te menge zuma niw ziyà te keniyu, iyan niw zaan ul-ulaha ziyà te kandan. Iyan heini hustu he kedtumana te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Iyan daan heini kes impenurù dengan te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà.
40007013	Diyè kew ikul te meliǥet he pultahan he idselang pehendiyà te untung he wazè din pidtemanan su meluag mulà is pultahan wey melemu he ed-ikulen is dalan he ibpehendiyà te Impirnu, ne mezakel he etew is ed-ikul zutun.
40007014	Meliǥet mulà is pultahan wey mereǥen he ed-ikulen is dalan he ibpehendiyà te untung he wazè din pidtemanan ne mezelag dà is ed-ikul kayi.
40007015	Likayi niw is menge ebpeneuven kun te Megbevayà he tarù is ibpenurù dan. Henduen be te hustu sikandan he tumutuu te Megbevayà, iyan, ebpekezezaat is ibpenurù dan.
40007016	Egketuusan niw he teruen sikandan pinaaǥi te ulaula zan su is banag, kenà ebeǥas te paras ne is seǥà, kenà ebeǥas te igira.
40007017	Is kayu he wazè din erat, meupiya is beǥas din; kenà ebpemeǥas te mezaat. Is kayu he zuen din erat, mezaat is beǥas din; kenà ebpemeǥas te meupiya.
40007019	Is kayu he mezaat is beǥas din, ne ebpilayen ne ebinsulan.
40007020	Iring din ded daan is menge ebpeneuven kun te Megbevayà he tarù is ibpenurù dan su edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà. Ne egketuusan niw he teruen sikandan tenged te menge ulaula zan he mezaat.
40007021	Su zuen menge etew he ebpengumew-umew kedì te, 'Nengazen, he Nengazen!' Iyan, kenà langun te sikandan ebmehimuwen he mehedii te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, kekenà, iyan dà sikan is edtuman te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
40007022	Ne zutun keuzemà te andew te kedsilut, mezakel is ebpehizuhizu zini te kedìey he egkaǥi te, 'He Nengazen, pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu neketagnè key, ne nengeulian dey is ebpenlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne mezakel is menge egkein-inuwan he nengehimu zey.'
40007023	Ne iyan tavak ku kandan dutun is: 'Kenè ku sikiyu egkekilala. Sikiyu is memezaat is ulaula, awà kew kayi!'
40007024	Ne minsan hentei he nekezineg kayi te langun he sambag ku ne ebpezumdumahan din, iring sikandin te etew he uluwanen, su heini is uluwanen, diyà mebevaley te zivavew te zekelà he vatu.
40007025	Ne mibegyuwan. Mid-uzan te mereǥes ne midalem is menge wahig ne utew mevendes is keramag, iyan, wazà merundus haazà is baley su ziyà benguna te zivavew te zekelà he vatu.
40007026	Ne is minsan hentei he ebpemineg dà kayi te sambag ku ne kenè din ebpezumdumahan, iring sikandin te etew he tulebung. Heini is tulebung, ne ziyà mebevaley te pantad.
40007027	Ne mibegyuwan daan; ne midalem haazà is wahig ne mibpengeramag te mevendes ne nerundus haazà is baley zin ne nepurung mewaǥey."
40007028	Ne nekepasad si Jesus te ebpenurù dutun. Ne neinuinu is mezakel he nengetiǥum dutun
40007029	su is kebpenurù din, kenà iring te kebpenurù te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan su zuen gehem mulà te penurù din.
40008001	Ne midtupang si Jesus ne utew mezakel he menge etew is nemenduma kandin.
40008002	Ne zutun, duen it-iten he mid-uvey ziyà te kandin. Ne heini is it-iten, midluhuzan din si Jesus ne migkaǥi te, "He Zatù, emun meupiya zà te ǥehinawa nu netuenan ku he egkeulian a kenikew kayi te utew meremerik he egezamen ku."
40008003	Ne midampà sikandin ni Jesus te egkaǥi te, "Utew meupiya te ǥehinawa ku. Meulii ka." Ne zutundutun nehanewhanew zutun te etew haazà is it-it din.
40008004	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus te, "Pemineg ka, Mama, kenè nu tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei, kekenà, pehendiyè ka ǥuntaan te memumuhat he midhimu te Megbevayà wey zin maahà he neulian ka; ne tumana nu sikan is pemuhat he insuǥù dengan ni Moises te it-iten, su wey metueni te langun he neulian ka iyan."
40008005	Ne zutun midhendiyà si Jesus te inged he Kepirnaum. Ne te kedseled din dutun te inged, duen etew he kenà Hudiyu he kepitan te nenggatus he sundaru he mid-uvey ki Jesus
40008006	he egkaǥi te, "Datù, diyà te valey ku egkezeruwan is suluǥuen ku. Minatey is divaluy he lawa zin ne merasey utew is egezamen din."
40008007	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Edhendiyan a ne ebewian ku wey sikandin meulii."
40008008	Ne midtavak haazà is kepitan te, "Kenà, Datù, su," ke sikandin, "tenged te lavew ka kedì, kenà a zait he ebiǥatbiǥat pa maan kenikew he edhendiyà te valey ku. Utew ka mekeǥeǥehem ne minsan ke egkaǥi ke zà te, 'Meulii sikandin,' ne egkeulian en is suluǥuen ku.
40008009	Netuenan ku heini su iring te zuen ebayàbayà kedì, ne zuen daan menge sundaru he ebeyveyaan ku. Ne edsuǥuen ku is sevaha he medhipanew ne edhipanew en. Ne edtewaǥen ku is sevaha he medhendini ne edhendini en; ne edsuǥuen ku zaan is suluǥuen ku ke zuen ebpeveelan ku ne ebeelan din en. Ne iring din ded daan diyan te kenikew su is egkeǥiyen nu ne egkehimu en."
40008010	Ne te nezineg ni Jesus heini, ne utew neinuinu ne ke sikandin diyà te menge etew he nemenduma kandin te, "Wazè ku pa meuma is etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil he iring kayi he utew mezesen is kedtuu zin.
40008011	Ne kenè niw lipati heini is egkeǥiyen ku he mezakel he etew he kenà menge Hudiyu he ziyà ebpemuun te meziyù, diyà te zapit te edsilaan wey ziyà te zapit te edsenlepan, ne ebpekidtuǥen dan keuzemà ki Abraham wey ki Isaak wey ki Hakub diyà te ginhedian te Megbevayà.
40008012	Iyan, mezakel zaan he kevuwazan ni Israyil he midteǥenahan pezem te Megbevayà te ginhedian din, iyan, igketimbag sikandan diyà te merusirem he utew meziyù te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà. Ne ebpemekekulahì dan is ebpemekengingitel he utew zan ebpemekedsendit."
40008013	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus kes kepitan te, "Ulì ka; ne sumalà is midtuuwan nu iyan daan ed-ul-ulahan ku." Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is suluǥuen kayi te kepitan.
40008014	Ne midhendiyà si Jesus te valey ni Pedro ne zutun neehè din is enuǥang he vahi ni Pedro he edetengen ne kenè en ebpekeenew.
40008015	Ne midampà ni Jesus is belad dà dutun te meritan ne zutundutun neulian. Ne mid-enew haazà is meritan ne midsuba sikandin te ibpekaan din engki Jesus.
40008016	Ne hein mahapun dutun duen nemenelavuk ki Jesus he mezakel he menge etew he ebpen-uwit te mezakel he ebpenlelungen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne mibpemewian ni Jesus sikandan pinaaǥi zà te lalag din ne nengeulian en sikandan. Ne mibpemewian din daan is langun he nengezeruwan ne nengeulian.
40008017	Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su egketuman dutun kes netagnà dengan ni Esaias he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, he egkaǥi te, "In-awè din is menge zaru tew ne mibewian din is menge ebpenggezamen tew."
40008018	Ne sevaha he andew zutun naahà ni Jesus is mezakel he menge etew he nengetiǥum. Ne migkeǥiyan din is menge sumusundan din te, "Edhendiyè kiw te zehipag."
40008019	Ne zutun mid-uvey kandin is sevaha he menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ke sikandin diyà te ki Jesus te, "He Menunudlù, eduma a kenikew minsan hendei ka ebpevayà."
40008020	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Is laku ne zuen surung he egkeubpaan din, ne is tagbis, duen din salag, iyan, siak is migeraran te Kakey te Menusiyà, minsan hendei e zà memekehizegà su wazà ed-ubpaan ku."
40008021	Ne zutun duen sevaha he sumusundan ni Jesus he migkaǥi te, "Datù, ed-ulì e zè pa su kenè e pa ebpekezuma kenikew taman te kenè pa egketapus is umur te amey ku. Ne emun igkeleveng ku en ne human a eduma kenikew."
40008022	Ne midtavak dutun si Jesus te, "Kenà, su iyan edleveng te menge minatey sikan is wazà mekezawat te untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Iyan, sikew mula, duma ka kediey."
40008023	Ne zutun, mid-untud si Jesus te zekelà he avang ne miduma kandin is menge sumusundan din.
40008024	Ne hein diyè dan en te lawed, ne midtekewtekew mebpengeramag te utew mevendes ne egkeselikuvungan en te vaǥel haazà is avang. Iyan, nekelipezeng dutun si Jesus.
40008025	Ne mid-uvayan sikandin te menge zuma zin su ebpukawen dan. "Tevangi key, Datù," ke sikandan, "su egkelavu en heini is avang ne egkengeǥerè kiw en."
40008026	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus, "Maan is egkehandek kew? Maan is kenè kew ebpekesarig kediey?" Ne mid-enew si Jesus ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is keramag wey haazà is menge vaǥel he med-engked dan. Ne zutun mibmelinew utew.
40008027	Nengeinuinu is langun he menge zuma zin. "Hengkey he etawa heini?" ke sikandan, "su minsan is keramag wey menge vaǥel ne ebpemineg kandin!"
40008028	Ne nekezunggù dan diyà te zehipag te ranew diyà te tanà he sakup te inged he Gedara. Ne zuen midsinuǥung ki Jesus dutun he zezuwa he etew he ziyà ebpuun te menge surung te pangpang he penlevengà. Midsuukan haazà is dezuwa te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpekekaid ne tenged kayi egkengehandek is menge etew he ebayà dutun.
40008029	Ne mibensaǥan dan si Jesus, ke sikandan te, "Sikew is Anak te Megbevayà, edsilutan key ve kenikew te wazè pa meuma is midtelaan he timpu?"
40008030	Ne zutun te uvey, duen mezakel he menge vavuy he ebpemenuwal.
40008031	Midhangyù ki Jesus haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, ke sikandan te, "Emun edsegseǥen key kenikew, tuǥuti key he mekesuuk key keniyà te menge vavuy."
40008032	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Egkehimu." Ne mid-awè dan ne midsuukan dan haazà is menge vavuy. Ne is langun he menge vavuy, nemelelaǥuy zan petupang dutun te utew mesilid he kelendiǥan ne mid-agbur zan diyà te ranew zutun ne nengelened dan maamin.
40008033	Ne zuen menge etew he ebpemen-elima zutun te menge vavuy, ne nemenhendiyè dan te inged is ebpemelelaǥuy ne midtudtulan dan is menge etew ke hengkey is nehitavù duen te midsuukan te mezaat he mulin-ulin wey kes menge vavuy.
40008034	Ne hein netuenan heini te menge meǥinged mibeyaan dan si Jesus. Ne hein neuma zan, midhengyuan dan he med-awà sikandin dutun te inged dan.
40009001	Ne zutun mid-untud en maan ensi Jesus te avang ne midlikù diyà te zehipag. Ne mid-ulì diyà te inged din.
40009002	Ne nemekeuma is menge etew he ed-uwit diyà te ki Jesus te minatey is divaluy he lawa zin he ziyà ipehizeǥà te zuyanà he ebintingen. Hein nesavut ni Jesus he zekelà is kedsarig dan kandin, migkeǥiyan din haazà is minatey is divaluy he lawa te, "Mama, mebmeupiya is gehinawa nu, su nepesaylu en is menge salè nu."
40009003	Ne zuen dutun menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan; ne te kegkezineǥa zan dutun, neisip dan he utew zekelà is supak ni Jesus te Megbevayà.
40009004	Ne nesavut ni Jesus is diyà te isip dan ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Maan is ed-isip kew te mezaat he iring keniyan?
40009005	Hendei zapit is egkehimu te etew zà duen, iyan be is kebpesaylu te salè din wey ke iyan is kegkeulii kandin?
40009006	Pinaaǥi te kebewii ku ǥuntaan kayi te etew, ibpeehè ku keniyu he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen ku keǥehem dini te lumpad te kebpesaylu te salà." Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa te, "Sikew, Mama, enew ka; kuwaa nu heeyan is duyanè nu ne ulì ka."
40009007	Ne zutundutun mid-enew haazà is maama ne mid-ulì.
40009008	Hein naahà heini te menge etew zutun, nengehandek dan ne midalig dan is Megbevayà tenged te mibeǥayan din is menusiyà te keǥehem he iring kayi.
40009009	Ne mid-ewaan sikandan ni Jesus ne zutun te ibayè din neehè din is menunukut te vuhis he egngezanan ki Mateo he zutun he timpu ebpimpinuu ziyà te upisina zin. Migkeǥiyan ni Jesus te, "Sunud ka kedì." Ne zutun midhitindeg si Mateo ne midsunud ki Jesus.
40009010	Ne hein egkaan si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din diyà te valey ni Mateo, mezakel is menge menunukut te vuhis wey menge etew he mesinupaken he nemekeuma ne nemengaan duma kandan.
40009011	Duen menge Perisiyu he nekeahà dutun te menge etew. Ne migkeǥiyan dan is menge sumusundan ni Jesus te, "Is egalen niw, maan is egkaan wey ed-inum duma te menge limbungan he menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken?"
40009012	Nezineg haazà ni Jesus ne midtavak sikandin pinaaǥi te sempità, ke sikandin te, "Sikan is wazè din daru, ne kenà egkinahanglan he ebpevawì, kekenà, iyan dà sikan is duen din daru.
40009013	Susiya niw ke hengkey is kehuluǥan duen te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he egkaǥi te, 'Kenè ku iyan egkesuatan is kebpemuhat niw, kekenà, iyan egkesuatan ku is kebpekedhihizuwè niw.'" Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Siak, wazà a medhendini wey ku ikepeengked te ed-ulaula te mezaat is menge metazeng, kekenà, iyan is menge mesinupaken te Megbevayà."
40009014	Ne zutun nekeuma ziyà te ki Jesus is menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu. Ne mid-insè dan te, "Is menge sumusundan nu, maan is kenè dan ebentayan is betasan tew he edsalang egkaan? Sikami mulà wey is menge Perisiyu, layun key edsalang egkaan wey zey mepurungi is ked-azap dey te Megbevayà."
40009015	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Penenglitan, ke zuen eseweey kenà egkehimu he kenà edlipey is menge zuma te ebpengesawa ke kemulu zan pa zuma haazà is ebpengesawa. Ne zutun te timpu he ibpaawè en diyà te kandan sikan is ebpengesawa, human sikandan edsalang egkaan. Iring din ded daan is menge sumusundan ku su te kemulu e pa zini te kandan, kenè dan edsalang egkaan."
40009016	Ne zutun insempità ni Jesus is kenà kebpeked-amur te veǥu he penurù din wey te zaan he tuluuwen. Ke sikandin te, "Is beǥu he manggad he wazè pa megkenseng, kenà meupiya he idapi te kumbalà he merunut en, su emun ebpìpian, ne egkenseng ne egkevindas haazà is daan tenged dutun te veǥu ne tuwas pa he meluag is kegkevindas dutun te kumbalà.
40009017	Iring din ded daan sikan is binu he sikan pa ebeeli he idtaǥù diyà te teleǥuey te vinu he lundis te kambing, su kenà egkehimu he ziyà idtaǥù te zaan he teleǥuey su ebetu haazà is teleǥuey ne egkeulaan is binu ne egkezeetan daan is teleǥuey. Kinahanglan he is binu he sikan pa ebeeli, ne ziyà idtaǥù te veǥu he teleǥuey. Ne zutun kenà egkezeetan haazà is binu wey haazà is teleǥuey."
40009018	Ne te kemulu pa zutun egkaǥikaǥi si Jesus, duen nekeuma he sevaha he pengulu te menge Hudiyu. Ne zutun midluhud sikandin diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus ne midhangyù he ke sikandin te, "Minatey ǥeina is anak ku he vahi, iyan, emun ebayaan nu ne edepenetan nu te velad nu ne egkevanhew sikandin."
40009019	Ne midhitindeg si Jesus ne miduma kandin, ne miduma zaan is menge sumusundan ni Jesus.
40009020	Ne hein diyè dan en te zalan duen mid-uvey he sevaha he vahi ziyà te iniyuǥan ni Jesus. Ne haazà is bahi, duen din daru. Sepulù en wey zezuwa he tuig is kegkevusbusi kandin ne kenà ed-engked. Ne egkeisip din he emun egkekevit din is minsan kumbalè dà ni Jesus, egkeulian en sikandin. Ne zutun nekevit din is sidsid te kumbalà ni Jesus.
40009022	Ne midlingì si Jesus ne neehè din haazà is bahi ne ke sikandin te, "Bayi, kenè ka mahandek; su umba neulian ka te zaru nu su midsarig ka kedì." Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is bahi.
40009023	Ne midlaus dan is edhipanew ne midseled si Jesus diyà te valey zutun te pengulu. Ne hein neehè din is menge memumulalà wey nezineg din is meǥurub tenged te egkengeǥisaweg he menge etew,
40009024	ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus sikandan te, "Pemen-awè kew is langun. Wazà mebpatey heeyan is batà, kekenà, midlipezeng." Ne mid-engitan dutun te menge etew si Jesus.
40009025	Ne hein nemen-awè en haazà is menge etew, ne midseled si Jesus dutun te ruǥu te vatà. Ne migewezan din diyà te velad ne zutundutun mid-enew haazà is batà.
40009026	Ne nevantug heini is neulaula ziyà te langun he menge siringan he menge inged dutun.
40009027	Ne zutun te ked-awà ni Jesus dutun, midtelukun kandin is dezuwa he lakap. Ne haazà is menge lakap, mid-umew zan ki Jesus is edhangyù te, "Kehizuwi key kenikew, su iyan ka kes kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David!"
40009028	Ne hein mid-ulì en si Jesus diyà te valey zin, nekeuma zaan haazà is dezuwa he lakap. Ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Edtuu kew ve he egkeulian ku is mata niw?" Ne midtavak dan te, "Uya, Datù, edtuu key."
40009029	Ne zutun midampà ni Jesus is mata zan ne ke sikandin te, "Berakat he meulii kew tenged te kedtuu niw."
40009030	Ne neulian is menge mata zan. Ne zutundutun nepuwasan is ked-ehè dan. Ne zutun migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan penudtula.
40009031	Iyan, te ked-awè dan dutun nasì dan mibantug si Jesus diyà te langun he menge siringan dutun he inged.
40009032	Ne zutun te wazè pa megenat haazà is menge lakap, nekeuma is menge etew he edumahan dan diyà te ki Jesus is maama he neemew su midsuukan te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
40009033	Ne mibewian heini ni Jesus, ne segugunà dutun nekekaǥi haazà is etew. Ne nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew zutun, ne ke sikandan te, "Sikitew is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, sikan tew pa maahà is iring kayi!"
40009034	Iyan, migkaǥi is menge Perisiyu zutun te, "Is tekinan te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, iyan mibeǥey kandin te ǥehem wey zin mevewii is edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin."
40009035	Ne neeneb ni Jesus is langun he menge inged dutun wey menge unayan. Mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun diyà te seled te menge simbahan dan wey impesavut din diyà te kandan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te kedhadì te Megbevayà. Nengeulian din is menge etew te minsan hengkey he zaru wey ebpenggezamen dan.
40009036	Ne kada zin egkeahà is mezakel he menge etew zutun, egkengehizuwan din sikandan su mezakel is menge seeng dan ne wazà ebpeketavang kandan. Iring sikandan te menge ayam he kerehidu he wazà ed-elima kandan.
40009037	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Mezakel pezem is edawat te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Iring sikandan te kamet he nelutuan en. Meluag heini is kamet, iyan, deisey kiw zà is ebpemenlegtey.
40009038	Iampù niw ziyà te Nengazen he suǥua zin pa zini te kamet din is duma pa he ebpekelegtey."
40010001	Ne midtiǥum ni Jesus diyà te kandin is menge sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din, ne mibeǥayan din sikandan te ǥehem wey zan meulii is edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, wey zan daan mevewii is minsan hengkey he zaru wey ebpenggezamen te menge etew.
40010002	Iyan heini menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan he migeraran ni Jesus he epustul, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, menge suǥù din: iyan lavew kandan si Simon he migeraran ni Jesus ki Pedro; ne zutun daan si Andres he hazi ni Pedro wey is menge anak ni Sibidiyu he si Santiago wey si Juan is hazi ni Santiago.
40010003	Ne zutun daan si Felipe, si Bartolomeo, si Tomas, si Mateo he iyan kes menunukut te vuhis wey si Santiago he anak ni Alpiyu. Duen daan si Tediyu,
40010004	wey si Simon is sevaha he sakup te upakat he Kenenista wey si Hudas kes tigKeriyuti he iyan mibpalad ki Jesus diyà te menge Hudiyu.
40010005	Impehipanew ni Jesus heini is sepulù wey zezuwa. Ke sikandin te, "Kenè kew hendiyà te menge inged te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu wey ziyà te menge inged te Semarya.
40010006	Diyè kew zà penudtul te menge zuma tew he kevuwazan ni Israyil. Iring sikandan te menge kerehidu he nengetazin.
40010007	Ipesavut niw kandan he meǥaan en edhadì te menusiyà is Megbevayà.
40010008	Bewii niw is egkengezeruwan, benhawa niw is ebpatey, bewii niw is menge it-iten wey is ebpenlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Sikan is nezawat niw he ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà ne wazè din peveyazi keniyu, ne kenè niw zaan peveyazi zuen te edtevangan niw.
40010009	Kenè kew med-uwit te vulawan wey selapì wey minsan menge sintabus.
40010010	Kenè kew zaan med-uwit te sundang. Is ed-ilisan he sepatus wey kumbalà wey minsan tuked, ne kenè kew med-uwit. Su is suluǥuen, ibeǥey ziyà te kandin is kinahanglan din.
40010011	Ne emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te inged he zekelà wey minsan deisek he inged, ne pen-ahaa niw is etew he egkesuat he edawat keniyu," ke si Jesus. "Ne ziyè kew pemenahik te valey zin. Ne zutun kew zà uliulì taman te ked-awè niw zutun te inged.
40010012	Ne emun ebpemenahik kew ziyà te sengevaley, ne penubtuvazi niw is ed-ubpà dutun te, 'Tuvazi kew te Megbevayà,'
40010013	su wey metuvazi sikandan te Megbevayà emun edewaten kew zan. Ne emun kenè kew zan igalewǥalew, maambe en, su kenà sikandan edleusan edtuvazi te Megbevayà.
40010014	Ne ke zuen inged he wazà dutun egalewǥalew keniyu, wey ke wazà ebpemineg te ibpesavut niw kandan, ewai niw sikandan wey tektaka niw is menge eliyavuk diyà te menge paa niw he tuus diyà te kandan he edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà.
40010015	Kenè niw lipati heini he lavew pa is idsilut te Megbevayà dutun te inged emun egkeuma keuzemà is andew te kedsilut, kenà te silut din dengan diyà te menge lalung he etew he meǥinged diyà te inged he Suduma wey te inged he Gumura.
40010016	Pemineg kew; edsuǥuen ku en sikiyu ziyà te menge etew he kumekaid. Iyan, sikiyu, kenè kew mulà ebpekekaid. Iring kew te menge kerehidu ne sikandan iring te menge erimaung. Kinahanglan he med-andam kew, iyan, kenè kew mebpesipala te minsan hentei.
40010017	Andam kew su edekepen kew zan, ne ed-uwiten kew zan diyà te hukmanan, ne ebuǥelen kew zan diyà te menge simbahan dan.
40010018	Ebpeǥesen kew zan he mekeetuvang te menge gubirnedur wey menge hadì tenged te kedtuu niw kedì wey niw ikewali is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te kandan wey ziyà daan te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu.
40010019	Ne emun ed-uwiten kew zan diyà te hukmanan, kenè niw ikeseeng ke hengkey is egkeǥiyen niw wey ke hengkey is paaǥi te kegkaǥi niw, su wey niw en egketuenan ke ziyè kew en te etuvangan dan su zutun ibeǥey keniyu is hustu he egkeǥiyen niw.
40010020	Su is egkeǥiyen niw zutun, ne kenà menge lalag he ebpuun te keniyu he isip, kekenà, diyà ebpuun te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he midsuǥù te Amey tew he Megbevayà. Ne heini is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, iyan ebekà te menge vebè niw.
40010021	Su zutun he timpu zuen menge etew he ibpehimetayan dan is menge suled dan. Ne zuen daan menge amey he ibpehimetayan dan is menge anak dan. Ne zuen menge etew he egkuntedahan dan wey ibpehimetayan dan is menge lukes dan.
40010022	Egkuntedahan kew te langun tenged te sumusundan ku sikiyu. Iyan, sikan is edhamen te kedtuu zin kedì taman te ketepusan dutun te menge kemeresayan, ebeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
40010023	Ne emun ebpesipelahan kew zan diyà te sengeinged, pelaǥuy kew pehendiyà te sevaha he inged. Ne venar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he te kenè niw pa egkepasad is ebpeveelan ku keniyu ziyà te langun he menge inged te nasud he Israyil ne edlikù e en is Kakey te Menusiyà.
40010024	Sikan is ebpepenurù, kenè din isipa he lavew sikandin he edtehuzen kenà te ebpenurù kandin. Ne iring din ded is suluǥuen su kenà sikandin egketahud he lavew te egalen din.
40010025	Umba, siak is egalen niw wey ebpenurù keniyu, kinahanglan he egkeiringan a keniyu. Su siak is egalen niw, emun egngezanan a te menge etew ki Endedaman, wey pe be kenà tuwas pa he mezaat is igngazan dan keniyu te menge sakup ku?
40010026	Iyan, kenè kew mahandek te menge etew su is ulaula zan he edtembunan dan, ebpekelepew zed su is minsan hengkey he kenè dan egkeǥiyen, ibpemeǥawaǥawa.
40010027	Is menge lalag ku he iyan kew zà nekezineg, ipenudtul niw ziyà te minsan hentei. Is idnaasnaas ku keniyu, isangyew niw ziyà te langun he menge etew.
40010028	Kenè kew mahandek te menge etew zà duen su iyan dà egkepatey zan is lawa niw; ne kenè dan egkepatey is gimukud niw. Iyan ikehandek niw is Megbevayà su egkepatey zin is lawa wey minsan is gimukud niw pinaaǥi te Impirnu.
40010029	Egkepemasa ta is dezuwa he zezeisey he tagbis te sengesintabus dà su utew minus is bali zan. Ne minsan pa zutun wazà minsan sevaha kandan he ebpatey ne egkeulug diyà te tanà emun kenà egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà.
40010030	Iyan, sikiyu, edlavew pa is ked-elimahi zin keniyu su minsan is menge bulvul te ulu niw, mibilang din en.
40010031	Umba kenè kew mahandek su lavew kew pa he mahal ziyà te kandin, kenà te utew mezakel he menge tagbis.
40010032	Sikan is egkaǥi ziyà te menge etew he iyan a egalen din, ed-engkenen ku zaan sikandin diyà te etuvangan te Amey ku he ziyà te langit.
40010033	Iyan, sikan is egkaǥi ziyà te menge etew he kenà a iyan egalen din, kenè ku zaan sikandin ed-engkenen diyà te etuvangan te Amey ku he ziyà te langit.
40010034	Kenè niw isipa he midhendini a te kelibutan su wey wazè en kesamuk te menusiyà. Wazà a medhendini wey zuen kelinew su tenged te kedhendini ku ebpekunkuntedahà is menusiyà.
40010035	Su tenged te kedhendini ku, egkuntedahan is maama te anak din he maama. Ne egkuntedahan is bahi te anak din he vahi. Ne egkuntedahan daan is bahi te ambey zin.
40010036	Ne iyan egkekuntada te etew is menge megeget he kezuzumahi zin.
40010037	Ke zuen etew he iyan mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is amey zin wey iney zin kenà siak, kenà dait sikandin he egngezanan he sumusundan ku. Ne ke iyan mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is anak din kenà siak, kenà daan sikandin dait he egngezanan he sumusundan ku.
40010038	Minsan hentei he kenà edsundan kedì ne kenè din edtiangen is krus din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenè din edtumanen is menge suǥù ku su kela ke iyan ibpatey zin, kenà dait sikandin he egngezanan he sumusundan ku.
40010039	Sikan is egkenuǥunan din is untung din dini te kelibutan, nasì egkeawà diyà te kandin is untung din. Iyan, sikan is edtumanen din is menge suǥù ku, minsan ke iyan ibpatey zin, ebeǥayan sikandin te untung he wazà din pidtemanan.
40010040	Is etew he edawat keniyu, edawat daan kediey; ne is edawat kediey, edawat daan te Megbevayà he midsugù kedì.
40010041	Ke zuen etew he edawat te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà tenged te Megbevayà is ebpenaub dutun te midawat din, ebpekeambit haazà is etew te suhul te Megbevayà dutun te ebpeneuven din. Ne ke zuen etew he edawat te metazeng he etew tenged te metazeng is ulaula zutun te etew, ebpekeambit sikandin te suhul te Megbevayà dutun te metazeng he etew.
40010042	Ne kenè niw lipati he ke zuen etew he minsan sengetasa zà he wahig is ibpeinum din te minsan hentei he sumusundan ku, ne iyan ibpeinuma zin dutun is tenged te sumusundan ku haazà is ebpekeinum, ne kenà egkehimu he kenà sikandin edsuhulan te Megbevayà. Ne minsan ke utew minus is pid-etawan dutun te sumusundan he ibpeinum din, kenà egkehimu he kenà sikandin edsuhulan."
40011001	Ne hein nepasad ni Jesus heini is kedseyseya zin te menge suǥù din dutun te sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din, mid-awà sikandin dutun ne midhipanew su ibpenurù din wey ibpesavut din is Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te menge siringan dutun he inged.
40011002	Ne ziyà te pirisuwan midtudtulan si Juan Megbebewtismu mehitenged te menge egkein-inuwan he mibeelan ni Jesu Kristu, ne midsuǥù ni Juan is menge sumusundan din wey zan meinsai si Jesus.
40011003	"Keleduwi key," egkaǥi haazà is menge suǥù ni Juan diyà te ki Jesus, "ke iyan ke ve kes migkaǥi ni Juan he netagnà is kebpekeuma zin dini te kelibutan wey ke zuen pe be ebpeebuten dey."
40011004	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Likù kew en ziyà te ki Juan ne tudtula niw ziyà te kandin is nengeehè niw he mid-ulaula ku wey is nengezineg niw he egkeǥiyen te menge etew. Iyan niw tudtula kandin he tenged kedì ebpemekeehè en is menge lakap, ne ebpemekehipanew en is menge piang, nengeulian en is menge it-iten wey ebpemekezineg en is menge vengel. Mibanhew ku is nemematey wey impesavut ku ziyà te menge egkengeayuayu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Utew deyzey is etew he kenà eduwazuwa he iyan a sikan is midsuǥù te Megbevayà."
40011007	Ne hein nekeǥenat en haazà is menge sumusundan ni Juan, migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te mezakel he nengetiǥum he menge etew, ke sikandin te, "Hein midhilesung niw si Juan diyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew, hengkey is inhilesunga niw kandin? Iyan be ed-ahaan niw is etew he iring te sagbet he egkengewaleng te keramag? Kenà iyan haazà su kenà egkehalinhalin is gehinawa ni Juan.
40011008	Midhilesung niw ve is etew he utew meupiya is bisti zin? Kenà daan, su is menge etew he iring dutun, diyè dà egkaahà te turuǥan te hadì.
40011009	Ne hengkey is inhilesunga niw? Ed-ehè kew ve te etew he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà? Iyan haazà tutuu he ed-ahaan niw su ebpeneuven iyan si Juan. Iyan, kenà te ebpeneuven dà
40011010	su pinaaǥi ki Juan netuman en kes netagnà diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà su migkaǥi zutun is Megbevayà te, 'Iyan heini kes etew he edsuǥuen ku. Ibpehuna ku sikandin kenikew wey zin mehiǥewani is ibayè nu.'"
40011011	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Tentenuzi niw he si Juan Megbebewtismu, wazè pa etew he nekelavew kandin, iyan, ke edhadì keuzemà is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, is minsan hentei he etew zutun he ebpezumazuma te Megbevayà, minsan utew minus is pid-etawan din, ne lavew pa kenà si Juan guntaan.
40011012	Puun pa zutun te kebpesavut ni Juan taman en guntaan, is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, edteǥel he mekehadì, ne edteǥel zaan is menge etew wey zan mekepehadì kandin.
40011013	Su is kedhadì te Megbevayà, netagnà dengan te langun he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà wey netagnà daan ni Moises su egkeehè ta ziyà te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin din. Ne netagnà daan ni Juan.
40011014	Ne emun edtuu kew te impesavut dan, egketuenan niw he iyan en si Juan si Elias su midtagnè dan is kebpekelikù ni Elias.
40011015	Heini is nezineg niw, sevuta niw.
40011016	Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, iyan ebpetug-iringan ku keniyu is menge vatà. Su is menge vatà, ne ebpememimpinuu zan diyà te tiyenggiyan is ebevaleyvaley. Ne ebpeum-umawè dan is egkaǥi te,
40011017	'Edtemburan dey sikiyu ne kenè kew edsayew, ne edlelendag key ne kenè kew zaan edtampu.'
40011018	Su hein neehè niw si Juan is edsalang egkaan ne kenà daan ed-inum te vinu, ne migkaǥi niw he midsuukan sikandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
40011019	Ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, wazà a medsalang megkaan ne mid-inum a mulà te vinu ne neinuinu kew ne migkaǥi niw he vuleǥuk a wey pereinum te vinu. Ne ke sikiyu zaan he emiǥu a te menge lalung he etew iring te menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken. Iyan," ke si Jesus, "egketuusan ta he utew metau is Megbevayà pinaaǥi te egkeveelan din."
40011020	Ne zutun, is menge meǥinged kayi te menge inged he mibpaahaan ni Jesus te mezakel he egkengein-inuwan, midsawey zin su wazè dan iniyuǥi is memezaat he ulaula.
40011021	Ne ke sikandin te, "Mekehizuhizu kew is menge tigKurasin! Mekehizuhizu kew zaan is menge tigBitsayda. Su is menge egkein-inuwan he impeehè ku ziyan te inged niw te menge Hudiyu, angin ke midhimu ku heini ziyà te menge inged he Tiru wey Sidun he kenà menge Hudiyu is meǥinged dutun, su nekekukumbalè dan en pezem te saku ne nepen-evuwan dan is ulu zan he tuus te ed-iniyuǥan dan en is memezaat he ulaula.
40011022	Kenè niw lipati he zutun keuzemà te andew te kedsusi te Megbevayà te menusiyà, lavew is idsilut din keniyu kenà te menge etew ziyà te Tiru wey Sidun.
40011023	Ne sikiyu zaan," ke si Jesus, "is menge tigKepirnaum, iyan egkesuatan niw pezem is deliǥa kew te minsan hentei, iyan, igketimbag kew ziyà te Impirnu. Su is egkengein-inuwan he impeehè ku ziyan te inged niw, angin ke ingkepaahà dengan diyà te menge tigSuduma su kenà egkezezeetan te Megbevayà is inged dan, ne kemulu pa pezem guntaan.
40011024	Kenè niw lipati he keuzemà te andew te kedsusi te Megbevayà te menusiyà, lavew is silut din keniyu kenà te menge tigSuduma."
40011025	Ne zutun mid-ampù si Jesus he egkaǥi te, "Amey ku he Nengazen te langit wey tanà, dekelà is kebpeselemati ku kenikew su is in-eles nu wey kenà mesavut te menge uluwanen wey uvag en memetau, impesavut nu en diyà te menge etew he wazè dan menge hanew.
40011026	Umba ebpeselematan ku su midhimu nu heini te iring kayi tenged te iyan egkesuatan nu tenged te ǥaǥew nu."
40011027	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, "Is minsan hengkey, insarig kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Wazà nesayud kedì te Anak te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan dà is Amey ku he Megbevayà. Ne wazà daan nesayud te Amey ku he Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan e zà is Anak din wey sikan is menge etew he mibpengelinteuwan ku he mesayud dan kandin.
40011028	Hendini kew te kediey, sikiyu is langun he nengeveley tenged te ked-uwit te menge meveǥat he ulaula su ibpehimeley ku sikiyu.
40011029	Beeli niw is idsuǥù ku keniyu ne pepenurù kew kedì ne ebpekehimeley kew su kenà a eengeren ne kenà a ebpenlupig te minsan hentei.
40011030	Is kedì he idsuǥù keniyu, melemu; ne kenà mereǥen is ebpeveelan ku keniyu."
40012001	Ne wazà utew meuǥet dutun, ne andew he Sebadu. Ne iyan haazà he andew, insuǥù dengan te Megbevayà te menge Hudiyu he wazà etew he ibpevaal zutun te andew su iyan Andew te Kedhimeley. Ne zutun he andew ingkevayà eni Jesus is pemuleey. Ne zutun egkengevitil is menge sumusundan din ne mibpengetu zan te menge trigu ne migkaan dan is beǥas dutun.
40012002	Ne naahà haazà te menge Perisiyu ne migkeǥiyan dan si Jesus te, "Ahaa nu is menge sumusundan nu su edsupaken dan is insuǥù kenitew te Megbevayà su maan is midlegtey zan kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley."
40012003	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenà egkehimu he wazè niw mevasa ziyà te ingkesurat dengan kes mid-ulaula ni Hadì David. Sikandin wey is menge sundaru zin, nengevitil zan.
40012004	Ne wazà sikandin mekesalà minsan te midseled diyà te Valey te Megbevayà ne sikandin wey is menge sakup din, migkaan dan is egkeenen he insavuk diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà. Ne supak te kesuǥuan haazà is kegkeena zan dutun su iyan dà ebpekekaan dutun he egkeenen is menge memumuhat.
40012005	Kenà daan egkehimu he wazè niw mevasa ziyà te ingkesurat ni Moises he is menge memumuhat diyà te Valey te Megbevayà, emun Andew te Kedhimeley kenè dan edhimeley, ne minsan pa zutun kenè dan ebpekesalà.
40012006	Tutuu heini is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he zuen nekeuma kayi te keniyu he lavew pa kenà is Baley te Megbevayà.
40012007	Duen daan insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he egkaǥi te, 'Kenà iyan mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku is menge pemuhat niw, kekenà, iyan is kegkehizu niw te zuma niw.'" Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Ke hustu is kedsevuta niw kayi te ingkesurat, wazè niw ǥeina mesewayi is wazè din salà.
40012008	Su siak is migeraran he Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan a zuen keǥehem te egkaǥi ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan te etew emun Andew te Kedhimeley."
40012009	Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun, ne midhendiyà te sevaha he simbahan.
40012010	Ne zutun te seled te simbahan, duen etew he minatey is menge uǥat te zivaluy he velad din. Duen daan dutun menge etew he ebpen-ahà te paaǥi he ikesumbung dan si Jesus he nekesupak te kesuǥuan. Ne mid-insaan dan sikandin te, "Emun Andew te Kedhimeley, ke ebewian ta is egkezeruwan wey meulii, ebpekesupak ki ve te kesuǥuan?"
40012011	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Ke zuen kerehidu te minsan hentei kenitew ne egkeulug diyà te vitu te Andew te Kedhimeley, kenà egkehimu he kenè din igaun puun dutun te vitu minsan ke Andew te Kedhimeley.
40012012	Ne is etew, lavew pa he mahal kenà te kerehidu. Ne tenged dutun kenè ki ebpekesupak te kesuǥuan ke edtevangan ta is etew minsan ke Andew te Kedhimeley."
40012013	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is etew he minatey is menge uǥat te zivaluy he velad din te, "Ketenga nu, Mama, is belad nu." Ne migketeng dutun te etew is belad din ne zutundutun neulian haazà he wazà pigeyanan din iring dutun te zivaluy he velad din.
40012014	Ne mid-awà dutun is menge Perisiyu ne mibpelelelaǥè dan ke hengkey is paaǥi he mehimu zan he mepatey si Jesus.
40012015	Ne hein netuenan ni Jesus is ed-isipen dutun te menge Perisiyu, mid-awà sikandin dutun, ne zuen mezakel he menge etew he nemenduma kandin. Ne neulian din is langun dutun he nengezeruwan,
40012016	ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan he kenè dan tudtula te zuma haazà is mid-ulaula zin.
40012017	Umba nekaǥi zin heini su egketuman sikan is Lalag te Megbevayà he netagnà dengan ni Esaias he edhenduen te,
40012018	"Iyan heini suluǥuen he pinilì ku. Iyan sikandin utew ku minahal ne utew ku egkesuati is menge vaal zin. Ebpeulinan ku sikandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne is metazeng he kukuman ku, edtudtulen din diyà te tivuuk he menusiyà.
40012019	Ne kenà sikandin ebpekidlawan; kenà daan ebpemensag; kenà daan egkezineg sikandin he edikursu ziyà te menge kersada te inged.
40012020	Kenè din edlekaan is meluya is kedtuu zin kandin. Su edtevangan din is minsan hentei, minsan sikan is deisek is kedsarig din kandin. Kenà ed-engked ebpenudtul taman te ebpekeeneb diyà te minsan hendei is metazeng he ulaula.
40012021	Ne ebpekesarig kandin is menge etew ziyà te langun he menge nasud."
40012022	Ne zutun duen nemekeuma he menge etew he zuen miduma zan he maama he nelakap wey neemew tenged te midsuukan sikandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne mibewian haazà ni Jesus ne segugunà nekekaǥi wey nekeahà.
40012023	Nengeinuinu is mezakel he menge etew zutun ne ke sikandan te, "Kela ke iyan sikandin kes netagnà he kevuwazan ni Hadì David."
40012024	Ne zuen menge Perisiyu zutun ne hein nezineg dan haazà migkaǥi zan te, "Umba zuen gehem din he ebpekeulì te edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin su iyan mibeǥey kandin te ǥehem si Endedaman, sikan is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin."
40012025	Iyan, nesavut ni Jesus is diyà te isip dan, ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Ke zuen hadì, ne ebpetebtebekà is menge sakup din, meǥaan egkeawà is gehem din te kedhadì. Ne ke zuen edlingahaan te sengevelayan ne emun kenà ne sengezetuan, ne ebpekungkuntedahà haazà is menge sakup dutun ne egkevengkag haazà is edetuan din.
40012026	Umba, ke pinaaǥi te ǥehem ni Setanas egkezaag ku is gehem ni Setanas, egketebek din bes is menge sakup din ne egkezezeetan din is gehem din.
40012027	Emun iyan ibpenegseg ku te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin is gehem he ebpuun diyà te ki Setanas ne hendei ves ebpuun is gehem te menge zuma niw he ebpenegseg te mezaat he mulin-ulin? Pinaaǥi te menge ulaula te menge sumusundan niw egketuusan he nengesayep kew.
40012028	Su heini is gehem ku te kebpemuǥew te mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne ziyà ebpuun te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he Megbevayà. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egketuusan he iyan en heini sikan is timpu te kedhadì te Megbevayà.
40012029	Nezaag ku en si Setanas umba igkepaawè ku is menge sakup din, su wazà minsan hentei he ebpekeseled te valey te mezesen he etew wey zin maaǥew is menge azen dutun te mezesen he etew, emun kenè din egkehunà egkevakus haazà is mezesen he etew. Kinahanglan he ebekusen din edhunai, ne human din egkeaǥew is menge azen dutun te mezesen he etew.
40012030	Sikan is kenè ku zuma, kuntada ku; sikan is kenà edtavang kedì, edsanggen kediey.
40012031	Umba, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he egkepesaylu pa is etew te minsan hengkey he salè din wey minsan hengkey he mezaat he egkeǥiyen din, iyan, sikan is edsumpalit te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kenà egkepesaylu.
40012032	Sikan is edsumpalit kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà, egkepesaylu pa; iyan, sikan is edsumpalit te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kenè en egkepesaylu te wazè din pidtemanan.
40012033	Is kayu he wazè din erat, ne meupiya is beǥas din. Ne is kayu he zuen din erat, ne mezaat is beǥas din. Egkekilala is kayu pinaaǥi te veǥas din.
40012034	Iring din ded daan kayi te keniyu. Wazà meupiya he egkekaǥi niw su memezaat is ulaula niw. Iring kew te menge uled su ebpekekaid kew! Is diyà te ǥehinawa te etew, iyan edlepew ziyà te vèbè din.
40012035	Is etew he meupiya is ulaula zin, ne meupiya zaan is kebpemèbè din. Is etew he mezaat is ulaula zin, ne mezaat daan is kebpemèbè din.
40012036	Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he zutun keuzemà te andew te kedsusi, ed-insaan te Megbevayà is minsan hentei, ke maan is nekekaǥi sikandin te wazà pulus he menge lalag.
40012037	Su pinaaǥi te menge lalag he nenggawas diyà te vèbè niw ne zutun egkeahà keuzemà ke egkesilutan kew ve wey ke kenà."
40012038	Ne zutun migkaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey menge Perisiyu te, "He Menunudlù, ipeehè key kenikew te singyal."
40012039	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, utew mezaat is menge ulaula niw. Wazè en diyà te gehinawa niw is kebmahala te Megbevayà. Maan is ed-ehè kew te singyal? Iyan dà singyal he ibpaahà keniyu is iring duen te singyal he impeulaula zuen te tipehuna he ebpeneuven he si Jonas.
40012040	Su nekeseled si Jonas diyà te ǥetek te zekelà he pait seled te tetelu he andew. Ne iring din ded daan, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpekeseled a ziyà te zizalem te tanà seled te tetelu he andew.
40012041	Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum te Megbevayà, edsewayen kew is menge etew ǥuntaan te menge tigNinivi zengan su hein nezineg dan is penurù ni Jonas, mid-iniyuǥan dan is memezaat he ulaula zan. Ne ǥuntaan duen ebpeneuven he lavew pa kenà si Jonas dini te keniyu, ne sikiyu mulà, wazè niw zewata is penurù din.
40012042	Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum edsewayen kew zaan duen te singyuda zengan he ziyà ebpuun te inged he Siba su utew meziyù is midhipenawan din te kebpemineg dà te penurù ni Hadì Sulumun te utew metau. Ne ǥuntaan duen ebpenurù he lavew pa kenà si Sulumun dini te keniyu ne sikiyu mulà, wazè niw zewata is penurù din.
40012043	Ke ed-awà is mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpuun diyà te etew he edlelungen din, diyà ebayà te memaza he tanà su ebpen-ahà te egkeubpaan din. Ne emun wazè din egkaahà,
40012044	egkaǥi si kandin te, 'Edlikù a nasì diyà te neubpaan ku.' Ne edlikù ne egkeehè din haazà is neubpaan din he wazà taǥù ne midtines en is menge vutang dutun ne nepurung melumpiyuwi.
40012045	Ne zutun edlikù edhipanew su ebpengakat te pitu he zuma zin he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he tuwas pa he memezaat kenà sikandin. Ne ed-ahuk dan ne ed-ubpè dan dutun te etew. Ne zutun ed-iseg pa ebmezaat is kebpekesavuk dutun te etew kenà te nehuna he kebpekesavuk din. Iring dutun is egkeulaula te menge etew ǥuntaan su ed-iseg ebmezaat is kebpekesavuk dan."
40012046	Ne te kemulu pa ebpekidlalag si Jesus dutun te menge etew, nekeuma is iney zin wey menge hazi zin he maama. Ne edtaǥad dan ki Jesus diyà te ǥawas su zuen egkeǥiyen dan kandin.
40012047	Ne migkeǥiyan si Jesus te etew zutun te, "Ahaa nu is iney nu wey menge hazi nu zutun su zuen dan kun egkeǥiyen kenikew."
40012048	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Duen ku pa ibpaahà keniyu he iney ku wey menge suled ku."
40012049	Ne zutun intezù din is menge sumusundan din te migkaǥi te, "Heini zed is iney ku wey menge suled ku.
40012050	Su is minsan hentei he edtuman te egkesuatan te Amey tew he ziyà te langit, iyan daan iney ku, menge suled ku he maama, wey suled ku he vahi."
40013001	Ne zutun he andew mid-awà si Jesus diyà te valey, ne midhendiyà te ranew ne mibpinuu ziyà te veyvey zutun.
40013002	Ne zuen mezakel he menge etew he midtiǥum diyà te kandin. Ne ǥeina te utew zan mezakel, mid-untud si Jesus te avang ne zutun mebpinuu. Ne is menge etew, diyè dan dà te veyvey is ebpememineg kandin.
40013003	Ne zutun mezakel is impenurù din kandan pinaaǥi te menge sempità. Ke sikandin te, "Duen etew he midhendiyà te pemuleey zin su ebpemula.
40013004	Ne zutun te kebpemula zin duen benì he nengeulug diyà te zalan, ne heini migkaan te menge tagbis.
40013005	Ne zuen daan benì he nengeulug ne nemekeuntud diyà te menge vatu he utew zà menipis is tanà he nekeapid dutun te menge vatu. Ne haazà petuluy zà midtuvù su menipis haazà is tanà.
40013006	Asal hein mid-andew, neǥangu petuluy haazà is menge pinemula su mevavew zà is nesenevan te zalid dan.
40013007	Ne zuen daan benì he nengeulug diyà te tanà he menge zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun. Ne mibmemelayat heini is sagbet ne mibpengulembezan dan haazà is pinemula.
40013008	Ne zuen daan benì he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà ne nemeǥas mulà heini. Duen dutun menge pinemula he mibeǥas te tigketluan. Ne zuen daan dutun menge pinemula he mibeǥas te tigkeneman. Ne zuen daan dutun pinemula he mibeǥas te tignenggatus."
40013009	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw."
40013010	Ne mid-uvayan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din, ke sikandan te, "Hengkey is ketezengan ke maan is migamit ka te menge sempità dutun te kebpenurù nu te menge etew?"
40013011	Ne midtavak kandan si Jesus te, "Sikan is in-eles dengan mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà, impesavut en keniyu te menge sumusundan ku, iyan, is duma he menge etew, id-eles heini kandan.
40013012	Su is etew he neketuu wey zuen kedsavut din, ed-umanan pa te Megbevayà te kedsavut su wey mehustu is kedsavut din. Iyan, sikan is kenà edtuu, id-awà te Megbevayà diyà te kandin sikan is deisey he nesavut din.
40013013	Umba ebpenurù a kandan pinaaǥi te menge sempità. Su edtengteng dan, iyan, kenè dan ebpekeahà, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, ebpemineg dan, iyan, henduen be te wazè dan mekezineg su kenè dan edsevuten.
40013014	Netuman en diyà te kandan kes insurat ni Esaias he migkaǥi te Megbevayà su ke sikandin te, 'Ebpurung dan ebpemineg, iyan, kenè dan ebpekesavut. Ebpurung dan edtengteng, iyan kenè dan ebpekeahà.
40013015	Su heini he menge etew, midmezesen is isip dan. Edsebpengen dan is telinga zan, edlipezengen dan is menge mata zan. Su emun kenà, ebpekeehè dan ne ebpekezineg dan, ne egkesavut dan is hustu ne edsarig dan kedì ne edlibriyen ku sikandan.'"
40013016	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Iyan, sikiyu mulà, dekelà utew is kelipey niw su metau kew ed-ahà wey metau kew ebpemineg.
40013017	Isipa niw heini he zengan mezakel is ebpeneuven wey menge tumutuu te Megbevayà he egkesuat pezem he meehè dan heini is egkeehè niw wey mezineg dan heini is egkezineg niw en, iyan, wazà ituǥut kandan."
40013018	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Pemineg kew wey niw mesavut is kehuluǥan kayi te sempità te keaǥi te etew he ebpemula.
40013019	Ke zuen menge etew he egkezineg dan is lalag mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè dan edsevuten, ne iring haazà te venì he ziyà mengeulug te zalan. Edlepew si Setanas ne ed-eǥawen din haazà is lalag he nezineg dan.
40013020	Ne is benì he ziyà mengeulug te menipis he tanà he zivavew te vatu, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he is nemekezineg duen, ne utew zan egkesuati te ebpemineg.
40013021	Iyan, kenà egkeheǥet is kedtuu zan ne kenà egkeuǥet ke egkeumahan sikandan te samuk wey ke kemeresayan be tenged te kedewata zan te Lalag te Megbevayà, edlikù dan diyà te zaan he ulaula zan.
40013022	Ne sikan is benì he ziyà mengeulug te tanà he zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun, iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he iyan nemekezineg duen is menge etew he ebpemineg, iyan, egkelipatan dan tenged te menge seeng dan kayi te kelibutan wey tenged te kegkesuat dan te selapì. Ne tenged kayi is Lalag te Megbevayà, kenà ebpulus diyà te kandan.
40013023	Ne sikan is benì he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he is nemekezineg duen, nesavut dan, ne ebpulus diyà te kandan. Is duma, ne ebpulus te zeisek diyà te kandan; ne is duma, ne ebpulus te malù dekelà; ne is duma, ebpulus te utew zekelà diyà te kandan."
