40013024	Ne impenurù daan ni Jesus is selakew pa maan he sempità. Ke sikandin te, "Is kedhadì te Megbevayà, ne iring te etew he zuen impemula zin he meupiya he pinemula ziyà te pemuleey zin.
40013025	Ne sengekezukileman dutun te nekelipezeng sikandin, nekeuma is kuntada zin ne midsewezan dutun te kuntada zin haazà is pemuleey zin te menge veǥas te mezaat he pinemula ne human med-ulì.
40013026	Ne hein midtuvù haazà is meupiya he pinemula, midtuvù daan haazà is mezaat he pinemula.
40013027	Ne zutun, is menge suluǥuen dutun te etew, midhendiyè dan te kandin ne ke sikandan te, 'Datù, iyan tew impemula ziyà te pemuleey nu is meupiya he pinemula, ne hendei vuwa ebpuun heini is memezaat he pinemula?'
40013028	Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, 'Iyan mibpemula zuen sikan is kuntada ku.' Ne ke sikandan te, 'Ebpemezuten dey ve wey ke kenà?'
40013029	Ne ke sikandin te, 'Kenè niw zè pa, su kela ke mekeragkes sikan is memeupiya.
40013030	Ebpesegdanen tew zè pa taman te egkeuma is tiraǥun, ne human ku ibpepemazut te ebpemenlegtey is memezaat he pinemula, ne ibpepemagkes ku kandan su ebinsulan. Ne is memeupiya he pinemula, ibpezerengdeng ku mulà is beǥas dan.'"
40013031	Ne impenurù en maan ni Jesus is selakew pa he sempità. "Is ked-iseg kebmahabet te edhedian te Megbevayà," ke sikandin, "ne iring te pinemula he utew zeisek is lisu.
40013032	Ibpemula heini te etew ziyà te pemuleey zin ne ke edtuvù ne edekelà, egkehimu he iyan utew zekelà te langun he menge pinemula he edlumbayen. Iring kezekelà te kayu ne egkeletunan te menge tagbis ne egkeseselaǥan dan is menge subpang dutun."
40013033	Ne impenurù ni Jesus kandan is selakew pa maan he sempità. Ke sikandin te, "Is kebmezakel te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring daan te tapey. Su ke zuen bahi he ebaal te supas egkuwaan din is tapey ne idsahug din te sengebisin he erina. Ne edtulin haazà is erina," ke si Jesus.
40013034	Ne heini is langun, ne impenurù ni Jesus diyà te mezakel he menge etew pinaaǥi te menge sempità. Minsan hengkey he impenurù din kandan, ne pinaaǥi te sempità.
40013035	Umba neveelan din heini su egketuman kes netagnà dengan te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, "Ibpenurù ku kandan is menge sempità. Ibpenudtul ku kandan is in-eles dengan puun pa te kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan taman en guntaan."
40013036	Ne zutun mid-ewaan ni Jesus haazà is mezakel he menge etew ne midseled sikandin diyà te valey. Ne is menge sumusundan din, midtelukun dan kandin, ne ke sikandan te, "Luwasa nu kenami ke hengkey is kehuluǥan te menge mezaat he pinemula ziyà te kamet he zuen te sempitè nu."
40013037	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan a sikan is etew he ebpemula te meupiya he pinemula.
40013038	Haazà is pemuleey, ne iyan heini is kelibutan; ne haazà is menge meupiya he pinemula, ne iyan heini is menge etew he ebpahadì te Megbevayà; ne sikan is menge mezaat he pinemula, ne iyan is menge sakup ni Setanas.
40013039	Ne sikan is kuntada te etew, ne iyan en si Setanas. Ne is tiraǥun, iyan is ketepusan he timpu; ne sikan is ebpemenlegtey, iyan is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.
40013040	Ne haazà is ebezuten dan he menge mezaat he pinemula he ebinsulan dan, iyan haazà egkehitavù keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu,
40013041	su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, edsuǥuen ku is menge velinsuǥuen ku ne id-awè dan puun te ǥinhedian ku is ebpemenuley wey is ebpemen-ulaula te mezaat.
40013042	Ne zutun idtimbag sikandan diyà te hapuy ne zutun ebpemekekulahì dan ne ebpemekengingitel zan tenged te utew zan ebpemekedsendit.
40013043	Ne zutun, is menge metazeng mulà, iring te andew is anlag dan diyà te ǥinhedian te Amey zan he Megbevayà. Sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw.
40013044	Is kedhadì te Megbevayà ne iring daan te vulawan he inggadung diyà te pemuleey. Duen etew he neketuredu zutun ne midtembunan din umani he utew sikandin nelipey ne mid-ulì ne imbelegyè din is langun he menge azen din ne midlikù dutun ne mibpemasa zin haazà is pemuleey.
40013045	Is kedhadì te Megbevayà, ne iring daan te etew he ebpemasa te menge utew meupiya he mahal he ebelieǥen he egngezanan te perlas.
40013046	Ne ke egkeehè din is sevaha he perlas he utew pa mahal, ibelegyè din is langun he azen din ne ebpemesahan din haazà.
40013047	Ne is kedhadì te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, ne iring te laya he intaan diyà te ranew wey mekeutel te minsan hengkey he kelasi te pait.
40013048	Ne emun mezakel en he menge pait is ebpekeahuk dutun, eguyuzen te menge etew haazà diyà te ǥeunan. Ne ebpinuu zan su ed-eramen dan is memeupiya zutun te pait ne id-ahuk dan diyà te menge ambung. Ne is kenà meupiya, idtimbag dan.
40013049	Ne keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu, iring kayi is egkeulaula su ebpenhipanew is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ne edtepizen dan is menge lalung wey menge metazeng he etew.
40013050	Ne is menge lalung, idtimbag dan diyà te hapuy. Ne sikan is menge lalung, ne ebpekekulahì dan wey ebpemekengingitel tenged te utew zan ebpemekedsendit."
40013051	Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te, "Egkesavut niw ve heini is egkeǥiyen ku?" "Uya, Datù, egkesavut dey," ke sikandan.
40013052	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Ne tenged kayi," ke sikandin, "ke zuen menunudlù te kesuǥuan he nekesundan te hadì tew he Megbevayà, ebpekeiring sikandin te etew he zekelà is ketiǥeyunan din diyà te valey zin. Su kenà iyan dà igkepenurù din is kinezaan, kekenà, igkepenurù din daan is beǥu."
40013053	Ne hein nepasad ni Jesus haazà is kebpenurua zin kandan kayi te menge sempità, mid-awà sikandin dutun ne
40013054	mid-ulì diyà te inged din. Ne ziyà te simbahan mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun. Nengeinuinu is menge etew he mibpemineg kandin. Ke sikandan te, "Hentei vuwa is nekepenurù kandin? Maan is metau sikandin ebaal te menge egkein-inuwan?
40013055	Anak dà sikandin te pandey. Ne si Maria is iney zin; ne menge hazi zin, ensi Santiago, si Jose, si Simon, wey si Hudas.
40013056	Ne is menge etevey zin, ne zini zaan sikandan ebpen-ubpà. Maan is metau sikandin wey maan is ebpekehimu sikandin te egkengein-inuwan he iring kayi?"
40013057	Ne tenged kayi wazè dan medtuu kandin. Ne zutun migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, kenà sikandin edtehuzen te menge etew ziyà te keugelingen din he inged; iyan, diyà te menge zuma he inged edtehuzen mulà sikandin," ke si Jesus.
40013058	Umba kenà mezakel is impeehè din dutun he egkein-inuwan su wazè dan kedtuu kandin.
40014001	Ne zutun he timpu nezineg ni Hadì Hirudis is tudtul mehitenged te ulaula ni Jesus.
40014002	Ne migkaǥi si Hirudis diyà te menge suluǥuen din te, "Heini si Jesus, siguradu he iyan ded si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew, ne tenged kayi zuen din gehem wey zin meveeli is menge iring kayi he singyal," ke sikandin.
40014003	Ne iyan hinungdan te kegkehimetayi ki Juan, su midsawey zin si Hirudis he migkaǥi te, "Nekesupak ka te kesuǥuan su mid-esawa nu si Hirudyas," ke sikandin. Ipag ni Hirudis si Hirudyas, su esawa te hazi zin he si Felipe. Ne tenged dutun te kedsewaya kandin ni Juan impezakep ni Hirudis si Juan ne mibpirisu zin. Edhimetayan din pezem si Juan, iyan, egkehandek te menge Hudiyu su netuenan dan he ebpeneuven si Juan te Megbevayà.
40014006	Ne neuma is andew he edsilibrahan ni Hirudis is ked-enaka kandin, ne midseyawan te anak he raǥa ni Hirudyas is menge etew he nengetiǥum dutun. Ne utew nesuat si Hirudis tenged dutun.
40014007	Ne mibpesarig din haazà is midsayew. Ke sikandin te, "Buyù ka te minsan hengkey, ne ibeǥey ku kenikew."
40014008	Ne zutun tenged te impenurù te iney zin, migkeǥiyan din si Hirudis te, "Iveǥey nu kedì kayi, ǥuntaan dà, is ulu ni Juan Megbebewtismu he id-ahuk diyà te pinggan."
40014009	Ne zutun utew neseeng haazà is hadì, iyan, tenged dutun te pesarig din he nezineg te langun he menge bisita zin, midtuman din haazà is mibuyù dutun te raǥa.
40014010	Ne mibpepungelan din si Juan te ulu ziyà te pirisuwan.
40014011	Ne in-ahuk dan is ulu ni Juan te pelatu ne imbeǥey zan duen te raǥa. Ne haazà is ulu, imbeǥey zutun te raǥa ziyà te iney zin.
40014012	Ne sikan is lawa ni Juan, mibeyaan te menge sumusundan din ne inleveng dan. Ne midhendiyè dan te ki Jesus su edtudtulan dan sikandin dutun te neulaula.
40014013	Ne hein netuenan eni Jesus is nehitavù ki Juan, mid-untud dan te avang ne mid-awè dan dutun te iyan dan dà su edhendiyè dan te wazà duen etew. Iyan, hein netuenan te mezakel he menge etew, ne mid-awè dan diyà te menge inged dan is ebpemeyvey he edtelukun ki Jesus.
40014014	Ne hein nekezunggù ensi Jesus, neehè din is mezakel he menge etew. Ne utew zin nengehizuwi sikandan ne mibewian din is egkengezeruwan dutun ne nengeulian.
40014015	Ne hein mahapun en, mid-uvayan sikandin te menge sumusundan din ne ke sikandan te, "Mahapun en utew ne wazà menge inged kayi te uvey tew; deyzey ke ibpeǥenat nu en is menge etew wey zan mekehendiyà te menge inged ne egkepemasa zan is egkekaan dan."
40014016	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iyan kew mebeǥey te egkekaan dan."
40014017	Ne ke sikandan te, "Es! Iyan dà naazen tew zini is lelima he vuuk he supas wey zezuwa he vuuk he pait."
40014018	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Uwita niw zini."
40014019	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din is menge etew he mebpinuu zan diyà te tanà; ne migkuwa zin haazà is lelima he supas wey haazà is dezuwa he pait ne midlingahà diyà te langit ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà. Mibpenevìtevì din is menge supas, ne imbeǥey zin diyà te menge sumusundan din. Ne minsan pa zutun wazà maamin haazà is supas. Ne midtukid te menge sumusundan din pemeǥayi zutun is menge etew.
40014020	Ne is kada sevaha zutun te menge etew, nekekaan ne nahantey. Ne haazà is egkeenen, nesemaan pa te sepulù wey zezuwa he vinevey is nehimes te menge sumusundan din he menge tevì te supas.
40014021	Lelima he libu is kezakel zutun te menge maama he nekekaan ne wazà iragkes te ebilang is menge vahi wey menge vatà.
40014022	Ne zutun impemeuntud ni Jesus te avang is menge sumusundan din wey zan mekehuna mekerapas pehendiyà te zehipag dutun te ranew su ibpemeulì din pa haazà is mezakel he menge etew.
40014023	Ne hein nemekehipanew en haazà is menge etew, midtekezeg si Jesus diyà te vuvungan te sebsevaha zin ne mid-ampù. Ne hein mezukilem en, kemulu pa zutun si Jesus te sebsevaha zin.
40014024	Ne haazà is nemen-untud te avang, diyè dan en te lawed te ranew ne nereǥenan sikandan te zekelà he vaǥel su egkesinuǥung dan is dekelà he keramag.
40014025	Ne hein meǥaan egkepawà, midhendiyà si Jesus te kandan he ziyà sikandin ebpenggiekgiek te zivavew zutun te wahig.
40014026	Ne te kegkeahaa kandin te menge sumusundan din, utew zan neherati. "Gimukud!" ke sikandan, ne nemekeerang dan is egkengehandek.
40014027	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan, "Sarig kew," ke sikandin, "kenè kew mahandek su iyan a."
40014028	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro te, "He Zatù, ke tutuu he iyan ka heeyan, pengelinteuwi nu he mekehendiyan a ne mekehipanew a kayi te zivavew te wahig."
40014029	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Hendini ka." Ne midrenà si Pedro puun dutun te avang ne midhipanew zutun te zivavew te wahig pehendiyà te ki Jesus.
40014030	Ne hein neǥezam din he utew mevendes is keramag dutun, ne netik-ew sikandin mahandek ne idteledted en sikandin. Ne segugunà sikandin nekekulahì te, "Tevangi a!"
40014031	Ne segugunà migewezi sikandin ni Jesus te egkaǥi te, "Maan is kenè ka ebpekesarig kediey? Maan is eduwazuwa ka?"
40014032	Ne mid-untud dan dutun te avang, ne mid-engked haazà is keramag.
40014033	Ne is menge zuma he menge sumusundan din dutun te avang, mid-azap dan ki Jesus he ke sikandan te, "Benar iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà!"
40014034	Ne hein nekeuma zan en diyà layun, nekezunggù dan diyà te inged he Giniserit.
40014035	Ne nekilala si Jesus te menge etew zutun. Ne impemetukew zan is egkengezeruwan diyà te menge siringan he inged dutun. Ne nemekeuma is ebpenhated diyà te ki Jesus te menge etew he zuen daru.
40014036	Ne midhangyù dan ki Jesus he ituǥut din he mekeǥawed dan te minsan sidsid dà te kumbalè din ne nengeulian is langun he nekeǥawed dutun.
40015001	Ne zutun, duen menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he menge tigHiruselim he midhendiyà te ki Jesus. Mid-insè dan ki Jesus te,
40015002	"Is menge sumusundan nu, maan is edsupaken dan is menge tuluuwen he imbilinbilin kenitew te lukes tew? Su is menge sumusundan nu, kenè dan ebpenlùlù te menge velad dan te hustu he paaǥi te kegkaan te kenè dan pa ebpuun egkaan."
40015003	Ne mid-insà daan si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Ne sikiyu zaan, maan is, pinaaǥi te kedtumana niw te menge tuluuwen he imbilinbilin keniyu te menge apù niw, ne edsupaken niw is suǥù te Megbevaya?
40015004	Su migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, 'Tehuza niw is amey niw wey iney niw.' Ne migkaǥi zaan te, 'Ke zuen edsulà te amey zin wey iney zin, ne kinahanglan he edhimetayan.'
40015005	Ne iyan keniyu he penurù is: ke zuen etew he zuen din igketavang te iney zin wey amey zin, idtuǥut niw he egkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, 'Heini is idtavang ku pezem keniyu, kenè ku igkeveǥey su imbuwis ku en heini te Megbevayà.'
40015006	Ne zutun," ke si Jesus, "sumalà is penurù niw, wazè en kinahanglan he ebeǥayan din pa te tavang is ginikanan din. Iyan heini paaǥi niw wey niw kenà metuman is Lalag te Megbevayà wey niw iyan metuman haazà is keniyu he penurù.
40015007	Tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Utew hustu is Lalag te Megbevayà he insurat te tipehuna he ebpeneuven he si Esaias. Netagnè kew zin, su ke sikandin te,
40015008	'Heini he menge etew, egkaǥi zan he edtehuzen e zan, iyan, wazà kedtuu he neseled diyà te ǥehinawa zan.
40015009	Wazà pulus te kedsimbaha zan kedì su zutun te kebpenurù dan, egkeǥiyen dan he menge suǥù ku is kandan dà he ebpeveelan te menge etew.'"
40015010	Ne zutun mid-umew ni Jesus is mezakel he menge etew zutun he med-uvey zan diyà te kandin. "Pemineg kew," ke sikandin, "wey niw mesavut.
40015011	Is igkeepesi te Megbevayà te etew, ne kenà iyan sikan is egkeenen he id-ahuk dutun te etew ziyà te vèbè din, kekenà, iyan sikan is menge mezaat he lalag he egawas he ebpuun te vèbè dutun te etew."
40015012	Ne mid-uvayan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din ne ke sikandan te, "Netuenan nu ve he nepeukan ka te menge Perisiyu tenged te menge lalag nu ǥeina?"
40015013	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Ebezuten is minsan hengkey he pinemula he wazà ipemula te Amey ku he Megbevayà.
40015014	Bey-ani niw en is menge Perisiyu. Iring sikandan te menge lakap. Ne ke zuen lakap he ed-eǥaken din is sengelelakap, haazà is ebpeeǥakà, ne pudu egkeulug diyà te vitu."
40015015	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Luwasa nu kenami sikan is kehuluǥan te sempitè nu ǥeina."
40015016	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Kenè niw pe ves egkesavut?
40015017	Kenè niw ves egkeisip he is id-ahuk ta ziyà te vèbè ta, ne ebpehendiyà te ǥetek ta ne zutun egawas puun te lawa ta? Ne kenà iyan haazà igkeepes te Megbevayà.
40015018	Iyan, is menge mezaat he lalag he ziyà egawas te vèbà te etew, diyà ebpuun te ǥehinawa zin, ne iyan heini utew igkeepesi kandin te Megbevayà.
40015019	Su ziyà te ǥehinawa te etew ebpuun is menge mezaat he isip he utew igkeepes te Megbevayà iring te kebunù, kedhilavet te kenè din esawa, meremerik he ulaula, kebpenakew, kedtarùtarù diyà te hukmanan, wey is kebpenudtul zin te tarù wey mezeeti is dengeg te sengeeetew.
40015020	Iyan heini menge ulaula he igkeepes te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè din igkeepes is kegkaan ta he wazè ki mekepenlùlù te velad ta sumalà is betasan te menge Perisiyu."
40015021	Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun su edhendiyà te inged he uvey te menge inged he Tiru wey Sidun.
40015022	Ne zuen dutun nekeubpà he vahi he tigKenaan. Ne midtelavuk haazà ki Jesus su edhangyù, ke sikandin te, "He Zatù he kevuwazan ni Hadì David, kehizuwi a kenikew su zuen anak ku he vahi he egkerasey utew su edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin."
40015023	Iyan, kenà edseǥipaan ni Jesus. Ne zutun, mid-uvayan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din; ne midhangyù dan he ke sikandan te, "Ipeulì nu heeyan is bahi su kenà edsuwey kenitew he ebpekeuringer."
40015024	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is bahi te, "Midsuǥù a te Megbevayà he iyan dà ibpetevangan kedì is kevuwazan ni Israyil he nengetazin iring te kerehidu."
40015025	Ne zutun mid-uvey haazà is bahi ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus is edhenduen te, "Datù, tevangi a!"
40015026	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenà meupiya ke egkuwaan ta is egkeenen te menge vatà ne idsamak te menge asu."
40015027	Ne migkaǥi haazà is bahi te, "Benar iyan, Datù, iyan, minsan ke asu ne ebpekekaan gihapun te menge mumu he egkengeulug puun te lemisahan te teǥiasu kandin."
40015028	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is bahi te, "Bayi," ke sikandin, "utew zekelà is kedtuu nu te Megbevayà. Ne ibeǥey ku kenikew is ebuyuen nu." Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is anak dutun te vahi.
40015029	Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun ne mibpemeyvey te ranew he Geliliya. Midtekezeg sikandin diyà te vuvungan dutun ne mibpinuu.
40015030	Ne mibpenhendiyà te kandin is utew mezakel he menge etew. Mibpenduma zan is menge piang, menge pungkul, menge lakap, menge emew. Ne miduma zan is mezakel pa he egkengezeruwan. Ne insavuk dan haazà diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus ne nengeulian din is langun dutun te mibpevawì kandin.
40015031	Ne utew nengeinuinu is menge etew zutun te nengeehè dan. Su ebpekekaǥi en sikan is emew; ne neulian en sikan is pungkul; sikan is piang, ne ebpekehipanew en; ne sikan is nengelakap, ne ebpekeehè en. Ne midalig dan dutun is Megbevayà he edsimbahan dan te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.
40015032	Ne mid-umew ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, "Kehizu kayi he menge etew su tetelu en he kezukileman is wazè dan medsuwey kediey, ne wazè dan en egkekaan. Kenà meupiya he ebpekeulì sikandan te wazè dan mekekaan su kela ke luyahi sikandan diyà te zalan."
40015033	Ne migkaǥi haazà is menge sumusundan din te, "Meziyù heini te menge valey. Ne wazà kayi egkekuwaan ta te ibpekaan keniyan te utew mezakel he menge etew."
40015034	Ne mid-insà si Jesus te, "Pira he vuuk is supas niw?" Ne midtavak dan te, "Pitu he vuuk wey pira he leǥas he pait he zezeisek," ke sikandan.
40015035	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus he mebpinuu ziyà te tanà haazà is menge etew.
40015036	Ne zutun migkuwa zin haazà is pitu he supas wey menge pait ne mibpeselamatan din te Megbevayà. Ne mibpenevìtevì din ne imbeǥey zin diyà te menge sumusundan din haazà ne intukid te menge sumusundan din ipemeǥey haazà diyà te menge etew.
40015037	Ne nemekekaan is langun he menge etew zutun ne nengehantey. Ne pitu pa he vinevey is netiǥum te menge sumusundan ni Jesus he samà dutun te menge etew.
40015038	Heepat he libu is menge maama zutun te nekekaan ne wazà iragkes te ebilang is menge vahi wey menge vatà dutun.
40015039	Ne zutun impemeulì ni Jesus haazà is menge etew. Ne mid-untud sikandin te avang ne midhendiyà te inged he Megadan.
40016001	Duen menge Perisiyu wey Sedusiyu he midhendiyà te ki Jesus su egezamen dan sikandin. Umba mid-insaan dan, ke sikandan te, "Ipeehè key te singyal he tuus he suǥù ka te Megbevayà."
40016002	Iyan, midtavak si Jesus te, "Emun edsanlep en is andew ne ebpemurawag, egkaǥi kew te, 'Meupiya is timpu keeselem.'
40016003	Ne ke egkepawà ne ebpemurawag ne zuen kivel, egkaǥi kew zaan te, 'Edrendeng guntaan.' Egketuusan niw is uzan tenged te ǥapun, iyan, kenè niw ves egketuusan is ed-ul-ulahan guntaan te Megbevayà.
40016004	Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, utew kew mezaat; wazè en diyà te ǥehinawa niw is kebmahala te Megbevayà! Maan is ed-ehè kew te singyal? Iyan dà singyal he ibpaahà keniyu is iring duen te singyal he neulaula zuen te tipehuna he si Jonas." Ne zutun mid-ewaan din sikandan.
40016005	Ne midlayun dutun te ranew is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, ne wazè dan mekeuwit te supas su nelipatan dan.
40016006	Hein nekerapas dan en, duen sempità he impezineg kandan ni Jesus. Ke sikandin te, "Andam kew wey niw melikayi is tapey te menge Perisiyu wey Sedusiyu."
40016007	Ne wazè dan mesavut he kenà iyan is tapey te supas egkeǥiyen din, ne mibpelelelaǥè dan te, "Iyan ingkeǥiya zin kayi su wazè kiw mekeuwit te supas."
40016008	Ne nesavut ni Jesus is egkeǥiyen dan ne ke sikandin te, "Maan is egkesamuk kew te wazè kew mekeuwit te supas? Utew meluya is kedtuu niw!
40016009	Wazè bes meketaǥù diyà te isip niw he kenè ta igkesamuk is supas? Wazè niw ves metenuzi kes mibeelan ku hein mibpenevìtevì ku kes menge supas wey mekekaan sikan is lelima he libu he menge maama? Wazè niw ves daan metenuzi sikan is menge vinevey he nengepenù te midhimes niw he nengesamè dan?
40016010	Ne wazè bes daan diyà te isip niw kes pitu he vuuk he supas he impekaan ku zuen te heepat he libu he menge maama, wey sikan is menge vinevey he nehimes niw?
40016011	Maan is wazè niw mesavut he kenà supas is egkeǥiyen ku? Andam kew wey kew mekelikey te tapey te menge Perisiyu wey Sedusiyu."
40016012	Ne human mesavut te menge sumusundan din haazà he kenà iyan ebpelikayan din kandan is idtapey te supas, kekenà, iyan is ibpenurù te menge Perisiyu wey Sedusiyu.
40016013	Midhendiyà ensi Jesus te inged he uvey te inged he Sisarya Pilipus. Ne hein nekeuma zan en dutun, mid-insaan din is menge sumusundan din te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, hentei e kun sumalà te ked-isipa kediey te menge etew?"
40016014	Ne midtavak dan te, "Is duma, ne iyan ke kun si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew. Ne is duma, ke sikandan te, iyan ka si Elias. Ne egkaǥi is duma pa te si Jeremias ka, ne emun kenà, ne sevaha ka zuen te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà."
40016015	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Ne sikiyu zaan, hentei e man sumalà te ked-isipa niw kediey?"
40016016	Ne zutun midtavak si Simon Pedro te, "Iyan ka sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì din te menusiyà; iyan ka sikan is Anak te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà."
40016017	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Simon, anak ni Juan, midtuvazan ka te Megbevayà su wazè nu metueni heini pinaaǥi te etew, kekenà, impinted kenikew te Amey ku he ziyà te langit.
40016018	Ne tenged kayi egeraran ku sikew ki Pedro, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, batu. Ne iring te vatu is edtukuzan ku te iglisya ku, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is menge etew he edtuu kediey. Ne minsan is gehem te kemetayen, ne kenà ebpekezaag kandan.
40016019	Ne idsarig ku kenikew is kebayàbayà emun edhadì is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit. Ne kinahanglan he is idawey nu zini te kelibutan, indawey en he zaan te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit; ne is idtuǥut nu zini te tanà, intuǥut en he zaan te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit."
40016020	Ne zutun mibpeketelteleenan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din he kenè dan tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei he iyan sikandin sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì.
40016021	Ne puun dutun impesavut din te menge sumusundan din is imbanglis kandin. Ke sikandin te, "Kinahanglan he edhendiyà a te Hiruselim ne utew merasey is ed-ul-ulahan kedì te menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Edhimetayan e zan ne seled te tetelu he andew zutun, egkevanhew a."
40016022	Ne zutun insivey sikandin ni Pedro, ne ke si Pedro te, "He Nengazen, berakat he kenà tumana te Megbevayà heini is migkaǥi nu."
40016023	Ne midsinaru si Jesus diyà te ki Pedro is egkaǥi te, "Sikew is ed-iring ki Setanas, awè ka zini te kediey. Egkesanggen a kenikew su wazà diyà te isip nu is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan diyà te isip nu is egkesuatan te etew!"
40016024	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Ke zuen egkesuat he edsundan kedì, kinahanglan he iawè din diyà te isip din is kandin he egkesuatan he menge ulaula, ne tianga zin is krus din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kinahanglan he edtumanen din is menge suǥù ku minsan ke iyan ibpatey zin. Ne human ebpekesunud kedì.
40016025	Su ke zuen etew he egkenuǥunan din is untung din, ebpatey ǥihapun. Iyan, ke zuen etew he edsunud kedì, minsan ke ibpatey zin pa, id-ulì te Megbevayà diyà te kandin is untung din ne kenè en sikandin ebpatey te wazà pidtemanan.
40016026	Minsan ke maangken pa te etew is tivuuk he kelibutan, wazà pulus diyà te kandin ke kenà sikandin egkeveǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan, su wazà minsan hengkey he azen he igkeliwè din wey zin maangken is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
40016027	Su Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, imbanglis kedì he mekelikù a keuzemà he edumahan te menge velinsuǥuen ku wey edsun-uzan ad te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Ne zutun edsuhulan ku is langun he menge etew sumalà is mid-ulaula te uman sevaha.
40016028	Kenè niw heini lipati he zuen menge zuma tew kayi he kenà ebpatey taman te egkeehè e zan is Kakey te Menusiyà he ebpekeuma su edhadì."
40017001	Neiwas is heenem dutun he andew ne miduma ni Jesus ensi Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan, sikan is hazi ni Santiago, ne midtekezeg dan te metikang he vuntud he iyan dan dà.
40017002	Ne zutun te kedtengtengi zan ki Jesus, netik-ew mahalin is dagwey zin. Utew merayag is paras din iring te andew. Ne nengenamag is bisti zin te keputì.
40017003	Ne zutun netik-ew zan daan maahà si Moises wey si Elias he ebpekidlalag ki Jesus.
40017004	Ne migkaǥi si Pedro ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Utew meupiya te zini key. Ke egkesuatan nu, ebeelan ku kayi is tetelu he lawig; sevaha is kenikew, sevaha zaan is ki Moises, wey sevaha is ki Elias."
40017005	Ne te kemulu pa heini is lalag ni Pedro, neselikuvungan sikandan te ebpenganlag he ǥapun. Ne ebpuun dutun te ǥapun nezineg dan is midtik-ew megkaǥi te, "Iyan heini sikan is Anak ku he utew ku minahal; ingkesuat ku utew sikandin. Pemineǥa niw sikandin."
40017006	Ne hein nezineg heini zutun te menge sumusundan ni Jesus nekelangkeb dan su utew zan nengahandek.
40017007	Ne mid-uvayan sikandan ni Jesus ne migewezan din sikandan ne ke sikandin te, "Enew kew, kenè kew mahandek."
40017008	Ne hein mid-enew zan, ne iyan dan dà dutun maan naahà si Jesus.
40017009	Ne zutun te edtupang dan, mibeleuzan sikandan ni Jesus te, "Heini is neehè niw, kenè niw tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei taman te kenè e pa is Kakey te Menusiyà egkevanhew."
40017010	Ne zutun mid-insaan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din te, "Maan is egkeǥiyen te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he kinahanglan he edhuna edlepew si Elias, sikan is ebpeneuven dengan, ne human sikan is edhadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà?"
40017011	Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, "Tutuu iyan he egkehuna ebpekeuma si Elias su ed-endamen din is langun.
40017012	Iyan, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he nekeume en iyan si Elias, iyan, wazà sikandin mekilala te menge punuan. Midrasey zan sikandin sumalà is egkesuatan dan he ed-ul-ulahan dan kandin. Ne iring ded dutun te kedresaya zan kandin is ed-ul-ulahan dan dini te kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà."
40017013	Ne human mesavut dutun te menge sumusundan ni Jesus he iyan egkeǥiyen din si Juan Megbebewtismu.
40017014	Ne hein neumahan dan sikan is mezakel he menge etew, ne zuen etew zutun he mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan din.
40017015	Ke sikandin te, "Datù, kehizuwi nu is anak ku. Ebevuyen sikandin ne utew merasey is egkeulaula zin su layun egkeulug diyà te hapuy wey ziyà te wahig.
40017016	Impeehè ku ziyà te menge sumusundan nu, iyan, wazè dan meulii sikandin."
40017017	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, utew zekelà is menge sayep niw! Wazè niw iyan kedtuu! Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekiduma ku keniyu! Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekeantus ku keniyu ne human kew edtuu! Ihengkayi niw heeyan is batà."
40017018	Ne midawey ni Jesus is mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung dutun te vatà ne impeǥuwè din ne zutundutun neulian haazà is batà.
40017019	Ne is menge sumusundan din, hein iyan dan dà engki Jesus, mid-uvayan dan sikandin. Ne ke sikandan te, "Maan is wazè dey meulii sikan is batà he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin?"
40017020	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Wazè niw meulii tenged te utew zeisek is kedtuu niw. Tentenuzi niw he ke zuen niw kedtuu, minsan utew zà deisek iring te lisu te mustasa, egkehimu he egkekeǥiyan niw heini is buvungan he medhalin, ne ebpemineg keniyu. Minsan hengkey, ne egkehimu niw.
40017021	Iyan, sikan he kelasi te mezaat he mulin-ulin, igkepaawà pinaaǥi zà te ked-ampù wey pinaaǥi te kedsalang te kegkaan. Wazà duma he paaǥi."
40017022	Netiǥum is menge sumusundan din diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya. Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen timpu he ibpalad a ziyà te menge kuntada ku ne edhimetayan e zan,
40017023	iyan, seled te tetelu he andew zutun egkevanhew a." Ne zutun utew nengeseeng is menge sumusundan din.
40017024	Nekeume en si Jesus wey menge sumusundan din diyà te inged he Kepirnaum. Ne mid-uvayan si Pedro te menge menunukut te ibayad dutun te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne mid-insà sikandan te, "Is menunudlù niw, ebayad be sikandin te ebpeveyazan kandin te Valey te Megbevayà?"
40017025	Ne midtavak si Pedro te, "Uya, ebayad sikandin." Ne hein mid-ulì dutun si Pedro ziyà te valey, iyan si Jesus mid-insà kandin te, "Simon, hengkey is ked-isipa nu kayi? Penenglitan, kayi te kelibutan hentei is ebayad te sidula ziyà te hadi? Iyan be is menge mesipeg din wey ke iyan be is kenè din kezuzumahi?" Ne ke si Pedro te, "Iyan is kenè din kezuzumahi."
40017026	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Ne emun iyan heeyan, ne kenè en ebpekevayad is menge mesipeg te hadì. Ne sikita is mesipeg diyà te Megbevayà, kenà daan kinahanglan he ebeyazan ta is ebpeveyazan te valey zin.
40017027	Asal, kenà meupiya he mepauk kenita heini is menge menunukut te ibayad dutun te Valey te Megbevayà. Hendiyè ka te ranew ne pemunuwit ka. Ne zutun te vèbà te pait he egkehuna nu egkeutel, egkeehè nu is selapì. Kuwaa nu haazà is selapì ne ivayad nu kayi te edsukuten kenita he ibayad te Valey te Megbevayà."
40018001	Ne zutun he timpu midhendiyà te ki Jesus is menge sumusundan din ne mid-insè dan te, "Hentei is lavew te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà?"
40018002	Ne mid-umew ni Jesus is batà ne impeteliwazè din dutun te menge sumusundan din.
40018003	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Kenè niw lipati heini: kinahanglan he ed-ewaan niw ziyà te isip niw is kebpelavew ne iringi niw heini is batà, su nelevawan sikandin te langun. Su emun kenè niw ed-iringan heini, ne kenè kew egkehedian te Megbevayà.
40018004	Su is etew he ed-engkezan din is kebpelavew ne ed-iringan din heini is batà, iyan sikandin lavew te langun he edhedian te Megbevayà.
40018005	Is etew he tenged te kedtuu zin kedì edewaten din ne ebpurungan din is minsan hentei he vatà he iring kayi, ne nezawat e zin en daan.
40018006	Minsan hentei he etew he pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig kediey te sevaha he vatà, meupiya pa zutun he etew ke edhiketan is lieg din te zekelà he ǥelingan he vatu ne id-agbur ziyà te lawed te zaǥat kenà is silut kandin ke pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig te sevaha he vatà he iring kayi.
40018007	Kehizu te menusiyà, su zuen iyan menge ebpekeawà te kedsarig te menge etew. Layun egkehitavù is iring kayi, iyan, kehizu utew te etew he pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig kediey te minsan hentei he midtuu kedì su utew meveǥat is silut kandin te Megbevayà.
40018008	Emun iyan ebpekeawà te kedsarig nu kediey is belad nu, emun kenà, ne paa nu, tempeza nu wey itimbag! Su meupiya pa ke pungkul ka is ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan, kenà te zezuwa is belad nu wey paa nu he idtimbag ka ziyà te hapuy he wazà pidtemanan.
40018009	Ne emun iyan ebpekeawà te kedsarig nu kediey is mata nu, luǥita nu wey itimbag su meupiya pa ke sevaha zà is mata nu ke ebeǥayan ka te untung he wazà pidtemanan, kenà te zezuwa is mata nu ne idtimbag ka pehendiyà te hapuy te Impirnu.
40018010	Ne is menge etew he iring kayi te menge vatà, kenè niw lupiǥi is minsan sevaha kandan su venar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey kandan, kenà ed-awà diyà te etuvangan te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
40018011	Su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan impekehendini ku te kelibutan su wey ku melibri is menusiyà wey kenà sikandan mesiluti tenged te menge salè dan.
40018012	Ke zuen etew he nenggatus is menge ayam din he kerehidu ne egketazin is sevaha zutun, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din? Iyan ed-ul-ulahan din is ed-ewaan din haazà is kesiyawan wey siyew he wazà metazin he ebpemenabtab diyà te kelendiǥan, ne ebpen-ahaan din haazà is sevaha he netazin.
40018013	Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke egketuredu zin haazà, utew sikandin egkelipey zutun te sevaha kenà dutun te kesiyawan wey siyew he wazà metazin.
40018014	Iring din ded daan is Amey tew ziyà te langit su kenè din egkesuatan he zuen minsan sevaha zà kayi te menge vatà he kenà egkelibri te silut.
40018015	Ne emun duen tumutuu he nekesalà kenikew, hendiyè ka te kandin ne keǥiya nu ziyà te kandin is salè din kenikew. Iyan, kinahanglan he itavis nu kandin. Ne emun ebpekidhusayà sikandin, ebpeked-uliey kew te meupiya he ǥehinawa.
40018016	Iyan, ke kenà ebpekidhusayà, pengehè ka te sevaha, ne emun kenà, ne zezuwa pa he tumutuu su wey mepirmahi zutun te zezuwa, emun kenà, ne tetelu haazà is kebitiyara niw.
40018017	Ne emun kenè pa sikandin ebpekidhusayà, tudtula nu ziyà te nengetiǥum he menge zuma niw he tumutuu. Ne emun kenè pa ebpekidhusayà dutun, isipa niw sikandin he iring te etew he kenà tumutuu te Megbevayà wey isipa niw zaan sikandin he iring te sevaha zuen te limbungan he menunukut te vuhis.
40018018	Ne egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kinahanglan he is idawey niw zini te tanà, indawey en he zaan te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit ne is idtuǥut niw zini te tanà, intuǥut en he zaan te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
40018019	Ne heini zaan is ibpesavut ku keniyu: ke zuen minsan hengkey he ebuyuen niw ziyà te Megbevayà he neuyunan te minsan dezuwa zà keniyu zini te tanà, ibeǥey heini keniyu te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
40018020	Su ke zuen minsan dezuwa, ne emun kenà, ne tetelu, he egkevurun su ed-azap dan kediey, ne zutun a zaan te kandan."
40018021	Ne zutun mid-uvayan si Jesus ni Pedro te egkaǥi te, "Nengazen, kepipira ebpekesalà is duma ku zini te kediey ne ebpeseyluwen ku pa? Kepipitu zè be?"
40018022	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenà kepipitu zà, kekenà, kepipitu egkekekepituwan.
40018023	Su is kedhadì te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, ne iring te hadì he edsusiyen din is menge utang kandin te menge suluǥuen din.
40018024	Ne zutun te kebpuuni zin pa te kedsusi kayi, mid-uwit dan diyà te kandin is sevaha he nekeutang diyà te kandin te sepulù he libu he libu he pisus.
40018025	Ne haazà, kenà ebpekevayad ne tenged dutun insuǥù dutun te hadì he ivelegyà haazà is etew wey meuripen ragkes is esawa zin wey menge anak din wey langun he azen din wey meveyazi haazà is utang din.
40018026	Ne zutun midluhud diyà te etuvangan te hadì haazà is suluǥuen he edhangyù, ke sikandin te, 'Ipaakul a kenikew; beǥayi e pa te timpu su edleǥuzan ku heini is bayad ku kenikew ne ebeyazan ku is langun.'
40018027	Ne nehizuwan haazà is etew zutun te hadì ne mibpesaylu zin ne wazè din en ipevayad dutun te utang din diyà te kandin. Ne impeulì din.
40018028	Ne zutun mid-awà haazà is suluǥuen ne neuma zin is suluǥuen daan dutun te hadì he utangan diyà te kandin haazà is iring din he suluǥuen te pira zà he pisus. Ne migewezan din haazà ne mibpekel zin te egkaǥi te, 'Beyazi nu kes utang nu kedì!'
40018029	Ne midluhud haazà diyà te etuvangan din is edhangyù diyà te kandin te, 'Ipaakul a kenikew; beǥayi e pa te timpu su wey ku meleǥuzi is bayad ku kenikew.'
40018030	Iyan, wazà mesuat haazà is etew, ne impepirisu zin haazà is utangan kandin taman te kenè pa ebpekevayad.
40018031	Ne hein netuenan te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen haazà is mid-ulaula zin dutun te utangan kandin ne nengepauk dan ne midhendiyè dan te egalen dan he hadì ne midtudtul zan haazà is langun he mid-ulaula zin.
40018032	Ne impetawag dutun te hadì haazà he suluǥuen, ne migkeǥiyan din te, 'Uripen ka he lalung! Mibpesaylu ku sikew ne in-awè kud diyà te kenikew is utang nu tenged dà te midhangyù ka kediey.
40018033	Ne maan is wazè nu mehizuwi kes duma nu he suluǥuen iring te kegkehizuwi ku kenikew?'
40018034	Ne utew nererengiti haazà is hadì ne impepirisu zin haazà is etew su edsilutan taman te kenè pa sikandin ebpekevayad dutun te langun he neutang din.
40018035	Ne," ke si Jesus te, "iring ded daan kayi is ed-ul-ulahan te Amey ku he ziyà te langit diyà te uman sevaha keniyu emun kenà tutuu is kebpesaylu niw te minsan hentei he zuma niw."
40019001	Ne hein ingkepenurù en ni Jesus haazà is langun, mid-awà sikandin diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne midhendiyà te Hudiya, diyà layun te wahig he Hurdan.
40019002	Utew mezakel he menge etew is nemenduma kandin, ne mibewian din is egkengezeruwan dutun ne nengeulian.
40019003	Duen menge Perisiyu zutun he midhendiyà te kandin su ebpengahaan dan te paaǥi sikandin wey zan ikesumbung. Ne mid-insaan dan sikandin te, "Intuǥut be te kesuǥuan is ked-engkezi ta te esawa ta minsan ke wazè ta utew ketezengan?"
40019004	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Wazè niw ves mevasa sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà
40019005	he edhenduen te, 'Dengan te kedlimbaǥa te Nengazen te langun, mibeelan din is maama wey vahi. Tenged kayi ed-ewaan te maama is amey zin wey iney zin ne ebpengesawa te vahi ne zutun egkesevaha sikandan.'
40019006	Ne tenged kayi," ke si Jesus, "kenè en maan dutun dezuwa he etew haazà is teleesawa, kekenà, sevaha zà, ne tenged kayi zaan kenà egkehimu he ipedsuwey te etew is midsevaha te Megbevayà."
40019007	Ne mid-uman med-insà is menge Perisiyu te, "Ne maan is intuǥut ni Moises diyà te maama he veǥayi zin dà is esawa zin te kemetuuzan te kebpekidsuwey emun egkesuatan din he meengkezi zin haazà is esawa zin?"
40019008	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Intuǥut ni Moises is kedsuwayi niw te esawa niw su ǥeina te edsumpeliten niw is penurù, iyan, dengan te kedlimbaǥa te langun, wazà ituǥut heini te Megbevayà is kebpekedsuwey te teleesawa.
40019009	Ne tenged kayi egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke zuen maama he ed-engkezan din is esawa zin he wazà sikandin is maama selselai zutun te esawa zin ne ed-uman ebpengesawa, ne haazà he maama, ebpekesalà dutun te nehuna he esawa zin tenged dutun te kebpengesawa zin."
40019010	Ne zutun migkaǥi is menge sumusundan ni Jesus te, "Emun iyan bes heini egkeulaula te telteleesawa meupiya pa ke kenà ebpees-eseweey is etew."
40019011	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen menge etew he imbanglis kandan te Megbevayà is kenà ebpekeesawa emun maama, ne kenà egkeesawa emun bahi; ne meupiya iyan haazà diyà te kandan, iyan, kenà meupiya te langun.
40019012	Su kenè en ed-iring-iring is ketezengan te etew ke maan is kenè dan ebpengesawa wey egkeesawa. Is duma, kenà ebpekeesawa wey egkeesawa su iyan en haazà kegkeetew-etew zan; ne is duma zaan tenged te migkapun; ne is duma pa, kenà ebpekeesawa wey egkeesawa su wey zan metuman is insuǥù kandan te Megbevayà tenged te kedhadì din. Sikan is ebpekezawat te kenè din kebpengesawa, wey ke kenè din kebpeesawa, ne meupiya ke edewaten din en."
40019013	Duen menge vatà he mid-uwit te menge etew ziyà te ki Jesus wey zin mezepeneti te palad din wey mepenubtuvazi. Ne midawey heini te menge sumusundan din.
40019014	Iyan, migkaǥi si Jesus dutun te, "Ipehendini niw te kediey heeyan is menge vatà; ne kenè niw zewaya su is etew he zuen din kedsarig he iring te kedsarig te vatà ne iyan ebpekepahadì te Megbevayà."
40019015	Ne midepenetan din haazà is menge vatà ne mibpenubtuvazan din ne hein nepasad din haazà, ne mid-awà dutun.
40019016	Duen menguhed he etew he mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus he ed-insà te, "He Menunudlù, hengkey is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan ku wey a meveǥayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan?"
40019017	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Maan is id-insè nu kedì is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan he sebsevaha zè man is ed-ulaula te meupiya ne wazè en duma, kekenà, iyan dà is Megbevayà. Ke egkesuat ka he meveǥayi ka te untung he wazè din pidtemanan, tumana nu is menge suǥù te Megbevayà."
40019018	Ne mid-insà haazà is etew te, "Hengkey he menge suǥù?" Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenè ka mebunù; kenè nu selselai is esawa nu; kenè ka penakew; kenè ka tarùtarù;
40019019	tehuza nu is amey nu wey iney nu; wey purungi nu is duma nu; isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he ǥehinawa."
40019020	Ne migkaǥi haazà is etew te, "Is langun keniyan, ne mibentayan ku; hengkey pa is kurang ku he ebpeveelan kedì?"
40019021	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Emun edheǥeten nu pa, ulì ka ne ivelegyè nu is langun he menge azen nu, ne is halin, ibpemeǥey nu ziyà te menge egkengeayuayu, ne edsepian ka ziyà te langit. Ne ke egkeipus nu heeyan likù ka zini wey ka mekesundan kediey."
40019022	Ne hein nezineg heini zutun te menguhed he etew, ne mid-ulì he utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin su utew zekelà is ketiǥeyunan din.
40019023	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Utew mereǥen te sepian he etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey mehedii sikandin.
40019024	Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kenè din egkehimu. Melemu pa te kemilyu is kedseled din diyà te vudsi te raǥum kenà te sepian he etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey sikandin mehedii."
40019025	Ne hein nezineg heini te menge sumusundan din utew zan neinuinu, ne ke sikandan te, "Emun kenà egkehimu te sepian, ne kenè bes egkehimu te minsan hentei is ked-angken te untung he wazà pidtemanan."
40019026	Ne zutun midtengtengan sikandan ni Jesus te egkaǥi te, "Kenà iyan egkehimu te etew; iyan, egkehimu mulà te Megbevayà he ibpaangken din is etew te untung he wazà pidtemanan su egkehimu zin is langun."
40019027	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Ahaa nu man, mid-ewaan dey is langun he menge azen dey wey key mekesunud kenikew. Ne hengkey is idsuhul kenami?"
40019028	Ne midtavak dutun si Jesus te, "Benar heini is egkeǥiyen ku, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, mekeǥeǥehem a keuzemà te kedhadì ku emun egkeveǥu en is langun; ne sikiyu is menge sumusundan ku, egkehedian niw zaan is menge kevuwazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he anak ni Israyil.
40019029	Ne is minsan hentei he mid-ewaan din is baley zin, menge suled din, amey zin, iney zin, anak din, wey tanè din su edsunud sikandin kediey, egkezawat din is kenenggatus egketakep haazà is mid-ewaan din ne liyu zutun ibeǥey kandin is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
40019030	Iyan, mezakel is menge etew ǥuntaan he henduen be te zekelà is pid-etawan dan, iyan, utew minus is pid-etawan dan keuzemà. Ne mezakel zaan is etew ǥuntaan he utew minus is pid-etawan dan, iyan, keuzemà, utew zekelà is pid-etawan dan," ke sikandin.
40020001	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Is kedhadì te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, iring te etew he zuen din menge pinemula he ǥawed he egngezanan te paras. Ne midselemselem haazà is etew mebpengahà te etew he edsuhulan din he ibpeterebahu zin dutun te perasan din.
40020002	Is aney he nengeehè din, mid-uyun dan he ebeyazan din is uman sevaha kandan te sengeelad he pelata su iyan haazà neleyaman he suhul te sevaha he etew te sengeandew. Ne zutun impepuun din en haazà is menge etew he edsuhulan din ipeterebahu zutun te perasan din.
40020003	Ne hein liwazè en ebpemenahik is andew zutun, midlikù sikandin mebpengahà te etew. Ne ziyà te tiyenggiyan neehè din dutun is menge etew he wazà mibpeterebahu kandan.
40020004	Ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is menge etew te, 'Terebahu kew ziyà te perasan ku ne edsuhulan ku sikiyu te hustu.'
40020005	Ne midterebahu haazà is menge etew. Ne hein neudtu en is andew zutun, midlikù en maan haazà is etew pehendutun te tiyenggiyan. Ne iring din ded hein liwazà ebpenaug is andew.
40020006	Ne hein meǥaan en edsanlep is andew, midlikù en maan sikandin dutun te tiyenggiyan. Ne neehè din dutun is menge etew he wazè dan terebahu, ne migkeǥiyan din te, 'Maan is tekew kew en kayi ed-uubpaubpà te egkehepunan en ne kenè kew edterebahu?'
40020007	Ne midtavak dan te, 'Geina te wazà ebpeterebahu kenami.' Ne migkaǥi haazà is etew te, 'Terebahu kew ziyà te perasan ku.'
40020008	Ne hein mezukilem en migkeǥiyan dutun te etew is sineriǥan din te, 'Umawa nu sikandan is ebpemenerebahu ne suhuli nu. Iyan nu hunai te edsuhul sikan is nengehuziyan, ne human sikan is nengehuna.'
40020009	Ne sikan is nemekepuun meketerebahu hein meǥaan en edsanlep is andew, midsuhulan din te tigsengeelad he pelata.
40020010	Ne hein iyan en edsuhulan sikan is nengehuna zutun, nekeperateng dan he lavew pa te insuhul zutun te utew nengehuziyan he neketerebahu is idsuhul kandan, iyan, tigsengeelad ded daan he pelata is insuhul kandan.
40020011	Umba hein edewaten dan en haazà is suhul kandan, ne neepes dan ne migkeǥiyan dan haazà is etew he mibpeterebahu kandan te,
40020012	'Sengeuras dà is kedterebahu kayi te nengehuziyan, ne sikami, ne tivuuk he andew is ked-antus dey te utew meinit, ne imped-iiring nu zà is suhul zey te langun!'
40020013	Ne migkeǥiyan dutun te etew is sevaha kandan te, 'Geli, wazè ku sikiyu lupiǥi. Su is mid-ulaula ku ne iyan neuyunan tew he tigsengeelad he pelata is idsuhul ku te uman sevaha keniyu.
40020014	Dewata niw en heeyan is idsuhul ku keniyu ne ulì kew su egkesuatan ku he mesuhuli heini is nengehuziyan te iring te suhul ku keniyu.
40020015	Kenè be egkehimu he iyan a ebayàbayà te kediey he selapì? Egkesina kew ve kandan tenged te ketulanged ku?'"
40020016	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Is egkengehuziyan guntaan ne iyan egkengehuna keuzemà, ne sikan is egkengehuna ǥuntaan ne iyan maan egkengehuziyan keuzemà."
40020017	Ne te kedtekezeg eni Jesus diyà te Hiruselim, migkeǥiyan din sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din he medtapid sikandan su zuen egkeǥiyen din kandan dutun te ziyè dan pa te zalan.
40020018	Ne ke sikandin te, "Netuenan niw he edhendiyè kiw te Hiruselim. Ne emun ebpekeuma kiw zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne egkeuyun dan he ebpehimetayan a,
40020019	ne ibpalad e zan daan diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, ne ed-iringen e zan te velvelayen, ebuǥelen e zan, ne idransang e zan te krus su edhimetayan a. Ne seled te tetelu he andew zutun, ebenhawen a te Megbevayà."
40020020	Ne zutun mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus is esawa ni Sibidiyu zuma is dezuwa he anak din he maama. Midluhud sikandin diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus su zuen ebuyuen din.
40020021	Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus te, "Hengkey is egkesuatan nu?" Ne midtavak haazà is bahi te, "Heini is dezuwa he anak ku he sumusundan nu, egkesuatan ku he, keuzemà ke ebpinuu ke en diyà te pinuuwè nu te kedhadì, ibpepinuu nu zaan sikandan, is sevaha ziyà dapit te egkekewanan nu, ne is sevaha, diyà dapit te egkeǥivang nu."
40020022	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is dezuwa te, "Wazè niw mesavut ke hengkey is edhengyuen niw. Egkeantus niw ve is merasey he ibpaantus kedì?" Ne midtavak dan is dezuwa te, "Uya, egkeantus dey."
40020023	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Benar iyan he ibpaantus keniyu is iring te ibpaantus kedì, iyan, kenà a iyan ebpilì ke hentei is ibpepinuu ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku wey ziyà te zapit te egkeǥivang ku, su iyan dà ebpekepinuu zutun sikan is etew he midteǥenahan te Amey ku he Megbevayà."
40020024	Ne hein nezineg haazà duen te zuma zan he sepulù he sumusundan, wazè dan ikesuat is mibeelan dutun te zezuwa he telehazi.
40020025	Ne tenged dutun mid-umew ni Jesus sikandan langun ne ke sikandin te, "Netuenan ta he is menge punuan te menge inged, ne utew zan memevurut wey is menge zatù dan ne edatùdatù dà sikandan is layun ebmandar te menge etew.
40020026	Iyan, sikiyu mulà, kenà egkehimu is iring kayi ziyan te keniyu. Su ke zuen sevaha keniyu he egkesuat he mekelavew, kinahanglan he suluǥuen sikandin te langun he menge zuma zin;
40020027	ne emun duen sevaha keniyu he egkesuat he iyan sikandin ebpeketikangen te langun keniyu, kinahanglan he iyan sikandin mebpekevavà te langun.
40020028	Su iring te siak, is Kakey te Menusiyà, kenà iyan inhendini ku te kelibutan is wey a metevangi te menge etew, kekenà, wey a meketavang ne wey a zaan mekepehimatey wey ku mevelukasi is mezakel he menge etew."
40020029	Ne hein ed-awè dan en diyà te inged he Hiriku utew mezakel he menge etew is nemenduma ki Jesus.
40020030	Ne zuen dezuwa he lakap he ebpimpinuu diyà te kilid te zalan. Ne hein netuenan dan he edsaǥad si Jesus dutun, mid-umew zan is egkaǥi te, "He Zatù, kehizuwi key kenikew su iyan ka sikan is netagnà he kevuwazan ni Hadì David!"
40020031	Ne nepeukan sikandan te menge etew zutun ne migkeǥiyan sikandan te menge etew he med-engked dan he ebpengumew. Iyan, nasì en mesuǥù sikandan is ebpengumew te, "He Nengazen he kevuwazan ni David, kehizuwi key!"
40020032	Ne zutun midteren si Jesus ne migkaǥi ziyà te kandan te, "Hengkey is kinahanglan niw he ed-ul-ulahan ku keniyu?"
40020033	Ne midtavak dan te, "Datù, iyan kinahanglan dey is mekeehè key."
40020034	Ne nehizuwan sikandan ni Jesus ne midampè din is menge mata zan. Ne zutundutun nepuwasan is ked-ehè dan, ne miduma zan ki Jesus.
40021001	Ne hein uvey zan en diyà te inged he Hiruselim su uvey zan te inged he Bitpagi, ne uvey zaan te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan, migkeǥiyan ni Jesus is dezuwa zutun te sumusundan din,
40021002	ke sikandin te, "Hendutun kew te inged he egkeumahan tew. Ne egkeehè niw zutun is intagkes he asnu he zuen din nati. Hekazi niw ne uwita niw zini zuma is nati zin.
40021003	Ne ke zuen ed-insà keniyu ke maan is edhekazan niw, ne ke sikiyu te, 'Egkinehenglanen heini te egalen tew he si Jesus.' Ne segugunà idtuǥut dutun te ed-insà keniyu he uwita niw haazà is asnu zuma is nati zin," ke si Jesus.
40021004	Umba egkeulaula heini is migkaǥi ni Jesus su egketuman kes netagnà te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà dengan he edhenduen te,
40021005	"Tudtuli niw is menge meǥinged diyà te Siyun te, 'Ebpekeume en guntaan is hadì niw. Kenà meinit is kedhadì din keniyu ne ed-untud sikandin te nati te asnu;'" iyan heini lalag dutun te ebpeneuven.
40021006	Ne migenat haazà is midsuǥù ni Jesus ne mid-ulaula zan is insuǥù din.
40021007	Ne hein neuwit dan en haazà diyà te ki Jesus is asnu wey nati zin, mibelhenan dan te menge kumbalè dan ne mid-untud dutun si Jesus.
40021008	Ne is utew mezakel he menge etew zutun, tenged te zekelà is kedtahud dan ki Jesus impendempas dan is impenamput dan diyà te ibayà ni Jesus. Ne is duma zutun, mibpenamped dan te menge zehunen he rasang ne in-eneb dan impendempas dutun te zalan he ibayà ni Jesus.
40021009	Ne mezakel he menge etew is midhuna ki Jesus, ne mezakel zaan is ebpemeninundug kandin, ne ke sikandan is ebpemengulahì te, "Edtehuzen tew is kevuwazan ni Hadì David. Deliǥa is nekeuma he midsuǥù te Nengazen. Sikiyu is diyà te langit, tehuza niw zaan sikandin!"
40021010	Ne hein nekeuma si Jesus diyà te Hiruselim, mibmeǥurub is menge meǥinged dutun. Ebpein-inseey zan ke, "Hentei sikandin?"
40021011	Ne midtavak is mezakel he menge etew he nemenduma ki Jesus te, "Iyan sikandin sikan is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he si Jesus he tigNeserit diyà te Geliliya."
40021012	Ne midseled si Jesus diyà te Valey te Megbevayà ne mibpenegseg din dutun is menge limbungan he etew zutun he ebpememelegyà wey ebpememasa. Mibpemiley zin is menge lemisahan te ebpemenliwà te menge selapì wey is menge pinuuwà te menge ebpememelegyà te ibpemuhat he merepatik.
40021013	Migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Is baley ku, ne egngezanan he valey he elempuanan.' Ne sikiyu," ke si Jesus, "nasì niw veeli he ubpeey te ebpemenlimbung."
40021014	Ne nemenelavuk kandin dutun te Valey te Megbevayà is menge lakap wey menge piang ne nengeulian din sikandan is langun.
40021015	Nengepauk is menge lavew he memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan dutun hein neehè dan is egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan ni Jesus wey nezineg dan is menge vatà diyà te Valey te Megbevayà he ebpemenhabet egkaǥi te, "Tehuza is kevuwazan ni Hadì David!"
40021016	Ne tenged dutun migkaǥi zan diyà te ki Jesus is egkengepauk te, "Egkezineg nu ve heini is egkeǥiyen dan?" Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Egkezineg ku. Wazè niw ves mevasa sikan is insurat he tagnà te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Mibpenurù nu is menge vatà wey mehustu is kedeliǥa zan kenikew.'"
40021017	Ne mid-ewaan din sikandan ne mid-awà sikandin dutun te inged he Hiruselim ne midhendiyà te inged he Bitanya, ne zutun medhizeǥà.
40021018	Ne te nepawà dutun te ziyà ensi Jesus te zalan su edlikù dan diyà te Hiruselim, egkevitil sikandin.
40021019	Ne te uvey zutun te zalan neehè din is kayu he igira. Mibeyaan din haazà, iyan, wazà beǥas he neehè din su menge zahun dà. Ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is kayu te, "Kenè ke en mebeǥas minsan keenu." Ne wazà metegteǥaad nelay-ub haazà is kayu.
40021020	Nengeinuinu utew is menge sumusundan ni Jesus dutun hein neehè dan is nehitavù dutun te kayu. Ne ke sikandan te, "Maan is segugunà nelay-ub heini is kayu he igira?"
40021021	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Tipiǥi niw heini ziyà te isip niw he ke edsarig kew te Megbevayà te kenà duwazuwa, egkehimu niw heini is midhimu ku kayi te kayu he igira. Ne kenà kayi zà taman su minsan pa ke ekeǥiyan niw heeyan is buntud te, 'Med-awè ka keniyan ne agbur ka ziyà te zaǥat,' ne ebpemineǥen kew zin.
40021022	Emun edsarig kew te Megbevayà, ke ed-ampù kew, egkezawat niw is ebuyuen niw."
40021023	Midlikù si Jesus diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun. Ne nemekeuma is menge lavew he memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu zutun ne mid-insè dan ki Jesus te, "Heini is langun he ed-ul-ulahan nu zini te simbahan, duen nu ve ketenged te ked-ulaula kayi, wey hentei is mibeǥey kenikew te ketenged wey nu meulaula heini?"
40021024	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen daan id-insè ku keniyu, ne emun edtevaken a keniyu, edtevaken ku zaan sikiyu ke hengkey is kediey he ketenged te ked-ulaula ku kayi te langun.
40021025	Hentei is mibeǥey ki Juan Megbebewtismu te ketenged din te kebpemewtismu? Megbevayà be wey ke etew zà?" Ne zutun mibpein-inseey sikandan is egkaǥi te, "Emun egkeǥiyen tew he Megbevayà, ed-insà sikandin ke maan is wazè tew tuuwi si Juan.
40021026	Ne emun egkeǥiyen ta he etew zà, ebpemiligru ki te menge etew su midtuu zan he ebpeneuven si Juan te Megbevayà."
40021027	Umba, iyan tavak dan dutun ki Jesus is, "Hanew ta." Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Kenè ku zaan egkeǥiyen keniyu ke hengkey is ketenged ku te kebaal kayi te langun," ke sikandin.
40021028	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Hengkey is isip niw kayi? Duen etew he zezuwa is anak din he maama. Mibeyaan din is kakey ne migkeǥiyan din te, 'Diyè ka ǥuntaan, Mama, terebahu te perasan.'
40021029	Ne midtavak haazà is anak din te, 'Es! kenà a egkesuat.' Asal netegteǥaad dutun neisip-isip din haazà, ne mibmezaat is gehinawa zin dutun te keberawa zin te amey zin ne zutun midtuman din haazà is ebpeveelan kandin.
40021030	Ne mibeyaan daan dutun te etew is hazi ne iyan ded daan insuǥù din haazà is insuǥù din duen te sevaha he anak din. Ne mid-uya haazà is hazi zutun te migkaǥi kandin, iyan, wazè din beeli haazà is ibpeveelan kandin."
40021031	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Hentei zutun te zezuwa he telesuled is hustu he neketuman te suǥù te Amey zan?" Ne ke sikandan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Iyan haazà is kakey." Ne ke si Jesus dutun te, "Benar iyan he edhuna keniyu is menge mezaat he etew iring te menge menunukut te vuhis wey is menge vahi he ibpenapì dan is dengeg dan su edewaten sikandan te Megbevayà wey zin mehedii kenà sikiyu.
40021032	Su nekeuma si Juan, ne impeehè din keniyu is paaǥi wey kew mebmetazeng ne wazè niw sikandin tuuwi, iyan, midtuuwan mulà sikandin te menge limbungan he menunukut wey menge vahi he ebpemenapì te zengeg dan. Ne minsan te netuenan niw heini, wazè niw iniyuǥi is memezaat he ulaula ne wazè kew zaan medtuu kandin."
40021033	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Pemineǥa niw is selakew pa he sempità he egkeǥiyen ku keniyu mehitenged te ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà. Duen etew he zuen din pemuleey he mibpemulaan din te menge ǥawed he paras. Mid-alad din haazà, ne mibudsiyan din te meluag is dekelà he vatu su ebeelan din he keresà te wahig dutun te veǥas te paras. Ne midlelawig sikandin te ebpeubpaan din te ebantey zutun te perasan. Ne mibpeelimahan din haazà is perasan ne zutun midhendiyà te sengeǥinhedian.
40021034	Ne hein tiraǥun en dutun, midsuǥù din is menge suluǥuen din he ibpekuwa te vahin din dutun te perasan din.
40021035	Ne hein nemekeuma haazà is menge suluǥuen din, mibpemuǥel zutun te impemeelima zin te perasan is sevaha zutun. Ne is sevaha, midhimetayan dan, ne is sevaha pa zutun, midtuleng dan te vatu.
40021036	Ne mid-uman medsuǥù heini is etew te mezakel pa kenà is nengehuna he midsuǥù din. Iyan, iyan ded gihapun mid-ulaula zutun te impemeelima zin te perasan is mid-ulaula zan dutun te nengehuna he suǥù din.
40021037	Ne te ketepusan, midsuǥù kayi te etew is anak din, su egkeisip din is, 'Kenà egkehimu he kenè dan edtehuzen is anak ku,'
40021038	Iyan, hein naahà dutun te impemeelima zin te perasan haazà is anak din, migkaǥi zan te, 'Na, iyan en heini sikan is anak din; kuwa kew en su edhimetayan tew ne egkeangken tew en heini is perasan din.'
40021039	Ne migewezan dan haazà ne intimbag dan diyà te ǥawas dutun te perasan ne midhimetayan dan."
40021040	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Emun ebpekeuma sikan is teǥiǥaked dutun te perasan, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din dutun te impemeelima zin dutun te perasan?"
40021041	Ne midtavak dan te, "Iyan is: ebpenhimetayan din haazà is impemeelima zin ne ebpeelimahan din maan haazà is perasan te selakew en he menge etew he ebeǥey mulà te vahin ke egkeuma is tiraǥun."
40021042	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Siguradu nevasa niw en sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Sikan is batu he himan te valey, mid-engkezan te menge pandey su kunaan dan ke wazè din pulus. Ne heini, nehimu en guntaan he vatu he iyan dà ebpekepurung te valey. Ulaula heini te Nengazen, ne igkeinuinu tew utew.'
40021043	Umba," ke si Jesus, "benar iyan he kenè kew en maan is menge Hudiyu edhedian te Megbevayà su iyan din edhedian is menge etew he edtuman te egkesuatan din.
40021044	Ne haazà he vatu, ke và dà egkeǥiya, iyan sikandin kes mibpilì he hadì, ne emun egkeuluǥan te etew haazà, egkepurung egkerupet is egkeulug dutun. Iyan, ke zuen etew he egkeuluǥan dutun te vatu ne egkepurung egkeapug is lawa zutun te egkeuluǥan."
40021045	Ne heini is menge sempità ni Jesus, nezineg te menge Perisiyu wey menge lavew he memumuhat ne nesavut dan he iyan din sikandan egkeǥiyen.
40021046	Iyan, hein ed-isipen dan en edekepa si Jesus, kenè dan egkehimu su egkehandek dan te mezakel he menge etew su midtuu is menge etew he ebpeneuven si Jesus te Megbevayà.
40022001	Ne mid-uman mebpenurù si Jesus te menge etew pinaaǥi te menge sempità.
40022002	Ke sikandin te, "Is kedhadì te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, ne iring te hadì he midtukud te zekelà he keemuran su ebpengesawa is anak din.
40022003	Midsuǥù din is menge suluǥuen din he ibpetukew sikan is menge etew he migkeǥiyan he zaan he ipetelavuk dan en dutun te keemuran. Iyan, is menge etew, wazè dan itetepian haazà is menge suluǥuen.
40022004	Ne mid-uman medsuǥù haazà is hadì te selakew en he menge suluǥuen din ne ke sikandin te, 'Keǥiyi niw sikan is menge etew he nelapè ku en is menge vaka wey menge impemelambù ku he nati, ne nelemise en is egkeenen. Ne medhendini en sikandan.'
40022005	Iyan, henduen be te wazà mekezineg haazà is menge etew. Wazè dan iniyuǥi is menge vaal zan. Is sevaha, ne ziyà te pemuleey zin ne is sevaha, ne ziyà te tindahan din.
40022006	Ne is duma he etew zutun, migewezan dan haazà is midsuǥù te hadì, ne mibpemuǥel zan ne human dan himetayi.
40022007	Ne zutun utew nepauk haazà is hadì. Midsuǥù din is menge sundaru zin ne sikan is nemumunù, mibpenhimetayan te menge sundaru ne mibinsulan dan is inged dutun te mibpenhimetayan dan.
40022008	Ne midtiǥum te hadì is menge suluǥuen din ne ke sikandin te, 'Nelemise en is keenen, iyan, sikan is ibpemetelavuk ku, kenè bes dait kayi te keemuran ku.
40022009	Umba, ikula niw is menge kersada he mezakel is menge etew zuen, ne minsan pira he etew is egkeehè niw ne ipehendini niw.'
40022010	Ne migenat haazà is menge suluǥuen din ne mid-ikul zan is menge kersada, ne is langun he etew he neuma zan, meupiya is ulaula zin se mezaat is ulaula zin, ne mid-umbita zan. Ne nepenù haazà te etew is turuǥan te hadì.
40022011	Ne zutun te kedseled te hadì su ed-ahaan din is nengetiǥum he etew, neehè din dutun is etew he wazà medsun-ud te bisti te eseweey.
40022012	Ne ke sikandin te, 'He Mama, maan is nekeaku ka he edtelavuk kayi te keemuran he wazè ka medsun-ud te bisti te eseweey?' Iyan, wazà igketavak dutun te etew.
40022013	Ne insuǥù dutun te hadì te menge suluǥuen din te, 'Bekusa niw is menge velad wey paa zin ne itimbag niw sikandin diyà te ǥawas, diyà te merusirem he utew meziyù. Ne zutun sikandin ebpekengingitel ne ebpekekulahì tenged te utew sikandin ebpekedsendit.'"
40022014	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Mezakel he menge etew is midtawag te Megbevayà wey zin egkehedii, iyan, mezelag dà is egkepilì din."
40022015	Ne zutun mid-ewaan si Jesus te menge Perisiyu su ed-uyunan dan ke hengkey is kegkepulutikahi zan ki Jesus wey mehimu he ikesumbung dan.
40022016	Ne midsuǥù dan diyà te ki Jesus is menge sumusundan dan wey menge sakup te upakat he midtukud ni Hirudis. Ne haazà is midsuǥù dan, migkaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Menunudlù, netuenan dey he metazeng ka he etew; su ibpenurù nu is tutuu he ebpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà, ne is lalag te menge etew, kenà ebpekehalin te ibpenurù nu tenged te wazè nu ibpelavi he minsan hentei.
40022017	Umba, keǥiyi key kenikew, ke ebpekesupak ki ve te kesuǥuan tew ke ebayad ki te vuhis diyà te hadì tew he ziyà te inged he Ruma?"
40022018	Ne netuenan ni Jesus ke hengkey is mezaat he ziyà te ǥehinawa zan ne ke sikandin te, "Teruen kew, maan is egezaman a keniyu?
40022019	Ipeehè niw kediey is selapì he ibayad niw te vuhis." Ne impeehè dan kandin is selapì.
40022020	Ne mid-insà si Jesus te, "Hentei ki zagwey wey ngazan heini is nekesurat kayi?"
40022021	Ne ke sikandan te, "Dagwey wey ngazan te hadì diyà te Ruma." Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Ne emun kandin, ne iyan egkesuatan din, iveǥey niw ziya te kandin, ne iveǥey niw zaan diyà te Megbevayà is kandin he azen," ke sikandin.
40022022	Ne hein nezineg dan haazà is lalag ni Jesus, utew zan nengeinuinu ne mid-ewaan dan si Jesus ne migawas dan dutun.
40022023	Ne netegteǥaad dutun, duen menge Sedusiyu he midhendiyà te ki Jesus. Is menge Sedusiyu, ne iyan is menge Hudiyu he edtuu he kenà egkengevanhew keuzemà is minsan hentei.
40022024	Ne migkeǥiyan dan si Jesus te, "Menunudlù, impenurù dengan ni Moises he emun duen maama he zuen din esawa ne ebpatey haazà is maama, kinahanglan he ebpemeluwen te suled dutun te maama haazà is ipag din su wey mevuwad haazà is minatey pinaaǥi zutun te suled din.
40022025	Ne zengan duen dini pitu he menge maama he teltelehazi. Mibpengesawa is kakey, iyan, minatey he wazà med-anak. Ne mibpemalu haazà is bahi te hazi zutun te minatey. Ne minatey zaan haazà is hazi he wazà mevuwad; ne haazà is bahi, mibpemalu en maan te hazi zutun te minatey. Ne iring din ded daan, minatey haazà is mibpemalu zutun te vahi he wazà mevuwad. Ne henduen dà duen su pudu nekeesawa zutun te vahi haazà is teltelesuled he pudu zin ingkevalu, iyan, nemematey zan maamin he wazà mevuwad.
40022027	Ne te ketepusan, minatey zaan haazà is bahi.
40022028	Ne keuzemà te andew ke egkengevanhew en is langun, hentei is hustu he teǥiesawa zutun te vahi? Su pudu nekeesawa kandin haazà is teltelesuled."
40022029	Ne midtavak kandan si Jesus te, "Nengesayep kew utew! Iyan is wazè niw mesavut sikan is ingkengesurat he menge Lalag te Megbevayà ne wazè niw zaan mesavut he mekeǥeǥehem is Megbevayà te kebpemanhew te menge minatey.
40022030	Su emun egkengevanhew en is menge minatey ne iring en sikandan te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit he kenà ebpees-eseweey is menge maama wey vahi.
40022031	Eguǥuzan ku sikiyu wey kew mevenari he egkevanhew is menge minatey. Wazè niw ves mevasa sikan is insurat he Lalag keniyu te Megbevayà?
40022032	Su minsan te minatey en dutun si Abraham, si Isaak, wey si Hakub, migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, 'Iyan a Megbevayà he ed-ezapen ni Abraham wey ni Isaak wey ni Hakub,' he ke va dà egkeǥiya, kemulu zan pa ed-azap te Megbevayà ; su is ed-azap kandin, minsan ke ebpatey, duen din pa untung."
40022033	Ne hein nezineg heini te menge mezakel he etew, nengeinuinu zan utew zutun te kebpenurù din.
40022034	Ne hein netuenan dutun te menge Perisiyu he wazà nehimu te menge Sedusiyu ziyà te ki Jesus he igkepezekepa zan kandin, midtiǥum sikandan.
40022035	Ne is sevaha zutun, menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne migezaman din dekepa is ketezengan ni Jesus pinaaǥi te menge insà.
40022036	"Menunudlù," ke sikandin, "hengkey is lavew he suǥù duen te kesuǥuan?"
40022037	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kinahanglan he iyan nu mahala ziyà te ǥehinawa nu is Megbevayà he Nengazen tew. Iyan nu sikandin mahala ziyà te ǥehinawa nu, isip nu, wey kedsavut nu.
40022038	Iyan heini lavew he suǥù he edhuna te langun.
40022039	Ne iring din ded daan is ikezuwa he iyan heini: 'Kinahanglan he mahala nu is duma nu; isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he ǥehinawa.'
40022040	Is tivuuk he kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin kenitew ni Moises wey is menge penurù te menge ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, kayi ebpuun te zezuwa he suǥù," ke sikandin.
40022041	Ne hein midtiǥum is menge Perisiyu, mid-insaan sikandan ni Jesus te,
40022042	"Hengkey is isip niw? Kes mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, hentei ki kevuwazan sikandin?" Ne midtavak dan te, "Kevuwazan sikandin ni Hadì David."
40022043	"Ne emun iyan heeyan," ke si Jesus, "maan is migkaǥi si David, pinaaǥi te ked-ulini kandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, he Nengazen din sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà? Su migkaǥi zengan si David te,
40022044	'Migkaǥi is Megbevayà diyà te Nengazen ku te, "Kayi ka pinuu te zapit te egkekewanan ku taman te kenè ku pa ibpeluhud diyà te kenikew is menge kuntada nu." '"
40022045	Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Emun migkaǥi ni David he Nengazen din sikan is ebperetengen he ibpahadì, egkehimu ve he kevuwazan dà duen ni David?"
40022046	Ne wazà neketavak ki Jesus dutun te minsan hengkey he menge insè din, ne puunè dà dutun wazè en maan nekeaku he ebpenginginsè pa maan kandin.
40023001	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te mezakel he menge etew wey ziyà te menge sumusundan din te,
40023002	"Is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey menge Perisiyu, insarig kandan is kebpenurù te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.
40023003	Umba, kinahanglan he ebentayan niw wey edtumanen niw is minsan hengkey he penurù dan keniyu. Iyan, kenè niw iringi mulà is ulaula zan su kenè dan edtumanen is ibpenurù dan keniyu.
40023004	Utew mezakel is mereǥen he tulumanen he ibpetuman dan te menge etew, iyan, wazà minsan hengkey he idtavang dan dutun te menge etew wey meketuman haazà is etew zutun te ibpetuman dan.
40023005	Mezakel is ed-ul-ulahan dan wey sikandan mezalig te menge etew su ibpeehè dan he edtumanen dan is suǥù te Megbevayà pinaaǥi zà te ebped-eepizen dan he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he ibedbed dan diyà te velad dan wey ziyà te vuked dan, wey pinaaǥi te utew meluag he sidsid te kemisula zan.
40023006	Iyan egkesuatan dan he utew zan tehuza ke edtelavuk dan te keemuran; ne emun diyè dan te simbahan, egkesuatan dan he iyan sikandan ibpepinuu ziyà te ebpepinuuwan te lavew he menge etew.
40023007	Utew ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa zan ke edtehuzen sikandan te menge etew ziyà te tiyenggiyan wey ke ed-umawen sikandan he 'menunudlù.'
40023008	Kenè niw ituǥut he iyan id-umew keniyu is 'menunudlù' su teltelesuled kew is langun ne sebsevaha zà is menunudlù niw he iyan a.
40023009	Kenè niw zaan gerari te 'amey' is minsan hentei kayi te kelibutan su sebsevaha zà is Amey niw he iyan is Megbevayà diyà te langit.
40023010	Kenè niw zaan ituǥut he iyan id-umew keniyu is 'egalen' su siak is mibpilì te Megbevayà, iyan e zà egalen niw.
40023011	Ne is ed-isipen niw he lavew ziyà te keniyu, kinahanglan he egkehimu sikandin he suluǥen niw te langun.
40023012	Sikan is ebpelavew, edhimuwen te Megbevayà he egkelevawan sikandin te langun. Ne sikan is ed-isipen din he lavew kandin is minsan hentei keniyu, edhimuwen sikandin te Megbevayà he lavew te minsan hentei keniyu.
40023013	Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Su ke zuen etew he ibeǥey zin pezem is gehinawa zin diyà te hadì tew he Megbevayà, kenè niw edtuǥutan, ne kenè niw zaan ibpeveyveyaan is gehinawa niw te Megbevayà.
40023014	Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Edlimbungan niw is menge valu he vahi wey niw maangken is baley zutun te edlimbungan niw. Ne utew meluǥayad is ked-ampù niw he iyan paaǥi te kedtembuni niw te mezaat he mibeelan niw. Tenged kayi utew zekelà is silut keniyu te Megbevayà.
40023015	Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Edlayun kew te zaǥat ne edhipenawen niw is meluag he tanà wey niw mekabig is etew; ne is egkekabig niw, edhimuen niw he tuwas pa he zait sikandin he edsilutan diyà te Impirnu, kenà sikiyu.
40023016	Kehizu niw, su iring kew te lakap he ed-aǥak te sengelelakap. Ibpenurù niw he ke zuen etew he ebpenaad ne ibpengumew-umew zin duen te zekelà he simbahan, egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen haazà he penaad. Ne ibpenurù niw zaan he emun iyan din ebpengum-umawen sikan is bulawan duen te simbahan, kenà egkehimu ke kenè din edtumanen haazà is penaad din.
40023017	Menge lakap kew he tulebung! Su iyan bes lavew sikan is bulawan duen te Valey te Megbevayà! Kenà egkehimu! Su sikan is bulawan, iyan igketeǥui zin te ǥehem te Megbevayà su ǥeina te nekeseled duen te Valey te Megbevayà.
40023018	Ne ibpenurù niw zaan he ke zuen etew he ebpenaad, ne ke ibpengumew-umew zin duen te vangkù he ebpemuhatan diyà te Valey te Megbevayà, egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is penaad. Iyan, emun iyan din ebpengum-umawen sikan is impemuhat he ziyà mekesavuk te vangkù ne kenà egkehimu ke kenè din edtumanen is penaad din.
40023019	Utew kew nelakap su iyan bes lavew is impemuhat? Kenà egkehimu, su iyan igketeǥui zin te ǥehem te Megbevayà sikan is bangkù he ebpemuhatan.
40023020	Ne tenged dutun, ke zuen ebpenaad, ne ebpengum-umawen din sikan is bangkù duen te seled te Valey te Megbevayà, kenà iyan dà sikan is bangkù egkeambit din, kekenà, elin sikan is impemuhat he zuen mekesavuk te vangkù.
40023021	Iring din ded daan ke zuen etew he ebpengum-umawen din is Baley te Megbevayà, kenà iyan sikan is baley egkeambit din, kekenà, iyan is Megbevayà he zutun ed-ubpà.
40023022	Ne ke zuen etew he ebpenaad ne ebpengum-umawen din is langit, iyan tutuu he egkeumew zin sikan is pinuuwà te Megbevayà, ne emun egkeambit din sikan is pinuuwà te Megbevayà, iyan tutuu he egkeambit din is Megbevayà.
40023023	Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu, su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Ibeǥey niw te Megbevayà is ikepulù he vahin minsan te menge perehemut te egkeenen iring te yirbebuyna, anis, wey kuminu, iyan, kenè niw edtumanen is menge lavew pa he suǥù iring te ked-ula-ula te metazeng, kegkehizu te zuma niw, wey kedtumana niw te menge penaad niw. Kinahanglan he ibeǥey niw is ikepulù, iyan, kenè niw zaan teǥaka heini is menge lavew pa he suǥù.
40023024	Iring kew te lakap he ed-aǥak te sengelelakap. Kenè niw egkeaku te ebaal is utew zeisey he salà, iyan, egkeekuwan niw mulà te ebaal is utew zekelà he salà.
40023025	Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Ebpurungan niw ebentayi is menge vetasan niw, iyan, diyà te isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw ne zuen keheheramham wey kelelalung. Iring kew te vasu wey pinggan he nelumpiyuwan diyà te ǥawas, iyan, meremerik is diyà te seled.
40023026	Iring kew te lakap is menge Perisiyu! Lumpiyuwi niw hunai is idseled niw zutun ne human egkelumpiyu is tasa niw wey pinggan niw.
40023027	Kehizu niw, te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu, su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Iring kew te valey he vatu he iyan lungun he mibpintalan te meputì he zutun idsavuk is lawa te nemematey. Meupiya he ed-ahaan diyà te ǥawas, iyan, dutun te seled din ne menge tulan te minatey he nengeredak en.
40023028	Iring kew zutun su emun ed-ahaan kew te etew henduen be te meupiya is ulaula niw, iyan, diyà te ǥehinawa niw, dutun is kedtarùtarù wey kedsupak te suǥù te Megbevayà.
40023029	Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Mideyzeyanan niw is menge valey he vatu he iyan inlungun niw te menge lawa te nemematey zengan he menge metazeng wey ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà.
40023030	Ne egkaǥi kew te, 'Angin ke neetew kiw en dutun te timpu te menge kepuun tew he mibpenhimetayan dan sikan is ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà su kenè kiw mulà dutun edtampu te mibeelan dan.'
40023031	Ne venar ves iyan he iyan kew sikan is menge kevuwazan te menge etew zengan he nekevunù te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà su iring kew kandan.
40023032	Himesaza niw en is mezaat he ulaula he wazà mepasad te menge kepuun niw!
40023033	Iring kew te menge uled wey menge anak te uled su utew mezaat is ulaula niw. Ebmenmenuwen niw te kedlikey is silut keniyu ziyà te Impirnu?
40023034	Su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ibpehendiyan ku pa te keniyu is ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà, wey menge etew he mibeǥayan te Megbevayà te ketau, wey menge menunudlù. Ne edhimetayan niw is duma kandan. Ne is duma, idransang niw ziyà te krus ne ebpemuǥelen niw is duma ziyà te seled te menge simbahan niw ne ed-elawen niw sikandan diyà te minsan hendei he inged he egkepeveyaan dan te ebpemelaǥuy.
40023035	Tenged kayi, iyan kew edsilutan te kebpemunua te langun he menge metazeng he nevunù puunè dà dutun te kedhimetayi ki Abel he metazeng he etew zengan, taman te kedhimetayi te anak ni Berekiyas he si Zacarias he mibunù niw ziyà te pid-elangan te Valey te Megbevayà wey vangkù he pemuhatà.
40023036	Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, elin kew zaan edsilutan tenged te kegkengevunù kayi te langun."
40023037	Ne zutun netenuzan ni Jesus is menge ulaula te menge meǥinged te Hiruselim ne ke sikandin te, "Igkeseeng ku sikiyu is menge meǥinged diyà te Hiruselim su ebpemunuen niw is ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà, ne is menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà he ibpehendiyan, ebpenulengen niw te vatu he edhimetayan niw. Utew zekelà is suat ku pezem he ed-uyemuwen ku sikiyu; ke và dà manuk, iring a te upa he edlekupan din is menge piyak din, ne kenè kew ebpelekup.
40023038	Ne ǥuntaan, utew mekevulungbulung heini is simbahan niw su mid-iniyuǥan kew en te Megbevayà.
40023039	Su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kenè ad maan keniyu egkeahà taman dutun te timpu keuzemà he ebpekekaǥi kew te, 'Deliǥa is nekeuma he midsuǥù te Nengazen.'"
40024001	Ne migawas si Jesus puun dutun te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne te ked-awè din dutun, mid-uvayan sikandin te menge sumusundan din su ibpeehè dan kandin is Baley te Megbevayà wey is menge valey he ziyà te uvey zutun.
40024002	Ne migkaǥi kandan si Jesus te, "Tengtengi niw heini is langun su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he heini is menge vatu he imbevaley zan kayi, wazà minsan sevaha keuzemà he ebpekeuntud diyà te sevaha su egkewaǥey heeyan is langun."
40024003	Ne netegteǥaad dutun mibpinuu si Jesus diyà te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan. Ne mid-uvayan en maan sikandin te menge sumusundan din te wazè dan duma su iyan dan dà. Ne ke sikandan te, "Keǥiyi key ke keenu egkehitavù heini is langun, wey ke hengkey is egkeulaula he tuus wey zey metueni he iyan en kedlikù nu wey kegketapus kayi te timpu?"
40024004	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Andam kew wey kenè kew mekesundan te teruen he etew.
40024005	Su mezakel is ebpenlepew he egamit te ngazan ku ne egkaǥi is kada sevaha zutun he iyan sikandin sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì! Ne mezakel is ebpeketuu te menge tarù dan.
40024006	Egkezineg niw ziyà te uvey niw is meǥurub tenged te ǥira ne egkezineg niw zaan is tudtul te menge ǥira ziyà te meziyù he tanà. Iyan, kenè kew mahandek su kinahanglan he egkeulaula is iring kayi te kenè pa edtepusen heini is timpu.
40024007	Ebpekidtebek is sengeinged te zuma zin he inged; ne egira is sengeǥinhedian te zuma zin he ǥinhedian. Egkehitavù is bitil wey menge linug diyà te minsan hendei.
40024008	Iyan, heini he egkehitavù, ne iring te ed-anak he sikan pa ebpuunà is belilit din.
40024009	Egkuntedahan kew te tivuuk he menusiyà tenged te menge sumusundan ku sikiyu. Ne edekepen kew te menge etew ne ibpalad kew zan diyà te edrasey keniyu ne is duma keniyu edhimetayan dan.
40024010	Dutun he timpu, mezakel is egkepenulayan ne ibpalad te kada sevaha zutun is duma zin he tumutuu wey mehimetayi ne ebpekunkuntedehè dan.
40024011	Ne zutun ebpemenlepew is mezakel he teruen he etew he egkaǥi is uman sevaha kandan he ebpeneuven sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne mezakel is egkelimbungan dan.
40024012	Ne tenged te kebpekeeneb te kelelalung te menusiyà egkeawà diyà te ǥehinawa te kezekelan dutun is kebmahala zan te zuma zan.
40024013	Iyan, sikan is kemulu pa edtuu ke egkeuma haazà is ketepusan te menge kemeresayan, iyan ebeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
40024014	Ne idsangyew ziyà te tivuuk he kelibutan heini is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te kedhadì te Megbevayà wey metueni heini te tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne emun egkepasad en haazà ne iyan en ketepusan.
40024015	Si Daniel, sikan is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà dengan, netagnè din is egngezanan te melimezang he ebpekekaid. (Is ebpekevasa kayi te netagnè din, kinahanglan he sevuta zutun te nekevasa haazà is nevasa zin.) Ne emun egkeehè niw he ziyè en heini ebpekehitindeg te Valey te Megbevayà,
40024016	mebpelaǥuy zan is diyà te prubinsya he Hudiya pehendiyà te menge vuvungan.
40024017	Sikan is etew he egkeserengà diyà te ǥawas te valey zin, kenè en med-usik-usik pa te timpu te kedseled diyà te valey he egkuwa te minsan hengkey te azen din.
40024018	Sikan is etew he ziyà egkeserengà te pemuleey zin, kenè en med-ulì te kegkuwa te malung din.
40024019	Ne zutun he andew, kehizu utew te menge vahi he memeǥingey wey ebpemenleǥimu su utew zan egkengereǥenan he ebpelaǥuy!
40024020	Hamen kew he ed-ampù diyà te Megbevayà he kenà heini meserengà is kebpelaǥuy niw zutun te timpu te meǥenew wey zutun te Andew te Kedhimeley.
40024021	Su utew mepait is kemeresayan dutun he timpu. Wazè pa meulaula is iring kayi puun pa te kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan. Ne emun egkehitavù heini kenè en maan egkehitavù is iring din te minsan keenu.
40024022	Iyan, midterinan en te Megbevayà is timpu zutun te kemeresayan su emun wazà, egkelimas dutun is tivuuk he menusiyà. Iyan, tenged te egkehizuwan din is menge pinilì din he etew, midterinan din is timpu zutun te kemeresayan.
40024023	Ne ke zuen egkaǥi ziyà te keniyu te, 'Ahaa niw; heini en is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà,' wey ke zuen be egkaǥi te, 'Heeyan en sikandin,' kenè kew mebpemineg dutun te egkaǥi.
40024024	Su zuen ebpemenlepew he menge teruen. Ne egkaǥi is kada sevaha kandan te, 'Iyan a sikan is hadì,' ne emun kenà, ne ke sikandin te, 'Ebpeneuven a te Megbevayà.' Ne ebpemeehè dan te egkein-inuwan wey menge singyal su ibpetuu zan pezem te menge tarù dan, ke egkehimu, is menge pinilì te Megbevayà.
40024025	Kenè niw heini lipati su mibpetizeenan ku sikiyu he zaan.
40024026	Ne emun duen egkaǥi te, 'Ahaa niw, su is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà, diyè en sikandin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew,' ne haazà is etew he egkaǥi, kenè niw pemineǥa. Ne emun duen daan egkaǥi te, 'Kayi sikandin med-eles,' haazà is egkaǥi, kenè niw zaan tuuwi.
40024027	Su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iring is kedlikù ku te kilat he idtik-ew ibmerayag te tivuuk he langit puun te edsilaan pehendiyà te edsenlepan. Egkeahà heini te langun.
40024028	Iyan, ke hendei is egkemahù, kenà egkehimu he kenà dutun daan is menge uwak he edhurun, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenà egkehimu he kenà egkehitavù heini is langun.
40024029	Ne emun egkeiwas haazà is timpu te kemeresayan, kenè en edsilà is andew ne kenè en daan ed-anlag is bulan. Egkengeulug is menge vituen diyà te langit, ne egkengewaleng is menge kedesenan diyà te hewhewanan.
40024030	Ne zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, egkeahà diyà te langit is tuus te kebpekeuma ku. Ne zutun utew egkengeseeng is langun he menge etew zini te kelibutan. Ne egkeehè e zan is Kakey te Menusiyà diyà te menge ǥapun su ebpekeuma a. Ne utew zekelà is gehem ku wey utew merayag is ked-anlag ku.
40024031	Ne zutun edsuǥuen ku is menge velinsuǥuen ku ziyà te heepat he pesaǥi kayi te kelibutan ne ibpezaǥing is budyung ne edtiǥumen dan is menge pinilì ku he etew he ebpemuun diyà te minsan hendei kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.
