40024032	Isipa niw is ibpenurù ku keniyu pinaaǥi te sempità he kayu he igira. Dini te kenita, emun ebpeneringsing en is subpang dutun he kayu ne ebpenlumbey en, egketuenan ta he meǥaan en is gulavung.
40024033	Iring din ded daan, emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en is langun kayi te migkaǥi ku, egketuenan niw he meǥaan a ebpekelikù.
40024034	Tenuzi niw is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu: emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en heini kenè kew pa egkeamin ebpatey taman te kenè pa egkengetuman heini is langun.
40024035	Egkehanew is langit wey tanà, iyan, heini is migkaǥi ku, kenà mulà egkehanew te minsan keenu.
40024036	Is Amey tew he Megbevayà, iyan dà nesayud ke keenu egketuman heini is langun. Ne ǥawas kandin wazè en nesayud te andew wey uras ke keenu heini egkehitavù. Is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà diyà te langit, wazè dan mesayud, wey minsan siak is Anak te Megbevayà, wazà a zaan mesayud.
40024037	Ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, keuzemà te timpu te kedlikù ku zini te kelibutan, ebpekeiring is menge ulaula te menge etew zutun duen te menge ulaula zengan te menge etew zuen te timpu ni Noe.
40024038	Su te wazè pa medlapey is daǥat, wazà diyà te isip dan ke hengkey is egkehitavù. Iyan dà neisip te menge etew is kegkebibu ne migkaan dan ne mid-inum dan ne mibpees-eseweey zan taman te midseled en si Noe te zekelà he avang he egngezanan te arka.
40024039	Ne wazà diyà te isip te menge etew sikan is egkehitavù kandan taman te midlapey is daǥat ne nengelened sikandan. Ne iring ded dutun keǥaan is kegketik-ew te kedlikù ku te Kakey te Menusiyà keuzemà.
40024040	Dutun he timpu zuen dezuwa he maama he ziyà te pemuleey su edterebahu; egkuwaan te menge velinsuǥuen ku is sevaha zutun ne egketaǥak is sevaha.
40024041	Ne zutun duen daan dezuwa he vahi he ebpeuǥupà te kebpenggaling; ne egkuwaan te velinsuǥuen ku is sevaha ne egketaǥak is sevaha.
40024042	Purungpurung kew su kenè niw egketuenan ke keenu he andew is kedlikù ku te Nengazen niw.
40024043	Kenè niw heini lipati he emun egketuenan te teǥiǥaked te valey ke keenu ebpekeuma is tekawen dutun te valey zin, ne kenà sikandin edlipezeng. Ne zutun, kenà egkeselezan te tekawen haazà is baley.
40024044	Iring din ded daan, layun kew andam su ebpekeuma a is Kakey te Menusiyà te uras he kenà a keniyu ebperetengen.
40024045	Sikan is suluǥuen he uluwanen wey metinumanen, iyan ibpevayàbayà te egalen din te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen. Ne iyan ebpekaan te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen dutun te uras te kegkaan.
40024046	Emun ed-ulì haazà is egalen din, utew zekelà is kelipey zutun te suluǥuen ke egkeahà te egalen din he midtuman din en is langun he ebpeveelan kandin.
40024047	Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he is suluǥuen he metinumanen, idsarig kandin is langun he menge azen te egalen din.
40024048	Iyan, kehizu zin ke iyan diyà te isip din is egkeuǥet pa ed-ulì haazà is egalen din,
40024049	ne ebpemuǥelen din is menge zuma zin he suluǥuen; ne egkaan wey ed-inum duma te menge lelenguten.
40024050	Su zutun he andew te wazè din peebuta wey zutun te uras he wazè din metueni, ebpekeulì haazà is egalen din.
40024051	Ne haazà he suluǥuen, edsilutan sikandin dutun te egalen din ne ebeelan diyà te kandin is iring te ebeelan daan diyà te menge etew he tarù is kedtuu zan. Ne zutun ebpekekulahì sikandin ne ebpekengingitel tuus te utew zin kebpekedsendit."
40025001	"Dutun te kedlikù ku, is kedhadì te Megbevayà, ne iring te sempità he sepulù he raǥa he netukid te sulù su edsinuǥungen dan is ebpengesawa.
40025002	Is lelima kandan, ne tulebung; ne is duma zan he lelima, ne memetau.
40025003	Haazà is menge tulebung, mid-uwit dan is menge sulù dan, iyan, wazà gas he mid-uwit dan he teǥana ke egkeamin is gas dutun te seled te sulù dan.
40025004	Ne haazà is memetau, kada sevaha kandan mid-uwit te sulù lapik is gas he intaǥù te butilya he teǥana ke egkeamin is gas dutun te sulù dan.
40025005	Ne ǥeina te neuǥet mekeuma sikan is ebpengesawa, ebpemekezungkàdungkè dan en dutun is edtaǥad he ebpemekelipezeng.
40025006	Ne hein metaneb en dutun is kezukileman ne nezineg dan is ed-umew te, 'Heini en sikan is ebpengesawa; sinuǥunga niw en sikandin.'
40025007	Ne nepukew haazà is sepulù he raǥa ne midsusi zan is menge sulù dan ne mibpurungan dan.
40025008	Ne zutun migkaǥi haazà is menge tulebung dutun te menge memetau te, 'Beǥayi key te gas su egkengeevukan en is kenami he menge sulù.'
40025009	Ne midtavak haazà is memetau te, 'Kenà egkehimu su kenà egkampet kenitew te langun is gas he neuwit dey. Hendiyè kew te tindahan wey kew mekepemasa te gas.'
40025010	Ne zutun migenat haazà is menge tulebung su ebpemasa zan te gas, ne hein nehaus dan en nekeuma sikan is ebpengesawa. Ne haazà is lelima he menge raǥa he memetau, miduma zan kandin te edseled dutun te valey he zutun is eseweey. Ne hein nekeseled dan en dutun ne midlekevan haazà is baley.
40025011	Ne netegteǥaad dutun nekeuma zaan haazà is menge zuma zan he raǥa; ne ziyè dan dà te ǥawas is egkaǥi te, 'He Nengazen, he Nengazen, puwasi key.'
40025012	Ne midtavak haazà is ebpengesawa te, 'Kenè ku sikiyu egkekilala.'"
40025013	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iring dutun, kinahanglan he andam kew su wazè niw metueni ke hengkey he andew wey ke hengkey he uras is kedlikù ku.
40025014	Is kedhadì te Megbevayà ne iring daan te etew he edhipanew. Te wazè pa sikandin megenat, midtiǥum din is menge suluǥuen din su idsarig din kandan is selapì din wey zan ikepetiǥayun.
40025015	Mibahin din kandan sumalà is egkeveleveg te uman sevaha kandan te ebpetiǥayun. Is sevaha, mibeǥayan din te lelima he libu he pisus; ne is sevaha, mibeǥayan din te zezuwa he libu; ne is sevaha pa, nengkelibu he pisus is imbeǥey zin dutun. Ne zutun migenat haazà is etew he edhipanew.
40025016	Ne sikan is suluǥuen he mibeǥayan te lelima he libu he pisus, impetiǥayun din haazà is kandin, ne netiǥayun te lelima pa he libu.
40025017	Iring din ded daan sikan is suluǥuen he mibeǥayan te zezuwa he libu he pisus, su netiǥayun daan te zezuwa pa he libu.
40025018	Iyan, sikan is suluǥuen he mibeǥayan te nengkelibu he pisus, mid-awà dutun ne inleveng din diyà te tanà haazà is selapì dutun te egalen din.
40025019	Ne hein neuǥet dutun, mid-ulì haazà is egalen dan su edsusiyen din haazà is selapì din.
40025020	Ne midtelavuk kandin sikan is suluǥuen din he mibeǥayan te lelima he libu he pisus ne indata zin haazà is selapì ragkes sikan is genansya he lelima he libu. Ne ke sikandin te, 'Mibeǥayan a kenikew te lelima he libu he pisus; ne heini zed is genansya he lelima he libu he pisus.'
40025021	Ne migkaǥi haazà is egalen din te, 'Utew meupiya is baal nu! Metinumanen ka he suluǥuen! Ne ǥeina te egkeseriǥan ka te zeisey he selapì idsarig ku kenikew is dekelà. Seled ka zini wey ka mekeambit te kelipey ku.'
40025022	Ne midtelavuk daan kandin sikan is mibeǥayan din te zezuwa he libu he pisus ne ke sikandin te, 'Datù, mibeǥayan a kenikew te zezuwa he libu he pisus. Ahaa nu, heini zed daan is genansya he zezuwa he libu he pisus.'
40025023	Ne migkaǥi haazà is egalen din te, 'Utew meupiya is baal nu! Metinumanen ka he suluǥuen! Geina te egkeseriǥan ka te zeisey he selapì, idsarig ku kenikew is dekelà. Seled ka zini wey ka medlipey te kelipey ku.'
40025024	Ne midtelavuk daan sikan is suluǥuen he mibeǥayan din te nengkelibu he pisus. Ke sikandin te, 'Datù, netuenan ku he wazè nu kehizu su edreǥunen nu is kenè nu pinemula, ne ebpenggenansya ka te wazè nu ipetiǥayun.
40025025	Ingkehandek ku sikew umba inleveng ku ziyà te tanà is selapì nu. Ahaa nu; heini zed sikan is selapì nu.'
40025026	Ne midtavak haazà is egalen din te, 'Utew mezaat is baal nu! Peǥulen ka he suluǥuen! Netuenan nu ves he edreǥunen ku is kenè ku pinemula ne ebpenggenansya a te wazè ku ipetiǥayun?
40025027	Maan is wazè nu ipeutang heeyan is selapì ku wey mepursintuwi wey medekelà is bali zin wey ku mezawat kayi te kedlikù ku?'
40025028	Ne zutun migkaǥi sikandin diyà te selakew en he suluǥuen te, 'Kuwaa nu heeyan is nengkelibu he pisus keniyan te kandin ne iveǥey nu ziyà te nekekuwa te sepulù he libu.
40025029	Su sikan is egkeseriǥan te insarig kandin, ed-umanan pa. Iyan, sikan is kenà egkeseriǥan, edhewien diyà te kandin minsan is deisek he insarig kandin.
40025030	Ne heini is wazè din pulus he suluǥuen, itimbag niw ziyà te merusirem he utew meziyù diyà te ǥawas. Dutun ne ebpekekulahì wey ebpekengingitel tenged te utew ebpekedsendit.'
40025031	Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, dutun te kedlikù ku he utew zekelà is gehem te ked-anlag ku wey edumahan ad te langun he menge velinsuǥuen ku, ebpinuu ad is edhadì.
40025032	Ebpekeetuvang kedì is tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne zutun edtepizen ku sikandan te zezuwa he vahin iring te kedtepiza te bekidu zuen te menge kambing wey menge kerehidu.
40025033	Idtapid ku is iring te menge kerehidu ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku, ne sikan is iring te menge kambing, idtapid ku ziyà te zapit te egkeǥivang ku.
40025034	Ne zutun, siak is hadì, egkeǥiyan ku is menge etew ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku te, 'Sikiyu is midtuvazan te Amey ku he Megbevayà, kayi kew su iyan kew edhedian ku. Su is kedhadì ku keniyu, inteǥana en dengan puun pa te kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan.
40025035	Su hein nevitil a, impekaan a keniyu; ne hein nemezahan a, impeinum a keniyu; minsan wazà a keniyu mekilala, midawat a keniyu ziyan te valey niw.
40025036	Hein wazè ku ugelingen mibeǥayan a keniyu; hein nezeruwan a, mid-elimahan a keniyu. Hein nepirisu a, midlauy a keniyu.'
40025037	Ne ed-insaan a zutun te menge etew he metazeng he ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku te, 'Nengazen, keenu zey sikew maahà he nevitil wey nemezahan ne impekaan dey wey impeinum dey sikew?
40025038	Keenu zey sikew zewata ziyà te valey zey te wazè dey sikew mekilala? Keenu ka megkinahanglan te ugelingen nu, ne mibeǥayan dey sikew?
40025039	Keenu zey sikew melauy he egkezeruwan wey ziyà te pirisuan?'
40025040	Ne zutun, siak is hadì, edtavak a te, 'Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke mid-ulaula niw heini ziyà te minsan sevaha kayi te menge suled ku, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, menge tumutuu kedì, minsan ke utew minus is pid-etawen din, neulaula niw en heini ziyà te kedì.'
40025041	Ne zutun egkeǥiyan ku is menge etew he ziyà te zapit te egkeǥivang ku te, 'Sikiyu is midrewakan te Amey ku he Megbevayà, awè kew kayi! Su zutun kew te regreg he wazè din pidtemanan he inteǥana he zaan ki Setanas he iyan idsilut kandin duma te menge velinsuǥuen din!
40025042	Su zengan nevitil a, iyan, wazà a keniyu ipekaan; nemezahan a, ne wazà a keniyu ipeinum.
40025043	Wazè ku egkepemenehikan ne wazà a keniyu zewata ziyà te valey niw. Egkinahanglan a te ugelingen, iyan, wazà a keniyu meveǥayi. Nezeruwan a, ne ziyà a te pirisuan, iyan, wazà a keniyu leuya.'
40025044	Ne ed-insè dan te, 'Nengazen, keenu zey sikew maahà he egkevitil, ebpekeinum, wazà egkepemenehikan, wazà ugelingen, nezeruwan, wey ziyà te pirisuan ne wazè dey sikew metevangi?'
40025045	Ne zutun edtavak a is hadì te, 'Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke wazè niw tevangi is minsan sevaha kayi te utew minus is pid-etawan din, siak is wazè niw metevangi.'
40025046	Ne heini he menge etew," ke si Jesus, "id-awà kayi su edsilutan sikandan te silut he wazè din pidtemanan; iyan, is menge metazeng mulà, ebeǥayan sikandan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan."
40026001	Ne hein nepasad ni Jesus haazà is kebpenurù din dutun te langun, migkaǥi sikandin diyà te menge sumusundan din te,
40026002	"Netuenan niw he mekezuwa zà guntaan ne egketuman en sikan is pista he egngezanan te Pista te Kedlevayi. Ne zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge etew wey e zan ikeransang te krus," ke sikandin.
40026003	Ne zutun is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, midtiǥum dan diyà te turuǥan ni Keyipas he lavew he memumuhat
40026004	su ebpengahaan dan is paaǥi wey zan mezakep si Jesus he kenà egketuenan te mezakel he menge etew.
40026005	"Deyzey nasì," ke sikandan, "ke kenè tew sikandin edekepen dutun te timpu te pista su kela ke edsinamuk is menge etew."
40026006	Ne hein diyà si Jesus te inged he Bitanya, diyà sikandin te valey ni Simun te it-iten he neulian en.
40026007	Ne mid-uvey ziyà te kandin is bahi he zuen din pelenahan he mibeelan puun te vatu he egngezanan te elebastru he midteǥuan haazà is pelenahan te mehemut he agwa he utew mahal. Ne impetiǥis din haazà is agwa ziyà te ulu ni Jesus te kemulu pa zutun egkaan si Jesus.
40026008	Ne hein naahà haazà dutun te menge sumusundan din ne nengepauk dan. Ke sikandan te, "Maan is mid-us-usikan din heeyan is agwa?
40026009	Meupiya pa ke imbelegyè din heeyan te utew mahal wey ikeveǥey is halin diyà te egkengeayuayu!"
40026010	Ne netuenan ni Jesus haazà is migkaǥi zan, ne ke sikandin te, "Pesegdana niw en heini is bahi. Utew meupiya heini is mid-ulaula zin dini te kedì.
40026011	Layun niw egketevangi is egkengeayuayu su kenè niw mulà sikandan egkesuwey, iyan, siak, meǥaan ku en sikiyu egkesuwey.
40026012	Mid-egwahan e zin su wey meteǥana is lawa ku zutun te kedlevenga kedì.
40026013	Tenuzi niw he kenà sikandin egkelipatan. Su minsan hendei idsangyew heini is Meupiya he Tudtulanen dini te tivuuk he kelibutan, egketudtul zaan heini is mid-ula-ula zin dini te kedì."
40026014	Ne te iyan daan haazà he timpu, sevaha zuen te sepulù wey dezuwa he sumusundan, sikan is migngezanan ki Hudas he tigKeriyuti, midhendiyà sikandin te menge punuan he memumuhat.
40026015	Ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Pira is idsuhul niw kedì ke pinaaǥi kedì igkepalad diyà te keniyu si Jesus?" Ne mibilang dan dutun is ketluan he elad he pelata ne imbeǥey zan diyà te ki Hudas.
40026016	Ne puun dutun mibpengahà si Hudas te paaǥi ke ebmenmenuwen din te ed-akal si Jesus su wey mezakep dutun te menge etew.
40026017	Ne zutun te nehuna he andew te Pista te Kegkeena te Supas he Wazè Din Tapey, mid-uvayan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din ne ke sikandan te, "Hendei is baley he egkesuatan nu he edhilutuan dey wey meteǥana is idlavung nu kayi te Pista te Kedlevayi?"
40026018	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus he medhendiyè dan te inged, diyà te etew he zaan he migkaǥi zin kandan ne keǥiyi zan haazà is etew he egkaǥi is menunudlù tew te, "Meǥaan en is kebpatey ku; dini key edlavung te menge sumusundan ku su Pista te Kedlevayi heini."
40026019	Ne mid-ulaula te menge sumusundan ni Jesus haazà is insuǥù din kandan ne midteǥana zan is idlavung dan dutun te Pista te Kedlevayi.
40026020	Ne te kegkezukilem dutun, si Jesus wey sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din, diyè dan te lemisahan.
40026021	Ne hein egkaan dan en dutun migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Duen egkeǥiyen ku keniyu. Iyan is: sevaha kayi te keniyu is ed-akal kedì wey a mehimetayi."
40026022	Ne utew nengeseeng haazà is menge sumusundan din, ne zutun mid-insà kandin is kada sevaha zutun te, "Nengazen, iyan e ve egkeǥiyen nu?"
40026023	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Sevaha kayi te edtuǥen kedì iyan ed-akal kedì.
40026024	Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpatey a sumalà te netagnà duen te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan, kehizu utew zuen te etew he ed-akal kedì. Meupiya pa ziyà te kandin ke wazè en sikandin ianak."
40026025	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Hudas, kes ed-akal kandin te, "Menunudlù, iyan e ve ed-akal kenikew?" Ne ke si Jesus te, "Uya, iyan ka."
40026026	Ne zutun te kemulu zan pa egkaan, mid-amì si Jesus te supas, ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà ne mibpenevìtevì din ne impemeǥey zin diyà te menge sumusundan din. Ke sikandin te, "Iyan heini lawa ku; dewata niw wey keena niw."
40026027	Ne zutun mid-amì din is tasa he midteǥuan te vinu te paras, ne mibpeselematan din daan te Megbevayà ne induwal zin diyà te kandan. Ke sikandin te, "Pudu kew kayi inum.
40026028	Su lengesa ku heini he ibpetiǥis wey mepelisi is mezakel he menge etew wey mepesaylu is menge salè dan. Tuus heini te paaǥi te kegkelibri he midtukud te Megbevayà.
40026029	Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kenè ku en maan ed-inumen is binu taman dutun te timpu keuzemà he ed-iinumey kiw te veǥu en he vinu emun edhadì en is Amey ku he Megbevayà."
40026030	Ne zutun migkanta zan te kedalig te Megbevayà ne hein nepasad haazà migawas dan ne midhendiyè dan te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan.
40026031	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Is langun te sikiyu, ne edluyahan is kedsarig niw kediey ǥuntaan te mezukilem tenged te egkehitavù kedì; su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Edhimetayan ku is ed-elima te menge kerehidu ne ebpekedsusuwey is menge kerehidu.'
40026032	Iyan, emun egkevanhew ad, edhuna a keniyu ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya."
40026033	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro ziyà te kandin te, "Minsan ke edluyahan is kedsarig kenikew kayi te langun he menge zuma ku ne kenà mulà edluyahan is kedì, minsan egkemenumenu."
40026034	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te ki Pedro te, "Benar is egkeǥiyen ku kenikew he te kenè pe kan ebpengukarà is manuk, ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekaǥi he kenà a kenikew egkekilala!"
40026035	Ne migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Minsan pa ke edhimetayan a zuma kenikew kenà a egkaǥi he wazè ku sikew mekilala!" Ne iring ded daan dutun is menge pesarig dutun te zuma he menge sumusundan ni Jesus.
40026036	Ne kebpekeuma zutun eni Jesus diyà te Gitsimeni, migkeǥiyan din is menge sumusundan din te, "Kayi kew zà pinuu su edlaus key ziyà su ed-ampù a."
40026037	Ne miduma zin si Pedro wey sikan is dezuwa he anak ni Sibidiyu. Ne zutun utew neseeng sikandin wey mibmesakit utew is gehinawa zin.
40026038	Ne migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Utew mesakit is gehinawa ku. Henduen be te egkevidtew en. Kayi kew zà ne kenè kew medlipezeng."
40026039	Ne midlaus si Jesus diyà te uvey zà dutun ne midlangkeb sikandin ne mid-ampù, ke sikandin te, "Amey ku, ke egkehimu zà ne kenè nu en kediey ipeseǥazi heini is merasey he imbanglis nu kediey, iyan, kenà egkesunud is kediey he egkesuatan, kekenà, iyan egkesunud is kenikew he egkesuatan."
40026040	Ne hein midlikuan din haazà is tetelu he menge sumusundan din, nekelipezeng dan, ne migkeǥiyan din si Pedro te, "Wazè niw ve metigker he kenè kew medlipezeng te minsan sengeuras dà?
40026041	Kenè kew lipezeng, kekenà, ampù kew wey kew mekelikey te menge penggezam keniyu. Edsunud is gehinawa niw, iyan, is lawa niw ne meluya."
40026042	Ne midlikù si Jesus ne mid-ampù med-uman, ke sikandin te, "Amey ku, emun kenè en egkehimu he id-awà sikan is kedresaya kedì ne iyan egkesunud is kenikew he egkesuatan."
40026043	Ne zutun midlikuan din sikan is menge sumusundan din ne neehè din he nemekelipezeng dan en maan su wazè dan maantus is kebpemetpetayi kandan te tuzug.
40026044	Ne midlikù si Jesus ne mid-ampù med-uman te iketelu ne in-uman din in-ampù kes in-ampù din.
40026045	Ne zutun midlikuan din sikandan ne migkaǥi te, "Kemulu kew ves nehurep he ebpemenhidhizeǥà? Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan en heini timpu he ibpalad a ziyà te menge lalung he etew.
40026046	Enew kew su heini en sikan is etew he ed-akal kedì. Kuwa kew en, su edsinuǥungen tew."
40026047	Ne te kemulu pa zutun egkaǥi si Jesus, nekeuma si Hudas is sevaha zuen te sepulù wey zezuwa he epustul. Duma zin is mezakel he menge etew he nengeǥumeenan te menge ubpit wey menge lagkut. Menge suǥù haazà te menge punuan te memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu.
40026048	Si Hudas, is giya zan pehendiyà te ki Jesus, migkaǥi zin he zaan ke hengkey is tuus te kegketueni zan ki Jesus. Ke sikandin te, "Is etew he edhezekan ku, ne iyan en ebpen-ahaan niw. Ne zekepa niw en."
40026049	Ne hein nekeuma si Hudas, segugunè din mid-uvayi si Jesus ne migkaǥi te, "Na! Menunudlù!" Ne zutun midhezekan din si Jesus.
40026050	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Pekezilepeti nu, Mama, is ed-ul-ulahan nu." Ne midakep dutun te menge etew si Jesus ne mibpekehemenan dan te egawed.
40026051	Ne sevaha zutun te zuma ni Jesus, nekehulavut te sundang din, ne midtibas din is suluǥuen te lavew he memumuhat ne netenaan haazà diyà te telinga, ne nesapla haazà is telinga zin.
40026052	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà te, "Iǥumè nu heeyan is ubpit nu su sikan is utew meǥaan he ebpenggumaan, gumaan daan is ibpatey zin.
40026053	Wazè nu ve metueni he emun ebpetavang a te Amey ku he Megbevayà ne edliblibuwen is ibpehendini zin he velinsuǥuen din?
40026054	Iyan," ke si Jesus, "emun ebpetavang a kandin ne kenà egketuman sikan is nengetagnà dengan dutun te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà; ne kinahanglan he egkeulaula haazà sumalà is netagnà," ke sikandin.
40026055	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is menge etew te, "Tulisan e ve? Su maan is neǥumeenan kew te menge ubpit wey menge lagkut is edakep kedì? Kada andew ne egkeahà a keniyu is ebpenurù te menge etew ziyà te Valey te Megbevayà, ne maan is wazà a keniyu zutun dà dekepa?
40026056	Iyan, guntaan, human en egkeulaula heini is langun kayi su egketuman sikan is menge tagnà he insurat dengan te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà." Ne hein nekaǥi en ni Jesus haazà, mid-ewaan sikandin dutun te menge sumusundan din su nemelaǥuy zan is langun.
40026057	Ne zutun, haazà is menge etew he midakep ki Jesus, mid-uwit dan sikandin diyà te ki Keyipas he lavew he memumuhat. Ne zutun, daan en he netiǥum is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey is menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu.
40026058	Si Pedro, midtinundug, asal kenà utew ed-uvey ne zutun te nekeuma zan en diyà te valey te lavew he memumuhat ne ziyè dà medtaman si Pedro te lama. Ne hein nekeseled en sikandin dutun te lama, mibpesahugsahug sikandin mebpinuu zuen te menge guwardya su ed-ahaan din ke hengkey en is egkeulaula ki Jesus.
40026059	Ne is menge punuan te memumuhat wey is langun he nengetiǥum he ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, ebpen-ehè dan te salà he id-ulug dan ki Jesus su wey zan mehimetayi.
40026060	Iyan, minsan pa te mezakel is teruen he ebpenistiǥus te menge ulaula ni Jesus ne wazè dan dutun egkeahà he zait he igkehimetayi kandin. Ne hein neuǥet, duen dezuwa he mid-etuvang
40026061	he egkaǥi te, "migkaǥi heini he etew te, 'Egkerundus ku is dekelà he simbahan te Megbevayà ne seled te tetelu he andew ne igkepehitindeg ku.'"
40026062	Ne zutun midhitindeg sikan is lavew he memumuhat dutun ne migkeǥiyan din si Jesus te, "Tutuu ve heini is menge sumbung dan mehitenged kenikew? Hengkey is igketavak nu?" ke sikandin.
40026063	Ne wazà medtavak si Jesus. Ne mid-uman megkaǥi haazà is lavew he memumuhat te, "Tangdù ka su kayi ka te etuvangan te Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen. Emun iyan ka sikan is Anak te Megbevayà, sikan is mibpilì din he ibpahadì, keǥiya nu," ke sikandin.
40026064	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Iyan heeyan sumalà is migkaǥi nu ne egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu is langun he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, keuzemà egkeahà a keniyu is diyà ebpinuu te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà. Ne egkeahà a zaan keniyu ziyà te menge ǥapun is ebulus he ebpuun diyà te langit," ke sikandin.
40026065	Ne haazà is lavew he memumuhat, mibpemindas din is kumbalè din he tuus te utew sikandin nepauk dutun te migkaǥi ni Jesus, ne ke sikandin te, "Uvag en kun Anak te Megbevayà! Nekesupak en heini te Megbevayà! Wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa tistiǥus su sikiyu is langun, nezineg niw en heini is menge lalag din he utew supak te Megbevayà!
40026066	Hengkey is hukum niw?" Ne midtavak is menge zuma zin te, "Dekelà is salè din; kinahanglan he edhimetayan."
40026067	Ne zutun mibpengilevan dan is ulu ni Jesus; ne mibuǥel zan. Ne is duma, midtabpì kandin
40026068	he egkaǥi te, "Sikew is mibpilì bes te Megbevayà, tegnaa nu ke hentei is neketabpì kenikew," egkaǥi zan.
40026069	Ne si Pedro, diyà te lama is ebpimpinuu. Ne zuen suluǥuen he vahi he mid-uvey ziyà te kandin is egkaǥi te, "Sikew, duma ka zaan ni Jesus he tigGeliliya."
40026070	Iyan, mibarew haazà ni Pedro is migkaǥi zutun te vahi, ne nekezineg dutun is langun te kebarew zin. Ke sikandin te, "Kenè ku egkesavut heeyan is egkeǥiyen nu."
40026071	Ne migawas si Pedro pehendiyà te pultahan dutun te lama. Ne zuen sevaha pa he suluǥuen he vahi he nekeahà kandin ne migkaǥi haazà is bahi ziyà te menge etew zutun te, "Duma heini ni Jesus he tigNeserit!"
40026072	Ne utew mezesen is kebarew zutun ni Pedro. Ke sikandin te, "Kenè ku egkekilala heeyan he etew."
40026073	Ne hein netegteǥaad dutun, mid-uvayan si Pedro zuen te menge etew he nerivurun dutun, ke sikandan te, "Tutuu iyan he zuma ke zin daan su egketuusan tenged te kegkaǥi nu."
40026074	Ne zutun mid-amin-amin si Pedro te sapà, ke sikandin te, "Siluti a te Megbevayà ke tarù heini is lalag ku he kenè ku egkekilala heeyan he etew." Ne zutundutun, mid-ukarà is manuk.
40026075	Ne human metenuzi ni Pedro sikan is migkaǥi kandin ni Jesus he, "Te kenè pe kan ebpengukarà is manuk, ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekaǥi he kenà a kenikew egkekilala." Ne zutun migawas si Pedro ne nekelelendag.
40027001	Ne hein nepawà dutun is langun he menge punuan te menge memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, mid-uyunan dan ke ebmenmenuwen dan is paaǥi wey iketuǥut kandan is kedhimetayi ki Jesus.
40027002	Mibakus dan si Jesus te kedina ne inhated dan sikandin diyà te ki Pilatu he iyan gubirnedur zutun.
40027003	Ne si Hudas, sikan is mid-akal ki Jesus, utew nekedsendit hein netuenan din he edhimetayan duen te menge etew si Jesus su nekaǥi zan he zait is ulaula ni Jesus he igkehimetayi kandin. Ne midhendiyà sikandin te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu su id-ulì din pezem sikan is ketluan he vuuk he selapì.
40027004	"Nekesalà a," ke sikandin, "su sikan is etew he migkaǥi niw he zait is ulaula zin he igkehimetayi kandin, wazè din salà ne iyan a mibpalad kandin diyan te keniyu." Ne midtavak dan te, "Wazè dey lavet keniyan; kenikew zà heeyan he samuk."
40027005	Ne haazà is selapì, insimburà ni Hudas dutun te simbahan ne mid-awà dutun su netaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa zin is kedhiket, ne zutun mibitey sikandin.
40027006	Ne is menge punuan te memumuhat, hein nekuwa zan sikan is selapì, migkaǥi zan te, "Ebpekesupak kiw te kesuǥuan ke id-ulug tew heini ziyà te teleǥuey te selapì kayi te simbahan su imbayad heini wey mehimetayi is etew."
40027007	Ne tenged dutun mibivitiyara zan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dan dutun. Ne zuen tanà he migngezanan te tanà te ebpendiyun, ne mibpemasa zan haazà dutun te selapì su wey mehimu he penlevengà te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu.
40027008	Ne tenged kayi migngezanan dan haazà he tanà te Tanà te Lengesa, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, tanà he nepemasa te selapì he imbayad te kedhimetayi te etew .
40027009	Ne netuman dutun sikan is netagnà dengan te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he si Jeremias su ke sikandin te, "Nekuwa zan kes ketluan he vuuk he selapì he iyan bali zin he neuyunan te menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil.
40027010	Ne impemasa zan te tanà te ebpendiyun sumalà is intelaan kedì te Nengazen." Iyan heini nekaǥi zengan ni Jeremias.
40027011	Ne zutun hein diyè en si Jesus te etuvangan te gubirnedur is ed-imbistigahan, mid-insà ki Jesus haazà is gubirnedur te, "Hadì ke ve te menge Hudiyu?" Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Uya, iyan is migkaǥi nu."
40027012	Iyan, dutun te migkaǥi en te menge punuan te menge memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu ziyà te ki Pilatu is sumbung dan mehitenged ki Jesus ne wazà haazà tevaka ni Jesus.
40027013	Umba mid-insaan sikandin ni Pilatu te, "Maan is wazè nu tevaka heini is langun he menge sumbung dan mehitenged kenikew?"
40027014	Iyan, wazà medtavak si Jesus te minsan hengkey; ne tenged kayi neinuinu utew is gubirnedur.
40027015	Ne iyan neleyaman ni Pilatu is: kada tuig, emun Pista en te Kedlevayi, edlibriyen din is sevaha he pirisu ke edhengyuen te menge etew.
40027016	Ne zuen nevantug he etew he mibpirisu he egngezanan ki Berabas.
40027017	Ne hein nevurun en dutun is menge etew, ne mid-insà si Pilatu te, "Hentei zapit is egkesuatan niw he edlibriyen ku, iyan be si Berabas wey ke iyan be si Jesus he migeraran he Pinilì te Megbevayà?"
40027018	Su netuenan ni Pilatu he iyan hinungdan ke maan is insumbung si Jesus te menge punuan is kegkesina zan kandin.
40027019	Ne te kemulu pa si Pilatu ebpimpinuu zutun te valey he ebpenhusayan, nekeuma is surat te esawa zin he egkaǥi te, "Kenè nu hileveti heeyan he etew su wazè din salà. Nerasey a utew ǥeina te mezukilem su mideetan a tenged kandin," ke sikandin.
40027020	Iyan, is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge ebmeǥurangen, migkeǥiyan dan is menge etew zutun he iyan dan hengyua he melibri si Berabas ne si Jesus, ibpehimetayan.
40027021	Ne mid-uman med-insà kandan haazà is gubirnedur te, "Hentei zapit kayi te zezuwa is egkesuatan niw he edlibriyen ku?" Ne ke sikandan te, "Iyan si Berabas."
40027022	Ne migkaǥi si Pilatu te, "Ne emun iyan heeyan, ebmenmenuwen ku si Jesus he migeraran he Pinilì te Megbevayà?" Ne migkaǥi sikandan is langun te, "Iransang te krus!"
40027023	Ne ke si Pilatu te, "Maan? Duen be mezaat he mid-ulaula zin?" Iyan, mid-iseg dutun is keǥurub dutun te menge etew he ebpememensag te, "Iransang te krus!"
40027024	Ne zutun nesavut ni Pilatu he wazè en pulus te menge lalag din su ebpuunè en edsinamuk is menge etew, ne tenged dutun, migkuwa sikandin te wahig ne mibpenlùlù te velad din dutun te etuvangan te menge etew, ne ke sikandin te, "Keniyu he salà heini. Is lengesa kayi te etew, ne ziyè dà te keniyu he velad; lumpiyu is kedì."
40027025	Ne midtavak is langun he menge etew te, "Uya, kenami en he salà is kedhimetayi kayi wey salà daan te menge kevuwazan dey!"
40027026	Ne zutun midlibri ni Pilatu si Berabas. Ne impevuǥel zin si Jesus ne insuǥù din te menge sundaru he iransang dan si Jesus diyà te krus.
40027027	Ne zutun impeseled si Jesus te menge sundaru zutun te turuǥan te gubirnedur. Ne netiǥum diyà te kandin is tivuuk he kumpeniya te menge sundaru.
40027028	Midlevasan dan si Jesus ne migkumbelaan dan sikandin te meriǥà he kumbalà su uvag kun hadì.
40027029	Ne zutun mibengkulè dan te zuǥiyen he ǥawed he igkuruna zan ki Jesus ne insuup dan haazà diyà te ulu zin. Ne is kewanan he velad din, impeǥawed dan te tuked ne midluhud dan diyà te etuvangan din is edtahud kun uvag kandin. Ne ke sikandan te, "Kumusta, Hadì te menge Hudiyu!"
40027030	Ne mid-ilevan dan ne midsekelew zan haazà is tuked ne imbadas dan diyà te ulu zin.
40027031	Ne hein nepezè dan en he ebaleyvaley kandin midluwasan dan duen te kumbalà he meriǥà ne insun-ud dan kandin is daan he kumbalè din. Ne zutun mid-uwit dan sikandin su idransang dan diyà te krus.
40027032	Ne ziyà te zalan he ibayè dan nesinuǥung dan is etew he tigSirini he egngezanan ki Simon. Ne mibpeǥes dan haazà ipetiang duen te krus he edtiangen ni Jesus.
40027033	Ne nekeuma zan diyà te migngezanan te Gulguta, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, Tulan te Ulu.
40027034	Ne ibpeinum dan pezem si Jesus te vinu he mid-emutan te utew mepait, iyan, hein neǥezaman din en haazà ne wazè din leusa te ed-inum.
40027035	Ne inransang dan sikandin diyà te krus; ne zutun midripa zan ke hentei is ebpekeangken te menge ugelingen din.
40027036	Ne te kegkepasad dan dutun mibpinuu zan su ed-ahaan dan sikandin ke egkemenumenu.
40027037	Ne ziyà te zivavew te ulu zin, impezeket dan is surat he iyan sikan is hinungdan te insumbunga kandin he edhenduen te, "Iyan heini si Jesus, sikan is Hadì te menge Hudiyu."
40027038	Ne zuen dutun dezuwa he tulisan he inransang dan daan. Impasek is krus te sevaha zutun diyà dapit te egkekewanan din, ne impasek is krus te sevaha ziyà te egkeǥivang din.
40027039	Ne is menge etew zutun he sumeseǥazà, ebpemenangàtangà is ed-engitan dan si Jesus.
40027040	Ke sikandan te, "Na! Kunaan nu ke egkeǥevè nu sikan is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne egkevangun nu te seled te tetelu he andew. Libriya nu kun is keugelingen nu. Emun tutuu ka he Anak te Megbevayà, penaug ka keniyan te krus."
40027041	Ne iring din ded daan is mid-ulaula kandin te menge punuan te memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan su mibaleyvaley zan sikandin,
40027042	ke sikandan te, "Nelibri zin is duma, iyan, is keugelingen din, kenè din egkelibri. Hadì bes sikandin te menge tig-Israyil. Ipepenaug keniyan te krus ne egkesundanan human.
40027043	Edsarig kun sikandin te Megbevayà ne egkeǥiyen din daan he Anak sikandin te Megbevayà. Ed-ahaan ta ǥuntaan ke edlibriyen sikandin te Megbevayà ke tutuu he igkesuat sikandin te Megbevayà," ke sikandan.
40027044	Ne minsan sikan is menge tulisan he inransang diyà te pesikilizè din, ne midsumpalit dan daan sikandin.
40027045	Ne te neudtu en is andew zutun, midtik-ew mebmerusirem is tivuuk he kelibutan seled te menge tetelu he uras.
40027046	Ne hein liwazè en he ebpenaug is andew, ingkulahì ni Jesus is utew mezaǥing he lalag he edhenduen te, "Ili, Ili, lama sebektani?" he ke và dà egkeǥiya, "He Megbevayè ku, maan is ed-iniyuǥan a kenikew?"
40027047	Ne zutun, is duma he etew he ebpemenhithitindeg dutun te uvey, hein nezineg dan haazà, ke sikandan te, "Pemineg kew su ebpengumawen din si Elias, is sevaha zuen te ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà."
40027048	Ne sevaha zutun te menge etew is migaanggaan megkuwa te ispungha ne intereb din diyà te sukà ne midtiyuk din te zeisek he kayu ne impaahuk din diyà te vèbà ni Jesus wey zin haazà mesupsup.
40027049	Iyan, migkaǥi is menge zuma zutun te etew te, "Pesegdana nu su ed-ahaan ta ke edlepew si Elias su edlibriyen sikandin."
40027050	Ne zutun, migkulahì si Jesus med-uman ne naawà is gehinawa zin.
40027051	Ne zutundutun, is manggad he utew mekepal he ingkurtina ziyà te seled te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, neliwazà mevindas puun te zivavew pehendiyà te zizalem. Ne midlinug ne mibpemeka is dezekelà he vatu.
40027052	Ne zuen menge surung he penlevengà he zutun nengepuwasan, ne nengevanhew is mezakel he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà,
40027053	ne mid-awè dan dutun te penlevengà. Ne zutun te kegkevanhew zaan ni Jesus, nemenriǥuriǥu haazà is nengevanhew ziyà te inged he Hiruselim ne mezakel is nemekeahà kandan dutun te kebpenriǥuriǥu zan.
40027054	Sikan is menge sundaru wey sikan is kepitan dan he mibantey ki Jesus, hein midtik-ew medlinug wey hein nengeehè dan is duma pa he nengehitavù dutun ne nengehandek dan. Ke sikandan te, "Tutuu ves iyan he Anak sikandin te Megbevayà!" egkaǥi zan.
40027055	Ne zuen daan dutun mezakel he menge vahi he ebantey ziyà te meziyù dutun. Menge tigGeliliya sikandan he miduma ki Jesus pehendiyà te Hiruselim su edtavang dan kandin.
40027056	Ne zutun si Maria Megdelina, wey si Maria, sikan is iney ni Santiago wey ni Jose, ne elin daan sikan is esawa ni Sibidiyu.
40027057	Ne hein mahapun en dutun, nekeuma is sepian he ebpuun te Erimetiya. Iyan ngazan din si Jose; ne sumusundan daan sikandin ni Jesus.
40027058	Midhendiyà sikandin te ki Pilatu is edhangyù he egkuwaan din is lawa ni Jesus. Ne zutun insuǥù ni Pilatu is lawa ni Jesus he ikeveǥey ziyà te ki Jose.
40027059	Ne migkuwa haazà ni Jose ne mibukusan din te veǥu he malung he meputì.
40027060	Ne zuen surung he penlevengà ni Jose he sikan pa mepasad he ingkalut diyà te kelendiǥan te paǥang. Ne zutun iseled ni Jose is lawa ni Jesus. Ne midlekevan din haazà is surung te zekelà he vatu ne mid-ewaan din.
40027061	Ne si Maria Megdelina, wey sikan is sevaha he Maria, dutun dan ebpimpinuu is ebantey zutun te surung.
40027062	Ne zutun te sunud he andew he Sebadu, midhendiyà te ki Pilatu is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge Perisiyu.
40027063	Ne ke sikandan diyà te kandin te, "Datù, netenuzan dey he migkaǥi zuen te teruen he etew hein uuyag pa, he emun ebpatey, egkevanhew zed seled te tetelu he andew.
40027064	Umba, meupiya ke ebpeventayan nu te menge sundaru sikan is surung taman te iketelu he andew su kela ke tekawa is lawa zin te menge sumusundan din, ne egkeǥiyen dan diyà te menge etew he nevanhew sikandin. Ne ed-iseg ebmezaat is ebpekesunud he kedlimbungi zan te menge etew."
40027065	Ne midtavak si Pilatu te, "Egkehimu. Dumaha niw pehendutun is menge sundaru, ne purungi niw peventayi haazà is surung."
40027066	Ne mibeyaan dan haazà ne midtuusan dan sikan is inlekeb he vatu zutun wey metuusi zan ke edwelengen te minsan hentei. Ne intaǥak dan haazà is menge sundaru zutun he ibpevantey zan.
40028001	Ne hein neiwas haazà is Andew te Kedhimeley te meǥaan egkepawà dutun te andew he Duminggu, midhendiyà te penlevengà ensi Maria Megdelina wey kes duma zin, he Maria zaan is ngazan, su ed-ahaan dan sikan is surung.
40028002	Ne zutun netekewtekew medlinug te utew mezesen. Ne zuen ebpuun diyà te langit he velinsuǥuen te Nengazen. Ne mibpenaug haazà ne in-awè din kes batu he inlekeb dutun te surung ne mid-untuzan din.
40028003	Is dagwey zin, ne ebpekesirang su utew merayag, ne utew zaan meputì is ugelingen din.
40028004	Ne nengehandek utew sikan is ebantey zutun he menge sundaru ne nengetentanan dan is wazà memekewaleng he ebpengerkeren.
40028005	Ne sikan is menge vahi, migkeǥiyan sikandan dutun te velinsuǥuen te, "Kenè kew mahandek. Netuenan ku he ebpen-ahaan niw si Jesus, sikan is inransang te krus.
40028006	Wazè en dini su nevanhew en sumalà is migkaǥi zin keniyu. Hendini kew wey niw ahaa is midsevukan kandin.
40028007	Ne ǥègaani niw veyai is duma he menge sumusundan din. Ne keǥiya niw ziyà te kandan he nevanhew en sikandin ne edhuna keniyu ziyà te Geliliya ne ziyè niw sikandin egkeuma. Ne kenè niw lipati heini is migkaǥi ku keniyu," ke sikandin.
40028008	Ne zutun, migaanggaan haazà is menge vahi med-awà dutun te surung. Nengehandek dan, iyan, nepenù is gehinawa zan te kelipey. Ne ebpelelaǥuy zan su ibpenudtul zan diyà te menge sumusundan he zuma.
40028009	Ne netekewtekew zan te nesinuǥung sikandan ni Jesus. Ne ke sikandin te, "Mebmelinawen kew." Ne mid-uvey zan diyà te kandin. Ne mid-azap dan kandin is egawed te paa zin.
40028010	"Kenè kew egkehandek," ke si Jesus, "beyai niw is menge suled ku ne keǥiyi niw he medhendiyè dan te Geliliya ne ziyè e zan egkeuma," ke sikandin.
40028011	Ne hein neipus haazà is menge vahi, migenat daan is duma zutun te menge sundaru he impevantey zutun te surung. Midhendiyè dan te inged ne midtudtul zan ziyà te menge punuan he memumuhat is langun he neulaula.
40028012	Ne is menge punuan, mibpekibitiyara te menge ebmeǥurangen. Ne zutun mibeǥayan dan haazà is menge sundaru te zekelà he selapì.
40028013	Ne migkeǥiyan dan te, "Iyan niw tudtula te menge etew is: hein mezukilem nekelipezeng kew ne nekeuma is menge sumusundan ni Jesus ne midtakew zan is lawa zin.
40028014	Ne emun egkezineg heini te gubirnedur, edlelaǥan dey para kenè kew zin mepeuki."
40028015	Ne midawat te menge sundaru haazà is selapì, ne midtuman dan haazà sumalà is migkaǥi kandan. Ne kemulu ǥuntaan iyan edtudtulen te menge Hudiyu haazà is impepenudtul te menge punuan diyà te kandan.
40028016	Ne haazà is sepulù wey sevaha he menge sumusundan ni Jesus, midhendiyè dan te Geliliya, duen te vuvungan he migkaǥi kandan ni Jesus.
40028017	Ne zutun neehè dan sikandin. Ne minsan te nezuwazuwa is duma kandan he edtuu mehitenged te kegkevanhew zin, dutun te kegkeahaa zan kandin, mid-azap dan kandin.
40028018	Ne mid-uvayan sikandan ni Jesus, ne ke sikandin te, "Imbeǥey kedì is ke ǥehem te kebayàbayà diyà te langit wey zini te tanà.
40028019	Umba, penhipanew kew en diyà te minsan hendei wey niw metukid te ebpesavut is langun he menge etew ziyà te langun he menge inged. Ne penurua niw he medsundan dan kedì. Pemewtismuwi niw sikandan wey metueni he nekidsevaha zan te Amey tew he Megbevayà, wey siak is Anak din, wey is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
40028020	Penurua niw sikandan he tumana zan sikan is langun he insuǥù ku keniyu. Ne kenè niw lipati he layun a eduma keniyu taman te kenè pa egketapus heini is timpu." Is Meupiya He Tudtulanen Te Keaǥi Ni Jesu Kristu Sumalà Is Keguǥuza Ni
41001001	Si Esaias, is tipehuna he ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, insurat din is Lalag te Megbevayà duen te Anak din, ne iyan haazà puunà te Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi ni Jesu Kristu he Anak te Megbevayà. Migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, "Duen keuzemà ibpehuna ku kenikew he etew he ibpepenudtul ku he meǥaan ka ebpekeuma.
41001003	Diyà sikandin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew. Ne zutun egkezineg sikandin te menge etew he edangep kandin is egkaǥi te, 'Meǥaan ebpekeuma is Nengazen. Hiǥewani niw is ibayè din; tendanga niw is dalan he ed-ikulen din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, endami niw is kebpekeuma zin .'"
41001004	Ne netuman haazà diyà te ki Juan, sikan is migeraran ki Megbebewtismu, su ziyà sikandin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew ne midweliyan din daan is menge etew. Ke sikandin te, "Iniyuǥi niw is memezaat he ulaula ne mebpebewtismu kew su wey metueni he mid-iniyuǥan niw en is memezaat he ulaula niw, ne human egkepesaylu te Megbevayà is menge salè niw," ke si Juan.
41001005	Ne zutun, mezakel he menge etew is midangep kandin he ebpemuun diyà te menge inged te tivuuk he prubinsya he Hudiya wey minsan is menge etew he ebpemuun diyà te inged he Hiruselim. Ne haazà he menge etew, intangdù dan is menge salè dan ne mibewtismuwan sikandan ni Juan diyà te wahig he Hurdan.
41001006	Ne heini si Juan, kukumbalà te midhavel he vulvul te kemilyu ne vevakes te lundis he neǥangu. Ne is keuyaǥan din ne terapan wey teneb.
41001007	Ne zutun midweliyan ni Juan is menge etew, ke sikandin te, "Duen etew he ebpekeuma he ed-ilis kediey. Iyan sikandin utew lavew kenà siak su minsan is kebpul-ut dà te menge sepatus din, kenè e pa zait he suluǥuen din.
41001008	Wahig is ibewtismu ku keniyu, iyan, haazà he etew is ed-ilis kediey, iyan ibewtismu zin keniyu sikan is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, ibeǥey zin keniyu is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ."
41001009	Ne zutun te timpu te kebpemewtismu ni Juan, nekeuma ziyà te ki Juan si Jesus is ebpuun diyà te inged he Neserit he ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya. Ne mibewtismuwan sikandin ni Juan diyà te wahig he Hurdan.
41001010	Ne te egaun en si Jesus dutun te wahig, segugunè din naahà is langit he nepuwasan ne is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, edlugtanà diyà te kandin he iring te merepatik.
41001011	Ne zutun nezineg is Megbevayà diyà te langit he egkaǥi te, "Minahal ku sikew he anak ku. Utew ku en sikew igkelipey."
41001012	Ne segugunà dutun, impehendiyà si Jesus te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew.
41001013	Ne zutun mekeubpà si Jesus seled te kepatan he andew, ne migezaman sikandin ni Setanas ke ebpekesalè be. Ne zuen daan dutun menge ebpekekaid he menge langgam, iyan, mibeyaan si Jesus te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ne mid-elimahan dan sikandin.
41001014	Ne hein impezakep en ni Hadì Hirudis si Juan, midlikù si Jesus diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne impesavut din dutun te menge etew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun te Megbevayà.
41001015	Ne ke sikandin te, "Iyan en heini timpu he egketuman sikan is nengetagnà dengan su meǥaan en edhadì keniyu is Megbevayà. Iniyuǥi niw en is memezaat he ulaula ne tuu kew te Meupiya he Tudtulanen."
41001016	Ne sevaha he andew zutun, te edhipanew si Jesus diyà te veyvey te ranew he Geliliya, ne neehè din ensi Simon wey is hazi ni Simon he si Andres he ebpenlaya zutun te ranew su menge menlelaya sikandan.
41001017	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Menunuǥes kew ves te pait? Duma kew kedì ne etew mulà is egkekuwa niw wey zan mekesundan kedì."
41001018	Ne zutundutun mid-engked dan is ebpenlaya ne miduma zan kandin.
41001019	Ne midlaus medhipanew ensi Jesus ne zutun te kedhipanew zan en, naahà ni Jesus ensi Santiago wey is hazi ni Santiago he si Juan he menge anak ni Sibidiyu he ebpurungan dan is menge laya zan diyà te avang dan.
41001020	Ne te naahà ni Jesus sikandan, mid-umew zin sikandan he meduma zan kandin, ne zutun mid-ewaan dan is amey zan wey is menge sinuhulan dan he menlelaya zutun te avang ne miduma zan ki Jesus.
41001021	Ne midhendiyè dan te inged he Kepirnaum, ne hein neume en is andew he Sebadu he iyan Andew te Kedhimeley ne midseled si Jesus diyà te simbahan te menge Hudiyu ne mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun.
41001022	Ne haazà is menge etew, hein nezineg dan is kebpenurù din, utew zan nengeinuinu su is kebpenurù din, ne kenà iring te kebpenurù te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan te menge Hudiyu su zekelà mulà is gehem ni Jesus te kebpenurù.
41001023	Ne zutun te kemulu pa ebpenurù si Jesus, netekew zan te nekeuma zutun te simbahan is maama he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
41001024	Ne hein neehè din si Jesus, mibensag sikandin is egkaǥi te, "Sikew, Jesus he tigNeserit, hengkey is lavet nu kenami te menge mulin-ulin? Kela ke iyan inhendini nu is edezeetan key kenikew. Egkekilala ku sikew; iyan ka kes hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà!"
41001025	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin te, "Med-engked ka ne awè ka keniyan te kandin!"
41001026	Ne zutundutun midhimu te mezaat he mulin-ulin he mevidbid haazà is etew ne impepengulahì din te mezaǥing. Ne mid-awà haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin puun dutun te etew.
41001027	Ne utew nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew zutun, ne tenged dutun mibpelelelaǥè dan te, "Hengkey vuwa heini? Kela ke veǥu en heini he tuluuwen su maan is utew sikandin mekeǥeǥehem te kebayàbayà te minsan menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne ebpemineg kandin."
41001028	Ne pinaaǥi zutun segugunà nekeeneb is bentuǥan ni Jesus diyà te tivuuk he prubinsya he Geliliya.
41001029	Ne mid-awà ensi Jesus dutun te simbahan ne midhendiyè dan te valey eni Simon wey ni Andres. Ne miduma zaan kandan si Santiago wey si Juan.
41001030	Ne egkezeruwan dutun is enuǥang he vahi ni Simon ne edhidhizeǥà su edetengen. Ne te kebpekeuma ni Jesus dutun te valey, migkeǥiyan dan si Jesus he egkezeruwan is enuǥang ni Simon.
41001031	Ne mibeyaan sikandin ni Jesus ne migewezan din diyà te velad ne impeenew zin. Ne zutundutun ne naawà is dateng din ne midsuba sikandin te ibpekaan din engki Jesus.
41001032	Ne hein edsanlep en is andew zutun, is langun he egkengezeruwan wey is ebpenlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, mibpen-uwit sikandan te menge etew ziyà te ki Jesus.
41001033	Ne utew mezakel he menge etew zutun te inged is netipun diyà te lama te valey he zutun si Jesus.
41001034	Ne zuen mezakel he egkengezeruwan dutun te migkelingulingu he menge zaru is nengeulian ni Jesus. Mezakel zaan he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin is impemaawè din puun dutun te menge etew. Ne haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, wazà tuǥuti ni Jesus he mekekaǥi sikandan su nekilala zan ke hentei si Jesus.
41001035	Ne hein egkepkepawè en, ne mid-enew si Jesus ne mid-awà diyà te valey ne midsivey sikandin diyà te wazà duen etew su ed-ampù.
41001036	Ne hein nepawà dutun mibpen-ahà ni Simon wey te menge zuma zin ke hendei si Jesus.
41001037	Ne hein neturedu zan, migkaǥi zan diyà te kandin te, "Ebpen-ahaan ka te langun he menge etew."
41001038	Iyan, migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Edhendiyè kiw te menge zuma he inged su wey ku meweliyi zaan su umba midhendini a su edweliyan ku is menge etew."
41001039	Ne mid-eneb eni Jesus is langun he menge inged diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne midwali sikandin diyà te menge simbahan te menge Hudiyu zutun. Ne impemaawè din is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin puun dutun te edlelungen dan.
41001040	Ne zuen sevaha he it-iten he etew he mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus. Ne haazà he etew, midluhud sikandin diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus is ed-akul kandin he egkaǥi te, "Emun meupiya zà te ǥehinawa nu ne egkeulian a kenikew kayi te utew meremerik he egezamen ku."
41001041	Ne nehizuwan sikandin ni Jesus ne midampè din te egkaǥi te, "Utew meupiya te ǥehinawa ku; meulii ka."
41001042	Ne zutundutun nahanewhanew zutun te etew haazà is it-it din.
41001043	Ne zutun mibeleuzan sikandin ni Jesus te, "Kenè nu zè pa tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei he etew heini is nehimu zini te kenikew, kekenà, hendiyè ka ǥuntaan te memumuhat he midhimu te Megbevayà wey zin maahà he neulian ka ne iveǥey nu kandin is ibpemuhat wey nu metuman sikan is insuǥù dengan ni Moises su wey metueni te langun he menge etew he tutuu iyan he neulian ke en." Ne zutun impehipanew sikandin ni Jesus.
41001045	Iyan, hein mid-awà dutun haazà is etew, midtudtul zin haazà is nehimu ziyà te kandin diyà te minsan hentei. Ne tenged dutun kenè en maan si Jesus ebpekepeǥawaǥawa ke edhendutun te menge inged su egkeamur-amur is mezakel he menge etew. Diyè dà si Jesus edriǥuriǥu te menge unayan. Ne midangep kandin is menge etew he ebpemuun diyà te minsan hendei he inged.
41002001	Ne nepipira pa zutun he menge andew, midlikù si Jesus diyà te inged he Kepirnaum. Ne nezineg te menge etew he ziyà si Jesus te valey zin.
41002002	Ne nengetiǥum sikandan dutun te valey. Utew mezakel is menge etew zutun ne tenged kayi wazè dan en ed-ereǥan minsan diyà te zeringdingan he uvey te ǥemawan. Ne impesavut kandan ni Jesus is Lalag te Megbevayà.
41002003	Ne zutun, duen nemekeuma he menge etew he ed-uwit te sevaha he etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin. Ebintingen haazà is etew te heepat he zuma zin.
41002004	Ne kenè dan ebpekeuvey ziyà te ki Jesus tenged te utew mezakel he menge etew he nengeamur-amur zutun. Ne zutun mibudsiyan dan is atep he renged ni Jesus ne hein meluag en haazà is budsi, ne midteyuntun dan diyà te ki Jesus haazà is etew he impehizeǥà diyà te zuyanè din.
41002005	Ne si Jesus, hein nesavut din he zekelà is kedsarig dan kandin, migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin te, "Mama, nepesaylu en is menge salè nu."
41002006	Ne zuen ebpimpinuu zutun he menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan ne hein nezineg dan haazà is migkaǥi ni Jesus, neepes dan ne neisip dan is,
41002007	"Tekew en egkaǥi heini he etew he ebpekepesaylu sikandin te salà. Edsupaken din is Megbevayà su hentei is ebpekepesaylu te menge salà, kekenà, iyan dà is Megbevayà?"
41002008	Ne zutun nesavut ni Jesus he iyan haazà diyà te isip dan ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Maan is egkeisip niw is iring keniyan?
41002009	Su hendei zapit is egkehimu te etew zà duen? Iyan be is kebpesaylu te salà kayi te etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin, wey ke iyan is kegkeulii kandin wey sikandin mekeenew ne mekuwa zin is duyanè din ne mekehipanew?
41002010	Pinaaǥi te kebewii ku ǥuntaan kayi te etew, ibpeehè ku keniyu he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen ku keǥehem dini te lumpad te kebpesaylu te salà." Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa te,
41002011	"Sikew, Mama, enew ka; kuwaa nu heeyan is duyanè nu ne ulì ka."
41002012	Ne zutun, haazà is etew, mid-enew sikandin ne migkuwa zin haazà is duyanè din ne midlawang puun dutun te valey ne naahà haazà te langun he menge etew zutun. Ne is menge etew, hein neehè dan haazà ne utew zan nengeinuinu ne midalig dan is Megbevayà. Ne ke sikandan te, "Wazè tew pa keenu maahà is iring kayi!"
41002013	Ne neipus haazà, ne mid-awà dutun si Jesus, ne midhendiyè en maan te veyvey te ranew, ne nengetiǥum diyà te kandin is mezakel he menge etew ne mibpenurù din sikandan.
41002014	Ne hein nepasad haazà is kebpenurù din ne midlaus si Jesus, ne ziyà te ibayè din duen upisina te menunukut te vuhis. Ne zutun neehè din is anak ni Alpiyu he si Levi he menunukut te vuhis he ebpimpinuu zutun. Ne migkeǥiyan din te, "Sunud ka kedì." Ne zutun midhitindeg si Levi ne midsunud ki Jesus.
41002015	Ne hein egkaan si Jesus wey menge sumusundan din diyà te valey ni Levi mezakel is menge menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken he etew he nemengaan duma kandan su mezakel is nemekesundan kandin.
41002016	Ne zuen dutun daan menge Perisiyu he menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne hein neehè dan he egkaan si Jesus duma zutun te menge mesinupaken wey menunukut te vuhis, nenginginsà sikandan duen te menge sumusundan ni Jesus, ke sikandan te, "Maan is egkaan si Jesus wey ed-inum duma te menge limbungan he menge menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken?"
41002017	Nezineg haazà ni Jesus ne midtavak sikandin pinaaǥi te sempità, ke sikandin te, "Sikan is wazè din daru, ne kenà egkinahanglan he ebewian, kekenà, iyan dà sikan is duen din daru. Siak, wazà a medhendini wey ku ikepeengked te ed-ulaula te mezaat is menge metazeng, kekenà, iyan is menge mesinupaken te Megbevayà."
41002018	Ne sengeandew zutun, edsalang te kegkaan is menge Perisiyu wey is menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu su edtumanen dan is tuluuwen te menge Hudiyu. Ne zuen menge etew he midhendiyà te ki Jesus ne ke sikandan te, "Is menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu wey is menge sumusundan te menge Perisiyu, edsalang dan te kegkaan su wey zan mepurungi is ked-azap dan te Megbevayà . Ne maan man is kenà mulà edsalang te kegkaan is kenikew he menge sumusundan?"
41002019	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Penenglitan ke zuen eseweey, is menge zuma zutun te ebpengesawa, kenè dan egkeisip he edsalang dan te kegkaan ke kemulu zan pa zuma haazà is ebpengesawa. Ne zutun te timpu he ibpaawà diyà te kandan sikan is ebpengesawa, human dan edsalang egkaan. Ne iring din ded daan is menge sumusundan ku su te kemulu e pa zini te kandan, kenè dan edsalang te kegkaan."
41002021	Ne zutun insempità ni Jesus is kenà kebpeked-amur te veǥu he penurù din wey te zaan he tuluuwen. Ke sikandin te, "Is beǥu he manggad he wazè pa megkenseng, kenà meupiya he idapi ziyà te kumbalà he merunut en he manggad su emun ebpìpian, egkenseng haazà is beǥu ne egkevindas is merunut en he manggad ne tuwas pa he meluag is kegkevindas din.
41002022	Ne iring din ded daan is binu he sikan pa ebeeli he idtaǥù diyà te teleǥuey he lundis te kambing. Kenà egkehimu he ziyà itaǥù te zaan he teleǥuey su ebetu haazà is teleǥuey ne egkeulaan haazà is binu ne egkezeetan daan haazà is teleǥuey. Kinahanglan he is binu he sikan pa ebeeli, ne ziyà idtaǥù te veǥu he teleǥuey."
41002023	Ne zutun te sevaha he andew he Sebadu ingkevayà eni Jesus is pemuleey. Iyan haazà andew he insuǥù dengan te Megbevayà te menge Hudiyu he wazà etew he ibpevaal zutun he andew su iyan Andew te Kedhimeley. Ne mibpengetù is menge sumusundan ni Jesus te trigu zutun.
41002024	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan si Jesus te menge Perisiyu te, "Is menge sumusundan nu, edsupaken dan is insuǥù kenitew te Megbevayà su maan is edlegtey zan guntaan kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley?"
41002025	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenà egkehimu he wazè niw mevasa ziyà te ingkesurat dengan kes mid-ulaula ni Hadì David. Sikandin wey is menge sundaru zin, midlised sikandan su nengevitil zan.
41002026	Ne tenged dutun midseled si David diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne migkaan din is egkeenen he insavuk diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà. Ne impekaan din daan dutun is menge zuma zin. Iyan lavew he memumuhat dutun si Ebiyatar. Supak te kesuǥuan haazà is kegkeena zan dutun su iyan dà ebpekekaan dutun he egkeenen is menge memumuhat.
41002027	Ne minsan pa zutun wazè dan mekesalà . Iyan aney he midlimbag te Megbevayà is etew ne human din insuǥù is Andew te Kedhimeley, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mahal is etew, kenà is Andew te Kedhimeley .
41002028	Umba, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan a zuen keǥehem te egkaǥi ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan te etew emun Andew te Kedhimeley."
41003001	Ne mid-uman medseled si Jesus duen te simbahan te menge Hudiyu, ne zuen dutun etew he minatey is menge uǥat te zivaluy he velad din.
41003002	Ne zuen menge kuntada ni Jesus dutun ne mibentayan dan si Jesus su ed-ahaan dan ke ebewian din haazà is etew zutun te andew su Andew te Kedhimeley haazà. Su emun ebewian ni Jesus haazà is etew ne idsumbung dan he midsupak din is Andew te Kedhimeley.
41003003	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is etew he nezeetan is belad din te, "Hengkayi ka, Mama, te teliwazà."
41003004	Ne zutun mid-insaan din haazà is menge kuntada zin te, "Hendei zapit is intuǥut kenitew zuen te kesuǥuan tew he ed-ul-ulahan tew kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley? Iyan be is kedtavang te etew he edlised wey ke ebpesipelahan be is etew? Iyan be is kedtevangi ta te etew su wey kenà mebpatey wey ke edhimetayan te ve is etew?" Ne wazè dan meketavak dutun.
41003005	Ne te ebpenlangulangu si Jesus dutun te mezakel he menge etew, utew zin egkepeuki sikandan ne utew zaan mibmesakit is gehinawa zin su haazà is menge etew, wazè dan kehizu. Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he nezeetan is belad din te, "Ketenga nu, Mama, is belad nu." Ne migketeng dutun te etew haazà is belad din ne segugunà neulii.
41003006	Ne is menge Perisiyu, nemen-awè dan dutun te simbahan. Ne sikandan wey is menge sakup te upakat he midtukud ni Hadì Hirudis, mibpelelelaǥè dan ke hengkey is paaǥi he mehimu zan he mepatey si Jesus.
41003007	Ne zutun mid-awà si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din ne midhendiyè dan te veyvey te ranew. Ne nemenduma ki Jesus is utew mezakel he menge etew he ebpuun diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya. Ne is duma kandan, diyà ebpemuun te prubinsya he Hudiya,
41003008	wey ziyà te inged he Hiruselim, wey ziyà te prubinsya he Idumiya, wey ziyà te tanà he zehipag te wahig he Hurdan wey ziyà te menge inged he siringan dutun diyà te inged he Tiru wey Sidun. Utew mezakel he menge etew is midhendiyà te ki Jesus su nezineg dan is menge tudtul mehitenged te menge egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan din.
41003009	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din he megkuwa zan te avang su wey zin meuntuzi emun egkelipitlipit sikandin te utew mezakel he menge etew.
41003010	Mezakel is nengeulian din en he egkengezeruwan ne tenged kayi, is egkengezeruwan dutun, ebpenlietliet dan en is edteǥel ed-uvey diyà te ki Jesus wey zan mekezampà kandin su wey zan meulii.
41003011	Ne is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, hein neehè dan si Jesus, ne nemenluhud sikandan diyà te etuvangan din is ebpemengulahì he egkaǥi te, "Iyan ka iyan kes Anak te Megbevayà!"
41003012	Ne zutun midawey ni Jesus haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan he kenè dan ipesavut he Anak sikandin te Megbevayà.
41003013	Ne zutun midtekezeg si Jesus diyà te vuvungan dutun ne mid-umew zin sikan is nengepilì din he mehimu he sineriǥan din. Ne mid-uvey zan diyà te kandin.
41003014	Ne intezù ni Jesus dutun is sepulù wey zezuwa he medumazuma kandin wey zin ikepehipanew sikandan te kebpesavut te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
41003015	Ne mibeǥayan din sikandan te ǥehem wey zan mevuǥew is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung te menge etew.
41003016	Iyan heini menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he etew he nengepilì ni Jesus: si Simon he migeraran din ki Pedro, wey si Santiago he anak ni Sibidiyu wey is hazi ni Santiago he si Juan. Heini is dezuwa, migeraran din ki Buwenirgis, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mezilapet he etew. Ne elin daan dutun si Andres, si Felipe, si Bartolome, si Mateo, si Tomas, si Santiago he anak ni Alpiyu, wey si Tediyu. Ne elin daan si Simon is sevaha te upakat dengan he egngezanan te Kenenista. Ne elin daan mibpilì ni Jesus si Judas he tigKeriyuti, sikan is mid-akal kandin. Ne neipus haazà is kebpilia ni Jesus kandan, ne mid-ulì sikandin.
41003020	Ne zutun ensi Jesus, wazè dan en timpu minsan te kegkaan su utew mezakel is menge etew he nengeamur-amur ziyà te kandin.
41003021	Ne hein nezineg te menge kezumahan ni Jesus is egkeulaula zin ne mibeyaan dan sikandin su kunaan dan ke neliveg.
41003022	Ne zuen dutun menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he ebpuun diyà te inged he Hiruselim ne ke sikandan te, "Heini he etew, mid-ulinan sikandin ni Endedaman, sikan is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne tenged kayi igkepeǥuwè din puun te menge etew is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin."
41003023	Ne zutun, migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is menge etew he med-uvey zan diyà te kandin ne zuen menge sempità he impenurù din kandan. Ke sikandin te, "Kenà egkehimu he ebuǥawen ni Setanas is duma zin he mezaat he mulin-ulin.
41003024	Penenglitan ke zuen hadì ne ebpetebtebekà is menge sakup din, meǥaan egkeawà is gehem din te kedhadì.
41003025	Ne ke zuen edlingahaan te sengevelayan ne ebpekunkuntedahà is menge sakup din, meǥaan egkevengkag is upakat dan.
41003026	Umba ke egkuntedahan ni Setanas is menge sakup din, kenà egkeuǥet is keǥehem din te kebayàbayà, kekenà, meǥaan egkeawà ne egkehanew.
41003027	Nezaag ku en si Setanas umba ebpekepaawà a te menge sakup din su wazà minsan hentei he ebpekeseled te valey te mezesen he etew he ed-aǥew te menge azen dutun te mezesen he etew emun kenè din egkehuna egkevakus haazà is mezesen he etew. Kinahanglan he ebekusen din edhunai, ne human din egkeaǥew is menge azen dutun te mezesen he etew.
41003028	Tentenuzi niw heini," ke si Jesus, "he egkepesaylu pa te Megbevayà is menge etew te minsan hengkey he menge salè dan wey minsan hengkey he kedsumpalit dan kandin,
41003029	iyan, sikan is edsumpalit te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kenè en egkeawà diyà te kandin haazà is salè din ne kenè en egkepesaylu te minsan keenu."
41003030	Umba migkaǥi ni Jesus haazà su is menge menunudlù, migkaǥi zan he mezaat he mulin-ulin is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ed-ulin ki Jesus.
41003031	Ne nekeuma zutun is iney ni Jesus wey is menge hazi ni Jesus he menge maama. Ne ziyè dan dà te ǥawas dutun te valey ne migkeǥiyan dan is menge etew he ipeǥawas dan si Jesus.
41003032	Ne utew mezakel is menge etew he ebpememinuu zutun he nekeliǥuy ki Jesus. Ne migkeǥiyan si Jesus te menge etew te, "Diyà te ǥawas is iney nu wey menge hazi nu ne ibpeliǥawang ke zan."
41003033	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Duen ku pa ibpaahà keniyu he iney ku wey menge suled ku."
41003034	Ne nenlangulangu si Jesus dutun te menge etew he nekelingut kandin ne ke sikandin te, "Heini zed is iney ku wey menge suled ku
41003035	su is minsan hentei he edtuman te egkesuatan te Megbevayà, iyan daan iney ku wey menge suled ku he maama, wey menge etevey ku."
41004001	Ne sevaha he andew zutun diyà te veyvey te ranew mid-uman penurua ni Jesus is menge etew. Ne utew mezakel is menge etew he nengeamur-amur ziyà te kandin, ne tenged kayi mid-untud sikandin diyà te avang he uvey zutun te veyvey ne zutun mebpinuu. Ne is menge etew, diyè dan dà te veyvey is ebpememineg kandin.
41004002	Ne mezakel is impenurù ni Jesus kandan pinaaǥi te menge sempità.
41004003	Ke sikandin te, "Duen etew he midhendiyà te pemuleey zin su ebpemula.
41004004	Ne zutun te kebpemula zin, duen benì he nengeulug diyà te zalan, ne heini migkaan te menge tagbis.
41004005	Duen daan benì he nengeulug he nemekeuntud diyà te utew menipis he tanà he nekeapid dutun te menge vatu. Ne haazà, petuluy zà midtuvù su menipis haazà is tanà.
41004006	Asal hein mid-andew, neǥangu petuluy haazà is menge pinemula su mevavew zà is nesenevan te zalid dan.
41004007	Ne zuen daan dutun benì he nengeulug diyà te tanà he menge zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun. Ne mibmemelayat haazà is sagbet ne mibpengulembezan haazà is menge pinemula ne wazà mekepemeǥas.
41004008	Ne zuen daan benì dutun he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà ne haazà, midtuvù, ne midekelà ne nemeǥas mulà. Duen dutun menge pinemula he mibeǥas te tigketluan, ne zuen daan mibeǥas te tigkeneman. Ne zuen daan mibeǥas te tignenggatus."
41004009	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Kinahanglan he sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw."
41004010	Ne hein wazè en utew etew zutun su iyan dan dà is menge sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan ni Jesus wey is kenà utew mezakel he menge etew, mid-insaan dan si Jesus ke hengkey is ibpesavut din dutun te menge sempità.
41004011	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge sumusundan ku, ibpesavut en keniyu te Megbevayà sikan is in-eles dengan mehitenged te kedhadì din, iyan, is menge zuma he menge etew, ibpenurù kandan pinaaǥi te menge sempità.
41004012	'Su zutun ebpurung dan edtengteng, iyan, kenè dan egkeahà, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, ebpemineg dan, iyan, henduen be te wazè dan mekezineg su kenè dan edsevuten. Su emun egkesavut dan ed-engkezan dan is memezaat he ulaula zan ne egkepesaylu sikandan te Megbevayà!'"
41004013	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Egkesavut niw ve heini is sempità he migkaǥi ku? Emun kenè niw heini egkesavut kenè niw zaan egkesavut is duma he menge lalag ku he pinaaǥi te sempità.
41004014	Duen te sempitè ku, is kehuluǥan te kebpemula te etew, ne iyan is kedsengyawa te Lalag te Megbevayà.
41004015	Ne is benì, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he zuen nemekezineg duen, iyan, midlepew si Setanas ne midhimu zin he melipati zuen te nekezineg sikan is lalag he nezineg dan.
41004016	Ne sikan is benì he ziyà meketanà te menipis he tanà he zivavew te vatu, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he is nemekezineg duen, ne utew zan egkesuati te ebpemineg, ne edtuuwan dan.
41004017	Iyan, kenà egkeheǥet is kedtuu zan ne kenà egkeuǥet, ke egkeumahan sikandan te samuk wey ke kemeresayan be tenged te kedewata zan te Lalag te Megbevayà, edlikù dan diyà te zaan he ulaula zan.
41004018	Ne sikan is benì, he ziyà mengeulug te tanà he zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew,
41004019	iyan, egkelipatan dan tenged te menge seeng dan kayi te kelibutan wey te kegkesuat dan te selapì wey te mezakel pa he menge azen, ne kenà ebpulus diyà te kandan is Lalag te Megbevayà.
41004020	Ne sikan is benì he ziyà meketanà te meupiya he tanà, iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew ne midtuu zan; ne is Lalag te Megbevayà, ne ebpulus diyà te kandan. Is duma, ne ebpulus te zeisek diyà te kandan, ne is duma, ne ebpulus te malù dekelà, ne is duma, ne ebpulus te utew zekelà diyà te kandan."
41004021	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Ke edtemtem is etew te sulù, kenà egkehimu he ebpelengkevan din te revan wey ke idsihung din be te vangkù he hizeǥaan su idsavuk din diyà te selevukà.
41004022	Ne iring din ded daan is minsan hengkey he in-eles guntaan ne ibpeǥawaǥawa zed keuzemà ne is minsan hengkey he penurù ku he kenè niw egkesavut guntaan ne egkesavut niw keuzemà.
41004023	Kinahanglan he sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw."
41004024	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Purungi niw pemineǥa is penurù ku keniyu su sumalà is kebpurung niw kebpemineg, ibeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà is kedsavut, asal zekelè pa is ibpesavut din keniyu.
41004025	Su is etew he edewaten din is ibpesavut kandin te Megbevayà, ed-umanan pa te Megbevayà is kedsavut din, iyan, is etew he kenè din edewaten is ibpesavut te Megbevayà, id-awà diyà te kandin is deisek he nesavut din en."
41004026	Ne impelaus ni Jesus is egkeǥiyen din, ke sikandin te, "Is kedekelà te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring te etew he mid-ezek te venì diyà te pemuleey zin.
41004027	Wazè din hanew ke egkemenumenu haazà is kedtuvù dutun te pinemula zin, kekenà, ebpeseseǥazen din dà. Edlipezeng sikandin te mezukilem ne ebaal te maandew ne kada andew edtuvù ne edekelà haazà is menge pinemula zin.
41004028	Su iyan idtuvù te pinemula haazà is tanà. Edtuvù haazà is pinemula ne edlepew is dahun din ne human edlepew is beǥas din ne zutun human egkeayun te kegkelutui.
41004029	Ne emun egkelutuan en haazà, edreǥunen dutun te teǥitanà su iyan en tiraǥun."
41004030	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Hengkey is meupiya he ebpetug-iringan tew te kedhadì te Megbevayà? Hengkey is meupiya he egemiten tew he sempità?
41004031	Is ked-iseg kebmahabet te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring te pinemula he utew zeisek is lisu zin he ibpemula haazà diyà te tanà.
41004032	Ne edtuvù ne edekelà ne egkehimu he iyan utew zekelà te langun he menge pinemula. Dezekelà is menge subpang din ne ebpekesesalag is menge tagbis dutun."
41004033	Pinaaǥi te mezakel he menge sempità impesavut ni Jesus is Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te kandan sumalà is netuenan din he egkesavut dan.
41004034	Pudu menge sempità is impezineg ni Jesus diyà te menge etew, iyan, emun iyan dan dà te menge sumusundan din, ne ibpesavut din kandan is kehuluǥan dutun te menge sempità he penurù din.
41004035	Ne hein midsanlep en is andew zutun, migkeǥiyan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te, "Edhendiyè kiw te ziyà layun."
41004036	Ne zutun mid-ewaan dan is mezakel he menge etew ne is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, mid-untud dan duen te avang he sikan is mibpinuuwan ni Jesus ne migenat dan. Ne zuen daan duma zutun he menge etew he nemen-aavang is eduma kandan.
41004037	Ne hein diyè dan en te lawed ne midtekewtekew mebpengeramag te utew mevendes ne egkeselikuvungan en te vaǥel haazà is avang ne egketeǥuan en te wahig.
41004038	Ne si Jesus, nekelipezeng diyà te huziyan he zulung dutun te avang he mid-uulunà. Ne migunggel sikandin dutun te menge sumusundan din he ke sikandan te, "Egkelavu kiw en! Kenè nu ve ebeliyen ke egkeǥerè kiw?"
41004039	Ne zutun nepukew si Jesus ne mid-enew ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is keramag wey vaǥel he med-engked dan. ||||| + 1.5 SECs ||||| Ne mid-engked haazà is keramag ne mibmelinew utew haazà is wahig.
41004040	Ne migkeǥiyan din is menge sumusundan din te, "Maan is egkengehandek kew? Wazè niw pe be kedsarig kedi?"
41004041	Ne zutun, utew nengeherati haazà is menge sumusundan din ne mibpein-inseey sikandan he egkaǥi is kada sevaha kandan te, "Hengkey heini vuwa he etew? Maan is minsan is keramag wey menge vaǥel ne ebpemineg kandin!"
41005001	Ne nekezunggù ensi Jesus diyà layun dutun te ranew, ne iyan haazà is nezungguan dan tanà te menge etew he Geresinen.
41005002	Ne zutun te kedrenà ni Jesus dutun te avang, midsinuǥung sikandin te etew he ziyà ebpuun te menge surung he penlevengà. Midsuukan haazà te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin
41005003	umba ziyà ed-ubpà te menge penlevengà. Ne utew mezesen sikandin ne tenged dutun kenè en egkevakus te minsan kedina.
41005004	Su neuǥet en, layun ebekusen is menge velad din wey paa zin, iyan, kada kebekusa kandin dutun, ne edrupeten din is pusas he ibpusas kandin, ne ebpemidtawen din dà is kedina he ibakus kandin. Wazè en ebpekeeǥen kandin tuus te utew mezesen.
41005005	Umba, te maandew wey mezukilem, dutun sikandin edriǥuriǥu te menge penlevengà wey menge vuntud ne edtulung ebpengulahì ne ebpemelian din is lawa zin te vatu.
41005006	Ne hein nepentawan dutun he etew si Jesus diyà te meziyù, mibpelelaǥuy is edsinuǥung ki Jesus ne mid-azap kandin.
41005007	Ne si Jesus, migkeǥiyan din haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin te, "Awè ka keniyan te etew!" Ne zutun nengulahì haazà is etew he ke sikandin diyà te ki Jesus te, "Ey! Sikew is anak te utew lavew he Megbevayà, ebmenuwen a kenikew? Edhengyuen ku kenikew he peseriǥa a kenikew he kenè e pa kenikew siluti su kayi ki te etuvangan te Megbevayà!"
41005009	Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus haazà is etew te, "Hentei is ngazan nu?" Ne midtavak dutun haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin te, "Iyan ngazan ku si Liblibuwen su utew key mezakel is nemenuuk kayi te etew."
41005010	Ne haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin, mibpenigudu medhangyù sikandin diyà te ki Jesus he kenè din segseǥa sikandan diyà te meziyù he tanà.
41005011	Ne te uvey zutun duen utew mezakel he menge vavuy he ebpemenuwal ziyà te kelendiǥan.
41005012	Ne sikan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, midhangyù dan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Ipehendutun key te menge vavuy wey key mekesuuk diyà te kandan."
41005013	Ne midtuǥutan ni Jesus sikandan. Ne zutun nemengguwà haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin puun dutun te etew ne midsuuk sikandan duen te menge vavuy. Haazà is menge vavuy, menge zezuwa he libu sikandan, ne nemelelaǥuy zan petupang dutun te utew mesilid he kelendiǥan ne mid-agbur zan diyà te ranew zutun ne nengelened dan maamin.
41005014	Ne zuen menge maama he ebpemen-elima zutun te menge vavuy, ne nemenhendiyè dan te inged is ebpemelelaǥuy wey ziyà te menge uvey zutun he unayan su ibpesavut dan ke hengkey is nehitavù. Ne hein nezineg haazà te menge etew, ne nemenhendiyè dan te ki Jesus su ed-ahaan dan ke hengkey is neulaula.
41005015	Ne hein nemekeuma zan, neehè dan kes midsuukan te edliblibuwen he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin. Neehè dan dutun he midsul-ub en te ugelingen ne hustu en is ked-isip-isip din ne tenged dutun utew zan en nengeinuinu.
41005016	Ne is menge etew he zutun he zaan, midtudtul zan dutun te menge etew is neulaula zutun te midsuukan te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin wey is neulaula zuen te menge vavuy.
41005017	Ne haazà is menge etew, midhengyuan dan si Jesus he med-awè en dutun te menge inged dan.
41005018	Ne hein ed-untud en si Jesus duen te avang, sikan is etew he neulian te kedsuuki kandin te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, midhangyù sikandin he eduma ki Jesus.
41005019	Iyan, wazà medtuǥut si Jesus he meduma kandin haazà is etew, kekenà, migkeǥiyan din te, "Ulì ke en ne tudtula nu te kezuzumahi nu is utew zekelà he utew meupiya he midhimu te Nengazen diyà te kenikew wey is hizu zin kenikew."
41005020	Ne zutun migenat haazà is etew, ne midtukid din is menge inged diyà te prubinsya he Dikepulis, ne mibpenudtul zin is langun he meupiya he midhimu ni Jesus diyà te kandin. Ne nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew zutun.
41005021	Ne midlayun ensi Jesus he ed-untud te avang. Ne hein nekezunggù dan nengeamur-amur zutun te veyvey is utew mezakel he menge etew he mid-uvey zan diyà te kandin.
41005022	Ne zutun nekeuma zaan is etew he egngezanan ki Hayru. Pengulu si Hayru te sevaha he simbahan te menge Hudiyu. Ne hein neehè din si Jesus ne mid-uvey sikandin diyà te kandin ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan din.
41005023	Ne midhengyuan din si Jesus te, "Is anak ku he vahi he edraǥaraǥe en, ne edluwàluwè en te ǥehinawa. Edhengyuan ku sikew he hendiyè ka te valey ku wey nu penemsama wey meulii ne meuyag."
41005024	Ne midumahan sikandin ni Jesus. Ne zutun te ziyè dan te zalan egkengelipitlipit dan en su mezakel is nemenduma kandin he menge etew.
41005025	Ne zuen dutun bahi he utew en nerasey su midsepulù en wey zezuwa he tuig is kegkevusbusi kandin ne kenà ed-engked.
41005026	Ne haazà is daru zin, ne mezakel en he ebpemenambar is midtambar zutun ne naamin en is selapì din he insuhul zin te ebpemenambar kandin, iyan, nasì dà sikandin egkeurat kada edtembari.
41005027	Nezineg dutun te vahi is tudtul mehitenged ki Jesus ne mibpenlietliet en daan sikandin dutun te mezakel he menge etew is edteǥel ed-uvey ziyà te egkeiniyuǥan ni Jesus su wey mekeǥawed te và dà kumbalà ni Jesus.
41005028	Su iyan diyà te ǥehinawa zin is: "Minsan ke mekeǥawed e zà te kumbalè din ne egkeawè en heini is daru ku."
41005029	Ne te neǥewezan din dutun is kumbalà ni Jesus, ne mid-engked haazà is kegkevusbusi kandin ne netuenan din dutun he haazà is egezamen din, ne naawè en diyà te kandin.
41005030	Ne si Jesus, netuenan din dutun he zuen neulaula te ǥehem din ne midteren is ebpenlangulangu zutun te mezakel he menge etew is mid-insà te, "Hentei is migawed te kumbalè ku?"
41005031	Ne migkaǥi is menge sumusundan din te, "Es, mezakel utew he menge etew is ebpenlietliet diyan te kenikew ne maan is ibpenginginsè nu pa maan ke hentei is migawed te kumbalè nu?"
41005032	Ne zutun, ebpenlenglenguwen ni Jesus ke hentei is nekeǥawed dutun te kumbalè din.
41005033	Ne haazà is bahi, utew nahandek su netuenan din en ke hengkey is nehitavù diyà te kandin dutun te kegewezi zin te kumbalà ni Jesus. Ne mid-uvayan din si Jesus te egkerkeren ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan din ne midseysey zin is langun mehitenged dutun te zaru zin.
41005034	Ne zutun, migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Bayi, umba neulian ka te zaru nu su midsarig ka kedì. Ulì ke en ne mebmelinawen is kebpekesavuk nu ne kenè ke en maan mezeruwi."
41005035	Ne te kemulu pa si Jesus egkaǥi zutun ne zuen nemekeuma he ebpuun diyà te valey ni Hayru. Ne migkaǥi zan diyà te ki Hayru te, "Kenè nu en bigbigata te eduma pa maan si Jesus su kenè niw en egkesepenan is gehinawa zuen te anak nu."
41005036	Iyan, si Jesus, wazè din itetenged haazà is migkaǥi te menge etew, kekenà, migkaǥi ziyà te ki Hayru te, "Kenè ka meseeng, kekenà, sarig ke zà kediey."
41005037	Ne zutun iyan dà impelaus ni Jesus he eduma kandan ki Hayru, si Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan he suled ni Santiago.
41005038	Ne hein nekeuma zan en dutun te valey ni Hayru, ne naahà ni Jesus dutun he egkengeǥisaweg is menge etew, ne nezineg din is ebpemenlelendag wey ebpemenineǥew.
41005039	Ne midseled ensi Jesus dutun te valey ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Maan is egkengeǥisaweg kew? Maan is ebpemenineǥew kew? Wazà mebpatey heeyan is batà, kekenà, midlipezeng!"
41005040	Ne te kegkezineǥa zan dutun te migkaǥi ni Jesus ne và dan dà mid-engiti sikandin. Ne zutun impaawà ni Jesus is menge etew zutun te valey. Iyan dà wazè din ipaawà is amey wey iney zutun te vatà wey is tetelu he menge sumusundan din. Ne miduma zin sikandan dutun te mibperey-asan te vatà.
41005041	Ne hein dutun dan en, migewezan ni Jesus is belad dutun te vatà ne ke sikandin te, "Telita kumi," he ke và dà egkeǥiya te, "Bayi, enew kad!"
41005042	Ne mid-enew haazà is batà ne segugunà midhiphipanew. Menge sepulù en wey zezuwa is penuiǥen dutun te vatà. Utew nengeinuinu is iney wey amey zutun te vatà.
41005043	Ne mibeleuzan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan penudtula ke hengkey is neulaula. Ne migkeǥiyan din daan sikandan he ipekaan dan haazà is anak dan.
41006001	Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun te inged ne mid-ulì diyà te inged din, diyà te Neserit. Ne nemenduma kandin is menge sumusundan din.
41006002	Ne zutun te andew he Sebadu he iyan mahal he Andew te Kedhimeley, mibpenurù ni Jesus is menge etew ziyà te seled te simbahan te menge Hudiyu. Mezakel he menge etew is nengetiǥum dutun, ne utew zan nengeinuinu is ebpememineg ki Jesus. Ke sikandan te, "Iyan sikandin sikan is pandey. Is iney zin, ne si Maria ne menge suled din ensi Santiago, si Jose, si Hudas, wey si Simon. Is menge etevey zin, ne kayi zà daan te inged tew. Maan is metau sikandin? Hendei zin buwa mekuwa is ketau zin? Maan is ebpekehimu sikandin te menge egkein-inuwan?" Ne zutun, wazè dan dewata is ibpenurù ni Jesus.
41006004	Ne zutun, migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, kenà sikandin edtehuzen te menge kezuzumahi zin wey te menge zuma he etew zuen te keugelingen din he inged, iyan, diyà te zuma he menge inged edtehuzen mulà sikandin," ke sikandin.
41006005	Umba, wazà egkein-inuwan he ingkepaahà ni Jesus dutun he inged. Pira zà dutun he egkengezeruwan is midepenetan din te velad din ne nengeulian sikandan.
41006006	Ne utew neinuinu si Jesus su wazà medtuu kandin is menge etew zutun he inged. Ne zutun midtukid ni Jesus te ebpenurù is menge siringan he inged dutun.
41006007	Ne midtiǥum din sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din su ibpehipanew zin. Mibpemahinbahin din sikandan te tigduwazuwa. Ne mibpemeǥayan din daan sikandan te ǥehem te kebpeguwà te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
41006008	Ne midteleenan din sikandan he ke edhipanew zan, iyan dan dà uwita is tuked dan ne kenè dan med-uwit te keenen, kemuyut, wey minsan selapì.
41006009	Idtuǥut kandan is kedsesepatus, iyan, kenè dan med-uwit te ed-ilisan dan he ugelingen.
41006010	Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te sengeinged kinahanglan he is egkepemenehikan niw he valey ne zutun kew zà uliulì taman te ked-awè niw zutun.
41006011	Ne ke zuen inged he kenè kew zuen igalewǥalew wey kenè dan ebpemineǥen is ibpesavut niw, ne tektaka niw is eliyavuk diyà te menge paa niw he iyan laǥuy he edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà."
41006012	Ne zutun, nenhipanew haazà is menge sumusundan ni Jesus ne impesavut dan he kinahanglan he iniyuǥi te menge etew is memezaat he ulaula.
41006013	Ne mezakel is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung te menge etew he impemaawè dan ne mezakel zaan is egkengezeruwan he mibpenheplasan dan te lana ne nengeulian.
41006014	Ne nezineg ni Hadì Hirudis is tudtul kayi te mid-ulaula eni Jesus su nevantug en si Jesus diyà te minsan hendei zutun. Ne zuen menge etew he migkaǥi te, "Heini si Jesus, ne iyan si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew umba zuen din gehem wey zin meveeli is menge iring kayi he singyal."
41006015	Ne migkaǥi is duma te, "Iyan si Jesus sikan is ebpeneuven dengan he si Elias." Ne migkaǥi is duma pa te, "Ebpeneuven iyan si Jesus he iring te menge tipehuna he ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà," edhenduen dan.
41006016	Iyan, hein nezineg ni Hadì Hirudis haazà is egkeǥiyen dan, kunaan din ke nevanhew si Juan, ne ke sikandin te, "Heini si Jesus, ne iyan ded si Juan Megbebewtismu he mibpepungelan ku te ulu ne nevanhew sikandin."
41006017	Ne heini si Hadì Hirudis, iyan hinungdan he ingkepehimetayan din si Juan su migkeǥiyan sikandin ni Juan he supak te kesuǥuan is ked-eǥawa zin te esawa te suled din su si Hadì Hirudis, mid-esawa zin is ipag din he si Hirudyas he esawa te suled din he si Felipe. Ne tenged dutun te migkaǥi ni Juan, impezakep sikandin ni Hirudis ne mibpirisu zin.
41006019	Ne si Hirudyas, nepeukan din si Juan, ne ebpehimetayan din pezem, iyan, wazà ituǥut ni Hadì Hirudis.
41006020	Ne si Hadì Hirudis, egkehandek sikandin ki Juan su netuenan din he metazeng he etew si Juan he ed-ulinan te Megbevayà. Umba wazè din ituǥut he mehimetayi. Egkesuatan ni Hirudis te ebpemineg is kebpenurù ni Juan, iyan, ingkeliveg din haazà is penurù.
41006021	Asal neuma is kedsilibra te andew te ked-enaka ki Hirudis. Ne zutun naahà human ni Hirudyas is paaǥi wey zin ikepehimetayi si Juan. Midtukud ni Hadì Hirudis is dekelà he keemuran ne mibpemesuǥuan din is menge punuan wey is menge egalen te menge sundaru wey is menge sepian diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
