41015021	Ne ziyà te zalan duen nesinuǥung dan he etew he tigSirini he egngezanan ki Simon, he amey ni Alejandro wey ni Rufo. Heini si Simon, diyà ebpuun te unayan ne edhendiyà te inged. Ne mibpeǥes dan ipetiang dutun te krus he edtiangen ni Jesus.
41015022	Ne mid-uwit dan si Jesus diyà te migngezanan te Gulguta, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, tulan te ulu.
41015023	Ne ibpeinum dan pezem si Jesus te vinu he mid-emutan te tambar he egngezanan te mira, iyan, wazè din dewata.
41015024	Ne zutun inransang dan sikandin diyà te krus. Mibpemahinbahin dan is menge ugelingen din ne midripa zan dutun ke hengkey is egkeangken te kada sevaha kandan.
41015025	Liwazè en ebpemenahik is andew hein inransang dan si Jesus.
41015026	Insurat dan sikan is insumbunga kandin he egkaǥi te, "Is Hadì te Menge Hudiyu."
41015027	Ne zuen dezuwa he tulisan he inransang dan daan te krus. Is krus te sevaha, ne ziyè dan ipasek te zapit te egkekewanan ni Jesus, ne is sevaha zutun, ne ziyà te zapit te egkeǥivang din.
41015028	Ne pinaaǥi kayi, netuman is netagnà dengan te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, "Mid-isip sikandin he zuma te menge mesinupaken."
41015029	Ne is menge etew he sumeseǥazà dutun, ebpemenangàtangà is ed-engitan dan si Jesus, ke sikandan te, "Na! Kunaan nu ke egkeǥevè nu sikan is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne egkevangun nu te seled te tetelu he andew!
41015030	Libriya nu kun is keugelingen nu ne penaug ka keniyan te krus!"
41015031	Ne sikan is menge punuan te memumuhat wey sikan is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, iring din ded daan is mid-ulaula zan kandin, su mid-engitan dan daan. Ke sikandan te, "Wey zè be! Nelibri zin is duma he etew, iyan, is keugelingen din, kenè din egkelibri.
41015032	Sikew is uvag Kristu he hadì dey te menge Hudiyu, penaug ke en keniyan te krus ne edtuuwan dey sikew!" Ne sikan daan is dezuwa he inransang diyà te pesikilizè din, ne midsumpalit dan daan kandin.
41015033	Ne hein neudtu zutun is andew, midtik-ew mebmerusirem is tivuuk he kelibutan seled te menge tetelu he uras.
41015034	Ne hein liwazè en he ebpenaug is andew zutun, ingkulahì ni Jesus is utew mezaǥing he lalag he edhenduen te, "Ili, Ili, lama sebektani," he ke và dà egkeǥiya, "He Megbevayè ku, maan is ed-iniyuǥan a kenikew?"
41015035	Ne zutun, is duma he etew he ebpemenhithitindeg dutun te uvey, hein nezineg dan haazà is lalag, ke sikandan te, "Pemineg kew su ebpengumawen din si Elias is sevaha zuen te ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà ."
41015036	Ne sevaha zutun te menge etew is migaanggaan megkuwa te ispungha ne intereb din diyà te sukà ne midtiyuk din te zeisek he kayu ne impaahuk din diyà te vèbà ni Jesus wey zin haazà mesupsup. Ne migkaǥi te, "Pesegdana niw su ed-ahaan tew ke edlepew si Elias su wey zin ikepenaug!"
41015037	Ne zutun ingkulahì ni Jesus is utew mezaging he lalag ne nevidtawan ne minatey.
41015038	Ne is manggad he utew mekepal he ingkurtina ziyà te seled te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, neliwazà mevindas puun te zivavew pehendiyà te zizalem.
41015039	Ne is egalen dutun te menge sundaru he edhithitindeg dutun te egkesineruwan ni Jesus, hein neehè din haazà is kegkevidtawi ni Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Benar he Anak heini te Megbevayà!"
41015040	Ne zutun te malù meziyù, duen daan menge vahi he ed-ahà. Ne zutun si Maria Megdelina, si Maria he iney ni Jose wey ni Santiago he zeisek. Ne elin daan dutun si Selumi.
41015041	Heini is menge vahi, layun dan ebpekiduma ki Jesus ne midtevangan dan sikandin hein diyè pa sikandin te Geliliya. Ne mezakel zaan dutun is menge vahi he nemenduma kandin te kedhendutun din te Hiruselim.
41015042	Ne hein mahapun en dutun te andew te kedteǥana he egkesunuzan te Andew te Kedhimeley, nekeuma si Jose he tig-Erimetiya. Sevaha sikandin he telehuzen he egalen te menge Hudiyu. Sevaha sikandin te menge etew he ebperateng te kegketuman te nengetagnà mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà. Ne zutun, in-awè din diyà te ǥehinawa zin is kegkehandek din ne midhendiyà te ki Pilatu ne midhangyù he egkuwaan din is lawa ni Jesus.
41015044	Dutun neinuinu si Pilatu su maan is utew meǥaan is kebpatey ni Jesus, ne tenged dutun mibpesuǥuan din sikan is egalen te menge sundaru ne mid-insà ke minatey en be iyan si Jesus.
41015045	Ne hein netuenan din dutun he minatey en iyan, ne intuǥut din ki Jose te egkuwa is lawa ni Jesus.
41015046	Mibpemasa si Jose te meputì he malung ne migkuwa zin is lawa ni Jesus ne mibukusan din dutun te malung he meputì. Ne zuen surung he penlevengà he ingkalut diyà te kelendiǥan he paǥang. Ne zutun din iseled is lawa ni Jesus. Ne midlilizan din haazà te zekelà he vatu he idlekeb dutun te penlevengà.
41015047	Ne si Maria Megdelina wey si Maria he iney ni Jose, neehè dan haazà ke hendei isavuk is lawa ni Jesus.
41016001	Ne hein neiwas dutun is Andew te Kedhimeley, si Maria Megdelina, wey si Maria he iney ni Santiago, wey si Selumi, mibpemasa zan te pehemut su edhendiyè dan te penlevengà wey zan ikehaplas haazà is pehemut te lawa ni Jesus.
41016002	Ne te meselem dutun te iyan pa kedsilà te andew zutun te egkehuna he andew te simana, nemenhendutun dan te midlevengan ki Jesus.
41016003	Ne ebpein-inseey zan te, "Hentei is ebpekelilid kenitew zuen te zekelà he vatu he inlekeb duen te idselang te penlevengà?"
41016004	Iyan, hein midlingehè dan, neehè dan he nelilid en sikan is batu zutun he utew zekelà.
41016005	Ne mid-ahuk dan dutun te idselang te penlevengà ne neehè dan is ebpimpinuu he menguhed he etew ziyà te egkekewanan dan he kukumbalà te meputì he manggad. Ne zutun nekehuyab is gehinawa zan.
41016006	Ne migkaǥi haazà is etew te, "Kenè kew mahandek. Ebpen-ahaan niw si Jesus he tigNeserit, sikan is inransang te krus, iyan, wazè en dini su nevanhew en. Ahaa niw man kayi te midsevukan kandin."
41016007	Ne te kegkeipus te ked-ahaa zan dutun, ke sikandin te, "Hendiyan kew en te menge sumusundan din ne keǥiyi niw sikandan wey si Pedro he si Jesus, edhuna sikandin diyà te Geliliya ne ziyè niw sikandin egkeahà, sumalà is migkaǥi zin keniyu."
41016008	Ne zutun nemengguwè dan dutun te penlevengà is ebpemelelaǥuy su utew zan nengeinuinu wey nengehandek. Ne tenged kayi wazè dan tudtula heini ziyà te minsan hentei su nengehandek dan.
41016009	Ne te meselem pa utew zutun te andew he Duminggu hein nevanhew en si Jesus, midhuna sikandin mebpaahà diyà te ki Maria Megdelina, sikan is bahi he mibpeǥuwaan din dengan te pitu he mezaat he mulin-ulin.
41016010	Ne heini si Maria, mibeyaan din is menge sumusundan ni Jesus. Ebpemenineǥew he egkengeseeng haazà is menge sumusundan ni Jesus tenged te kedhimetayi ki Jesus.
41016011	Ne hein midtudtulan sikandan ni Maria he neehè din si Jesus su nevanhew en, wazè dan tuuwi.
41016012	Ne neiwas haazà mibpaahà si Jesus is nahalin is dagwey zin diyà te zezuwa he menge sumusundan din dutun te edhendiyà haazà is dezuwa te unayan.
41016013	Ne midlikù dan diyà te Hiruselim ne mibpenudtulan dan is menge zuma zan he neehè dan si Jesus, iyan, minsan pa zutun wazà medtuu is menge zuma zan.
41016014	Ne zutun, mibpaahà daan si Jesus dutun te sepulù wey sevaha he menge sumusundan din te timpu he egkekaan sikandan. Midsawey zin sikandan tenged te kezesen te isip dan su wazè dan medtuu te menge etew he nemenudtul he nekeahà kandin he nevanhew.
41016015	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus sikandan te, "Penhipanew kew ziyà te tivuuk he kelibutan, ne ipesavut niw is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te minsan hentei he etew he linimbag te Megbevayà.
41016016	Ne sikan is edtuu kayi wey ebpebewtismu, ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne sikan is kenà edtuu ne edhukuman te silut.
41016017	Ne sikan is etew he edtuu kediey, duen menge singyal he egkehimu zan. Pinaaǥi te keǥehem te ngazan ku igkepeǥuwè dan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung te menge etew. Ne ebpekekaǥi sikandan te kineǥiyan he kenè dan egketuenan.
41016018	Ne minsan ke ebpekeǥawed sikandan te menge uled wey ebpekeinum sikandan te minsan hengkey he edhilu, kenà sikandan egkekeizan. Ne emun edempaan dan is egkengezeruwan, ne egkengeulian."
41016019	Ne te kegkeipusa te Nengazen he si Jesus dutun te menge lalag din, mibatun sikandin pehendiyà te langit, ne mibpinuu ziyà te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.
41016020	Ne zutun nemenhipanew is menge sumusundan te Nengazen he si Jesus ne impesavut dan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te minsan hendei. Ne is gehem te Megbevayà, mid-uǥup kandan su nemekehimu zan te menge egkengein-inuwan su wey memeketuu is menge etew zutun te ibpesavut dan. Is Meupiya He Tudtulanen Te Keaǥi Ni Jesu Kristu Sumalà Is Keguǥuza Ni
42001001	Minahal he Teofilo: Mezakel is migezam medsurat te ǥuǥud te langun he neulaula zini te kenami he inged mehitenged te menge vaal ni Jesus.
42001002	Insurat dan is neǥuǥud kenami te menge etew he iyan nekeahà kayi te menge vaal wey iyan midsangyew te Lalag te Megbevayà.
42001003	Ne siak daan guntaan, geina te mibpurungan ku te ed-istudyu heini, puun pa te puunà kayi te nengeulaula, neisip ku he meupiya zaan ke ebpurungan ku kenikew te edsurat is keguǥuza kayi te langun.
42001004	Umba idsurat ku heini su wey nu mepurung mesavut is tutuu te langun he impenurù kenikew.
42001005	Ne heini is eguǥuzen ku kenikew, ebpuun pa zutun te timpu zengan hein iyan pa hadì si Hirudis diyà te prubinsya he Hudiya. Ne zuen dutun maama he egngezanan ki Zacarias. Ne heini si Zacarias, sevaha sikandin he memumuhat he kevuwazan te etew zengan he si Abyas. Ne is menge kevuwazan ni Abyas, menge memumuhat sikandan te Megbevayà. Ne si Zacarias, esawa zin is bahi he egngezanan ki Elisabet he kevuwazan te memumuhat dengan he si Arun.
42001006	Si Zacarias wey haazà is esawa zin, metazeng sikandan he etew su wazà igkesawey zutun te kebpurungi zan te edtuman te langun he menge tulumanen wey menge suǥù te Megbevayà.
42001007	Ne haazà is teleesawa, wazè dan anak su si Elisabet ne kenà ed-anak, ne zutun he timpu ne utew zan en menge meǥurang.
42001008	Ne neuma is timpu zutun he iyan en si Zacarias wey is menge zuma zin he kevuwazan ni Abyas ebpekepemuhat diyà te zekelà he simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà.
42001009	Ne zutun sumalà is imbilinbilin he vetasan te menge mememuhat, nepilì si Zacarias pinaaǥi te ripa su wey iyan sikandin mekeseled dutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he ibpetutung te veyewà.
42001010	Ne te kemulu zin pa ed-ul-ulaha haazà, ne mezakel is menge etew ziyà te ǥawas he ebpemen-ampù diyà te Megbevayà.
42001011	Ne zutun mibpaahà kandin is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ne heini is belinsuǥuen, dutun edhithitindeg te egkekewanan te vangkù he tutungà te veyewà.
42001012	Ne zutun te kegkeahaa ni Zacarias kayi netentanan sikandin su utew nahandek.
42001013	Ne zutun migkaǥi kandin haazà is belinsuǥuen te, "Kenè ka mahandek, Zacarias, su nezineg te Megbevayà is ked-ampù nu ne edhimuwen din he meǥingey nu is esawa nu he si Elisabet ne ed-anak si Elisabet te maama ne iyan nu ingazan kandin si Juan.
42001014	Utew nu igkelipey heini ne utew egkengeǥalew is mezakel he menge etew emun id-anak en heini is batà,
42001015	su utew zekelà is pid-etawan din sumalà is ked-isipa kandin te Nengazen. Kenà sikandin ed-inum te vinu wey minsan hengkey he ebpekelangut. Ne puun dà dutun te kenè pa sikandin id-anak egkepurung sikandin egkeulini te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
42001016	Ne pinaaǥi te kebpenurù din," egkaǥi haazà is belinsuǥuen, "mezakel is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil he edlikù edtuu te Megbevayà he iyan ed-ezapen te menge ǥinikanan dan dengan.
42001017	Heini is anak nu, edsuǥuen sikandin he ibpehuna te kebpekeuma te Nengazen ne ed-ulinan sikandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin iring te ked-ulini zengan te Megbevayà te ebpeneuven he si Elias. Ne is gehem din, ne iyan ded sikan is gehem ni Elias dengan. Ne pinaaǥi te menge penurù kayi te anak nu egkehimu zutun he ebpeked-uuliey te meupiya he ǥehinawa is menge amey wey te menge anak dan. Is menge etew he wazà mebpezumazuma te menge suǥù te Megbevayà, pinaaǥi te penurù kayi te anak nu ebpekedsendit dan ne zutun metazeng human is ed-isipen dan. Ne pinaaǥi kandin mezakel he menge etew is ed-endaman dan is kebpekeuma te Nengazen," lalag te velinsuǥuen.
42001018	Ne zutun midtavak si Zacarias te, "Hengkey is tuus wey ku metueni he tutuu he egketuman heini is migkaǥi nu? Su siak wey is esawa ku, utew key en meǥurang."
42001019	Ne midtavak haazà is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà te, "Iyan a si Gabriel, sikan is suluǥuen te Megbevayà he layun diyà te etuvangan din. Midsuǥù e zin dini te kenikew wey ku ikepesavut heini is tudtul te utew meupiya he egkeulaula.
42001020	Ne egkeemew ka ne kenè ke en ebpekekaǥi taman te timpu he kenè pa heini egketuman su wazè nu tuuwi heini is migkaǥi ku kenikew he kenà duwazuwa he egketuman dutun te timpu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà," ke sikandin.
42001021	Ne is menge etew he edtaǥadtaǥad diyà te ǥawas dutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, nengeinuinu zan su maan is utew neuǥet si Zacarias dutun te seled.
42001022	Ne hein midlawang en sikandin dutun, ne kenè en ebpekekaǥi ziyà te kandan. Ne netuenan dan dutun he zuen impaahà kandin te Megbevayà dutun te seled te simbahan su kenè en ebpekekaǥi ne ebpenguyew-uyew zà sikandin diyà te menge etew. Ne puun dà dutun ne emew sikandin.
42001023	Ne hein neuma is timpu he zutun egkeilisan si Zacarias te menge vaal zin dutun te simbahan, mid-ulì sikandin diyà te inged din.
42001024	Ne wazà utew meuǥet dutun ne mibmeǥingey is esawa zin he si Elisabet. Ne taman te menge lelima he vulan dutun wazà si Elisabet megawasgawas diyà te valey.
42001025	Ne ke sikandin te, "Human guntaan ingkehizu a te Megbevayà su ebpekeanak e zed, ne is wazè ku kebpekeanak dengan ne kenè ku en igkeeled."
42001026	Ne zutun hein menge heenem en he vulan is keǥingayan te esawa ni Zacarias, midsuǥù en maan te Megbevayà is belinsuǥuen din he si Gabriel pehendiyà te inged he egngezanan te Neserit he ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
42001027	Iyan mibpeveyaan kandin dutun is raǥa he egngezanan ki Maria. Ne heini si Maria, nekeǥunan te kenakan he egngezanan ki Jose. Ne heini si Jose, ne kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David.
42001028	Ne nekeuma is belinsuǥuen diyà te ki Maria ne ke sikandin te, "He Bayi, ingkehizu ka te Megbevayà ne ed-ipaten ke zin!"
42001029	Ne hein nezineg ni Maria heini, netentanan utew sikandin ne mid-isip-isip din ke hengkey vuwa haazà is kehuluǥan dutun te lalag te velinsuǥuen.
42001030	Ne migkaǥi haazà is belinsuǥuen te, "Kenè ka, Maria, mahandek su utew zekelà is gaǥew te Megbevayà kenikew.
42001031	Ebmeǥingey ka ne ebpekeanak ka te maama ne ngezani nu sikandin ki Jesus.
42001032	Utew zekelà is pid-etawan din ne egkengezanan sikandin he Anak te utew lavew he Megbevayà. Ne edhimuwen te Nengazen he Megbevayà he edhadì heini is id-anak nu iring te kedhadì dengan te kepuun din he si David.
42001033	Ne heini is anak nu, wazà pidtemanan te kedhedii zin keniyu te menge kevuwazan ni Hakub. Wazè en ketepusan te kedhadì din!"
42001034	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Maria ziyà te velinsuǥuen te, "Egkemenumenu ve heini? Su raǥe e man ne wazè e pa meuvayi te maama."
42001035	Ne midtavak haazà is belinsuǥuen te, "Is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, iyan ebpengelintau kayi ziyan te kenikew ne edlig-enan ka te ǥehem te Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi, heini is id-anak nu, pudu metazeng is menge ulaula zin ne egkengezanan sikandin he Anak te Megbevayà.
42001036	Ne kenà iyan dà heini tudtul ku kenikew su is ayè nu he si Elisabet, minsan te utew en sikandin meǥurang ne mibmeǥingey en sikandin. Menge heenem en he vulan guntaan is keǥingayan din he zengan, iyan isip te menge etew he kenà sikandin ed-anak.
42001037	Umba egkeulaula heini su egkehimu te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey."
42001038	Ne midtavak si Maria te, "Berakat he mehitavù kediey sumalà is migkaǥi nu su mepezumdumahan a te Nengazen." Ne zutun mid-ewaan si Maria zutun te velinsuǥuen.
42001039	Ne wazà utew zutun meuǥet mibpenines si Maria ne migaanggaan megenat su edhendiyà te sevaha he inged he vuvungan he sakup te prubinsya he Hudiya.
42001040	Ne zutun te kebpekeuma zin diyà te engki Zacarias wey Elisabet, mibpenelehuzan sikandin.
42001041	Ne hein nezineg ni Elisabet haazà is kebpenelehuzan ni Maria ne midredsà medleǥuwat haazà is batà diyà te ǥetek ni Elisabet. Ne zutun nepurung si Elisabet meulini te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
42001042	Ne si Elisabet, tenged te utew nelipey, mibpekezaǥing is egkaǥi te, "Wazà ebpekerepeng kenikew he vahi su utew ka mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa te Megbevayà. Ne mahal zaan diyà te ǥehinawa zin heeyan is id-anak nu.
42001043	Maan buwa is utew a ingkeǥaǥew te Megbevayà su maan is ebpenumbelayan a kenikew te iney te mibpilì he hadì?
42001044	Umba netuenan ku heini su zutun te kegkezineǥa ku zà kenikew, heini is dini te ǥetek ku, nekeleǥuwat te kegkeǥalew zin.
42001045	Umba, Maria, edtuvazan ka te Megbevayà su midtuu ka he egketuman is impesavut kenikew te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà!"
42001046	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Maria te, "Utew a ebpekezalig te Nengazen.
42001047	Utew ku ingkelipey is Megbevayà he iyan menluluwas ku.
42001048	Su siak is suluǥuen din he utew minus is pid-etawan, wazè e zin ded melipati. Ne puun guntaan egkaǥi is tivuuk he menusiyà he iyan a vahi he utew lavew is tuvad kandin te Megbevayà.
42001049	Egkekaǥi zan heini tenged te menge egkein-inuwan he mid-ulaula kediey te utew lavew he mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà. Utew lavew is ngazan din.
42001050	Puun pa te nengehuna he menge etew zengan taman en guntaan, dekelà is hizu zin diyà te minsan hentei he edtahud kandin.
42001051	Nehimu zin is menge egkein-inuwan he vaal. Nemekepelaǥuy kandin is memepelevawen, ne wazè dan meveeli is ed-isipen dan.
42001052	Duen menge lavew he hadì he mibpekevavè din is pid-etawan ne zuen daan menge etew he minus is pid-etawan he mibpeketikang din is pid-etawan.
42001053	Is menge etew he egkengeayuayu, iyan ebeǥayan din te meupiya, iyan, is menge sepian, ibpehipanew zin he wazè dan uwiten.
42001054	Is impenaad din dengan diyà te menge kepuun tew he si Abraham wey is menge kevuwazan din, wazè din lipati. Midtevangan kiw zin is menge suluǥuen din he kevuwazan ni Israyil. Ne egkehizuwan kiw zin daan te wazà pidtemanan is menge nepilì din he etew he menge kevuwazan ni Abraham," ke si Maria.
42001056	Ne menge tetelu he vulan dutun is ked-ubpà ni Maria ziyà te engki Elisabet ne human med-ulì sikandin.
42001057	Ne hein neuma is andew, ne mid-anak si Elisabet ne maama haazà is anak din.
42001058	Ne hein nezineg te menge kezumahan dan wey menge siringan dan heini is utew meupiya he mid-ulaula te Megbevayà ki Elisabet, nengelipey zan daan.
42001059	Ne hein walu en he andew is ked-enaka zutun te vatà midtuman dan is betasan dan te menge Hudiyu su emun maama is id-anak, ne zutun te ikewalu he andew edsirkunsidaren dan. Ne is menge etew zutun, egngezanan dan pezem haazà is batà ki Zacarias su iyan ngazan dutun te amey zin.
42001060	Iyan, si Elisabet, wazà mesuat dutun ne ke sikandin te, "Kenà egkehimu su Juan is igngazan kandin."
42001061	Ne migkeǥiyan dan si Elisabet te, "Maan? Wazà minsan sevaha te menge kezuzumahi niw he ebpuunan te iring keniyan he ngazan!"
42001062	Ne mid-uyawan dan is amey zutun te vatà su id-insè dan ke hentei is igngazan din dutun te anak din.
42001063	Ne zutun mid-uyew si Zacarias he veǥayi zan sikandin te edsuratan din te igngazan din, ne iyan insurat din dutun is, "Si Juan is ngazan keniyan te vatà." Ne zutun utew zan nengeinuinu.
42001064	Ne segugunà nekekaǥi en maan si Zacarias ne nekezalig sikandin te Megbevayà.
42001065	Ne is langun he menge siringan dan, hein nezineg dan heini, utew zan nengeinuinu. Ne is tudtul zutun te neulaula, segugunà nekeeneb diyà te langun he menge vuvungan he inged he sakup te prubinsya he Hudiya.
42001066	Ne wazà heini melipati te langun he nemekezineg. Ne netaǥù diyà te isip dan ke hengkey vuwa is ibpeulaula keuzemà te Megbevayà dutun te vatà ke edekelè en su utew keladu he ed-ulinan te Megbevayà haazà is batà.
42001067	Ne zutun nepurung meulini is amey zin he si Zacarias te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne migkaǥi zin haazà is impinted kandin ne ke sikandin te,
42001068	"Edeliǥen tew is Nengazen he Megbevayà tew te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil su sikitew is ed-azap kandin, mibulusan kiw zin ne midlibri kiw zin te menge kuntada tew.
42001069	Edsuǥuen din dini te kenitew is Menluluwas he kevuwazan duen te suluǥuen te Nengazen dengan he si Hadì David.
42001070	Is Megbevayà, pinaaǥi te menge ebpemeneuven din dengan,
42001071	migkaǥi zin he edtevangan kiw zin wey kiw kenà mezaag te menge kuntada tew, ne wey kiw zaan kenà mahandek te langun he egkepauk kenitew.
42001072	Migkaǥi zin daan he ingkehizu zin is menge kepuun tew ne kenè din egkelipatan is penaad din kandan.
42001073	Utew mezesen is penaad din dengan diyà te kepuun tew he si Abraham
42001074	su impenaad din he sikitew is menge kevuwazan ni Abraham, edlibriyen kiw zin wey kiw kenà mezaag te menge kuntada tew ne zutun kenè kiw egkengehandek is ed-ulaula te egkesuatan din.
42001075	Ne egkehimu he metinumanen wey metazeng is ked-ezapa tew kandin andew-andew te kemulu kiw pa zini te lumpad te kelibutan."
42001076	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Zacarias haazà is anak din te, "Ne sikew, anak ku, iyan ka egeraran keuzemà he ebpeneuven te utew lavew he Megbevayà. Edsuǥuen ke zin he ibpehuna zuen te Nengazen tew su wey nu mekeǥiyi is menge etew he endami zan is kebpekeuma zin.
42001077	Ibpesavut nu kandan he egkeveǥayan sikandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan emun ebuyù dan te pesaylu ziyà te Megbevayà.
42001078	Su utew hihizuwen kenitew is Megbevayà. Is kedlibriya zin kenitew te silut, ne iring te kedsilà te andew emun egkepawà.
42001079	Henduen be te ziyè kiw ed-ubpà te utew merusirem su utew kiw egkengehandek te silut he iyan is wazè din ketepusan he kemetayen; iyan, emun ebpekeuma is Nengazen tew edteyawan kiw zin te ǥaǥew zin. Ne ibpeehè din kenitew is paaǥi wey ebmelinawen is ked-ubpè tew," ke si Zacarias.
42001080	Ne haazà is anak ni Zacarias, midtulin ne mid-iseg daan is ketau zin te ked-isip. Ne hein nekeiseg-iseg en is kezekelè din ne midhendiyà sikandin te tanà he kenè ed-ubpaan te etew ne zutun med-ubpà taman te neuma haazà is timpu te kebpenurù din te menge kezuzumahi zin he kevuwazan ni Israyil mehitenged te Lalag te Megbevayà.
42002001	Ne hein iyan pa si Augusto hadì diyà te inged he Ruma, mibaal sikandin te velaud he mebpesinsus is langun he menge etew te seled te menge ǥinhedian he sakup din.
42002002	Ne iyan en haazà aney en he kedsinsusa te etew hein iyan pa si Sirinyu gubirnedur ziyà te prubinsya he Sirya.
42002003	Ne zutun te kedsinsus, ne kinahanglan he ziyà edsinsusa is kada etew te inged te menge kepuun din.
42002004	Umba, si Jose is dutun ed-ubpà te inged he Neserit he ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya, kinahanglan he edhendiyà te prubinsya he Hudiya, diyà te inged he Bitlihim he iyan inged he mid-enakan ki Hadì David dengan; su si Jose, kevuwazan sikandin ni Hadì David.
42002005	Ne miduma ni Jose si Maria, sikan is bahi he nekeǥunan din su ebpesinsus dan. Meǥingey zutun si Maria.
42002006	Ne hein diyè dan en te inged he Bitlihim, netuman is ked-anak ni Maria,
42002007	ne in-anak din is maama he iyan en pengenayan. Ne mibukusan din haazà is batà te malung ne impehizeǥè din diyà te selemakà te kudà su wazè dan ed-ereǥan dutun te valey he ebpehizeǥaan te etew su neenget en te etew.
42002008	Ne iyan daan haazà he kezukileman, te uvey zutun he inged duen menge etew ziyà te penebtavà su ibpepenabtab dan is menge ayam dan he kerehidu.
42002009	Ne netekew zan te mibpaahà kandan is belinsuǥuen te Nengazen ne neketayew ziyà te kandan is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Megbevayà ne utew zan dutun nengehandek.
42002010	Ne migkaǥi haazà is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà te, "Kenè kew mahandek su midsuǥù a zini wey ku sikiyu mepenudtuli te utew meupiya he tudtul he iyan utew igkelipey te tivuuk he menusiyà.
42002011	Su kayi te kezukileman in-anak diyà te Bitlihim he iyan inged ni Hadì David dengan, is Nengazen he iyan kes mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Iyan sikandin edlibri keniyu te silut te Megbevayà.
42002012	Egketuusan niw haazà is batà su emun egkeehè niw is batà he mibukusan te malung ne impehizeǥà diyà te selemakà te kudà, ne iyan en sikandin," egkaǥi haazà is belinsuǥuen.
42002013	Ne zutundutun mibpaahà daan is utew mezakel he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebpemendalig te Megbevayà,
42002014	ke sikandan te, "Edeliǥen tew is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit. Ne zini te lumpad te kelibutan mebmelinawen is kebpekesavuk te langun he menge etew he igkesuat te Megbevayà."
42002015	Ne zutun mid-ulì diyà te langit haazà is menge velinsuǥuen. Ne hein neipus haazà mibpelelaǥà haazà is menge ebpemepenabtab te, "Kuwà kiw en su ebpehendiyè kiw te Bitlihim su wey tew maahà heini is midtudtul kenitew te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà."
42002016	Ne zutun nemenhipanew zan is egkengezegdeǥusu ne nekeuma zan diyà te ki Jose wey ki Maria ne neehè dan daan haazà is batà he impehizeǥà diyà te selemakà te kudà.
42002017	Ne zutun te neehè dan haazà is batà midtudtul zan engki Jose sikan is langun he midtudtul kandan te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà mehitenged dutun te vatà.
42002018	Ne langun dutun te nekezineg kayi te tudtul te menge mibpemepenabtab, ne utew zan nengeinuinu.
42002019	Ne si Maria, wazè din melipati heini is langun he nezineg din, kekenà, mibpurungan din is-isipa.
42002020	Ne haazà is ed-elima te menge kerehidu, mid-ulì dan is utew nengelipey. Ne midalig dan is Megbevayà tenged te langun he nezineg dan wey neehè dan su netuman haazà is langun dutun te migkaǥi te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.
42002021	Ne is menge ǥinikanan dutun te vatà, hein nekewalu en is ked-enaka kandin ne midsirkunsidar zan sikandin sumalà is betasan dan. Ne migngezanan dan sikandin ki Jesus he iyan sikan is inngazan kandin duen te velinsuǥuen te wazè pa sikandin ikeǥingey.
42002022	Ne kepatan he andew puun dutun te ked-enaka te vatà, iyan en timpu he edtumanen ni Jose wey ni Maria is betasan te kedlumpiyu sumalà is imbilinbilin ni Moises dengan mehitenged te vahi he sikan pa med-anak. Ne mid-uwit dan haazà is batà diyà te Hiruselim ne midseled dan diyà te simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà su id-etuvang dan haazà is anak dan diyà te Megbevayà.
42002023	Iyan id-ul-ulaha zan dutun su edtumanen dan sikan is insurat dengan duen te kesuǥuan he imbeǥey te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, "Is penganey he anak he maama, ne ebpeveyveyaan te Megbevayà."
42002024	Ne si Maria wey si Jose, duen impemuhat dan dutun su sumalà is insuǥù dengan te Nengazen ne kinahanglan he zuen dezuwa he limuken ne emun kenà ne zezuwa he merepatik he ibpemuhat te sikan pa med-anak.
42002025	Ne zuen dutun maama he ed-ubpà diyà te Hiruselim he egngezanan ki Simeon. Metazeng haazà he etew he layun edsimba te Megbevayà. Kenà egkeawà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is kebperetenga zin te kegketuman te midtagnà dengan he zuen timpu he edlibriyen te Megbevayà is nengepilì din he menge etew he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Layun ed-ulinan si Simeon te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
42002026	Ne impesavut kandin he zaan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he kenà tekew en ebpatey taman te kenè din pa egkeahà is impenaad he etew he nepilì te Nengazen he ibpahadì din te menusiyà.
42002027	Ne zutun te mid-uwit ni Jose wey ni Maria haazà is anak dan ne midseled dan dutun te simbahan su edtumanen dan sikan is insuǥù te kesuǥuan, daan en dutun si Simeon te seled su iyan impinted kandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
42002028	Ne hein naahà ni Simeon haazà is batà, nesepipi zin ne mibpeselematan din is Megbevayà.
42002029	Ke sikandin te, "Na, Nengazen, midtuman nu en human is penaad nu kediey. Ne egkehimu en he idtuǥut nu en he ebpatey a su wazè en human edteǥazan ku.
42002030	Neehè ku en is midsuǥù nu he iyan edlibri kenami te menusiyà te silut.
42002031	Iyan sikandin Menluluwas he imbeǥey nu he egkeahà te tivuuk he menusiyà.
42002032	Iyan sikandin idtayew te isip te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu he wazà mesayud ke hentei ka is tutuu he Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi kandin edeliǥen key is nengepilì nu he etew he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil." Iyan heini migkaǥi ni Simeon.
42002033	Ne haazà is ginikanan dutun te vatà, utew zan nengeinuinu kayi te migkaǥi ni Simeon mehitenged dutun te anak dan.
42002034	Ne in-ampù daan sikandan ni Simeon he tuvazi sikandan te Megbevayà ne migkeǥiyan din si Maria, sikan is iney zuen te vatà te, "Heini is anak nu, nepilì sikandin te Megbevayà su wey pinaaǥi kandin mevahinbahin kiw is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Ne is edsundan kandin ne egkelibri, ne sikan is kenà edsundan, ne edsilutan te Megbevayà. Egketuusan he sugù sikandin te Megbevayà, iyan, edsumpeliten sikandin te mezakel he menge etew,
42002035	ne pinaaǥi kandin egketuusan is menge mezaat he isip dan. Ne sikew is iney zin, tenged te egkuntedahan sikandin te mezakel, utew ebmesakit is gehinawa nu keuzemà." Iyan heini migkaǥi kandin ni Simeon.
42002036	Ne zutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà duen meritan he egngezanan ki Ana he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Anak sikandin ni Penuwil he kevuwazan ni Asir. Meǥurang en utew haazà is bahi. Hein menguhed pa sikandin, neesawa, iyan, seled te menge pitu zà he tuig te kegkeesawa zin, ne nevalu sikandin.
42002037	Ne menge keweluwan wey heepat en he tuig is kegkevalu zin. Ne layun sikandin diyà te simbahan su andew wey se mezukilem ne edsimba sikandin te Megbevayà, ne zuen timpu he kenà sikandin egkaan su wey zin utew mepurungi is ked-ampù din diyà te Megbevayà .
42002038	Ne te kemulu pa zutun te simbahan si Jose wey si Maria, nekeuma sikandin ne midalig din is Megbevayà tenged dutun te vatà. Ne impesavut din dutun ke hentei haazà is batà diyà te langun he menge etew he netiǥum dutun he hustu is kebpeebuta zan te kedlibriya te Megbevayà te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.
42002039	Ne hein nepasad ni Jose wey ni Maria haazà is kedtumana zan te langun he insuǥù diyà te kesuǥuan he imbeǥey te Nengazen, mid-ulì dan diyà te ed-ubpaan dan diyà te inged he Neserit diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
42002040	Ne midekelà haazà is batà ne mibmezesen is lawa zin, ne utew sikandin metau he vatà ne midtuvazan sikandin te Megbevayà.
42002041	Ne kada tuig edhendiyà is menge ǥinikanan ni Jesus te Hiruselim su edtelavuk dan te pista he egngezanan te Kedlevayi.
42002042	Ne hein sepulù en wey zezuwa he tuig is idad ni Jesus midtelavuk dan te pista sumalà is ulaula he neleyaman dan.
42002043	Ne hein netapus haazà is pista migenat dan su ed-ulì dan, ne mibpetaǥak si Jesus diyà te inged he Hiruselim, iyan, wazà heini metueni te ǥinikanan din.
42002044	Kunaan dan ke zutun si Jesus te menge zuma zan te ebpenhipanew med-elupitpit. Ne hein sengeandew en is kedhipanew zan ne human dan meseǥipà he wazà dutun si Jesus, ne midsusi zan is menge kezuzumahi zan wey menge emiǥu zan ne neehè dan he wazà dutun iyan si Jesus. Ne zutun midlikù dan diyà te Hiruselim ne mibpengehè dan.
42002046	Ne hein tetelu en he andew is kebpengehè dan, neehè dan sikandin diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà is ebpemekibitiyara te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ebpemineg te menge lalag dutun te menge menunudlù ne zuen daan menge insè din kandan.
42002047	Ne utew nengeinuinu is langun he nekezineg te menge tavak din te menge insà kandin su utew sikandin metau.
42002048	Ne si Maria wey si Jose, utew zan neinuinu hein neturedu zan sikandin diyà te simbahan ne migkaǥi is iney zin te, "Mama, maan is mid-ulaula nu kenami heini is utew zey igkeseeng? Su is amey nu wey siak, ne utew key neipeng is ebpen-ahà kenikew."
42002049	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Maan is ebpen-ahaan a keniyu? Wazè niw ve metueni he kinahanglan he zini a te valey te Amey ku?"
42002050	Iyan, wazè dan mesavut ke hengkey is kehuluǥan dutun te migkaǥi zin.
42002051	Miduma kandan si Jesus te ed-ulì diyà te Neserit su mepezumdumahan sikandin te ǥinikanan din. Ne wazà melipati te iney zin haazà is langun he neulaula, kekenà, netipiǥan diyà te isip din.
42002052	Ne midtulin is lawa ni Jesus ne mid-iseg is ketau zin te ked-isip. Inmeupiya sikandin te ǥehinawa te Megbevayà ne henduen ded daan is etew.
42003001	Ne zutun te ikesepulù wey lelima he tuig te kedhadì ni Hadì Tibiryu ziyà te inged he Ruma duen impesavut te Megbevayà diyà te ki Juan he anak ni Zacarias. Ne ziyà si Juan te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he menge etew. Ne zutun he timpu iyan gubirnedur ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya si Punsyu Pilatu. Ne ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya iyan gubirnedur si Hirudis. Ne si Felipe, is hazi ni Hirudis, iyan gubirnedur ziyà te menge prubinsya he Iturya wey Terekuniti. Ne si Lisanyas, iyan gubirnedur diyà te prubinsya he Ebilinya. Ne si Anas wey si Keyipas, ne iyan menge lavew he memumuhat diyà te inged he Hiruselim.
42003003	Si Juan, mibeyaan din is langun he menge inged dutun te uvey te wahig he Hurdan ne mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun. Ke sikandin te, "Iniyuǥi niw is memezaat he menge ulaula ne mebpebewtismu kew ne ebpeseyluwen te Megbevayà is menge salè niw."
42003004	Heini is kebpenurù ni Juan, iyan kegketuman te netagnà he insurat dengan ni Esaias te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà su ke si Esaias te, "Duen etew ziyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew. Ne egkezineg sikandin te menge etew he edangep kandin is egkaǥi te, 'Meǥaan ebpekeuma is Nengazen. Hiǥewani niw is ibayè din; tendanga niw is dalan he ed-ikulen din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, endami niw is kebpekeuma zin .
42003005	Ne tembaki is menge zal-ug; ne emun nenlebilebi haazà is ibayà, ne petaǥa. Ne emun nengepekùpekù ne kinahanglan he tendanga, ne emun duen menge mibuketur ne kinahanglan he ebpenhayen.
42003006	Ne zutun ibpaahà te Megbevayà te tivuuk he menusiyà is edsuǥuen din he Menluluwas.'"
42003007	Ne zuen mezakel he menge etew he nemenhendiyà te ki Juan su ebpemebewtismu. Ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Iring te ulaula te uled is ulaula niw su teruen kew. Maan is edhendini kew? Kunaan niw vuwa ke ebpekeǥawas kew te silut te Megbevayà.
42003008	Emun tutuu he mid-iniyuǥan niw is memezaat he ulaula, ipeehè niw pinaaǥi te menge meupiya he vaal niw. Ne kenè niw iyan seriǥi is kevuwazan kew ni Abraham su wazà dutun pulus diyà te Megbevayà. Su egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu he emun iyan egkinehenglanen te Megbevayà, ne egkehimu he ebeelan din heini is menge vatu he kevuwazan ni Abraham.
42003009	Is ebpiley te kayu, migkayew en su ebpemilayen din en is minsan hengkey he kayu he kenà meupiya is beǥas din su wey mevinsuli, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is etew he kenà meupiya is ulaula zin, edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà."
42003010	Ne haazà is menge etew, mid-insaan dan si Juan, ke sikandan te, "Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dey wey key mekelikey keniyan te egkeǥiyen nu?"
42003011	Ne midtavak ni Juan sikandan te, "Sikan is etew he zezuwa is kumbalè din, ne veǥayi zin sikan is wazè din kumbalà. Ne iring din ded daan sikan is etew he zuen din keenen, ne veǥayi zin sikan is wazà egkekaan," ke sikandin.
42003012	Ne zutun nekeuma is menge menunukut te vuhis su ebpebewtismu zaan sikandan. Ke sikandan te, "Menunudlù, hengkey is egkesuatan te Megbevayà he ed-ul-ulahan dey?"
42003013	Ne ke si Juan te, "Emun ebpenukut kew, kenè niw limbungi is menge etew te ibayad dan te vuhis. Iyan niw zà kuwaa ziyà te kandan is insuǥù keniyu te gubirnu."
42003014	Ne zutun duen menge sundaru he mid-insà diyà te ki Juan te, "Sikami, hengkey is ibpeulaula kenami te Megbevayà?" Ne midtavak si Juan te, "Engkezi niw is kebpelihendeka te menge etew wey is ked-uluǥi niw kandan te kewsa te kegkuwaa niw te selapì dan. Is sildu niw, metengkai en diyà te ǥehinawa niw."
42003015	Is menge etew zutun, hein nezineg dan haazà is kebpenurù ni Juan netenuzan dan is netagnà he hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà ne egkeisip dan he kela ke iyan si Juan.
42003016	Ne tenged kayi, migkaǥi si Juan diyà te kandan te langun te, "Duen ed-ilis kediey he utew lavew su minsan is kebpul-ut dà te menge sepatus din, kenè e pa zait he suluǥuen din. Wahig is ibewtismu ku keniyu," ke si Juan, "iyan, haazà is migkaǥi ku, ebewtismu zaan keniyu. Is edtuu, ne ebewtismuwan din te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Ne is kenà edtuu, ne iyan din ibewtismu kandan is hapuy.
42003017	Geina te ibpedsivayè din te edtapid is menge metazeng wey is menge lalung he etew, iring sikandin te ebpalid te parey he id-awè din is ukap dutun te parey. Ne haazà is parey ederengdengen, iyan, is ukap, edtutungen din diyà te hapuy he kenà egkeevukan," ke si Juan.
42003018	Ne sevaha he andew zutun hein neketapus is langun he menge etew he ebpemebewtismu, mibpebewtismu zaan si Jesus diyà te ki Juan. Ne zutun mid-ampù si Jesus ne te kemulu pa sikandin ed-ampù nepuwasan is langit ne midlugtanà diyà te kandin is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he henduen te merepatik. Ne nezineg dutun is Megbevayà he egkaǥi ziyà te langit he ke sikandin te, "Minahal ku sikew he Anak ku. Utew ku en sikew igkelipey." Utew pa mezakel is impenurù ni Juan dutun te menge etew su ibpesavut din kandan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Migkaǥi ni Juan diyà te menge etew he mezaat is ulaula ni Gubirnedur Hirudis su mid-aǥew zin is ipag din he si Hirudyas he esawa te hazi zin he si Felipe. Ne kenà iyan dà mezaat he ulaula ni Hirudis haazà is nekaǥi ni Juan su mezakel pa zutun is utew memezaat he vaal zin. Ne kenà dutun dà taman te memezaat he ulaula zin he mibeelan din, kekenà, impepirisu zin pa si Juan.
42003023	Ne hein menge ketluan en he tuig is penuiǥen ni Jesus ne mibpuunan din is ebpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà. Iyan diyà te isip te menge etew he anak sikandin ni Jose. Ne si Jose, anak ni Hili.
42003024	Ne si Hili, anak ni Matat; ne si Matat, anak ni Levi; ne si Levi, anak ni Milki; ne si Milki, anak ni Hani; ne si Hani, anak ni Jose.
42003025	Ne si Jose, anak ni Metatyas; ne si Metatyas, anak ni Amos; ne si Amos, anak ni Nahum; ne si Nahum, anak ni Isli; ne si Isli, anak ni Nagey.
42003026	Ne si Nagey, anak ni Maat; ne si Maat, anak ni Metatyas; ne si Metatyas, anak ni Simi; ne si Simi, anak ni Jose; ne si Jose, anak ni Huda.
42003027	Ne si Huda, anak ni Huwanan; ne si Huwanan, anak ni Risa; ne si Risa, anak ni Surubebil; ne si Surubebil, anak ni Selatil; ne si Selatil, anak ni Niri;
42003028	ne si Niri, anak ni Milki; ne si Milki, anak ni Adi; ne si Adi, anak ni Kusam; ne si Kusam, anak ni Ilmudam; ne si Ilmudam, anak ni Iyir;
42003029	ne si Iyir, anak ni Josue; ne si Josue, anak ni Eliezer; ne si Eliezer, anak ni Hurim; ne si Hurim, anak ni Matat; ne si Matat, anak ni Levi.
42003030	Ne si Levi, anak ni Simeon; ne si Simeon, anak ni Huda; ne si Huda, anak ni Jose; ne si Jose, anak ni Hunan; ne si Hunan, anak ni Iliyakim.
42003031	Ne si Iliyakim, anak ni Miliya; ne si Miliya, anak ni Meinan; ne si Meinan, anak ni Metata; ne si Metata, anak ni Natan; ne si Natan, anak ni David;
42003032	ne si David, anak ni Isai; ne si Isai, anak ni Ubid; ne si Ubid, anak ni Buus; ne si Buus, anak ni Salmun; ne si Salmun, anak ni Nasun.
42003033	Ne si Nasun, anak ni Eminadab; ne si Eminadab, anak ni Admin; ne si Admin, anak ni Arni; ne si Arni, anak ni Isrum; ne si Isrum, anak ni Piris; ne si Piris, anak ni Huda;
42003034	ne si Huda, ne anak ni Hakub; ne si Hakub, anak ni Isaak; ne si Isaak, anak ni Abraham; ne si Abraham, anak ni Tari; ne si Tari, anak ni Nakur.
42003035	Ne si Nakur, anak ni Siruk; ne si Siruk, anak ni Ragaw; ne si Ragaw, anak ni Pilig; ne si Pilig, anak ni Ibir; ne si Ibir, anak ni Sile;
42003036	ne si Sile, anak ni Keynan; ne si Keynan, anak ni Erpaksad; ne si Erpaksad, anak ni Sim; ne si Sim, anak ni Noe; ne si Noe, anak ni Lamik;
42003037	Ne si Lamik, anak ni Metusalin; ne si Metusalin, anak ni Inuk; ne si Inuk, anak ni Harid; ne si Harid, anak ni Meheleliyil; ne si Meheleliyil, anak ni Keynan;
42003038	ne si Keynan, anak ni Inus; ne si Inus, anak ni Sit; ne si Sit, anak ni Adan; ne si Adan, ne anak te Megbevayà.
42004001	Ne hein nebewtismuwan en si Jesus, mid-awà sikandin dutun te wahig he Hurdan. Nepurung sikandin meulini te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne mid-uwit sikandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin pehendiyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew.
42004002	Ne zutun, seled te kepatan he andew, migezaman si Jesus ni Setanas ke ebpekesalè be. Ne te zutun he menge andew wazà minsan hengkey he nekaan ni Jesus, ne zutun te ikekepatan en he andew utew nevitil si Jesus.
42004003	Ne migkeǥiyan sikandin ni Setanas te, "Emun tutuu iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà pengelinteuwi nu he mevaluy he egkeenen heini is menge vatu."
42004004	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Kenà iyan dà igkeuyag te menusiyà is egkeenen.'"
42004005	Ne zutun mid-uwit si Jesus ni Setanas diyà te utew metikang ne te sengeperè dà dutun impeehè din is langun he ǥinhedian dini te kelibutan.
42004006	Ne migkaǥi si Setanas te, "Is kebayàbayà kayi te langun he menge ǥinhedian wey is langun kayi he ketiǥeyunan, ibeǥey ku kenikew. Impeveyveyaan kediey heini is langun ne egkehimu he ibeǥey ku zaan diyà te minsan hentei he egkesuatan ku.
42004007	Langun kayi ne ibeǥey ku kenikew emun ed-azap ka kedì."
42004008	Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Iyan niw zà ezapa is Nengazen he Megbevayè niw. Ne is duma pa he ngazan he megbevayà, kenè niw tumana is suǥù din.'"
42004009	Ne zutun mid-uwit si Jesus ni Setanas diyà te inged he Hiruselim. Ne miduma zin diyà te utew metikang he limbuvungan te valey he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne migkeǥiyan din te, "Emun tutuu iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà, umpak ka
42004010	su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Ebpetevangan ka te Megbevayà te menge velinsuǥuen din
42004011	ne edtemukan ke zan su wey kenà egkerudruzan is minsan paa nu te vatu.'"
42004012	Ne midtavak kandin si Jesus te, "Duen daan insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Kenè kew mebaal te paaǥi he igezam niw te ǥehem te Nengazen he iyan Megbevayè niw.'"
42004013	Ne hein netuenan ni Setanas he kenè din bes egkepenulayan si Jesus, ne mid-ewaan din dè pa.
42004014	Ne zutun mid-ulì si Jesus diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne zekelà diyà te kandin is gehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Ne segugunà nekeeneb diyà te langun he menge inged dutun is tudtul mehitenged ki Jesus.
42004015	Ne nenurù sikandin diyà te menge simbahan te menge Hudiyu zutun te menge inged ne nemekezalig kandin is langun he menge etew.
42004016	Ne zutun midhendiyà si Jesus te Neserit, sikan is inged he zutun en sikandin medekelà. Ne zutun te andew he Sebadu he iyan Andew te Kedhimeley midseled si Jesus te simbahan su iyan betasan din. Ne midhitindeg su ebesahan din is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.
42004017	Ne induwal zan kandin is belesahan he menge surat ni Esaias, sikan is ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà. Mibekar zin haazà ne neehè din ne mibasa zin is insurat he edhenduen te,
42004018	"Mid-ulinan a te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ebpuun te Megbevayà. Ne mibpilì a te Nengazen su wey ku ikepesavut te menge egkengeayuayu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne mibpeveyaan din kedì is menge etew wey ku sikandan metudtuli he egkengevelukasan is nengevihag ni Setanas, ne egkengeulian is nengelakap wey zan mekeahà ne egketevangan is egkengereǥenan.
42004019	Midsuǥù e zin daan wey ku metudtul he iyan heini tuig he ibpeehè din is gaǥew zin te menusiyà."
42004020	Ne zutun midlulun ni Jesus haazà is belesahan ne induwal zin diyà te miduwal kandin ne mibpinuu su ebpenurù. Ne is langun he menge etew zutun, midtengtengan dan sikandin su ebpemineg dan.
42004021	Ne ke sikandin te, "Heini is netagnà he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he mibasa ku, ne netuman en guntaan dini te etuvangan niw."
42004022	Ne haazà is menge etew he nevurun dutun, nevenaran sikandan te menge penurù din, iyan, utew zan nengeinuinu su utew sikandin metau he edseysey. Ne ke sikandan te, "Kenè be anak heeyan ni Jose?"
42004023	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Siguradu ebpekekaǥi kedì is duma keniyu te erubasa he edhenduen te, 'Sikew is mememawì, hunai nu vewii is kenikew he lawa, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, emun tutuu ka he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà ne ipeehè nu is gehem nu zini te inged nu . Su nezineg dey is egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan nu ziyà te inged he Kepirnaum, ne beeli nu zaan kayi te keugelingen nu he inged.'
42004024	Iyan," ke si Jesus, "utew venar is egkeǥiyen he is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, kenà sikandin ebpemineǥen te menge etew ziyà te keugelingen din he inged.
42004025	Tutuu heini is egkeǥiyen ku he iring heini is ulaula niw ǥuntaan te timpu zengan hein kaazen pa ni Elias he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà; wazà ipeuzan te Megbevayà dini seled te tetelu he tuig wey heenem he vulan, ne nesuǥat te zekelà he vitil is langun he menge inged dini te kenitew. Ne mezakel is menge zuma tew he Hudiyu he menge valu he vahi he nengereǥenan dutun te vitil.
42004026	Iyan, wazà minsan sevaha kandan he mibpeveyaan ki Elias te Megbevayà wey zin metevangi, kekenà, nasì sikandin suǥua te Megbevayà diyà te inged he Seripta ziyà te prubinsya he Sidun wey zin metevangi is balu he vahi zutun he kenà Hudiyu.
42004027	Ne iring din ded daan is sevaha he neulaula. Dengan te kaazen daan ni Elisio te sevaha zuen te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà, mezakel is menge Hudiyu he ebpen-it-iten. Ne wazà Hudiyu he mibewian ni Elisio, kekenà, iyan is etew he kenà Hudiyu he si Naaman he tigSirya," ke si Jesus.
42004028	Ne is menge etew zutun te simbahan, hein nezineg dan haazà is migkaǥi ni Jesus ne utew zan nengepauk.
42004029	Nemenhitindeg dan ne migewezan dan si Jesus ne mid-uwit dan pehendiyà te pangpang dutun te puntur te vuvungan he zutun benguna haazà is inged dan su ed-uluǥen dan pezem dutun si Jesus te pangpang.
42004030	Iyan, nenelektelek dà si Jesus diyà te kandan ne mid-awà sikandin dutun.
42004031	Ne midlaus si Jesus pehendiyà te Kepirnaum he inged he sakup te Geliliya. Ne zutun te Andew te Kedhimeley mibpenurù din is menge etew ziyà te simbahan.
42004032	Ne is menge etew, hein nezineg dan haazà is kebpenurù din, utew zan nengeinuinu su zekelà is gehem ni Jesus te kebpenurù.
42004033	Ne te kemulu pa ebpenurù si Jesus, duen maama zutun te simbahan he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne hein neehè din si Jesus, mibensag sikandin is egkaǥi te,
42004034	"Sikew, Jesus he tigNeserit, hengkey is lavet nu kenami te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin? Kela ke iyan inhendini nu is edezeetan key kenikew. Egkekilala ku sikew; iyan ka sikan is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà!"
42004035	Ne zutun midawey ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin ne ke sikandin te, "Med-engked ka ne awè ka ziyan te kandin!" Ne zutun mibpengelinteuwan duen te mezaat he mulin-ulin he mekebadas diyà te tanà dutun te etuvangan te langun he menge etew haazà is edlelungen din. Ne mid-awà sikandin ne wazè din mekeizi haazà is etew he midlalung din.
42004036	Ne utew nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew zutun ne neked-iinseey zan is egkaǥi te, "Hendei ebpuun heini is gehem ni Jesus te kebayàbayà? Su utew mekeǥeǥehem is kedsuǥua zin te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he med-awè dan ne ebpemineg dan kandin!"
42004037	Ne zutun pinaaǥi kayi nekeeneb haazà is bentuǥan ni Jesus diyà te langun he menge inged he uvey zutun.
42004038	Ne te ked-awà ni Jesus dutun te simbahan, midhendiyà te valey ni Simon. Ne egkezeruwan dutun is enuǥang he vahi ni Simon ne utew meinit is lawa zin. Ne midhangyù dan ki Jesus he vewii zin haazà is bahi.
42004039	Ne mid-uvayan ni Jesus haazà, ne mibpengelinteuwan din he maawà haazà is dateng din. Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is bahi. Ne zutun mid-enew ne midsuba sikandin te ibpekaan din engki Jesus.
42004040	Ne hein edsanlep en is andew, is langun he menge etew he zuen duma zan he egkezeruwan, mibpen-uwit dan diyà te ki Jesus haazà is egkengezeruwan. Ne edempaan dà ni Jesus is kada egkezeruwan dutun ne egkeulian en.
42004041	Ne minsan sikan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, impemaawè din dutun te menge etew he edlelungen dan. Nemekekulahì haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he egkaǥi te, "Iyan ka iyan sikan is Anak te Megbevayà!" Iyan, impeengked sikandan ni Jesus su wazè din ituǥut he zuen egkeǥiyen dan su netuenan dan he iyan sikandin kes mibpilì te Megbevayà he hadì.
42004042	Ne hein egkepkepawè en mid-awà si Jesus dutun te inged ne midsiveysivey zutun te wazè din duma he etew. Iyan, mibpemengahà sikandin te menge etew, ne hein neturedu zan, midhangyù dan kandin he kenè pa sikandin med-awà dutun te inged dan.
42004043	Iyan, migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te kedhadì te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he ibpenudtul ku ziyà te menge etew ziyà te menge zuma he inged su iyan heini insuǥua kediey te Megbevayà."
42004044	Ne zutun midlaus si Jesus ne midweliyan din is menge etew zutun te menge simbahan te menge Hudiyu ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya.
42005001	Sevaha he andew te ziyà si Jesus te veyvey te ranew he egngezanan te Giniserit, utew mezakel he menge etew is nengetipun su ebpememineg dan te Lalag te Megbevayà he ibpenurù din.
42005002	Ne naahà ni Jesus is dezuwa he avang diyà te veyvey he wazà dutun mid-untud su midrenà dutun is menge teǥiǥaked su edlumpiyuwan dan is menge laya zan.
42005003	Ne mid-untud si Jesus dutun te sevaha he avang he ǥaked ni Simon ne impehalin din ki Simon haazà is avang te malù ebpekeziyù dutun te veyvey. Ne mibpinuu si Jesus dutun te avang ne mibpenurù din is utew mezakel he menge etew.
42005004	Ne hein nekepasad si Jesus is ebpenurù, migkeǥiyan din si Simon te, "Begsaya niw heini is avang pehendutun te mezalem ne penlaya kew zutun ne ebpekeutel kew te menge pait."
42005005	Ne midtavak si Simon te, "Tivuuk he kezukileman is kebpenlaya zey ne wazè dey neutel he minsan sevaha, iyan, emun iyan heeyan lalag nu ne ed-uman key ebpenlaya."
42005006	Ne zutun mibpenlaya zan en maan ne hein mibuwat dan haazà is laya ne nevenbenaran sikandan te utew mezakel he menge pait he neutel su samè dà kenà mevindas haazà is laya te kegkepenù din.
42005007	Ne migkapey zan is menge zuma zan dutun te sevaha he avang wey zan mekeuǥup. Ne hein nekeuma haazà is menge zuma zan, impen-ahuk dan is pait dutun te zezuwa he avang ne samè dà kenà melavu haazà is menge avang tenged te utew nepenù.
42005008	Ne si Simon Pedro, hein neehè din is neulaula, nekeluhud diyà te ki Jesus is egkaǥi te, "Datù, deyzey ke ebpekeziyuan a kenikew su utew a mekesesalà."
42005009	Iyan ingkekeǥiya zin kayi su utew neherat is mata zin te nengeutel zan he pait. Ne henduen ded daan haazà is menge zuma zan.
42005010	Elin daan nengeinuinu zutun is menge anak ni Sibidiyu he si Santiago wey si Juan he menge zuma ni Simon te ebpenlaya. Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te ki Simon te, "Kenè ka mahandek. Menlelaya ka te pait, iyan, puun guntaan iyan ku ibpeveelan kenikew is kebpen-ahà te etew wey mehimu he menge sumusundan ku."
42005011	Ne zutun mid-uwit dan haazà is menge avang dan diyà te ǥeunan, ne mid-ewaan dan dutun is langun ne midsundan dan ki Jesus.
42005012	Ne sevaha he andew ne ziyà si Jesus te sevaha he inged ne neuma zin is etew he nepurung en meeneb te menge it-it. Haazà is it-iten, hein neehè din si Jesus, mid-uvey ziyà te kandin ne midluhud ne midungul diyà te etuvangan din is egkaǥi te, "Datù, emun meupiya zà te ǥehinawa nu ne egkeulian a kenikew kayi te utew meremerik he egezamen ku."
42005013	Ne zutun midampà sikandin ni Jesus te egkaǥi te, "Utew meupiya te ǥehinawa ku; meulii ka!" Ne segugunà nehanewhanew zutun te etew haazà is it-it din.
42005014	Ne zutun mibeleuzan sikandin ni Jesus te, "Kenè nu heini zè pa tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei he etew, kekenà, hendiyè ka ǥuntaan te memumuhat he midhimu te Megbevayà wey zin maahà he neulian ka. Ne iveǥey nu kandin is ibpemuhat wey nu metuman sikan is insuǥù dengan ni Moises su wey metueni te langun, he tutuu iyan he neulian ke en."
42005015	Iyan, minsan pa zutun, nekeeneb diyà te meziyù is bentuǥan ni Jesus ne tenged dutun utew mezakel he menge etew is ebpemenhendutun te kandin wey zan mezineg is kebpenurù din ne wey zaan meulii sikandan te menge zaru zan.
42005016	Iyan, duen menge timpu he ed-ewaan din haazà is mezakel he menge etew ne edhendiyà sikandin te tanà he wazà dutun duma zin he etew ne zutun ed-ampù diyà te Megbevayà.
42005017	Sevaha he andew he ebpenurù si Jesus, duen ebpemimpinuu he mezakel he menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he midtelavuk dutun. Diyà haazà ebpemuun te langun he menge inged he sakup te Geliliya wey sakup te Hudiya. Ne zuen daan duma zan dutun he ebpemuun te Hiruselim. Ne zutun te ki Jesus is gehem te Megbevayà su wey zin mevewii is menge etew.
42005018	Ne zutun nekeuma is menge etew he ed-uwit te etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin he impehizeǥà te zuyanà. Idseled dan pezem dutun te valey su wey zan ikesavuk diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus.
42005019	Ne ǥeina te nepurung mehasek is menge etew zutun te valey ne wazè dan ikevayà sikandin dutun. Diyè dan mebayà te atep ne mibudsiyan dan is atep he renged ni Jesus ne haazà is duyanà he zutun is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin, midteyuntun dan dutun te teliwazà te menge etew he zutun si Jesus.
42005020	Ne hein nesavut ni Jesus he zekelà is kedsarig dan kandin, migkeǥiyan din heini is etew te, "Mama, nepesaylu en is menge salè nu."
42005021	Ne zutun, is menge Perisiyu wey is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, neisip dan diyà te ǥehinawa zan is: "Hentei heini he etew is edsupak te Megbevayà? Megbevayà sikandin uvag su hentei is ebpekepesaylu te menge salà, kekenà, iyan dà is Megbevayà."
42005022	Ne nesavut ni Jesus is diyà te isip dan ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Maan is egkeisip niw is iring keniyan?
42005023	Hendei zapit is egkehimu te etew zà duen, iyan be is kebpesaylu te salà kayi te etew wey ke iyan is kegkeulii kayi te etew su wey mekeenew ne mekehipanew?
42005024	Pinaaǥi te kebewii ku ǥuntaan kayi te etew, ibpeehè ku keniyu he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen ku keǥehem dini te lumpad te kebpesaylu te salà." Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa, ke sikandin te, "Sikew, Mama, enew ka, ne kuwaa nu heeyan is duyanè nu ne ulì ka!"
42005025	Ne zutundutun mid-enew haazà is etew zutun te etuvangan dan te langun ne migkuwa zin haazà is impehizeǥaan kandin ne mid-ulì is edalig te Megbevayà.
42005026	Ne is langun he menge etew zutun ne nengeherat is mata zan, ne utew zan nengeinuinu ne midalig dan is Megbevayà, ne ke sikandan te, "Heini is neehè tew ǥuntaan, ne utew egkein-inuwi!"
42005027	Ne hein neipus haazà, ne mid-awà dutun si Jesus ne neehè din is sevaha he menunukut te vuhis he egngezanan ki Levi he ebpimpinuu ziyà te upisina zin. Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus te, "Mama, sunud ka kedì."
42005028	Ne zutun ne mid-ewaan ni Levi is minsan hengkey zutun ne midsunud ki Jesus.
42005029	Ne zutun midtukud te zekelà he keemuran si Levi ziyà te valey zin su zutun si Jesus. Ne mezakel is nemenelavuk dutun he menge menunukut te vuhis he menge zuma ni Levi, ne zuen daan menge zuma he menge etew he nemengaan duma kandan.
42005030	Ne zuen menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he nekeahà kayi te menge etew. Ne migkeǥiyan dan is menge sumusundan ni Jesus te, "Maan is egkaan kew wey ed-inum kew zuma te menge limbungan he menunukut te vuhis wey te menge mesinupaken?"
42005031	Ne iyan midtavak dutun si Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Sikan is wazè din daru, ne kenà egkinahanglan he ebewian, kekenà, iyan dà is duen din daru.
42005032	Siak, wazà a medhendini wey ku ikepeiniyug te ked-ulaula te mezaat is menge metazeng, kekenà, iyan is mesinupaken te Megbevayà."
42005033	Ne zuen menge etew he migkaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Is menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu wey is menge sumusundan te menge Perisiyu, ne layun dan ed-ampù wey edsalang dan he egkaan su wey zan mepurungi is ked-azap dan te Megbevayà . Iyan, is kenikew he menge sumusundan, kenè dan mulà edsalang he egkaan, kekenà, kada andew egkaan dan wey ed-inum dan."
42005034	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Penenglitan, ke zuen eseweey, is menge zuma te ebpengesawa, kenà egkehimu he ibpesalang sikandan te kegkaan ke kemulu zan pa zuma haazà is ebpengesawa.
42005035	Ne zutun te timpu he ibpaawà diyà te kandan sikan is ebpengesawa, human dan edsalang egkaan, su egkeseeng dan."
42005036	Ne zutun insempità ni Jesus is kenà kebpeked-amur te veǥu he penurù din wey te zaan he tuluuwen te menge Hudiyu, ke sikandin te, "Wazà etew he ebindas te veǥu pa he kumbalà su idapi zin te kumbalà he tuǥak en. Su emun ebeelan din is iring kayi, ne nezezeetan din dà is beǥu, ne haazà is daan he kumbalà, kenà ed-engayan te veǥu he indapi zutun.
42005037	Ne iring din ded daan," ke si Jesus, "is binu he sikan pa ebeeli he idtaǥù diyà te teleǥuey he lundis te kambing. Kenà egkehimu he ziyà idtaǥù te zaan he teleǥuey su ebetu is teleǥuey ne egkeulaan haazà is binu ne egkezeetan daan is teleǥuey.
42005038	Kinahanglan he sikan is binu he sikan pa ebeeli, diyà idtaǥù te veǥu en he teleǥuey.
42005039	Ne sikan is etew he nekeinum te zaan he vinu, kenè en sikandin ed-inum duen te vinu he sikan pa ebeeli su ke sikandin te, 'Iyan meupiya is daan he vinu.'"
42006001	Ne zutun te sevaha he andew he Sebadu, ingkevayà eni Jesus is pemuleey. Ne mibpengetu haazà is menge sumusundan din te menge trigu ne mibpengusu zan haazà ne mibpengaan dan is menge veǥas dutun.
42006002	Ne zutun duen menge Perisiyu he migkaǥi te, "Maan is edsupaken niw is insuǥù kenitew te Megbevayà he wazà ibpevaal emun Andew te Kedhimeley?"
42006003	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenà egkehimu he wazè niw mevasa ziyà te ingkesurat dengan kes mid-ulaula ni Hadì David. Sikandin wey is menge sundaru zin ne nengevitil sikandan.
42006004	Ne wazà sikandin mekesalà minsan midseled diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne migkaan din is egkeenen he insavuk diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà ne impekaan din daan dutun is menge zuma zin. Supak te kesuǥuan is kegkeena zan dutun su iyan dà ebpekekaan dutun he egkeenen is menge memumuhat."
42006005	Ne impelaus ni Jesus haazà is lalag din, ke sikandin te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan a zuen keǥehem te egkaǥi ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan te etew emun Andew te Kedhimeley."
42006006	Ne sevaha pa zutun he andew he Sebadu, midseled si Jesus duen te simbahan te menge Hudiyu ne nenurù sikandin. Ne zuen dutun etew he minatey is menge uǥat te kewanan he velad din.
42006007	Ne zuen dutun menge etew he Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne mibentayan dan si Jesus su ed-ehaan dan ke ebewian din be haazà is etew zutun te andew su Andew te Kedhimeley. Iyan ibpurungi zan ibentayi ki Jesus su wey zan mekeahà te paaǥi te kedsumbunga zan kandin he midsupak din is Andew te Kedhimeley.
42006008	Ne si Jesus, netuenan din ke hengkey is netaǥù diyà te isip dan ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he nezeetan is belad din te, "Mama, hitindeg ka ne uvey ka zini." Ne midhitindeg haazà is etew ne mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus.
42006009	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù, ke sikandin te, "Hengkey is isip niw? Hendei zapit is intuǥut kenitew zuen te kesuǥuan tew he ed-ul-ulahan tew kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley? Iyan be is kedtavang te etew he edlised wey ke ebpesipelahan be is etew? Iyan be is kedtavang te etew su wey kenà mebpatey wey ke edhimetayan be?"
42006010	Ne mibpenlangulangu si Jesus dutun te langun he menge etew ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he nezeetan is belad din te, "Ketenga nu, Mama, is belad nu." Ne migketeng dutun te etew is belad din ne segugunà neulii.
42006011	Ne zutun, ne utew nengepauk haazà is menge Perisiyu wey haazà is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan ne mibpelelelaǥè dan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dan ki Jesus.
42006012	Ne sevaha he andew zutun midhendiyà si Jesus te vuvungan su ed-ampù diyà te Megbevayà. Ne mid-ampù sikandin dutun te tivuuk he kezukileman.
42006013	Ne hein nepawà dutun ne miburun din is menge sumusundan din ne mibpilì din dutun is sepulù wey zezuwa ne migeraran din haazà he menge epustul.
42006014	Is menge etew he nengepilì din dutun iyan ensi Simon he sikan is migeraran din ki Pedro, wey sikan is hazi ni Simon he si Andres, si Santiago wey si Juan, si Felipe wey si Bartolome,
42006015	si Mateo wey si Tomas, si Santiago he anak ni Alpiyu wey sevaha he etew he egngezanan ded daan ki Simon he nevantug tenged te utew mezesen sikandin he edtuman te imbilinbilin he kesuǥuan,
42006016	ne elin daan si Hudas he anak te sevaha he etew he egngezanan daan ki Santiago wey is sevaha pa he egngezanan ki Hudas he tigKeriyuti. Heini he Hudas, iyan kes mid-akal ki Jesus.
42006017	Ne hein neipus ni Jesus is kebpilia zin kandan midtupang sikandin duma haazà is nengepilì din. Midteren dan dutun te patag ne nengevurun dutun is mezakel he menge sumusundan din wey is medmezakel he menge etew he ebpemuun diyà te menge inged he sakup te Hudiya wey ziyà te inged he Hiruselim. Ne zuen daan menge etew he ziyà ebpemuun te menge inged he Tiru wey Sidun he ziyà te veyvey te zaǥat. Iyan tuyù dutun te menge etew is ebpemineg dan te kebpenurù ni Jesus wey ebpemevawì daan sikandan kandin te menge zaru zan.
42006018	Ne mibewian din is langun he menge etew he ebpenlelungen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin zutun ne nengeulian sikandan.
42006019	Ne mezakel zutun te menge etew is egkesuat he egawed diyà te ki Jesus, su zuen gehem he ebpuun diyà te kandin ne pinaaǥi zutun egkengeulian is langun te sikandan.
42006020	Ne mibpenlangulangu si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din ne migkaǥi sikandin te, "Utew kew zeyzey is menge ayuayu su iyan kew en edhedian te Megbevayà!
42006021	Utew kew zeyzey is egkengevitil ǥuntaan su ebpekehentayen kew keuzemà te Megbevayà! Utew kew zeyzey is egkengeseeng guntaan su egkengelipey kew keuzemà.
42006022	Utew kew zeyzey emun egkuntedahan kew te menge etew ne kenè kew zan edewaten he zuma zan, ne ebpeel-elezan kew zan, ne egkeǥiyen kew zan he memezaat is ulaula niw tenged te midsundan kew kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà. Iyan heini kes mid-ulaula zengan te menge kepuun dan diyà te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Medlipey kew utew emun egkehitavù heini ziyan te keniyu su utew zekelà is suhul keniyu te Megbevayà he ebpeebuten niw ziyà te langit.
42006024	Iyan, kehizu niw te menge sepian guntaan su emun egkehanew is menge ketiǥeyunan niw wazè en duma pa he igkelipey niw keuzemà.
42006025	Kehizu niw te layun egkengehantey ǥuntaan su zuen timpu keuzemà he egkengevitil kew! Kehizu niw te egkengelipey ǥuntaan su zuen timpu keuzemà he utew kew egkengeseeng.
42006026	Kehizu niw te edtehuzen guntaan te langun he menge etew su iyan heeyan mid-ulaula zengan te menge kepuun dan diyà te menge kenà tutuu he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Umba edtehuzen kew te menge etew su iring kew zutun te menge kenà tutuu he ebpeneuven ne edsilutan kew zaan te Megbevayà.
42006027	Iyan egkeǥiyen ku keniyu te menge sumusundan ku he ebpemineg kediey ǥuntaan is: kinahanglan he kenà mezaat is gehinawa niw ziyà te menge kuntada niw, kekenà, purungi niw is egkengeepes keniyu.
42006028	Penubtuvazi niw te meupiya is ebpenrawak keniyu. Iampù te Megbevayà is ebpesipala keniyu.
42006029	Emun duen etew he edtebpien din is enaping nu, ne keǥiyi nu he egkehimu pa ke elin din edtebpien is divaluy. Ne emun duen etew he edluwasen din is kumbalè nu ne keǥiyi nu te egkehimu pa ke elin din egkuwaan is kemising nu.
42006030	Emun duen ebuyù diyà te kenikew, iveǥey nu ziyà te kandin is ebuyuen din, ne emun duen etew he ed-eǥawen din is menge azen nu ne kenè nu hewia.
42006031	Is meupiya he egkesuatan nu he ed-ul-ulahan te zuma ziyà te kenikew, ne iyan nu ul-ulaha ziyà te kandan.
42006032	Kenè nu isipa he edsuhulan ka te Megbevayà emun iyan nu zà igkesuat is menge etew he igkesuat ke zan daan su minsan is menge mesinupaken he etew, ne igkesuat dan daan is menge etew he egkesuat kandan.
42006033	Ne ke iyan nu zà ebpurungan is menge etew he ebpurungan ke zan daan, kenè nu isipa he edsuhulan ka te Megbevayà su minsan is menge mesinupaken he etew, ne ebpurungan dan daan is ebpurung kandan.
42006034	Ne emun iyan nu zà ibpeutang is etew he netuenan nu he ebpekevayad te ibpeutang nu kandin, kenè nu isipa he edsuhulan ka te Megbevayà su minsan is menge mesinupaken he etew, ibpeutang dan is menge zuma zan he mesinupaken emun egketuenan dan he ebpekevayad dutun te ibpeutang.
42006035	Iyan penurù ku keniyu is: kenà imezaat te ǥehinawa niw is menge kuntada niw, kekenà, meupiya is ul-ulaha niw ziyà te kandan. Ke zuen etew he ed-utang keniyu, kenè niw itaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa niw he kinahanglan he beyazi kew zin. Emun edtumanen niw heini, igkepeehè niw he menge anak kew te utew lavew he Megbevayà. Ne utew zekelà is suhul zin keniyu su minsan is menge etew he memezaat is ulaula wey is menge kenà ebpeselamat kandin, egkehizuwan din sikandan gihapun.
42006036	Iring te nehizu kenitew is Amey tew he Megbevayà, mehizu kew zaan te zuma niw.
42006037	Kenè kew medsawey te zuma niw ne kenè kew zaan edsewayen te Megbevayà. Is duma niw he nekesalà, kenè niw keǥiya he meupiya ke edsilutan su wey kenè kew mesiluti te Megbevayà. Mebmepeseyluwen kew te zuma niw ne ebpeseyluwen kew te Megbevayà te menge salè niw.
42006038	Mebeǥey kew ziyà te menge zuma niw ne is Megbevayà, ebeǥayan kew zin daan. Is kezekelà te ibeǥey niw ne iyan daan kezekelà te ibeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà. Ne is ibeǥey zin keniyu, ne utew subra su henduen te utew edhesheseka wey utew ebpenpenua ne egkepeuluwan pa."
42006039	Ne impezineg ni Jesus is sempità, ke sikandin te, "Is etew he lakap, kenà egkehimu he ed-aǥak te sengelelakap daan, su pudu zan is dezuwa, egkeulug diyà te vitu.
42006040	Is ebpepenurù, kenè din isipa he lavew sikandin he edtehuzen kenà te ebpenurù kandin. Ne emun wazè en igkepenurù kandin te ebpenurù, human ebpekedrepeng sikandan is ebpepenurù wey is ebpenurù."
42006041	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikew is layun edsawey te zuma nu, maan is edsawey ka te salà te zuma nu he iring dà te pesek he nekeahuk te mata zin. Ne sikew, duen nu salà he iring kezekelà te vatang he nekevuta te mata nu ne ebpesegdanen nu?
42006042	Ne egkeǥiyan nu pa sikandin he id-awè nu haazà is nekepesek kandin, iyan, nepesek mulà is kenikew he mata te vatang he ebpesegdanen nu! Utew tarù is ulaula nu! Ihuna nu iawà is batang he nekepesek kenikew ne human ka ebpekeahà. Ne zutun melemu nu zà igkeawà haazà is nekepesek te zuma nu."
42006043	Ne ke si Jesus en maan te, "Is kayu he wazè din erat, meupiya is beǥas din ne kenà ebpemeǥas te mezaat. Is kayu he zuen din erat, mezaat is beǥas din ne kenà ebpemeǥas te meupiya.
42006044	Egketuusan is kada kayu pinaaǥi te veǥas din, su is banag ne kenà ebpemeǥas te paras ne is seǥà ne kenà ebeǥas te igira.
42006045	Ne iring din ded daan te etew," ke si Jesus, "su emun meupiya is ulaula zin he etew, memeupiya zaan is nemeketaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa zin; meupiya zaan is kebpemèbè din. Iyan, ke mezaat is ulaula zin he etew, memezaat daan is nemeketaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa zin, ne mezaat daan is kebpemèbè din. Su is egketaǥù te ǥehinawa te etew, iyan daan egkekaǥi zin."
42006046	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Maan is egkeǥiyen niw he iyan a egalen niw, iyan, kenè niw edtumanen is menge sambag ku keniyu.
42006047	Is minsan hentei he sumusundan ku he nekezineg te menge sambag ku ne ebpezumdumahan din, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he
42006048	iring sikandin te etew he ebevaley te melig-en diyà te zivavew te zekelà he vatu. Memezalem is bangbang din he mibpesekan din te tukud. Ne nepasad haazà is baley ne mibagyu ne midalem is wahig ne nesuǥat haazà is baley te meseleg he wahig, iyan, wazà merundus su neviǥeran man.
42006049	Ne is etew he ebpemineg dà te menge sambag ku, iyan, kenè din ebpezumdumahan, ne iring sikandin te etew he ebevaley ziyà te pantad. Ne hein nepasad din haazà is baley zin ne mibagyu ne nesuǥat haazà is baley zin te utew meseleg he wahig ne nerundus haazà is baley he nepurung mewaǥey."
42007001	Ne hein nekeipus dutun si Jesus he ebpenurù te menge etew ne midhendiyà sikandin te inged he Kepirnaum.
42007002	Ne zuen dutun etew he kenà Hudiyu he kepitan te nenggatus he sundaru he zuen din suluǥuen he maama he utew zin minahal. Ne heini is suluǥuen ne egketigbak is egkezeruwan su edluwàluwè en te ǥehinawa.
42007003	Ne hein neventuǥan haazà is egalen din mehitenged ki Jesus, midsuǥù din is pira he vuuk te ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu wey zan mehengyui si Jesus he medhendutun su wey zin mevewii haazà is suluǥuen dutun te kepitan.
42007004	Ne mibeyaan dutun te menge ebmeǥurangen si Jesus ne midhangyù dan kandin, ke sikandan te, "Engayan he tevangi nu sikandin
42007005	su sikitew is menge Hudiyu, ne mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin; mibpehitindeg sikandin te sevaha he simbahan tew."
42007006	Ne zutun miduma si Jesus kandan ne hein ebpelingguma zan en dutun te valey te egalen te menge sundaru ne impesinuǥung din ensi Jesus te menge zuma zin wey zan mekaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus is lalag din he edhenduen te, "Datù, kenè nu en semuka is gehinawa nu te kedhendini te valey ku su kenà a zait he ebigatbigat kenikew he medhendini ke pa maan.
42007007	Su utew zekelà is pid-etawan nu ne minsan is kedsinuǥung ku kenikew, ne kenà a zait. Utew ka mekeǥeǥehem ne minsan ke egkaǥi ke zà te, 'Meulii sikandin,' ne egkeulian en is suluǥuen ku.
42007008	Netuenan ku heini su iring te zuen ebayàbayà kedì ne zuen daan menge sundaru he ebeyveyaan ku. Ne edsuǥuen ku is sevaha he medhipanew ne edhipanew en. Ne edtewaǥen ku is sevaha pa he medhendini ne edhendini en. Ne edsuǥuen ku zaan is suluǥuen ku ke zuen ebpeveelan ku ne ebeelan din. Ne iring din ded daan diyan te kenikew su is egkeǥiyen nu ne egkehimu en."
42007009	Ne te nezineg ni Jesus heini, ne utew neinuinu. Ne midlingì ne migkaǥi ziyà te mezakel he menge etew he nemenduma kandin te, "Wazè ku pa meuma is etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil he iring kayi he utew mezesen is kedtuu zin!"
42007010	Ne mid-ulì haazà is menge midsuǥù dutun te egalen te menge sundaru ne hein nekeuma zan diyà te valey, neulian en haazà is suluǥuen te kepitan.
42007011	Ne nepiraan pa maan dutun midhendiyà si Jesus te inged he egngezanan te Nain. Ne utew mezakel is menge etew he nemenduma kandin ragkes te menge sumusundan din.
42007012	Ne hein ebpekeuma zan en dutun te idselang dutun te inged ne nesinuǥung dan is menge etew he ebpuun dutun te inged he edlanting te minatey su idleveng dan. Maama haazà is minatey he iyan dà anak dutun te meritan he valu. Mezakel is menge etew zutun te inged he miduma zutun te vahi he eduma te edleveng.
42007013	Ne is Nengazen he si Jesus, hein neehè din haazà is bahi he edsineǥew ne midtavang is gehinawa zin ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is bahi te, "Ayà, kenè ka sineǥew."
42007014	Ne mibeyaan din is edlentingen ne migewezan din. Ne nemeketeren haazà is edlanting dutun te minatey ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is edlentingen te, "Mama, enew ka!"
42007015	Ne zutundutun mid-enew haazà is minatey ne mibpekidlalag kandan. Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is iney zutun te nevanhew he kuwaa zin en haazà is anak din.
42007016	Ne is langun he nemekeahà dutun, ne utew zan nengehandek ne nezalig dan is Megbevayà, ke sikandan te, "Heini en te kenitew is utew lavew he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà!" Ne ke sikandan daan te, "Mibulus en is Megbevayà su wey kiw melibri is menge nengepilì din he etew!"
42007017	Ne haazà is tudtul te mid-ulaula ni Jesus, ne segugunà nekeeneb diyà te tivuuk he menge inged te prubinsya he Hudiya wey ziyà te zuma pa he menge inged he nekepeǥilid dutun.
42007018	Ne hein nezineg te menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu is tudtul mehitenged kayi te langun, midtudtulan dan si Juan.
42007019	Ne zutun midtawag ni Juan is dezuwa te menge sumusundan din ne midsuǥù din diyà te ki Jesus. Iyan insuǥua zin dutun su ibpeinsè din ke iyan en be iyan si Jesus sikan is netagnà dengan is kebpekeuma zin dini te kelibutan he impesavut ni Juan wey ke zuen pe be ebpeebuten he liyu ki Jesus.
42007020	Ne hein nekeuma zan diyà te ki Jesus migkaǥi zan te, "Iyan impekehendini zey te kenikew su midsuǥù key ni Juan Megbebewtismu su ibpeinsè din ke iyan ke en be iyan kes impesavut din he ibpehendini te Megbevayà wey ke zuen pe be ebpeebuten liyu kenikew?"
42007021	Ne zutun he andew, mezakel is menge etew he nengeulian ni Jesus te menge zaru wey ebpenggezamen dan. Impemeǥuwè din dutun te menge etew is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung kandan ne midhimu zin he mekeahà is mezakel he menge lakap.
42007022	Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is menge suǥù ni Juan te, "Likù kew en diyà te ki Juan ne tudtula niw ziyà te kandin is nengeehè niw he mid-ulaula ku wey ke hengkey is nezineg niw he migkaǥi ku. Iyan niw tudtula kandin he tenged kedì ne ebpemekeehè en is menge lakap ne ebpemekehipanew en is menge piang; nengeulian en is menge it-iten wey ebpemekezineg en is menge vengel. Mibanhew ku is nemematey wey impesavut ku ziyà te menge egkengeayuayu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
42007023	Utew zeyzey is etew he kenà eduwazuwa he iyan a sikan is midsuǥù te Megbevayà."
42007024	Ne hein migenat en haazà is menge suǥù ni Juan ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te mezakel he nengetiǥum he menge etew, ke sikandin te, "Hein midhilesung niw si Juan diyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew, hengkey is inhilesunga niw kandin? Iyan be ed-ahaan niw is etew he iring te sagbet he egkewaleng te keramag? Kenà iyan haazà su kenà egkehalinhalin is gehinawa ni Juan .
42007025	Midhilesung niw ve is etew he utew meupiya is bisti zin? Kenà daan, su is menge etew he memeupiya is bisti wey utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk, ne ziyè dà egkeahà te turuǥan te hadì.
42007026	Ne hengkey is inhilesunga niw? Ed-ehè kew ve te etew he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà? Iyan haazà tutuu he ed-ahaan niw su ebpeneuven iyan si Juan. Iyan, kenà te ebpeneuven dà
42007027	su iyan daan si Juan sikan is kegketuman te netagnà he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà su migkaǥi zutun is Megbevayà te, 'Duen etew he edsuǥuen ku. Ibpehuna ku sikandin kenikew wey zin mehiǥewani is ibayè nu.'" Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te,
42007028	"Tentenuzi niw he si Juan Megbebewtismu, wazà minsan hentei he etew te minsan keenu he timpu he nekelavew kandin, iyan, ke edhadì keuzemà is Megbevayà, is minsan hentei he etew zutun he edhedian te Megbevayà, minsan utew minus is pid-etawan din, lavew pa sikandin kenà si Juan guntaan."
42007029	Ne hein nezineg heini is menge penurù ni Jesus te langun he menge etew zutun wey te menge mesinupaken he menge menunukut te vuhis, migkaǥi zan he utew hustu is menge ulaula te Megbevayà. Umba migkaǥi zan heini su iyan si Juan kes mibpemewtismu kandan.
42007030	Iyan, is menge Perisiyu wey is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan te menge Hudiyu, wazè dan mulà pezumdumahi is egkesuatan te Megbevayà he ibpeulaula kandan ne wazè dan daan mebpebewtismu ki Juan.
42007031	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, iyan ebpetug-iringan ku keniyu is menge vatà.
42007032	Su is menge vatà, ne ebpememimpinuu ziyà te tiyenggiyan is ebevaleyvaley. Ne ebpeum-umawà sikandan is egkaǥi te, 'Edtemburan dey sikiyu ne kenè kew edsayew, ne edlelendag key ne kenè kew zaan edtampu.'
42007033	Ne hein neehè niw si Juan Megbebewtismu, is edsalang egkaan, ne kenà daan ed-inum te vinu ne migkaǥi niw he midsuukan sikandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
42007034	Ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, wazà a medsalang megkaan ne mid-inum a mulà te vinu ne nengeinuinu kew ne migkaǥi niw he vuleǥuk a wey pereinum te vinu. Ne ke sikiyu te emiǥu a te menge lalung he etew iring te menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken.
42007035	Iyan," ke si Jesus, "pinaaǥi te menge ulaula te menge etew he tutuu is kedsarig dan te Megbevayà egketuusan ta he utew metau sikandin."
42007036	Ne zuen dutun Perisiyu he mid-umbita zin si Jesus he ibpekaan diyà te valey zin. Ne midhendiyà si Jesus. Ne hein nekeuma en si Jesus dutun, ne mibpinuu is egkaan.
42007037	Ne zutun he inged duen bahi he mezaat is dengeg din. Ne hein netuenan kayi te vahi he zutun egkaan si Jesus te valey te Perisiyu, midhendutun sikandin is ed-uwit te meputì he pelenahan he vatu he elebastru he midteǥuan te mehemut he agwa he mahal utew.
42007038	Ne mid-uvayan din si Jesus ne midluhud diyà te uvey te paa zin ne mibpeniǥis is luhè din ne nengeulug diyà te paa ni Jesus. Ne mibpunasan din te vulvul zin ne midhezekan din. Ne zutun mibusbusan din haazà is paa ni Jesus duen te agwa he utew mehemut.
42007039	Ne naahà heini zutun te Perisiyu he mid-umbita ki Jesus, ne neisip din is, "Angin ke tutuu he ebpeneuven heini te Megbevayà ne kenà ebpekeeles kandin is meremerik he ulaula kayi te vahi ne wazè din pezem ituǥut he meǥewezi is lawa zin kayi te vahi."
42007040	Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus dutun te Perisiyu heini is lalag, ke sikandin te, "He Simon, duen egkeǥiyen ku kenikew." Ne ke si Simon te, "Hengkey?"
42007041	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iyan heini is sempità. Dengan duen sevaha he etew he ebpeutang te selapì. Ne zuen dutun dezuwa he etew he nekeutang diyà te kandin. Is sevaha, ne lelima he ǥatus is neutang din ne is sevaha, ne kelimahan dà is kandin he neutang.
42007042	Ne hein kenà ebpekevayad haazà is dezuwa he utangan, ne migkaǥi haazà is neutangan dan he kenè dan en beyazi haazà is utang dan." Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Hendei zapit dutun te zezuwa he etew he nekeutang is lavew he utew mahal diyà te ǥehinawa zin haazà is neutangan dan?"
42007043	Ne ke si Simon te, "Iyan buwa lavew he utew zekelà is gehinawa zin te etew he neutangan dan sikan is dekelà is utang din he wazè en peveyazi kandin." Ne ke si Jesus te, "Benar, su iyan sikandin utew lavew he zekelà is gehinawa zin dutun te etew he neutangan dan."
42007044	Ne midsinaru si Jesus dutun te vahi ne migkeǥiyan din si Simon te, "Sikan is sempitè ku, ne iring kayi te vahi. Su mibpemenahik a zini te valey nu, iyan, minsan pa te iyan betasan tew is ebeǥey ki te ibpepenlùlù te paa te meǥeliyug ta ne wazà a kenikew veǥayi. Ne heini is bahi mulà, midlùlùan din is menge paa ku te menge luhè din ne midterepuwan din te menge vulvul zin.
42007045	Ne minsan te iyan betasan tew te kegalewǥalew is kedhezeki ta te meǥeliyug ta, ne wazà midhazek kedì te kebpekeuma ku. Ne heini is bahi, puun pa te kebpekeuma ku midtulungan din hezeki is menge paa ku.
42007046	Ne wazè nu zaan itisi is ulu ku te lana, iyan, heini is bahi, mahal he mehemut he agwa is imbusbus din dini te menge paa ku!
42007047	Umba migkaǥi ku heini kenikew su egketuusan ta kayi te vahi he mezakel is menge ulaula zin he mezaat he nengepesaylu en te Megbevayà su utew a mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin. Ne ke zuen etew he zeisek dà is menge ulaula zin he mezaat he nepesaylu te Megbevayà, wazè din utew ǥehinawa te Megbevayà."
42007048	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is bahi te, "Bayi, nepesaylu en te Megbevayà is menge salè nu."
42007049	Ne is menge etew zutun he egkaan duma ki Jesus, neisip dan is, "Hentei heini etawa he minsan is menge salà, ne ebpeseyluwen din en?"
42007050	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus dutun te vahi, ke sikandin te, "Na, ulì ke en, Bayi, ne mebmelinawen en is kebpekesavuk nu. Nelibri ke en te silut tenged te midsarig ka te Megbevayà."
42008001	Nepipira pa zutun he andew ne mibeyaan ni Jesus is mezakel he menge inged, dekelà wey se zeisek, ne impesavut din te menge etew zutun is Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kedhedii te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Ne sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din, miduma zan daan kandin.
42008002	Ne zuen daan menge vahi zutun he eduzumazuma kandin. Ne heini he menge vahi, neulian din dengan te menge zaru wey is duma kandan ne mibpeǥuwaan din te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung kandan. Is sevaha zutun te menge vahi ne si Maria Megdelina, sikan is mibpeǥuwaan ni Jesus te pitu he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.
42008003	Ne elin daan dutun te menge vahi si Juana he esawa ni Kusa. Si Kusa, ne sineriǥan ni Hadì Hirudis. Ne zutun daan si Susana wey mezakel pa he menge zuma he vahi he nemenduma su midtevangan dan ensi Jesus pinaaǥi te menge ketiǥeyunan dan.
42008004	Ne zutun he timpu layun duen menge etew he egkengetiǥum diyà te ki Jesus he ebpemuun diyà te langun he menge inged. Ne hein nengetiǥum is utew mezakel he menge etew impezineg kandan ni Jesus is sempità, ke sikandin te,
42008005	"Duen etew he midhendiyà te pemuleey zin su ebpemula. Ne haazà is benì din, duen dutun nengeulug diyà te zalan ne nengeǥiekan te etew ne migkaan te menge tagbis.
42008006	Ne zuen daan benì din he nengeulug he nemekeuntud diyà te menipis he tana he nekeapid te vatu ne midtuvù haazà, iyan, petuluy zà neǥangu su nemezahan haazà is tanà.
42008007	Ne zuen daan dutun benì din he nengeulug diyà te tanà he menge zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun. Ne hein mibmelayat haazà is menge pinemula, mibmelayat daan haazà is menge sagbet ne mibpengulembezan dan haazà is pinemula.
42008008	Ne zuen daan benì din he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà ne midtuvù ne mibpemeǥas mebpurung te tignenggatus." Ne ke si Jesus te, "Sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw."
