42008009	Is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, in-insè dan ke hengkey is kehuluǥan dutun te sempità.
42008010	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Sikan is in-eles dengan mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà, ibpesavut ku en keniyu te menge sumusundan ku, iyan, is menge zuma he menge etew he kenè dan edsundan kedì, ibpenurù ku kandan pinaaǥi te menge sempità su wey minsan edtengteng dan, kenè dan ebpekeahà ne minsan ebpemineg dan ne kenè dan ebpekesavut."
42008011	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Ibpesavut ku keniyu is kehuluǥan kayi te sempità. Haazà is benì, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà.
42008012	Ne haazà is benì he ziyà mengeulug te zalan, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew ne zutun ebpekeuma si Setanas ne edhimuwen din he egkelipatan dan haazà is lalag he nezineg dan su wey kenè dan meketuu ne kenà melibri te silut.
42008013	Ne haazà is benì he ziyà mengeulug te menipis he tanà he zivavew te vatu, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he is nemekezineg duen, ne utew zan egkesuati te ebpemineg ne edtuuwan dan. Iyan, kenà egkeheǥet is kedtuu zan ne kenè en utew egkeuǥet dutun emun egezaman ni Setanas is kedtuu zan, ne edlikù dan diyà te zaan he ulaula zan.
42008014	Ne haazà is benì he ziyà mengeulug te tanà he zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew, iyan, tenged te menge seeng dan wey is suat dan te selapì, wey is menge kelipey he kayi te kelibutan, egkelipatan dan is nezineg dan ne kenà ebpulus diyà te kandan is Lalag te Megbevayà.
42008015	Ne haazà is benì he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà, ne iyan egkeǥiyen dutun is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew ne midawat dan, ne midtuman dan haazà, ne mibpeniguduwan dan te edtuman taman te mibpulus te zekelà is Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te kandan."
42008016	Ne zuen pa sempità he migkaǥi ni Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Is etew he edtemtem te sulù, ne kenà egkehimu he ebpelengkevan din te revan wey ke idsihung din be te vangkù he hizeǥaan su idsavuk din diyà te selevukà. Ne emun duen etew he edseled ne egketeyawan."
42008017	Ne ke si Jesus maan te, "Ne iring din ded daan is minsan hengkey he in-eles guntaan su ibpeǥawaǥawa zed keuzemà, ne is minsan hengkey he penurù ku he kenè niw egkesavut guntaan, ne egkesavut niw zed keuzemà.
42008018	Umba, purungi niw te ebpemineg is ibpenurù ku su is etew he edewaten din is ibpesavut kandin te Megbevayà, ed-umanan pa te Megbevayà is kedsavut din, iyan, is etew he kenè din edewaten is ibpesavut te Megbevayà, id-awà diyà te kandin haazà is kunaan din ke nesavut din en."
42008019	Is iney ni Jesus wey is menge hazi zin, ne edhendiyè dan te kandin, iyan, wazè dan meuvayi su nepurung en sikandin melingut te mezakel he etew.
42008020	Ne zuen etew zutun he midtazem ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Keniyà te ǥawas is iney nu wey is menge hazi nu ne ebpengahaan ke zan."
42008021	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge etew zutun te, "Duen ku pa iney wey menge hazi su is langun he ebpemineǥen dan is Lalag te Megbevayà ne ebpezumdumahan dan, iyan daan sikandan iney ku wey menge suled ku."
42008022	Sengeandew zutun ne mid-untud si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din te avang. Ne ke sikandin te, "Kuwa kew en su edlayun kiw ziyà layun." Ne zutun migenat dan is ed-aavang.
42008023	Ne zutun te ked-aavang dan ne nekelipezeng si Jesus. Ne nesuǥat haazà is ranew te mevendes he keramag ne egketeǥuan en te wahig haazà is avang dan ne amaama zan kenà melavu.
42008024	Ne mid-uvayan dan si Jesus ne mibpukew zan, ke sikandan te, "He Zatù, egkengeǥerè kiw en!" Ne nepukew zutun si Jesus ne mid-enew ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is keramag wey haazà is menge zekelà he vaǥel he mebpeeneng-eneng dan, ne zutun ne mibmelinew utew haazà is ranew.
42008025	Ne migkaǥi dutun si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Maan is wazè niw kedsarig kediey?" Ne utew zan nengeinuinu wey nengehandek. Ne zutun neked-iinseey sikandan te, "Hentei heini vuwa he etew? Maan is minsan keramag wey vaǥel ne ebpemineg te lalag din?"
42008026	Ne zutun midlaus dan is ed-aavang taman te nekezunggù dan diyà te tanà he iyan ed-ubpaan te menge etew he Geresinen he ziyà te zehipag te prubinsya he Geliliya.
42008027	Ne zutun te kegaun ni Jesus neuma zin is etew he zaan he meǥinged dutun te inged te menge Geresinen. Ne midsuukan sikandin te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne haazà is etew, neuǥet en utew he wazè din seseberen. Kenà ed-ubpà diyà te valey, kekenà, diyà ed-ubpà te penlevengà he menge surung. Kenà kepipira zà uwita haazà is maama zutun te ebpemekaid kandin. Ne minsan pa te layun sikandin edhiketan ne ibpenagkes te kedina ne ebentayan pa te menge etew, iyan, melemu zin dà he ebpemidtawen is kedina ne ed-uwiten sikandin dutun te mezaat he mulin-ulin pehendiyà te tanà he wazà ubpai te menge etew. Ne hein neehè din si Jesus, mid-erang ne midlangkeb diyà te etuvangan din is egkaǥi he utew mezaǥing te, "Sikew, Jesus he Anak te utew lavew he Megbevayà, ebmenuwen a kenikew? Ebpengemuyù a kenikew he kenè e pa kenikew siluti!" Nekaǥi zin heini su migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin he ibpaawà diyà te kandin.
42008030	Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus haazà is etew te, "Hentei is ngazan nu?" Ne midtavak te, "Iyan ngazan ku si Liblibuwen." Umba nekaǥi zin heini su utew zan mezakel is mezaat he mulin-ulin he nemen-ulin dutun te etew.
42008031	Ne haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, midhangyù dan ki Jesus he kenè din pa sikandan iagbur ziyà te vitu he wazà pidtemanan te kezalem din.
42008032	Ne zutun te kenà utew meziyù, duen layud he menge vavuy he ebpemenuwal ziyà te kelendiǥan. Ne midhangyù ki Jesus haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he zutun dan ipehalin te menge vavuy. Ne midtuǥutan sikandan ni Jesus.
42008033	Ne iyan dà haazà, ne mid-awè dan dutun te maama ne midhalin dan dutun te menge vavuy. Ne haazè dà ne nemelelaǥuy haazà is menge vavuy petupang dutun te utew mesilid he kelendiǥan ne mid-agbur zan diyà te ranew ne naamin dan mengelened.
42008034	Ne zuen menge maama he ebpemen-elima zutun te menge vavuy; ne hein neehè dan is nehitavù, ne henduen dan te midhiyup he vulvul is nemelaǥuy ne mibpenudtul zan diyà te inged wey ziyà te menge unayan is neulaula.
42008035	Ne is menge etew he nekezineg dutun te tudtul, ne nemenhendutun dan te ki Jesus su ed-ahaan dan. Ne neehè dan dutun kes neulian he ziyà mebpinuu te etuvangan ni Jesus he midsun-ud en te ugelingen, ne hustu en is ked-isip-isip din. Ne tenged dutun utew zan en nengeinuinu.
42008036	Ne sikan is menge etew he nekeahà ki Jesus te kebewii zin dutun te etew, ne mibpenudtulan dan is menge etew he sikan pa mekeuma ke nemenumenu is kegkeulii zutun te etew he midlalung te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.
42008037	Ne zutun, haazà is langun he menge etew he meǥinged dutun te tanà te menge Geresinen, ne midhangyù dan ki Jesus he med-awà sikandin dutun te kandan su utew zan ingkehandek sikandin. Ne iyan dà haazà, ne mid-untud ensi Jesus te avang su egenat dan.
42008038	Ne zutun, haazà is etew he veǥu he neulian, midhangyù sikandin ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Egkesuat a he eduma kenikew." Iyan, wazà ipezuma ni Jesus, kekenà, impeulì din. Ke si Jesus te,
42008039	"Ulì ke en ne tudtula nu ke hengkey is utew meupiya he midhimu te Megbevayà kenikew." Ne zutun, mid-ulì haazà is maama ne mibpenudtul zin duen te langun he menge meǥinged dutun ke hengkey is midhimu ni Jesus diyà te kandin.
42008040	Ne hein nekezunggù ensi Jesus dutun te ebpuunan dan ne utew nengeǥalew is utew mezakel he menge etew he nengetiǥum dutun su edtaǥad dan kandin.
42008041	Ne zutun duen maama he egngezanan ki Hayru he pengulu te sevaha he simbahan te menge Hudiyu. Ne mid-uvey heini ziyà te ki Jesus ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan din is edhangyù kandin he zumahi zin sikandin diyà te valey zin.
42008042	Su zuen budtung he anak din he raǥaraǥa he menge sepulù pa wey zezuwa is penuiǥen din, ne egkezeruwan ne edluwàluwè en te ǥehinawa. Ne miduma kandin si Jesus. Ne zutun te kedhipanew zan ebpenelektelek dan dà su egkengelipitlipit dan te utew mezakel he menge etew zutun.
42008043	Ne zuen dutun bahi he utew en nerasey su midsepulù en wey zezuwa he tuig is kedlengesahi kandin ne kenà ed-engked. Ne wazà minsan hentei he nekeulì kandin.
42008044	Ne mibpenlietliet medhendiyà te egkeiniyuǥan ni Jesus ne midsengkawad din kevita is sidsid te kumbalà ni Jesus. Ne zutundutun ne mid-engked is kegkevusbusi kandin.
42008045	Ne redsà dutun ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Hentei is migawed kedì?" Ne is menge etew zutun, pudu mibarew he wazè dan mekeǥawed. Ne migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Datù, maan is ebpenginginsè ke pa te iring keniyan, te hanu man mezakel utew he menge etew is edlilipitlipit diyan te kenikew."
42008046	Iyan, migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Duen iyan migawed kedì su neǥezam ku he zuen etew he neulian te zaru pinaaǥi te ǥehem ku."
42008047	Ne hein nesavut dutun te vahi he netuenan ni Jesus haazà is mid-ulaula zin, mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus is egkerkeren su utew nahandek. Midluhud sikandin diyà te ki Jesus, dutun te etuvangan te langun he menge etew. Ne midtudtul zin ke hengkey is ketezengan ke maan is migawed sikandin te kumbalà ni Jesus ne midtudtul zin daan he segugunà dutun neulii is daru zin.
42008048	Ne migkaǥi kandin si Jesus te, "Bayi, umba neulian ka te zaru nu su midsarig ka kedì. Ulì ke en ne mebmelinawen is kebpekesavuk nu."
42008049	Ne te kemulu pa si Jesus egkaǥi zutun ne zuen nekeuma he ebpuun diyà te valey ni Hayru. Ne migkaǥi diyà te ki Hayru te, "Kenè nu en bigbigata te eduma pa maan si Jesus su kenè niw en egkesepenan is gehinawa zuen te anak nu."
42008050	Ne hein nezineg ni Jesus haazà ne migkaǥi sikandin te, "Kenè ka meseeng, kekenà, sarig ke zà kedì, ne egkeuyag is anak nu."
42008051	Ne hein nekeuma zan diyà te valey ni Hayru, ne wazà ipemeseled ni Jesus is menge etew. Iyan din dà dutun impeseled ensi Pedro, si Juan, si Santiago, wey is menge ǥinikanan dutun te vatà.
42008052	Ne zutun, is langun he menge etew he nerivurun dutun, egkengeǥisaweg sikandan ne ebpemenineǥew su nengeseeng. Ne migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus te, "Kenè niw sineǥawi su wazà mebpatey heeyan is batà, kekenà, midlipezeng dà!"
42008053	Ne te kegkezineǥa zan dutun te migkaǥi ni Jesus, ne và dan dà mid-engiti su netuenan dan he minatey en iyan haazà is batà.
42008054	Ne mid-uvayan ni Jesus haazà is batà ne migewezan din diyà te velad ne mid-umew zin he ke sikandin te, "Bayi, enew kad."
42008055	Ne zutundutun nekesunggud is gehinawa zutun te vatà ne mid-enew. Ne migkaǥi si Jesus dutun te ǥinikanan te vatà he ipekaan dan haazà is anak dan.
42008056	Ne utew ingkeinuinu te ǥinikanan dutun te vatà haazà is midhimu ni Jesus. Ne migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan tudtula haazà ziyà te minsan hentei.
42009001	Ne midtiǥum ni Jesus sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din. Ne kada sevaha kandan, mibeǥayan din te ǥehem su wey zan mevewii is egkengezeruwan wey ikepemeǥuwè is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.
42009002	Ne zutun ne impehipanew zin sikandan su wey zan ikepesavut is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te kedhadì te Megbevayà ne wey zan daan mekepemawì te minsan hengkey he egezamen te etew.
42009003	Ne midteleenan din sikandan he ke sikandin te, "Kenè kew uwit te menge azen niw te kedhipanew niw; minsan tuked, ne kenè niw uwita; kenè kew kekempilù, kenè kew lulutù, kenè kew uwit te selapì, ne minsan is ed-ilisan, ne kenè niw zaan uwita.
42009004	Ke hendei is baley he zuen egalewǥalew keniyu ne zutun kew zà uliulì taman te kegenat niw.
42009005	Ne emun duen inged he wazà dutun etew he egalewǥalew keniyu, ne ewai niw ne penektaka niw is menge eliyavuk diyà te menge paa niw he iyan laǥuy he edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà."
42009006	Ne zutun migenat haazà is menge sumusundan ne mibpesusuwayè dan ne midtukid dan is menge inged te ebayà te ebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen ne mibpemewian dan daan is egkengezeruwan diyà te kada inged.
42009007	Ne heini is nengeulaula eni Jesus, nezineg ni Gubirnedur Hirudis diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne ingkesamuk te ǥehinawa zin su zuen egkaǥi he iyan si Jesus si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew.
42009008	Ne zuen daan egkaǥi he mibpeetew mebpeuman si Elias, kes ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, ne iyan en si Jesus. Ne zuen daan egkaǥi he nevanhew is sevaha zuen te menge ebpeneuven dengan ne iyan si Jesus.
42009009	Neisip ni Hirudis is: "Si Juan, ne mibpepungelan ku en te ulu, iyan, hentei etawa heini is egkeǥiyen dan?" Ne mibpen-ahà sikandin te paaǥi wey zin maahà si Jesus.
42009010	Ne mid-ulì sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he epustul ni Jesus ne midtudtul zan kandin is langun he mid-ulaula zan. Ne zutun miduma zin sikandan he iyan dan dà pehendiyà te inged he Bitsayda.
42009011	Ne netuenan te nerivurun he mezakel he menge etew he midhipanew ensi Jesus ne nemenelukun dan. Ne migalewǥalew sikandan ni Jesus ne impesavut din kandan is mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà ne mibpemewian din daan is menge etew zutun te minsan hengkey he ebpenggezamen dan.
42009012	Ne hein mahapun en mid-uvayan si Jesus te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din. Ke sikandan te, "Ipeǥenat nu en is menge etew wey zan mekehendiyà te menge unayan wey menge inged su wey zan mekepen-ahà te egkekaan dan wey egkehizeǥaan dan su wazà egkekuwa zan dini te wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew."
42009013	Iyan, midtavak si Jesus te, "Iyan kew mebeǥey te egkekaan dan." Ne midtavak haazà is menge sumusundan din te, "Lelelima zà he vuuk he supas wey zezuwa he zezeisek he pait is naazen tew he egkeenen. Kela ke egkesuatan nu he edhipanew key te kebpemasa te ibpekaan tew kayi te utew mezakel he menge etew," egkaǥi zan.
42009014	Menge lelima he libu he menge maama is nengetiǥum dutun ne zuen daan menge vahi wey vatà . Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Ipemepinuu niw sikandan he mebpundukpunduk he tigkelimahan is sengepunduk."
42009015	Ne zutun impemepinuu zan haazà is langun he menge etew.
42009016	Ne migkuwa zutun ni Jesus haazà is lelima he supas wey haazà is dezuwa he pait ne midlingahà diyà te langit ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà. Ne mibpenevìtevì din. Ne minsan pa zutun kenà egkeamin haazà is edtevien din . Ne imbeǥey zin diyà te menge sumusundan din haazà is nengetevì wey zan ikepemeǥey zutun te menge etew.
42009017	Ne is kada sevaha zutun te menge etew, nekekaan ne nahantey. Ne haazà is egkeenen, ne nesemaan pa te sepulù wey zezuwa he vinevey is nehimes he menge tevì te supas te menge sumusundan din.
42009018	Sengeandew zutun ne ed-ampù si Jesus he sebsevaha zin diyà te Megbevayà ne is menge sumusundan din, diyè dan te uvey zin. Ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Hentei e kun sumalà te ked-isipa kediey te menge etew?"
42009019	Ne midtavak dan te, "Iyan ke kun si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew, ne zuen daan egkaǥi te iyan ka si Elias, ne zuen pa egkaǥi te sevaha ka zuen te menge tipehuna he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà."
42009020	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Ne sikiyu zaan, hentei e man sumalà is ked-isipa niw kediey?" Ne midtavak si Pedro te, "Iyan ka sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì din te menusiyà."
42009021	Ne zutun mibpeketelteleenan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan tudtula haazà diyà te minsan hentei.
42009022	Ne ke sikandin daan te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, kinahanglan he mezakel is menge kemeresayan he ibpaantus kediey. Edsumpeliten a te menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu wey te menge punuan he memumuhat wey te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Edhimetayan e zan ne seled te tetelu he andew zutun egkevanhew a."
42009023	Ne mid-uman si Jesus megkaǥi diyà te kandan te langun, ke sikandin te, "Ke zuen egkesuat he edsundan kedì ne kinahanglan he iawè din diyà te isip din is kandin he paaǥi ne tianga zin te kada andew is krus din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kinahanglan he edtumanen din is menge suǥù ku minsan pa ke iyan ibpatey zin. Ne human ebpekesunud kedì.
42009024	Su ke zuen etew he egkenuǥunan din is untung din, ebpatey ǥihapun. Iyan, ke zuen etew he minsan ibpatey zin pa is kedsunud din kedì, id-ulì te Megbevayà diyà te kandin is untung din ne kenè en sikandin ebpatey te wazà pidtemanan.
42009025	Minsan ke maangken pa te etew heini is tivuuk he kelibutan, wazà pulus diyà te kandin ke kenà sikandin egkeveǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan ne edsilutan pa sikandin.
42009026	Is minsan hentei he igkeeled e zin wey igkeeled din is ibpenurù ku, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, igkeeled ku zaan sikandin keuzemà ke edlikù a he zekelà is gehem te ked-anlag ku wey edsun-uzan ad te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Amey ku he Megbevayà wey te anlag te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.
42009027	Tentenuzi niw heini," ke si Jesus, "duen menge zuma tew kayi he kenà ebpatey taman te timpu he ibpaahà kandan te Megbevayà is keǥehem din te kedhadì."
42009028	Ne menge sengesimana puun dutun te kegkaǥi kayi ni Jesus, miduma zin ensi Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan ne midtekezeg dan te vuvungan su wey mekeampù diyà te Megbevayà.
42009029	Ne zutun te ked-ampù ni Jesus, netik-ew mahalin is dagwey zin ne mibpengenamag te keputì is ugelingen din ne ebpekesirang te mata.
42009030	Ne netekewtekew mekepeǥawaǥawa is dezuwa he maama he ebpekidlalag kandin he iyan si Moises wey si Elias, kes menge tipehuna he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà.
42009031	Midsun-uzan daan sikandan te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag, ne iyan imbitiyara zan ki Jesus is mehitenged te meǥaan din en kedhimuwa te suǥù te Megbevayà su edhimetayan sikandin diyà te Hiruselim.
42009032	Ne si Pedro wey is menge zuma zin, ne nemekelipezeng dan ne hein nepukew zan neehè dan is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag ni Jesus wey haazà is dezuwa he maama he zuma ni Jesus.
42009033	Ne hein ed-awè en diyà te kandin haazà is dezuwa, migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Nengazen, utew meupiya te zini key. Ebeelan dey is tetelu he lawig; sevaha is kenikew, sevaha zaan is ki Moises, ne sevaha is ki Elias." Wazà metentenuzi ni Pedro he nengekaǥi zin heini is lalag.
42009034	Ne zutun te kemulu pa egkaǥi si Pedro, neselikuvungan sikandan te ǥapun ne utew zan nengehandek is tetelu he sumusundan dutun te kegkeselikuvungi kandan te ǥapun.
42009035	Ne nezineg dan is midtik-ew megkaǥi he ebpuun dutun te ǥapun te, "Iyan heini Anak ku he mibpilì ku he ibpahadì. Pemineǥa niw is menge lalag din."
42009036	Ne hein mid-engked haazà is egkaǥi ne iyan dà maan dutun si Jesus neehè dan. Ne puun dutun he timpu wazè pa minsan sevaha he etew he midtudtulan dan te neehè dan.
42009037	Ne hein mid-ilis he andew, midtupang dan dutun te vuvungan ne utew mezakel he menge etew is nemenelavuk ki Jesus.
42009038	Ne zuen maama zutun he nengumew ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, "He Zatù, ahaa nu pa kedì heini is anak ku he maama. Sebsevaha heini he anak ku!
42009039	Ahaa nu su edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin ne emun ebpekeume en is edlalung kandin ne ebpeketik-ew ebpekeerang ne egkerkeren ne eburvuraan is bèbè din ne edsiguduwan sikandin ed-eyuwa te edlalung kandin taman te egkevuǥel is lawa zin ne egkeuǥet sikandin ed-engkezi te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
42009040	Midhangyù a ziyà te menge sumusundan nu he vewii zan, iyan, wazè dan meulii."
42009041	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, utew zekelà is menge sayep niw; wazè niw iyan kedtuu te Megbevayà. Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekiduma ku keniyu! Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekeantus ku keniyu ne human kew edtuu. Ihengkayi nu heeyan is anak nu."
42009042	Ne hein uvey en haazà is batà diyà te ki Jesus, ne neumahan en maan dutun te edlalung kandin ne nepiley sikandin ne migkerker te utew mezesen. Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin he ewai zin haazà is edlelungen din. Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is batà. Ne migkaǥi si Jesus dutun te amey te vatà te, "Kuwaa nu en heini is anak nu."
42009043	Ne langun he menge etew zutun, ne utew nengeinuinu tenged dutun te nehimu ni Jesus pinaaǥi te zekelà he ǥehem te Megbevayà. Ne zutun te kemulu pa egkeinuinu is menge etew zutun te langun he ed-ul-ulahan ni Jesus, ne migkaǥi sikandin diyà te menge sumusundan din te,
42009044	"Kenè niw lipati heini is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, duen timpu keuzemà he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge kuntada ku," ke sikandin.
42009045	Ne is menge sumusundan din, wazè dan dutun mesavut is ibpesavut ni Jesus. Wazà ipesavut te Megbevayà kandan su wey kenè dan metueni. Ne wazè dan mekeaku he ed-insà kandin ke hengkey is kehuluǥan dutun.
42009046	Sevaha he andew zutun ebpelewlewanà is menge sumusundan ke hentei is lavew kandan.
42009047	Ne netuenan ni Jesus ke hengkey is diyà te isip dan, ne tenged dutun, migkuwa zin is batà ne impehitindeg din diyà te uvey zin
42009048	ne ke sikandin te, "Is etew he tenged te kedtuu zin kedì, edewaten din ne ebpurungan din heini is deisek he vatà, ne nezawat e zin en daan. Ne is minsan hentei he edawat kediey, nezawat din en daan is Amey ku he Megbevayà he midsuǥù kedì. Su is minsan hentei keniyu he ebpevayàbayà te menge zuma zin, iyan sikandin tutuu he lavew keniyu."
42009049	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Juan te, "Duen etew he neuma zey he ebewian din is menge etew he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin ne egemiten din is gehem te ngazan nu te kebpemawì. Ne midawey zey su kenà ebpekiduma kenitew."
42009050	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Kenè niw zewaya is ed-ulaula te iring dutun su is etew he kenè tew kuntada, ne edtavang kenitew."
42009051	Ne hein egkeuvayan en is andew te kebpeewaa ki Jesus dini te kelibutan su ed-ulì en diyà te langit ne netivuuk is gehinawa zin te kedhendiyà te Hiruselim ne zutun migenat dan.
42009052	Duen menge etew he impehuna ni Jesus ne migenat dan ne midhendiyè dan te inged diyà te prubinsya he Semarya su edteǥenahan dan is egkinehenglanen eni Jesus.
42009053	Iyan, is menge meǥinged dutun, wazè dan ikesuat he edtuluy si Jesus su netuenan dan he Hudiyu sikandin he ziyà ebpetandang te inged he Hiruselim.
42009054	Ne hein netuenan ni Santiago wey ni Juan he wazà edawat kandan dutun te inged, migkeǥiyan dan si Jesus te, "Egkesuatan nu ve he ebuyù key te hapuy he ebpuun te langit he ibpetanà dini su wey meǥerà heini he menge etew?"
42009055	Iyan, si Jesus, midsinaru ziyà te kandan ne midawey zin sikandan.
42009056	Ne midlaus dan diyà te zuma he inged.
42009057	Ne zutun te kedhipanew zan, duen etew he migkaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Eduma a kenikew minsan hendei ka ebpevayà."
42009058	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Is laku, ne zuen surung he egkeubpaan din, ne is menge tagbis, ne zuen kandan he salag, iyan, siak, is migeraran te Kakey te Menusiyà, ne wazà hustu he egkehimelayan ku."
42009059	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te sevaha he etew, ke sikandin te, "Sundan ka kedì." Iyan, migkaǥi haazà is migkeǥiyan din te, "Datù, ed-ulì e zè pa su kenè e pa ebpekezuma kenikew taman te kenè pa egketapus is umur te amey ku. Ne emun igkeleveng ku en ne human a eduma kenikew."
42009060	Ne midtavak si Jesus dutun te etew te, "Iyan nu ipeleveng te menge minatey sikan is wazà mekezawat te untung he wazà pidtemanan su iyan ku ibpeveelan kenikew is kebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen te kedhedii te Megbevayà te menge etew."
42009061	Ne zuen pa zutun sevaha he etew he egkaǥi zaan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Datù, edsundan a kenikew, iyan, ed-ulì e pa su ibpesayud ku is bevelayan ku."
42009062	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Emun ed-eradu ka he layun ka edlilingey ne kenà heeyan meupiya. Iring din ded daan is etew he edsundan kedì wey zuen din igkelilingey ne kenà sikandin dait he edhedian te Megbevayà."
42010001	Ne hein neipus heini, duen daan kepituwan wey zewuwa he menge maama he nepilì te Nengazen he si Jesus su ibpehuna zin ibpehipanew te tigduwazuwa ziyà te langun he menge inged he ebpemeyaan din daan.
42010002	Ne migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Mezakel pezem is edawat te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Iring sikandan te kamet he nelutuan en. Utew meluag is kamet, iyan, deisey kiw zà is ebpemenlegtey. Iampù niw ziyà te Nengazen he suǥua zin pa ziyà te kamet din is duma pa he ebpekelegtey.
42010003	Genat kew en, iyan, andam kew su edsuǥuen ku sikiyu ziyà te menge etew he kumekaid. Iring kew te menge nati he kerehidu ne sikandan ne iring te menge erimaung.
42010004	Kenè kew med-uwit te selapì, wey kempilù, wey sepatus he ed-ilisan niw. Ne kenà utew meluǥayad is kedlelaǥi niw te etew he egkeuma niw ziyà te zalan.
42010005	Ne ke hendei is baley he ebpemenehikan niw ne penelehuzan kew. Kaǥi kew te, 'Sikiyu is meǥinged kayi, tuvazi kew te Megbevayà.'
42010006	Ne emun dait he edtuvazan is etew zutun dekelà is tuvad te Megbevayà kandan. Ne emun kenà, ne kenà sikandan edleusan edtuvazi te Megbevayà.
42010007	Ne haazà is baley he zuen etew he egalewǥalew keniyu, ne zutun kew pundu taman te kegenat niw. Ne zewata niw is minsan hengkey he ibpekaan dan wey ibpeinum dan keniyu su iring te suhul zan keniyu. Dait is edterebahu he edsuhulan. Kenè kew en penhalinhalin pa maan diyà te zuma pa he menge valey.
42010008	Ne emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te inged ne zuen egalewǥalew keniyu, minsan hengkey is keenen dan he ibpekaan dan keniyu, ne keena niw.
42010009	Pemewii niw is egkengezeruwan dutun te inged. Ne keǥiyi niw is menge etew zutun he meǥaan en is timpu te kedhedii kandan te Megbevayà.
42010010	Iyan, emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te inged ne wazà egalewǥalew keniyu zutun, ne peehè kew te menge etew zutun, ne ke sikiyu te,
42010011	'Minsan is menge eliyavuk kayi te inged niw he nemendeket te menge paa zey, edtektaken dey en wey niw metueni he edsilutan kew te Megbevayà .' Ne ke sikiyu zaan te, 'Kinahanglan he metueni niw he meǥaan en is timpu te kedhadì te Megbevayà.'
42010012	Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu," ke si Jesus, "he lavew pa is idsilut te Megbevayà dutun te inged emun egkeuma keuzemà is andew te kedsilut, kenà te silut din dengan diyà te menge lalung he etew he meǥinged diyà te inged he Suduma."
42010013	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Mekehizuhizu kew keuzemà is menge tigKurasin! Mekehizuhizu kew zaan keuzemà is menge tigBitsayda. Su is menge egkein-inuwan he impeehè ku ziyan te inged niw te menge Hudiyu, angin ke midhimu ku haazà diyà te menge inged he Tiru wey Sidun he kenà menge Hudiyu is meǥinged dutun, su nekekukumbalè dan en pezem te saku ne nepen-evuwan dan en is ulu zan he tuus te ed-iniyuǥan dan is memezaat he ulaula .
42010014	Kenè niw lipati he zutun keuzemà te andew te kedsusi te Megbevayà te menusiyà, lavew is silut din keniyu kenà te menge etew ziyà te Tiru wey Sidun.
42010015	Ne sikiyu zaan," ke si Jesus, "is menge tigKepirnaum, iyan egkesuatan niw pezem is deliǥa kew te minsan hentei, iyan, igketimbag kew ziyà te Impirnu."
42010016	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din haazà is menge sumusundan din te, "Is minsan hentei he etew he ebpemineg te ibpenurù niw, ne iring te iyan e zin nepemineg. Ne sikan is etew he kenè kew zin edseǥipaan, ne iring te iyan a wazè din seǥipaa. Ne sikan is etew he kenà edseǥipà kedì, ne iyan wazè din seǥipaa is Megbevayà he midsuǥù kedì."
42010017	Ne nepipira pa he andew zutun hein nemekeulì sikan is kepituwan he midsuǥù, utew zan nengelipey su ke sikandan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Minsan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin ne ebpemineǥen key zan ke ibpaawè dey sikandan pinaaǥi te ǥehem te ngazan nu!"
42010018	Ne zutun migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus te, "Si Setanas, is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, neehè ku is kegkezaaǥa niw kandin ne utew meǥaan su iring te kilat he ebpuun te langit.
42010019	Tentenuzi niw heini he mibeǥayan ku sikiyu te ǥehem he minsan ke ebpekeǥiek kew te uled wey venayew ne kenè kew edhereǥen. Ne kenè kew zaan egkezaag te ǥehem te ukag tew he si Setanas ne wazà minsan hengkey he ebpekekaid keniyu.
42010020	Iyan, kenè niw iyan ikelipey is kebpemineǥa keniyu te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, kekenà, ikelipey niw is menge ngazan niw he impelista te Megbevayà diyà te langit."
42010021	Ne zutun midlipey si Jesus te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne mid-ampù diyà te Megbevayà, ke sikandin te, "Amey ku he Nengazen te langit wey tanà, dekelà is kebpeselemati ku kenikew su is in-eles nu su wey kenà mesavut te menge uluwanen wey uvag en memetau ne impesavut nu en diyà te menge etew he wazè dan menge hanew. Amey ku, umba ebpeselematan ku su midhimu nu heini te iring kayi su iyan egkesuatan nu tenged te ǥaǥew nu."
42010022	Ne zutun mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, "Is minsan hengkey, insarig kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Wazà nesayud kedì te Anak te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan dà is Amey ku he Megbevayà. Ne wazà daan nesayud te Amey ku he Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan e zà is Anak din wey sikan is menge etew he mibpengelinteuwan ku he mesayud dan kandin."
42010023	Ne midsineruwan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din hein iyan dan dà, ne ke sikandin te, "Deyzey kew he menge etew su nemetmetahan niw en heini is langun he edhimuwen ku.
42010024	Su tutuu is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kenà pira zà is menge ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà dengan wey menge hadì dengan he egkesuat pezem he mekeahà kayi te nengeehè niw ǥuntaan, iyan, wazà ipaahà kandan. Ne egkesuatan dan daan he ebpemineǥen heini is nengezineg niw ǥuntaan, iyan, wazà ipepemineg kandan."
42010025	Ne zutun duen sevaha he etew he menunudlù te menge kesuǥuan te menge Hudiyu he midhitindeg su egezaman din edekepa is ketezengan ni Jesus pinaaǥi te menge insà, ne ke sikandin te, "He Zatù, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku wey a meveǥayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan?"
42010026	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Hengkey is nekaǥi te kesuǥuan te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin ni Moises? Hengkey is kedsevuta nu te nengevasa nu?"
42010027	Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, "Is Megbevayà he Nengazen tew, kinahanglan he iyan tew sikandin ebmahalen dini te ǥehinawa tew. Iyan sikandin mahal zini te ǥehinawa tew, isip tew, kedsavut tew, wey tivuuk he ulaula tew. Ne kinahanglan daan he ebpurungan tew is duma tew; ed-isipen tew sikandin he iring en te kenitew he ǥehinawa."
42010028	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Benar is nekaǥi nu. Ne iyan ul-ulaha nu ne ebeǥayan ka te untung he wazà pidtemanan."
42010029	Iyan, haazà is menunudlù te kesuǥuan, egkesuatan din pezem he meisip ni Jesus he hustu is menge ulaula zin, umba migkaǥi sikandin te, "Hentei is nekaǥi he zuma ku?"
42010030	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Duen sevaha he etew he Hudiyu he midhipanew ebpuun diyà te inged he Hiruselim he sebsevaha zin su edtupang pehendiyà te inged he Hiriku. Ne ziyà te zalan neuma sikandin te menge tulisan ne mibuǥel zan sikandin ne midlevasan dan, ne wey zan ewai hein deisek dà is gehinawa zin.
42010031	Ne te kegkeipus dutun te menge tulisan, nekeuma zutun is Hudiyu he memumuhat te Megbevayà, iyan, hein neehè din haazà is midruug he nekehidhizeǥà, mid-eliǥu zin ne midlaus te hipanew zin.
42010032	Ne iring din ded daan is nekesunud he nekeuma zutun. Hudiyu zed daan he kevuwazan ni Levi he edtavangtavang te menge memumuhat diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, iyan, hein neehè din haazà is nekehidhizeǥà ne mid-eliǥu zin daan ne midlaus te hipanew zin.
42010033	Ne wazà utew meuǥet ne nekeuma zutun daan is sevaha he kenà Hudiyu su tigSemarya. Ne hein neehè din haazà is nekehidhizeǥà he midruug ne utew sikandin nehizu.
42010034	Ne mid-uvayan din ne mibewian din te lana wey vinu is menge palì dutun ne mibukusan din te manggad. Ne zutun mibitbit din ne in-untud din te kudè din ne mid-uwit din diyà te valey he hulevungà te menge etew ne zutun mibpurungan din elimahi.
42010035	Ne te nepawà dutun ne mibeǥey te selapì dutun te teǥiǥaked te valey ne migkaǥi te, 'Elimahi nu kedì heini is midruug te tulisan ne emun duen selapì nu pa he egkeǥastu nu kandin he liyu kayi te ibeǥey ku, ne zutun te kedlikù ku ne ed-ilisan ku ziyan te kenikew.'"
42010036	Ne ke si Jesus diyà te menunudlù te, "Hentei zutun te tetelu he etew is nehimu he hustu he zuma zutun te midruug te menge tulisan?"
42010037	Ne midtavak haazà is menunudlù te, "Iyan nehimu he hustu he zuma zutun te midruug te menge tulisan haazà is nehizu kandin he etew ne midtavang kandin." Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iyan haazà ul-ulaha nu is iring dutun."
42010038	Ne hein midlaus ensi Jesus, ne nekeuma zan diyà te sevaha he inged he zuen dutun bahi he egngezanan ki Marta. Impepemenahik ni Marta si Jesus dutun te valey zin.
42010039	Ne zuen dutun hazi ni Marta he egngezanan ki Maria. Ne mibpinuu si Maria ziyà te uvey ni Jesus su ebpurung ebpemineg te menge penurù ni Jesus.
42010040	Ne si Marta, ne iyan dà sikandin diyà te avu su ebaal te egkekaan dan ne mezakel is igkesamuk din he ebeelan din. Ne zutun mid-uvey sikandin diyà te ki Jesus he ke sikandin te, "Meupiya ve te ǥehinawa nu he iyan e zà egkeviyuviyu he ebaal te egkekaan tew? Suǥua nu si Maria he uǥupi e zin."
42010041	Iyan, migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Marta, utew mezakel is igkesemuki nu he kenà utew ebpulus.
42010042	Sevaha zà is dekelà is pulus din he iyan mibpilì ni Maria ne kenà heini igkeawà diyà te kandin."
42011001	Sengeandew, ne ed-ampù si Jesus diyà te Megbevayà. Ne te nekeipus sikandin te ed-ampù migkaǥi is sevaha zuen te menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, "Datù, penurua key te ked-ampù su si Juan Megbebewtismu, mibpenurù din is menge sumusundan din te ked-ampù."
42011002	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Iyan heini iringi niw ke ed-ampù kew; ke sikiyu te, 'Amey zey ziyà te langit, berakat he tehuza te menusiyà is ngazan nu. Berakat he medhadì ka te menusiyà.
42011003	Beǥayi key te egkeenen he egkinehenglanen dey te kada andew.
42011004	Peseyluwa key te menge salè dey su sikami, ebpeseyluwen dey is langun he nekesalà diyà te kenami. Ne ipekeziyù key kenikew te mezesen he penuley.'"
42011005	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Penenglitan is sevaha keniyu, duen emiǥu zin he edhendutun te kandin te metaneb en is kezukileman ne ke sikandin te, 'He Geli, ipesambey e pa kenikew te egkekaan.
42011006	Su zuen meǥeliyug ku he ziyà ebpuun te meziyù ne wazè ku igkepeǥana kandin.'
42011007	Ne zutun, edtavak sikandin dutun te valey zin te, 'Es! egkepeǥulan ad he ed-enew su midlekevan ku en heeyan is gemawan ne nemekelipezeng en heini is menge anak ku kayi te hulid ku. Ne kenè e en ebpekeenew he ebeǥey ziyan te kenikew te egkekaan.'
42011008	Ne haazà," ke si Jesus, "minsan ke kenà sikandin egkesuat he ed-enew he edtavang te emiǥu zin, iyan, ke kenà ed-engked haazà is edhangyù, ebpeketeǥel sikandin ebpekeenew ne ibeǥey zin kandin is langun he kinahanglan din.
42011009	Ne venar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he penigudu kew vuyù diyà te Megbevayà ne ebeǥayan kew zin; penigudu kew pen-ahà ne ibpeturedu zin keniyu is ebpen-ahaan niw; penigudu kew penelehuzan ne ebpuwasan kew zin.
42011010	Su is langun he ebuyù diyà te Megbevayà, ebpekezawat; ne sikan is ebpen-ahà, ebpeketuredu; ne sikan is ebpenelehuzan, ebpuwasan daan te Megbevayà.
42011011	Sikiyu is menge ǥinikanan, ke zuen ebuyuen te anak niw he pait, ne kenà egkehimu he uled is ibeǥey niw.
42011012	Ne emun impis is ebuyuen din, kenà daan egkehimu he venayew is ibeǥey niw.
42011013	Ne sikiyu is menusiyà he kenà memetazeng, emun meupiya is ibeǥey niw ziyà te menge anak niw, iyan pe be is Amey tew he Megbevayà diyà te langit kenà mebeǥey keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ke ebuyuen niw."
42011014	Ne zuen timpu he mibewian ni Jesus is maama he midhimu he emew te mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung kandin. Ne hein impaawà ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin ne segugunà nekekaǥi haazà is maama. Ne utew nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew he nengetiǥum dutun.
42011015	Iyan, duen dutun migkaǥi te, "Iyan mibeǥey kandin te ǥehem te kebpenegseg te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin si Endedaman, sikan is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin."
42011016	Ne zuen pa zutun menge etew he egezaman dan si Jesus. Midhangyù dan he ibpeehè din is egkein-inuwan su ed-ahaan dan ke tutuu ve he midsuǥù sikandin te Megbevayà.
42011017	Iyan, netuenan ni Jesus ke hengkey is seled te ǥehinawa zan ne migkaǥi sikandin te, "Penenglitan ke zuen hadì ne ebpetebtebekà is menge sakup din ne meǥaan egkeawà is gehem din te kedhadì. Ne ke zuen edlingahaan te sengepemilya ne ebpekungkuntedahà is menge sakup din, ne egkevengkag haazà is pemilya.
42011018	Ne emun egketebek ni Setanas is menge sakup din egkezeetan is gehem din. Kenà egkehimu is migkaǥi niw he pinaaǥi te ǥehem ni Endedaman egkezaag ku is menge sakup din.
42011019	Emun iyan igkesegseǥa ku te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin is gehem he ebpuun diyà te ki Setanas ne hendei ves ebpuun is gehem te menge zuma niw he ebpenegseg te mezaat he mulin-ulin? Pinaaǥi te menge ulaula te menge sumusundan niw egketuusan he nengesayep kew.
42011020	Su heini is gehem ku te kebpemuǥew te mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egketuusan niw he iyan en heini sikan is timpu te kedhadì te Megbevayà."
42011021	Ne zutun impesavut ni Jesus he lavew he mekeǥeǥehem sikandin kenà si Setanas is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin . Ke si Jesus te, "Ke zuen mezesen he etew he nepurung meǥumeeni ne ebentayan din is baley zin, wazà ebpekeaǥew te menge azen din.
42011022	Iyan, ke zuen tuwas pa he mezesen he ebpekeuma, egkezaag din haazà is nehuna, ne ed-eǥawan din te menge ǥumaan he iyan edseriǥan dutun te etew ne ebpeneltelazen din haazà is netavan din diyà te menge sakup din."
42011023	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikan is kenè ku zuma, ne kuntada ku; sikan is kenà edtavang kedì, ne edsanggen kediey.
42011024	Ke ed-awà is mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpuun diyà te etew he edlelungen din, diyà ebayà te memaza he tanà su ebpen-ahà te egkeubpaan din. Ne emun wazè din egkeahà, egkaǥi sikandin te, 'Edlikù a nasì diyà te neubpaan ku.'
42011025	Ne edlikù ne egkeehè din haazà is neubpaan din he midtines en is menge vutang dutun, ne nepurung melumpiyuwi.
42011026	Ne zutun edlikù edhipanew su ebpengakat te pitu he zuma zin he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he tuwas pa he memezaat kenà sikandin. Ne ed-ahuk dan ne ed-ubpè dan dutun te etew. Ne zutun ed-iseg pa ebmezaat is kebpekesavuk dutun te etew, kenà te nehuna he kebpekesavuk din."
42011027	Ne zutun hein neipus ni Jesus haazà is migkaǥi zin ne zuen dutun bahi he midhabet megkaǥi te, "Dekelà is kelipey te vahi he mid-anak kenikew wey nekepesusu kenikew!"
42011028	Iyan, midtavak si Jesus te, "Lavew pa he zekelà is kelipey te etew he ebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne ebpezumdumahan din!"
42011029	Ne zutun hein egkengehasekhasek en is utew mezakel he menge etew he ed-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus, migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, utew mezaat is menge ulaula niw. Egkesuatan niw he meehè niw is singyal he ebpuun te Megbevayà diyà te langit he tuus he midsuǥù e zin, iyan, iyan dà singyal he ibpaahà keniyu is iring te impeulaula zengan duen te tipehuna he ebpeneuven he si Jonas.
42011030	Su si Jonas, hein nekeuma sikandin dengan diyà te inged he Ninivi, impeehè din is singyal he tuus te silut te Megbevayà diyà te menge tigNinivi. Ne iring din ded daan, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, egkehimu is penurù ku he tuus te meǥaan en is ed-ul-ulahan keniyu te Megbevayà.
42011031	Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum te Megbevayà, sikan is tipehuna he bai he ebpuun te inged he Siba, edsewayen kew zin is menge etew ǥuntaan su utew meziyù is midhipenawan din te kebpemineg dà te penurù ni Hadì Sulumun te utew metau. Ne ǥuntaan, duen lavew pa kenà si Sulumun dini te keniyu ne wazè niw zewata is penurù din.
42011032	Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum te Megbevayà, edsewayen kew is menge etew ǥuntaan te menge tigNinivi zengan su hein nezineg dan is penurù ni Jonas, mid-iniyuǥan dan is memezaat he ulaula. Ne ǥuntaan duen ebpeneuven he lavew pa kenà si Jonas dini te keniyu, ne sikiyu mulà, wazè niw zewata is penurù din."
42011033	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Wazà etew he edtemteman din is sulù ne id-eles din, ne emun kenà, ne ebpelengkevan din te revan, kekenà, diyè din idsavuk te sevukà, ne emun duen etew he edseled ne egketeyawan.
42011034	Is mata te etew, ne iring te sulù diyà te lawa zin su emun merayag is ked-ehè din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, emun metazeng is ulaula zin, ne henduen be te egketeyawan is tivuuk he lawa zin. Iyan, emun lakap sikandin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, lalung sikandin, henduen be te egkezukileman is tivuuk he lawa zin.
42011035	Iring din ded daan is sulù te isip te etew, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is kedsevuta zin te hustu . Kinahanglan he kenà heini egkezaag te mezaat
42011036	he ulaula zin, ne henduen be te utew merayag is egkeulaula zin iring te egketeyawan sikandin te sulù."
42011037	Ne hein nekeipus dutun si Jesus is ebpenurù ne zuen sevaha zutun he Perisiyu he mid-umbita kandin te kegkaan diyà te valey zin. Ne midhendiyà si Jesus ne migkaan.
42011038	Ne naahà dutun te Perisiyu he migkaan si Jesus he wazè din lùlui is belad din. Ne utew sikandin neinuinu su nesupak ni Jesus is betasan te menge Perisiyu.
42011039	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Sikiyu is menge Perisiyu, ebpurungan niw ebentayi is menge vetasan niw, iyan, diyà te isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw ne zuen keheheramham wey kelelalung. Iring kew te vasu wey pinggan he nelumpiyuwan diyà te ǥawas, iyan, meremerik is diyà te seled.
42011040	Menge wazè niw isip! Is Megbevayà he midlimbag din is gawas te lawa niw, midlimbag din daan is gehinawa wey isip niw. Ne kinahanglan he lumpiyu is gehinawa niw wey isip niw iring te ǥawas te lawa niw.
42011041	Ne sumalà is egkehimu niw, beǥayi niw is menge egkengeayuayu ne human egkehimu he egkelumpiyuwan kew egkepurungi.
42011042	Kehizu niw te menge Perisiyu su ibeǥey niw te Megbevayà is ikepulù he vahin minsan te menge perehemut te egkeenen iring te yirbebuyna wey vawing wey is langun he menge edlumbayen, iyan, is metazeng he ulaula wey is kebmahala niw te Megbevayà diyà te ǥehinawa niw, ne wazè niw isipa. Kinahanglan he iveǥey niw is ikepulù, iyan, kenè niw zaan ipeliyu heini is menge lavew pa he suǥù.
42011043	Kehizu niw te menge Perisiyu su emun diyè kew te simbahan egkesuatan niw he ibpepinuu kew ziyà te menge pinuuwà te menge egalen. Ne emun diyè kew te tiyenggiyan, utew ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa niw ke edtehuzen kew te menge etew.
42011044	Kehizu niw te menge Perisiyu su iring kew te menge leveng he kenà egketuusan ne egkeǥiekan te etew, iyan, wazè dan metueni he meremerik haazà is neǥiekan dan ."
42011045	Ne zutun duen menunudlù te kesuǥuan dutun he migkaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Datù, heeyan is menge lalag nu, ne nesuǥat key zaan keniyan."
42011046	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Sikiyu zaan is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, kehizu niw zaan su utew mezakel is mereǥen he tulumanen he ibpetuman niw te menge etew, iyan, wazà minsan hengkey he idtavang niw kandan wey zan meketuman dutun te ibpetuman niw kandan.
42011047	Mekehizuhizu kew utew keuzemà su mideyzeyanan niw is mibpenlevengan duen te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, iyan, menge kevuwazan kew te nememunù kandan.
42011048	Is menge kepuun niw, ne iyan mibunù, ne midhimasad niw haazà is mezaat he mid-ulaula zan su iyan kew midayandayan te midlevengan; mid-ulaula niw heini he tuus te egkesuatan niw is mezaat he vaal te menge kepuun niw.
42011049	Is Megbevayà he utew metau, migkaǥi sikandin dengan te, 'Ibpehendiyan ku pa te kandan is ebpemeneuven wey is menge epustul. Ne edhimetayan dan is duma ne is duma ebpesipelahan dan.' Umba migkaǥi heini te Megbevayà su netuenan din he sikiyu is menge Hudiyu, nesevaha is gehinawa niw te ǥehinawa te menge kepuun niw.
42011050	Umba sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, elin kew zaan edsilutan te kebpemunua te langun he menge ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà he nengevunù dengan
42011051	puunè pa te kedhimetayi ki Abel pehendiyà te kedhimetayi ki Zacarias he mibunù diyà te pid-elangan te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà wey vangkù he pemuhatà. Benar is egkeǥiyen ku he sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, elin kew zaan edsilutan tenged kayi!
42011052	Mekehizuhizu kew keuzemà sikiyu is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan su ed-elangan niw is menge etew wey zan kenà metueni is hustu he ibpevayà pehendiyà te Megbevayà. Kenè kew egkesuat he ed-ikul te hustu he ibayà, iyan, ed-eǥenen niw is etew he egkesuat he ed-ikul zutun!"
42011053	Ne hein mid-awà si Jesus dutun te valey te Perisiyu, midreǥenreǥen sikandin te menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Mezakel is menge insè dan kandin su edteǥelen dan sikandin wey meketavak
42011054	su ebpengahaan dan is paaǥi wey mehimu si Jesus he igkesumbung dan.
42012001	Ne sevaha he andew, utew mezakel he menge etew is edhahasekhasek he ed-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus. Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus, asal iyan egkeǥiyan din is menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, "Andam kew wey niw melikayi is tapey te menge Perisiyu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is tarù he kedtuu zan te Megbevayà.
42012002	Kunaan dan ke kenà egketuenan he tarù is kedtuu zan, iyan, is langun he midtembunan he ed-ul-ulahan te etew, ne egketuenan ded wey is minsan hengkey he nekeeles ne ibpeǥawaǥawa ǥihapun.
42012003	Is langun he ednèneesen niw te mezukilem, ne egkezineg ke maandew wey is minsan hengkey he egkegkeǥiyen niw he meeles diyà te ruǥu niw, ne egketuenan ded te mezakel he menge etew ziyà te tiyenggiyan.
42012004	Ne sikiyu is menge emiǥu ku, iyan egkeǥiyen ku keniyu is: kenè kew mahandek te menge etew zà duen su iyan dà egkepatey zan is lawa niw, iyan, is gimukud niw, kenè dan egkepatey.
42012005	Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu ke hentei is engayan he igkehandek niw. Iyan niw ikehandek is Megbevayà su kenè din iyan dà egkepatey is lawa niw su zuen din keǥehem he ebpeketimbag te ǥimukud niw ziyà te Impirnu. Uya, iyan niw sikandin ikehandek!"
42012006	Ne ke si Jesus te, "Duen tagbis he egkepemasa te etew is lelima he vuuk te dezuwa zà he tumbaǥa. Ne minsan pa zutun, is Megbevayà, kenè din id-awà diyà te isip din is minsan sevaha kandan.
42012007	Ne iyan kew pe be is minsan ke edtigselimbahan te ebilang is bulvul niw ne netuenan din en is kezakel. Umba, kenè kew mahandek su lavew kew he mahal ziyà te kandin kenà te minsan utew mezakel he menge tagbis.
42012008	Utew venar is egkeǥiyen ku," ke si Jesus, "he sikan is etew he egkaǥi ziyà te menge etew he iyan a egalen din, ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ed-engkenen ku zaan sikandin diyà te etuvangan te menge velinsuǥuen te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
42012009	Ne sikan is etew he egkaǥi ziyà te menge etew he kenà a iyan egalen din, ne kenè ku zaan sikandin ed-engkenen diyà te etuvangan te menge velinsuǥuen te Amey ku he ziyà te langit.
42012010	Ne sikan is edsumpalit kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà, ne egkepesaylu pa; iyan, sikan is edsumpalit te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kenè en egkepesaylu.
42012011	Ne emun tenged te kedtuu niw kedì ed-uwiten kew te menge etew ziyà te menge simbahan dan su edhukuman kew zan ne emun ed-imbistigahan kew zaan diyà te etuvangan te menge hadì wey huwis, kenè kew meseeng ke hengkey is idtavak niw kandan wey ke hengkey is paaǥi niw zutun.
42012012	Su is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, iyan ebpenurù keniyu zutun he timpu; ne egketaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa niw is ibpekaǥi zin keniyu."
42012013	Ne zuen sevaha he maama zutun te nengevurun he menge etew. Ke sikandin te, "Datù, iyan ka metau te kakey ku he vehini e zin te menge azen he kevilin dey te amey zey he minatey en."
42012014	Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Wazè ku kelavet keniyan su kenà a iyan edhusey keniyu."
42012015	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, "Purungi niw ventayi is ulaula niw su wey wazà keleleǥed diyan te keniyu. Su is ibmeupiya te untung te etew, kenà ebpuun te mezakel he menge azen."
42012016	Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus kandan is sempità. Ke sikandin te, "Duen etew he utew egketiǥayun su zuen tanè din he utew uuzaran.
42012017	Ne neisip dutun te etew is, 'Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku kayi te langun he uzar ku? Su kenà egkeamin kayi te menge budiga ku ne wazè en egketeǥuan ku.'
42012018	Ne ke sikandin te, 'Edrundusen ku heini is menge budiga ku ne ed-uman a ebevaley te utew zekelà su wey ku zuen meteǥui te langun he egkeraǥun ku wey zuma pa he menge azen ku.
42012019	Ne zutun, geina te utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk ku he etew, kenà ad maan edterebahu su naazen ku en is minsan hengkey he egkinehenglanen ku taman te pira pa he tuig. Ne tenged kayi ebperenggey e zà is ebpurung egkaan, ed-inum, wey edlipeylipey,' ke sikandin.
42012020	Iyan, dutun migkaǥi ziyà te kandin is Megbevayà te, 'Utew ka tulebung he etew! Guntaan dà te mezukilem egkeumuran ke en ne ebpatey kad, ne hentei vuwa is ebpekeangken te langun he menge azen nu he intaǥù nu keniyan te valey nu?'"
42012021	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus diyà te mezakel he menge etew, ke sikandin te, "Iring kayi te sepian he etew is minsan hentei he edtipig te zekelà he ketiǥeyunan, iyan, wazà diyà te kandin is minsan hengkey he igkesuat te Megbevayà."
42012022	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, Ne tenged kayi egkeǥiyen ku keniyu te menge sumusundan ku he kenè kew meseeng te egkeenen he igkeuyag niw. Ne kenè kew zaan meseeng te ugelingen he idsun-ud te lawa niw.
42012023	Su mibeǥayan kew te Megbevayà te ǥehinawa wey lawa he mahal utew; ne wey pe be kenà mehimu he ebeǥayan kew zin daan te egkeenen wey ugelingen?
42012024	Isipa niw is menge uwak; kenè dan ebpemula; kenè dan edraǥun ne wazè dan daan lawig he ederengdengan dan. Ne minsan pa zutun ebpengelintau is Megbevayà te egkekaan dan. Ne iyan kew pe be is etew he lavew pa he mahal ziyà te kandin kenà is menge uwak!
42012025	Ne minsan sengemenu is kegkenuǥuni te etew te untung din, wazà minsan hengkey he paaǥi he egkesumpatan din te minsan deisey zà.
42012026	Ne emun pinaaǥi te kegkeseeng niw wazè niw egkehimu te minsan kayi te utew zeisey he ebeelan, hengkey is pulus te kedseengseeng niw pa maan te zuma he ebeelan?
42012027	Ahaa niw is menge kevukazan ke hengkey is kedtuvù dan. Kenè dan edterebahu ne kenè dan daan ebpengavel. Ne minsan pa zutun, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he minsan si Hadì Sulumun dengan he utew sepian wey nevantug, ne wazà mekesusuluwan is kezagwey te menge bisti zin te kezagwey kayi te menge kevukazan.
42012028	Is sagbet, ne wazè din bali; egkeehè ta ǥuntaan ne kenè en utew egkeuǥet ne egkeǥangu en, ne ebinsulan en. Iyan, ke edhimuwen te Megbevayà he mekempet minsan heini is menge sagbet, iyan kew pe be kenè din daan meveǥayi te igkeuugelingen! Maan is utew zeisek is kedsarig niw kandin?
42012029	Kenè kew meseeng! Kenè niw iyan isipa ke hengkey is egkekaan niw wey egkeinum.
42012030	Su is iring keniyan, ne iyan igkengeseeng te menge etew he wazà medtuu te tutuu he Megbevayà, iyan, sikiyu mulà, kenè niw ikeseeng is iring dutun su is Amey niw he Megbevayà, netuenan din he egkinehenglanen niw heini is langun.
42012031	Iyan niw ul-ulaha is ibpeulaula keniyu te Megbevayà he iyan edhadì keniyu ne ibeǥey zin diyà te keniyu is langun he egkinehenglanen niw.
42012032	Sikiyu is menge sumusundan ku, kenè kew mahandek. Minsan pa te zeisey kew zà, is Amey niw he Megbevayà, egkesuatan din he medhadì kew iring te edhadì daan sikandin.
42012033	Ivelegyè niw is langun he azen niw ne ipemeǥey niw is halin diyà te menge egkengeayuayu. Pinaaǥi kayi egkehimu he zuen ketiǥeyunan niw ziyà te langit. Is menge azen niw ziyà te langit, ne kenà egkezeetan ne kenà egketerinan su wazà ebpenakew ne wazà ipes he ebpekeketket.
42012034	Ne ke hendei is egketeǥuan te ketiǥeyunan niw ne zutun daan is gehinawa niw.
42012035	Ne impezineg en maan ni Jesus is sempità, ke sikandin te, Andam kew he zaan su wey kenè kew metingkemed te minsan hengkey. Iringi niw is suluǥuen he edtaǥad te egalen dan he ebpuun te eseweey he midtelavuk din.
42012036	Su haazà is menge suluǥuen, ne layun dan ed-andam ne kenè dan ed-evukan is sulù dan ne emun ebpekeuma haazà is egalen dan ne ebpenelehuzan diyà te pultahan ne petuluy zan egkepuwasi.
42012037	Utew meupiya is kegeǥehinawa zutun te menge suluǥuen emun ebpekeuma haazà is egalen dan ne zaan dan neendami haazà is kebpekeuma zin. Benar is egkeǥiyen ku he haazà is egalen dan, ibpepinuu zin sikandan diyà te lemisahan ne iyan sikandin ebpekaan kandan.
42012038	Utew egkengelipey sikandan ke ebpekeuma is egalen dan he kemulu zan pa sikandin edteǥazi minsan ke liwazè en is kezukileman wey minsan ke egkepkepawè en be.
42012039	Ne ke si Jesus maan te, Kenè niw heini lipati he emun egketuenan te teǥivaley ke keenu ebpekeuma is tekawen ne ebpekepurung sikandin ebpekevantey ne kenà ebpekeseled dutun te valey zin haazà is tekawen.
42012040	Ne sikiyu zaan, kinahanglan he mebpekevantey kew su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpekeuma a te uras he wazè niw isipa he ebpekeuma a.
42012041	Ne zutun, mid-insà si Pedro, ke sikandin te, Heini is sempità he migkaǥi nu, iyan key zè be kenikew ebpenuruen is menge sumusundan nu, wey ke elin be is menge etew?
42012042	Ne midtavak is Nengazen te, Sikan is suluǥuen he uluwanen wey metinumanen, iyan ibpevayàbayà te egalen din te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen. Ne iyan ebpekaan te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen dutun te uras te kegkaan.
42012043	Emun ed-ulì haazà is egalen din, utew zekelà is kelipey zutun te suluǥuen ke egkeahà te egalen din he midtuman din is langun he ebpeveelan kandin.
42012044	Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he is suluǥuen he metinumanen, idsarig kandin is langun he menge azen te egalen din.
42012045	Iyan, kehizu zin ke iyan diyà te isip din is menaney pa ed-ulì haazà is egalen din ne ebpemuǥelen din is menge zuma zin he suluǥuen he maama wey vahi ne iyan dà baal zin is egkaan wey ed-inum ne egkelangut.
42012046	Su zutun te andew he wazè din peebuta wey te uras he wazè din metueni, ebpekeulì haazà is egalen din. Ne haazà is suluǥuen, ebeelan diyà te kandin is iring te ebeelan diyà te menge suluǥuen he kenà egkeseriǥan ne edhimetayan sikandin te egalen din.
42012047	Ne sikan is suluǥuen he netuenan din en is ibpeveelan kandin te egalen din, iyan, wazà med-andam ne wazà medtuman te ibpeveelan kandin te egalen din, ne kenà sikandin ed-uraman te ebuǥel zutun te egalen din.
42012048	Ne sikan is suluǥuen he wazè din pa metueni is ibpeveelan kandin te egalen din, iyan, duen mid-ulaula zin he igkepeuki kandin te egalen din, ne kenà utew sikandin ebuǥelen. Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, Is etew he zekelà is insarig kandin, dekelà daan is ebperetengen diyà te kandin. Ne emun utew pa zekelà is insarig kandin ne utew en daan dekelà is ebperetengen diyà te kandin.
42012049	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, Iyan ku impehendini su wey dini te kelibutan duen hapuy, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, su wey mehukumi is menge etew . Ne ǥustu ku pezem he zaan en he neretem heini is hapuy.
42012050	Duen ibewtismu kedì he iyan is dekelà pa he menge kemeresayan he egkeulaula ku he wazè pa mengetuman. Henduen a te ed-utuk te langit taman te kenè ku pa heini egkeliyu.
42012051	Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan impehengkayi ku te kelibutan is wey wazè en samuk te menusiyà. Iyan kenà! Su heini is kebpekehendini ku, ne zuen kebpemekedsusuwey te ǥehinawa te menge etew.
42012052	Puun guntaan tenged kedì emun duen lelima he etew ziyà te sengepeningaan, egkevahin sikandan. Ebpekigkuntada is tetelu te zezuwa. Ne iring din ded daan ebpekigkuntada haazà is dezuwa zutun te tetelu.
42012053	Ebpekigkuntada is maama te anak din he maama ne is anak, ne ebpekigkuntada te amey zin. Ne is bahi, ne ebpekigkuntada te anak din he vahi ne is anak din, ne ebpekigkuntada zaan te iney zin. Ne ke zuen bahi, ne ebpekigkuntada te ambey zin. Ne egkuntedahan daan sikandin te ambey zin.
42012054	Ne migkaǥi med-uman si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, Dini te kenitew ke egkeehè niw is kivel ziyà te edsenlepan ne ke sikiyu te, Ed-uzan heini, ne ed-uzan iyan.
42012055	Ne emun ebpengeramag he ebpuun te zapit te zivavà ne ke sikiyu te, Ebmeinit utew ǥuntaan, ne ed-andew iyan.
42012056	Tarù is ulaula niw! Su emun ed-ahaan niw is langit wey tanà egketuenan niw ke hengkey is egkehitavù te timpu, iyan, kenè niw uvag egkesavut ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan guntaan te Megbevayà pinaaǥi kedì.
42012057	Ne ke si Jesus te, Deyzey ke ed-isipen niw is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan.
42012058	Penenglitan duen etew he idsumbung kew zin, ne ed-uwiten kew zin diyà te hukmanan. Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw su wey kew kandin mebpekidhusey te kenè kew pa ebpekeetuvang te huwis. Su emun ebpekeetuvang kew en te huwis, kela ke izata kew zin diyà te pulis ne egkepirisu kew.
42012059	Ne zutun kew ebpekeubpà taman te kenè niw pa egkeǥempusan is multa keniyu.
42013001	Ne zutun he timpu zuen nemekeuma he menge etew ne mibpenudtul zan diyà te ki Jesus is mehitenged te menge etew he tigGeliliya he impehimetayan ni Gubirnedur Pilatu zutun te timpu te kebpelengesa zutun te menge etew te langgam diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà.
42013002	Ne migkaǥi kandan si Jesus te, Kunaan niw vuwa ke lavew pa he mekesesalà haazà is menge tigGeliliya, kenà is menge zuma zan he tigGeliliya, ne tenged dutun intuǥut te Megbevayà he edhimetayan sikandan.
42013003	Kenà heeyan iyan! Su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he emun kenè niw ed-iniyuǥan is menge ulaula niw he memezaat, ebpatey kew zaan is langun, iring kandan.
42013004	Ne isipa niw zaan is sepulù wey walu he menge etew he nemematey hein nepilayan sikandan te metikang he valey ziyà te Siluwi. Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan kandan ingkepilayi su utew lavew sikandan he mekesesalà kenà te langun he menge zuma zan he tigHiruselim.
42013005	Kenà daan. Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he emun kenè niw ed-iniyuǥan is memezaat he menge ulaula niw ne ebpatey kew zaan is langun iring kandan.
42013006	Ne zuen en maan sempità he impezineg ni Jesus kandan. Ibpenurù din he emun wazà mahalin is ulaula te etew ne edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà . Ke sikandin te, Duen etew he zuen din pinemula he kayu he igira ziyà te pemuleey zin. Sevaha he andew zutun mid-ehè din haazà is kayu ke zuen en beǥas din he igira. Iyan, wazà mebeǥas haazà is kayu.
42013007	Ne migkeǥiyan din is impeelima zin dutun te kayu, ke sikandin te, Nemenu vuwa heini is kayu he kenè en ebeǥasbeǥas? Su tetelu en he tuig is kebperetenga ku ke ebeǥas ne kenè en iyan ebeǥas. Pilaya nu nasì su ebpekehenung dà kayi te zuma he pinemula.
42013008	Iyan, migkaǥi haazà is impeelima zutun te, Kenè te pa zè pa, Anggam, ebpilayen su ebpeseseǥazen te pa seled te sengetuig. Edhiǥewanan ku pa is pelingut ne ebukbukan ku pa te pelambù te pinemula.
42013009	Ne emun ebeǥas te ilis he tuig ne meupiya, ne emun kenà ebeǥas ne ebpilayen ku.
42013010	Ne sevaha he andew he Sebadu, diyà si Jesus ebpenurù te simbahan te menge Hudiyu.
42013011	Ne zuen dutun te simbahan bahi he nevekut su midlalung te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne menge sepulù en wey walu he tuig haazà is kegkevekut din ne kenè en iyan egkevulug egkeketeng te minsan deisey zà.
42013012	Ne zutun te kegkeahaa ni Jesus kandin, mid-umew zin ne ke sikandin te, Ayà, egkeulian ke en keniyan te zaru nu.
42013013	Ne midsamsam ni Jesus is peka zutun te vahi ne zutundutun ne neketeng is peka zin. Ne nekezaligdalig haazà is bahi te Megbevayà.
42013014	Ne is egalen dutun te simbahan, utew nepauk dutun te kebpemawì ni Jesus dutun te Andew te Kedhimeley. Ne ke sikandin diyà te menge etew te, Seled te heenem he andew is kedterebahu tew te sengesimana. Emun ebpevawì kew zutun he timpu ne meupiya, iyan, kenè kew pevawì guntaan te Andew te Kedhimeley!
42013015	Ne midtavak kandin si Jesus te, Tarù is menge ulaula niw! Ke zuen baka ne emun kenà ne kudà te minsan hentei keniyu, kenà egkehimu he kenè din edhekazan haazà emun Andew te Kedhimeley, kekenà, edhekazan din ne edtuyuken din pehendiyà te wahig su ibpeinum din.
42013016	Ne heini ǥuntaan is bahi he kevuwazan daan ni Abraham, ne mibakus ni Setanas te sepulù en wey walu he tuig, ne kenè niw ves ebpehekazan kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley!
42013017	Ne haazà is tavak ni Jesus, utew ingkeeled te menge kuntada zin. Ne is duma zutun he mezakel he menge etew, utew zan nengelipey te langun he menge egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan din.
42013018	Ne impenurù en maan ni Jesus is selakew en maan he sempità, ke sikandin te, Hengkey is meupiya he ebpetug-iringan te kebmezakel te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà?
42013019	Is kebmezakel zan te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring te pinemula he utew zeisey is lisu zin. Ibpemula heini te etew ziyà te kamet din ne ke edtuvù ne edekelà ne egkehimu he iring kezekelà te kayu ne egkeletunan te menge tagbis ne egkeseselaǥan dan is menge subpang din.
42013020	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, Hengkey pa is meupiya he ebpetug-iringan te kebmezakel te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà?
42013021	Is kebmezakel zan te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring daan te tapey. Su ke zuen bahi he ebaal te supas, egkuwaan din haazà is tapey ne idsahug din te sengebisin he erina. Ne ed-ensak haazà is tapey zutun te erina ne edtulin haazà is erina.
42013022	Midhipanew si Jesus pehendiyà te inged he Hiruselim ne zutun te kedhipanew zin ne mibpenuluytuluy ziyà te zuma pa he menge inged su ebpenurù te menge etew.
42013023	Ne zuen mid-insà kandin te, Datù, deisey zè be is menge etew he ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan? Ne midtavak si Jesus te,
42013024	Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw wey kew mekeseled te meliǥet he ǥemawan he idselang dutun te valey he iyan is untung he wazà pidtemanan su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he mezakel is egkesuat pezem he edseled dutun, iyan, kenè dan ebpekeseled.
42013025	Su edlekevan te teǥivaley haazà is gemawan. Ne emun diyè kew pa te ǥawas ebpenelehuzan kew is egkaǥi te, Puwasi key kenikew! Ne iyan dà idtavak dutun te teǥiǥaked is, Kenè ku egketuenan ke hentei kew wey ke hendei kew ebpuun.
42013026	Ne zutun edtavak kew te, Dengan migkaan key wey mid-inum key zuma kenikew ne mibpenurù ka ziyà te inged dey!
42013027	Ne edtevaken kew zin te, Kenè ku iyan egketuenan ke hentei kew wey ke hendei kew ebpuun. Sikiyu is memezaat is ulaula, awè kew en dini.
42013028	Ne zutun, ke si Jesus, utew zekelà he erang niw ne ebpemekengingitel kew tenged te utew ibmesakit pezem te ǥehinawa niw su kenè kew ebpekeragkes dutun te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne ziyà te seled, ne egkeehè niw is menge kepuun niw zengan, ensi Abraham wey sikan is anak din he si Isaak wey sikan is apù din he si Hakub wey elin daan dutun is langun he ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà.
42013029	Mezakel zaan dutun is menge etew he kenà menge zuma niw he Hudiyu he ebpemuun diyà te heepat he pesaǥi kayi te kelibutan. Ne ebpemekepinuu sikandan dutun te keemuran te langun he edhedian te Megbevayà.
42013030	Duen guntaan menge etew he kunaan niw ke egkengehuziyan su kenà menge zuma niw he Hudiyu, iyan, emun egkeume en haazà he andew ne iyan sikandan egkehuna te langun he edhedian te Megbavayà. Ne zuen daan menge etew ǥuntaan he kunaan niw ke egkengehuna, iyan, emun egkeume en haazà he andew ne iyan sikandan egkengehuziyan te langun.
42013031	Ne zutun daan he andew ne zuen menge Perisiyu he midhinguma zan si Jesus, ne ke sikandan te, Laus ke en ne kenè ke en tuluy zini te kenami su edhimetayan ke kun ni Hadì Hirudis.
42013032	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, Si Hirudis, haazà is utew metau he ed-akal, keǥiyi niw sikandin he kenè e pa ed-awà dini su ǥuntaan wey keeselem ebpenegseǥen ku pa is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung te menge etew, ne ebewian ku is egkengezeruwan. Ne mekezuwa pa ǥuntaan ne human egkeipus heini is menge vaal ku zini.
42013033	Iyan, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kinahanglan he ednaneynaney e zè pa edlaus guntaan wey keeselem wey te mekezuwa pa su kenà egkehimu he edhimetayan a zini su is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, ne kenà tekew en edhimetayan ke kenà diyà te seled te inged he Hiruselim.
42013034	Ne zutun netenuzan ni Jesus is menge ulaula te menge meǥinged te Hiruselim ne ke sikandin te, Igkeseeng ku sikiyu is menge meǥinged diyà te Hiruselim su ebpemunuen niw is ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà ne is menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà he ibpehendiyà, ebpenulengen niw te vatu he edhimetayan niw. Utew zekelà is suat ku pezem he ed-uyemuwen ku sikiyu; ke và dà manuk, iring a te upa he edlekupan din is menge piyak din ne kenè kew ebpelekup.
42013035	Ne ǥuntaan, utew mekevulungbulung heini is simbahan niw su mid-iniyuǥan kew en te Megbevayà. Su egkeǥiyen ku he kenà ad maan keniyu egkeahà taman dutun te timpu keuzemà he ebpekekaǥi kew te, Deliǥa is nekeuma he midsuǥù te Nengazen.
42014001	Ne sevaha maan he Andew te Kedhimeley, ne mid-umbite en maan si Jesus te sevaha he pengulu te menge Perisiyu he ziyà ibpekaan te valey zin. Ne is menge kuntada ni Jesus, mibpurungan dan sikandin bentayi ke egkesupak din is kesuǥuan.
42014002	Ne zuen dutun maama he egkezeruwan su midlevag is menge paa zin wey velad din ne mid-uvey heini ziyà te ki Jesus.
42014003	Ne si Jesus, mid-insaan din is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey is menge Perisiyu, ke sikandin te, Sumalà is ibpenurù kenitew te insurat he kesuǥuan, ebpekesalè ki ve ke ebpemawì ki ke Andew te Kedhimeley?
42014004	Iyan, wazè dan tevaka si Jesus, ne zutun migewezan ni Jesus haazà is egkezeruwan ne zutundutun ne neulian. Ne impeulì sikandin ni Jesus.
42014005	Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge etew zutun te, Hengkey ve is ed-ul-ulahan niw ke zuen niw anak, ne emun kenà, ne vaka niw he egkeulug diyà te mezalem he vudsi emun Andew te Kedhimeley. Siguradu, edtevangan niw minsan ke Andew te Kedhimeley.
42014006	Ne zutun ne wazè dan meketavak.
42014007	Ne zuen daan dutun menge etew he mid-umbita zaan dutun te Perisiyu. Ne hein ebpememinuu zan en is egkaan ne naahà ni Jesus he ebpilien te menge etew is ebpinuuwan dan he meupiya he ebpinuuwan he zutun ibpepinuu is menge lavew he menge etew. Ne tenged kayi impezineg ni Jesus kandan is penurù din, ke sikandin te,
42014008	Emun egkeumbita ki ziyà te keemuran, kenè ki edhuna ebpinuu ziyà te meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Su kela ke zuen pa ebpekeuma he lavew is ked-etew zin kenè ki.
42014009	Ne egkeǥiyan ki zutun te midtukud te keemuran te, Ibpahalin ki su ebpepinuuwan dutun te lavew kenè ki, haazà is mibpinuuwan ta. Ne utew ki zutun egkeeled ke ziyè ki ibpepinuu te kenà utew meupiya he ebpinuuwan.
42014010	Iyan, ke egkeumbita ki ziyà te keemuran, kenè ki ebpemilì te meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Ne emun ebpinuu ki en, diyè ki ebpinuu te kenà utew meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Ne zutun, haazà is midtukud te keemuran, ebpekekaǥi kenita te, He Geli, kenè ka keniyan mebpinuu su kayi ka pinuu te meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Ne zutun, kenè ki egkeeled, kekenà, egketahud ki te menge etew.
42014011	Sikan is etew he ed-isipen din he lavew is pid-etawan din ne ebminusen heini te Megbevayà. Iyan, sikan is etew he ed-isipen din he minus is pid-etawan din ne ebpeketikangen te Megbevayà is pid-etawan din.
42014012	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus dutun te midtukud te keemuran te, Ne sikew zaan, Mama, emun edtukud ka te keemuran ne kenè nu iyan dà umbitaha is menge kilala nu wey is menge suled nu wey menge siringan nu he sepian su sikandan, ne neezenan dan mulà ne edsembayan ke zan ed-umbitaha ke edtukud dan te keemuran ne zutun ebpekevales dan en te meupiya he mid-ulaula nu kandan.
42014013	Iyan, emun edtukud ka te keemuran ne iyan nu umbitaha is egkengeayuayu wey is menge pigket, menge pungkul, wey is menge lakap.
42014014	Ne emun iyan heini ulaula nu ne utew zekelà is kelipey nu su kenè dan ebpekesambey he ed-umbita kenikew ne kenè dan egkevelesan is meupiya he mid-ulaula nu kandan, ne iyan is Megbevayà ebales kenikew te utew meupiya he egkeulaula zutun keuzemà te kegkengevanhew te menge etew he memeupiya is ulaula.
42014015	Ne is sevaha zutun te menge maama he ebpememinuu ziyà te uvey ni Jesus, hein nezineg din haazà is penurù ni Jesus ne migkaǥi te, Utew zekelà is kelipey te menge etew he ebpeketelavuk dutun keuzemà te keemuran he zutun ibpekaan is langun he menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà!
42014016	Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus kandin is sempità. Ke sikandin te, Duen sevaha he etew he midtukud te zekelà he keemuran. Ne haazà is etew, ne mezakel is menge etew he mid-umbita zin.
42014017	Ne hein netuman en haazà is keemuran ne midsuǥù din is suluǥuen din he ibpetukew en is menge etew su nengelutù en is igastu. Ne ke sikandin diyà te menge suluǥuen din te, Keǥiyi niw sikandan he medhendini zan en su naandam en is langun!
42014018	Iyan, is menge etew he mid-umbita zin, ne wazà diyà te ǥehinawa zan haazà is keemuran. Is kada sevaha zutun ne mibpemituwà te kenà ebpeketelavuk dutun. Is duma ne egkaǥi te, Kenè dà mebmezaat is gehinawa nu kedì su kenà a ebpeketelavuk su zuen tanà he veǥu ku pa he nepemasa ne edleuyen ku ǥuntaan.
42014019	Ne is sevaha pa maan dutun ne migkaǥi te, Kenè dà mebmezaat is gehinawa nu kedì su kenà a ebpeketelavuk te keemuran su zuen sepulù he vaka he sikan ku pa mepemasa ne igezam ku id-edadu!
42014020	Ne is sevaha pa he etew zutun, ne egkaǥi te, Kenà a ebpeketelavuk su sikan pa meipus is kebpeesewaa kediey ne umba kenà a ebpekehendiyan.
42014021	Ne zutun mid-ulì haazà is midsuǥù te edtukud te keemuran ne midtudtul zin diyà te egalen din haazà is langun he menge pituwà te menge etew he impeveyaan kandin. Ne haazà is egalen din, ne utew mibmezaat is gehinawa zin. Ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is suluǥuen din te, Hendiyè ka te inged ne ikula nu is menge kersada wey menge zalan dutun ne pendumaha nu zini is menge etew he egkengeayuayu, sikan is menge piang, menge pungkul, wey menge lakap. Ne zutun midhipanew haazà is suluǥuen.
42014022	Ne hein nekeulì en haazà is midsuǥù ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is egalen din te, Nemekeume en is menge etew he impeveyaan nu, iyan, wazè pa meenget heini is baley.
42014023	Ne midtavak haazà is egalen din te, Hendiyè ka te menge unayan wey vuntud ne ikula nu is menge zalan dutun ne teǥela nu is menge etew zutun he medtelavuk dan kayi te keemuran ku su wey mepurung meenget te menge etew heini is baley ku.
42014024	Benar is egkeǥiyen ku kenikew he haazà is nengehuna he mid-umbita ku, ne kenè dan ebpekekaan te minsan deisey zà kayi te ǥastu ku te keemuran!
42014025	Ne sengeandew zutun te edhipanew si Jesus ne utew mezakel is menge etew he ebpemenduma kandin. Ne midsineruwan din sikandan te egkaǥi te,
42014026	Sikan is etew he egkesuat he edsundan kediey, iyan, iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is ginikanan din, esawa zin, menge anak din, menge suled din, ne emun kenà, ne iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is keugelingen din he lawa, ne kenà egkehimu he tutuu sikandin he sumusundan ku.
42014027	Ne iring din ded daan sikan is etew he egkesuat he edsundan kediey, iyan, kenà edtiang te krus din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, egkehandek he edtuman te menge suǥù ku su kela ke iyan ibpatey zin , ne kenà daan egkehimu he tutuu sikandin he sumusundan ku.
42014028	Penenglitan, ke zuen sevaha keniyu he ebevaley te utew metikang he valey, ne zutun te kenè pa sikandin ebpuun ne egkuwintahan din is selapì he egkeǥastu zin su wey zin metueni ke egkeveleveg din be haazà is baley he ibpehitindeg din wey ke kenà.
42014029	Su emun kenè din egkuwintahan is selapì he igkeǥastu zin ne kela ke tekew zin en ikepasek is menge tukud ne zutun dà taman. Ne is mezakel he menge etew he ebpekeahà dutun ne ebpemenggemenggemen is edsudì su haazà is baley, ne tekew en tukud he ingkepasek.
42014030	Ne ebpelelelaǥè dan te, Tumù pa ke wazè en sikandin mebulug mebpasek te ebelayen su kenè din bes egkehimu.
42014031	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, Iring din ded daan is hadì. Su is hadì he ebpekidtebek te sengehahadì ne kinahanglan he edhuna sikandin ebelansi ke ebpekezaag is sepulù he libu he menge sundaru zin te keluwaan he libu he ebpemekeuma he sundaru te kuntada zin he sengehahadì.
42014032	Ne emun egkevelansi zin he kenà ebpekesukul is menge sundaru zin, ne meupiya pa ke edsuǥuen din is menge suluǥuen din dutun te kuntada zin te meziyù pa is menge sundaru te kuntada zin su wey zan mebpehusayà te wazè pa mekevulug mekedtebek is menge sundaru zan.
42014033	Ne iring din ded daan, ke si Jesus, su sikiyu is edsundan kediey, kenè kew egkehimu he tutuu he menge sumusundan ku emun kenè egkeawà diyà te ǥehinawa niw is ked-engkezi niw te langun he egkenuǥunan niw.
42014034	Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus is sempità su ibpesavut din he is kedsundan dan kandin ne iring te timus . Ke sikandin te, Meupiya is timus su ibmeupiya te egkeenen , iyan, ke egkeawà diyà te timus is taam din wazè en paaǥi he egkehimu te kebpelikua te taam din.
42014035	Ne wazè en iyan pulus din su kenà egkeǥamit te minsan ebunu he pelambù te tanà ne ed-engkezan dà. Kinahanglan he sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw.
42015001	Ne zutun he timpu, duen mezakel he menge mekesesalà he etew he menge menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken te kesuǥuan, ne nemenhendiyè dan te ki Jesus su ebpemineǥen dan is penurù din.
42015002	Ne utew heini ingkeepes te menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he zutun daan, ne ke sikandan te, Heini si Jesus, ne ebpemekiduma kayi te menge etew he utew mesinupaken te kesuǥuan tew ne egkaan daan sikandin duma kandan.
42015003	Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus kandan heini is sempità, ke sikandin te,
42015004	Penenglitan, is sevaha keniyu ke zuen din nenggatus he ayam he kerehidu, ne netazin is sevaha zutun, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din? Siguradu egkeewaan din haazà is kesiyawan wey siyew he ebpemenabtab su ebpengahaan din haazà is sevaha he netazin taman te egketuredu zin.
42015005	Ne emun egketuredu zin ne utew sikandin egkelipey. Ne edsepipiyen din haazà su ed-ulì.
42015006	Ne ke ebpekeuma sikandin diyà te valey zin ne ebpenewaǥen din is menge zuma zin wey menge siringan din ne ke sikandin te, Edlipey kiw en su neehè ku zed heini is netazin he kerehidu ku.
42015007	Ne ke si Jesus te, Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he iring din ded daan, utew zekelà is kelipey ziyà te langit ke zuen sevaha he mesinupaken he ed-iniyuǥan din is memezaat he ulaula zin, kenà dutun te kesiyawan wey siyew he menge etew he kunaan dan ke memetazeng is ulaula zan wey kenà kinahanglan he ed-iniyuǥan dan haazà is mezaat he ulaula zan.
42015008	Ne zuen pa maan sempità he impezineg ni Jesus kandan. Ke sikandin te, Duen sevaha he vahi he midtipig te sepulù he elad he selapì he mahal su pudu pelata. Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din ke egketezinan haazà te sengeelad? Iyan ed-ul-ulahan din is edhuna edtemtem te sulù. Ne ebpeyupasan din is baley zin, ne ebpurungan din te ebpen-ahà taman te egkeehè din.
42015009	Ne emun egkeehè din ne ebpenewaǥen din is menge zuma zin wey menge siringan din, ne ke sikandin te, Edlipey kiw en su neehè ku zed heini is selapì he netazin ku.
42015010	Ne migkaǥi si Jesus med-uman te, Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he iring kayi is kedlipey ziyà te langit te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà emun duen sevaha he mesinupaken he ed-iniyuǥan din is memezaat he ulaula zin.
42015011	Ne impelaus ni Jesus is egkeǥiyen din, ke sikandin te, Duen sevaha he etew he zezuwa is anak din he pudu maama.
42015012	Ne migkaǥi is hazi ziyà te amey zin te, Amà, iveǥey nu en kedì is kediey he vahin kayi te menge azen tew. Ne iyan dà haazà ne mibahin dutun te amey is menge azen din dutun te zezuwa he vuuk he anak din.
42015013	Ne wazà utew meuǥet dutun ne imbelegyè en dutun te hazi is kandin he vahin ne midhipanew is ed-uwit te selapì din. Diyà sikandin medtandang te meziyù he inged ne zutun migastu zin is selapì din te wazà pulus.
42015014	Ne zutun naamin is selapì din. Ne nekeuma is utew mepait he vitil zutun te tanà, ne sikandin, wazè din en egkekuwaan te kinahanglan din.
42015015	Ne midhangyù sikandin te terebahu ziyà te sevaha he meǥinged dutun. Ne mibeǥayan sikandin te terebahu he kebpenamak te vavuy ziyà te unayan.
42015016	Egkesuatan din pezem he mahantey sikandin te minsan ukap dà he idsamak te menge vavuy, iyan, wazà dutun mibeǥey kandin.
42015017	Ne hein neuǥet dutun ne nekepurung sikandin mekeisip-isip. Ke sikandin te, Langun te menge suluǥuen te amey ku ne idsegkayè dan is egkeenen, iyan, siaken heini, ne egkeumes e en te vitil.
42015018	Iyan tumù ne ed-ulì e zed diyà te amey ku, ne iyan egkeǥiyen ku ziyà te kandin is: Amà, dekelà utew is salè ku ziyà te Megbevayà wey zini te kenikew te amey ku.
42015019	Kenà ad dait he ed-isipen nu pa maan he anak nu, kekenà, isipe e zà kenikew he sevaha te menge suluǥuen nu.
42015020	Ne iyan dà haazà neisip din ne zutun midtandang sikandin med-ulì. Ne meziyù pa sikandin ne nepantew en dutun te amey zin. Ne utew nehizu haazà is amey zin he ed-ahà kandin. Ne mibpelelaǥuy is amey zin he edsinuǥung kandin ne migkepkepan ne midhezekan sikandin te amey zin.
42015021	Amà, egkaǥi haazà is kenakan, utew zekelà is salè ku ziyà te Megbevayà wey ziyan te kenikew te amey ku. Kenà ad dait he ed-isipen nu pa maan he anak nu. Ne himuwe e zà he sevaha te menge suluǥuen nu.
42015022	Iyan, haazà is amey zin, mid-umew zin is menge suluǥuen din dutun te valey, ne ke sikandin te, Ihated niw pa zini sikan is meupiya he ugelingen, ne isun-ud niw ziyà te kandin. Sisingi niw is tezù din wey sun-uzi niw te sepatus is menge paa zin.
42015023	Ne kuwaa niw sikan is nati he vaka he impelambù ku ne lepaa niw su egkaan kiw ne edlipey kiw.
42015024	Su heini is anak ku, iring te minatey sikandin ne ǥuntaan neuyaǥan. Netazin sikandin ne ǥuntaan neturedu en. Ne zutun nebibu zan.
42015025	Ne haazà maan, ke si Jesus, is kakey he anak dutun te etew, diyà sikandin te unayan dan. Ne hein ebpelpelinggume en sikandin is ed-ulì ne nezineg din is edtambur wey is leletepak te paa te ebpemenayew.
42015026	Ne mid-umew zin is sevaha zutun te menge suluǥuen te amey zin ne mid-insà te, Hengkey is igkebibu te menge etew keniyan te valey?
42015027	Ne midtavak haazà is suluǥuen te, Nekeulì sikan is hazi nu. Ne impelapà te amey nu sikan is nati he impelambù su nekeulì sikandin he wazè ded mekeizi.
42015028	Ne zutun utew neepes haazà is kakey ne wazà mebpemenahik dutun te valey. Ne zutun mibpenaug haazà is amey zan he ednayùnayù is egkaǥi ziyà te kandin te, Laus ke man dini, Mama.
42015029	Ne midtavak haazà is anak din te, Tenuzi nu, Amà, ke sengemenu is keuǥet te kedterebahu ku kayi he iring te suluǥuen nu. Wazè nu egketenuzan he suǥù nu he wazè ku pemineǥa te minsan hengkey he timpu. Ne minsan pa zutun ne wazà a kenikew veǥayi te minsan kambing dà duen wey a mekelipeylipey zuma te menge emiǥu ku.
42015030	Iyan, heini is anak nu he nekelaga te menge azen nu tenged te kebpengumpadi zin te menge vahi, ne iyan nu mulà midlepaan te impelambù nu he nati!
42015031	Mama, egkaǥi haazà is amey zin, sikew, dini ka mulà layun duma ku. Ne is langun he azen ku, ne kenikew. Ne iyan ka teǥiǥaked te langun.
42015032	Ne kenè ta egkeeǥen is kelipey ta, su heini is hazi nu, ne iring sikandin te minatey, ne ǥuntaan neuyaǥan en. Netazin sikandin, ne ǥuntaan neturedu en.
42016001	Ne impezineg en maan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te selakew pa maan he sempità. Ke sikandin te, Duen sepian he etew he impezumala zin is sevaha he suluǥuen din te menge ketiǥeyunan din. Ne zuen daan etew he midsumbung dutun te sepian he haazà is impezumala, ne ebpenggestuwen din is selapì dutun te egalen din.
42016002	Ne hein nezineg haazà dutun te sepian, ne midtawag din haazà is suluǥuen din ne migkeǥiyan din te, Tutuu heini is sumbung mehitenged kenikew. Iulì nu kediey is langun he insarig ku kenikew su kenè en egkehimu he iyan ka ibpezumala kayi te menge ketiǥeyunan ku.
42016003	Ne neisip dutun te suluǥuen is, Id-awè e ves kayi te terebahu ku. Hengkey is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan ku? Su siak, ne kenè e en ebpekehimu he edterebahu te meveǥat iring te kegkalut ne egkeeled a he ebpemumuyù te limus.
42016004	A, ke sikandin, iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan ku su wey zuen duma ku he egkepeveyaan ku ke egkeawè e en kayi te terebahu ku.
42016005	Ne zutun midtawag din te tigselimbaha is langun he nekeutang dutun te egalen din. Ne ke sikandin diyà te nehuna te, Pira is kenikew he utang diyà te egalen ku?
42016006	Ne midtavak haazà is mid-insaan te, Nenggatus he lata te lana. Ne migkaǥi haazà is suluǥuen te, Heini zed is listahan te utang nu. Pinuu ka kayi ne is insurat nu kayi he utang nu ne ilisi nu te kelimahan dà he lata.
42016007	Ne nekeuma is sevaha zutun. Ne mid-insaan dutun te suluǥuen ke pira is kandin he utang, ne midtavak sikandin te nengkelibu he vinevey he trigu. Ne migkeǥiyan sikandin te suluǥuen te, Heini zed is listahan te utang nu. Pinuu ka kayi ne ilisi nu te walu he ǥatus dà he vinevey.
42016008	Ne zutun, ke si Jesus, hein nezineg haazà dutun te egalen din ke hengkey is mid-ulaula zutun te suluǥuen din, ne nekekaǥi te, Hey, utew metau sikandin su ebpeneǥane en sikandin he zaan te keuyaǥan din keuzemà.  Ne ke si Jesus te, Is menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te menge lalag te Megbevayà, utew metau te paaǥi te kegkezeyzey zan. Iyan, is menge etew he sakup te Megbevayà, kenè dan bes mulà utew metau te paaǥi wey mezeyzey sikandan keuzemà diyà te langit.
42016009	Umba, ke si Jesus, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ǥemita niw is ketiǥeyunan niw zini te kelibutan wey metevangi is egkengeayuayu ne emun egkeuma haazà is timpu keuzemà he kenè niw en egkeǥamit is menge azen niw, edsuhulan kew te Megbevayà diyà te langit.
