47005016	Is paaǥi zey te ked-isipa te minsan hentei he etew, ne kenà iyan is paaǥi he egemiten te menge etew he wazà medtuu. Dengan, iyan heini migamit dey he paaǥi su mid-isip dey he etew zà duen si Kristu, iyan, guntaan netuenan dey he kenà etew zà duen sikandin.
47005017	Ne sikan is etew he nekidsevaha en ki Kristu, beǥu en sikandin he linimbag. Nahanew en diyà te kandin is daan he netaǥù te isip din ne mid-ilisan en heini te veǥu.
47005018	Iyan midhimu kayi is Megbevayà su pinaaǥi ki Kristu midhimu kiw zin he menge emiǥu zin. Ne mibpeveelan din daan kenami is kedhimuwa te zuma he etew he meemiǥu zin.
47005019	Iyan ibpesavut dey is: pinaaǥi ki Kristu egkehimu he edhimuwen te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà he menge emiǥu zin. Ne id-awè din diyà te isip din is menge mezaat he ulaula zan. Ne sikami, insarig din kenami is kedtudtula he egkehimu en he ebpekid-emiǥu te Megbevayà is menusiyà.
47005020	Umba midsuǥù key ni Kristu su wey pinaaǥi kenami ebpekehangyù keniyu is Megbevayà. Ne tenged ki Kristu edhengyuan dey zaan sikiyu he ituǥut niw he himuwa kew te Megbevayà he menge emiǥu zin.
47005021	Wazà minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula ni Kristu, iyan, midhimu te Megbevayà he iyan sikandin midsilutan tenged te salè tew su wey pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew kandin, egkehimu he ed-isipen kiw he metazeng te Megbevayà.
47006001	Ne ǥeina te nehimu key en he menge timbang te Megbevayà, edhengyuan dey sikiyu he himuwa niw he mebpulus is gaǥew zin keniyu.
47006002	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Dutun te timpu he egkesuatan ku, mibpemineg a te ked-ampù nu; ne zutun te hustu he timpu te kedlibriya ku te menusiyà, midtevangan ku sikew. Ne iyan lalag ku keniyu is: iyan en heini timpu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà te kedtavang keniyu; iyan en heini timpu te kedlibriya zin keniyu te silut.
47006003	Egkesuatan dey he wazà igkesawey te minsan hentei te ulaula zey su wey wazà igkesudì dan te kedsengyawa zey te Lalag te Megbevayà.
47006004	Ne umba ebpurungan dey is ulaula zey su wey zey ikepaahà he menge suluǥuen key te Megbevayà te minsan hengkey he paaǥi. Ne tenged kayi ed-antus key te minsan hengkey he kemereǥenan, kemeresayan, wey menge samuk.
47006005	Mibuǥel key, mibpirisu key, mibpesipelahan key te edsinamuk. Duen timpu he utew subra is terebahu zey ne nepurang key ne nevitil key zaan.
47006006	Ne midlikayan dey is meremerik he ulaula. Hustu is kedsevuta zey te Lalag te Megbevayà; mepeseyluwen key ne metinevangen key te minsan hentei. Ed-ulinan key te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin; ibpeehè dey is gaǥew zey ziyà te langun;
47006007	ibpenurù dey is tutuu he Lalag te Megbevayà ne edtevangan key te ǥehem te Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi kayi te langun egketuusan he menge suluǥuen key te Megbevayà. Iyan kelasag dey wey lembitan dey is metazeng he ulaula.
47006008	Duen edtahud kenami ne zuen daan menge etew he kenè key zan edtehuzen. Duen edalig kenami ne zuen daan ed-ituk kenami. Duen egkaǥi he teruen key, iyan, kenà tarù is egkeǥiyen dey.
47006009	Duen egkaǥi he utew minus is pid-etawan dey, iyan, nasì dekelà is bentuǥan dey. Layun key ed-ed-edisi te kemetayen, iyan, idtuǥut pa te Megbevayà he kenè key pa mebpatey. Edsilutan key te Megbevayà wey key mepenurù, iyan, kenè key zin edhimetayan.
47006010	Mezakel is menge seeng dey, iyan, layun key egkelipey. Henduen be te utew key egkeayuayu, iyan, pinaaǥi kenami, edsepian te wazà pidtemanan is mezakel he menge etew. Henduen be te wazè dey azen, iyan, naangken dey is langun he ibeǥey te Megbevayà.
47006011	Sikiyu is menge suled ku ziyan te Kurintu, wazè dey ieles keniyu is isip dey. Layun kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa zey.
47006012	Kenè iyan minus is gehinawa zey keniyu, kekenà, iyan kew minus is gehinawa niw kenami.
47006013	Edlelaǥan ku en sikiyu he iring te menge anak ku. Kinahanglan he mahala key zaan diyan te ǥehinawa niw.
47006014	Kenè kew, menge suled, mebpekidsevaha te menge etew he kenà tumutuu su kenà egkehimu he egkesevaha is meupiya wey mezaat. Ne kenà daan egkehimu he ebpeked-amur is kerayag wey is merusirem.
47006015	Kenà daan egkeuyun si Kristu wey si Setanas ne kenà egkehimu he egkesevaha is tumutuu wey is kenà edtuu.
47006016	Ne is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he zutun ed-ezapa sikandin, kenà egkehimu he zutun daan ed-ezapa is menge tarù he ed-ezapen. Ne iring din ded daan sikitew is tumutuu su iyan kiw iring te valey he ed-ubpaan te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà. Su migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Edlumunan ku sikandan ne ebpekiduma a kandan ne egkehimu he iyan a edsimbahan dan he Megbevayà ne iyan sikandan menge ǥaked ku he etew.
47006017	Ne tenged kayi migkaǥi zaan is Megbevayà te, Suwayi niw is ebpemen-azap te kenà tutuu he ed-ezapen ne sivey kew kandan. Engkezi niw is minsan hengkey he meremerik he ulaula ne edewaten ku sikiyu.
47006018	Ne egkehimu a he Amey niw ne sikiyu, menge vahi wey maama, egkehimu kew he menge anak ku. Lalag heini te mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen te langun.
47007001	Ne ǥeina te iyan heini impenaad kenita te Megbevayà, ne edlumpiyuwen ta is menge ulaula ta su wey wazà minsan hengkey he meremerik he ulaula te lawa ta wey meremerik he isip ta. Ne ebpurungan ta is ulaula ta su wey meheǥeti is kebmetazeng ta pinaaǥi te layun ta kedtehuza kandin.
47007002	Mahala key keniyu ziyan te ǥehinawa niw su wazè dey salà te minsan hentei ziyan; wazà minsan hentei ziyan he nezeetan dey is kedtuu zin. Wazà minsan hentei ziyan he midlimbungan dey.
47007003	Kenà iyan igkeǥiya ku kayi su zuen igkesewayi ku keniyu. Nekaǥi ku he zaan he utew kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa zey. Te uuyag key pa wey minsan ke ebpatey key en ne kenè kew ǥihapun egkeawà dini te ǥehinawa zey.
47007004	Utew zekelà is kedsarig ku keniyu; dekelà layun is kebpekezalig ku keniyu. Ne tenged kayi minsan pa te mezakel is menge seeng dey, meupiya ǥihapun is ǥehinawa ku; utew zekelà is kelipey ku tenged keniyu.
47007005	Ne hein nekeuma key en dini te prubinsya he Mesidunya, wazè key ǥihapun meewai te menge seeng dey. Su nereǥenan key te mezakel he samuk. Mibpekidtebek kenami is menge kuntada zey ne ingkeipeng dey is menge tumutuu.
47007006	Iyan, is Megbevayà he metau he edlipey te egkengeseeng, midhimu zin he meupiya is gehinawa zey pinaaǥi te kebpekeuma ni Tito.
47007007	Ne kenà iyan dà ingkelipey zey is keǥalew zey ki Tito, kekenà, elin daan is tudtul zin he utew sikandin nelipey mehitenged keniyu. Netudtul zin he egkesuatan niw utew he mekepenumbaley a ziyan. Netudtul zin daan he ebuyù kew te pesaylu zini te kediey. Ne elin daan tudtul zin is: dekelà te ǥehinawa niw is kedtumana niw te egkesuatan ku. Ne tenged kayi utew zekelà is kelipey ku.
47007008	Su minsan ke pinaaǥi zutun te surat ku ne neseeng kew, neisip ku he meupiya utew te neveelan ku haazà. Hein aney, nekedsendit a su maan is neveelan ku is nehimu he ingkeseeng niw, iyan, petuluy zà naawà haazà is kegkeseeng niw.
47007009	Ne ǥuntaan nelipey ad, kenà tenged te neseeng kew, kekenà, tenged te mibpurungan niw is menge ulaula niw pinaaǥi zutun te kegkeseeng niw. Ne haazà is kegkeseeng niw, himan te Megbevayà umba inmeupiya niw haazà is surat dey.
47007010	Su is kegkeseeng he egemiten te Megbevayà, egkehimu he igkehalin te ǥehinawa te etew su wey melibri sikandin te silut. Ne kenà heini engayan he ibpekedsendit ta, iyan, is kegkeseeng te menge etew he kenà edsundan te Megbevayà, kenà igkehalin te ǥehinawa zan ne tenged kayi kenà sikandan egkeveǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
47007011	Iyan, sikiyu, susiya niw is meupiya he nehimu te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kegkeseeng niw. Su pinaaǥi kayi mid-iseg en is kebpurungi niw te ulaula niw. Dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa niw he metueni te menge etew he wazè dey igkesawey te menge ulaula niw. Utew niw ingkeepes haazà is mid-ulaula zuen te nekesalà. Utew niw ingkehandek haazà su kela ke mekeragkes kew ke edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne utew kew zaan mibulung kediey, ne mid-iseg is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù ku keniyu. Ne kenà dutun dà taman su segugunè niw midsiluti sikan is etew he mid-ulaula te mezaat. Ne ingkepeehè niw he wazà keniyu he salà dutun te neulaula zin.
47007012	Kenà iyan dà impesurati ku keniyu is mehitenged duen te etew he nekesalà wey kes neselaan din, kekenà, ebpeketistiǥus is Megbevayà he umba mibpesuratan ku sikiyu su wey niw meisipisip ke sengemenu key kemahal diyan te ǥehinawa niw.
47007013	Ne tenged kayi utew key nelipey. Ne kenà duen dà taman su nelipey key zaan tenged te nelipey si Tito. Ne iyan ingkelipey ni Tito is: pinaaǥi te menge ulaula niw he meupiya ne naawà is menge samuk diyà te isip din.
47007014	Indantal ku sikiyu ziyà te ki Tito ne wazà mebperis is kedentala ku keniyu. Layun tutuu is egkeǥiyen dey keniyu ne iring din ded daan, benar is migkaǥi ku ziyà te ki Tito mehitenged keniyu.
47007015	Umba ed-iseg kew ebmahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin su egketenuzan din is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù ku wey is kegkeǥalew niw kandin asal utew niw zutun ingkelenew kes kebpekeuma zin su nahandek kew ke zuen wazè niw metuman.
47007016	Ne tenged kayi, utew ad egkelipey su netuenan ku he ebpekepurung ad ebpekesarig keniyu.
47008001	Egkesuatan dey, menge suled, he metueni niw ke hengkey is nehimu tenged te ǥaǥew te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu ziyà te Mesidunya.
47008002	Minsan dutun te nekeantus dan te utew mepait he kemeresayan, ingkelipey zan utew ǥihapun ne tenged kayi minsan pa te utew zan egkengeayuayu, utew zekelà is ingkeveǥey zan he tavang te menge zuma zan he tumutuu.
47008003	Ebpeketistiǥus a he midhimu zan is taman te egkehimu zan, ne subra pa te egkehimu zan is imbeǥey zan he ebpuun te keputian te atey zan.
47008004	Su midhengyuan key zan he tuǥuti zey sikandan he mekeuǥup kenami te kebeǥey te tavang diyà te menge tumutuu ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya.
47008005	Wazè dey peebuta he egkehimu zan is iring dutun. Inhuna zan iveǥey is tivuuk he lawa zan wey ǥehinawa zan diyà te Megbevayà, ne zutun, tenged te edtumanen dan is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, mibpevayàbayè dan daan kenami.
47008006	Ne ǥeina te iyan si Tito nemuunà te vaal ziyan te keniyu te kebpenguwaa te idtavang niw ziyà te menge tumutuu he tigHudiya, midsembaǥan dey sikandin he ipelaus din en su wey kew zin metevangi te kedhimesaza kayi te ulaula mehitenged te ǥaǥew niw.
47008007	Netuenan ku he wazà kurang niw te langun he menge ketau wey ulaula he meupiya. Dekelà is kedtuu niw; metau kew he ebpenurù; nesavut niw is tutuu he tuluuwen; ebpetebtevangè kew layun; ne zekelà is gaǥew niw kenami. Tenged kayi egkesuatan dey he wazè niw zaan kurang kayi te kebpaahaa niw te ǥaǥew niw ziyà te menge tumutuu he tigHudiya.
47008008	Kenà heini kesuǥuan ku keniyu, kekenà, ibpesayud ku keniyu is dekelà he ǥustu te zuma he menge tumutuu te kedtavang te menge zuma zan. Umba ibpesayud ku heini su wey niw meiringi. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egketuenan ku ke tutuu ve is keniyu he ǥaǥew.
47008009	Netuenan ta ke hengkey is kezekelà te ǥaǥew kenita te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Su tenged te hizu zin kenita, minsan te utew sikandin sepian diyà te langit, midhimu zin he utew sikandin ayuayu pinaaǥi te kebpeetew zin wey kebpehimatey zin. Ne tenged kayi te kegkeayuayu zin egkehimu ki he utew sepian.
47008010	Iyan sambag ku keniyu is: himesaza niw haazà is kedtiǥuma niw te selapì he mibpuunan niw zutun te nehuna he tuig. Iyan kew nehuna te kedtiǥum te selapì wey metevangi is menge tigHudiya, ne kenà duen dà taman su heini he isip te kedtavang kandan, ne ziyan ebpuun te keniyu.
47008011	Ne tenged kayi peniguduwi niw wey niw mepasad sumalà is egkehimu niw. Kinahanglan he zekelà is gustu niw te kedhimesaza kayi te vaal iring te zekelà is gustu niw hein aney te kebpuuni kayi.
47008012	Su emun dekelà is gustu niw te kebeǥaya te tavang sumalà is egkehimu niw, iyan heini igkesuat te Megbevayà su kenè din ebuyuen kenita is kenè ta igkeveǥey, kekenà, iyan ebuyuen din haazà is egkehimu ta he ibeǥey kandin.
47008013	Kenà iyan dini te isip ku is merasey kew su wey metevangi is duma he edlised, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he metevangi niw is menge tumutuu he edlised guntaan geina te sepian kew ǥuntaan. Ne keuzemà, emun iyan kew edlised ne iyan sikandan sepian, egkehimu he edtevangan kew zan daan. Pinaaǥi kayi ebpeked-iiring kew ne wazà edlised he tumutuu.
47008015	Iring heini te insurat dengan he Lalag te Megbevayà su edhenduen heini te, Haazà is etew he nekekuwa te zekelà, wazà gihapun mesubrahi is nekuwa zin. Ne haazà is etew he zeisek is nekuwa zin, wazè din daan kurang.
47008016	Dekelà is kebpeselemati zey te Megbevayà su imbeǥey zin ki Tito is dekelà he ǥustu te kedtavang keniyu iring te kenami zaan he ǥustu.
47008017	Ne hein mid-insaan dey sikandin ke egkesuatan din he edtavang keniyu utew sikandin nesuat. Ne kenà duen dà taman su zaan sikandin egkesuat he edtavang keniyu. Ne tenged kayi te suat din ed-isip edlikù diyan te keniyu.
47008018	Ibpezuma zey kandin is sevaha kayi te menge suled tew he tenged te kedhaǥù din te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, utew sikandin telehuzen te menge tumutuu te langun he menge inged.
47008019	Ne kenà duen dà taman su nepilì sikandin te menge gurupu te menge tumutuu zini he iyan eduma kenami zutun te kedhated dey kayi te idtavang diyà te egkengeayuayu. Umba iyan key edhated su wey mevantug is Nengazen ne wey zaan metueni he utew key egkesuat he edtavang.
47008020	Umba egkesuatan dey he eduma heini is suled tew su wey key kenà medudahi su kela ke zuen egkaǥi he ebpenggemiten dey heini is dekelà he selapì he idhated dey.
47008021	Su egkesuatan dey he hustu is ebeelan dey sumalà is ked-isipa kenami te Megbevayà ne kenà duen dà taman, kekenà, maahà daan te menge etew he metazeng is menge vaal zey.
47008022	Ne zuen pa suled tew he ibpezuma zey engki Tito. Mibpurungan ku sikandin susiya ne utew zekelà is gustu zin te edtavang te menge tumutuu, iyan, tuwas pa zekelà is gustu zin te edtavang keniyu ǥeina te zekelà is kedsarig din keniyu.
47008023	Si Tito, iyan timbang ku te kedhimuwa ku te kedtavang keniyu. Ne heini is menge suled tew he zezuwa he eduma kandin pehendiyan, menge suǥù sikandan te menge ǥurupu te tumutuu zini. Pinaaǥi kandan egkevantug layun si Kristu ziyà te menge etew.
47008024	Ipeehè niw kandan is gaǥew niw su wey metueni te menge tumutuu ziyà te minsan hendei he inged he tutuu iyan is gaǥew niw te menge zuma niw, ne zutun egketuenan dan he tutuu is migkaǥi zey he metinevangen kew.
47009001	Wazà kinahanglan he idsurat ku keniyu ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan niw te kedtavang te menge tumutuu he egkengeayuayu
47009002	su netuenan ku he zekelà is gustu niw te kedtavang. Migkeǥiyan ku is menge tumutuu he tigMesidunya he layun dekelà is gustu niw te kedtavang. Migkaǥi ku kandan he puun pa zutun te nehuna he tuig daan naandam is gehinawa niw te menge tigGerisya te kebeǥey. Ne is kezekelan kandan, hein nezineg dan heini, mid-iseg is gustu zan te kedtavang daan.
47009003	Ne ǥuntaan edsuǥuen ku ziyan heini is menge suled tew su wey kew zan metevangi te kedtumana te migkaǥi ku mehitenged keniyu su kela ke mehimu he lalag dà duen ne zutun dà taman. Iyan, netuenan ku he edtumanen niw ǥihapun ne edteǥenahan niw is idtavang niw sumalà is migkaǥi ku.
47009004	Su emun kenè niw edtumanen ne emun eduma kediey pehendiyan is menge tigMesidunya ne egkeehè dan he wazè niw teǥenaha is idtavang niw, ne egkeeled key ne egkeeled kew zaan tenged te migkaǥi ku he naandam kew en.
47009005	Ne tenged kayi neisip ku he kinahanglan he ed-insaan ku heini is tetelu he menge suled tew ke egkehimu he edhuna zan kediey pehendiyan su wey kew zan metevangi te kedteǥenaha he zaan te idtavang he impenaad niw. Ne zutun egkehimu he egketeǥane en haazà dutun te kebpekeuma ku ne egketuenan te langun he umba ebeǥey kew, kenà tenged te ebpeǥesen kew, kekenà, tenged te ebpuun diyà te keputian te atey niw is kebeǥey niw.
47009006	Kenè niw lipati heini is sempità he emun deisek is ibpemula ta, deisek daan is egkeraǥun ta, ne emun dekelà is ibpemula ta, dekelà daan is egkeraǥun ta.
47009007	Kinahanglan he ed-isipen te kada sevaha ke hengkey is egkesuatan din he ibeǥey ne iyan ibeǥey zin. Kenè ta ibeǥey is kenè ta egkesuatan he ibeǥey, ne kenè ta zaan ibeǥey emun egkeisip ta he inteǥel kenita is kebeǥaya ta, su emun ebeǥey ki, kinahanglan he ebpuun te keputian te atey ta is kebeǥaya ta zutun ne iyan haazà utew egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
47009008	Ne egkehimu te Megbevayà he ibeǥey zin kenita is subra pa zutun te egkinehenglanen ta, su wey ta layun maazen is langun he menge kinahanglan ta wey zuen ta zaan subra he igketavang ta te zuma.
47009009	Ne zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Layun dekelà is ibeǥey te Megbevayà diyà te egkengeayuayu ne kenà egkelipatan te wazà pidtemanan is ketulanged din.
47009010	Ne is Megbevayà, iyan ebeǥey te venì diyà te ebpemula su wey zuen egkeenen. Is idtavang ta te zuma ne iring te ibpemula. Ibeǥey zin daan kenita is ibpemula, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is igketavang ta te zuma, su wey zuen dekelà he uzar ta he ebpuun te metazeng he ulaula ta ziyà te zuma.
47009011	Su edhimuwen din layun he kenè ki maalang-alang te selapì su wey ta meveǥayi is edlised. Ne umba, menge suled, mezakel is ebpeselamat te Megbevayà tenged te tavang he ibpeuwit niw kenami.
47009012	Ne heini is ibeǥey niw, kenà iyan dà pulus din is kegketavangi te menge tumutuu te Megbevayà, kekenà, pinaaǥi kayi utew mezakel he etew is ebpeselamat te Megbevayà.
47009013	Ne emun egketuenan te menge etew he utew kew metulanged, ebentuǥen dan is Megbevayà tenged te kedtumana niw te menge suǥù din wey tenged te mezesen he kedtuu niw te Meupiya he Tudtulanen su midtevangan niw sikandan ne midtevangan niw zaan is duma.
47009014	Ne zutun id-ampù kew zan, ne egkehimu he utew kew mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zan tenged te zekelà he ǥagew niw kandan he imbeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà.
47009015	Ne tenged kayi ebpeselematan ta is Megbevayà tenged te kebeǥaya zin kenita te Anak din he wazà minsan hengkey he ebpekerepeng te kemahal zin.
47010001	Duen egkaǥi he siak, si Pablo, telawen a emun diyan a te keniyu, iyan, memeǥarang kun is menge lalag ku keniyu emun edlelaǥan ku sikiyu pinaaǥi te surat. Iyan, guntaan, kenà meǥarang is menge lalag ku, kekenà, edhangyù a keniyu pinaaǥi te menayù he menge lalag iring te menayù wey veliǥeǥawen si Kristu.
47010002	Idhangyù ku keniyu he purungi niw is ulaula niw su wey kenà kinahanglan he mebmeǥarang is menge lalag ku emun diyan a te keniyu. Duen duma keniyu he egkaǥi he iring a te etew zà duen he kenà dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Ne hanu man su kayi te kedhendiyan ku te keniyu emun kenè dan ebpurungan is menge ulaula zan, ne egkeehè dan ke sengemenu keǥarang is menge lalag ku.
47010003	Tutuu iyan he etew key zà duen, iyan, is paaǥi te kedsukuli zey te mezaat, ne kenà ebpuun te isip te etew zà duen.
47010004	Su is menge ketezengan, he ke và dà gumaan, he idsukul zey te mezaat, ne kenà ebpuun te etew, kekenà, mekeǥeǥehem utew su ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà. Ne heini is menge ketezengan, kenà egkesukulan te minsan hengkey he tarù he ketezengan he igkuntada te Megbavayà minsan ke utew melig-en.
47010005	Ne iyan heini egemiten dey te kedeeǥa te menge tarù he ketezengan te menge mepedeliǥen he etew he kenà egkesuat he edtuu te ibpesavut te Megbevayà. Ne minsan is ked-isipa zan te tarù, egkehimu he ed-ilisan dey su wey zan human meisip is tutuu ne pinaaǥi kayi ebpemineǥen dan is menge suǥù ni Kristu.
47010006	Ne emun ibpeehè niw en he metinumanen kew te menge suǥù ni Kristu, ne zutun edsilutan dey is minsan hentei pa he tumutuu ziyan he kenè pa egkesuat he ebpemineg te menge suǥù din.
47010007	Purungi niw isipa is nesavut niw en su zuen menge zuma niw he kunaan dan ke iyan dan dà menge hustu he suluǥuen ni Kristu. Kinahanglan he mesavut dan he sikami, hustu key zaan he menge suluǥuen ni Kristu.
47010008	Kenè en buwa kinahanglan he egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he zuen kebayàbayà ku keniyu he imbeǥey kedì te Megbevayà. Iyan, ke henduen be te utew subra is idantal ku, kenè ku igkeeled heini su wazè din iyan iveǥaya kayi te kebayàbayà dini te kediey su wey ku mezezeeti is kedtuu niw, kekenà, imbeǥey zin kediey su wey ku melig-eni is kedtuu niw.
47010009	Kenè ku egkesuatan he ibpelihandek ku keniyu is menge surat ku,
47010010	iyan, duen egkaǥi he siak si Pablo, utew a mevurut he edawey keniyu emun ebpekidlalag a keniyu pinaaǥi te surat, iyan, emun diyan a te keniyu, telawen e kun ne kenè e kun metau he egkaǥi.
47010011	Is etew he egkaǥi te iring kayi, kinahanglan he sevuta zin he is egkeǥiyen dey pinaaǥi te surat emun kenè key ziyan te keniyu, ne iyan ded ed-ul-ulahan dey emun ebpekeuma key ziyan.
47010012	Telawen key iyan te ked-iring te menge ulaula te menge zuma he etew ziyan he menge mepedeliǥen. Kunaan dan ke iyan sikandan metau egkaǥi ke hengkey is meupiya he ulaula. Utew zan tulebung! Su emun ed-iringan te menge etew is kandan he ulaula egkeǥiyen dan he utew meupiya. Iyan, ke kenà sikandan ed-iringan te menge etew egkeǥiyen dan he sayep haazà is kenà ed-iring.
47010013	Ne sikami, kenà subra is kedantal zey su iyan dey zà idantal haazà is nehimu zey te edtuman he insuǥù kenami te Megbevayà. Ne ragkes kayi is menge vaal zey hein diyan key te keniyu.
47010014	Kenà egkehimu he subra is kegemita zey te keǥehem dey emun edsembaǥan dey sikiyu. Kenè dey sikiyu pezem egkeveyveyaan ke wazè dey sikiyu mepenudtuli zengan, iyan, iyan key nehuna he nekeuma ziyan he ebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged ki Kristu.
47010015	Kenè dey idantal is menge vaal te zuma he etew ziyà te menge inged he zutun wazè key suǥua te Megbevayà. Iyan, geina te neragkes kew kayi te mibpeveelan kenami te Megbevayà, egkesuatan dey he emun ed-iseg en is kedtuu niw ne edtevangan key keniyu zutun te menge vaal zey ziyan te inged niw.
47010016	Ne pinaaǥi kayi egkehimu he idsangyew zey is Meupiya he Tudtulanen ziyà te menge meziyù he inged he ziyan dapit te keniyu. Su kenè dey egkesuatan he idantal zey is mibeelan te zuma he etew zutun te menge inged he wazè key zutun suǥua te Megbevayà.
47010017	Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ke zuen etew he egkesuat he edantal, kinahanglan he iyan dà idantal zin is nengehimu te Nengazen.
47010018	Su emun edeliǥen ta is kenita he menge vaal, kenà heini egkesuatan te Megbevayà, iyan, emun duen igkezeliǥi kenita te Megbevayà iyan heini egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
47011001	Pekelalaglalag kew he entusa niw is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu minsan ke henduen be te tulebung a.
47011002	Su insavuk te Megbevayà kayi te kediey is dekelà he suat he kenè kew medsuwey te Nengazen. Iring kew te raǥa he nekeǥunan, iyan, iyan si Kristu ingkaǥun ku keniyu. Ne egkesuatan ku he wazà duma he ebpekeesawa keniyu.
47011003	Egkeipeng a keniyu su kela ke meengkezi niw is kebpurungi niw kedtumana te menge suǥù ni Kristu su kela ke mesahug is kedtuu niw te selakew he edtuuwen. Kela ke meiringi niw si Ibà dengan su mid-akalan sikandin te teruen he uled he iyan si Setanas.
47011004	Umba egkeipeng a su ke zuen ebpekeuma ziyan he selakew is ibpesavut dan mehitenged ki Jesus, ne selakew is mulin-ulin he ibpenurù dan, ne kenè dan iyan ibpesavut is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut dey, kekenà, selakew is ibpenurù dan, ne ed-entusen niw mulà is kandan he kebpenurù ne kenà duen dà taman su utew niw egkesuati te ebpemineg.
47011005	Ne heini is menge uvag kun lavew he epustul ni Kristu, kunaan dan ke utew zan lavew, iyan, netuenan ku he wazè e zan melevawi
47011006	su minsan ke kenà a metau he egkaǥi netuenan ku mulà ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen. Ne iyan heini impesavut dey keniyu zengan te minsan keenu he timpu wey te minsan hengkey he paaǥi.
47011007	Hein impesavut ku ziyan te keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, wazà a mebpesuhul keniyu te minsan sengesintabus dà. Ne iyan benar is: mibpekeminus ku en is pid-etawan ku su wey ku sikiyu ikepelavew. Sayep ku ve heeyan?
47011008	Dutun te kebpenurua ku keniyu ne iyan midsuhul kedì is menge tumutuu ziyà te zuma pa he menge inged. Henduen be te midtekawan ku sikandan wey ku sikiyu iyan metevangi.
47011009	Ne hein diyan a te keniyu ke zuen kinahanglan ku he selapì, wazè ku vuyua ziyan te keniyu su is menge suled tew he ebpuun diyà te prubinsya he Mesidunya, imbeǥey zan kedì is minsan hengkey he egkinehenglanen ku. Sikiyu is tigGerisya, wazè ku pa sikiyu vuyui te igkeuyag ku, ne kenà daan egkehimu he ebuyù a ziyan te keniyu te minsan keenu he timpu.
47011010	Ne heini is idantal ku, kenà egkehimu he egkehalin te minsan keenu he timpu su kenà a edawat te selapì te minsan hentei he ziyan te tivuuk he prubinsya he Gerisya. Tutuu heini iring te netuenan ku he tutuu is impesavut ni Kristu.
47011011	Kunaan niw vuwa ke umba egkeǥiyen ku he kenà a ebuyù diyan te keniyu su wazà gehinawa ku keniyu, iyan, utew kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku. Netuenan te Megbevayà he mahal kew zini te ǥehinawa ku.
47011012	Kenè ku edlekaan heini is lalag ku he kenè ku kebuyù diyan su wey haazà is menge uvag kun lavew he epustul ni Kristu, kenè dan mekekaǥi he iring te kenami is menge paaǥi zan te kebaal.
47011013	Kenà sikandan tutuu he menge epustul ni Kristu, kekenà, tarù sikandan he menge suluǥuen ni Kristu. Edterteruan kew zan pinaaǥi te menge vaal zan ne egkeǥiyen dan he tutuu sikandan he menge epustul ni Kristu.
47011014	Ne kenè ku heini igkeinuinu su minsan si Setanas, egkehimu zin is dagwey zin he iring te utew merayag he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebpuun te langit.
47011015	Umba, kenè ki egkeinuinu ke egkehimu zaan is menge suluǥuen ni Setanas he iring te menge metazeng he suluǥuen te Megbevayà. Iyan, keuzemà edsilutan sikandan sumalà is menge mezaat he vaal zan.
47011016	Edsublien ku te egkaǥi he kinahanglan he kenà isipa te minsan hentei keniyu he tulebung a tenged te menge lalag ku keniyu. Iyan, minsan ke ed-isipen niw he tulebung a, entusa niw te ebpemineg su wey a mekezantal te kenà utew egkeuǥet.
47011017	Heini is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, ne kenà iyan ibpekaǥi kedì te Nengazen, su iring a te tulebung is edantal.
47011018	Ne ǥeina te zuen mezakel he idantal zan is menge ulaula zan dini te kelibutan egkehimu vuwa taman te meǥaan dà ke idantal ku zaan is kedì.
47011019	Ne ǥeina te menge uluwanen kew he etew, utew kew metau he ed-antus te menge lalag te tulebung diyà te keniyu.
47011020	Su ke zuen minsan hentei he ebmandarmandar keniyu wey ke zuen ed-aǥew te menge azen niw wey ke zuen edlimbung keniyu wey ke edlupiǥen kew zan wey ke ebuǥelen kew zan ne ed-entusen niw.
47011021	Utew zan mevurut, iyan, sikami, telawen key ne egkeeled a su haazà is menge ulaula zan keniyu he kunaan niw ke utew meupiya, wazè dey meulaula ziyan te keniyu. Ne ǥeina te wazè dan en kegkehandek te edantal ne kenà a zaan egkehandek he edantal minsan ke ebpekeiring a te tulebung.
47011022	Haazà he menge etew, egkeǥiyen dan he menge pinilì sikandan te Megbevayà su menge Hudiyu zan, menge kevuwazan ni Israyil wey menge kevuwazan te kepuun ni Israyil he si Abraham. Ne siak daan, Hudiyu a he kevuwazan daan ni Israyil wey ni Abraham.
47011023	Netuenan ku he henduen a te ebuneǥen kayi te menge lalag ku, iyan, kenà egkesabpeng is bèbè ku kayi te egkeǥiyen ku. Egkeǥiyen dan he menge suluǥuen sikandan ni Kristu. Siak, lavew e pa he metinumanen he suluǥuen ni Kristu. Utew memereǥen is ebpeveelan din kediey. Lelayun ad egkepirisu ne sikandan, kenà layun. Lelayun ad ebuǥela te menge etew he kuntada te Megbevayà, kenà te sikandan. Mezakel en is nengeeǥiyan ku he edhimetayan a pezem, kenà te sikandan.
47011024	Kelelima e en buǥela te menge Hudiyu te menge ketluan wey siyew he lagkut.
47011025	Ketetelu ad buǥela pinaaǥi te menge tuked. Midtuleng a te vatu te menge etew su edhimetayan e zan pezem. Ketetelu en daan melavu is barku he mid-untuzan ku ne zuen timpu he sengekezukileman wey sengeandew ziyà a te lawed te zaǥat is nekeǥeǥentungan dà.
47011026	Ne zutun te menge kedhipanew ku ne nengeeǥiyan ku is mezakel he menge kemereǥenan tenged te kedalem te wahig, wey tenged te menge tulisan, wey tenged te menge kuntada ku he menge zuma ku he Hudiyu wey menge kenà Hudiyu. Mezakel is menge hitavù kediey ziyà te menge inged wey ziyà te wazà meǥinged wey ziyà te zaǥat wey pinaaǥi te menge tarù he tumutuu.
47011027	Midhaǥù a is edterebahu; layun a egkepurang; layun a egkevitil; ne layun a egkemezahi. Layun a kurang te egkeenen wey layun a egkealang-alang te egkeubpaan wey ugelingen.
47011028	Ne kenà duen dà taman su andew-andew egkereǥenan a te kedumelaha ku te langun he menge gurupu te menge tumutuu ziyà te minsan hendei.
47011029	Su ke zuen tumutuu he edlised su ebmeǥuyà is kedtuu zin, ne edlised a zaan su egkeipeng a kandin. Ke zuen nepenulayan ne nekesalà, ne haazà is etew he nekepenuley kandin, utew ku igkeepes.
47011030	Kenè ku egkesuatan he edantal a, iyan, emun kinahanglan he ibpezantal a, idantal ku is menge kemeresayan he nengeeǥiyan ku su pinaaǥi kayi egketuenan niw he zekelà is kurang ku te ketau.
47011031	Is Megbevayà wey Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, deliǥa sikandin te wazà pidtemanan. Netuenan din he kenà tarù heini is egkeǥiyen ku.
47011032	Dengan, hein diyà a te inged he Demasku, is gubirnedur he intezù ni Hadì Eritas, midsuǥù din is menge sundaru he ventayi zan is pultahan he idselang dutun te kutà te inged su wey e zan mezakep ke egawas a zutun.
47011033	Iyan, duen menge etew he midtavang kediey ne in-ahuk e zan te zekelà he vinevey ne midheluǥan e zan diyà te sulawà he liyu te metikang he elavat he kutà dutun te inged ne nekeǥawas a zutun.
47012001	Minsan pa te wazà pulus te kedantal ku, edantal e zed gihapun. Ne ǥuntaan egkeǥiyen ku keniyu is impezayag wey is impaahà kedì te Nengazen.
47012002	Dengan, duen tumutuu he nekilala ku he mibpengelinteuwan he mekepenumbaley sikandin diyà te utew metikang he langit he ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà. Sepulù en wey heepat he tuig heini is kegkehitavù kayi. Wazè ku metueni ke nekehendiyè be is lawa zin wey ke impeehè dè be heini kandin te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te teǥeinep; iyan dà nesayud kayi is Megbevayà.
47012003	Iyan dà netuenan ku is: diyà sikandin mekeseled te utew mekempet he inged te Megbevayà ne edsublien ku te egkaǥi he wazè ku metueni ke nekehendiyè be is lawa zin wey ke impeehè dà heini kandin te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te teǥeinep; iyan dà nesayud is Megbevayà.
47012004	Ne zutun te kebpenumbaley zin diyà te langit duen nezineg din he kenà egkekaǥi pinaaǥi te kelibutanen he lalag ne kenà daan idtuǥut he egkeǥiyen te etew zà duen.
47012005	Ne egkehimu he idantal ku heini is nehitavù kandin, iyan, kenè ku iyan idantal is menge ketau ku, kekenà, iyan ku idantal haazà is ebpekepaahà te kurang ku te ketau.
47012006	Ne penenglitan ke egkesuatan ku he edantal a, kenà egkehimu he egkeǥiyen niw he wazà pulus te zantal ku su tutuu is idantal ku, iyan, kenà a edantal su kenè ku egkesuatan he isipa a te menge etew he utew lavew. Meupiya ke zutun dà ebpuun is ked-isipa zan kedì te menge ulaula ku he neehè dan wey menge penurù ku he nezineg dan.
47012007	Mibeǥayan a te Megbevayà te utew merasey he zaru su wey ku kenà ikezantal is utew meupiya he nengeehè ku ziyà te langit. Ne heini is daru, ne egemiten ni Setanas he idrasey kedì, ne pinaaǥi kayi kenà a ebpekepelavew.
47012008	Ketetelu ku en iampù diyà te Megbevayà he iawè din,
47012009	iyan, iyan tavak din kediey is, Edtevangan ku sikew wey nu maantus ne hustu en. Su zekelà is egkehimu te ǥehem ku ziyan te kenikew emun wazè nu en egkehimu, ke sikandin. Ne tenged kayi utew ku egkesuati he idantal ku is kurang ku te ketau su wey a melig-eni te ǥehem ni Kristu.
47012010	Ne meupiya en utew te ǥehinawa ku is kurang ku te ketau, is kedsumpelita wey is pesipala kediey te menge etew, wey is menge kemereǥenan wey is kemeresayan tenged te kedtuu ku ki Kristu. Su netuenan ku he emun wazè en kediey he ketau, dekelà is ibeǥey kediey ni Kristu he ketau.
47012011	Henduen a te tulebung he etew su edantal a, iyan, neteǥel a keniyu su iyan kew pezem ebeǥey te menge ketezengan ku he idtavak keniyan te menge uvag kun epustul ni Kristu. Ne minsan pa te wazà kediey he ketau wazà a ǥihapun melevawi kayi te uvag menge utew lavew he kenà tutuu he epustul ni Kristu.
47012012	Ne hein diyan a te keniyu impeehè ku keniyu he tutuu a he epustul ni Kristu su minsan nereǥenan a, mid-antus a su wey ku ikepaahà is menge singyal wey menge egkengein-inuwan he iyan tuus te tutuu he epustul.
47012013	Is kedtavang ku keniyu ne iring ded te kedtavang ku te menge tumutuu ziyà te zuma he menge inged. Asal kela ke kunaan niw ke kenè ku idtavang keniyu is kenè ku keniyu kebuyui te selapì. Emun nekesalà a keniyu pinaaǥi kayi peseyluwa a keniyu.
47012014	Ed-endaman ku en is kedhendiyan ku ne iketelu en heini is kebpenumbaley ku ziyan te keniyu. Ne iring ded te nehuna, kenà egkehimu he ebuyù a keniyu te selapì. Kenè ku egkesuatan is selapì niw, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he mahala a keniyu ziyà te ǥehinawa niw. Nehimu a he amey niw su pinaaǥi kedì neketuu kew te Megbevayà. Ne kenà egkehimu he ebuyuan is menge vatà te amey zan, kekenà, iyan ebuyù is menge vatà.
47012015	Egkelipey a utew ke igkeveǥey ku is menge azen ku wey is desen ku wey ku sikiyu metevangi. Iyan, minsan pa te mahal kew zini te ǥehinawa ku henduen be te kenà a mulà mahal ziyan te ǥehinawa niw.
47012016	Duen duma keniyu he ke sikandan te, Tutuu iyan he wazà si Pablo mebuyù te selapì, iyan, duen paaǥi zin he meeles wey kiw zin melimbungi.
47012017	Ne emun iyan heeyan egkeisip niw, ipetueni niw kedì ke hengkey he paaǥi is kegkelimbungi ku keniyu. Duen be nekuwa ku zutun te kedsuǥua ku te menge zuma ku ziyan te keniyu? Nelimbungan kew zan be?
47012018	Midhengyuan ku si Tito he medhendiyan te keniyu, ne impezuma ku zaan kandin is sevaha te menge suled tew. Midlimbungan kew zan be? Wazè niw egkekaǥi he iring kayi, su si Tito wey siak ne neked-iring is paaǥi zey wey ed-ul-ulahan dey su pudu memetazeng.
47012019	Kunaan niw vuwa ke pinaaǥi kayi te egkeǥiyen ku ibpesavut ku keniyu he wazè dey menge sayep, iyan, kenà iyan heeyan tuyù ku. Su ebpeketistiǥus is Megbevayà he heini is migkaǥi ku keniyu, ne iyan hustu he egkeǥiyen tenged te kebpekidsevaha ku ki Kristu. Ne, minahal ku he menge suled, insurat ku heini is langun, su wey meheǥet is kedtuu niw.
47012020	Egkesamuk is gehinawa ku su kela ke zutun te kebpekeuma ku ziyan ne iyan ku egkeahà diyan te keniyu is menge ulaula he kenè ku egkesuatan. Ne emun iyan haazà ne zuen ed-ul-ulahan ku zutun he kenè niw zaan egkesuatan su kinahanglan he edsewayen ku is keniyu he ulaula. Su kela ke zuen ebpekigkuntada ziyan te menge zuma zin, kela ke zuen egkesina, duen petuluy egkepauk, wey leǥezen, kela ke zuen diyan ebpenemperasà wey edsulà te zuma zin, kela ke zuen bereituk. Kela ke zuen diyan te keniyu gelbuwen, wey kela ke wazè niw kebpekid-uyun te menge tumutuu.
47012021	Egkesemukan a su kela ke zutun te kebpekeuma ku ziyan ne igkeeled ku sikiyu ziyà te Megbevayà ne kela ke utew a egkeseeng tenged te mezakel he netuenan ku zengan he nekevaal te mezaat ne wazè dan pa engkezi is menge mahawag he ulaula zan iring te kedhilavet te kenè dan esawa wey is kedtumana zan te mezaat he kebayè dan.
47013001	Iketelu en heini te kebpenumbaley ku ziyan. Ke zuen etew he ebpehusey kedì ne zuen idsumbunga zin te zuma zin he tumutuu, kinahanglan he ebentayan ta is suǥù diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ke zuen idsumbunga niw te zuma niw kinahanglan he edtistiǥusan te menge tetelu ne emun kenà ne menge zezuwa he etew.
47013002	Dutun te ikezuwa he kebpenumbelayi ku keniyu, sikiyu is memezaat is ulaula zengan, migkaǥi ku keniyu he emun kenè niw ed-engkezan haazà is memezaat he ulaula niw ne edsilutan ku sikiyu emun ebpekelikù a. Ne ed-umanan ku egkeǥiya ǥuntaan diyan te keniyu wey ziyà te minsan hentei pa he ed-ulaula te mezaat. Ke ebpekeuma a, wazà minsan hentei he ed-ulaula te mezaat he ebpekelikey te kedsiluti ku kandin.
47013003	Dutun, ne egkevenaran kew human he is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, iyan is impekaǥi kediey ni Kristu. Ne kenà sikandin telawen, kekenà, emun duen ed-ul-ulahan din keniyu dekelà is gehem din he ibpeehè din keniyu.
47013004	Su minsan ke henduen be te wazà egkehimu ni Kristu zutun te kedrensanga kandin diyà te krus, nevanhew zed sikandin ne zuen din en beǥu en he untung pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Megbevayà. Ne sikami zaan, henduen be te wazè dey egkehimu su layun key zaan ebpekeantus te kemeresayan, iyan, pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Megbevayà he edtavang kenami, duen dey zaan beǥu en he untung ne ebpeketavang key pa keniyu.
47013005	Susiya niw is gehinawa niw wey niw metueni ke tutuu ve is kedtuu niw ki Kristu. Wazè niw ve metueni he midlumunan kew ni Kristu? Ne emun wazà, ne tarù is kedtuu niw ne wazè kew mezawat ni Kristu.
47013006	Egkesuatan ku he metueni niw he tutuu key iyan he menge epustul ni Kristu.
47013007	Id-ampù dey ziyà te Megbevayà he wazà ulaula niw he mezaat. Ne kenè dey iyan id-empua keniyu su wey metueni te menge etew he edtumanen niw is impenurù dey keniyu su maambe ke kenè niw ed-isipen he epustul key ni Kristu, asal, ed-ul-ulahan niw is hustu.
47013008	Su emun hustu is ed-ul-ulahan niw, sikami is epustul, kenà egkehimu he ibpeehè dey is keǥehem dey keniyu su wey zey zà ibpaahà is keǥehem dey ke edsupaken niw is hustu he ulaula.
47013009	Egkelipey ad emun wazè niw supak, minsan ke henduen te wazè dey keǥehem. Ne kenà duen dà taman su id-ampù dey he mepurung meheǥet is ked-ul-ulaha niw te hustu.
47013010	Umba ebpesuratan ku sikiyu te zini e pa te meziyù su ke ebpekeuma a ziyan kenè en kinahanglan he meǥamit ku is keǥehem ku te epustul te kedsilut. Imbeǥey kedì te Megbevayà heini is keǥehem. Kenà iyan imbeǥaya zin kayi te keǥehem su wey maawà is upakat niw te tumutuu, kekenà, wey meheǥet is upakat niw.
47013011	Menge suled, iyan dà heini menge lalag ku keniyu; berakat he mebmelipayen kew. Purungi niw is menge ulaula niw; tumana niw is menge sambag ku keniyu. Kinahanglan he mesevaha is gehinawa niw ne mebmelinawen is ked-ubpè niw. Su emun ebeelan niw heini, is Megbevayà he iyan puunà te ǥaǥew wey kelinew, layun eduma keniyu.
47013012	Mebpelimlimuey kew he iyan tuus he teltelesuled kew tenged te kedtuu niw.
47013013	Ebpengemusta keniyu is langun he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà dini.
47013014	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey verakat he ipeehè keniyu te Megbevayà he mahal kew ziyà te ǥehinawa zin wey verakat daan he meheǥet is upakat niw te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Iyan a si Pablo.
48001001	Siak si Pablo is midsurat kayi. Ibpeuwit ku heini ziyan te keniyu te langun he menge tumutuu ziyan te menge inged te tivuuk he prubinsya he Gelasya. Siak wey is langun he menge tumutuu he menge zuma ku zini, ebpengemusta keniyu. Epustul a, iyan, wazà a ǥerari he epustul te etew zà duen, ne kenà daan pinaaǥi te etew zà duen is kedsuǥua kedì, kekenà, migeraran a he epustul ni Jesu Kristu wey te Amey tew he Megbevayà he mibanhew ki Jesus, ne iyan sikandan midsuǥù kedì.
48001003	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus wey veǥayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
48001004	Si Kristu, imbelavag din is untung din su wey mepalis is menge salè tew su wey kiw melibri, ne kenè tew meiringi is menge etew he ed-ulaula te mezaat te ǥuntaan he timpu kayi te kelibutan. Umba mibeelan heini ni Kristu su edtumanen din is egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà.
48001005	Berakat he zeliǥa is Megbevayà te wazà pidtemanan
48001006	Utew ku sikiyu igkeinuinu su wazè en utew meuǥet ne henduen be te nahalin en is kedtuu niw, ne is Megbevayà he iyan mibpetuu keniyu pinaaǥi te ǥaǥew ni Kristu, ed-iniyuǥan niw ne edtuuwan niw is selakew he tuluuwen he egngezanan daan te menge etew he Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
48001007	Iyan, kenà egkehimu he zuen selakew pa he tuluuwen he egngezanan te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Egkeǥiyen ku heini su zuen menge etew ziyan he ebpenurù te tarù, ne pinaaǥi kayi egkesemukan is isip niw su edhelinen dan te tarù is Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged ki Kristu.
48001008	Iyan, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke zuen minsan hentei, minsan ke sikami, wey minsan ke velinsuǥuen he ebpuun te langit, ne zuen ibpesavut din keniyu he egkeǥiyen din he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iyan, selakew, ne kenà iyan heini is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut dey keniyu, ne verakat he meimpirnu sikandin.
48001009	Daan dey en keniyu heini migkaǥi, iyan, ed-umanan ku egkeǥiya ǥuntaan he ke zuen ibpesavut te minsan hentei he egkeǥiyen din he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iyan, kenà iyan is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut dey keniyu, ne verakat he meimpirnu sikandin.
48001010	Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan netaǥù te ǥehinawa ku is: egkesuat a he zeliǥa a te menge etew. Iyan, kenà iyan heini netaǥù te ǥehinawa ku, kekenà, iyan is kebpenunuata ku te Megbevayà. Kunaan niw vuwa zaan ke egkesuatan ku he ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa te menge etew is menge ulaula ku, iyan, kenà daan iyan egkesuatan ku su emun iyan egkesuatan ku, kenà egkehimu he suluǥuen a ni Kristu.
48001011	Egkesuatan ku, menge suled, he mesavut niw he heini is migngezanan he Meupiya he Tudtulanen he impesavut ku keniyu ne kenà ebpuun te etew zà duen
48001012	su wazà keǥiya kediey te minsan hentei he etew ne wazà daan ipenurù kediey te etew, kekenà, impinted kediey ni Jesu Kristu.
48001013	Nezineg niw is daan he menge ulaula ku zengan te kemulu ku pa kebenteyani te tuluuwen te menge zuma ku he Hudiyu. Is langun he menge tumutuu ki Jesus, mibpesipelahan ku su ebpeǥesen ku pezem sikandan he meengkezi zan is kedtuu zan.
48001014	Is menge zuma ku he menge Hudiyu he serenganè ku te penuiǥen, wazà nekerepeng kedì te kebenteyani ku te menge tuluuwen dey te menge Hudiyu. Ne wazà kandan kedì nekerepeng te kebenteyani te imbilinbilin he menge vetasan te ǥinepuan dey.
48001015	Ne minsan pa zutun, ingkeǥaǥew a te Megbevayà ne mibpilì e zin he suluǥuen din te wazè e pa ianak ne nehimu zin he meketuu a kandin.
48001016	Ne hein neisip din he ibpekilala zin en kediey is Anak din he si Jesus su wey ku ikepenudtul is keaǥi ni Jesus diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, wazà a mebpepenurù te minsan hentei he etew;
48001017	ne wazà a zaan medhendiyà te inged he Hiruselim su wey ku mesampit kes nengehuna he epustul ni Jesu Kristu, kekenà, midhendiyà a te prubinsya he Erabya ne zutun, midlikù a ziyà te inged he Demasku.
48001018	Ne tetelu pa zutun he tuig ne human a medhendiyà te inged he Hiruselim wey a mekepenumbaley ziyà te ki Pedro ne ziyà a te kandin taman dà te zezuwa he simana.
48001019	Ne neehè ku zaan dutun si Santiago, sikan is hazi te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, ne wazà duma he epustul he neehè ku zutun, iyan dà sikandan is dezuwa.
48001020	Tutuu heini is edtudtulen ku keniyu. Netuenan te Megbevayà he kenà tarù.
48001021	Ne zutun mibeyaan ku is prubinsya he Sirya wey Silisya.
48001022	Ne wazè e pa zutun mekilala te menge gurupu te menge tumutuu ki Jesus he ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya.
48001023	Netudtulan dà sikandan te menge etew he siak is ebpendakep te menge tumutuu ki Jesus dutun te nengehuna he andew, ne ǥuntaan idsangyew ku en is tinuuwan he iyan ibpendekepa ku kandan su wey zan meewai.
48001024	Ne tenged dutun midalig dan is Megbevayà tenged te neketuu a ki Jesus.
48002001	Ne sepulù wey heepat pa he tuig dutun ne human a medlikù diyà te Hiruselim. Mibpezumehè key ki Bernabe ne miduma ku zaan si Tito.
48002002	Umba midhendiyà a su impinted kedì te Megbevayà haazà is kedhendiyè ku. Ne kebpekeuma zey zutun ne midtiǥum is menge egalen te menge tumutuu he iyan dan dà ne impesavut ku kandan ke hengkey is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ibpenurù ku ziyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Egkesuatan ku zutun he kenà maawà is pulus te nengeveelan ku en wey is kemulu ku pa ebeeli.
48002003	Iyan, nesuatan dan ded is baal ku su si Tito, is duma ku, minsan te kenà sikandin Hudiyu, wazè dan iteǥel is kedsirkunsidar kandin sumalà is insuǥù ni Moises.
48002004	Iyan, duen menge etew he kenà tutuu he menge tumutuu te tutuu he tuluuwen he midtampu kenami. Egkesuatan dan dutun he sirkunsidara si Tito. Umba midtampu zan he id-eles dan he kenè dan tutuu he tumutuu su wey zan maahà ke edtumanen tew is menge suǥù he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Su egkesuatan dan he meiring kiw te uripen pinaaǥi te kedtuman te kesuǥuan minsan te nelibri kiw en ni Jesu Kristu ne wazè en kinahanglan he ebenteyanan tew pa is kesuǥuan.
48002005	Ne wazè dey ituǥut he meveyveyai key zan te minsan hengkey he paaǥi su wey kenà meumani te tarù is tutuu he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ne kenà egkezeetan is kedtuu niw.
48002006	Ne zutun, minsan sikan is menge etew ziyà te Hiruselim he henduen be te menge egalen te tumutuu, wazè dan ingkepenurù kediey he idheǥet te ibpenurù ku. Umba egkeǥiyen ku he henduen dan te menge egalen su wazà bali ziyà te Megbevayà te igerar kenita te menge etew. Wazà id-uman dan te kediey he ibpenurù, kekenà, nesavut dan dutun he insarig kediey te Megbevayà is kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu iring te insarig din daan ki Pedro is kedsengyawa kayi ziyà te menge Hudiyu.
48002008	Su is Megbevayà, mid-ulinan din si Pedro wey mehimu sikandin he epustul he iyan ebpenudtul ziyà te menge Hudiyu, ne iring din ded, mid-ulinan e zin daan wey a mehimu he epustul he iyan suǥù din diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu.
48002009	Ne si Santiago, si Pedro, wey si Juan, haazà is menge egalen dutun, hein nesavut dan he insarig kediey te Megbevayà heini is baal ku, mibpekigkumusta zan kenami ki Bernabe he tuus te teltelezuma key pudu is edtuman te ebpeveelan te Megbevayà. Neuyunan dey he iyan key ebpenudtul ziyà te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu ne iyan dan ebpenudtul ziyà te menge Hudiyu.
48002010	Iyan dan dà intelaan kenami is kedtevangi zey te menge tumutuu he egkengeayuayu ziyà te Hiruselim, iyan, daan ku en heini midheǥet dini te ǥehinawa ku.
48002011	Ne malù pa neuǥet dutun nekeuma si Pedro ziyà te kenami, te ziyè key te inged he Entiyukya. Ne hein aney sikandin mekeuma, hustu is mid-ulaula zin su mid-amur he egkaan te menge tumutuu he kenà menge Hudiyu. Iyan, hein nekeuma is menge tumutuu he Hudiyu he midsuǥù ni Santiago, midlikayan din he mekekaan duma te kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne midsawey ku sikandin su utew keladu he kenà hustu is ed-ul-ulahan din. Umba midlikayan din su nahandek sikandin su kela ke ikesewayi kandin haazà is ulaula zin dutun te menge tumutuu he Hudiyu he egkaǥi he kinahanglan he ebpesirkunsidar is menge tumutuu he kenà menge Hudiyu.
48002013	Ne iring din ded daan dutun is mid-ulaula te zuma he menge tumutuu he Hudiyu su midlikey zan daan, ne minsan si Bernabe, ne neuwit daan dutun.
48002014	Ne hein nesavut ku he ed-ul-ulahan dan is supak te tutuu he impenurù te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, migkeǥiyan ku si Pedro ziyà te etuvangan te langun kandan, ke siak te, Sikew, Pedro, sikan is menge tumutuu he kenè tew zuma he Hudiyu, maan is ibpetuman nu kandan is kesuǥuan tew te menge Hudiyu? Su minsan Hudiyu ka, mid-engkezan nu en is kedtumana nu kayi he kesuǥuan, ke siak.
48002015	Ne impelaus ku haazà is lalag ku te, Sikita is etew he in-anak he Hudiyu, ne kenè ki iring te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu he egngezanan ta he menge mesinupaken.
48002016	Ne minsan pa zutun, netuenan ta he kenè ki egkeisip he metazeng te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtumana ta te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, kekenà, pinaaǥi zà te kedsarig ta ki Jesu Kristu. Sikita is Hudiyu, nekesarig ki zaan ki Jesu Kristu su wey pinaaǥi te kedtuu ki Jesu Kristu meisip ki zaan te Megbevayà he metazeng. Netuenan ta he kenà heini egkehimu pinaaǥi te kedtumana te kesuǥuan. Su wazà minsan hentei he ed-isipen he metazeng te Megbevayà tenged te kedtumana zin te kesuǥuan.
48002017	Guntaan, egkesuatan ta he isipa ki te Megbevayà he metazeng pinaaǥi ki Kristu. Ne pinaaǥi te kedtuu ta kandin ibpesavut kenita he mesinupaken ki ves daan he iring te kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne emun iyan heini, ne sikita is Hudiyu, egkehimu ve he ebpekekaǥi ki he pinaaǥi ki Kristu nehimu ki en he mesinupaken? Kenà daan egkehimu!
48002018	Su emun edlikuan ku ne egkeǥiyen ku he hustu he paaǥi haazà is kesuǥuan he mid-engkezan ku, igkepeehè ku pinaaǥi kayi he venar iyan he mekesesalà a su nesupak ku is kesuǥuan.
48002019	Siak, nesavut ku en he kenà a egkeveǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan pinaaǥi te kedtumana ku te kesuǥuan, ne tenged dutun mid-engkezan ku is kedsarig ku te kedtumana ku te kesuǥuan su wey ku iyan metuman is menge suǥù te Megbevayà.
48002020	Tenged te kedsarig ku ki Kristu, inransang a te krus duma kandin su elili ku sikandin. Minatey a, iyan, uuyag a ǥihapun su zini ed-ubpà te kediey si Kristu ne heini is kebpengungubpaan ku zini te kelibutan, pinaaǥi zà te kedsarig ku kandin te Anak te Megbevayà. Mahal a ziyà te ǥehinawa zin ne mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kediey su wey a melibri.
48002021	Kenà egkehimu he kenè ku edewaten is gaǥew te Megbevayà kedì su ke egkehimu he ed-isipen ki zin he metazeng pinaaǥi te kedtumana ta te kesuǥuan, wazè bes pulus te kebpehimatey ni Kristu!
48003001	Sikiyu is menge tigGelasya, henduen be te kenè kew metau he ed-isip-isip! Utew a egkeinuinu keniyu! Maan is ebpemineǥen niw is menge etew he ebpetuman keniyu te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises? Utew keladu is kebpenurua ku keniyu te nehimu ni Jesu Kristu kenitew pinaaǥi te kebpatey zin diyà te krus.
48003002	Duen id-insè ku keniyu. Hengkey is paaǥi te kegkezewata niw te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin? Nezawat niw ve is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin tenged te kedtumana niw te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises? Wazà, su netuenan niw he imbeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin tenged dà te nezineg niw ne midtuuwan niw is tudtul mehitenged te nehimu ni Jesus.
48003003	Menge tulebung kew ves! Dutun te aney niw en kedsundan ki Jesus, midseriǥan niw is kedtavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, iyan, guntaan, kunaan niw vuwa ke egkepurungan is kedsundan niw pinaaǥi te keniyu za he ketau!
48003004	Wazè bes pulus te menge meupiya he tuvad keniyu tenged te kebpeketuu niw! Kenà egkehimu he wazà pulus.
48003005	Is Megbevayà, hein imbeǥey zin keniyu is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne impeehè din diyan te keniyu is menge egkein-inuwan, wazè din iyan iveeli zutun is tenged te edtumanen niw is kesuǥuan, kekenà, tenged dà te nezineg niw ne midtuuwan niw is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
48003006	Iring din ded daan is nehitavù ki Abraham he kepuun tew zengan su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Midtuu sikandin te migkaǥi te Megbevayà ne tenged kayi, is Megbevayà, midawat din si Abraham ne mid-isip din sikandin he metazeng.
48003007	Ne sikiyu zaan, kinahanglan he sevuta niw he iyan ded heini ǥuntaan kayi te kenitew su ke zuen etew he edtuu te Lalag te Megbevayà ne nehimu en sikandin he kevuwazan ni Abraham, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, egkezawat din is impenaad te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham.
48003008	Daan he migkaǥi is Megbevayà diyà te insurat he lalag din he minsan is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, ne ed-isipen din sikandan he metazeng emun edtuuwan dan sikandin. Impesavut din he zaan ki Abraham is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ke sikandin te, Tenged te midtuu ka te migkaǥi ku, midtuvazan ku sikew. Ne pinaaǥi zaan kayi te kedtuu nu edtuvazan ku is tivuuk he menusiyà dini te kelibutan.
48003009	Ne midtuu si Abraham dutun te Lalag te Megbevayà, ne tenged dutun midtuvazan sikandin te Megbevayà; ne iring din ded daan ke edtuu is minsan hentei te Lalag te Megbevayà, edtuvazan daan sikandin te Megbevayà.
48003010	Iyan, is minsan hentei mulà he edsarig te kedtumana te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, nesuǥat en te rawak te Megbevayà su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megvevayà he edhenduen te, Is minsan hentei he kenà din egkepurung egketuman is minsan hengkey he suǥù he insurat dutun te kesuǥuan, ne nesuǥat en sikandin te rawak te Megbevayà.
48003011	Ne emun iyan haazà, ne egkesavut ta he wazà minsan hentei he metazeng is ked-isipa kandin te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtumana te kesuǥuan su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is minsan hentei he metazeng is ked-isipa kandin te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtuu zin te Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan sikandin ebeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan, ke sikandin.
48003012	Iyan, ke zuen etew he egkepurung din egketuman is langun he suǥù dutun te kesuǥuan, kenè en kinahanglan he edtuu pa sikandin wey meveǥayi te untung he wazè din pidtemanan, su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is etew he egkepurung din egketuman is langun he suǥù dutun te kesuǥuan, ebeǥayan sikandin te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
48003013	Minsan pa te nesupak te en is kesuǥuan, nelibri ki ni Jesus te silut su midrewakan en si Jesus he elili kenitew zutun te kedrensanga kandin te krus, su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ke zuen etew he edhimetayan ne idtaud te impasek he kayu ne tuus heini te rawak kandin te Megbevayà.
48003014	Ne umba mibpehimatey si Jesu Kristu te iring dutun su wey pinaaǥi kandin ikeveǥey zaan diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu is ketazeng he intuvad te Megbevayà ki Abraham. Ne pinaaǥi zutun sikitew is langun he edtuu ki Jesus, ebeǥayan kiw zin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he impenaad dengan te Megbevayà.
48003015	Menge suled, duen penenglitan he ibpesavut ku keniyu. Su ke zuen ibpenaad te sevaha he etew he insurat diyà te dukumintu he mibpirmahan din ne mibpirmahan daan te menge tistiǥus, ne kenà egkehimu he edhelinan wey ed-umanan haazà te minsan hentei su nelig-enan.
48003016	Ne iring din ded daan su zuen impenaad te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham wey ziyà te kevuwazan ni Abraham he egkeuǥet pa zutun id-anak. Wazè din iyan keǥiya he zuen penaad din diyà te menge kevuwazan ni Abraham su kenà mezakel is egkeǥiyen din, kekenà, ke sikandin diyà te ki Abraham te, diyà te kevuwazan nu. Umba migkaǥi zin heini su sebsevaha zà he etew zutun te kevuwazan ni Abraham is ibpesavut din he iyan si Kristu.
48003017	Iyan ibpesavut ku kayi is: duen untung he wazè pidtemanan he impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham he kenà duwazuwa he edtumanen din su midlig-enan din. Daan en heini is penaad te wazè pa is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises su neuǥet pa zutun si Moises su menge heepat pa he ǥatus wey ketluan he tuig. Ne kenà egkehimu he egkeawà is penaad te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Kenà egkehimu he kenè edtumanen te Megbevayà is penaad din.
48003018	Si Abraham, imbeǥey kandin te Megbevayà is untung he wazà pidtemanan tenged dà te impenaad heini kandin te Megbevayà. Iyan, emun egkehimu he ibeǥey kenita is untung pinaaǥi te kedtumana ta te kesuǥuan, kenà daan egkehimu he ibeǥey heini kenita tenged dà te impenaad heini te Megbevayà.
48003019	Ne emun iyan heini, ne hengkey is pulus te kesuǥuan? Ibpesavut ku keniyu is pulus din. In-uman te Megbevayà is kesuǥuan su wey zin ipesavut kenita ke hengkey is mezaat he ulaula ta; ne egkesuatan din he zutun dà taman is kedseriǥi te kesuǥuan te kebpekeuma te kevuwazan ni Abraham he iyan si Kristu he iyan mibpenaazan te Megbevayà. Midsuǥù te Megbevayà is menge velinsuǥuen din he ebpuun diyà te langit wey zan ikeveǥey is kesuǥuan diyà te ki Moises. Ne si Moises, nehimu sikandin he zatù te pid-elangan su imbeǥey zin daan is kesuǥuan diyà te menge etew.
48003020	Iyan, dutun te kebpenaazi te Megbevayà ki Abraham wazà kinahanglan he zuen datù te pid-elangan su sebsevaha zà dutun is nekepenaad he iyan is Megbevayà.
48003021	Ne kunaan niw vuwa ke kenà egkeuyun is kesuǥuan wey is menge penaad dengan te Megbevayà, iyan, kenà egkehimu he kenà heini egkeuyun. Su ke zuen kesuǥuan he pinaaǥi kayi egkeveǥayan kiw te untung he wazè din pidtemanan ne siguradu egkehimu kiw he metazeng pinaaǥi zaan kayi te kesuǥuan.
48003022	Iyan, impesavut kenitew te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he sikitew is tivuuk he menusiyà, sakup kiw en pudu te mezaat he kebayè tew. Ne tenged kayi, wey zà edtumana te Megbevayà is menge penaad din kenita ke edsarig kiw kandin. Wey kiw zà egkeveǥayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan ke zuen tew kedtuu.
48003023	Ne te wazè pa ipezayag kenitew he egkekuwa tew is untung pinaaǥi te kedtuu ki Jesus, iring te nepirisu kiw te kesuǥuan. Nehimu is kesuǥuan he iring te guwardya he ebantey kenitew wey kiw kenà mekeawà taman te kenè pa ibpezayag kenitew is paaǥi he iyan is kedtuuwi ki Jesu Kristu.
48003024	Nehimu zaan is kesuǥuan he iring te ed-uyamu he iyan ebayàbayà kenitew te iring te menge vatà taman dà te kebpekeuma ni Kristu su wey, ke ebpekeuma si Kristu, meisip kiw te Megbevayà he metazeng pinaaǥi te kedtuu tew kandin.
48003025	Ne ǥuntaan, te impezayag en kenitew is paaǥi he iyan is kedtuu, kenè kiw en egkeveyveyaan te kesuǥuan.
48003026	Ne ǥeina te iyan haazà, nehimu kew en pudu he menge anak te Megbevayà tenged dà te kedtuu niw ki Jesu Kristu.
48003027	Su midtuuwan niw si Jesu Kristu, ne nebewtismuwan kew he tuus te sumusundan kew zin, ne tenged dutun insun-ud niw si Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, neiringan niw is menge ulaula ni Kristu.
48003028	Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he kenè niw isipa he ibpelavi te Megbevayà is menge Hudiyu, ne emun kenà, ne iyan is kenà menge Hudiyu, su ziyà te kandin neked-iiring is langun he menge etew, uripen se kenà uripen, maama se vahi, ne sikiyu zaan, neked-iiring kew ziyà te Megbevayà su neked-iiring kew he edtuu ki Jesu Kristu.
48003029	Ne ǥeina te sakup kew ni Kristu, nehimu kew en he iring te menge kevuwazan ni Abraham ne egkezawat niw zaan is impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham.
48004001	Penenglitan duen anak he minatey is amey zin te vatè pa utew sikandin. Ne minsan pa te sumusunud sikandin te langun he azen te amey zin he minatey, ne zutun te vatè pa sikandin, iring sikandin te suluǥuen dà su zuen pa ebayàbayà kandin.
48004002	Duen ed-uyamu kandin he ebantey zaan dutun te menge azen din taman te kenè pa egketuman is timpu he midtelaan te amey zin, ne human sikandin ebpekezawat te keǥehem te kebayàbayà te menge azen din.
48004003	Ne iring kiw zaan dutun su neveyveyaan kiw zengan te menge kenè pa hustu he tuluuwen dini te kelibutan su iring kiw pa te menge vatà is ebantey te langun dutun.
48004004	Ne hein netuman en is hustu he timpu he netagnà dengan, is Megbevayà, midsuǥù din dini te kelibutan is Anak din. Ne heini is Anak din, nehimu he etew pinaaǥi te ked-enaka kandin te vahi. Ne pinaaǥi kayi nehimu zaan sikandin he nezizalem te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises,
48004005	su wey kiw zin melibri is langun he zizalem te kesuǥuan ne wey kiw zaan mehimu he menge anak te Megbevayà.
48004006	Ne zutun wey ta metueni he anak ki iyan te Megbevayà, midsuǥù te Megbevayà he ibpeubpà dini te kenita is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ziyà te ki Jesus, ne ibpinted din kenita he mekekaǥi ki te, Amey ku he Megbevayà.
48004007	Ne ǥuntaan kenè ki en iring te menge suluǥuen dà, kekenà, anak ki en te Megbevayà. Ne ǥeina te iyan heini, egkezawat ta is minsan hengkey he ibeǥey zin diyà te anak din.
48004008	Dengan te wazè niw pa tuuwi is tutuu he Megbevayà, neuripen kew te menge edtuuwan he kenà hustu he megbevayà.
48004009	Iyan, guntaan te nekilala niw en is Megbevayà iring te kegkekilelaa zin keniyu, maan is edlikuan niw is wazà pulus he menge tuluuwen he kenà ebpekelibri keniyu te silut? Maan is egkesuatan niw he meuripen kew en maan kayi?
48004010	Maan is ebenteyanan niw is menge andew, menge vulan, wey menge tuig he ibpetuman te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises?
48004011	Utew ku sikiyu igkeipeng su kela ke kenà ebpulus is langun he impenurù ku keniyu.
48004012	Menge suled, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he ul-ulaha niw is mid-ulaula ku su siak is Hudiyu, mid-engkezan ku en is kedseriǥi te kesuǥuan te menge Hudiyu. Nehimu a he iring keniyu zengan te kenà menge Hudiyu. Tutuu iyan he wazà a keniyu meselai, kekenà, mibpurungan a keniyu.
48004013	Netuenan niw he umba nehimu is aney ku en kebpenudtuli keniyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen su nezeruwan a.
48004014	Ne minsan te zuen ku mezaat he zaru ne wazà a keniyu ikeremerik minsan ke heini is daru ku ne nekesamuk keniyu, iyan, midawat a keniyu iring te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebpuun te langit. Impeiring niw is kedewata niw kedì te kedewata niw ki Jesu Kristu.
48004015	Utew a zengan keniyu ingkeǥalew, su ke egkehimu zà ne egkeluten niw is mata niw ne ibeǥey niw kedì. Iyan e en mismu ebpekekaǥi kayi mehitenged keniyu. Ne ǥuntaan, maan is nahalin en is gehinawa niw?
48004016	Maan is egkepeukan a keniyu ǥuntaan? Kela ke nehimu kew en he kuntada ku tenged dà te migkaǥi ku keniyu ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen.
48004017	Haazà is menge etew he kenà tutuu is ibpenurù dan keniyu, ebpurungan kew zan, iyan, kenà meupiya is tuyù dan diyan te keniyu. Egkesuatan dan he maawà is upakat niw kediey su wey iyan niw zà sikandan mepurungi.
48004018	Utew meupiya ke ebpekid-emiǥu zan keniyu emun kenà mezaat is tuyù dan. Egkesuatan ku he kenà iyan e zà ebpekid-emiǥu keniyu. Emun kenà a ziyan, meupiya ke zuen pa ebpekid-emiǥu keniyu.
48004019	Henduen be te menge anak ku en sikiyu su minahal ku sikiyu. Iring te edlised is bahi ke ed-anak, egkereǥenan a zaan te ked-isipa ku keniyu su egkesuatan ku he meǥaan niw ituǥut he iyan ebayàbayà keniyu si Kristu.
48004020	Angin ke ziyan a te keniyu su wey ku sikiyu melelaǥi; kenè ku egketuenan ke hengkey is meupiya he idsurat ku he ibpeuwit ku ziyan su egkeipeng a keniyu.
48004021	Sikiyu is egkesuat he ebpezizalem te kedtuman te kesuǥuan, ibpesavut ku keniyu ke hengkey is kehuluǥan kayi.
48004022	Su miguǥud dutun te kesuǥuan he zuen dezuwa he anak he maama ni Abraham. In-anak haazà is sevaha ni Hagar, kes esawa zin he uripen, ne in-anak haazà is sevaha te esawa zin he kenà uripen he iyan si Sara.
48004023	Is ked-enaka te anak te vahi he uripen, ne iring ded te ked-enaka te minsan hengkey he vatà, iyan, kes ked-enaka zutun te sevaha he in-anak te vahi he kenà uripen, ne kenà egkehimu emun wazà ipenaad te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham.
48004024	Ne sempità heini is dezuwa he vahi. Iyan kehuluǥan din is dezuwa he paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà te kebpekidsevaha zin te menusiyà. Si Hagar is bahi he uripen, ne iyan alung te paaǥi he imbeǥey te Megbevayà ki Moises diyà te vuntud he Siney. Iyan heini kes kesuǥuan. Su is menge anak ni Hagar, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is langun he nekesarig te kedtuman te kesuǥuan, ne menge uripen sikandan.
48004025	Diyà haazà is buntud he Siney te tanà he egngezanan te Erabya. Ne alung heini is buntud he Siney ki Hagar. Ne iyan kehuluǥan ni Hagar is inged he Hiruselim su neuripen is langun he meǥinged dutun te kedtumana te kesuǥuan.
48004026	Ne si Sara, haazà is esawa ni Abraham he kenà uripen, ne iyan kiw alung te kandin he menge anak su kenè kiw menge uripen te kesuǥuan.
48004027	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Sikew is bahi he kenà ed-anak, lipey ka. Minsan ke wazè ka belilita, derag-ey ka te kegkelipey su minsan ke mid-ewaan ka te esawa nu, ed-ulian ke zin ne mezakel is menge kevuwazan nu kenà te vahi he zuen din esawa.
48004028	Na, menge suled, iring din ded daan, nehimu kiw en he menge anak te Megbevayà tenged te netuman din is penaad din. Iring heini zuen te ked-enaka ki Isaak ni Sara tenged te netuman is pesarig te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham.
48004029	Ne zutun he timpu zengan, haazà is anak ni Abraham he in-anak pinaaǥi zà te kelibutanen he paaǥi te kegkevuwad, midhimu zin he mereǥeni is hazi zin he in-anak pinaaǥi te tavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Ne iring din guntaan edregreǥenen kiw te menge etew he neuripen te kedtumana te kesuǥuan.
48004030	Ne hengkey is sambag te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà? Duen insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Ipaawè nu is bahi he uripen wey is anak din su is anak te uripen, kenà egkehimu he ebeǥayan sikandin te menge azen te amey zin. Iyan dà ebpekeangken kayi is anak te vahi he kenà uripen.
48004031	Umba, menge suled, sikitew, iring kiw te anak te vahi he kenà uripen, kenè kiw iring te anak te uripen.
48005001	Pinaaǥi te kebelukasi kenitew ni Kristu, nelibri kiw en te kedtumana te kesuǥuan. Umba, kinahanglan he edsukul kiw is mibelukasan su wey kenè kiw en maan meuripen.
48005002	Utew tutuu heini is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke iyan niw edseriǥan is kedsirkunsidara keniyu wey kew meluwas, ne kenè kew egketevangan ni Kristu.
48005003	Ne kenà duen dà taman su tutuu iyan he ke zuen minsan hentei he kunaan din ke ebpulus kandin is kebpesirkunsidar, kinahanglan daan he ebpurungan din te edtuman is minsan hengkey he suǥù dutun te tivuuk he kesuǥuan.
48005004	Is minsan hentei keniyu he kunaan din ke pinaaǥi te kedtumana te kesuǥuan is kebpeketezenga kandin te Megbevayà, nekesuwey en sikandin ki Kristu. Neewaan din en is gaǥew te Megbevayà kandin.
48005005	Iyan, sikami mulà, pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin wey tenged te kedtuu zey kandin, iyan ebpeebuten dey is kedhimuwa kenami he metazeng te Megbevayà.
48005006	Su emun tumutuu ki en ki Jesu Kristu, neked-iiring kiw en diyà te Megbevayà is nengesirkunsidar wey is wazà mesirkunsidar. Iyan dà duen din pulus diyà te Megbevayà is kedtuu ta kandin he egketuusan heini pinaaǥi te ǥaǥew ta te zuma ta.
48005007	Mibpurungan niw zengan te ed-ikul is hustu he ibayà. Maan is idtuǥut niw he zuen ed-eǥen keniyu wey niw kenè en metuuwi is tutuu he tuluuwen?
48005008	Kenà heini vaal te Megbevayà is kebpekesuwey niw su iyan mid-umbita keniyu wey kew meketuu.
48005009	Haazà is tarù he tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu, ne iring te tapey emun ebaal ki te supas su minsan deisek dà is id-amut dutun te zekelà he midhames he erina, egketepayan gihapun is tivuuk he supas.
48005010	Ne minsan pa zutun, dekelà is kedsarig ku te Nengazen he pinaaǥi te kedtavang din keniyu, ebpemineǥen niw zed is hustu he impenurù ku keniyu. Iyan, haazà is etew he nekesamuk te isip niw pinaaǥi te penurù din he tarù, siguradu he edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà.
48005011	Menge suled, duen egkaǥi he wazè ku pa engkezi is penurù he kinahanglan he ebpesirkunsidar ki, iyan, emun tutuu heini, maan is kenà a ed-engkezan te ebpesipala te menge zuma ku he Hudiyu? Su emun ibpenurù ku he kinahanglan is kebpesirkunsidar, ne kenè dan egkepauk kediey minsan ke elin ku pa ibpenurù is kebpehimatey ni Jesus he elili kenitew.
48005012	Ne sikan is menge etew he edsamuk keniyu pinaaǥi te tarù he penurù dan, egkesuatan ku pezem he kenà iyan dà is kebpesirkunsidar edtumanen dan, kekenà, elin daan ul-ulaha zan is kebpekapun!
48005013	Na, menge suled, tutuu iyan he impetuu ki te Megbevayà wey ki zin melibri ne wazè en kinahanglan he ebpeuripen ki te kesuǥuan. Ne minsan pa zutun wazè ki melibri su wey iyan mebayàbayà kenita is mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta. Kinahanglan he tenged te zekelà is gaǥew tew te menge zuma tew ne medtitinevangà is kada sevaha kenitew te menge tumutuu.
48005014	Is tivuuk he kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne egkepurung egketuman pinaaǥi te sevaha zà he suǥù he iyan heini: Kinahanglan he purungi nu is duma nu. Isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he ǥehinawa.
48005015	Iyan, emun iyan niw zà ed-ul-ulahan is kebpepespesipelehey wey kebpeeg-eǥetà, ne egkepurung egkezeeti is upakat niw te menge tumutuu ki Kristu.
48005016	Iyan heini suǥù ku keniyu: pevayàbayè kew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin su emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini, kenà egkehimu he egketuman niw is mezaat he kebayà te lawa niw.
48005017	Kenà egkeuyun is mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta wey is egkesuatan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin su telekuntada heini is dezuwa, ne tenged dutun kenè ta layun egkeveelan is meupiya he egkesuatan ta.
48005018	Iyan, ke ebpesakup ki te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kenè ki egkesakup te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.
48005019	Egketuusan ta is menge mezaat he ulaula he egkehimu pinaaǥi te mezaat he kebayà te lawa su iyan is kedhilavet te kenè ta esawa, is meremerik wey mahawag he vaal,
48005020	is ked-ezapa te kenà hustu he ed-ezapen, wey is kegemita te ǥehem he ibeǥey ni Setanas. Ebpekigkuntada is menge etew; ebpekidtebek dan; egkesina zan; egkengepauk dan; iyan dà ed-isipen dan is kandan dà he egkesuatan. Ne ed-engkezan dan is kebpekidsevaha zan te menge zuma zan.
48005021	Egkeimahan dan is menge azen te menge zuma zan. Egkengelangut dan, ne kenè dan ed-eǥenen is menge kebayè dan he mezaat, kekenà, edtumanen dan, wey mezakel pa is ed-ul-ulahan dan he iring kayi. Ed-umanan ku te egkaǥi is migkaǥi ku he zaan he is etew he ed-ul-ulahan din is menge iring kayi, kenà sikandin ebpekeragkes te egkehedian te Megbevayà keuzemà.
48005022	Egketuusan ta zaan is menge ulaula he egkehimu pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Su emun ed-uwiten ki te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, mahal zini te ǥehinawa ta is menge zuma ta, layun ki egkelipey, melinawen layun is gehinawa ta, mepelevayen ki, beliǥeǥawen ki, metulanged ki, metinumanen ki,
48005023	kenè ki mevurut, wey egkeeǥen ta is kebayà te lawa ta. Ne emun iyan heini menge ulaula ta, kenè ta egkesupak is menge suǥù kenita te Megbevayà.
48005024	Ne is minsan hentei he migaked en ni Jesu Kristu, ne iring te inransang din en te krus is mekesesalà he lawa zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mid-engkezan din en is menge mezaat he kebayè din wey egkesuatan din.
48005025	Ne is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, geina te mibeǥayan ki zin te veǥu en he untung, kinahanglan he ebpevayàbayè ki zaan kandin.
48005026	Kinahanglan he kenè ki ebpelavew, kenè ki zaan ebpekidtebek te menge zuma he etew, kenè ki zaan egkesina te zuma ta.
48006001	Menge suled, ke zuen duma niw he tumutuu he netuenan niw he nesupak din is Megbevayà, sikiyu is mid-ulinan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, tevangi niw sikandin su wey zin kenà meengkezi is kedtumana zin te egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Asal, kinahanglan he utew kew mepelevayen is edtavang kandin. Mebpekevantey kew su kela ke mepenulayi kew zaan ni Setanas.
48006002	Layun kew mebpetebtevangà te uman sevaha keniyu su emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini egketuman niw is insuǥù kenitew ni Kristu.
48006003	Ke zuen minsan hentei he kunaan din ke wazà kurang te menge ulaula zin su pudu meupiya, nelimbungan din is gehinawa zin.
48006004	Deyzey ke ebpurungan edsusiya te uman sevaha is menge ulaula zin. Ne emun meupiya, egkehimu he ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa zin. Iyan, kenè din isukud is menge ulaula te zuma zin te kandin he ulaula.
48006005	Su kinahanglan he bevaa te kada sevaha is kandin he keugelingen he bevaan.
48006006	Ne sikan is etew he ebpepenurù te Lalag te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he veǥayi zin is ebpenurù kandin te menge meupiya he nezawat din.
48006007	Kenè kew pelimbung te ulaula niw su kenè ta egkeelesan is Megbevayà te minsan hengkey he ulaula. Is ibpemula te etew, iyan daan egkeraǥun din. Ne iring din ded daan is menge ulaula te etew, su ed-ahaan heini te Megbevayà ne edsuhulan din is etew keuzemà sumalà is neulaula te uman sevaha.
48006008	Emun edtumanen te etew is kandin he egkesuatan, iyan egkezawat din is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan. Emun edtumanen din is egkengesuatan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ibeǥey kandin is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
48006009	Umba kenè ki ebpepepeǥul te ked-ulaula te meupiya su emun ebpeniguduwan ta heini, egkeuma is timpu keuzemà he zuen idsuhul kenita te Megbevayà he utew meupiya.
48006010	Ebpurungan ta layun is minsan hentei he etew, lavew en is menge zuma ta he tumutuu ki Kristu.
48006011	Kayi te ketepusan te surat he ibpeuwit ku ziyan, siak si Pablo is midsurat. Egketuusan niw su egkeehè niw he utew zezekelà is kedsurat ku.
48006012	Ne sikan is menge etew he egkesuatan dan he mebpesirkunsidar kew, egkesuatan dan he zeliǥa zan te menge zuma zan. Egkehandek dan te menge zuma zan he Hudiyu su kenè dan egkesuat he pesipelahi sikandan tenged te kedsarig dan te kebpehimatey ni Kristu.
48006013	Haazà is menge etew, ne ibpenurù dan he kinahanglan he mebpesirkunsidar kew sumalà is penurù te kesuǥuan, ne minsan pa zutun kenè dan ebpurungan edtumana is kesuǥuan. Umba egkesuatan dan he mebpesirkunsidar kew su wey mezalig sikandan tenged te nehimu kew he menge kabig dan.
48006014	Siak mulà, iyan ku zà ibpezalig is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he mibpehimatey he elili kenitew. Ne tenged te kebpehimatey zin, wazè e en meuripen te menge kelibutanen he kebayà, ne wazè en kayi ǥehem te kebayàbayà kediey.
48006015	Kenà ebpulus is kebpesirkunsidar ne kenà daan ebpulus is kenà kebpesirkunsidar. Iyan dekelà is pulus din is kegkehimu kenita he veǥu en he linimbag.
48006016	Is minsan hentei he ed-ikul kayi te ibayà he impenurù ku pinaaǥi kayi te surat, berakat he mehizuwi te Megbevayà wey veǥayi te melinawen he kebpekesavuk, ne kenà iyan dà sikandin, kekenà, elin daan is langun he menge tutuu he tumutuu te Megbevayà.
48006017	Puun dà guntaan, kinahanglan he wazà minsan hentei he megkaǥi he wazà iveǥey kediey ni Jesus is keǥehem te kebpenurù. Egketuusan kayi te lawa ku is kedtumana ku te menge suǥù ni Jesus. Mezakel is menge tulak te menge palì ku he nehimu te menge kuntada ni Jesus.
48006018	Menge suled, berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan a si Pablo.
49001001	Iyan a si Pablo is teǥisurat kayi. Nehimu a he epustul ni Jesu Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, midsuǥù e zin, tenged te iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Ibpeuwit ku heini is surat diyan te inged he Ipisu, diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu he menge metinumanen te menge suǥù ni Jesu Kristu.
49001002	Is Amey tew he Megbevayà wey is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew zan wey tuvazi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
49001003	Dekelà utew is kebpeselemati tew te Megbevayà he Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu su tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu, intuvad din kenitew ziyà te langit is minsan hengkey he meupiya pinaaǥi te ked-ulini kenitew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
49001004	Dengan te wazè pa limbaǥa is kelibutan, mibpilì kiw en te Megbevayà. Iyan impilia zin kenitew su wey kiw mehimu he menge sakup din he wazà igkesewayi zuen.
49001005	Ne tenged te utew zekelà is gaǥew zin kenitew, dengan te wazè pa is kelibutan, mid-isip din he pinaaǥi ki Jesu Kristu edhimuwen kiw zin he menge anak din su iyan egkesuatan din wey tuyù din.
49001006	Edeliǥen tew is Megbevayà tenged te utew zekelà he mekeǥeǥehem he ǥaǥew zin he intuvad din kenitew pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew te mahal he Anak din he si Jesus.
49001007	Su tenged te utew zekelà is gaǥew zin kenitew, midlibri kiw zin te silut pinaaǥi te kedtiǥis te lengesa zutun te kebpehimatey ni Kristu, ne mibpesaylu zin is menge salè tew.
49001008	Kenà pinaaǥi te sukud is kegkeǥeǥawi zin kenitew, kekenà, utew subra is gaǥew zin kenita. Ne imbeǥey zin daan kenita is kedsavut wey ketau su wey tew metueni ke hengkey is paaǥi zin.
49001009	Ne impesavut din kenitew is daan he in-eles he edhimuwen din su iyan tuyù wey egkesuatan din. Ne mid-isip din he zaan he pinaaǥi ki Kristu
49001010	edhimuwen din heini zutun te hustu he timpu. Su mid-isip te Megbevayà he zutun edhimuwen din he sebsevaha zà si Kristu he ebayàbayà te minsan hengkey he linimbag diyà te langit wey zini te tanà.
49001011	Is langun he ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà, ne iyan kedtumana te tuyù din wey egkesuatan din. Ne tenged te iyan tuyù din, mibpilì key zin is menge tumutuu he Hudiyu wey key mehimu he menge sakup din he ebpekidsevaha ki Kristu. Iyan heini tuyù din he zaan he mid-isip din. Ne sikami is menge Hudiyu he nengehuna he nemeketuu ki Kristu, umba mibpilì key zin su iyan egkesuatan din he pinaaǥi kenami edeliǥen sikandin he utew mekeǥeǥehem.
49001013	Ne iring din ded daan diyan te keniyu su hein impesavut keniyu is tutuu he tuluuwen he iyan kes Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kedlibriya kenitew te silut, nemeketuu kew ki Kristu, ne midhimu kew zaan te Megbevayà he menge sakup din pinaaǥi te kebeǥaya zin keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he zaan he impenaad din.
49001014	Is ked-ulini kenitew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne iyan tuus kenitew he keuzemà ibeǥey zin kenitew te menge sakup din is langun he impenaad din kenitew. Ne pinaagi kayi egketuenan tew he keuzemà edhimesazen din is kedlibriya kenitew te kebpekesalè tew. Edeliǥen tew sikandin is mekeǥeǥehem!
49001015	Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, geina te netudtulan a he mezesen is kedtuu niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesus wey zekelà is gaǥew niw te minsan hentei he tumutuu kandin,
49001016	kenà egkeamin is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tenged keniyu. Layun ku sikiyu id-ampù.
49001017	Is Megbevayà te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he iyan daan Amey tew he zait he ebentuǥen, edhengyuan ku layun sikandin he pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne iveǥey zin keniyu is ketau wey ipeǥawaǥawa zin keniyu is kegketueni niw te menge ulaula zin.
49001018	Id-ampù ku he iveǥey zin daan keniyu is kebpurung kedsavut su wey niw metueni ke hengkey is langun he meupiya he egkeperateng tew keuzemà tenged te midhimu kiw en he menge tumutuu zin, ne wey niw zaan metueni he utew mezakel zutun is menge meupiya he idtuvad din kenitew.
49001019	Ne id-ampù ku zaan he ipesavut din keniyu ke hengkey is kenà egkesukud he utew lavew he zekelà he ǥehem te Megbevayà he zini edterebahu te kenitew te menge tumutuu kandin. Ne iyan heini sikan is utew zekelà he ǥehem
49001020	he migamit te Megbevayà dutun te kebenhawa zin ki Kristu wey is kebpepinuuwa zin kandin diyà te egkekewanan din diyà te langit.
49001021	Ne zutun utew lavew si Kristu kenà is minsan hentei he hadì, wey egalen, wey minsan hentei he zuen din keǥehem wey kebayàbayà. Lavew pa is inggerar ki Kristu te minsan hengkey he ǥerar te minsan hentei ǥuntaan wey te wazè din pidtemanan.
49001022	Ne is Megbevayà, midhimu zin he sakup ni Kristu is minsan hengkey he linimbag. Umba midhimu zin si Kristu he egalen te minsan hengkey su wey kiw metevangi is langun he menge tumutuu.
49001023	Sikitew is edsarig ki Kristu, ne iring kiw te lawa zin ne iyan sikandin ulu tew. Ne sikitew is lawa zin, ne wazà kurang te ked-ulini zin kenitew su ziyà sikandin te minsan hendei te tivuuk he kelimbaǥan.
49002001	Dengan, henduen kew te minatey su wazè niw pa untung he wazà pidtemanan tenged te kenè kew pa zutun ebpemineg te menge suǥù te Megbevayà wey tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula niw.
49002002	Dutun he timpu mid-ikul niw is mezaat he ibayà he iyan ed-ikulen te menge etew he kuntada te Megbevayà. Midtuman kew te menge suǥù ni Setanas. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te menge zuen din gehem diyà te hewhewanan. Iyan daan sikandin ebayàbayà te langun he kenà ebpemineg te menge suǥù te Megbevayà.
49002003	Ne sikitew zaan, elin kiw zengan ebpen-ulaula te mezaat sumalà is mezaat he kebayà te lawa tew, wey is mezaat he isip tew. Ne tenged kayi neragkes kiw pa zutun te silut iring te zuma he menusiyà he kenà sakup te Megbevayà.
49002004	Ne minsan pa te iyan en haazà, utew zekelà is hizu te Megbevayà kenitew ne utew kiw mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin.
49002005	Ne minsan pa te iring kiw te minatey tenged te kenè tew kebpemineg te menge suǥù din, dutun te kebenhawa zin ki Kristu, inragkes kiw zin daan su wey tew maangken is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Midlibri kiw zin te silut tenged dà te ǥaǥew zin kenitew.
49002006	Ne is Megbevayà, tenged te nekidsevaha kiw ki Kristu, dutun te kebenhawa zin ki Kristu, mibanhew kiw zin daan wey kiw mekehadì duma ki Kristu ziyà te langit.
49002007	Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey ikepeehè din kenitew is utew lavew he kezekelà te ǥaǥew zin wey kedtavang din kenitew pinaaǥi ki Jesu Kristu te wazè din pidtemanan.
49002008	Su tenged dà te ǥaǥew zin kenita, midlibri ki zin te silut dutun te kebpeketuu ta. Wazè ki melibri pinaaǥi te kenita he vaal,
49002009	kekenà, imbeǥey zà kenita is untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Ne tenged dutun, wazà etew he igkezantal zin is kedlibriya kandin te silut su kenà iyan is kandin he ked-ul-ulaha te meupiya ingkelibri zin.
49002010	Su is kedlimbaǥa kenita he veǥu, ne iyan baal te Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha ta ki Jesus midlimbag ki zin su wey ta meulaula is meupiya he midteǥana zin en he zaan wey ta meveeli.
49002011	Sikiyu is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, isipa niw is daan he kebpekesavuk niw. Is menge Hudiyu, ne ebpesirkunsidar sikandan, ne egngezanan kew zan te menge etew he kenà ebpesirkunsidar, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenè niw ebpetuusan is lawa niw sumalà is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.
49002012	Netuenan niw he zengan wazè niw upakat ki Kristu ne wazè kew iragkes te menge etew he pinilì te Megbevayà. Wazè kew zaan mekeambit duen te menge meupiya he impenaad te Megbevayà kandan. Wazà egkepaabut niw he tavang te Megbevayà ne kenà duen dà taman su wazè niw metueni ke hentei is tutuu he Megbevayà dini te kelibutan.
49002013	Iyan, guntaan, tenged te nekidsevaha kew en ki Jesus, sikiyu is menge etew he utew meziyù te Megbevayà dengan, impeuvey kew zin en tenged te kebpelisi keniyu te lengesa ni Jesus dutun te kebpehimatey zin.
