49002014	Sikami is menge Hudiyu wey sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, midhimu ni Kristu he melinawen en is kedepitè tew su midhimu kiw zin en he teltelezuma. Pinaaǥi te kebpehimatey zin duen te krus in-awè din is kegkekuntada tew he iring te elavat he nekepetug-elang kenitew.
49002015	Pinaaǥi te kebpehimatey zin, in-awè din is kebpetumana tew te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises ragkes is menge tulumanen su wey sikitew is dezuwa he kelasi te etew, mehimu zin he veǥu en he kelasi te etew pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew kandin, ne tenged kayi naawè en is kegkekuntada tew.
49002016	Pinaaǥi te kebpehimatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus in-awè din is kebpekunkuntedehè tew te Hudiyu wey te kenà Hudiyu, ne midhimu kiw zin he sevaha he kelasi te etew su wey tew melikui is ked-ezapa te tutuu he Megbevayà.
49002017	Midhendini si Kristu te kelibutan ne impesavut din kenitew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kelinew. Sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu wey sikami is menge Hudiyu, impesavut din kenitew is kelinew te kedepitè tew ziyà te Megbevayà.
49002018	Tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu, sikami is menge Hudiyu wey sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, ebpekeuvey kiw en ziyà te Amey tew he Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
49002019	Ne sikiyu is menge tumutuu he kenà menge Hudiyu, minsan pa te zengan wazè kew isipa he menge sakup te Megbevayà, iyan, guntaan nehimu kew en he zuma te menge pinilì din he etew. Nehimu kew en he menge anak te Megbevayà iring te minsan hentei he tumutuu kandin.
49002020	Ne sikitew is menge tumutuu, iring kiw te valey he ibpehitindeg te Megbevayà diyà te vatu. Iyan si Kristu kes batu he edtukuzan kayi te valey. Is menge epustul wey ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà, ne iyan menge tukud. Ne iyan kew menge zuma he himan kayi te valey.
49002021	Ne pinaaǥi ki Kristu neviǥeran is kebeeli kayi te valey ne egkehimu heini he valey te Nengazen he zutun sikandin ed-ezapa.
49002022	Ne sikiyu zaan is kenà menge Hudiyu, ragkes kew kayi, ne nehimu kew en daan he menge himan kayi te valey he zutun ed-ubpà is Megbevayà pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
49003001	Ne tenged kayi te langun, siak si Pablo, is pirisu tenged te kedsundan ku ki Jesu Kristu, layun ku sikiyu id-ampù diyà te Megbevayà. Umba nepirisu a su insangyew ku is Lalag te Megbevayà diyan te keniyu te kenà menge Hudiyu.
49003002	Is Megbevayà, tenged te ǥaǥew zin keniyu, duen insarig din kediey he terebahu he iyan igkezeyzey niw. Netuenan ku he nezineg niw heini.
49003003	In-eles dengan heini, iyan, impesavut din kediey. Mehitenged kayi, duen ingkepesavut ku en keniyu pinaaǥi te surat.
49003004	Ne emun ebesahan niw heini, egketuenan niw is nesavut ku mehitenged te in-eles dengan mehitenged ki Kristu.
49003005	Dengan wazà heini ipezayag diyà te minsan hentei he menusiyà, iyan, guntaan, pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, impezayag en te Megbevayà diyà te menge epustul wey ebpemeneuven din.
49003006	Ibpesavut ku keniyu heini is in-eles dengan he sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, pinaaǥi te kedtuuwi niw te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, edtuvazan kew zaan te Megbevayà te langun he meupiya he idtuvad din te menge Hudiyu. Ne idragkes kew zaan dutun te lawa ni Kristu. Ne egkezawat niw is menge penaad te Megbevayà tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu.
49003007	Nehimu a he suluǥuen te Megbevayà te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Tenged dà te ǥaǥew zin kediey wey pinaaǥi te ǥehem din imbeǥey zin kediey heini is ketengdanan.
49003008	Siak, lavew kediey is minsan hentei he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà. Ne minsan pa te iyan heini, midtuvazan a te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedsuǥua zin kediey te kebpenudtul ziyan te keniyu te kenà menge Hudiyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te utew lavew he zekelà he kenà egketegkad he meupiya he igketuvad kenitew ni Kristu.
49003009	Ne elin daan insuǥua zin kediey su wey ku ikepesavut diyà te minsan hentei he etew ke hengkey is kedtumana zin te zaan he mid-isip din he ebeelan. Ne wazà dengan heini ipezayag su in-eles te Megbevayà he nenlimbag te minsan hengkey.
49003010	Umba wazà heini zengan ipezayag su wey ǥuntaan pinaaǥi zà te menge tumutuu ki Jesus, ibpaahà te Megbevayà diyà te menge kedesenan wey menge egalen diyà te langit ke hengkey kezekelà is ketau zin he wazè med-iring-iring.
49003011	Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su edtumanen din is mid-isip din dengan te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey. Ne nehimu zin en heini ǥuntaan pinaaǥi te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
49003012	Ne ǥuntaan tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Jesus wey pinaaǥi te kedsarig tew kandin, egkehimu en he ebpekeetuvang kiw te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te ked-ampù ne wazè en igkeeled tew kandin.
49003013	Ne tenged kayi te langun, kinahanglan, menge suled, he kenà igkeawà te kedsarig niw heini is kemereǥenan he egkeantus ku tenged keniyu, kekenà, lipey kew su iyan ibmeupiya niw.
49003014	Ne tenged kayi te langun he intuvad kenitew te Megbevayà, edluhuzan ku te ed-ampù is Amey tew he Megbevayà.
49003015	Is langun he menge tumutuu he zini pa te lumpad wey ke ziyè en be te langit, ne migngezanan din sikandan he pemilya zin.
49003016	Ne edhengyuan ku sikandin he puun te utew zekelà he ǥehem din, beǥayi kew zin te utew melig-en he kedtuu pinaaǥi te ked-ulini keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin,
49003017	su wey, pinaaǥi te kedtuu niw, melumuni is gehinawa niw ni Jesu Kristu. Ne idhangyù ku zaan he heǥeti zin wey lig-eni zin is kebmahala niw te minsan hentei. Umba idhangyù ku heini su wey sikiyu,
49003018	wey is minsan hentei kenitew te menge sakup te Megbevayà, iveǥey kenitew is kedsavut ke hengkey is kenà egkesukud he kebmahala kenitew ni Kristu ziyà te ǥehinawa zin.
49003019	Berakat he mesavut niw is gaǥew zin keniyu, minsan pa te kenà heini egkepurung egkesavut te minsan hentei. Egkesuatan ku heini su wey metuman diyan te keniyu is wazè din kurang he kegkeulini keniyu te Megbevayà.
49003020	Edeliǥen tew is Megbevayà su, pinaaǥi te zekelà he ǥehem din he impelumun din dini te kenitew, utew zekelà is egkehimu zin su lavew pa is egkehimu zin, kenà te minsan hengkey he egkeisip ta he ebuyuen.
49003021	Berakat he zeliǥa sikandin pinaaǥi kenitew te langun he menge tumutuu zin wey pinaaǥi ki Jesu Kristu ǥuntaan he timpu wey te wazè din pidtemanan.
49004001	Ne tenged kayi te langun, siak is pirisu tenged te midtuman ku is menge sugù te Nengazen, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he ǥeina te midhimu kew te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu zin, ul-ulaha niw is ulaula he zait he ed-ul-ulahan te tumutuu.
49004002	Kinahanglan he kenè kew pegalbu, kekenà, peketulanged kew wey mebmeinentusen kew. Ipeehè niw is gaǥew niw ziyà te kada sevaha keniyu pinaaǥi te kebmepelevayen niw.
49004003	Purungi niw is menge ulaula niw su wey kenà maawà is kegkeupakat niw he imbeǥey keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin su pinaaǥi kayi te upakat egkesevaha is gehinawa niw.
49004004	Su sikitew is langun he menge tumutuu, sevaha kiw zà he lawa, ne sevaha zà is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ed-ulin kenitew, ne sevaha zà daan is ebperetengen tew he ketulusan tenged te midhimu kiw he menge tumutuu.
49004005	Sevaha zà is Nengazen tew he iyan si Jesus; iyan dà sikandin edtuuwan tew; sevaha zà daan is imbewtismuwi kenitew.
49004006	Sevaha zà daan is Megbevayà he Amey te minsan hentei. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te minsan hentei he tumutuu, ne ziyà sikandin te minsan hentei he tumutuu, ne edterebahu pinaaǥi te minsan hentei he tumutuu.
49004007	Sikitew is langun, mibeǥayan is kada sevaha kenitew te ketau sumalà is egkesuatan ni Kristu he ibeǥey kenitew.
49004008	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Dutun te kebetuna kandin pehendiyà te langit mezakel is menge vihag din he mid-uwit din. Ne zuen daan menge ketau he impemeǥey zin diyà te menge sakup din.
49004009	Ne pinaaǥi kayi te migkaǥi he nevatun sikandin, ibpesavut kenitew te Lalag te Megbevayà he midlugtanà sikandin he zaan dini te lumpad te kelibutan.
49004010	Ne haazà is midhendini te tanà he iyan si Kristu, iyan daan sikandin nevatun pehendiyà te langit wey minsan diyà dapit te utew metikang he langit. Ne umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey mehimu he ziyà sikandin te minsan hendei te tivuuk he kelimbaǥan.
49004011	Iyan menge ketau he imbeǥey zin kenitew is: is duma, midhimu zin he epustul; ne is duma, midhimu zin sikandan he peneuva te Megbevayà; ne is duma, ne imbeǥey zin kandan is ketau wey zan ikesangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen; ne is duma pa, ne imbeǥey zin kandan is ketau wey zan meuwit wey mepenurù is menge tumutuu.
49004012	Umba imbeǥey zin heini is menge ketau su wey kiw mehimani ne wey tew meulaula is ebpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà ne wey melig-eni is kedtuu tew te menge tumutuu he iyan lawa ni Kristu.
49004013	Pinaaǥi kayi egkehimu human he egkesevaha kiw te kedtuu tew wey kegketueni tew te menge ulaula te Anak te Megbevayà. Ne zutun egkepurung egkeheǥet is kedtuu tew ki Jesus ne zutun wazà kurang te menge ulaula tew iring te wazà daan kurang te menge ulaula ni Kristu.
49004014	Dutun ne egkehimu he kenè kiw en ebpekeiring te vatà su is etew he iring dutun ne egkehalinhalin is kedtuu zin su melemu ebpeketuu te minsan hengkey he tuluuwen he ibpenurù kandin te menge teruen he etew he metau he edlimbung.
49004015	Ne sikitew mulà, kinahanglan he tutuu is ibpesavut tew ziyà te menge zuma tew tenged te mahal sikandan dini te ǥehinawa tew. Ne pinaaǥi kayi ebpekeiseg is kebpekeiring tew te minsan hengkey he ulaula ni Kristu.
49004016	Su iring kiw te lawa, ne sikandin iyan ulu. Ne sikitew is lawa, ne ebpekesarig kiw kandin te ulu. Ne is minsan hengkey he parti kayi te lawa, ne ebpekesarig daan te menge zuma zin he parti. Ne emun hustu is baal zutun te kada sevaha he parti, edtulin haazà is tivuuk he lawa pinaaǥi te kebpekedtetevangà te minsan hendei he parti zin. Ne sikitew zaan, ebpekeiseg is kebpekeiring tew te ulaula ni Kristu pinaaǥi te kebpurungi te kada sevaha te zuma zin.
49004017	Tenged te suǥù a te Nengazen, ebpeketelteleenan ku sikiyu he engkezi niw en is menge mezaat he ulaula he iyan ed-ul-ulahan te menge etew he kenà edtuu te Nengazen wey wazà pulus te ed-isipen dan.
49004018	Wazè dan hanew te hustu he ibayà ne wazè dan untung he ibeǥey te Megbevayà, geina te nengepaglung sikandan tenged te kezesen te ǥehinawa zan.
49004019	Kenè dan en igkeeled is minsan hengkey he ulaula zan he mezaat. Ne kenè dan daan ed-eǥenen is mahawag he kebayà te lawa zan, kekenà, utew zan en egkesuati is meremerik he ulaula.
49004020	Ne sikiyu mulà, dutun te kebpeketuu niw ki Kristu, kenà iyan heini sikan is impenurù keniyu.
49004021	Tutuu iyan he impesavut keniyu is keaǥi ni Kristu ne impesavut daan keniyu is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù din.
49004022	Tenged kayi engkezi niw is menge isip te zaan he kegkeetew niw su nesakup heini te zaan he menge mezaat he ulaula niw. Ebpekezezaat keniyu heini pinaaǥi te ebpemekelimbung he kebayè din.
49004023	Kinahanglan he egkepurung egkeveǥu is isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw.
49004024	Kinahanglan he edhimuwen kew he veǥu en he etew he iyan sikan is beǥu en he linimbag pinaaǥi te zagwey te Megbevayà. Egketuusan heini is beǥu he etew pinaaǥi te menge tutuu wey metazeng he ulaula he ibpeulaula keniyu te Megbevayà.
49004025	Umba, menge suled, engkezi niw is kedtarùtarù. Kinahanglan he tutuu is egkeǥiyen niw ziyà te menge zuma niw. Su nesevaha kiw he pudu parti te lawa ni Kristu.
49004026	Emun duen igkepauk niw tigkera niw is gehinawa niw su kela ke ibpekesalè niw. Ne kinahanglan he te kenè pa edsanlep is andew iawè niw en is pauk te isip niw.
49004027	Kenè niw ituǥut he pinaaǥi te pauk niw, ne mevintahai kew ni Setanas.
49004028	Is tekawen, engkezi zin is kebpenakew ne medterebahu su wey hustu he paaǥi is kegkuwaa zin te igkeuyag din ne wey metevangi zin is egkengeayuayu.
49004029	Kinahanglan he kenà ebpekezezaat is kebpemèbè niw, kekenà, iyan keǥiya niw is menge lalag he ebpekeveǥey he tavang te kedtuu te menge zuma niw su wey zekelà is pulus diyà te ebpemineg sumalà is egkinehenglanen dan.
49004030	Ne kenè niw ul-ulaha is minsan hengkey he kenà egkesuatan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin su iyan sikandin tuus diyan te keniyu he ǥaked kew te Megbevayà, wey tuus daan he keuzemà egkeuma is andew he zutun edhimesaza te Megbevayà is langun he nepuunan din en he vaal te kedlibriya zin keniyu te kebpekesalà.
49004031	Engkezi niw is kebpekunkuntedehè niw. Kenè kew meepes wey mepauk te zuma niw. Kenè kew pekid-eǥet; kenè kew ituk; kenè niw ituǥut he ibmezaat te ǥehinawa niw is minsan hengkey he ulaula te zuma niw,
49004032	kekenà, mebpepurpurungè kew te kada sevaha keniyu. Mebpehidhizuwè kew, mebpepespeseyluwè kew iring te mibpesaylu kew te Megbevayà tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu.
49005001	Ne ǥeina te pinelanggè kew he menge anak te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he mekeiring kew kandin.
49005002	Kinahanglan he ipeehè niw layun he mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa niw is menge zuma niw iring te mahal kiw ziyà te ǥehinawa ni Kristu. Mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kenitew wey kiw zin melibri. Nehimu heini he pemuhat he utew mehemut, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, utew egkesuati te Megbevayà.
49005003	Ne ǥeina te menge sakup kew te Megbevayà kinahanglan he kenè niw ul-ulaha is keleleǥed wey is minsan hengkey he ulaula he meremerik. Kenè niw hileveti is kenè niw esawa. Minsan is ked-isipa wey kegkeǥiya kayi ne kenè niw ul-ulaha.
49005004	Kenè niw ǥemita is menge meremerik, mahawag, wey wazè din pulus he menge lalag, kekenà, layun dekelà is kebpeselemati niw te Megbevayà.
49005005	Su ibpesavut ku keniyu is utew tutuu. Is etew he meremerik is ulaula zin wey ke edhilavet te kenè din esawa, ne kenà sikandin egkehedian ni Kristu wey te Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan is leǥezen he etew su is menge vutang he igkeleǥezi zin, egkehimu he menge megbevayè din.
49005006	Su tenged kayi he menge ulaula, utew egkepeuki te Megbevayà keuzemà is menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te menge suǥù din. Ne tenged dutun, kenè niw ituǥut he meketuu kew te tarù he penurù te minsan hentei he etew pinaaǥi te menge ketezengan dan he kenà tutuu.
49005007	Kenè kew mebpekid-upakat te minsan hentei he iring kayi.
49005008	Su zengan utew merusirem is ibayè niw, iyan, guntaan neteyawan is ibayè niw su nehimu kew en he menge sakup te Nengazen. Ne tenged kayi, kinahanglan he zait is ulaula niw te ked-ikula niw te merayag he ibayà.
49005009	Su emun neteyawan te Megbevayà is isip niw, egkeulaula niw is langun he hustu wey metazeng he vaal he ibpenurù te tutuu he tuluuwen.
49005010	Purungi niw istudyuwi ke hengkey is menge ulaula he egkesuatan te Nengazen.
49005011	Is menge etew he kemulu pa ziyà te kerusireman, kenè kew medtampu kandan te ed-ulaula te menge vaal he wazè din pulus, kekenà, ipeehè niw he mezaat is menge vaal zan.
49005012	Su is menge vaal he id-eles dan, utew mekeeled-eled minsan is kebenteeni zà kayi.
49005013	Ne pinaaǥi te kerayag, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is tutuu he tuluuwen, egketuenan dan ke hengkey is ed-isipen te Megbevayà dutun te menge ulaula zan, ne zutun egkehimu he egketeyawan daan is isip dan.
49005014	Ne mehitenged kayi zuen erubasa he edhenduen te, Sikew is edlipezeng, gimerat kad; sikew is minatey, ne mevanhew kad ne egketeyawan ka ni Jesu Kristu.
49005015	Umba, menge suled, pekeventayi niw is menge ulaula niw su wey kew mehimu he menge metau, ne kenà menge paglung.
49005016	Te minsan keenu, ke zuen meupiya he egkeveelan niw, beeli niw en su ǥuntaan he timpu mezelag is ebaal te meupiya.
49005017	Kenè niw ul-ulaha is wazè din pulus he ulaula, kekenà, purungi niw sevuta ke hengkey is ebpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà.
49005018	Kenè kew mebpelelangut te vinu su ebpekezezaat heini keniyu, kekenà, kinahanglan he egkepurung kew egkeulini te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
49005019	Emun ebpelelelaǥè kew, gemita niw is menge lalag diyà te menge Salmo wey menge kentahan he idalig te Megbevayà, wey menge kentahan he ibpinted keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Kentahi niw is Megbevayà ne pinaaǥi kayi te menge kentahan wey te menge Salmo, medlipey kew is edalig te Megbevayà.
49005020	Peselemati niw layun te Amey tew he Megbevayà is langun he tuvad din keniyu tenged te kedsundan niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
49005021	Mebpetetehuzè kew te kada sevaha tenged te kedtahud niw ki Kristu.
49005022	Sikiyu is menge vahi, pesakup kew te menge esawa niw iring te nesakup kew en te Nengazen.
49005023	Su is maama, duen din keǥehem te kebayàbayà te esawa zin, iring te si Kristu, duen keǥehem din te kebayàbayà kenitew te langun he menge tumutuu he iyan lawa zin. Midlibri kiw zin te silut is lawa zin.
49005024	Ne iring din ded daan kinahanglan he mebpesakup mebpurung is bahi te esawa zin iring te ebpesakup kiw ki Kristu is menge tumutuu zin.
49005025	Sikiyu is menge maama, kinahanglan he mahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw is esawa niw iring te mahal kiw is menge tumutuu ziyà te ǥehinawa ni Kristu. Egketuenan tew heini su mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kenitew wey kiw zin melibri te silut,
49005026	ne wey kiw mezawat te Megbevayà. Midhimu zin heini pinaaǥi te kedlumpiyuwi zin kenitew pinaaǥi te kebewtismu wey pinaaǥi te lalag din.
49005027	Elin daan idhimuwa zin kayi su wey kiw zin mezawat he esawa zin. Ne wazè en igkesawey zin kayi te kenitew su nepurung kiw en melumpiyuwi ne utew kiw mekempet diyà te kandin.
49005028	Ne iring din ded daan is maama, ne kinahanglan he mahala zin diyà te ǥehinawa zin is esawa zin iring te kebmahala zin te keugelingen din he lawa. Su is kebmahala zin te esawa zin ne iyan ded daan kebmahala zin te keugelingen din he lawa, su is teleesawa, sevaha zà sikandan he lawa.
49005029	Wazà etew he kenè din ebmahalen is keugelingen din he lawa, kekenà, ibpekaan din ne ebpurungan din iring te kebpurungi ni Kristu te keugelingen din he lawa.
49005030	Ne iyan kiw is menge tumutuu, lawa ni Kristu.
49005031	Tenged kayi, duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ed-ewaan te maama is iney zin wey amey zin ne ebpengesawa, ne sikandan is dezuwa, is maama wey haazà is bahi, ne egkesevaha zà.
49005032	Duen impezayag te Megbevayà kenitew kayi he utew tutuu, ne sumalà is kedsevuta ku kayi ne iyan ibpesavut din si Kristu wey sikitew is menge tumutuu.
49005033	Iyan, kenà duen dà taman su egkehimu zaan he elin egkeǥiyen din is teleesawa. Kinahanglan he mahala te maama is esawa zin ne kinahanglan daan he tehuza te vahi is kandin he esawa.
49006001	Sikiyu is menge vatà, kinahanglan he tumana niw layun is menge suǥù te menge ǥinikanan niw su ke tumutuu ki te Nengazen he si Jesus, iyan heini hustu he ulaula.
49006002	Duen insuǥù kenitew te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Tehuza niw is amey niw wey iney niw. Ne heini he suǥù, ne iyan nehuna he suǥù he midsumpulan din te penaad su
49006003	ke sikandin daan te, Emun edtumanen niw heini ne edtuvazan ku sikiyu te meupiya ne ebmeluǥayad is untung niw zini te kelibutan.
49006004	Ne sikiyu is menge ǥinikanan, kinahanglan he kenà igkepauk te menge anak niw is paaǥi niw te kebpenurù kandan, kekenà, ipenurù niw kandan is menge ulaula he zait te menge tumutuu, ne iyan niw isambag kandan is sambag he ebpuun te Nengazen tew.
49006005	Sikiyu is menge suluǥuen, purungi niw tumana is menge suǥù keniyu te menge egalen niw zini te kelibutan. Tehuza niw sikandan ne kinahanglan he ebpuun te meupiya he ǥehinawa niw is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù dan iring te iyan si Kristu edsuǥù keniyu.
49006006	Kinahanglan he layun meupiya is baal niw ne kenà dutun dà te ebentayan kew te egalen niw su kinahanglan he kenà iyan dà ebpekezalig te vaal niw is etew, kekenà, elin daan is Megbevayà su menge suluǥuen kiw zaan ni Kristu ne kinahanglan he edtumanen ta is ebpeveelan kenita te Megbevayà tenged te ebpuun te keputian te atey ta is kedtumana ta kayi. Kinahanglan he meupiya is gehinawa ta zutun te vaal ta iring te iyan ebayàbayà kenita is Megbevayà ne kenà iyan dà is egalen ta zini te kelibutan.
49006008	Su minsan ke suluǥuen ki, wey ke kenà, netuenan ta he ke meupiya is baal ta, ne meupiya zaan is idsuhul kenita te Megbevayà.
49006009	Ne sikiyu is menge egalen, iring din ded daan kayi is ul-ulaha niw ziyà te menge suluǥuen niw. Kenè kew mebpelihandek kandan su netuenan niw he sikitew is langun, ke suluǥuen ki wey ke egalen ki ve, ne zuen gihapun egalen ta ziyà te langit he iyan is Megbevayà ne wazè din ibpelavi te minsan hentei.
49006010	Menge suled, ketepusan heini he menge lalag ku keniyu: kinahanglan he lig-eni niw is kedsarig niw te Nengazen wey te lavew he zekelà he gehem din.
49006011	Gemita niw is langun he menge himan te kebpekidtebek he ibeǥey te Megbevayà su wey kew mekesukul ki Setanas emun egemiten din is ketau zin te kegkeiza zin keniyu.
49006012	Su kenà iyan edtebeken tew is menge etew zà duen, kekenà, iyan edtebeken tew is menge mezaat he kedesenan he ziyà ed-ubpà te langit wey is menge kenà egkeahà he hadì, wey menge egalen, wey menge ebayàbayà te langun he menge mezaat he etew he nesakup te kerusireman guntaan dini te kelibutan.
49006013	Umba, menge suled, gemita niw en is menge himan te kebpekidtebek he imbeǥey te Megbevayà. Su zutun emun egkeuma haazà is timpu he zutun utew mereǥen is kedtebeka te menge mezaat, ne egkesukulan niw is menge kuntada niw ne emun egketapus en haazà is tebek ne wazè kew meewai te zesen.
49006014	Ne tenged kayi, andam kew en. Layun tutuu is egkeǥiyen niw wey ed-isipen niw ne iyan heini bakes niw. Ul-ulaha niw layun is metazeng he ulaula ne iyan heini limbutung niw.
49006015	Andam kew layun te kebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kelinew he ibeǥey te Megbevayà, ne iyan heini sepatus niw.
49006016	Ne iyan utew kinahanglan is: layun kew sarig te Megbevayà ne iyan heini kelasag niw ne pinaaǥi kayi kenè kew egkesuǥat te menge egkeregreg he panà ni Setanas he iyan is menge penuley zin keniyu.
49006017	Ne zewata niw is kedlibriya keniyu te Megbevayà su iyan heini kalù niw he putew. Ne ǥemita niw layun daan is Lalag te Megbevayà su iyan heini sundang he ibeǥey keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
49006018	Pekezesen kew ampù te minsan hengkey he timpu sumalà is ked-uwita keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Buyù kew te tavang te Megbevayà ne layun kew andam ne peniguduwi niw layun te ked-ampù is langun he menge tumutuu.
49006019	Ne iampù a zaan keniyu he iveǥey kediey te Megbevayà is ketau te kebpenudtul te lalag din. Ne iampù niw zaan he kenà a mahandek, kekenà, iveǥey kediey is hustu he egkeǥiyen wey ku ikepesavut is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he in-eles dengan.
49006020	Umba nehimu a he suluǥuen te Megbevayà su wey ku ikepenudtul heini is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne tenged daan kayi te kebpenudtul ku, nehimu a he pirisu. Umba, menge suled, iampù a su wey kenà a mahandek te kebpenudtul su iyan heini ketengdanan he imbeǥey kediey te Megbevayà.
49006021	Si Tikiku is minahal tew he suled wey metinumanen he suluǥuen te Nengazen tew, iyan ebpeketudtul keniyu mehitenged te kebpekesavuk ku wey ke hengkey is egkeulaula ku kayi.
49006022	Umba edsuǥuen ku sikandin diyan su wey niw metueni ke hengkey is kebpekesavuk dey zini su wey meheǥet is kebpekesarig niw te Megbevayà.
49006023	Is Amey tew he Megbevayà wey is Nengazen tew he si Jesus, berakat he sikiyu is menge suled dey, tuvazi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk, wey ipeehè dan keniyu is kebmahala zan keniyu ziyà te ǥehinawa zan wey heǥeta zan is kedtuu niw kandan.
49006024	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew te Megbevayà is minsan hentei he kenà egkeawà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is kebmahala zin te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
50001001	Siak si Pablo wey si Timoteo surat dey heini, menge suluǥuen key ni Jesu Kristu. Ibpeuwit heini is surat diyan te keniyu te langun he menge tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu he menge meǥinged diyan te inged he Pilipus wey te menge ebmeǥurangen niw wey menge diyekunu.
50001002	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, ne veǥayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
50001003	Dekelà utew is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tew tenged keniyu emun egkeisip ku sikiyu.
50001004	Ne emun id-ampù ku sikiyu utew a egkelipey
50001005	su egketenuzan ku is kedtevangi niw kediey te kedsengyawa ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen puun pa te timpu zengan te kebpeketuu niw taman en guntaan.
50001006	Dutun he timpu mibpuunan te Megbevayà is meupiya he vaal zin he edhimuwen din diyan te keniyu. Ne netuenan ku he ebpeniguduwan din pa heini edhimuwa taman te egkepasad din keuzemà te andew te kedlikù ni Kristu.
50001007	Hustu iyan is ked-isipa ku keniyu te iring kayi su minsan ke pinirisu a wey ke kenà a pinirisu wey ke edsangyew a te Meupiya he Tudtulanen wey ke edtevaken ku is menge kuntada te Lalag te Megbevayà, mahal kew layun dini te ǥehinawa ku su pudu kiw ingkeǥaǥew te Megbevayà.
50001008	Ebpeketistiǥus is Megbevayà he utew zekelà is kebulunga ku keniyu su is kezekelà te ǥehinawa ku keniyu, ne iring te kezekelà te ǥehinawa ni Jesu Kristu keniyu.
50001009	Ne id-ampù ku he med-iseg is kebpepurpurungè niw, is kegketueni niw te menge ulaula te Megbevayà, wey is ketau niw te ked-isip
50001010	su wey niw layun metueni ke hengkey is hustu ne wey niw layun heini meulaula. Ne zutun wazà keuzemà igkesawey ziyan te keniyu su egkehimu kew he waǥas dutun te kedlikù ni Kristu.
50001011	Ne zutun egkeveelan niw is minsan hengkey he metazeng he ulaula tenged te ǥehem he ibeǥey ni Jesu Kristu su wey mezalig wey mevantug is Megbevayà.
50001012	Menge suled, egkesuatan ku he mesavut niw he is langun he mereǥen he nehitavù kediey, ne kenà mezaat, kekenà, meupiya, su neketavang kedì te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
50001013	Su is langun he menge sundaru he guwardya zini te turuǥan te hadì wey is minsan hentei pa kayi, ne netuenan dan he mibpirisu a tenged dà te suluǥuen a ni Kristu.
50001014	Ne kenà duen dà taman su is kezekelan te menge zuma tew he tumutuu, ingkeheǥet te kedsarig dan te Nengazen heini is kebpirisuwa kedì. Ne tenged kayi ed-iseg is sigudu zan te kedsengyawa te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenè dan en egkehandek.
50001015	Is duma, ne iyan idsengyawa zan te impenurù ni Kristu is: tenged te nesina zan kediey ne wey e zan melevawi. Iyan, duen duma he iyan idsengyawa zan te menge penurù ni Kristu su igkesuat dan heini te ebpenudtul.
50001016	Ebpenudtul zan tenged te mahal a ziyà te ǥehinawa zan su netuenan dan he mibpilì a te Megbevayà wey ku metavak is menge kuntada te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
50001017	Iyan, is menge zuma, kenà meupiya is tuyù dan te kebentuǥa zan ki Kristu. Egkesuatan dan he melevawi e zan ne kunaan dan ke pinaaǥi kayi egkeumanan is menge samuk ku zini te pirisuwan.
50001018	Iyan, nasì ku igkelipey heini is menge vaal zan su ke hustu is tuyù dan wey minsan ke mezaat, maambe en, asal mevantug dan si Kristu.
50001019	Kenà egkeawà is kelipey ku su netuenan ku he ibpaawà a kayi te pirisuwan tenged te ked-empua niw kedì wey tenged te tavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he midtevangan din daan si Jesu Kristu.
50001020	Ne utew ku egkesuati, wey idsarig ku ziyà te Megbevayà he layun ku metuman is ebpeveelan din kedì su wey a kenà meeled te minsan keenu he timpu lavew en guntaan. Egkesuatan ku he mezalig si Kristu tenged kedì pinaaǥi te kebpaawaa kedì kayi te pirisuwan ne emun kenà, ne mezalig si Kristu pinaaǥi te kebpatey ku.
50001021	Ne tenged te egkesuatan ku he mezalig si Kristu, egkesuatan ku he mebmeluǥayad pa is ked-ubpaubpè ku zini te kelibutan su wey mevantug ku pa si Kristu, iyan, ke ebpatey a ne lavew pa he ibmeupiya ku.
50001022	Kenè ku egketuenan ke hendei zapit is meupiya he ebpilien ku, su egkesuatan ku he metapus en is ked-ubpaubpè ku zini te kelibutan wey a mekepekidume en ki Kristu su meupiya pa utew haazà. Iyan, ke zuen pa ebpeveelan kedì he ebpulus, meupiya zaan.
50001024	Iyan, kinahanglan he kenè e pa ebpatey wey ku sikiyu metevangi.
50001025	Ne tenged te iyan heini netaǥù dini te ǥehinawa ku, netuenan ku he kenè pa egketapus is untung ku kayi te kelibutan ne ebpekiduma e pa keniyu wey ku mepurungi te edheǥet is kelipey niw tenged te kedtuu niw.
50001026	Ne zutun, ke ebpekelikù ad diyan te keniyu egkehimu he iyan a igkeventuǥa niw ki Jesu Kristu.
50001027	Menge suled, ke minsan hengkey is egkehitavù kediey, utew kinahanglan he is menge ulaula niw, ne kenà ebpekesuwey te impenurù ni Kristu pinaaǥi te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Su emun kenè kew edsuwey kayi, minsan ke kenà a ebpekelikù diyan, egketudtulan a he nesevaha is gehinawa niw wey tuyù niw te kedhaǥù su wey metuuwi te mezakel he menge etew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
50001028	Ne egketudtulan a zaan he kenè kew egkehandek te menge kuntada niw. Su emun kenè kew egkehandek kandan egkesavut dan he iyan sikandan edsilutan ne iyan kew ebeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan su ibpesavut kandan heini te Megbevayà.
50001029	Su is mibpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà, ne kenà iyan dà is kedtuuwi niw ki Kristu, kekenà, elin daan is ked-entusa niw te kemeresayan tenged te kedtuu niw kandin.
50001030	Nekedreragkes kiw en is ed-antus te kemeresayan tenged te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne heini is menge kemeresayan he nehitavù kediey zengan, ne kemulu ǥuntaan kenè ku egkesuwey, sumalà is nezineg niw.
50002001	Menge suled, netuenan ku he ingkeheǥet te kedtuu niw is kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu, ne netuenan ku zaan he naawà is menge keseengan niw mehitenged te hizu zin keniyu. Ne netuenan ku zaan he neupakat kew pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne ebpekedhihizuwè kew wey ebpelimlimuey kew is menge tumutuu.
50002002	Ne tenged kayi te langun edhengyuan ku sikiyu he tuǥuti niw he mepurung mesevaha is isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw, ne heǥeta niw is kebmahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw te menge zuma niw. Ne emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini human egkeheǥet is kelipey ku tenged keniyu.
50002003	Kinahanglan he kenà kew mebpekidlawan ne kenè kew mebpelavew, kekenà, isipa te minsan hentei keniyu he minus is pid-etawan din kenà te zuma zin.
50002004	Kenè niw iyan dà isipa is keniyu he egkinehenglanen, kekenà, isipa niw zaan is egkinehenglanen te menge zuma niw.
50002005	Kinahanglan he iring is isip niw te isip ni Jesu Kristu.
50002006	Su minsan ke kenà egkeawà diyà te kandin is kegkemegbevayè din wazè din isipa he kenè din ed-ewaan is kebpekesavuk din te zekelà is keǥehem din he Megbevayà,
50002007	kekenà, mid-ewaan din ne mibpaanak te etew, ne nehimu he suluǥuen te Megbevayà.
50002008	Ne zutun te etew en sikandin wazà sikandin mebpelavew, kekenà, mibpezumazuma sikandin te menge suǥù kandin te Amey zin he Megbevayà minsan pa te pinaaǥi kayi inransang sikandin te krus ne zutun mibpatey.
50002009	Ne tenged kayi midhimu en sikandin te Megbevayà he utew lavew, ne migeraran din sikandin te ǥerar he lavew pa te minsan hengkey he ǥerar te minsan hentei.
50002010	Ne umba mid-ulaula heini te Megbevayà su ke egkezineg is gerar ni Jesus, ed-ezapen si Jesus te minsan hentei he linimbag he ziyà te langit wey zini te tanà, wey minsan diyà te Iveyaan. Ebpekeluhud dan kandin,
50002011	ne ebpekekaǥi zan he iyan si Jesu Kristu Nengazen te minsan hengkey. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egkevantug dan daan is Amey tew he Megbevayà.
50002012	Ne umba, menge suled, iring te layun kew ebpememineg te menge suǥù ku, ne kenà dutun dà te kebpekiduma ku keniyu, kekenà, minsan te wazà a ziyan te keniyu, ne iring din ded daan guntaan kinahanglan is uman sevaha keniyu, ne himuwa zin is taman te egkehimu zin he edumahan te kegkehandek te Megbevayà su wey mepasad haazà is nepuunan en te Megbevayà te kedlibriya zin keniyu te silut.
50002013	Su layun edtavang keniyu is Megbevayà wey niw mesuati ne wey niw mehimu is kedtumana te tuyù din diyan te keniyu.
50002014	Is langun he ebpeveelan din keniyu, tumana niw te wazà kebpeneremudtemud wey kebelivad.
50002015	Ne zutun, wazà mezaat diyan te keniyu su meupiya is ulaula niw su menge anak kew te Megbevayà he wazà igkesewayi zin keniyu, minsan te zini kew pa mekeubpà te kelibutan te teliwazà te lalung he menge etew he kenà memetazeng is menge ulaula. Iring kew te menge sulù
50002016	he edtayew kandan su ibpesavut niw kandan is lalag he ebpekeveǥey kandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan niw, utew ebmeupiya is ǥehinawa ku keuzemà dutun te andew te kedlikù ni Kristu su egketuenan ku zutun he zekelà is pulus te kedhaǥù ku ziyan te keniyu.
50002017	Is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà, ne iring te pemuhat he edewaten din. Ne emun egkesuatan din pa he id-uman is kebpatey ku kayi te pemuhat, igkelipey ku pa. Ne igkelipey ku zaan is kedtuu niw iring te nelipey kew.
50002018	Ne iring din ded daan, kinahanglan he igkelipey niw zaan is kebpatey ku emun egkehitavù kediey.
50002019	Dekelà is kedsarig ku te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he meǥaan ku en egkesuǥù diyan te keniyu si Timoteo. Ne emun ebpekelikù en dini, egketuenan ku ke hengkey is kebpekesavuk niw. Ne utew heini ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa ku.
50002020	Iyan dà sikandin duma ku kayi he utew zekelà is gehinawa zin keniyu.
50002021	Is duma, ne iyan dà egkeisip dan is kandan dà he egkesuatan, ne kenà iyan is egkesuatan ni Jesu Kristu.
50002022	Si Timoteo, netuenan niw he hustu is menge ulaula zin. Iring sikandin te tutuu he anak ku te kedtevangi zin kedì te kedsengyawa kayi te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
50002023	Umba, emun egketuenan ku en ke hengkey is egkehitavù kedì kayi, egkesuatan ku he segugunè ku sikandin mesuǥù diyan.
50002024	Ne zekelà daan is kedsarig ku te Megbevayà he meǥaan a zaan ebpeketelukun kandin.
50002025	Ne elin daan kayi te isip ku he kinahanglan he ibpehendiyan ku is suled tew he si Ipepruditu, kes midsuǥù niw pehendini wey e zin metevangi. Iyan sikandin duma ku wey timbang ku kayi te ebpeveelan kedì te Megbevayà.
50002026	Umba ibpehendiyan ku su utew sikandin ebulunga keniyu ne utew inmezaat te ǥehinawa zin is nezineg niw he tudtul he nezeruwan sikandin.
50002027	Netigbak iyan sikandin is midaru umba kunaan ku ke ibpatey zin en, iyan, nehizuwan sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne nehizuwan a zaan te Megbevayà su ke mibpatey sikandin, neumanan en geina is menge seeng ku.
50002028	Umba utew ku egkesuati heini is ked-ulì din diyan su wey kew melipey te kebpekeuma zin ne pinaaǥi kayi egkeawà daan is kedì he kegkeseeng.
50002029	Umba, kinahanglan he meǥalew kew te kebpekeuma zin su suled tew sikandin tenged te kedtuu zin te Nengazen. Is langun he iring kayi he etew, tehuza niw
50002030	su hapit sikandin ebpatey wey zin metuman is ebpeveelan kandin ni Kristu. Inserakan din is untung din wey e zin metevangi su zutun he timpu kenà a keniyu egketevangan.
50003001	Na, menge suled, ketepusan heini he sambag ku keniyu. Lipey kew tenged te upakat niw te Nengazen. Maambe ke idsublì ku keniyu is daan he sambag ku su melemu zà heini, ne kela ke egkehimu he pinaaǥi kayi egkelig-enan is isip niw.
50003002	Likayi niw is menge kuntada te Megbevayà he mezaat is ulaula zan he iyan is menge Hudiyu he ebpenurù he iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà is kebpelii niw te lawa niw.
50003003	Iyan kiw kes tutuu he menge sakup te Megbevayà, ne kenà iyan sikandan, su pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ed-azap kiw te Megbevayà ne edlipey kiw tenged te upakat tew ki Jesu Kristu. Ne kenè tew iyan edseriǥan is kelibutanen he ulaula iring te kebpesirkunsidar.
50003004	Iyan, ke egkehimu he egkeseriǥan is iring dutun, egkeseriǥan is nengeulaula ku zengan su ke zuen etew he kunaan din ke egkeseriǥan din is kedtumana zin te menge kelibutanen he tulumanen, ne egkelevawan ku pa sikandin te kedtumana kayi.
50003005	Su hein walu en he andew is ked-enaka kedì, ne midsirkunsidar a. Is menge ǥinikanan ku, ne kevuwazan sikandan ni Benjamin he anak te kepuun dey he si Israyil. Ne tudalis a he Hudiyu. Mibpurungan ku te edtuman is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises su Perisiyu a.
50003006	Ne tuus te utew meheǥet dini te ǥehinawa ku is kedtumana ku te menge tulumanen dey te menge Hudiyu, su mibpemesipelahan ku is menge tumutuu ki Jesus. Ne sumalà te kedtumana ku te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises wazè ku netuenan he supak ku te Megbevayà.
50003007	Iyan, is langun he iring dutun he kunaan ku ke egkeseriǥan ku wey a melibri te silut, mid-engkezan ku en wey ku maangken si Kristu.
50003008	Ne kenà dutun dà taman is mid-engkezan ku, kekenà, mid-eminan ku engkezi is minsan hengkey he zekelà dini te ǥehinawa ku su wey ku mekuwa is utew pa lavew he mahal he iyan is kebpekidsevaha ku ki Jesu Kristu te Nengazen ku. Tenged kandin mid-engkezan ku is langun ne mid-isip ku heini he abper zà dini te kelibutan wey a mekepekidsevaha ki Kristu,
50003009	su wey a zaan meisip te Megbevayà he metazeng tenged ki Kristu. Wazà a meisip he metazeng pinaaǥi te kediey zà he ulaula te kedtumana te kesuǥuan, su mibpeketazeng a te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtuu ku ki Kristu. Heini is kebmetazeng, ne idtuvad kenita te Megbevayà emun edtuu ki ki Kristu.
50003010	Iyan dà guntaan ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa ku is kegketueni ku te menge ulaula ni Kristu wey is kebulusi kedì te ǥehem he iyan sikan is gehem he ingkevanhew zin. Egkesuatan ku he mekeambit a zaan duen te kemeresayan he mid-antus din he iyan is ked-engkezi ku te kediey he egkesuatan iring te kandin he kebelevaǥa te untung din.
50003011	Umba egkesuatan ku heini su wey mehimu he mevanhew a keuzemà.
50003012	Kenè ku iyan ibpesavut kayi he netuman en dini te kedì heini is langun wey ke nehimu e en he etew he wazè en duen igkesawey, kekenà, ebpenigudu a wey heini metuman su iyan heini tuyù ni Jesu Kristu zutun te kedhimuwa zin kedì he sakup din.
50003013	Netuenan ku, menge suled, he wazè pa heini metuman dini te kedì, iyan, mid-awè ku ziyà te isip ku is nengehuna he nengetuman ku en, ne edhimuwen ku is taman te egkehimu ku wey ku mekuwa is langun he egkesuatan te Megbevayà he mekuwa ku keuzemà.
50003014	Ebpenigudu e pa wey ku mekuwa is suhul te Megbevayà su iyan heini ketezengan ke maan is mid-umew kiw zin te ked-angken te untung he wazà pidtemanan pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Jesu Kristu.
50003015	Ne is langun te sikitew he meǥurang en te kedtuu, kinahanglan he iring kayi zaan is isip tew wey ǥehinawa tew. Iyan, emun kenè kew egkengeuyun ibpetuenan keniyu te Megbevayà is benar.
50003016	Iyan, kinahanglan guntaan he edtumanen tew is daan he impenurù kenitew te Megbevayà.
50003017	Is langun te sikiyu, menge suled, purungi niw te ed-iring heini is menge ulaula ku. Iyan niw zaan iringi haazà is menge etew he iring is menge ulaula zan te kenami he ulaula.
50003018	Dengan ku zà heini layun egkeǥiya, iyan, guntaan ed-umanan ku egkeǥiya zuma is menge luhè ku he ebpeniǥis, tenged te mezakel he menge etew he egkeǥiyen dan he sakup sikandan ni Kristu, iyan, egketuusan pinaaǥi te ulaula zan he kuntada sikandan te kebpesevuta mehitenged te kebpehimatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus.
50003019	Siguradu egkeimpirnu sikandan su iyan ebayàbayà kandan is menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa zan. Ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa zan is menge mezaat he ulaula, iyan, meupiya pezem ke igkeeled dan; ne iyan dan dà egkeisip is menge vutang he zini te kelibutan.
50003020	Ne sikitew mulà, ne iyan hustu he inged tew is diyà te langit ne utew zekelà is perateng tew te kedlikù te Menluluwas tew he ebpuun diyà te langit he iyan is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
50003021	Ne zutun te andew, ne edhelinen din en is memeǥuyà he menge lawa tew ne edhimuwen din he iring te mekeǥeǥehem he lawa zin. Ne kayi te kedhelina zin kenitew, egemiten din is dekelà he ǥehem din he iyan ingkehimu zin he ebayàbayà te minsan hengkey.
50004001	Umba menge minahal ku he menge suled, heǥeta niw is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù te Nengazen. Utew a mibulung keniyu. Igkelipey ku sikiyu wey ibmeupiya kew te ǥehinawa ku.
50004002	Edhengyuan ku sikiyu, Ibudya wey Sintiki, he melinew is kebpekid-upakat niw su telesuled kew tenged te upakat niw te Nengazen.
50004003	Ne sikew zaan is timbang ku ziyan, egkesuatan ku he tevangi nu heini is menge vahi wey zan heini metuman su mibpenigudu zan te kedtavang kedì te kedsengyawa ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne elin daan si Clemente wey zuen pa menge zuma niw he midtavang kedì. Is menge ngazan dan te langun, ne nekesurat en diyà te libru te Megbevayà he zutun inlista zin is mibeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
50004004	Egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu he sigudu kew lipey tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw te Nengazen, su meupiya ke zekelà layun is kelipey niw.
50004005	Kinahanglan he peketulanged kew te minsan hentei su meǥaan en edlikù is Nengazen.
50004006	Kenè niw ikeseeng is minsan hengkey he egkeulaula niw, kekenà, emun ed-ampù kew buyua niw ziyà te Megbevayà is egkinehenglanen niw ne emun ebuyù kew, ne kinahanglan he peselemati niw en he zaan.
50004007	Ne zutun wazà samuk diyà te isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw su pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu ibeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà is melinawen he ǥehinawa he kenà egkesavut te minsan hentei he etew.
50004008	Ketepusan heini, menge suled, he menge lalag ku keniyu. Iyan niw itaǥù diyà te isip niw is meupiya, is dait he igkezeliǥi, is tutuu he tuluuwen, is metazeng wey hustu wey mekempet he ulaula, wey is minsan hengkey he igkehimu te minsan hentei he egketahud.
50004009	Pen-ul-ulaha niw heini is langun he impenurù ku, wey impesavut ku keniyu pinaaǥi te menge lalag ku wey pinaaǥi zaan te menge ulaula ku. Ne zutun, is Megbevayà he iyan puunà te kelinew tew te wazè din pidtemanan, iyan ed-ulin keniyu.
50004010	Utew zekelà is kelipey ku wey is kebpeselemati ku te Nengazen su nehimu en maan he ingkepeehè niw is gaǥew niw pinaaǥi kayi te impeuwit niw kedì. Kenè ku iyan ibpesavut keniyu he wazè niw gaǥew kedì dutun te nengehuna he timpu, kekenà, wazè niw pa zutun paaǥi wey niw ikepaahà is gaǥew niw.
50004011	Kenà iyan igkeǥiya ku kayi is tenged te zuen kurang ku te menge egkinehenglanen ku, su minsan ke kenà utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk ku, impenurù kedì te Megbevayà he kinahanglan he mebmeupiya ǥihapun is gehinawa ku.
50004012	Neseǥazan ku en is kegkealang-alang wey is neezenan te langun he egkinehenglanen ku. Ne neleyaman ku en heini he egkeulaula te minsan hendei wey te minsan keenu, se zuen keuyaǥan ku se wazè ku keuyaǥan, ke neeezenan a wey ke egkealang-alang a.
50004013	Egkehimu ku is minsan hengkey he ibpeulaula kedì tenged te tavang ni Kristu he iyan edlig-en kedì.
50004014	Ne minsan pa te iyan heini, utew kew metulanged su midtevangan a keniyu kayi te menge seeng ku he mezakel.
50004015	Sikiyu is menge tigPilipus, netuenan niw he zutun te kedhipanew ku puun diyan te prubinsya he Mesidunya hein aney ku en ipenudtul ziyan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iyan kew zà menge tumutuu he midtavang kedì. Wazà duma he gurupu te menge tumutuu he nehimu he menge timbang ku su iyan kew zà nekeveǥey kedì te selapì.
50004016	Ne hein diyè e pa te Mesidunya, diyà te inged he Tiselunika, ne layun kew ebpeuwit te tavang niw kedì.
50004017	Kenè ku iyan igkekeǥiya kayi su wey a layun mekezawat te ibeǥey niw, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he zekelà is suhul keniyu te Megbevayà.
50004018	Nezawat ku en is impeuwit niw ne utew subra is imbeǥey niw. Ne kenà ad egkealang-alang su inhated en ni Ipepruditu zini is idtavang niw kedì. Iring heini te pemuhat he utew mehemut, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, utew igkesuat te Megbevayà.
50004019	Ne is Megbevayà, iyan daan ebeǥey keniyu te langun he kinahanglan niw tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu su utew zekelà is ketiǥeyunan din.
50004020	Berakat he zeliǥa is Amey tew he Megbevayà te wazà pidtemanan.
50004021	Ebpengemusta a keniyu te langun he menge tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu ziyan. Is menge suled tew he zuma ku kayi, ebpengemusta zan daan keniyu.
50004022	Ne is langun he menge zuma ku he tumutuu kayi te inged, lavew en is menge suled tew he zini ed-ubpà te valey te hadì, ebpengemusta zan daan keniyu.
50004023	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan a si Pablo.
51001001	Siak si Pablo wey heini is suled tew he si Timoteo, ebpengemusta key keniyu ziyan. Epustul a; midsuǥù a ni Jesu Kristu su iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
51001002	Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu is menge ǥaked te Megbevayà diyan te inged he Kulusas he menge metinumanen te lalag ni Kristu. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey veǥayi kew zin te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
51001003	Sikami, emun id-ampù dey sikiyu, layun key ebpeselemat diyà te Megbevayà he Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus tenged keniyu,
51001004	su nezineg dey is tudtul he mezesen is kedtuu niw ki Jesu Kristu wey zekelà layun is gaǥew niw te minsan hentei he etew he ǥaked te Megbevayà.
51001005	Umba mezesen is kedtuu niw wey zekelà is gaǥew niw su kenà egkeawà is perateng niw te langun diyà te langit he inteǥana keniyu te Megbevayà. Nezineg niw heini zutun te kebpesevuta keniyu te tutuu he penurù he iyan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
51001006	Heini is migkaǥi he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, pinaaǥi te kedtuu kayi, mezakel en he menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei he inged is mibmeupiya is menge ulaula zan. Ne kenà duen dà taman su ed-iseg ebmezakel is menge tumutuu pinaaǥi te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iring te layun daan ed-iseg ebmezakel is menge tumutuu ziyan te keniyu puun pa zutun te andew zengan he nezineg niw is tudtul te ǥaǥew kenitew te Megbevayà wey netuenan niw he venar iyan.
51001007	Impenurù keniyu heini ni Ipapras he minahal he zuma zey he suluǥuen ni Kristu. Metinumanen sikandin te menge suǥù ni Kristu pinaaǥi te kedtavang din kenami.
51001008	Midtudtul zin kenami he zekelà is gaǥew niw te menge zuma tew he tumutuu tenged te mid-ulinan kew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
51001009	Ne tenged kayi ibpenigudu zey sikiyu id-ampù puun pa zutun te andew zengan he nezineg dey is tudtul mehitenged te kedtuu niw. Layun dey id-ampù diyà te Megbevayà he veǥayi kew zin te kegkesayud te langun he ulaula he ebpeveelan din keniyu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mehimu kew zin he mebmetau ne pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, iveǥey zin keniyu is kegketuusi te meupiya wey mezaat.
51001010	Su emun ebeelan din is iring kayi, ne human egkehimu is menge ulaula niw he zait he menge ulaula te menge etew he neǥaked te Nengazen tew, ne egkehimu zaan he layun niw egkeveeli is egkesuatan din; layun niw egkeulaula is minsan hengkey he menge meupiya he ulaula. Ne layun daan ed-iseg is kegketueni niw te menge ulaula te Megbevayà.
51001011	Ne ibeǥey zin keniyu is dekelà he ǥehem he ebpuun te zekelà he ǥehem din, ne tenged kayi te ǥehem layun niw egkeantus is kemereǥenan he zekelà is kelipey niw.
51001012	Ne kenà duen dà taman su zekelà dutun is kebpeselemat niw te Amey tew he Megbevayà tenged te kedhimuwa zin keniyu he zait he mekeambit kew zutun te langun he ibeǥey zin diyà te keniyu te menge ǥaked din he midteyawan is isip dan.
51001013	Midtevangan kiw te Amey tew he Megbevayà ne tenged kayi wazè kiw en maan meveyveyai te kerusireman, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, si Setanas . Ne ǥuntaan iyan en ebayàbayà kenitew is Anak te Megbevayà he si Jesus he utew mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa te Megbevayà.
51001014	Ne pinaaǥi kayi te Anak din, nevelukasan kiw zin te kegkeuripen kenitew ni Setanas ne mibpesaylu kiw zin te menge ulaula tew he mezaat.
51001015	Heini is Anak te Megbevayà, ne iyan kebpeǥawaǥawa te kenà egkeahà he Megbevayà. Is Anak, ne lavew sikandin te minsan hengkey he linimbag din
51001016	su pinaaǥi kandin te Anak te Megbevayà midlimbag te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey ziyà te langit wey zini te tanà, sikan is egkeahà te etew wey is kenà egkengeahà he kedesenan he zuen dan keǥehem, wey kebayàbayà, wey kedhadì. Is Anak, mibpeveelan kandin te Amey zin he Megbevayà is minsan hengkey su wey zin meǥamit heini is minsan hengkey he linimbag din.
51001017	Ne elin daan ketezengan ke maan is lavew is Anak te Megbevayà su tenged te zaan en sikandin te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey, wey pinaaǥi kandin is hustu he kebpekesavuk wey egkengeulaula te langun he linimbag.
51001018	wey tenged te iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te lawa zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is langun he menge tumutuu kandin, wey tenged daan te iyan sikandin ebeǥey te untung diyà te langun he menge tumutuu su iyan sikandin lavew te langun he egkengevanhew ne tenged kayi iyan sikandin lavew te minsan hengkey.
51001019	Ne egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà he ke hengkey sikandin, iyan ded daan sikan is Anak din.
51001020	Ne egkesuatan din daan he pinaaǥi te Anak din meked-uliey te meupiya he kedepità sikandin wey is minsan hentei zini te tanà wey ziyà te langit. Ne pinaaǥi te kedtiǥis duen te lengesa te Anak din diyà te krus egkehimu he menge emiǥu zin is minsan hentei.
51001021	Kenè kew zengan menge emiǥu te Megbevayà, kekenà, menge kuntada kew zin su layun mezaat is menge isip niw wey ulaula niw.
51001022	Ne minsan pa te iyan haazà, midhimu kew ǥuntaan te Megbevayà he menge emiǥu zin pinaaǥi te kebpatey ni Kristu. Umba mibpehimatey si Kristu su wey kew mehimu he menge etew he wazà mezaat he ulaula ne wazà igkesumbunga keniyu keuzemà emun ibpeetuvang kew zin diyà te Amey zin he Megbevayà.
51001023	Iyan, kinahanglan he kenè niw engkezi is kedtuu te tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, lig-eni niw is kedtuu niw ne kenè kew medarà is ebpaabut te langun he impenaad te Megbevayà he nezineg niw zengan hein impenurù keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Heini is nekaǥi he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ne insangyew ziyà te menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei. Siak si Pablo, midsuǥù a wey ku ikesangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
51001024	Maambe ke ebpekeantus a ǥuntaan te merasey su iyan igkezeyzey niw. Igkelipey ku heini su iring te kegkerasey ni Kristu edhimesazan ku en is langun he mereǥen he ibpaantus din kediey su wey mezeyzey is lawa ni Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is menge tumutuu kandin.
51001025	Nehimu a he suluǥuen wey a meketavang te menge tumutuu. Ne umba mibpilì a te Megbevayà su wey ku sikiyu metevangi is menge etew he kenà Hudiyu ne wey ku ikepurung ikepenudtul is Lalag te Megbevayà.
51001026	Ne zengan, heini is Lalag, ne in-eles te Megbevayà ne wazà ipezayag diyà te menge etew, iyan, guntaan ibpezayag din en kenitew te menge tumutuu kandin
51001027	su egkesuatan din he sikitew is menge ǥaked din, ne egkesayud kiw ke hengkey is utew lavew he meupiya he edhimuwen din diyà te langun he menge etew. Ibpesayud din en kenitew he edlumunan kiw ni Kristu ne tenged kayi egketuenan tew he edtulusen kiw keuzemà.
51001028	Sikami, idsangyew zey si Kristu; edleǥuyan dey is minsan hentei, wey ebpenurù key kandan ebpurung sumalà is egkehimu zey he ketau su wey meketuu is langun ki Kristu, ne wey sikandan keuzemà ikepeetuvang diyà te Megbevayà he wazà kurang te kedtuu zan.
51001029	Siak, ebpenigudu a ebaal he edlig-enan te zekelà he zesen ni Kristu su wey metuman heini.
51002001	Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su egkesuatan ku he metueni niw ke maan is ebpenigudu a edhaǥù tenged keniyu wey tenged daan te menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Leudisiya wey is minsan hentei he tumutuu ziyan he iring keniyu wazè pa mekekilala kedì.
51002002	Iyan idhaǥù ku su wey melig-eni is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kegkeupakat niw wey pinaaǥi te kebmahala niw te uman sevaha keniyu. Egkesuatan ku he meheǥet is kegkesavut niw te impenurù keniyu he iyan kes impezayag te Megbevayà keniyu mehitenged ki Kristu.
51002003	Su iyan dà sikandin ebpekeveǥey te minsan hengkey he tutuu he ketau wey tutuu he kedsavut.
51002004	Egkeǥiyen ku heini su wey wazà mekekabig keniyu he minsan hentei pinaaǥi te menge ketezengan he henduen be te hustu, iyan, tarù.
51002005	Su minsan te wazà a ǥuntaan diyan te keniyu, layun ku sikiyu ed-isipa. Igkelipey ku sikiyu su netuenan ku he mibpurungan niw te ed-ulaula is meupiya he ulaula wey melig-en daan is kedtuu niw ki Kristu.
51002006	Ne ǥeina te midawat niw si Jesu Kristu he Nengazen niw kinahanglan he is menge ulaula niw, ne zait te upakat niw kandin.
51002007	Purung kew pendalid diyà te kandin; purungi niw istudyuwi is menge ulaula zin; purungi niw tuuwi sikan is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu. Ne kinahanglan he layun niw peselemati te Megbevayà is gaǥew zin keniyu.
51002008	Andam kew su kela ke zuen egkabig keniyu pinaaǥi te kebpenurù te tuluuwen he tarù ne wazè din pulus su imbilinbilin dà te menge etew. Kenà haazà hustu he tuluuwen su kenà ebpuun diyà te ki Kristu.
51002009	Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su si Kristu, nehimu sikandin he etew. Duen din lawa, iyan, minsan pa kayi is minsan hengkey he ziyà te Megbevayà ne ziyà te kandin.
51002010	Ne sikiyu zaan, pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu, nekepurung kew en mekeazen te untung he imbeǥey keniyu ni Kristu. Ne iyan si Kristu sikan is edhadì te minsan hentei he kedesenan he zuen din keǥehem wey kebayàbayà.
51002011	Ne tenged kayi, minsan kenè kew menge Hudiyu, is midhimu keniyu te Megbevayà, ne iring duen te kedsirkunsidara zengan te menge Hudiyu su nehimu kew en he menge ǥaked te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu. Iyan, selakew heini, su kenà pinaaǥi te kebpelii te lawa zà duen, kekenà, in-awà ni Kristu is gehem te mezaat he kebayà te lawa niw.
51002012	Ne tenged kayi inleveng kew zuma kandin dutun te kebewtismuwi keniyu, ne nevanhew kew zaan duma kandin su nekidsevaha kew kandin tenged te midtuuwan niw he mekeǥeǥehem is Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin sikan is mibanhew ki Kristu.
51002013	Ne sikiyu, wazè niw pa zengan untung he wazè din pidtemanan tenged te memezaat is menge ulaula niw te kenà menge Hudiyu wey tenged te midtuman niw is memezaat he kebayà te lawa niw. Ne minsan pa zutun, mibeǥayan kew te Megbevayà te untung he wazè din pidtemanan ne nevanhew kew en duma ki Kristu. Mibpesaylu kiw te Megbevayà te langun he menge salè tew.
51002014	Ne minsan pa te wazè kiw medtuman te insurat he kesuǥuan din, pinaaǥi te kebpatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus, in-awè din is kesuǥuan ne tenged kayi wazè en igkesiluti zin kenitew.
51002015	Ne haazà is menge kedesenan he mezaat he mulin-ulin he zuen dan keǥehem te kebayàbayà, in-awà te Megbevayà is keǥehem dan, ne pinaaǥi te kedsulituwa zin kandan pinaaǥi te kebpatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus, impeehè din he wazè dan en kebpekesukul.
51002016	Umba, menge suled, kenè niw itetenged is edsudì keniyu emun kenè niw ebpezumdumahan is egkesuatan dan he ibpeulaula keniyu mehitenged te kegkaan wey ked-inum, wey mehitenged daan te kedsilibra te menge mahal he menge andew wey kedsilibra te intrada te hayag wey menge andew te kedhimeley.
51002017	Su is menge iring dutun, ne nehimu zengan he alung dà. Ne ziyè pa te huziyan is teǥialung dutun he iyan si Kristu.
51002018	Duen daan menge etew he egkaǥi he lavew sikandan tenged te zuen kun menge egkein-inuwan he impaahà kandan wey tenged te kenè dan mepelevawen. Ne ibpenurù dan he kinahanglan he ebpekeazap ki te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ziyà te langit. Kenè niw, menge suled, itetenged is kedsudì dan keniyu su is iring dutun he etew, ne ebpezalig dà, iyan, wazà hustu he ketezengan te kebpezalig dan su iyan ebayàbayà te isip dan is kelibutanen he kebayè dan.
51002019	Ne wazè dan en upakat ki Kristu he iyan ed-uwit kenitew. Iyan si Kristu puunà te zesen te kedtuu tew ne pinaaǥi kandin ed-iseg is kezesen te upakat tew te langun he tumutuu sumalà is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, iring te lawa tew, ne ed-iseg daan is desen din ne kenè ebpekedsusuwey pinaaǥi te kegkevagkes kayi zutun te menge uǥat din.
51002020	Na, menge suled, geina te iring te minatey ki en duma ki Kristu, wey kenè ki en maan egkeveyveyaan te menge kenà hustu he tuluuwen, kinahanglan he kenè kew en maan mebpemineg te menge suǥù te menge etew he menge kuntada te Megbevayà. Menge suǥù heini te menge etew zà duen. Egkaǥi zan he zuen menge egkeenen he kenà ibpekaan kenitew te Megbevayà, ne minsan is kegezami wey is kegewezi zà kayi ne wazè din kun ituǥut kenitew. Kenè niw, menge suled, pemineǥa is iring dutun su wazà pulus te idawey zan su emun egkeenen tew is egkeenen ne egkeawà heini.
51002023	Haazà is menge etew, henduen be te hustu is ibpenurù dan. Egkaǥi zan he kinahanglan he ed-ezapen ta is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà, wey kinahanglan he ebminusen ta is pid-etawan ta wey kinahanglan daan he edresayen ta is lawa ta. Ne minsan pa kayi, kenà hustu heini is ibpenurù dan su is menge suǥù he iring kayi, ne kenà heini ebpeketavang kenita te kedsukul te mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta.
51003001	Ne, menge suled, nevanhew si Kristu ne iring te nevanhew kiw zaan duma kandin su zuen tew en untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Ne tenged kayi, kinahanglan he ebpurungan ta layun ed-isipa is ibpeisip-isip kenita te Megbevayà diyà te langit he zutun edhadì si Kristu he ebpinuu ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.
51003002	Ed-isipen ta layun heini ne kenè te en ed-isipen is menge mezaat he ulaula zini te tanà.
51003003	Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su sikita is tumutuu, minatey ki en duma ki Kristu ne is tutuu he untung ta pinaaǥi kandin, wazè pa heini ipezayag te Megbevayà.
51003004	Umba, menge suled, emun edlikù dini si Kristu he iyan puunà te veǥu he untung ta, ibpeǥawaǥawa is kekempet din ne ibpeǥawaǥawa zaan dutun is kekempet te kenita he veǥu he untung su zutun duma ki kandin.
51003005	Umba, menge suled, kenè niw en ituǥut he tumana niw is mezaat he kebayè niw; kenè niw ul-ulaha is mahawag wey meremerik he ulaula ne kenè niw mehimuwa he zuen suat niw te kenè niw esawa; engkezi niw is mezaat he ulaula wey is keleleǥed su emun leǥezen ki te menge azen, henduen be te egkeilisan dini te ǥehinawa ta is tutuu he Megbevayà te menge azen.
51003006	Ne siguradu edsilutan te Megbevayà is menge etew he kenà ebpemineg su layun dan ed-ulaula te menge iring kayi.
51003007	Ne iring kayi zaan is mid-ulaula niw zengan su zutun layun mezaat is menge ulaula niw.
51003008	Ne ǥuntaan, kinahanglan he ed-iniyuǥan ta is minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula iring te kegkepauk wey kebpekigkuntada te zuma he etew, is kebpesipala, is ked-ituk wey is meremerik he kegkaǥi.
51003009	Kenè ki edtarùtarù su nelibri ki en te zaan he kegkeetew ta wey te menge mezaat he vaal he mid-ulaula ta zengan te kedtumana ta te menge zaan he suat ta.
51003010	Ne ǥuntaan midhimu ki en te Megbevayà he veǥu en he etew he edhimuwen din he iring te kandin. Umba midhimu ki zin he veǥu su wey ta mepurung mesavut ke hentei sikandin.
51003011	Ne tenged kayi, sikita is midhimu zin he veǥu he etew, wazè ta zapit ibpelavi te etew he Hudiyu wey te etew he kenà Hudiyu su neked-iiring diyà te Megbevayà is nesirkunsidar wey is wazà mesirkunsidar; neked-iiring daan diyà te kandin is neketunghà wey is wazà meketunghà, is suluǥuen wey is egalen. Dini te kenitew te menge veǥu he etew, iyan dà lavew si Kristu ne midlumunan ni Kristu is kada sevaha kenitew.
51003012	Ne, menge suled, geina te mibpilì kiw te Megbevayà, ne midhimu kiw zin he menge ǥaked din, wey ǥeina te mahal kiw ziyà te ǥehinawa zin, kinahanglan he zekelà is hizu ta wey ǥaǥew ta ziyà te minsan hentei. Ebpurungan ta is menge zuma ta ne kenè ki ebpelavew. Kinahanglan he mepelevayen ki layun.
51003013	Ed-entusen ta, ne ebpeseyluwen ta is menge zuma ta he ebpekesupak kenita. Kinahanglan he iring te mibpesaylu kiw te Nengazen tew ebpepespeseyluwè kiw zaan.
51003014	Kinahanglan he mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa te kada sevaha is minsan hentei he zuma zin. Iyan heini lavew te langun he sambag ku keniyu su emun egketuman niw heini egkehimu niw zaan is langun kayi te menge meupiya he ulaula.
51003015	Ne kinahanglan daan, he iyan niw ipelavi ziyà te ǥehinawa niw is kelinew he ibeǥey ni Kristu su umba midhimu kiw he tumutuu te Megbevayà su wey kiw mebmelinawen su nesevaha kiw is menge tumutuu. Ne layun niw peselemati te Megbevayà is gaǥew zin keniyu.
51003016	Menge suled, layun niw zewata is impesavut ni Kristu. Pepempenuruey kew wey mebpesemsembaǥè kew sumalà is ketau te kada sevaha. Kanta kew te menge idalig te Megbevayà, wey menge Salmo, wey elin daan is menge kentahan he ibpinted keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Kentahi niw is Megbevayà he utew zekelà is kebpeselemati niw kandin.
51003017	Ne minsan hengkey he egkeǥiyen niw wey ed-ul-ulahan niw, kinahanglan he zait heini he ulaula te suluǥuen te Nengazen tew he si Jesus. Ne kinahanglan daan he layun dekelà is kebpeselemati niw te Amey tew he Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesus.
51003018	Sikiyu is menge vahi, pevayàbayà kew te esawa niw su iyan heini hustu he ulaula te vahi he tumutuu te Nengazen.
51003019	Ne sikiyu zaan is menge maama, mahala niw is esawa niw; kenè niw sikandan henghenggeri.
51003020	Sikiyu is menge vatà he tumutuu te Nengazen, pemineǥa niw layun is menge suǥù te ǥinikanan niw su utew heini egkesuati te Megbevayà.
51003021	Ne sikiyu zaan is menge ǥinikanan, kinahanglan he kenà utew subra is kedsewaya niw te menge anak niw su kela ke maawà diyà te kandan is gustu zan te ked-ulaula te hustu.
51003022	Ne sikiyu is suluǥuen, layun niw pemineǥa is suǥù te egalen niw te minsan keenu he timpu, ne kenà dutun dà te timpu he ebentayan kew zin. Ne kenè niw iyan dà ibpemineǥa kandin su wey meupiya is isip din keniyu, kekenà, kinahanglan he iyan ketezengan ke maan is ebpurungan niw is baal niw su ǥeina te zekelà is kedtahud niw te Nengazen tew.
51003023	Ne minsan hengkey is ebpeveelan keniyu, ne purungi niw su iyan edsusi keniyu is Nengazen ne kenà iyan dà haazà is kelibutanen he egalen niw,
51003024	su netuenan niw en he edsuhulan kew keuzemà te Nengazen. Ne ibeǥey zin keniyu haazà is suhul he impenaad din su is tutuu he egalen niw ne iyan si Kristu.
51003025	Su sikan is etew he ed-ulaula te mezaat, ne edsilutan sikandin sumalà is keveǥat te salè din su wazà ibpelavi te Megbevayà te minsan hentei.
51004001	Ne sikiyu zaan is duen din uripen, purungi niw is kedumala niw te menge uripen niw ne iveǥey niw kandan is metazeng wey hustu he ibeǥey ne kenè niw lipati he zuen daan teǥiuripen keniyu ziyà te langit.
51004002	Ne sikiyu is langun, pekehamen kew ampù ne purungi niw is ked-isip niw ke ed-ampù kew wey layun niw peselemati te Megbevayà is gaǥew zin keniyu.
51004003	Ne emun ed-ampù kew, iampù key zaan keniyu. Ampù kew he himuwa te Megbevayà is paaǥi wey key mekesangyew te in-eles dengan he lalag din mehitenged ki Kristu. Umba zini a ǥuntaan te pirisuwan su insangyew ku heini is lalag.
51004004	Ampù kew zaan he metevangi a te Megbevayà wey ku ikepesavut heini is lalag te hustu he paaǥi.
51004005	Purungi niw, menge suled, te minsan keenu he timpu is ulaula niw ziyà te menge etew he wazè pa medtuu ki Kristu su wey meketuu sikandan te Lalag te Megbevayà.
51004006	Kinahanglan he layun ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa te menge etew is menge lalag niw kandan ne kinahanglan daan he iyan niw keǥiya kandan is menge lalag he zuen din pulus ne emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini, ne egketuenan niw ke hengkey is hustu he ketezengan he idtavak diyà te kada sevaha he etew.
51004007	Is langun he nengehitavù kedì dini, ne egketuenan niw ziyà te ki Tikiku te sevaha he suled tew he utew minahal. Duma zey sikandin he suluǥuen te Nengazen he utew metinumanen te ebpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà.
51004008	Edsuǥuen ku sikandin diyan te keniyu su wey niw metueni ke hengkey is kebpekesavuk dey ne wey zaan maawà is ebpekesamuk te ǥehinawa niw tenged kenami.
51004009	Iyan duma ni Tikiku, si Unisimu, is sevaha zaan he suled tew he metinumanen daan te menge suǥù te Nengazen. Minahal zey zaan sikandin. Duma niw si Unisimu he tigKulusas. Edtudtulan kew zan te langun he neulaula zini.
51004010	Ebpengemusta keniyu si Eristarku he zuma ku he pirisu. Si Marcos, is id-aǥew ni Bernabe, ne ebpengemusta zaan keniyu. Gelǥelawa niw sikandin emun ebpekeuma ziyan. Netuenan niw en is intelaan ku keniyu mehitenged kandin.
51004011	Ne elin daan ebpengemusta keniyu si Jesus he egngezanan daan ki Hustu. Heini is tetelu, si Eristarku, si Marcos wey si Hustu, ne iyan dà sikandan menge Hudiyu he zuma ku kayi te kedsengyawa ku te kedhadì te Megbevayà. Ingkelipey sikandan te ǥehinawa ku.
51004012	Ebpengemusta zaan keniyu si Ipapras. Duma niw zaan he tigKulusas he suluǥuen ni Jesu Kristu. Layun kew zin id-ampù. Ed-ampù sikandin diyà te Megbevayà he mebmelig-en wey meheǥet is kedtuu niw ne wey meheǥet daan is kedtumana niw te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
51004013	Iyan igkekeǥiya ku kayi ziyan te keniyu su egkesuatan ku he metueni niw he zekelà is kedhaǥù ni Ipapras wey kew mezeyzey ne kenà iyan kew zà, kekenà, ragkes daan is menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Leudisiya wey ziyà te inged he Hirepulis.
51004014	Si Lucas, is minahal tew he duktur, ne ebpengemusta zaan keniyu wey si Dimas.
51004015	Ipengemusta key zaan te menge suled tew ziyà te inged he Leudisiya. Si Nimpa zaan wey is menge tumutuu he ziyà edsimba te valey zin, ebpengemusta key zaan kandan.
51004016	Emun egkepasad niw is kebasa kayi ziyà te menge tumutuu ziyan, ne ipevasa niw zaan heini ziyà te menge tumutuu ziyà te Leudisiya. Ne sikan daan is surat ku ziyà te menge tigLeudisiya, sembayi niw ziyà te kandan wey niw mevasa.
51004017	Keǥiya niw ki Erkipu he purungi zin beeli is ebpeveelan kandin te Nengazen su suluǥuen sikandin te Megbevayà.
51004018	Siak si Pablo, ebpengemusta a keniyu. Tuus heini is kedsurata ku te ngazan ku he kediey he surat heini. Kenè niw lipati he pirisu a ne iampù a keniyu. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Megbevayà.
52001001	Sikami si Pablo, si Silas, wey si Timoteo, ebpesuratan dey sikiyu is menge tumutuu he menge tigTiselunika he ǥaked te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey ǥaked te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Megbevayà ne veǥayi kew zin te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
52001002	Dekelà layun is kebpeselemati zey te Megbevayà tenged keniyu ne layun dey sikiyu id-ampù.
52001003	Su emun ed-ampù key te Megbevayà he Amey tew kenè dey egkelipatan is kedtuu niw, wey is kebmahala niw, wey is kebperateng niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Su egketuusan is kedtuu niw kandin pinaaǥi te ulaula niw, ne pinaaǥi te kedhaǥù niw egketuusan daan is kebmahala niw kandin diyà te ǥehinawa niw. Ne egketuusan daan is kebperateng niw kandin pinaaǥi te kebmeinentusen niw.
52001004	Ne menge suled he minahal te Megbevayà, netuenan dey he pinilì kew zin
52001005	su impesavut dey keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, kenà pinaaǥi te lalag dey zà, kekenà, pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Midheǥet te Megbevayà dutun is kedsevuta zey kayi. Ne netuenan niw zaan ke hengkey is menge ulaula zey he meupiya wey kew mezeyzey hein diyan key te keniyu.
52001006	Ne sikiyu zaan, mid-iringan niw is mid-ulaula zey wey is mid-ulaula zengan te Nengazen tew he si Jesus su midawat niw is Lalag te Megbevayà minsan nekeaǥi kew te kemeresayan tenged te kedawat niw. Ne minsan pa te nerasey kew, nelipey kew zed tenged te ked-ulini keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
52001007	Tenged kayi iyan kew ed-iringan te langun he menge zuma he tumutuu ziyan te prubinsya he Mesidunya wey ziyà daan te prubinsya he Gerisya.
52001008	Ebpuun diyan nekeeneb is Lalag te Nengazen, kenà diyan dà te prubinsya he Mesidunya wey ziyà te prubinsya he Gerisya, kekenà, is menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei, nezineg dan is tudtul mehitenged te kedtuu niw te Megbevayà. Wazè en kinahanglan he ibpenudtul zey pa ziyà te menge etew is kedtuu niw.
52001009	Nezineg dan en ne iyan sikandan ebpenudtul mehitenged te kegelǥelawa niw kenami. Ebpenudtul zan he mid-engkezan niw kes ked-azap te menge kenà tutuu he ed-ezapen. Mid-engkezan niw kun wey kew mekeazap te tutuu he Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen.
52001010	Su edteǥazan niw kun is kedlikù te Anak din he ebpuun te langit. Iyan si Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà he mibanhew zin. Iyan si Jesus he midlibri kenitew te silut wey kiw mekeliyu te ebpekeuma he kedlimasa te Megbevayà te menusiyà.
52002001	Menge suled, netuenan niw en he mibpulus is kedhendiyan dey te inged niw.
52002002	Su wazè niw melipati is nehitavù kenami ziyà te inged he Pilipus hein wazè key pa mekeuma ziyan te Tiselunika. Wazè key zan urami te kebpemuǥel wey te kebpeelimungawi. Ne minsan pa zutun, tenged te kedtavang te Megbevayà wazè key mahandek he ebpenudtul ziyan te keniyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun diyà te kandin, iyan, nereǥenan key utew.
52002003	Is kedwali zey ziyà te menge etew, ne kenà ebpuun te sayep wey te meremerik he tuyù. Kenè key edtarùtarù te minsan hentei.
52002004	Nezawat key te Megbevayà ne insarig din kenami is kebpesavut te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ne tenged kayi ebpenudtul key. Kenè dey iyan tuyù is kebpenunuata te menge etew su iyan tuyù dey is kebpenunuata te Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin metau he ebpenggezam kenitew wey metueni he hustu is tuyù dey.
52002005	Netuenan niw he kes menge lalag dey, kenà kedigdig dà. Kenà ibpenapì kes mid-ulaula zey ziyan. Is Megbevayà, iyan ebpeketistiǥus kayi.
52002006	Wazè key mebpezalig keniyu; wazè key zaan mebpezalig te zuma. Geina te menge epustul key ni Kristu, egkehimu he edsuǥùsuǥù key zaan keniyu, iyan, wazè dey heini ul-ulaha.
52002007	Mibpurungan dey sikiyu; iring key te iney he metulanged te menge anak din.
52002008	Utew kew mahal kayi te ǥehinawa zey, umba kenà iyan dey zà egkesuatan is kedweliyi zey keniyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun te Megbevayà, kekenà, ebpekid-uunungen key en daan keniyu su utew zey sikiyu minahal.
52002009	Menge suled, kenè niw vuwa egkelipatan is kedhaǥù dey ziyan te kebaal. Su hein impesavut dey keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun te Megbevayà, mibpenigudu key zaan medhaǥù te maandew se mezukilem wey key mekekuwa te keuyaǥan dey wey key kenà mekesamuk keniyu.
52002010	Ebpeketistiǥus kew, ne ebpeketistiǥus daan is Megbevayà he hein diyan key te keniyu te nemeketuu wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula zey, kekenà, metazeng key wey metinumanen key te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
52002011	Netuenan niw he is mid-ulaula zey ziyà te kada sevaha keniyu, ne meupiya su iring te ed-ul-ulahan te amey ziyà te menge anak din.
52002012	Midsembaǥan dey sikiyu; iyan key midlangan te ǥehinawa niw ne midhengyuan dey sikiyu he med-ulaula kew te sungkad te egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin midhimu keniyu he tumutuu wey kew zin mehedii wey kew tulusa.
52002013	Ne elin daan layun dey ibpeselemati te Megbevayà is: hein impesavut dey keniyu is Lalag te Megbevayà, midawat niw su nesavut niw he Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenà lalag te etew zà duen. Su pinaaǥi te lalag din egkelig-enan is kedtuu tew te nemeketuu kandin.
52002014	Kes menge ǥaked te Megbevayà he ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya he menge tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu, neiringan niw sikandan. Su iring te kedresaya kandan te menge zuma zan he Hudiyu, midrasey kew zaan te menge zuma niw he kenà menge Hudiyu.
52002015	Is menge Hudiyu, iyan kes midhimatey te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà dengan wey te Nengazen tew zaan he si Jesus. Ne mid-avug key zan daan. Utew supak is menge ulaula zan te egkesuatan te Megbevayà,
52002016	ne iring te egkuntedahan dan is tivuuk he menusiyà, su edsemuken key zan wey zey kenà ikesangyew is Lalag te Megbevayà he igkelibri te silut te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne ebpeniguduwan dan te ebaal is taman te egkehimu zan he salà. Ne ǥuntaan in-andam en is silut kandan te Megbevayà.
52002017	Ne sikami, menge suled, hein neewaan dey sikiyu seled te meǥaan dà, wazè dey sikiyu melipati, kekenà, utew key ebulunga keniyu ne layun key pezem egkesuat he ebpenumbaley ziyan.
52002018	Ne tenged kayi layun dey egkeisip he edlikù key pezem diyan te Tiselunika. Siak si Pablo, layun ku egkeisip is iring dutun, iyan, mibangen key ni Setanas, umba wazè key mekelaus.
52002019	Umba egkesuatan ku he ed-uman a ebpenumbaley ziyan su tenged keniyu utew meheǥet is kebperetenga zey te kedlikù ni Jesus su iyan kew igkelipey zey. Tenged keniyu kenè key egkeeled keuzemà, kekenà, igkezantal zey is kedtuu niw emun ed-etuvang kiw ki Jesus dutun te kedlikù din.
52002020	Uya, iyan kew iyan igkezantal zey; iyan kew igkelipey zey.
52003001	Ne hein kenè dey en egkeantus is kebulunga zey keniyu, sikami is tetelu, mid-isip dey he meupiya ke ebpetaǥak is dezuwa kenami ziyà te inged he Etinas.
52003002	Ne zutun midsuǥù dey ziyan si Timoteo he suled tew wey suluǥuen daan te Megbevayà te kegkesengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged ki Kristu. Iyan insuǥua zey kandin su wey zin meheǥeti is kedtuu niw ne wey kew zin mesembaǥi
52003003	su wey kenà meliveg is minsan hentei keniyu tenged te kebpesipelahi keniyu te menge etew. Netuenan niw en he sikitew is tumutuu, imbanglis kenitew te Megbevayà is kemeresayan.
52003004	Hein diyan key pa te keniyu migkeǥiyan dey sikiyu he zuen timpu he egkeumahan kiw te kemeresayan, ne netuenan niw ǥuntaan he netuman en.
52003005	Ne tenged kayi hein kenè ku en egkeantus is kegkeipeng ku keniyu, midsuǥù ku ziyan si Timoteo wey ku metueni ke nemenumenu en is kedtuu niw. Nahandek a su kela ke nepenulayan kew ni Setanas ne naawà is pulus te kedhaǥù dey ziyan te keniyu.
52003006	Ne iyan pa kebpekeuma ni Timoteo he ebpuun diyan te Tiselunika. Ne meupiya is tudtul zin he mezesen ded is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà wey ebmahalen niw zaan diyà te ǥehinawa niw is menge zuma niw. Ne iyan daan tudtul zin is: utew meupiya is gehinawa niw kenami, ne ebulungen kew kenami iring te kebulunga zey zaan keniyu.
52003007	Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, minsan neseeng key wey nemereǥenan key, utew key nelipey tenged keniyu wey tenged te kedtuu niw.
52003008	Ne ǥuntaan mibmeupiya en utew is kebpekesavuk dey su netuenan dey en he mezesen ded bes is kedtuu niw te Nengazen.
52003009	Kenè pa hustu is kebpenigudu zey kebpeselamat te Megbevayà tenged keniyu, su utew zey sikiyu ingkelipey. Iyan ebpeketistiǥus kayi is Megbevayà.
52003010	Su maandew wey mezukilem ebpenigudu key ed-ampù he ituǥut din he memeked-uuma kiw en maan wey zey meheǥet is kedtuu niw ke zuen din kurang.
52003011	Berekati te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he meǥaan key mekehendiyan te keniyu.
52003012	Berekati te Nengazen he med-iseg is kebmahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw te uman sevaha keniyu wey is langun he etew, iring te utew mezesen is kebmahala zey keniyu.
52003013	Berekati zin daan he mebmelig-en kew te kedtuu niw su wey wazà igkesewayi keniyu te menge ǥaked te Megbevayà emun diyè kew ed-etuvang te Amey tew he Megbevayà dutun te kebpekeuma te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he edumahan te langun he tumutuu kandin.
52004001	Ne ǥuntaan, menge suled, tenged te kegkesevaha tew te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, duen ebuyuen dey wey edhengyuen dey ziyan te keniyu. Impenurù dey keniyu is ed-ul-ulahan he egkesuatan te Megbevayà, ne mid-ulaula niw en. Iyan, edhengyuen dey keniyu he ipeiseg niw pa is ked-ul-ulaha niw kayi.
52004002	Netuenan niw is insuǥù dey keniyu he ebpuun te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
52004003	Iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà is: kinahanglan he zait is menge ulaula niw te etew he ǥaked din. Kinahanglan he kenè niw hileveti is kenè niw esawa.
52004004	Kinahanglan he is uman sevaha keniyu te menge maama, ne mebpengesawa te paaǥi he meupiya wey kenà meremerik,
52004005	ne kenà tenged te egkeveyveyaan sikandin te suat te lawa zin, su iyan heeyan egkeulaula te menge etew he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà.
52004006	Kinahanglan he wazà minsan hentei he ebpekesalà wey ed-akal te zuma zin pinaaǥi te menge ulaula he iring kayi. Su edsilutan te Megbevayà is ed-ulaula te iring dutun. Heini impurung dey ipenurù keniyu.
52004007	Su nehimu kiw te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu kandin su wey mehimu is menge ulaula tew he zait te etew he ǥaked din. Kenà iyan din egkesuatan he meremerik is menge ulaula tew.
52004008	Emun ebpesegdanen niw heini is penurù ku keniyu, kenè niw iyan dà egkepesagdan is penurù te etew, kekenà, iyan niw egkepesagdan is penurù te Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin kes mibeǥey kenitew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
52004009	Ne wazè en kinahanglan he ibpenurù ku pa keniyu he mahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw is menge zuma niw he tumutuu su impenurù en heini keniyu te Megbevayà.
52004010	Netuenan ku he ebmahalen niw en is menge tumutuu ziyà te tivuuk he prubinsya he Mesidunya. Ne edhengyuan dey pa sikiyu, menge suled, he ipeiseg niw pa is kebmahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw te langun.
52004011	Ne kenà duen dà taman su iyan layun pen-ahaa niw is melinew he kebpekesavuk. Tegteǥami te uman sevaha is kandin dà he vaal. Medhaǥù sikandin wey zin mekuwa is igkeuyag din. Daan heini he insuǥù dey keniyu.
52004012	Ne emun ebeelan niw heini edtehuzen kew te menge etew he kenè pa tumutuu, ne zutun kenè en daan kinahanglan he ebpekevuyù kew te igkeuyag niw ziyà te minsan hentei.
52004013	Menge suled, egkesuatan dey he metueni niw is egkeulaula te menge tumutuu he minatey en su wey kew kenà meseeng iring te kegkeseeng te zuma he menge etew he kenè dan egkeperateng he egkevanhew sikandan.
52004014	Midtuu kiw he mibpatey si Jesus ne nevanhew ne edlikù keuzemà. Iring din daan kes menge tumutuu he minatey en su ebenhawen ne ibpezuma sikandan te Megbevayà ki Jesus keuzemà te kedlikù din.
52004015	Lalag en te Nengazen heini is egkeǥiyen dey keniyu ne iyan is: sikitew is uuyag pa keuzemà te timpu te kedlikù te Nengazen, kenè kiw egkehuna te menge tumutuu he minatey en.
52004016	Su ebpuun te langit ebpenaug is Nengazen he edtawag kenitew, ne egkezineg tew is ked-umew te lavew he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà wey is budyung he ibpezaǥing te Megbevayà. Ne egkehuna egkevanhew is menge tumutuu ki Kristu he nemematey en.
52004017	Ne human kiw is menge uuyag pa, ebpekezuma kiw zaan kandan diyà te menge ǥapun su edtelavuk kiw te Nengazen diyà te zivavew. Ne zutun kenè kiw en ebpekesuwey te Nengazen te wazà pidtemanan.
52004018	Umba ipedlilipayè niw heini is egkeǥiyen ku.
52005001	Menge suled, kenè en kinahanglan he edseysayen dey pa keniyu kayi te surat is menge andew wey menge timpu te kegketuman kayi te menge midtagnà.
52005002	Su netuenan niw en he iring te tekawen he ebpekeuma ke mezukilem is kegketuman te andew te kedlimas te Nengazen, su egketingkemed is menusiyà.
52005003	Ne egkehitavù te timpu he kunaan te menge etew ke melinew is langun wey nelig-enan sikandan. Ne segugunà dutun egkeǥerà sikandan. Utew meǥaan; iring te kedlepew te velilit diyà te ed-anak. Ne wazà edresik dutun he minsan sevaha.
52005004	Ne sikiyu, menge suled, wazè kew mulà diyà te merusirem. Kenè kew mulà egkengetingkemed te andew te kedlimas te Nengazen iring te egkengetingkemed is menge etew te tekawen. Kenè kew iyan iring dutun.
52005005	Su sakup kew mulà te merayag wey te maandew, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, sakup kew te Megbevayà . Su sikitew, wazè tew kelavet te merusirem wey kezukileman.
52005006	Umba kinahanglan he kenà iring te kedlipezeng is ulaula tew su iring kayi is ulaula te zuma he etew he wazà meketuu. Kinahanglan he ed-andam kiw ne ed-eǥenen tew is menge mezaat he suat tew.
52005007	Sikan is edlipezeng, edlipezeng te mezukilem, ne sikan is egkelangut, egkelangut daan te mezukilem.
52005008	Iyan, sikitew mulà is nesakup te maandew, kinahanglan he ed-eǥenen tew is menge mezaat he suat tew. Idsun-ud tew is limbutung he iyan is kedtuu tew te Megbevayà wey is kebmahala tew zini te ǥehinawa tew te menge zuma tew. Ne iring te kalù tew te sundaru is kedhemeni tew te kebperateng tew te kedlibriya te Megbevayà kenitew te silut.
52005009	Su is Megbevayà, wazè din ivanglis kenitew is silut, kekenà, midluwas kiw zin pinaaǥi te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
52005010	Ne minsan ke uuyag kiw pa wey ke minatey kiw en be zutun te kedlikù ni Kristu, duen tew en gihapun untung he wazà pidtemanan duma kandin su iyan heini ketezengan ke maan is mibpehimatey sikandin.
52005011	Ne ǥeina te netuenan niw en heini peliplipayè kew ne lig-eni niw is kedtuu te uman sevaha keniyu, iring te neveelan niw en.
52005012	Ne menge suled, sikan is edhaǥù te ked-uwit dan keniyu, kes menge eǥalen niw he mibpilì te Nengazen wey sikandan is ebpenurù keniyu, edhengyuan dey sikiyu he tehuza niw sikandan.
52005013	Kinahanglan he utew niw sikandan tehuza wey mahala tenged te menge vaal zan diyan te keniyu. Ne kinahanglan he melinew is kedepitè niw te kada sevaha.
52005014	Ne iyan daan idhangyù dey keniyu, menge suled, is: keǥiyi niw is menge peǥulen he medterebahu zan. Sembaǥi niw is egkengehandek, lig-eni niw is menge meǥuyà is kedtuu, ne kinahanglan he mebmepelevayen kew te langun kandan.
52005015	Kenè niw ituǥut he zuen minsan hentei keniyu he ebales te mezaat, kekenà, mebpepurpurungè kew layun. Purungi niw zaan is minsan hentei he etew.
52005016	Ne ǥeina te nekidsevaha kew ki Jesu Kristu, iyan ebpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà is: layun kew medlipey, layun kew med-ampù, wey layun kew mebpeselamat te Megbevayà minsan hengkey is egkeulaula niw.
52005019	Kenè niw verawa is menge suǥù keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
52005020	Kenè niw pesegdana is menge lalag te mid-ulinan,
52005021	kekenà, gezami niw is langun ne tipiǥi niw is meupiya.
52005022	Likayi niw is minsan hengkey he mezaat.
52005023	Is Megbevayà, ne iyan ebeǥey te kelinew, berakat he purungi zin lumpiyuwi is ulaula niw. Lig-eni zin is tivuuk he ǥehinawa niw, isip niw, wey lawa niw su para wazà igkesewayi keniyu keuzemà te kedlikù te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
