52005024	Ne edhimuwen heini te Megbevayà su iyan sikandin midhimu keniyu he menge tumutuu kandin ne egkeseriǥan sikandin.
52005025	Menge suled, iampù key zaan keniyu.
52005026	Pengemustaha niw te limù is langun he menge suled tew ziyan.
52005027	Ibeǥey ku keniyu is suǥù te Megbevayà he vesaha niw heini is surat diyà te langun he menge suled tew ziyan.
52005028	Ikeǥeǥawi kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
53001001	Sikami, si Pablo, si Silas, wey si Timoteo, ebpesuratan dey sikiyu is menge tigTiselunika he ǥaked te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey ǥaked te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
53001002	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, ne veǥayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
53001003	Menge suled, kinahanglan he layun dekelà is kebpeselemati zey te Megbevayà tenged keniyu. Ne hustu heini su layun dekelà is ked-uswag te kedtuu niw wey layun daan ed-iseg is kebmahala niw te uman sevaha he menge zuma niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw.
53001004	Ne tenged kayi emun ebpenumbelayan dey is menge tumutuu te Megbevayà diyà te minsan hendei he inged, ebentuǥen dey sikiyu tenged te kedsarig niw te Megbevayà wey tenged te kebmeinentusen niw te menge kemeresayan wey kemereǥenan he egkeseǥazan niw.
53001005	Heini is kedsarig niw wey ked-antus niw, ne iyan tuus he metazeng is kukuman te Megbevayà su pinaaǥi te memerasey he egkeantus niw, ibpeehè din he zait kew he idragkes dutun te menge etew he edhedian din.
53001006	Metazeng is menge ulaula te Megbevayà ne edresayen din keuzemà is menge etew he midrasey keniyu ǥuntaan.
53001007	Ke ibpeǥawaǥawa keuzemà is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he ebpuun te langit, id-awè din diyan te keniyu wey zini zaan te kenami is kemeresayan he egkeantus tew ǥuntaan. Egkukumbalà sikandin te iring te regreg wey edumahan te menge mekeǥeǥehem he menge velinsuǥuen din.
53001008	Dutun, edsilutan din sikandan is wazà medtetenged te Megbevayà wey wazà mebpemineg te Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
53001009	Iyan silut din kandan is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan. Egkesuwey zan is Nengazen wey is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag din.
53001010	Egkehitavù heini keuzemà dutun te andew te kedlikù din. Iyan idlikù din dini te kelibutan su wey mezalig sikandin te menge etew he mibpesakup kandin. Dutun, ne ebentuǥen sikandin te langun he menge tumutuu kandin wey sikiyu zaan su neketuu kew te impesavut dey keniyu.
53001011	Tenged kayi layun dey sikiyu id-ampù. Ed-ampù key he himuwa te Megbevayà is menge ulaula niw he zait te kedtuu niw kandin. Ed-ampù key he pinaaǥi te ǥehem din himuwa zin he tumana niw is minsan hengkey he meupiya he ulaula he iyan en tuyù niw tenged te midtuu kew kandin.
53001012	Ne pinaaǥi kayi egkezalig niw is Nengazen tew he si Jesus, ne edeliǥen kew zin daan. Egkehimu heini pinaaǥi zà te ǥaǥew te Megbevayè tew wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
53002001	Ne ǥuntaan, menge suled, ibpesavut dey keniyu is kedlikù keuzemà te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey is kedtulusa zin kenitew.
53002002	Edhengyuan dey sikiyu he kenè kew petuluy meliveg wey mahandek emun egkezineg niw is tudtul he neuma en is andew te kedlimasa te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Kenè kew meliveg kayi minsan ke lalag he ibpinted kun, wey ke tudtul zey kun be, wey minsan surat he zini kun ebpuun te kenami.
53002003	Kinahanglan he kenè niw tuuwi is minsan hengkey he lalag te minsan hentei he teruen he etew. Su haazà is andew, ne kenè pa egketuman emun wazè pa mehitavù is kedsukul te menge etew ziyà te Megbevayà. Ne zutun ibpeǥawaǥawa sikan is etew he lavew he mesinupaken. Iyan imbanglis kandin is kegkeimpirnu.
53002004	Edsukulan din wey edlevawan din pezem is minsan hengkey he mid-isip te menge etew he megbevayà wey is minsan hengkey he ed-ezapen dan. Ne ebpinuu sikandin minsan diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà su egkeǥiyen din he iyan sikandin Megbevayà.
53002005	Wazè niw pa vuwa melipati he migkaǥi ku en heini is langun hein diyan e pa te keniyu.
53002006	Netuenan niw ke hengkey is ed-eǥen dutun te utew mesinupaken he etew su wey kenè pa sikandin mekepeǥawaǥawa te kenè pa hustu he timpu.
53002007	Su is gehem dutun te utew mesinupaken, egemiten din en guntaan he meeles. Ne ebpekeeles-eles pa sikandin taman te kenè pa id-awà sikan is ed-eǥen kandin.
53002008	Ne zutun, human ebpeǥawaǥawa sikan is utew mesinupaken he etew. Iyan, dutun te kebpekeuma ni Jesus edhimetayan sikandin ni Jesus pinaaǥi te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag din; edhiyupen din dà ne segugunà ebpatey, ne egkeawà is gehem din.
53002009	Emun ebpeǥawaǥawa keuzemà sikan is mesinupaken he etew egemiten din is gehem ni Setanas ne ibpeehè din is gehem din pinaaǥi te minsan hengkey he tarù he menge singyal wey egkein-inuwan.
53002010	Edterteruan din te minsan hengkey he kelelalung he paaǥi sikan is menge etew he kenà ebpekelikey te silut. Umba kenè dan ebpekelikey te silut su wazè dan medawat te tutuu he tuluuwen he iyan ebpekeveǥey kandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
53002011	Ne tenged dutun idtuǥut te Megbevayà he meekali sikandan pinaaǥi te ketetarù he ebpekeakal su wey zan metuuwi is kenà tutuu.
53002012	Ne tenged dutun, edsilutan te Megbevayà is langun he kenà edtuu te tutuu he tuluuwen, su iyan igkesuat dan is mezaat he ulaula.
53002013	Menge suled he minahal te Nengazen, kenà egkehimu he kenà dekelà layun is kebpeselemati zey te Megbevayà tenged keniyu. Su zengan hein midlimbag din is langun, mibpilì kew zin wey kew zin melibri te silut pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he iyan ingkehimu niw he menge ǥaked din, wey pinaaǥi te kedtuu niw te tutuu he tuluuwen.
53002014	Midhimu kew zin he menge tumutuu kandin pinaaǥi te kebpesevuta zey keniyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen su wey kew mekeambit te utew kegkelavew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
53002015	Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, pekezesen kew te kedtuu niw, ne hemeni niw is langun he impenurù dey keniyu pinaaǥi te kedwali zey hein diyan key wey pinaaǥi zaan te kebpesurati zey keniyu.
53002016	Berakat he lipaya kew wey lig-eni kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey te Amey tew he Megbevayà su wey meupiya is langun he menge vaal niw wey is langun he menge lalag niw. Mahal kiw layun diyà te ǥehinawa zin ne pinaaǥi te ǥaǥew zin kenitew zuen tew igkelipey he wazè din pidtemanan wey zuen tew zaan utew meupiya he ebperetengen.
53003001	Ne ǥuntaan, menge suled, iampù key keniyu wey meǥaan mekeeneb ne mezawat diyà te minsan hendei is kebpesevuta zey te Lalag te Nengazen iring te kegkezewata niw kayi ziyan te keniyu.
53003002	Iampù key zaan wey key mekeliyu te pesipala te menge kenà metazeng wey lalung he menge etew su mezakel is kenà edtuman te lalag din.
53003003	Iyan, metinumanen mulà is Nengazen te lalag din, ne iyan sikandin ebantey wey edlig-en keniyu wey kew kenà mekeizi ni Setanas.
53003004	Tenged te kedsarig dey te Nengazen, netuenan dey he ebpenigudu kew pa edtuman te menge suǥù dey keniyu.
53003005	Berakat he ipesavut keniyu te Nengazen ke sengemenu kew kemahal ziyà te ǥehinawa te Megbevayà wey himuwa zin he veǥayi kew ni Kristu te kelig-en wey niw maantus is kemereǥenan.
53003006	Menge suled, tenged te keǥehem te ngazan te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he imbeǥey kenami, duen menge idsuǥù dey keniyu. Iyan is: kenè kew mebpekiduma te tumutuu he tepulen he kenà edsunud te impenurù dey keniyu.
53003007	Netuenan niw en is egkeveelan niw wey kew mekeiring te ebeelan dey. Su hein diyan key te keniyu kenè key tepulen.
53003008	Wazè key mekevuyù te egkeenen dey ziyà te minsan hentei, kekenà, mibeyazan dey. Maandew wey mezukilem midhaǥù key mebaal su wey kew kenà medlised tenged kenami.
53003009	Duen dey ketenged te kebpesuhul keniyu, iyan, wazè key mebpesuhul, kekenà, midterebahu key su wey zuen ulaula zey he egkeiringan niw.
53003010	Hein diyan key pa iyan penurù dey keniyu is: sikan is kenà edterebahu, kenà ipekaan.
53003011	Impenudtul kenami he zuen diyan menge zuma niw he menge tepulen. Kenè dan kun edterebahu, kekenà, edsemuken dan is terebahu te menge zuma zan.
53003012	Tenged te keǥehem te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, idsuǥù dey wey idhangyù dey kandan he kinahanglan he medterebahu zan ne kenè dan medsamuk su wey zan meketiǥayun te igkeuyag dan.
53003013	Ne sikiyu zaan, menge suled, kenè kew meevek te ked-ulaula te meupiya.
53003014	Ke zuen minsan hentei he tumutuu he kenà ebpemineg te menge suǥù he insurat dey kayi te surat, kilelaa niw ne kenè kew mebpekiduma kandin su wey meeled sikandin,
53003015	iyan, kenè niw isipa he kuntada niw, kekenà, penurua niw he iring te suled niw.
53003016	Berakat he iveǥey keniyu te Nengazen is melinawen he ǥehinawa te minsan keenu he timpu wey te minsan hengkey is kebpekesavuk niw. Iyan sikandin ebeǥey te kelinew. Dumahi kew is langun te Nengazen.
53003017	Iyan a si Pablo; impirma ku kayi is ngazan ku. Iyan heini tuus he idsavuk ku te langun he menge surat ku, wey iyan heini paaǥi te kedsurat ku.
53003018	Sikiyu is langun, ikeǥaǥew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
54001001	Sikew, Timoteo he iring te tutuu he anak ku tenged te kedtuu nu ki Kristu, ebpesuratan ku sikew. Iyan a si Pablo he epustul ni Jesu Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, suluǥuen e zin. Nehimu a he epustul mehitenged te suǥù te Megbevayà he iyan midlibri kenitew te silut wey mehitenged te suǥù ni Jesu Kristu. Iyan sikandin egkeseriǥan ta. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew ka wey kehizuwi ka te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey veǥayi ke zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
54001003	Ed-umanan ku egkeǥiya kenikew is sambag ku hein mid-awà a ziyan pehendiyà te Mesidunya. Iyan is: kenè ka med-awà diyan te Ipisu. Iyan idsembaǥi ku kenikew su zuen menge etew ziyan he kinahanglan he zewaya nu. Dewaya nu he med-engked dan te kebpenurù te menge sayep he tuluuwen
54001004	wey med-engked dan te ked-istudyu te menge sayep he menge ǥuǥud, wey te menge meluǥayad he ǥuǥud te kepuun te menge etew. Su emun iyan heini ed-istudyuwan dan ebpekidlewanè dan dà ke hengkey is hustu. Kenà egkehimu he pinaaǥi kayi egketuenan ta is ibpesavut te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtuu.
54001005	Ne kinahanglan he iyan ketezengan ke maan is idsuǥù nu kandan heini su wey zan mahala is menge zuma zan diyà te ǥehinawa zan. Ne kenà egkehimu he hustu is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta emun wazè ki melumpiyuwi te Megbevayà duen te menge salè ta. Kinahanglan he iyan dà ed-ul-ulahan ta is netuenan ta he hustu ne kinahanglan daan he tutuu is kedtuu ta te tutuu he tuluuwen ne zutun human hustu is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta.
54001006	Duen diyan menge etew he wazè dan meseǥipà heini. Iyan dan impelavi is kebpekidlewanà mehitenged te wazè din pulus.
54001007	Su minsan pa te egkesuatan dan pezem he menge menunudlù sikandan te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises wazè dan hanew te egkeǥiyen dan wey wazè dan mesavut is tuluuwen dan he idteǥel zan diyà te zuma he menge etew.
54001008	Netuenan ta he meupiya is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises ke hustu is kegemita ta kayi.
54001009	Iyan, wazà isuǥù heini su wey mezawey is menge metazeng he etew, kekenà, insuǥù heini su wey mezawey is menge mesinupaken, menge kenà metinumanen, menge kenà edtuu te Megbevayà, menge selaan, menge lalung wey menge kenà edtahud te Megbevayà, menge ebunù te amey wey iney zan, menge teremunù,
54001010	menge egkevut te kenè dan esawa, menge maama he egkeeriǥan te iring dan he maama, menge menggeǥebpà, menge teruen, menge ebpen-ulug te kewsa wey is minsan hentei he ebpekesupak is ulaula zin te hustu he tuluuwen.
54001011	Ne heini is hustu he tuluuwen, ne ebpuun te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te utew zekelà he ǥehem te Megbevayà. Is Megbevayà he iyan dait he edeliǥen, insarig din kedì heini is tudtulanen wey ku mesangyew.
54001012	Ebpeselematan ku is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu su mibeǥayan e zin te zesen wey ku metuman heini is ebpeveelan din kedì. Mid-isip e zin he metinumanen ne tenged kayi intezù e zin he suluǥuen din.
54001013	Dengan, mezaat is menge lalag ku mehitenged kandin; midrasey ku is menge sumusundan din ne midsumpalit ku sikandin. Ne minsan pa zutun, nehizuwan e zin su nehimu ku is menge mezaat he vaal ku tenged te wazè ku pa metueni is tutuu he tuluuwen wey wazè ku pa sikandin tuuwi.
54001014	Ne kenà dutun dà taman su utew ad ingkeǥaǥew te Megbevayà ne ǥuntaan neketuu ad ki Jesu Kristu ne utew en sikandin mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku.
54001015	Duen erubasa he utew tutuu ne kinahanglan he tuuwi te minsan hentei; ne iyan is: Midhendini si Jesu Kristu te kelibutan wey zin libriya te silut is menge mekesesalà. Ne siak, iyan a tuwas he lalung te langun kandan.
54001016	Ne minsan pa zutun, nehizuwan a ǥihapun te Megbevayà su wey pinaaǥi te kebpelevaya zin kedì te utew lalung, ikepezayag ni Jesu Kristu he utew mepelevayen sikandin. Impezayag din heini su wey mesavut heini te langun he menge etew he edtuu kandin keuzemà ne ebeǥayan din te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
54001017	Kes sebsevaha zà he Megbevayà, kenà egkeahà. Iyan sikandin hadì te minsan hengkey ne wazè din kemetayen; berakat he tehuza wey zeliǥa sikandin te wazè din pidtemanan.
54001018	Ne sikew, Timoteo he anak ku, edteleenan ku sikew he ipenurù nu te menge etew heini is migkaǥi ku. Sungkad heini te netagnà dengan mehitenged kenikew. Ne idtelaan ku zaan he sumalà haazà is netagnà, pekezesen ka te kedsundaru nu tenged ki Jesu Kristu.
54001019	Iyan gumaan nu is kedtuu nu te tutuu he tuluuwen wey is kedtumana nu te langun he netuenan nu he hustu. Duen menge etew he wazè dan tumana is netuenan dan he hustu ne tenged kayi nezeetan en is kedtuu zan te Megbevayà.
54001020	Duma kayi si Himinyu wey si Alejandro. Impevayàbayè ku si Setanas kandan wey ikepenurù kandan he kenè dan sumpelita is Megbevayà.
54002001	Ne iyan idhuna ku idhangyù is: kinahanglan he vuyua te menge tumutuu is egkinehenglanen dan diyà te Megbevayà. Kinahanglan he iampù dan is langun he menge etew wey peselemati zan te Megbevayà is gaǥew zin kandan.
54002002	Iampù dan daan is menge hadì wey is minsan hentei he zuen din keǥehem su wey mebmelinew is ked-ubpè tew wey wazà samuk te kebpurungi tew kedtumana te egkesuatan te Megbevayà wey te hustu he ulaula.
54002003	Umba idhangyù ku heini su meupiya is ked-ampù he iring kayi. Iyan heini igkesuat te Megbevayà he Menluluwas tew
54002004	su iyan din egkesuatan is wey melibri te silut is tivuuk he menusiyà ne wey zan daan metueni is tutuu he tuluuwen.
54002005	Sebsevaha zà is Megbevayà, ne sebsevaha zà daan is datù diyà te teliwazà te Megbevayà wey menge etew, ne iyan datù tew is etew he si Jesu Kristu.
54002006	Imbelavag din is untung din ne mibpehimatey su wey zin mevelukasi is langun he menge etew. Ne pinaaǥi kayi, dutun te hustu he timpu, impeehè din he egkesuatan te Megbevayà he melibri te silut is tivuuk he menusiyà.
54002007	Ne tenged kayi intezù e zin he epustul ne midsuǥù e zin wey ku ipenurù heini. Kenà tarù heini is egkeǥiyen ku, kekenà, tutuu. Midtezù e zin wey ku mepenurù is menge etew he kenà Hudiyu su wey zan meketuu te tutuu he tuluuwen.
54002008	Ne tenged kayi, is menge maama ziyà te langun he menge inged he meheǥet is ked-engkezi zan te mezaat he ulaula, egkesuatan ku he med-ampù dan diyà te Megbevayà. Kinahanglan he wazà pauk dan te menge zuma zan wey wazè dan keduwazuwa.
54002009	Ne is menge vahi zaan, kinahanglan he hustu is kegemita zan te ugelingen dan. Kenè dan ipezalig, kekenà, kinahanglan he metau sikandan he egkeeled. Kenà utew subra is kebmekempeta zan te ulu zan pinaaǥi te vulvul zan. Kenè dan megamit te menge mahal iring te vulawan wey menge velieg he pirlas wey menge mahal he ugelingen,
54002010	kekenà, kinahanglan he iyan ideliǥa kandan is menge meupiya he ulaula. Iyan heini zait he ed-ul-ulahan te vahi he egkaǥi he ed-azap sikandin te Megbevayà.
54002011	Kinahanglan is menge vahi he mebpurung dan mebpemineg te penurù kandan he kenè dan megkaǥikaǥi wey kinahanglan he layun mebpezumazuma sikandan te menge egalen dan.
54002012	Kenè ku idtuǥut he iyan ebpenurù is bahi. Kenè ku zaan idtuǥut he ebayàbayà is bahi te maama. Mebpemineg dà sikandin,
54002013	su iyan nehuna he nelimbag si Adan ne human si Ibà.
54002014	Ne kenà iyan si Adan neekalan ni Setanas, kekenà, iyan si Ibà neekalan ne tenged dutun nekesupak sikandin te intelaan kandan.
54002015	Ne minsan pa te iyan haazà, egkelibri ǥihapun is menge vahi te silut pinaaǥi te ked-anak te vatà ke kenè dan edlekaan is kedtuu zan, wey is kebmahala zan te menge zuma zan wey is menge ulaula zan he igkesuat te Megbevayà wey is ked-erengana zan te langun he ed-ul-ulahan dan.
54003001	Utew tutuu is erubasa he edhenduen te: Is maama he egkesuat he iyan sikandin ed-uwit te menge tumutuu, utew meupiya haazà is terebahu he egkesuatan din.
54003002	Iyan, is ed-uwit te menge tumutuu, kinahanglan he wazà igkesewayi kandin. Sevaha zà is esawa zin ne kenè din selselai. Kinahanglan he egketengkaan layun is ed-ul-ulahan din; metau sikandin he ed-isip te hustu wey telehuzen sikandin. Kinahanglan he meelima sikandin te menge meǥeliyug din. Kinahanglan daan he metau he ebpenurù.
54003003	Kenà sikandin lelenguten; kenà sikandin ebpemeǥespeǥes, kekenà, metulanged sikandin. Edlikayan din is samuk ne kenà susuaten te selapì.
54003004	Kinahanglan he meupiya is ked-uwita zin te esawa zin wey menge anak din. Kinahanglan he menge mepeveyveyaan wey metinehuzan layun is menge anak din kandin.
54003005	Su is maama he kenà metau he ed-uwit te esawa zin wey menge anak din, ebmenumenu sikandin he ed-uwit te menge etew he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà?
54003006	Ne kinahanglan daan he kenà sikandin beǥu pa he tumutuu, su kela ke mehimu he mepelevawen ne egkesilutan te Megbevayà iring te midsilutan si Setanas.
54003007	Kinahanglan he meupiya layun is menge ulaula zin su wey mehimu he telehuzen sikandin te menge etew he kenà tumutuu ki Kristu, su emun kenà, kela ke ituka zan ne egkeseleizan sikandin ni Setanas.
54003008	Ne iring din ded daan is menge diyekunu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, menge edtavang te menge tumutuu; kinahanglan he meupiya is menge ulaula zan. Kinahanglan he telehuzen sikandan; metinumanen sikandan te menge lalag dan. Kenè dan lelenguten, ne kenè dan mebmanggad pinaaǥi te limbung.
54003009	Kinahanglan he edhemenan dan te edtuu he kenà duwazuwa is menge tuluuwen he imbugnà kenitew te Megbevayà.
54003010	Ke zuen etew he ebpilien niw he diyekunu, kinahanglan he edsusiyen pa is menge ulaula zin. Ne emun wazà netuenan he mezaat he ulaula zin, egkehimu he ebpilien sikandin he diyekunu.
54003011	Iring din ded daan is bahi he esawa te diyekunu su kinahanglan he telehuzen sikandin. Kenà menge vereituk, kekenà, egketengkaan is ked-isipa zin te langun wey egkengeseriǥan te minsan hengkey he meupiya he ulaula.
54003012	Is diyekunu, ne kinahanglan he sevaha zà is esawa zin ne kenè din selselai. Kinahanglan daan he meupiya is ked-uwita zin te esawa zin wey menge anak din
54003013	su is diyekunu he meupiya is menge vaal zin te kedtavang din te menge tumutuu, telehuzen sikandin utew te menge etew ne egkehimu he kenè din igkehandek is kebpenurù din mehitenged te kedtuu zin ki Jesu Kristu.
54003014	Kayi te kedsurat ku, ebperetengen ku he meǥaan e en ebpekepenumbaley ziyan te kenikew.
54003015	Umba ebpesuratan ku sikew su kela ke mesanggen a. Ne emun egkesanggen a egketuenan nu ǥihapun ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan he zait tew te menge anak te Megbevayà. Iyan kiw iglisya, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, menge tumutuu te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà. Iyan kiw kes menge tukud wey vangel he zutun mekesavuk is tutuu he tuluuwen.
54003016	Ne netuenan tew te langun he lavew pa te langun is imbugnà he tuluuwen he midtuuwan tew. Mibpeetew si Kristu; midtistiǥusan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he metazeng sikandin; naahà sikandin te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà; insangyew sikandin diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu; duen menge tumutuu kandin dini te tivuuk he kelibutan; midtulus sikandin pehendiyà te langit.
54004001	Utew keladu is impesavut te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu zuen menge etew he kenè en edtuu te tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, iyan ebpemineǥen dan is impinted te menge teruen he menge mulin-ulin. Ebpemineǥen dan is impenurù kandan te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin
54004002	pinaaǥi te menge tarù te menge uvag kun tumutuu he kenè en ibmezaat te ǥehinawa zan is menge mezaat he ulaula zan.
54004003	Ibpenurù dan he indawey te Megbevayà is kebpengesawa ne egkeǥiyen dan he zuen menge egkeenen he indawey zaan. Iyan, heini is menge egkeenen, midlimbag te Megbevayà he egkeenen tew te menge tumutuu he nekesavut te tutuu he tuluuwen. Ne kinahanglan he ebpeselematan tew te Megbevayà emun egkeenen tew.
54004004	Meupiya is minsan hengkey he egkeenen he midlimbag te Megbevayà ne kinahanglan he kenè tew egkeǥiyen he mezaat is minsan hengkey, kekenà, edewaten tew wey ebpeselematan tew.
54004005	Netuenan ta he meupiya is kegkeena ta kayi tenged te iyan migkaǥi te Megbevayà wey tenged te ebpeselematan tew.
54004006	Emun ibpenurù nu heini ziyà te menge zuma he tumutuu egkehimu ka he metinumanen he suluǥuen ni Jesu Kristu. Ne egkeheǥet is kedtuu nu pinaaǥi te ked-istudyu nu te tuluuwen tew wey pinaaǥi te kedhamen nu te hustu he impenurù kenikew.
54004007	Iyan, likayi nu is menge penurù he menge tarù he ǥuǥud he kenà dait te Megbevayà. Purungi nu tumana is egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
54004008	Duen deisek he pulus te kedlumbaza te lawa, iyan, utew zekelà is pulus te kedlumbaza te kedtuu ta su iyan ibmeupiya te kebpekesavuk tew minsan guntaan wey lavew en keuzemà ke ziyà ki en te langit.
54004009	Erubasa heini he utew tutuu ne kinahanglan he tuuwi te langun.
54004010	Tenged kayi ebpenigudu ki edhaǥù wey metuuwi heini te langun he menge etew su nekesarig ki en te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà ne iyan sikandin Menluluwas te langun he menge etew, lavew en is menge tumutuu kandin.
54004011	Heini is menge suǥù ku wey penurù ku kenikew, isuǥù nu wey ipenurù nu zaan diyà te menge zuma nu.
54004012	Minsan pa te menguhed ke pa, kinahanglan he mezait ka he edtehuzen te minsan hentei; kinahanglan he iyan ka ed-iringan te menge tumutuu ki Kristu, ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he tegteǥami nu is kegkaǥikaǥi nu, is ulaula nu, is kebmahala nu te langun, is kedsarig nu te Megbevayà, wey is kedlikayi nu te meremerik he ulaula.
54004013	Taman te kenè e pa ebpekeuma ziyan, iyan beeli nu is: besaha nu is Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te menge etew. Sembaǥi nu wey penurua nu sikandan.
54004014	Kenè nu lipati haazà is ketau he imbeǥey zengan kenikew te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kebpenuvadtuvad te ebpeneuven wey pinaaǥi te kedempaa kenikew te menge ebmeǥurangen.
54004015	Hemeni nu wey purungi nu is kedtumana nu kayi te langun su wey metueni te langun is layun ked-iseg te kebpeketuman nu te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
54004016	Purungi nu susiya is kenikew he ulaula wey is kebpenurù nu. Su emun edhemenan nu heini kenà iyan ke zà is egkelibri te silut, kekenà, pinaaǥi kenikew egkehimu he egkelibri zaan is menge etew he ebpememineg te ibpenurù nu.
54005001	Kenè nu bensaǥi is meǥurang, kekenà, sembaǥi nu he iring te amey nu en. Sembaǥi nu zaan is menge menguhed he maama he iring te menge suled nu en.
54005002	Is menge vahi he meǥurang en, sembaǥi nu zaan he iring te iney nu en wey is menge menguhed he vahi, sembaǥi nu sikandan he iring te menge etevey nu en. Ne kinahanglan he utew hustu is ked-isipa nu kayi ziyà te kandan.
54005003	Purungi niw is menge valu he vahi he wazè dan egkeseriǥan te keuyaǥan dan.
54005004	Ke zuen balu he vahi he zuen din menge anak wey menge apù, ipenurù nu kandan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dan wey zan metahud is ginikanan dan wey zan meverasi. Iyan heini egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
54005005	Ne sikan is balu he vahi he wazè din egkeseriǥan te keuyaǥan din, iyan din dà egkeseriǥan is Megbevayà, ne maandew wey mezukilem ed-ampù wey ebuyù te tavang diyà te Megbevayà.
54005006	Iyan, haazà is balu he vahi he iyan dà mulà egkesuatan din is menge kelibutanen he kelipey, minsan ke uuyag pa, iring sikandin te minatey en.
54005007	Heini is impenurù ku, ipurung nu isuǥù diyà te menge tumutuu ziyan su wey wazà igkesewayi kandan.
54005008	Su ke zuen tumutuu he kenè din ed-elimahan is menge edsarig kandin, lavew en sikandan he ziyà ed-ubpà te valey zin, mid-engkezan din en is kedtumana zin te tuluuwen tew. Meupiya pa sikan is wazà meketuu kenà sikandin.
54005009	Kenè niw ilista is balu he vahi he minus pa te keneman is penuiǥan din. Kinahanglan he wazè din selselai is esawa zin.
54005010	Ne kinahanglan daan he nevantug sikandin tenged te menge vaal zin he meupiya iring te ked-elimahi te menge vatà, ked-elimahi te menge meǥeliyug; nekelùlù sikandin te paa te menge tumutuu, midtavang sikandin te nengeseeng wey mibeelan din is minsan hengkey he menge meupiya.
54005011	Kenè niw ilista is menge menguhed he menge valu he vahi su zuen timpu he pinaaǥi te suat te lawa zan, egkesuat dan pa he ebpeesawa ebpeuman.
54005012	Ne pinaaǥi zutun ebpekesalè dan su kenè dan edtumanen is pesarig dan ki Kristu.
54005013	Ne kenà duen dà taman su melemu zan ebpetetapul ne layun dan ebpenumbaley ziyà te menge valey, ne kenà iyan dà haazà su egkehimu zan daan he vereituk, ne ebpekekevut dan te wazè dan kelavet duen ne ebenteenan dan is kenà meupiya he ebenteenan.
54005014	Ne tenged kayi egkesuatan ku he mebpeuman mebpeesawa is menge menguhed he valu he vahi su wey mekeanak sikandan ne med-elima te pemilya zan. Ne zutun wazà igkesewayi kandan te menge kuntada tew.
54005015	Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su zuen menge valu he vahi he mid-engkezan dan is kedsunud dan ki Kristu ne ebpezumdumahan dan si Setanas.
54005016	Ke zuen tumutuu he vahi he zuen menge keǥapì din he valu he vahi, kinahanglan he elimahi zin. Kenè din seriǥi is duma he tumutuu he iyan ed-elima su wey kenà mesemuki is menge tumutuu he ed-elima te zuma he menge valu he vahi he wazà egkeseriǥan.
54005017	Is menge ebmeǥurangen he meupiya is ked-uwita zan te menge tumutuu, kinahanglan he isipa niw sikandan he zait he edtekepen is suhul kandan, lavew en sikandan is dekelà is baal zan te kedwali wey kebpenurù.
54005018	Iring sikandan te vaka he ibpeǥunas su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is ibpeǥunas he vaka, kinahanglan he kenè niw ebusalan, ne heini zaan, Is etew he edterebahu, dait sikandin he edsuhulan.
54005019	Kenè niw pemineǥa is edsumbung te ebmeǥurangen te menge tumutuu ke wazà dezuwa wey ke tetelu ve he ebpeketistiǥus te idsumbung.
54005020	Is ebmeǥurangen he layun ebpekesalà, sewaya nu ziyà te etuvangan te menge tumutuu su wey mahandek is menge zuma he ebmeǥurangen.
54005021	Edteleenan ku sikew he purungi nu tumana heini is insuǥù ku kenikew. Iyan ebpeketistiǥus kayi is Megbevayà, si Jesu Kristu, wey is menge pinilì din he velinsuǥuen. Kinahanglan he te minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan nu wazè nu zepiǥi he minsan hentei. Ke edhusey ka kinahanglan he iyan nu pemineǥa kes ebpekevenar.
54005022	Kinahanglan he kenè nu zegdeǥusuwi is kebpilì nu te ed-uwit te menge tumutuu su ke ebpekesalà sikandin iyan ka egkevesulan. Ne kinahanglan he wazà igkevesuli kenikew he iring kayi.
54005023	Ne elin daan sambag ku kenikew is: kenè nu iyan dà inuma is wahig, kekenà, inum ka zaan te zeisey he vinu su wey mevewii is getek nu wey is mezakel he zaru nu.
54005024	Duen menge etew he kenè en ebpekeeles is menge mezaat he vaal zan ne netuenan te langun te wazè pa sikandan imbistigaha. Ne zuen daan menge etew he nekeeles is menge mezaat he vaal zan ne wey zà heini egketueni ke ed-imbistigahan.
54005025	Ne iring din ded daan duen menge etew he kenà ebpekeeles is menge vaal zan he meupiya ne zuen daan menge etew he kenà egketuenan is menge vaal zan he meupiya, iyan, duen timpu he egketuenan ded daan heini.
54006001	Is menge suluǥuen he tumutuu, kinahanglan he isipa zan is menge egalen dan he zait he edtehuzen dan te minsan keenu he timpu. Su pinaaǥi kayi wazà ebpekezezaat te zengeg te Megbevayà wey wazà ebpekesudì te kebpenurù dey.
54006002	Ke tumutuu ki Kristu is egalen, kinahanglan he kenà maawà is kedtahud kandin te suluǥuen din he tumutuu tenged te telesuled dan pinaaǥi ki Kristu. Kinahanglan he tuwas pa he meupiya is baal te suluǥuen din tenged te tumutuu wey minahal te Megbevayà sikan is egketevangan dan pinaaǥi te vaal zan. Iyan heini ipenurù nu wey ipesavut nu ziyà te menge tumutuu.
54006003	Ke zuen ebpenurù te selakew he tuluuwen ne kenè din edewaten is hustu he kebpenurù te Nengazen tew he si Kristu wey is tuluuwen mehitenged te kedtumana tew te egkesuatan te Megbevayà,
54006004	paglung sikandin he mepedeligen. Utew subra is kegkesuat din te menge winalì he kebpekidlawan mehitenged te menge lalag dà. Kayi ebpuun is kegkesina, is kebpekid-eǥet, is kedsulà, is kedhaled he wazè din kepesikazan,
54006005	wey is kebpekidsemukà. Ulaula heini te menge etew he nelalung en is isip dan wey kenè dan en edewaten is tutuu he tuluuwen. Kunaan dan ke petiǥayun is kebpesakup te Megbevayà.
54006006	Tutuu iyan he zekelà utew is pulus te kebpesakup te Megbevayà, iyan, dutun dà te etew he ibmeupiya en te ǥehinawa zin is minsan deisey he egketiǥeyunan din.
54006007	Su te ked-enaka kenita wazè ta uwiten, wazè ta zaan egkeuwit emun ebpatey ki.
54006008	Ke zuen ta egkekaan wey ke zuen ta igkebisti, meupiya en is gehinawa ta.
54006009	Is menge etew he egkesuat he medsepian, melemu sikandan egkepenulayi wey egkeseleizi. Mezakel is menge suat dan he wazà pulus ne ebpekezezaat heini. Ebpekezezaat heini kandan wey egkehimu zaan he ibpatey zan heini.
54006010	Su ke zuen etew he susuaten te selapì ne egkehimu he egkeulaula kandin is minsan hengkey he mezaat. Pinaaǥi kayi neiniyuǥan te zuma is tuluuwen tew ne tenged kayi nehimu he utew mezakel is menge keseengan dan.
54006011	Ne sikew mulà, suluǥuen ka te Megbevayà; likayi nu is langun he iring kayi he menge ulaula. Hemeni nu is metazeng he ulaula, is kedtumana te egkesuatan te Megbevayà, is kedsarig kandin, is kegkeǥeǥawi nu te menge zuma nu, is kebmeinentusen te menge supak dan, wey is kelinew te ulaula nu.
54006012	Penigudu ka he meupiya is kedlumbè nu, he ke và egkeǥiya, is kedtumana nu te langun he ebpeveelan kenikew tenged te neketuu ka. Hemeni nu is untung he wazè din pidtemanan su umba midhimu ka te Megbevayà he tumutuu kandin su wey nu heini maangken. Nekepenudtul ka ziyà te mezakel he menge etew he neketuu ka te tutuu he tuluuwen.
54006013	Ebpeketistiǥus is Megbevayà wey si Jesu Kristu he ebpeketelteleenan ku sikew he purungi nu tumana he wazà sayep is insuǥù ku kenikew taman te kenè pa edlikù is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Is Megbevayà, iyan ebpengelintau he meuyag is langun he menge linimbag din; ne si Jesus, iyan nekepenistiǥus mehitenged te tutuu he tuluuwen diyà te etuvangan ni Punsyu Pilatu.
54006015	Ibpelikù si Jesus te Megbevayà ke egketuman en is hustu he timpu. Iyan dà ebayàbayà te langun is Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin kes meupiya is kebpekesavuk din. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te minsan hentei he hadì wey zatù.
54006016	Iyan sikandin wazà kemetayen. Diyà sikandin ed-ubpà te kerayag he kenà egkeuvayan. Wazà etew he nekeahà kandin ne kenà sikandin egkeahà te minsan hentei he etew. Berakat he zeliǥa sikandin wey medhadì sikandin te wazà pidtemanan.
54006017	Is menge tumutuu he mezakel is menge azen dan, keǥiyi nu he kenè dan mebpelavew wey kenè dan medsarig te menge azen dan su kenè ta egketuenan ke keenu ki egkeewai te menge azen ta. Keǥiyi nu he iyan dan seriǥi is Megbevayà su iyan sikandin metulanged. Is minsan hengkey he naazen ta, imbeǥey zin kenita wey mebmeupiya is kebpekesavuk ta.
54006018	Keǥiyi nu is menge sepian he tumutuu he hemeni zan ul-ulaha is meupiya su iyan heini hustu he ketiǥeyunan. Mebmetulanged dan wey mebmetinevangen.
54006019	Pinaaǥi kayi egkekuwa zan is hustu he ketiǥeyunan he kenè dan egkesuwey keuzemà. Ne ebpekeangken dan te untung he iyan tutuu he untung.
54006020	Sikew Timoteo, purungi nu tumana is tuluuwen he insarig kenikew. Likayi nu is menge etew he supak te Megbevayà is kegkaǥikaǥi zan. Likayi nu zaan is kunaan te zuma ke tutuu en he ketau.
54006021	Duen duma he menge etew he nekekuwa en kun kayi te ketau, iyan, pinaaǥi kayi neengkezan dan en is tutuu he tuluuwen he midtuuwan tew. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew is langun te Megbevayà.
55001001	Sikew, Timoteo he iring te anak ku su utew ku minahal, ebpesuratan ku sikew. Iyan a si Pablo he epustul ni Jesu Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, suluǥuen e zin . Midsuǥù a te Megbevayà wey ku ipenudtul is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Iyan heini sikan is impenaad din he untung he nekuwa te en pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha ta ki Jesu Kristu. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew ka wey kehizuwi ka te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey veǥayi ke zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
55001003	Iring te nengeulaula te menge kepuun ku hustu is tuyù ku te ked-ezapa ku te Megbevayà, ne utew zekelà is kebpeselemati ku kandin dutun te layun ku kenikew ked-empua ziyà te kandin te maandew wey mezukilem.
55001004	Ne emun egketenuzan ku is kedtiǥis te luhè nu zutun te ked-ewai ku kenikew, utew a kenikew ebulunga ne utew a egkesuat he meked-uman ki meked-uma wey a utew melipey.
55001005	Kenè ku egkelipatan he utew meheǥet is kedtuu nu he iring te meheǥet daan is kedtuu te apù nu he si Luwida wey is iney nu he si Eunisi. Ne netuenan ku he utew hustu zaan is kenikew he kedtuu.
55001006	Ne tenged dutun kenè nu lipati he kinahanglan he ǥemita nu is ketau nu he imbeǥey zengan kenikew te Megbevayà dutun te kedlilai ku kenikew pinaaǥi te kedempaa ku te purù nu.
55001007	Su is Mulin-ulin he impeulin kenita te Megbevayà, kenè ta igketalew, kekenà, edlig-enan ki zin wey ebeǥayan ki zin te zesen su wey mehimu he ebmahalen ta is menge zuma ta wey edtengkaan ta is langun he ed-ul-ulahan ta.
55001008	Ne tenged dutun kenè nu ikeeled is kebpenurù nu mehitenged te Nengazen tew ne kenà a zaan kenikew ikeeled is gaked din wey nepirisu tenged te kedsengyawa kandin, kekenà, pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Megbevayà he idtavang kenikew, ambit ka zaan kayi te ked-entusa ku te kemeresayan tenged te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
55001009	Is Megbevayà, ne iyan midlibri kenita te silut ne midhimu ki zin he ǥaked din. Umba mid-ulaula zin heini, kenà tenged te meupiya is menge ulaula ta, kekenà, tenged dà te iyan tuyù din wey tenged te utew zekelà is gaǥew zin kenita. Dengan te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey mid-isip din he ibpeehè din is gaǥew zin kenita pinaaǥi te kebeǥaya zin kenita ki Jesu Kristu.
55001010	Ne ǥuntaan impeehè en kenita haazà is gaǥew zin su mibpeetew si Jesu Kristu he iyan Menluluwas tew. Ne si Jesus, in-awè din is gehem te kemetayen ne pinaaǥi te Meupiya he Tudtulanen impesavut din kenita he egkeveǥayan ki te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
55001011	Ne siak, midtezù a te Megbevayà wey a mehimu he epustul ne wey ku ikesangyew wey ipenurù haazà is Meupiya he Tudtulanen,
55001012	ne tenged kayi egkeantus ku ǥuntaan heini is kemeresayan. Ne minsan pa zutun, netuenan ku ke hentei sikandin is midseriǥan ku, ne netuenan ku zaan he taman te andew keuzemà he edsusiyen din is nengeulaula te menusiyà, metau sikandin he ebantey te langun he insarig din kediey.
55001013	Is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ku kenikew, kinahanglan he iyan layun edsunuzen nu. Hemeni nu is kedtuu nu te Megbevayà wey is kebmahala nu te menge zuma nu su iyan heini tuus te kebpekidsevaha ta ki Jesu Kristu.
55001014	Pinaaǥi te kedtavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he zini ed-ubpà te kenita, bentayi nu he kenà mahalin haazà is tutuu he tuluuwen he insarig kenikew te Megbevayà.
55001015	Netuenan nu en he is langun he menge tumutuu zini he ebpuun te prubinsya he Asya, wazè e zan tevangi. Elin dutun si Pihilu wey si Hirmuhinis.
55001016	Iyan, berakat he mehizuwi te Nengazen si Unisipuru wey pemilya zin. Su layun e zin edtevangi kayi te menge keseengan ku. Wazè din ikeeled is kebpenumbaley zin kedì te pinirisu,
55001017	kekenà, dutun dà te kebpekeuma zin dini te Ruma, mibpeniguduwan e zin pen-ahaa taman te neturedu e zin.
55001018	Id-ampù ku layun he mehizuwi sikandin te Nengazen keuzemà te andew te kedsusi te Nengazen te langun. Ne netuenan nu en daan he zekelà is kedtevangi zin kedì diyan te Ipisu.
55002001	Sikew, Timoteo, is iring te tutuu he anak ku, heǥeta nu is kedtuu nu su zekelà is tavang te Megbevayà kenita tenged te nekidsevaha ki ki Jesu Kristu.
55002002	Nezineg nu is kebpenurua ku te tutuu he tuluuwen diyà te mezakel he menge tumutuu; ne kinahanglan he ipenurù nu zaan heini diyà te menge etew he egkeseriǥan nu su wey mekepenurù dan daan te zuma.
55002003	Ambit ka zaan kayi te ked-entusa ku te kemeresayan tenged te kedtuu su wey ka mehimu he suluǥuen ni Jesu Kristu he iring te metinumanen he sundaru.
55002004	Sikan is mibpesundaru, ne kenà egkehimu he ed-ul-ulahan din is ed-ul-ulahan te kenà sundaru, su kinahanglan he layun sikandin andam te kebpenunuat te egalen din.
55002005	Is suluǥuen te Megbevayà, ne iring te ibanggà. Ne is ibanggà, kenà ebpekezaag ne kenà ebeǥayan te suhul emun kenè din edsunuzen is belaud te kebpekibanggà.
55002006	Ne iring daan is suluǥuen te Megbevayà te ebasuk. Is etew he midhaǥù mebasuk, ne iyan sikandin egkehuna he ebpekezawat te vahin te sebpet din.
55002007	Isipa nu heini is impesavut ku kenikew ne edtevangan ka te Nengazen wey nu mepurung heini mesavut.
55002008	Kenè nu lipati he si Jesu Kristu, mibpeetew he kevuwazan ni Hadì David ne mibpehimatey ne nevanhew. Iyan heini ibpesavut ku emun ebpenudtul a te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
55002009	Ne tenged kayi te kebpenudtul ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen midrasey a te menge kuntada te Megbevayà ne neeǥen a te kedina he iring te mesinupaken, iyan, kenà mulà egkeeǥen is Lalag te Megbevayà.
55002010	Ne tenged kayi ed-entusen ku is minsan hengkey he merasey wey ku metevangi is menge etew he pinilì te Megbevayà. Egkesuatan ku he melibri sikandan te silut pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha zan ki Jesu Kristu ne mekezawat dan te ketulusan he wazà pidtemanan.
55002011	Utew tutuu is penurù he edhenduen te, Ke pinaaǥi te kedhimuwa kandin he elili kenita minatey ki en duma kandin, duen te en daan untung duma kandin.
55002012	Ke ed-antus ki te kemeresayan ebpekehadì ki keuzemà duma kandin. Iyan, ke egkaǥi ki he kenè ki ǥaked din egkaǥi zaan sikandin keuzemà he kenè ki iyan gaked din.
55002013	Minsan ke kenè ki metinumanen te lalag din kenita, metinumanen mulà sikandin te lalag din su kenà egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is lalag din.
55002014	Keǥiyi nu is menge tumutuu he kenè dan melipati heini is langun. Iyan nu itelaan kandan he ibpetistiǥus is Megbevayà he likayi zan is kebpekidlawan he winalì mehitenged te kehuluǥan te menge lalag su wazè din pulus ne ebpekezezaat te kedtuu te ebpekezineg duen.
55002015	Himuwa nu is taman te egkehimu nu su wey mesuati te Megbevayà ne wey kenè nu ikeeled is baal nu. Kinahanglan he utew hustu is kebpenurua nu te tutuu he tuluuwen.
55002016	Likayi nu is winalì he kebpenurù he kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà, su pinaaǥi zutun ed-iseg is kenà kedtahud kandin te menge etew.
55002017	Is menge etew he iring kayi is kebpenurù dan, ne iring te it-it is penurù dan su ebpekeeneb ne ebpekezezaat. Is kebpenurù ni Himinyu wey ni Pilitu, ne iring kayi.
55002018	Midsuwayan dan en is kebpenurù te tutuu he tuluuwen ne pinaaǥi zutun nehugkà is kedtuu te zuma he menge tumutuu. Egkeǥiyen dan he nepasad en is kebenhawa kenita.
55002019	Ne minsan pa zutun kenà egkehalin kes tuluuwen he midtukud te Megbevayà su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Egketuenan te Nengazen ke hentei is menge etew he ǥaked din, wey zuen pa zaan lalag he edhenduen te, Is minsan hentei he egkaǥi he ǥaked sikandin te Nengazen, ne kinahanglan he ed-iniyuǥan din is mezaat he ulaula.
55002020	Diyà te minsan hendei he zekelà he valey zuen menge ǥelemiten he vulawan wey pelata ne zuen daan dutun menge ǥelemiten he kayu wey diniyun. Wey zà egemita is menge ǥelemiten he vulawan wey pelata ke zuen keemuran, iyan, is duma, andew-andew mulà is kegemita zuen.
55002021	Ne sikan is etew he egkesuat he mahala wey meteǥeley te Megbevayà he iring te utew mahal he ǥelemiten, kinahanglan he ed-iniyuǥan din is langun he mezaat he ulaula. Ne human sikandin dait he egemiten te Megbevayà te minsan hengkey he meupiya he ulaula.
55002022	Iniyuǥi nu is menge mezaat he kebayà te menge menguhed. Hemeni nu is metazeng he ulaula; layun ka sarig te Megbevayà; mahala nu ziyà te ǥehinawa nu is minsan hentei he tumutuu; peniguduwi nu he melinew is kedepitè niw te menge zuma nu su iyan heini menge ulaula te langun he menge etew he ebpetavang te Megbevayà tenged te iyan dà egkesuatan dan is kedtumana zan te menge suǥù din.
55002023	Iyan, kenè ka penlavetlavet dutun te menge winalì wey pinaglung he ed-istudyuwan. Netuenan nu en he iyan haazà puunà te kebpekid-eǥet.
55002024	Ne netuenan nu zaan he kinahanglan he kenà mebpekid-eǥet is suluǥuen te Nengazen, kekenà, purungi zin layun is minsan hentei he etew. Kinahanglan he metau he ebpenurù ne mepelevayen daan sikandin.
55002025	Emun menayù is kebpenurua zin te menge kuntada zin, kela ke mahalin te Megbevayà is gehinawa zan wey zan mesavut is tutuu he tuluuwen.
55002026	Ne pinaaǥi zutun human ebmetandang is ked-isipa zan te langun, ne human dan egkepeleǥuyi is gehem ni Setanas su iyan si Setanas nekezakep kandan wey zan metuman is egkesuatan din.
55003001	Kinahanglan he sevuta nu he timpu te kemereǥenan haazà is ketepusan he timpu keuzemà te kenè pa edlimasen is menusiyà.
55003002	Su zutun he timpu leǥezen is menge etew wey iyan mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zan is selapì. Ebmepelevawen wey ebmepedeligen dan. Edsulaan dan is menge zuma zan; kenè dan ebpemineǥen is menge lukes dan; ne kenè dan ebpeselamat. Utew lalung sikandan.
55003003	Kenè dan ebmahalen is menge zuma zan; kenà egkeawà is pauk dan. Bereituk sikandan; kenè dan egkeeǥen is menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa zan. Utew zan mevurut ne wazà minsan hengkey he meupiya he ulaula he kenè dan egkeepesan.
55003004	Menge men-aakal sikandan; kenè dan ed-isipen ke hengkey is egkeulaula tenged te kelelalung dan. Menge gelbuwen sikandan. Iyan dan ibpelavi is kelibutanen he kelipey kenà is kebmahala zan te Megbevayà.
55003005	Uvag sikandan ed-azap te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè dan edtuu he zuen gehem din. Likayi nu is menge etew he iring dutun.
55003006	Iyan duma zutun is menge maama he edseled te menge valey wey zan mepenurù wey meveyveyai is menge vahi he wazà menge pulus. Is menge vahi he iring kayi, egkehandek dan tenged te mezakel he neveelan dan he salà, iyan, mezakel zaan is menge mezaat he egkesuatan dan.
55003007	Layun sikandan ebpepenurù, iyan, kenè dan edsevuten is tutuu he tuluuwen.
55003008	Haazà is menge maama zaan, edsumpalit dan te tutuu he tuluuwen. Netazin en utew is isip dan ne uvag dà is kedtuu zan te Nengazen. Iring sikandan ki Hanis wey ki Hembiris he midsumpalit dengan ki Moises.
55003009	Kenà ebpekeuswag is ed-ul-ulahan te menge etew he iring kayi su egkeahà te langun he engey sikandan iring ki Hanis wey ki Hembiris.
55003010	Ne sikew mulà, Timoteo, nepurung nu en metueni is langun he impenurù ku, is menge vetasan ku wey is egkesuatan ku he meulaula ku. Netuenan nu zaan is kedtuu ku te Megbevayà, is kebmepelevayen ku, is kebmahala ku te minsan hentei, wey is ked-antus ku te kemereǥenan.
55003011	Netuenan nu zaan is menge kemeresayan wey menge keseengan he nengeantus ku. Netuenan nu zaan is langun he neeǥiyan ku ziyà te menge inged he Entiyukya, wey Ikunya, wey Listera wey is langun he utew merasey he naantus ku. Is Megbevayà, ne midlibri e zin kayi te langun.
55003012	Ne is langun he tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu he egkesuatan dan he pinaaǥi kandin metuman dan is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, edresayen sikandan te menge kuntada te Megbevayà.
55003013	Iyan, is menge lalung he etew, wey is menge uvag kun tumutuu, ed-iseg mulà ebmezaat is menge ulaula zan. Edtezinen dan is isip te menge etew, iyan, egketazin daan is kandan he isip.
55003014	Ne sikew mulà, hemeni nu is tuluuwen he impenurù kenikew he netuenan nu he tutuu. Netuenan nu ke hentei is nemekepenurù kenikew
55003015	ne egketenuzan nu he zengan te vatè ke pa nesavut nu en is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà. Dutun te lalag din ebpuun is kedsavut he iyan paaǥi te kedlibriya kenita te silut emun edtuu ki ki Jesu Kristu.
55003016	Impinted te Megbevayà is kedsurata te langun he insurat he menge lalag din, ne zekelà is tavang kenita kayi te lalag emun ebpenurù ki, emun edawey ki, wey ke edsambag ki te menge tumutuu wey emun ibpenurù ta is metazeng he ulaula.
55003017	Pinaaǥi te ked-istudyuwi kayi te lalag ebmetau ki is suluǥuen te Megbevayà ne egkehimu ta is minsan hengkey he meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan.
55004001	Duen idtelaan ku kenikew, ne is Megbevayà wey si Jesu Kristu, iyan ebpeketistiǥus kayi te menge lalag ku. Netuenan ta he edlikù si Jesus su iyan sikandin hadì ne iyan sikandin edsusi keuzemà te nengeulaula te minsan hentei, se uuyag pa wey is nemematey en.
55004002	Ne tenged kayi iyan idtelaan ku kenikew is: ipesavut nu is Lalag te Megbevayà. Kinahanglan he layun ka andam te kebpesevuta te lalag din te minsan keenu he timpu ke zuen egkesuat he ebpemineg wey ke wazà. Dewaya nu is menge etew, sembaǥi nu he med-iniyug dan te mezaat he ulaula. Hengyui nu sikandan. Kinahanglan he layun ka mepelevayen is ebpenurù kandan.
55004003	Umba idtelaan ku heini kenikew su egkeuma keuzemà is timpu he kenà edewaten te menge etew is tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, iyan dan edsunuzen is menge mezaat he kebayè dan. Ebpemepenurù dan te mezakel he menge menenudlù. Ne iyan ibpenurù kayi is tuluuwen he utew zan egkesuati te ebpemineg.
55004004	Kenè dan ebpemineǥen is tutuu, kekenà, iyan dan edtuuwan is menge tarù he ǥuǥud.
55004005	Iyan, sikew mulà, tengkai nu is ed-ul-ulahan nu te minsan keenu he timpu. Entusa nu is kemereǥenan. Peniguduwi nu te edsangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Purungi nu tumana is langun he ebpeveelan kenikew te Megbevayà.
55004006	Siak mulà, meǥaan en egkeepus is umur ku; meǥaan en egkeuma is kebpatey ku.
55004007	Nepasad ku en is kebenggaa kedì te Megbevayà; nekeuma ad te edungguan te edlumbà. Hustu is ked-ikula ku te tutuu he tuluuwen.
55004008	Ne ǥuntaan inteǥana en kedì te Nengazen is suhul he iyan ibeǥey zin diyà te langun he memetazeng he etew. Ibeǥey zin heini keuzemà te andew te kedsusiya zin te nengeulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà. Iyan sikandin kes metazeng is kedsusi zin. Ne kenà iyan e zà midteǥenahan din te suhul, kekenà, midteǥenahan din daan is langun he utew egkeǥalew ke ebpekelikù sikandin.
55004009	Himuwa nu is taman te egkehimu nu wey ka meǥaan mekehendini
55004010	su mid-ewaan a ni Dimas tenged te iyan egkenuǥunan din is untung din dini te kelibutan. Midhendiyà sikandin te Tiselunika. Ne si Krisinti, midhendiyà te Gelasya, ne si Tito zaan, midhendiyà te Delmasya.
55004011	Iyan dà duma ku kayi, si Lucas. Tuluya nu si Marcos ne zumaha nu zini su zekelà is tavang din kedì te langun he ed-ul-ulahan ku kayi.
55004012	Midsuǥù ku si Tikiku ziyà te inged he Ipisu.
55004013	Sikan is kumbalè ku he intaǥak ku ziyà te ki Karpu he ziyà te Truwas, meupiya ke ed-uwiten nu zini. Uwita nu zaan sikan is midlulun he menge libru, lavew en sikan is diyà isurat te lundis.
55004014	Utew mezaat is mid-ulaula kedì ni Alejandro, sikan is pandey te tumbaǥa. Iyan ebales kandin is Nengazen.
55004015	Endami nu sikandin su utew mezesen is kedsumpelita zin te tuluuwen he ibpenurù ta.
55004016	Dutun te nehuna he ked-imbistiga kedì wazà minsan hentei he midtavang mebpenistiǥus kediey su mid-ewaan a zuen te langun. Id-ampù ku he mepesaylu sikandan te Megbevayà.
55004017	Minsan pa zutun midtevangan a te Nengazen ne midlig-enan e zin ne tenged dutun nepurungan ku te edsangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te langun he menge etew zutun he kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne tenged dutun nelibri a ne wazà a mehimetayi.
55004018	Ne kenà dutun dà taman su edlibriyen e pa te Nengazen te minsan hengkey he ebpekekaid kedì ne edlig-enan e zin taman te ed-uwiten e zin dutun te ǥinhedian din diyà te langit. Berakat he zeliǥa sikandin te wazà pidtemanan.
55004019	Ipengemusta a ki Priscila, ki Ekilu, wey ki Unisipuru wey is pemilya zin.
55004020	Mibpetaǥak si Irastu ziyà te Kurintu ne intaǥak ku si Trupimu ziyà te Militu su nezeruwan.
55004021	Gaanggaan ka hendini te kenè pa tipenguzan. Ebpengemusta kenikew ensi Yubulu, si Pudinti, si Linu, si Claudia, wey is langun he menge tumutuu zini.
55004022	Berakat he zumahi kew te Nengazen. Ikeǥaǥew kew zin is langun. Iyan a si Pablo.
56001001	Sikew, Tito, ebpesuratan ku sikew. Iring ka te tutuu he anak ku su is kedtuu nu te Nengazen, ne iring daan te kedì he kedtuu kandin. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew ka te Megbevayà wey te Menluluwas tew he si Jesu Kristu wey veǥayi ke zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk. Iyan a si Pablo is suluǥuen te Megbevayà wey is epustul, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, suǥù ni Jesu Kristu. Iyan insuǥua zin kedì su wey ku meheǥet is kedtuu te menge etew he pinilì te Megbevayà, ne wey ku zaan meheǥet is kedsavut dan te tutuu he tuluuwen he iyan edtuuwan ta. Elin daan insuǥua zin kedì is wey zan mesavut he ebpekeperateng dan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Dengan te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey, migkaǥi te Megbevayà he ibeǥey zin kenitew heini is untung ne netuenan ta he kenà egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is egkeǥiyen din. Ne ǥuntaan iyan en timpu te kebpetueni zin kayi te untung pinaaǥi te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne heini he tudtulanen, insarig kediey te Megbevayà he menluluwas tew.
56001005	Iyan inteǥaka ku kenikew ziyan te Krita is wey nu mehimasad is menge vaal he wazè ta mepasad, ne wey nu zaan mepilì diyà te kada inged is menge ebmeǥurangen he egkeseriǥan te menge tumutuu. Emun ebpilien nu is menge ebmeǥurangen, ul-ulaha nu is intelaan ku kenikew.
56001006	Is ebmeǥurangen, kinahanglan he wazà supak din, sevaha zà is esawa zin, ne kenè din selselai. Kinahanglan he menge tumutuu is menge anak din, ne kenà sikandan ed-isipen te menge etew he iyan dan dà ebpen-ahaan is kelibutanen he kelipey. Kinahanglan he metinumanen sikandan te menge idsuǥù kandan.
56001007	Ne ǥeina te insarig kandin te Megbevayà is kedumala te menge tumutuu, kinahanglan he wazà supak din. Kenà sikandin mebmandarmandar zà; kenà sikandin eengeren. Kinahanglan he kenà sikandin lelenguten, kenà sikandin ebpemeǥespeǥes ne kenà iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is selapì.
56001008	Kinahanglan he meelima sikandin te menge meǥeliyug din ne kinahanglan daan he iyan utew zin egkesuati is kedtevangi zin te menge etew. Metau sikandin he ed-isip te hustu. Metazeng sikandin he etew wey igkesuat te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zin. Metau zaan sikandin he ed-eǥen te menge suat te lawa zin.
56001009	Kinahanglan he zutun te kebpenurù din, kenè din suwayi is tutuu he tuluuwen he iyan impenurù ta. Su emun iyan ibpenurù din is tutuu he tuluuwen, egkeheǥet is kedtuu te ebpememineg kandin ne igkepesavut din he utew nengesayep is edsumpalit te penurù din.
56001010	Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su zuen mezakel he menge zuma niyu ziyan he edsumpalit te hustu he penurù. Iyan is menge Hudiyu he tumutuu en ki Kristu. Wazà pulus te egkeǥiyen dan wey tarù is ibpenurù dan.
56001011	Kinahanglan he ibpeengkezan nu kandan is kebpenurù dan su ke zuen sevaha he egketazin is isip din pinaaǥi te kedtuuwi zin kayi he penurù egkesemukan is kebpekid-upakat din te menge zuma zin dutun te pemilya zin. Iyan dà ibpenurua zan dutun te kenà hustu he ibpenurù is wey zan mekepenapì.
56001012	Duen nevantug he menenagnà he zuma zan he tigKrita he migkaǥi te, Teruen wey utew lalung is menge etew zini te Krita. Utew zan egkeepesi is kedterebahu, iyan, utew zan egkesuati is kegkaan.
56001013	Ne utew venar is migkaǥi zin. Tenged dutun kinahanglan he pekezeseni nu sikandan te edawey wey mehustu is kedtuu zan
56001014	ne wey zan meengkezi is kedtuu zan te menge tetezemen te menge Hudiyu wey te menge kelibutanen dà he suǥù he mibeelan te menge etew he edsumpalit te tutuu he tuluuwen.
56001015	Ke zuen etew he nelumpiyuwan te Megbevayà, wazà minsan hengkey he ibmeremerik din. Iyan, ke zuen etew he wazà melumpiyuwi te Megbevayà, wazà minsan hengkey pa he paaǥi he igkelumpiyu kandin su kenè sikandin edtuu ne nelalung utew is isip din wey ǥehinawa zin.
56001016	Duen menge etew he egkeǥiyen dan he emiǥu sikandan te Megbevayà, iyan, pinaaǥi te menge ulaula zan egketuusan ta he kuntada sikandan te Megbevayà. Utew zin sikandan egkeepesi su kenè dan ebpememineg te tutuu he tuluuwen. Ne tenged dutun kenè dan dait he ibpeulaula zin te minsan hengkey he meupiya.
56002001	Ne sikew mulà, kinahanglan he kenà ebpekesuwey is ibpenurù nu zuen te tutuu he tuluuwen.
56002002	Is menge meǥurang en he maama, ne iyan ipenurù nu kandan is: kinahanglan he metau sikandan he ed-eǥen te menge suat te lawa zan; kinahanglan he zait sikandan he edtehuzen tenged te menge ulaula zan he meupiya; kinahanglan he metau zan he ed-isip te hustu. Meheǥet is kedtuu zan te Megbevayà, ebmahalen dan diyà te ǥehinawa zan is menge zuma zan, wey meinentusen sikandan.
56002003	Ne iring ded daan dutun is penurù nu ziyà te menge meǥurang en he vahi. Kinahanglan he layun igkesuat te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zan. Kenà sikandan pereituk, kenà sikandan pereinum te vinu. Kinahanglan he layun dan ipenurù is meupiya he ulaula
56002004	su wey zan ikepenurù diyà te menge menguhed he vahi is kebmahala zan te menge esawa zan wey menge anak dan,
56002005	ne wey zan daan ikepenurù kandan is ked-isip te hustu, is kedlikayi te meremerik he ulaula, wey is kebpurungi zan te menge vaal zan. Kinahanglan he ebpemineǥen dan is suǥù te esawa zan. Ne emun iring dutun is menge ulaula te menge vahi wazà minsan hentei he ebpekekaǥi he mezaat is ibpenurù ta zutun te Lalag te Megbevayà.
56002006	Ne iring din daan dutun is penurù nu ziyà te menge menguhed he maama. Kinahanglan he ipenurù nu kandan he purungi zan tengkai is menge ulaula zan.
56002007	Sikew zaan, kinahanglan he layun meupiya is kenikew he ulaula su wey iyan ka meiringi te menge zuma nu. Ne emun ebpenurù ka, kinahanglan he hustu is tuyù nu wey sungkad te Lalag te Megbevayà is paaǥi nu te kebpenurù.
56002008	Is minsan hengkey he ibpenurù nu, ne kinahanglan he zutun ebpuun te hustu he tuluuwen su wey kenà egkekaǥi he sayep ne zutun wazà igkesudii kenita te menge kuntada ta, kekenà, egkeeled dan.
56002009	Penurua nu is menge tumutuu he suluǥuen he pemineǥa zan is suǥù te menge egalen dan su wey ikesuat te menge egalen is menge vaal zan. Kinahanglan he kenè dan medsukul,
56002010	ne kenè dan mebpenakew, kekenà, ipeehè dan he egkeseriǥan sikandan te egalen dan. Emun iyan haazà ulaula te menge suluǥuen he tumutuu egkesavut te menge etew he utew tutuu is tuluuwen he ibpenurù ta mehitenged te Megbevayà he iyan menluluwas tew.
56002011	Impeǥawaǥawa en guntaan is gaǥew te Megbevayà su wey mehimu he melibri te silut is tivuuk he menusiyà.
56002012	Ne pinaaǥi zutun te ǥaǥew egkesavut ta he kinahanglan he meengkezi ta is menge ulaula he kenà igkesuat te Megbevayà wey is kedtumana ta te menge suat te lawa ta zini te kelibutan. Kinahanglan he ed-eǥenen ta is menge kebayà ta he mezaat. Kinahanglan daan he metazeng wey igkesuat te Megbevayà is menge ulaula ta te zini ki pa ed-ubpà te kelibutan.
56002013	Su zuen edteǥazan ta he andew he zutun ibpeǥawaǥawa is lavew he Megbevayà he iyan Menluluwas tew he si Jesu Kristu he utew zekelà is gehem din. Iyan sikandin ebperetengen ta.
56002014	Mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kenitew wey kiw zin melibri te kebpekeulaula tew te mezaat ne wey kiw zin daan mehimu he menge ǥaked din he etew he nelumpiyuwan he utew en egkengesuat he ed-ulaula te meupiya.
56002015	Ne heini is langun he migkaǥi ku, ipenurù nu ziyà te menge etew ziyan. Gemita nu is keǥehem nu te kebayàbayà kandan. Sembaǥi nu wey dewaya nu sikandan. Kinahanglan he kenè ka lulupiǥan te minsan hentei.
56003001	Keǥiyi nu is menge tumutuu ziyan he kinahanglan he mebpesakup dan te velaud te gubirnu wey te menge upisyal ziyan. Medtuman dan te menge suǥù dan kandan ne medtavang dan ke zuen meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan te gubirnu.
56003002	Keǥiya nu kandan he kenè dan med-ituk te minsan hentei, kekenà, melinawen is kedepitè dan te langun, mebpekid-emiǥu zan te langun, wey kenè dan mepelevawen.
56003003	Su sikita zaan is tumutuu, engey ki zengan wey mesinupaken ki te Megbevayà su wazè ta meturedu is tutuu he ibayà. Nengeuripen ki te menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta wey te menge kelipey he kenà meupiya. Neteǥeb dengan is isip ta te kelelalung wey kesina. Nepeukan ki te menge etew ne nepeukan ta zaan sikandan.
56003004	Ne is Megbevayà he Menluluwas tew, hein neuma is timpu te kebpaahaa zin kenita te gaǥew zin wey ketulanged din,
56003005	midlibri ki zin te silut. Iyan ingkelibriya zin kenita is: kenà tenged te menge metazeng he ulaula he nehimu ta, kekenà, tenged dà te hizu zin kenita. Midlibri ki zin pinaaǥi te kedlumpiyuwi kenita he iyan is kebpeuman ta kebpaanak pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he nekeveǥey kenita te veǥu he untung.
56003006	Midhimu te Megbevayà he mepurung ki meulini te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin pinaaǥi te kebpehimatey ni Jesu Kristu he Menluluwas tew.
56003007	Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey tenged te ǥaǥew zin kenita meisip ki zin he metazeng ne maangken ta is untung he wazà pidtemanan he iyan ebperetengen ta.
56003008	Utew tutuu heini is impesavut ku kenikew. Egkesuatan ku he ipurung nu ipenurù heini ziyan su utew hustu wey zekelà is pulus kayi ziyà te minsan hentei. Ne emun nesavut en heini te menge tumutuu te Megbevayà iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zan is ked-ul-ulaha zan te meupiya.
56003009	Iyan, likayi nu is winalì he kebpekidlewanà te menge etew. Likayi nu zaan is ked-istudyu te menge ǥuǥud te menge ngazan te menge kepuun te etew he iyan baal zan. Ne elin nu zaan likayi is kebpekid-eǥet dan mehitenged te kedtumana te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Wazà pulus te langun kayi su ebpekezezaat.
56003010	Ke zuen duma niw he edsemuken din is upakat te menge tumutuu, dewaya nu, ne emun kenà ebpemineg, umani nu zewaya. Ne emun kenè pa zutun ebpemineg engkezi nu sikandin.
56003011	Su egketuenan nu zutun he is etew he iring kayi, nekesuwey is isip din te hustu he ulaula. Minsan pa te netuenan din he mezaat is ulaula zin, ebpeniguduwan din gihapun.
56003012	Emun ebpeveyaan ku sikew ki Ertimas ne emun kenà, si Tikiku, gaanggaan ka telavuk kediey ziyà te Nikupulis su ziyà a ed-ubpà ke egkeuma is tipenguzan.
56003013	Himuwa nu is taman te egkehimu nu wey nu metevangi is ebugadu he si Sinas wey si Epulus ke edhipanew zan. Susiya nu sikandan su wey wazà kurang dan.
56003014	Ipenurù nu ziyà te menge zuma nu he tumutuu ziyan he kinahanglan he iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zan is ked-ulaula zan te meupiya wey zan metevangi is menge edlised. Kenà meupiya ke zuen tumutuu he peǥulen su wazà pulus dutun.
56003015	Ebpepengemusta kenikew is langun he menge zuma ku kayi. Ipengemusta key zaan te langun he menge emiǥu zey he tumutuu ziyan. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Megbevayà is langun.
57001001	Minahal he emiǥu zey wey timbang dey he si Pilimun. Siak si Pablo is nepirisu tenged te kedtuu ku ki Jesu Kristu wey si Timoteo he suled tew, ebpesuratan dey sikew, wey si Epiya he etevey tew tenged te kedtuu, wey si Erkipu he zuma tew he sundaru ni Kristu wey elin daan ebpesuratan dey is menge tumutuu he ziyan edsimba te valey nu.
57001003	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey veǥayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
57001004	Sikew, suled, layun dekelà is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tenged kenikew te kada ku ked-ampù;
57001005	su nezineg ku is tudtul mehitenged te mezesen he kedtuu nu te Nengazen tew he si Jesus wey mehitenged te kebmahala nu ziyà te ǥehinawa nu te langun he menge tumutuu kandin.
57001006	Ne id-ampù ku zaan he pinaaǥi te kebpekid-upakat nu kenami tenged te kedtuu tew, med-iseg is kedsavut tew te langun he meupiya he intuvad kenitew te Megbevayà tenged te nekidsevaha kiw ki Kristu.
57001007	Utew ku ingkelipey, Geli, is kebmahala nu te menge zuma tew he tumutuu. Ingkeheǥet heini te kedtuu ku su pinaaǥi kenikew nengelipey is gehinawa te menge etew ziyan he ǥaked te Megbevayà.
57001008	Ne tenged kayi te langun duen idhangyù ku kenikew. Netuenan ku he tenged te keǥehem he imbeǥey kedì ni Kristu egkehimu he edsuǥù a kenikew he himuwa nu is hustu,
57001009	iyan, tenged te utew ka mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku, edhangyù e zà kenikew. Siak, si Pablo, is meǥurang wey ǥuntaan pinirisu a zaan tenged te kedtuu ku ki Kristu,
57001010	edhengyuan ku sikew he peseyluwa nu si Unisimu. Tenged te kedtuu zin ki Kristu iring sikandin te tutuu en he anak ku su pinaaǥi kedì nehimu sikandin he tumutuu zini te pirisuwan.
57001011	Dengan wazè nu pulus ki Unisimu, iyan, guntaan edekelà utew is pulus tew kandin.
57001012	Ibpeulì ku en diyan te kenikew si Unisimu he utew ku pezem minahal.
57001013	Neisip ku he meupiya pezem ke iyan sikandin duma ku kayi su wey mehimu sikandin he iyan tavang nu kedì te kemulu e pa nepirisu zini tenged te kedsengyawa ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
57001014	Iyan, kenè ku pa heini ebeelan te wazè nu pa ituǥut kediey. Kenà a ebpeǥes he ikehizu a kenikew. Su iyan meupiya is ebpuun te meliwanag he ǥehinawa is kedhimuwa nu kayi.
57001015	Kela ke iyan tuyù te Megbevayà te kedsuwaya ni Unisimu kenikew is: impaawà sikandin diyan te kenikew te wazà utew meuǥet su wey mehimu he meǥaked nu en te wazà pidtemanan.
57001016	Ne ǥuntaan kenà sikandin uripen nu zà duen, kekenà, utew pa mahal kenà is uripen su suled nu en daan tenged te kedtuu zin ki Kristu. Utew sikandin mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku ne mahal pa zaan diyan te kenikew, kenà tenged dà te uripen nu, kekenà, tenged daan te suled nu en tenged te Nengazen.
57001017	Ne emun ed-isipen a kenikew he timbang nu, iǥalewǥalew nu si Unisimu iring te kegelǥelawa nu kediey.
57001018	Ke zuen salè din diyan te kenikew wey ke zuen utang din diyà te kenikew, isipa nu he kediey.
57001019	Ahaa nu is kedsurata ku kayi: Iyan a si Pablo ebayad. Asal netuenan nu he zekelà daan is utang nu kedì su pinaaǥi kediey nekeangken ka te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
57001020	Ne tenged kayi, Geli, edhengyuan ku sikew he ikehizu a kenikew su telesuled ki pinaaǥi te kedtuu ta te Nengazen. Himuwa nu heini wey a melipey su telesuled ki pinaaǥi ki Kristu.
57001021	Dekelà is kedsarig ku kayi te kebpesurati ku kenikew su netuenan ku he ebpemineǥen a kenikew. Netuenan ku he zekelà is edhimuwen nu, kenà te idhangyù ku.
57001022	Ne zuen pa idhangyù ku he iyan is: endami a zaan te edhizeǥaan ku ziyan, su zekelà is kedsarig ku he pinaaǥi te ked-ampù niw, idtuǥut te Megbevayà he mekehendiyan a te keniyu.
57001023	Si Ipapras, is duma ku he pinirisu tenged te kedtuu ki Jesu Kristu, ebpengemusta keniyu.
57001024	Ebpengemusta zaan keniyu ensi Marcos, si Eristarku, si Dimas, wey si Lucas. Menge timbang ku sikandan kayi te ebpeveelan te Megbevayà.
57001025	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
58001001	Dengan duen impesavut te Megbevayà diyà te menge ǥin-epuan tew pinaaǥi te menge etew he ebpeneuven din. Mezakel is menge paaǥi te kebpeneuva kandan ne mezakel zaan is impesavut din pinaaǥi kandan.
58001002	Iyan, guntaan, duen impesavut te Megbevayà kenitew pinaaǥi te Anak din. Ne heini is Anak din, pinaaǥi kandin ne nelimbag te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey; ne midhimu sikandin te Megbevayà he Nengazen te minsan hengkey.
58001003	Pinaaǥi kayi te Anak din ibpezayag is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Megbevayà su neked-iring dan. Ke hengkey is Megbevayà ne iyan ded daan sikan is Anak din. Ne pinaaǥi te ǥehem te kegkaǥi kayi te Anak ebeyveyaan din is minsan hengkey he linimbag. Ne hein nepasad din en is ked-ewaa zin te menge salè tew, mid-ulì diyà te langit ne mibpinuu ziyà te egkekewanan te Megbevayà su edhadì.
58001004	Impaahà kenita te Megbevayà he utew lavew is Anak din, kenà is menge velinsuǥuen din diyà te langit, ne iring din ded daan, lavew is inggerar zin te Anak din, kenà is inggerar zin kandan.
58001005	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te Anak din he edhenduen te, Iyan ka Anak ku ne egkeǥiyen ku kenikew he ǥuntaan ibpeehè ku he Amey a kenikew. Iyan, wazà belinsuǥuen din he migkeǥiyan din te iring dutun te minsan keenu he timpu. Ne zuen pa insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Egkehimu he iyan a Amey zin ne iyan sikandin Anak ku. Ne kenà iyan is belinsuǥuen egkeǥiyen din dutun.
58001006	Ne migkaǥi zaan is Megbevayà mehitenged te kakey he Anak din dutun te timpu te kedsuǥua zin kandin dini te kelibutan, ke sikandin te, Kinahanglan he ed-ezapen sikandin te langun he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.
58001007	Ne iyan mulà migkaǥi te Megbevayà mehitenged te menge velinsuǥuen din is: Menge suǥù ku zà sikandan, ne egkehimu ke edhimuwen ku sikandan he iring te keramag, ne emun kenà, ne iring te hapuy ke iyan egkesuatan ku.
58001008	Ne iyan lalag din diyà te Anak din is: Iyan ka Megbevayà ne wazà pidtemanan te kedhadì nu. Metazeng is kedumala nu te ǥinhedian nu.
58001009	Iyan egkesuatan nu is metazeng he ulaula ne igkeepes nu is mezaat he ulaula. Tenged kayi, siak is Megbevayà nu, midhimu ku sikew he lavew te menge zuma nu ne imbeǥey ku kenikew is utew zekelà he kelipey.
58001010	Ne zuen pa insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edlelaǥan din is Anak din he edhenduen te, Sikew is Nengazen, iyan ka nenlimbag te tanà, ne kenikew he velad is mibaal te langit.
58001011	Ne minsan pa te egkehanew keuzemà is langit wey tanà, kenè ka mulà egkehanew. Iring dan te manggad he egkezeetan.
58001012	Iring te kedlumpia te kumbalà, edlumpien nu is langit wey tanà ne ed-ilisan nu. Iyan, sikew, kenè ka mulà egkehalin; is untung nu ne wazè din pidtemanan.
58001013	Wazà belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he migkeǥiyan din te, Dini ke zè pa pinuu te egkekewanan ku taman te kenè ku pa ibpeluhud diyà te kenikew is menge kuntada nu.
58001014	Iyan, is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà, menge suluǥuen dà sikandan te Megbevayà. Kenè tew egkeahà, iyan, edsuǥuen din sikandan wey kiw zan metevangi is menge etew he edtulusen keuzemà.
58002001	Ne tenged kayi, kinahanglan he edhemenan tew ebpurungi is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù kenitew wey tew kenà melekai su kela ke mekesuwey kiw te tutuu he ibayà.
58002002	Su is kesuǥuan he imbeǥey zengan te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te menge velinsuǥuen din, netuenan tew he is minsan hentei he nekesupak kayi, midsilutan te Megbevayà sumalà is supak din.
58002003	Ne iring din ded daan, sikitew is menusiyà, kenè kiw zaan ebpekelikey te silut te Megbevayà emun ebey-anan tew, ne kenè tew edtumanen is impenurù kenitew mehitenged te mekeǥeǥehem he kedlibriya zin kenitew te silut. Is nehuna he nekepenudtul kayi, ne iyan en is Nengazen tew he si Jesus. Ne is menge etew he nemekezineg kandin, edtistiǥusan dan dini te kenitew he tutuu heini.
58002004	Ne is Megbevayà, midtistiǥusan din daan haazà is impenurù dan su mibeǥayan din sikandan te ǥehem wey zan ikepaahà is menge singyal, wey menge egkein-inuwan he kenà ed-iring-iring. Ne zuen daan menge ketau he imbeǥey zin diyà te menge tumutuu pinaaǥi te ked-ulini kandan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin sumalà is egkesuatan din he ebeǥayan.
58002005	Ne ibpesavut ku keniyu is kelibutan keuzemà he id-ilis te Megbevayà kayi te kelibutan tew ǥuntaan. Ne wazà pilia te Megbevayà is menge velinsuǥuen din he ebayàbayà dutun keuzemà he kelibutan,
58002006	kekenà, iyan mibpilì din is menge etew. Su zuen insurat he lalag he egkeehè ta kayi te menge surat dengan he edhenduen te, Sikew, Megbevayà, maan is kenè nu egkelipatan is menusiyà? Etew zà duen, ne maan is ebpurungan nu?
58002007	Midhimu nu he lavew kandin is menge velinsuǥuen nu, iyan, taman te mevavè dà he timpu su migkaǥi nu he zuen timpu keuzemà he kinahanglan he edtulusen wey edtehuzen is menusiyà.
58002008	Ne migkaǥi nu zaan he kinahanglan he keuzemà edhimuwen nu he mekevayàbayà sikandin te minsan hengkey. Iyan haazà insurat dengan. Ne ǥeina te migkaǥi zutun he edhimuwen te Megbevayà is menusiyà he ebayàbayà te minsan hengkey, egkesavut ta zutun he zuen timpu keuzemà he wazà minsan hengkey he linimbag he kenà egkeveyveyaan te menusiyà. Ne ǥuntaan netuenan ta he kenè pa ebpekevayàbayà is menusiyà te iring dutun.
58002009	Ne minsan pa zutun, mibpeetew si Jesus ne pinaaǥi kayi midhimu he lavew kandin is menge velinsuǥuen taman te mevavè dà he timpu su wey tenged te zekelà he ǥaǥew te Megbevayà, mebpehimatey sikandin he elili te tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne tenged kayi te kebpehimatey zin, ne nehimu en sikandin guntaan he utew telehuzen wey utew belentuǥen ne imbeǥey kandin te Megbevayà is kebayàbayà te minsan hengkey.
58002010	Is Megbevayà he nenlimbag te langun su wey mehimu is langun he igkezeliǥi kandin, ne utew hustu is kedtuǥuta zin he mekeantus si Jesus te merasey su pinaaǥi kayi impeehè din he wazà igkesawey ziyà te ki Jesus, ne egkehimu he mezakel kiw is edhimuwen din he menge anak te Megbevayà su wey kiw metulus iring te kedtulusa kandin. Nehimu si Jesus he ibayà wey kiw melibri te silut.
58002011	Si Jesus, mibpalis din en is menge salè tew. Ne ǥuntaan sikitew is nepelisan te salà wey sikandin is mibpalis te salà, sebsevaha zà is Amey tew he iyan is Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi kenè kiw igkeeled ni Jesus, kekenà, egngezanan kiw zin te menge hazi zin.
58002012	Su zuen insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Sikew is Megbevayà, edtudtulan ku is menge hazi ku mehitenged kenikew. Egkentahan ku is kedalig ku kenikew ziyà te etuvangan te langun he ed-azap kenikew.
58002013	Ne ǥeina te menusiyà daan sikandin migkaǥi sikandin te, Edseriǥan ku is Megbevayà. Ne ke sikandin daan te, Heini e zed he edumahan te menge zuma ku he menge anak te Megbevayà he insarig din kedì.
58002014	Ne sikitew is menge anak te Megbevayà, menge etew kiw zà duen he zuen din kemetayen. Ne tenged kayi mibpeetew zaan si Jesus wey mehimu sikandin he iring tew. Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey mehimu he ebpehimatey sikandin ne wey pinaaǥi te kebpatey zin mezaag din si Setanas he iyan mibayàbayà te kemetayen,
58002015	ne wey pinaaǥi kayi metevangi kiw zin ne libriya kiw zin te kemetayen. Su zengan te wazè kiw pa libriya, kenà egkeawà dini te kenitew is kegkehandek te kemetayen ne iring te menge uripen kiw zutun te kegkehandek.
58002016	Ne kenà iyan is menge velinsuǥuen din midtevangan din, kekenà, iyan kiw zin midtevangan is menge kevuwazan ni Abraham.
58002017	Umba kinahanglan he ebpeetew sikandin su wey mehimu sikandin he iring kenitew te menge suled din te minsan hengkey he paaǥi. Ne mid-ulaula zin heini su wey mehimu sikandin diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà he iring te lavew he memumuhat tew he utew hihizuwen wey metinumanen su wey zin mepalis is menge salè tew.
58002018	Ne egkehimu en he egketevangan din is ebpenulayen ni Setanas su neseǥazan din en is kemereǥenan tenged te kebpenulaya kandin.
58003001	Ne tenged kayi, menge suled ku te kedtuu, mid-umbita kew zaan te Megbevayà wey kew mekeubpà keuzemà diyà te langit. Purungi niw isipa si Jesus. Iyan sikandin kes midsuǥù te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan wey sikandin mehimu he lavew he memumuhat he edtavang kenitew kayi te kebpesakup tew te Megbevayà.
58003002	Su si Jesus, ne mibpurung medtuman te langun he ebpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà, iring te si Moises, nepurungan din daan te edtuman is langun he mibpeveelan kandin dutun te kebeyveyai zin te valey te Megbevayà, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, menge etew he sakup te Megbevayà .
58003003	Iyan, si Jesus, ed-isipen sikandin te Megbevayà he utew pa lavew kenà si Moises, iring te lavew is ebevaley kenà te valey.
58003004	Netuenan ta he ke zuen baley ne zuen daan mibaal zutun te valey, ne is mibaal te minsan hengkey ne iyan is Megbevayà.
58003005	Ne si Moises, suluǥuen sikandin he metinumanen is kebayàbayè din te valey te Megbevayà ne nehimu is menge vaal zin he alung te ibpaahà te Megbevayà te egkeuǥet pa zutun he timpu egketuman.
58003006	Ne si Jesus mulà, Anak sikandin te Megbevayà he metinumanen is kebayàbayè din te valey. Ne iyan kiw valey zin emun edhemenan tew is kedsundan tew kandin wey is melipayen he kedteǥazi tew te langun he impenaad kenitew ni Kristu.
58003007	Su zuen insurat he lalag te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he edhenduen te, Guntaan emun egkezineg niw is lalag keniyu te Megbevayà,
58003008	kinahanglan he kenà mezesen is gehinawa niw iring te ǥehinawa niw zengan hein midsukulan niw is Megbevayà dutun te timpu he migezaman niw is ked-antus din keniyu zutun te tanà he wazà meubpai te etew.
58003009	Su migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Minsan pa te seled te kepatan he tuig nengeehè dan is menge egkein-inuwan he mibeelan ku, ne migezaman dan pa ke hendei taman is kebpelevaya ku te menge mezaat he ulaula zan.
58003010	Umba, utew a zutun nepauk kandan, ne ke siak te, Layun egkesayep is ed-isipen dan ne kenè dan egkesuat he edtuman te menge suǥù ku.
58003011	Ne utew a nepauk ne migkaǥi ku he utew tutuu he kenè dan en ebpekeseled dutun te inteǥana ku he inged wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey.
58003012	Umba, menge suled, susiya niw is gehinawa niw. Kinahanglan he wazà minsan sevaha keniyu he mezaat is ed-isipen din nè wazè din kedtuu, su pinaaǥi kayi egkeengkezan din is wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà.
58003013	Ne ǥuntaan te kemulu pa egkehimu he egkekuwa is keluwasan he imbeǥey kenitew te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he ebpesemsembaǥè kiw su wey kiw kenà melimbungi pinaaǥi te salà he iyan is kenà kedtuu ne wey kenà mebmezesen is gehinawa tew.
58003014	Su sikitew, emun edhemenan tew is daan he kedsarig tew ki Kristu, duen tew pudu upakat kandin.
58003015	Su iring te Lalag te Megbevayà he insurat ku en he edhenduen te, Guntaan, emun egkezineg niw is lalag keniyu te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he kenà mezesen is gehinawa niw iring te ǥehinawa niw zengan hein midsukulan niw is Megbevayà.
58003016	Ne hentei heini is menge etew he minsan nezineg dan is Lalag te Megbevayà midsukulan dan gihapun sikandin? Iyan sikandan sikan is menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil he mid-uwit ni Moises puun diyà te tanà he Ihiptu.
58003017	Ne hentei is menge etew he nepeukan dengan te Megbevayà seled te kepatan he tuig? Iyan ded heini is menge zuma te kevuwazan ni Israyil he mibaal te salà diyà te Megbevayà ne tenged kayi midsilutan din sikandan ne minatey sikandan dutun te tanà he wazà meubpai te etew.
58003018	Iyan ded sikandan kes menge etew he mehitenged kandan migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Kenè dan ebpekeseled dutun te midteǥana ku he inged wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey. Umba migkaǥi zin heini su wazè dan mebpemineg te lalag din.
58003019	Ne netuenan tew he wazè dan mekeseled dutun su wazè dan tuuwi is Lalag te Megbevayà.
58004001	Ne minsan pa zutun, wazà iawà te Megbevayà is daan he penaad din he zuen menge etew he ebpekeseled dutun te inged din wey zan mekehimeley zuma kandin. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he ebpekeandam kiw su wey wazà minsan sevaha kenitew he kenà edtuǥutan te Megbevayà he mekeseled dutun.
58004002	Su sikitew, nezineg tew zaan is kebpenudtula te Meupiya he Tudtulanen iring te menge ǥin-epuan tew zengan. Iyan, minsan te nezineg dan is impesavut kandan te Megbevayà, wazà pulus kayi ziyà te kandan su zutun te kegkezineǥa zan kayi, wazè dan tuuwi.
58004003	Ne sikitew mulà is nemeketuu, idtuǥut kenitew is kedseled dutun wey kiw mekehimeley zuma te Megbevayà. Iyan, wazà ituǥut te kenà edtuu su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ne utew a nepauk ne migkaǥi ku he utew tutuu he kenè dan en ebpekeseled dutun te inteǥana ku he inged wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey! Wazà iyan ikeǥiya zin kayi is wazè pa meteǥana haazà is kedhimeley su zaan en he nepasad din en heini puun pa te kedlimbaǥa zin te minsan hengkey.
58004004	Su zuen insurat he lalag mehitenged te ikepitu he andew he edhenduen te, Midhimeley is Megbevayà dutun te ikepitu he andew su netapus din en is langun he ebeelan din.
58004005	Ne migkaǥi en maan is Megbevayà mehitenged kayi te kedhimeley te, Kenè dan en ebpekeseled wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey.
58004006	Tenged kayi, netuenan ta he haazà is menge etew zengan he nehuna he nemekezineg te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged kayi te kedhimeley, wazà sikandan mehimuwa te Megbevayà he mekeseled dan wey zan mekehimeley tenged te wazè dan kebpemineg. Iyan, netuenan tew zaan he zuen menge zuma pa he ebmehimuwen mulà te Megbevayà he mekeseled sikandan wey zan mekehimeley zuma kandin.
58004007	Umba egketuenan ta heini su zuen pa andew he midtelaan te Megbevayà he zutun ebpekeseled is menge etew zutun te kedhimeley he midteǥana zin. Su neuǥet pa zutun te timpu te menge tipehuna he etew he wazà medtuu, impinted te Megbevayà is lalag din diyà te ki Hadì David. Ne ke si David te, Guntaan, emun egkezineg niw is lalag keniyu te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he kenà mezesen is gehinawa niw.
58004008	Haazà is menge tipehuna he etew, angin ke mid-uwit sikandan ni Josue ne impeseled din sikandan dengan dutun te hustu en he kedhimeley he midteǥana te Megbevayà su kenè en kinahanglan he ibpesavut pa maan te Megbevayà is duma pa he andew he zutun ibpeseled pa maan is menge etew.
58004009	Ne tenged kayi, sikitew is menge sakup te Megbevayà guntaan, nesavut tew en he egkehimu kiw he ebpekeseled wey kiw mekehimeley zuma te Megbevayà iring te midhimeley is Megbevayà dutun te ikepitu he andew.
58004010	Ne is minsan hentei he ibpehimeley te Megbevayà, ed-engkezan din en is kandin he vaal iring te midhimeley is Megbevayà dutun te kegkepesaza zin te vaal zin te kedlimbag.
58004011	Umba, sikitew zaan, ebeelan tew is taman te egkehimu tew wey kiw zaan mekeseled dutun te edhimelayan he midteǥana te Megbevayà. Kenè tew ed-iringan haazà is menge etew zengan he wazà mebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà su wey wazà minsan sevaha kenitew he kenà ebmehimuwen he mekeseled dutun te edhimelayan.
58004012	Uuyag is Lalag te Megbevayà ne zekelà is gehem din. Iring te sundang he zezuwa is gerangan din he utew meǥarang, iyan, meǥarang pa is Lalag te Megbevayà kenà haazà is sundang su edlembasan din minsan is isip ta, gehinawa ta, wey tuyù ta ne igkepetuenan din kenita ke hengkey is ked-isipa kenita te Megbevayà.
58004013	Is Megbevayà, kenà sikandin egkeelesan te minsan hengkey. Egkeehè din layun is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan ta. Ne ke minsan hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ta, iyan sikandin edsusi.
58004014	Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, edhemenan tew is kedtuu he impenurù kenitew. Su zuen utew lavew he memumuhat he iyan datù tew he nekid-etuvang en te Megbevayà. Iyan heini si Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà.
58004015	Ne heini si Jesus is lavew he memumuhat tew, nesavut din is keǥuyè tew tenged te kememenusiyai tew su neseǥazan din he mibpenulayan sikandin dengan ni Setanas te minsan hengkey he paaǥi iring te ebpenulayan kiw zaan, iyan, wazà mulà sikandin mepenulayi.
58004016	Ne tenged kandin, wazà igkelenew te isip tew te ked-uvey zutun te etuvangan te mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà pinaaǥi te ked-ampù su utew veliǥeǥawen is Megbevayà. Ingkehizu kiw zin ne edtevangan kiw zin dutun te timpu te menge kemereǥenan.
58005001	Su ke zuen etew he ebpilien he lavew he memumuhat, idsarig kandin is ked-etuvang te Megbevayà ne iyan sikandin datù te menge etew. Ne idsarig daan kandin is menge ibeǥey ziyà te Megbevayà wey is kebpemuhat wey mepelisi is menge etew te menge mezaat he ulaula.
58005002	Ne tenged te etew zà duen sikandin he layun egkesayep, egkehimu he mepelevayen sikandin te menge zuma zin he etew he egkengesayep daan tenged te kenè dan ebpekesavut.
58005003	Ne tenged te zuen daan kandin he menge sayep, kinahanglan he zuen ibpemuhat din tenged te kandin he menge mezaat he ulaula iring te zuen daan ibpemuhat din tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula te menge zuma zin he etew.
58005004	Utew telehuzen is lavew he memumuhat, iyan, wazà minsan hentei he ebpekehimu he ebpilì te keugelingen din wey mehimu sikandin he lavew he memumuhat su iyan ebpilì kandin is Megbevayà iring te mibpilì din dengan si Arun.
58005005	Ne iring din ded daan wazà iyan si Kristu mebpilì te keugelingen din wey mehimu sikandin he mekeǥeǥehem he lavew he memumuhat tew, kekenà, iyan is Megbevayà su migkaǥi kandin is Megbevayà te, Iyan ka Anak ku. Ne egkeǥiyen ku he ǥuntaan ibpeehè ku he Amey a kenikew.
58005006	Ne zuen pa insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Iring ka ki Milkisidik he memumuhat dengan, su wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat nu.
58005007	Ne hein kemulu pa si Jesus dini te kelibutan, ne mibpeniǥis is luhè din ne nekelelendag sikandin tenged te utew meheǥet is kebuyù din wey ked-ampù din diyà te Megbevayà he iyan ebpekelibri kandin te kemetayen.
