Ne tenged te zekelà is kedtahud din wey kedtumana zin te menge suǥù te Megbevayà, midineg is ked-ampù din te Megbevayà.
58005008	Su minsan pa te Anak sikandin te Megbevayà, ingkepenurù gihapun kandin is kebpeketuman te suǥù te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te menge kemereǥenan he nengeeǥiyan din.
58005009	Ne hein nepasad din en is langun he impetuman kandin te Megbevayà, nehimu sikandin he Menluluwas te langun he ebpemineg kandin su wey meveǥayi sikandan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
58005010	Ne zutun, is Megbevayà, midlilaan din sikandin he lavew he memumuhat iring te memumuhat dengan he si Milkisidik.
58005011	Dekelè pa is ibpesavut ku pezem keniyu mehitenged te kegkememumuhat ni Milkisidik wey ni Jesus, iyan, mereǥen he edseysayen su kenè niw en egkesavut. Henduen be te kenè en ed-uteng diyà te isip niw.
58005012	Neuǥet en is kebpeketuu niw ki Jesus, ne engayan kew en pezem he menge menunudlù, iyan, kenà egkehimu su kinahanglan he ebpekepepenurù kew pa ebpekepeuman wey niw mesavut is menge melemu zà he tuluuwen he ebpuun te Lalag te Megbevayà. Henduen te kemulu kew pa edsusu su kenè niw pa egkelutang te egkaan is mezesen he egkeenen, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is menge mezalem he ebpuun te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà .
58005013	Emun deisek ki pa he vatà ne iyan dà egkezawat ta is gatas, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenè te pa egketuenan is penurù mehitenged te metazeng he ulaula.
58005014	Ne emun meǥurang ki en ne egkesepè te en is mehunit he egkeenen, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mezalem en is igkepenurù kenita ne metau ki en he ed-isip-isip, ne egketuusan te en ke hengkey is meupiya wey ke hengkey is mezaat he ibayà.
58006001	Ne tenged dutun, menge suled, netengkaan en is ked-istudyuwi tew zuen te menge nehuna he melemu he tuluuwen he impenurù kenitew mehitenged ki Kristu. Kinahanglan he edlaus kiw en dutun te ked-istudyu te menge penurù he zait te menge etew he mezesen en is kedtuu zan. Kenè tew ed-ul-ulitan te ed-istudyu is menge nehuna he impenurù kenitew iring te ked-engkezi te kedsarig te menge ulaula he wazà pulus, wey is kedtuu te Megbevayà.
58006002	Kenè tew ed-ul-ulitan is ked-istudyu te kebpemewtismu, wey is kedewata te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, is kegkevenhawa kenita keuzemà, wey is kedsusiya te Megbevayà keuzemà te tivuuk he menusiyà,
58006003	kekenà, emun idtuǥut te Megbevayà, edlaus kiw en te ked-istudyu te menge penurù he zait te menge etew he mezesen en is kedtuu zan.
58006004	Su penenglitan duen menge etew he neteyawan te Megbevayà is isip dan. Nesavut dan en ke hengkey is ibeǥey kenitew ziyà te langit, ne nekeambit dan en te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne netuenan dan en is meupiya he impesavut te Megbevayà, ne neehè dan daan is egkehimu te ǥehem he ibpaahà te Megbevayà keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu. Ne emun ed-iniyuǥan dan heini kenè en egkehimu he ibpelikù dan ibpeuman wey zan meiniyuǥi is mezaat he menge ulaula zan. Henduen be te in-uman dan iransang diyà te krus is Anak te Megbevayà ne edhimuwen dan he sumpelita sikandin te menge etew.
58006007	Su sikitew is menusiyà, ne iring kiw te tanà. Ne is tanà he layun ed-uzani ne memelambeg is menge pinemula zuen, ne zekelà is pulus kayi ziyà te teǥitanà. Ne is etew he iring dutun te tanà, edtuvazan sikandin te Megbevayà.
58006008	Iyan, ke zuen tanà he iyan dà ebpeketuvù duen is menge zuǥiyen he sagbet wey menge hilemunen, ne wazè din pulus, ne ed-engkezan, ne ebinsulan te teǥitanà. Ne iring din ded daan is etew he iring kayi te tanà su edsilutan te Megbevayà.
58006009	Na, menge minahal ku he menge suled, minsan pa te iring kayi is menge lalag ku keniyu, netuenan ku he meupiya pa mulà is egkezungguan niw su netuenan ku he zekelà is pulus te kedlibriya keniyu te Megbevayà.
58006010	Su kenà egkehimu he kenà metazeng is kedsusiya keniyu te Megbevayà; su kenà egkehimu he egkelipatan din is langun he meupiya he mid-ulaula niw tenged te mahal sikandin diyà te ǥehinawa niw su midtevangan niw is menge zuma tew he tumutuu ne minsan guntaan wazè niw engkezi is kedtevangi niw kandan.
58006011	Ne is kada sevaha keniyu, egkesuatan dey he kenè niw zaan engkezi is kedhaǥù niw taman te kedlikù ni Jesus dutun te ketepusan he timpu keuzemà su wey zutun metuman diyan te keniyu is langun he meupiya he ebpeebuten tew.
58006012	Kinahanglan he kenè kew mebpetetapul, kekenà, iringi niw is menge etew he meinentusen he edtuu te Megbevayà su tenged kayi egkezawat dan is impenaad te Megbevayà.
58006013	Isipa niw si Abraham. Dutun te kebpenaazi kandin te Megbevayà, is Megbevayà, ne wazà duma he ngazan he neǥamit din te kedlig-eni zin te penaad din, kekenà, migamit din is kandin he keugelingen he ngazan su wazà lavew kandin.
58006014	Ne pinaaǥi te kandin he ngazan migkaǥi sikandin diyà te ki Abraham te, Kenè en ebperis he edtuvazan ku sikew te meupiya ne ebmezakel utew is menge kevuwazan nu.
58006015	Ne si Abraham, utew sikandin meinentusen he edsarig te Megbevayà taman te netuman te Megbevayà is penaad din kandin.
58006016	Ne emun duen penaad te etew zà duen, iyan idlig-en din te penaad din is: duen lavew kandin he ibpepirma zin zutun te penaad din. Ne emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan din dutun te husayen, ebpeketuu te lalag din is ebpemineg dutun te penaad din.
58006017	Ne egkesuatan dengan te Megbevayà he mesavut te menge etew he mibpenaazan din he kenà duwazuwa he edtumanen din is penaad din kandan, ne tenged kayi midlig-enan din is penaad din.
58006018	Ne zuen dezuwa he ulaula te Megbevayà he kenà egkehalin te minsan hentei. Is sevaha, ne iyan is penaad din, ne is sevaha, ne iyan is kedlig-eni zin te penaad din. Ne pinaaǥi kayi te zezuwa egkesavut ta he kenà egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is penaad din. Ne tenged kayi, sikitew is nemekeaput diyà te kandin, utew meheǥet is kedsarig tew kandin ne tenged kayi edhemenan tew is kebpeebuta tew te langun he meupiya he impenaad din kenitew.
58006019	Ne utew mezesen wey nelig-enan heini is kebpeebuta tew he edtumanen te Megbevayà is penaad din su iyan edseriǥan tew is Megbevayà. Ne si Jesus, ne nehimu en sikandin he zatù tew ne ziyè en sikandin te etuvangan te Megbevayà. Ne nehimu en si Jesus he lavew he memumuhat tew he wazè din pidtemanan he iring te memumuhat dengan he si Milkisidik.
58007001	Su heini si Milkisidik, ne hadì sikandin dengan te inged he Selim, wey memumuhat sikandin he ed-azap te lavew he Megbevayà. Ne zuen timpu zutun he si Abraham, mibpekidtebek te menge hadì he kuntada zin ne mibpenhimetayan din. Ne zutun te ked-ulì ni Abraham, midsinuǥung sikandin ni Milkisidik, ne migkaǥi ni Milkisidik pinaaǥi te kebpenuvadtuvad he edtuvazan si Abraham te Megbevayà te meupiya he tuvad.
58007002	Ne si Abraham, imbeǥey zin diyà te ki Milkisidik is ikesepulù he vahin te langun he nengetavan din. Ne heini is ngazan he Milkisidik, dezuwa is kehuluǥan din. Is egkehuna ne hadì he ebpekeveǥey te ketazeng. Ne tenged te hadì sikandin te inged he Selim, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kelinew, elin daan kehuluǥan din is hadì he ebpekeveǥey te kelinew.
58007003	Ne kenà duen dà taman su wazà guǥud ke hentei is amey zin wey iney zin wey menge kepuun din, ne wazà daan guǥuza is kegkeetew zin wey is keaǥi te kemetayen din. Umba heini si Milkisidik, ebpekeiring sikandin te Anak te Megbevayà su iring te wazè din puunà, ne wazè din ketepusan, ne wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat din.
58007004	Isipa niw he utew lavew si Milkisidik su is kepuun tew he si Abraham, imbeǥey zin kandin is ikesepulù he vahin te netavan din dutun te kebpekezaag din te menge hadì.
58007005	Ne is menge memumuhat te menge Hudiyu he menge kevuwazan ni Levi, ne menge kevuwazan daan sikandan ni Abraham. Ne insuǥù kandan te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises he kuwaa zan is ikesepulù he vahin te langun he ketiǥeyunan te menge zuma zan he Hudiyu minsan pa te menge kevuwazan daan heini ni Abraham.
58007006	Iyan, si Milkisidik, kenà mulà sikandin kevuwazan ni Levi ne minsan pa zutun midawat din is ikesepulù he imbeǥey kandin ni Abraham ne zutun, si Abraham, is mibpenaazan te Megbevayà, mibpenubtuvazan ni Milkisidik.
58007007	Ne netuenan te minsan hentei he is etew he ebpenubtuvazan din is sengeeetew en, ne lavew sikandin kenà haazà is etew he ebpenubtuvazan din.
58007008	Ne is menge memumuhat he kevuwazan ni Levi, ne edewaten dan is ikesepulù ne ebpatey zan gihapun, iyan, si Milkisidik he mibeǥayan dengan ni Abraham te ikesepulù, sumalà is kedsevuta ta zutun te Lalag te Megbevayà, iring te kemulu pa sikandin uuyag.
58007009	Ne si Levi, iyan kepuun te langun he menge memumuhat te menge Hudiyu, ne egkesavut ta zaan he zutun te kebeǥaya ni Abraham te ikesepulù diyà te ki Milkisidik, nekeveǥey zaan si Levi ziyà te ki Milkisidik.
58007010	Su zutun te kebpeked-uma ni Abraham wey si Milkisidik wazè pa zutun ianak si Levi, kekenà, diyè pa sikandin te lawa ni Abraham he apù din.
58007011	Ne netuenan ta he zutun te kebeǥaya te Megbevayà te kesuǥuan diyà te menge Hudiyu, midtendek din is menge memumuhat he iyan is menge kevuwazan ni Levi he iyan ed-uwit te kesuǥuan. Ne emun egkehimu he ebmetazeng is menusiyà pinaaǥi te kandan he menge vaal, wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa maan memumuhat he iring ki Milkisidik. Iyan, duen en mibpilì te Megbevayà he selakew en he memumuhat. Ne heini, ne kenà iring ki Arun he kevuwazan ni Levi, kekenà, iring sikandin ki Milkisidik.
58007012	Ne emun ed-ilisan is menge memumuhat, kinahanglan he ed-ilisan daan is kesuǥuan he mibenteyanan dan.
58007013	Ne is Nengazen tew he si Jesus he iyan memumuhat he nekeilis te zaan he menge memumuhat, kenà sikandin kevuwazan ni Levi su kevuwazan ni Huda. Ne te langun he menge kevuwazan ni Huda, iyan dà sikandin nehimu he memumuhat. Ne wazà ipesavut ni Moises dengan he zuen kevuwazan ni Huda he egkehimu he memumuhat.
58007015	Ne keladu en utew he emun mid-ilisan en is menge memumuhat he kevuwazan ni Levi ne mid-ilisan daan is kesuǥuan su zuen selakew en he memumuhat he iring ki Milkisidik.
58007016	Ne wazà heini is beǥu himuwa he kelibutanen he memumuhat pinaaǥi te menge kelibutanen he kesuǥuan, kekenà, midhimu sikandin he memumuhat tenged te mekeǥeǥehem sikandin su wazè din kemetayen.
58007017	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he zutun migkeǥiyan sikandin te Megbevayà te, Memumuhat ka he wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat nu iring te kegkememumuhat ni Milkisidik.
58007018	Ibpesavut kenitew kayi he is daan he kesuǥuan, in-awè en te Megbevayà su wazè din pulus ne kenà ebpeketavang kenitew te menusiyà,
58007019	su kenà egkehimu he ed-isipen kiw he metazeng pinaaǥi te kedtumana kayi. Ne tenged kayi, imbeǥey en kenitew te Megbevayà is meupiya pa he egkeseriǥan he paaǥi. Ne pinaaǥi kayi, egkehimu he pinaaǥi te ked-azap tew ebpekeetuvang kiw en te Megbevayà.
58007020	Ne kenà duen dà taman su utew zeyzey heini is beǥu he paaǥi su zutun te kedhimuwa te Megbevayà ki Jesus he memumuhat, mibpenaazan sikandin te Megbevayà. Iyan, hein nehimu zengan he memumuhat is menge kevuwazan ni Levi, wazà sikandan penaazi te Megbevayà.
58007021	Iyan, si Jesus mulà, mibpenaazan te Megbevayà su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Siak is Megbevayà, impenaad ku he egkehimu ka he memumuhat ne wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat nu, ne kenè en heini ebperis.
58007022	Ne tenged kayi te penaad te Megbevayà, pinaaǥi ki Jesus egkesiguru tew he utew pa meupiya heini is beǥu he paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà te kedlibriya zin kenitew kenà is daan.
58007023	Ne kenà duen dà taman su haazà is menge memumuhat dengan he menge kevuwazan ni Levi, kinahanglan he utew zan mezakel su emun ebpatey is duma kandan, kinahanglan he ed-ilisan dutun te zuma.
58007024	Iyan, si Jesus, wazà pidtemanan mulà te kandin he untung ne kenà sikandin egkeilisan he memumuhat.
58007025	Ne tenged kayi, egkehimu te minsan keenu he timpu he edlibriyen din te silut is minsan hentei he menge etew emun pinaaǥi kandin ed-aput sikandan diyà te Megbevayà su wazà pidtemanan te untung din, ne layun din egkehimu te edtavang sikandan diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.
58007026	Iyan si Jesus lavew he memumuhat he egkinehenglanen tew su wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula zin, wazè din salà, ne wazè din sayep. Ne kenà sikandin iring te menge mekesesalà he menusiyà, ne midhimu sikandin te Megbevayà he lavew te minsan hentei ziyà te langit.
58007027	Kenà sikandin iring te menge zaan he lavew he memumuhat su wazà kinahanglan he ebpemuhat sikandin andew-andew iring kandan. Su andew-andew ebpemuhat dan. Edhuna zan ebpemuhat tenged te kandan he keugelingen he salà, ne human dan ebpemuhat tenged te menge salà te menge etew. Iyan, si Jesus mulà, kesevaha zà is kandin he kebpemuhat ne wazè din en umani. Midhimu zin heini zutun te kebpehimatey zin diyà te krus.
58007028	Haazà is nengehimu he menge lavew he memumuhat pinaaǥi te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne layun duen igkesewayi kandan. Iyan, neuǥet pa zutun nehimu is Anak te Megbevayà he memumuhat tenged te kebpilia kandin te Megbevayà wey tenged te penaad te Megbevayà he nekeilis te zaan he kesuǥuan. Ne heini si Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà he wazà igkesewayi kandin, nehimu en sikandin he memumuhat he wazà pidtemanan is kegkememumuhat din.
58008001	Ne iyan kehuluǥan te langun he impesavut ku en keniyu is: duen tew en lavew he memumuhat he iring kayi ne iyan si Jesus. Impepinuu en sikandin diyà te utew lavew he pinuuwà su ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan te mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà diyà te langit.
58008002	Edtumanen din is kegkememumuhat din diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà, diyà te tutuu he valey he ed-ezapan he wazà beeli te etew, kekenà, mibeelan te Megbevayà su ziyà te langit.
58008003	Is lavew he memumuhat dini te kelibutan, insuǥù kandin is kebpemuhata te menge ibpelengesa wey is kebeǥaya te menge halad diyà te Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan kinahanglan he zuen daan ibpemuhat te kenitew he lavew he memumuhat.
58008004	Iyan, dutun te kemulu pa sikandin dini te kelibutan, kenà egkehimu he memumuhat sikandin su puun pa te zengan dà taman guntaan duen menge memumuhat he ebpemuhat sumalà is insuǥù kandan dutun te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.
58008005	Alung dà is kandan he vaal su ed-iringan dan dà haazà is tutuu he ebpeiringan kandan he ziyà te langit. Netuenan ta heini su zutun te kebeeli ni Moises te simbahan he terapal he iyan dengan baley te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan, migkeǥiyan sikandin te Megbevayà te, Purungi nu te ed-iring is simbahan diyà te langit he impeehè ku kenikew ziyà te vuntud.
58008006	Ne is baal ni Jesus te memumuhat, ne lavew pa utew he meupiya, kenà is baal te menge memumuhat dini te kelibutan. Ne iring din ded daan, meupiya pa utew is beǥu he paaǥi he ed-ikulen din wey kiw mezawat te Megbevayà, kenà is daan he paaǥi. Su heini is beǥu, ne neviǥeran te tuwas pa he meupiya he penaad te Megbevayà.
58008007	Haazà is nehuna he paaǥi, ne kenà ebpeketavang kenitew. Su ke neketavang haazà is nehuna kenè en kinahanglan he ed-ilisan pa maan te veǥu.
58008008	Iyan, wazà mesuat is Megbevayà te menge ulaula te menge etew he nekesundan duen te nehuna he paaǥi su zuen insurat he Lalag te Nengazen he edhenduen te, Duen timpu keuzemà he zutun edhimuwen ku is beǥu en he paaǥi wey ku mezawat is langun he menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil.
58008009	Ne heini is beǥu he paaǥi, ne kenà iring te nehuna he paaǥi he imbeǥey ku ziyà te menge lukes dan dengan te ked-eǥaka ku kandan dutun te kebpeewaa ku kandan dutun te tanà he Ihiptu. Wazè dan tumana is menge suǥù ku zutun te nehuna he paaǥi ne tenged kayi mid-iniyuǥan ku sikandan, ke sikandin.
58008010	Ne mid-uman megkaǥi is Nengazen te, Is beǥu he paaǥi he edtukuzen ku wey ku mezawat is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, ne iyan heini: is menge suǥù ku, ne idsurat ku ziyà te ǥehinawa zan wey ziyà te isip dan ne egkesuatan dan human te edtuman heini. Ne human a egkehimu he Megbevayà dan ne egkehimu sikandan he menge ǥaked ku.
58008011	Ne tenged kayi, dutun he timpu keuzemà kenè en kinahanglan te minsan hentei he ebpepenurù te zuma zin mehitenged kedì, ne kenè en daan kinahanglan dutun he zuen pa maan etew he edseysey ziyà te zuma zin ke hentei a is Megbevayà su zutun egketuenan te minsan hentei, lavew se kenà lavew, ke hentei a.
58008012	Ne egkehizuwan ku sikandan, ne ebpeseyluwen ku sikandan te mezaat he mid-ulaula zan, ne edlipatan ku en is menge salè dan, ke sikandin.
58008013	Ne ǥeina te migkaǥi te Megbevayà he zuen beǥu en he paaǥi, egkesavut tew he kenè en ebpulus haazà is daan. Ne ke zuen minsan hengkey he zaan en he kenè en egkeǥamit ne ed-engkezan en su ed-ilisan te veǥu.
58009001	Ne zutun te nehuna he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha te Megbevayà te menusiyà, impenurù te Megbevayà is paaǥi te ked-ezapa zan kandin wey ke ebmenmenuwen is kebeeli te simbahan dini te kelibutan.
58009002	Impehitindeg dan is simbahan he valey he terapal ne zezuwa is ruǥu zutun. Is sevaha, ne iyan kes egngezanan te mahal he ruǥu. Ne zutun dan isavuk is sulù, wey is lemisahan he zutun isavuk is supas he ibpemuhat diyà te Megbevayà.
58009003	Duen kurtina zutun te idselang te valey he terapal ne zuen daan kurtina he intaltal zutun te mid-elangan te zezuwa he ruǥu. Ne heini is ikezuwa he ruǥu ne iyan kes egngezanan te utew mahal he ruǥu.
58009004	Ne is seled kayi, insavuk dan dutun kes pemuhatà he vulawan he zutun edtutunga is beyewà. Ne zutun daan isavuk kes kavan he mid-epizan te vulawan. Tuus heini is kavan te zaan he paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà. Diyà te seled dutun te kavan ne egkeahà is bulawan he umuy he zutun itaǥù kes keuyaǥan he mana. Ne zutun daan te seled te kavan egkeahà kes tuked ni Arun he mibpeneringsing wey kes dezuwa he melumpipi he vatu he zutun isurat te Megbevayà kes kesuǥuan.
58009005	Ne insihung haazà is kavan dutun te zezuwa he ledawan te menge mekeǥeǥehem he kedesenan he iyan tuus he zutun is Megbevayà. Mibekar zan is pakpak dan ne intezung dan dutun te vulawan he vangkù he zutun ebpelisa te Megbevayà is menge salà te menge etew. Ne kayi zà taman heini su kenè en egkehimu he id-amin ku te edseysey is langun kayi.
58009006	Ne hein naandam dan en is langun kayi ne kada andew edseled is menge memumuhat dutun te nehuna he ruǥu he egngezanan te mahal he ruǥu su edtumanen dan is ebpeveelan kandan.
58009007	Iyan, haazà is sevaha he ruǥu he egngezanan te utew mahal he ruǥu, iyan dà ebpekeseled dutun is lavew he memumuhat. Ne kesevaha zà sikandin edseled dutun te sengetuig. Ne emun ed-ahuk sikandin dutun, kinahanglan he ed-uwiten din is lengesa he ibpemuhat wey mepalis is menge salè din wey is menge salà he wazà tuyua te langun he menge zuma zin he kevuwazan ni Israyil.
58009008	Iyan heini ulaula te menge memumuhat dutun te simbahan, ne pinaaǥi kayi ibpesavut kenitew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he te kemulu pa kinahanglan he egemiten haazà is egkehuna he ruǥu he egngezanan te mahal he ruǥu, kenè pa ebpekeseled is menge etew zà duen dutun te utew mahal he ruǥu.
58009009	Ne alung heini he ibpesavut kenita he is menge ibpemuhat dutun he menge langgam wey is menge halad, kenà heini ebpekeawà te menge salà te menge etew he ed-azap dutun su nesavut dan he pinaaǥi kayi wazè dan pa himuwa he metazeng.
58009010	Su heini he paaǥi te ked-ezapa te Megbevayà, ne pinaaǥi zà te menge suǥù mehitenged te vetasan te kegkaan, ked-inum, kebpenlùlù, wey kedhemesa te lawa he paaǥi he insuǥù te Megbevayà. Menge suǥù heini he edtumanen te menge etew pinaaǥi zà te lawa wey tenged dà te insuǥù ne kenà tenged te iyan diyà te ǥehinawa zan. Ne is pulus kayi te paaǥi, ne taman dà heini kayi te timpu ǥuntaan te ked-ilisi te Megbevayà kayi te veǥu he paaǥi.
58009011	Ne ǥuntaan nekeuma en si Kristu, ne nehimu sikandin he lavew he memumuhat mehitenged kayi te veǥu he paaǥi he meupiya kenà kes daan. Ne midseled sikandin diyà te meupiya pa wey lavew pa he simbahan he wazà beeli te etew zà duen su kenà dini te kelibutan.
58009012	Ne kesevaha zà is kedseled din dutun te utew mahal he ruǥu te simbahan he ziyà te langit ne kenè en ed-uman. Ne wazà sikandin mekeseled dutun tenged te kebpelengesa zin te lengesa te menge ayam dà duen, iring te menge kambing wey menge nati he vaka, kekenà, nekeseled dutun tenged te impelengesa zin is kandin he lengesa. Ne tenged kayi te kebpemuhata te lawa zin, midhimu zin he wazà pidtemanan te kedlibriya zin kenita te silut.
58009013	Dengan, sumalà is impenurù te kesuǥuan, ke zuen etew he mibmeremerik tenged te mid-uvayan din is minatey, kinahanglan he ebpetiǥisan sikandin te lengesa te ibpemuhat he vaka wey kambing, wey igmuk te edtutungen he nati he vaka. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egkepelisan sikandin dutun te kegkeremeriki te lawa zin.
58009014	Ne emun egkehimu he egkelumpiyuwan haazà pinaaǥi zà te lengesa te menge vaka wey kambing, iyan pe be kenà utew pa lavew is egkelumpiyuwan pinaaǥi te lengesa ni Kristu. Su pinaaǥi te tavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he wazè din pidtemanan, impemuhat ni Kristu ziyà te Megbevayà is kandin he lawa; ne wazà igkesewayi kandin. Ne pinaaǥi te kebpelisi kenita te lengesa zin, in-awè din is menge salè ta wey is kebpekesarig ta te menge ulaula he wazè dan pulus. Ne tenged kayi ebpekeazap ki en te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà.
58009015	Ne tenged kayi zaan nehimu en si Kristu he zatù tew su wey zin metukud is beǥu en he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew te Megbevayà. Ne pinaaǥi kayi, is langun he midhimu te Megbevayà he meketuu, egkezawat dan is langun he meupiya he wazè din pidtemanan he impenaad te Megbevayà. Umba egkehimu heini su pinaaǥi te kebpatey ni Kristu nengepalis is langun he menge mezaat he ulaula he nehimu te menge etew zutun te timpu he nengesakup sikandan te nehuna he paaǥi.
58009016	Ne penenglitan, duen etew he mibaal te dukumintu ne migkaǥi zin dutun te dukumintu he emun ebpatey sikandin duen menge azen din he ibpepengevilin din te menge zuma zin. Ne zutun te kebpatey zin kinahanglan he zuen ebpeketistiǥus he tutuu iyan he minatey en haazà is etew, ne human ebpekezawat dutun te menge azen din haazà is migkaǥi zutun te dukumintu.
58009017	Emun kemulu pa uuyag haazà is teǥiazen, ne kenè pa edtumanen haazà is migkaǥi zutun te dukumintu. Iyan, emun ebpatey en, human edtumana haazà.
58009018	Ne iring din ded daan haazà is nehuna he paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà su kinahanglan dutun he zuen lengesa he tuus te edhimetayan he langgam ne human egketuman haazà is paaǥi.
58009019	Ne tenged kayi, hein aney ipenurù ni Moises diyà te langun he menge etew is langun he ibpetuman kandan te Megbevayà dutun te kesuǥuan, migkuwa zin is lengesa te menge nati he vaka he impemuhat, ne mid-emutan din te wahig. Midhames din dutun is bulvul te kerehidu he midtinà te meriǥà wey is subpang te kayu he egngezanan te hisup. Ne mibpirikan din dutun is libru he zutun isurat is kesuǥuan wey mibpirikan din daan is langun he menge etew.
58009020	Ne migkeǥiyan din dutun is menge etew te, Tuus heini is lengesa te paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà wey kiw zin mezawat, ne kinahanglan he ebpurungan tew te edtuman heini su insuǥù te Megbevayà, ke sikandin.
58009021	Ne iring din ded daan mibpirikan ni Moises is simbahan he valey he terapal wey is langun he taǥù dutun he egemiten dan te ked-ezapa zan te Megbevayà.
58009022	Impenurù te kesuǥuan he kinahanglan he ebpelisan te lengesa is hapit minsan hengkey he egemiten dan te ked-azap. Ne iring din ded daan wey zà egkepesaylu is menge salà te menge etew ke zuen ibpelengesa.
58009023	Ne haazà is simbahan te menge Hudiyu zini te kelibutan wey is menge ǥelemiten dan te ked-azap, ne menge alung dà te tutuu he simbahan diyà te langit. Ne egkepelengesahan is kelibutanen he simbahan pinaaǥi te kelibutanen he pemuhat, iyan, haazà is diyà te langit, ne kinahanglan he lavew pa he meupiya is ibpemuhat dutun.
58009024	Dutun te kebpemuhat ni Kristu, wazè sikandin medseled diyà te utew mahal he ruǥu te simbahan he zini te kelibutan su alung dà heini te tutuu he simbahan he ziyà te langit. Iyan midselezan din kes tutuu he simbahan he ziyà te langit ne ǥuntaan iyan sikandin datù tew he edtavang kenitew ziyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.
58009025	Ne is lavew he memumuhat te menge Hudiyu, ne kada tuig edseled sikandin dutun te utew mahal he ruǥu zutun te simbahan dini te kelibutan su ibpemuhat din is lengesa te langgam. Iyan, si Kristu mulà, wazà melelayun is kebpemuhata zin te lawa zin
58009026	su emun iyan haazà egkinehenglanen, puun pa te kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan, ne utew mezakel is kebpekeantus din te kebpehimatey. Iyan, wazà iyan haazà kinehenglana su iyan mid-ulaula zin kayi te timpu he meǥaan en egketapus is kelibutan is: midlepew sikandin wey zin maawà is salè tew pinaaǥi te kebpemuhata zin te keugelingen din he lawa. Ne kesevaha zà is kedhimuwa zin kayi.
58009027	Imbanglis te Megbevayà diyà te menusiyà is kebpatey te kesevaha, ne egkeipus dutun te kebpatey zin ne edsusiyen te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zin.
58009028	Ne si Kristu zaan, kesevaha zà is kebpehimatey zin he iyan kebpemuhata zin te lawa zin wey zin maawà is menge salà te utew mezakel he menge etew. Ne ed-uman pa ebulus si Jesus dini te kelibutan, kenà te ked-ewaa zin te menge salè tew, kekenà, edhimesazen din is kedlibriya zin te langun he utew zekelà is perateng dan kandin.
58010001	Ne egkesavut te en he is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne alung dà; ne is langun he meupiya he egkehimu pinaaǥi ki Kristu, ne iyan hustu he impaalung dutun te kesuǥuan. Su insuǥù dutun te kesuǥuan he kinahanglan kada tuig, ne layun edhimuwa is menge kebpemuhat. Ne tenged kayi egkesavut ta zaan he pinaaǥi kayi te kebpemuhat kenà egkehimu he ebmetazeng is menge etew.
58010002	Su emun pinaaǥi zutun he paaǥi nelumpiyuwan is menge ulaula te menge ed-azap, ne wazè en kinahanglan he ed-uman dan pa ebpemuhat su nengepesaylu en pezem is menge salè dan ne egkesavut dan dutun he kenè en sikandan edsilutan tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula zan.
58010003	Ne ǥeina te kada tuig dutun, kinahanglan gihapun he ed-uman dan ebpemuhat ne netuenan dan he wazè bes maawà is menge salè dan.
58010004	Su kenà egkehimu te minsan hengkey he paaǥi he igkeawà te menge salè tew is lengesa te menge vaka wey menge kambing.
58010005	Ne egketuenan ta heini su zutun te timpu zengan he nekeuma si Kristu zini te kelibutan, migkaǥi sikandin diyà te Amey zin he Megbevayà te, Kena iyan is menge ibpemuhat he ayam egkesuatan nu, kekenà, midlimbag nu is lawa he egkeǥamit ku, ne iyan heini egkesuatan nu he ibpemuhat.
58010006	Su kenè nu iyan egkesuatan is kebpemuhata zan te menge ayam he edtutungen wey is lengesa te menge ayam he ibpemalis te menge salè dan.
58010007	Ne tenged kayi migkaǥi si Kristu ziyà te Megbevayà te, Iyan impengetuvang ku kenikew su edtumanen ku en is egkesuatan nu sumalà is insurat he tagnà mehitenged kedì dutun te insurat he lalag nu,  ke sikandin.
58010008	Midhunaan din te egkaǥi he kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà is menge halad wey menge kebpemuhat he edtutungen wey is lengesa te menge ayam he ibpemalis te salà. Ne migkaǥi zin heini minsan pa te intelaan heini te kesuǥuan.
58010009	Ne mid-umanan din te egkaǥi te, Iyan impengetuvang ku kenikew su edtumanen ku en is egkesuatan nu. Ne tenged kayi egkesavut tew he mid-ilisan te Megbevayà is daan he paaǥi te kebpemuhat ne iyan in-ilis dutun is kebpemuhata te lawa ni Kristu.
58010010	Ne ǥeina te midtuman ni Jesu Kristu is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, nengepalis is menge salè tew pinaaǥi te kesevaha zà he kebpemuhata zin te keugelingen din he lawa.
58010011	Ne zutun te zaan he paaǥi te ked-azap, is menge memumuhat he Hudiyu, ne andew-andew ziyè dan te simbahan edhithitindeg is edterebahu su edtumanen dan is baal zan te kebpemuhat. Ne heini is menge kebpemuhat dan, ne kenà gihapun ebpekeawà te menge salà te menge etew.
58010012	Iyan, si Kristu mulà, kesevaha zà sikandin mebpemuhat, ne naawà dutun is menge salè tew ne kenè en heini kinahanglan he ed-umanan pa maan te minsan keenu. Ne tuus te netapus din en heini is terebahu zin su mibpinuu sikandin diyà te lavew he pinuuwà te egkekewanan te Megbevayà su edhadì.
58010013	Ne kemulu pa sikandin dutun guntaan su edteǥazan din is timpu keuzemà he zutun egkevakus te Megbevayà is langun he menge kuntada zin wey sikandin mekehadì.
58010014	Ne tenged kayi te kesevaha zà he kebpemuhat din diyà te Megbevayà, sikitew is mibpelisan din te salà, midhimu kiw zin he metazeng te wazà pidtemanan.
58010015	Ne zuen daan ibpenurù kenitew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin dutun te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
58010016	Siak is Nengazen, iyan heini veǥu en he paaǥi he edtukuzen ku zutun te menge sakup ku keuzemà wey ku sikandan mezawat. Idsurat ku is menge suǥù ku ziyà te ǥehinawa zan wey ziyà te isip dan, ke sikandin.
58010017	Ne mid-uman sikandin megkaǥi te, Is menge salè dan wey is menge mezaat he ulaula zan, edlipatan ku, ne kenè ku en maan ed-isipen.
58010018	Ne zutun, geina te nengepesaylu zin en heini is langun, wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa ibpemuhat he id-awà te menge salè ta.
58010019	Ne, menge suled, tenged te mibpehimatey si Jesus ne impetiǥis is lengesa zin, wazè en kegkelenew ta te kedseled pinaaǥi te ked-ampù dutun te utew mahal he ruǥu he seled te kurtina.
58010020	Su si Jesus, midhimu zin is ibayè ta pinaaǥi te kebpemuhata te lawa zin, ne heini is ibayà, ne ebpekeveǥey te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
58010021	Ne kenà duen dà taman su zuen te en utew lavew he memumuhat he ebayàbayà kenitew te menge sakup te Megbevayà.
58010022	Ne tenged kayi, ed-etuvang ki en te Megbevayà, ne kenà tarù is ked-ezapa ta kandin. Edheǥeten ta is kedtuu ta ne kenè ki eduwazuwa. Su netuenan ta he nepelisan ki en te lengesa ni Jesus ne netuenan ta zaan he in-awà kayi is menge salè ta. Nengebewtismuwan kiw en he tuus te kedlumpiyuwi kenitew te Megbevayà.
58010023	Edhemenan tew is meheǥet he kebperateng te kedtulusa kenitew keuzemà te wazà duwazuwa su netuenan tew he metinumanen is Megbevayà ne edhimuwen din is impenaad din kenitew.
58010024	Kenà tew ed-ewaan dini te ǥehinawa tew is kebpepurpurungè tew su wey layun mahal zini te ǥehinawa tew is minsan hentei, ne wey layun mehimu te uman sevaha kenitew is menge meupiya he ulaula.
58010025	Kenè tew ed-engkezan is kedtiǥum tew te ked-azap te Megbevayà; kenè tew ed-iringan is duma he menge tumutuu he mid-engkezan dan en is kedsimba, kekenà, edtiǥum kiw su wey kiw mekepesemsembaǥà. Utew heini kinahanglan, lavew en emun egketuusan ta he meǥaan en is kedlikù te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
58010026	Ne emun nesavut te en is tutuu he tuluuwen, iyan, edtuyuen te pa maan is layun ked-ulaula te mezaat he ulaula, wazè en minsan hengkey he kebpemuhat he edewaten te Megbevayà wey maawà is salè ta.
58010027	Is etew he iyan heini ulaula zin, ne iyan egkepengkusan din is mekelimlimezang he hukum kandin wey is utew meinit he hapuy he iyan idsilut te Megbevayà dutun te langun he edsukul kandin.
58010028	Su is minsan hentei zengan he wazè din tehuza is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, emun edtistiǥusan heini te minsan tetelu wey ke zezuwa ve he tistiǥus, ne kenà egkehizuwan, kekenà, edhimetayan sikandin.
58010029	Ne emun iyan haazà, wey pe be kenà utew meveǥat is idsilut dutun te etew ǥuntaan he edsumpeliten din is hizu kandin te Anak te Megbevayà. Utew meveǥat is idsilut kandin su igkepesavut din pinaaǥi zutun te mid-ulaula zin he wazà pulus dutun te lengesa ni Jesus he ibpalis pezem kandin he iyan tuus te veǥu en he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Meveǥat is silut kandin su edsumpeliten din is beliǥeǥawen he Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
58010030	Su netuenan tew he migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Iyan a ebales, iyan a edsilut kandan tenged te menge ulaula zan he mezaat. Ne zuen daan insurat he lalag he edhenduen te, Edsusiyen te Megbevayà is menge ulaula te menge sakup din.
58010031	Ne emun iyan edsilut is Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen, ne utew mekehandekhandek haazà is idsilut din!
58010032	Isipa niw is timpu zengan hein sikan kew pa meteyawi te tutuu he tuluuwen ne midtuuwan niw. Utew mezakel is kemereǥenan he nengeeǥiyan niw, iyan, nekeantus kew ne wazà haazà ikeawà te kedtuu niw.
58010033	Mibpesipelahan kew ne midlupiǥan kew ziyà te etuvangan te mezakel he menge etew, ne zuen timpu he mid-unungan niw is menge zuma niw te menge pesipala kandan su nehizuwan niw.
58010034	Ne nehizuwan niw, ne midtevangan niw is menge tumutuu he nengepirisu. Ne minsan pa te mibpen-ileg te menge etew is langun he menge azen niw, midlipey kew gihapun su netuenan niw he zuen azen niw he utew pa meupiya ziyà te langit he kenà egkeileg diyà te keniyu te wazè din pidtemanan.
58010035	Umba, menge suled, kenè niw engkezi is kedsarig niw su emun meheǥet is kedsarig niw te Megbevayà, egkezawat niw is suhul zin he utew meupiya.
58010036	Kinahanglan he meinentusen kew wey niw metuman is egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne human niw egkezawat is impenaad din keniyu.
58010037	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Meǥaan en is kebpekeuma te edteǥazan niw ne kenà egkehimu he ebpekelimpas sikandin.
58010038	Ne haazà is menge sakup ku he nengehimu en he metazeng tenged te kedtuu zan kedì, ebeǥayan ku sikandan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Iyan, ke zuen minsan hentei kandan he edsuwey tenged te kegkehandek, utew ku igkeepes, ke sikandin.
58010039	Iyan, sikitew, menge suled, kenè kiw iring te menge etew he edsuwey ne edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà su mezesen mulà is kedtuu tew ne pinaaǥi kayi nelibri kiw en te silut.
58011001	Emun duen kedtuu ta te Megbevayà, egketuenan ta he egkezawat ta is meupiya he ebperetengen ta. Pinaaǥi te kedtuu ta, egketaǥù dini te ǥehinawa ta is kedewata ta keuzemà te menge vutang he wazè te pa maahà.
58011002	Is menge tipehuna he etew, nezeliǥan sikandan te Megbevayà tenged te midtuuwan dan sikandin.
58011003	Netuenan ta he is minsan hengkey he egkeahà he midlimbag te Megbevayà, ne nehimu pinaaǥi zà te lalag din. Ne tenged kayi egketuenan ta he is minsan hengkey he egkeahà ne ziyà ebpuun te kenà egkeahà.
58011004	Si Abel zengan, tenged te kedtuu zin te Megbevayà ne nehimu zin is utew pa meupiya he pemuhat kenà te impemuhat te kakey zin he si Kain. Ne tenged kayi te kedtuu ni Abel mid-isip te Megbevayà sikandin he metazeng su midawat te Megbevayà is impemuhat din. Ne minsan pa te zengan dà minatey si Abel zuen ketudluanan din kenitew tenged te mezesen is kedtuu zin.
58011005	Ne si Inuk daan. Tenged te kedtuu zin wazà sikandin mebpatey su midtulus sikandin te Megbevayà ne kenè en sikandin egkeahà dini te kelibutan su ziyè en sikandin te Megbevayà. Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he ibpesavut he te wazè pa tulusa si Inuk, nesuat is Megbevayà te menge ulaula zin.
58011006	Is etew he wazè din kedtuu te Megbevayà, kenà egkehimu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zin. Su is etew he ebpetavang te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he edtuuwen din he zuen Megbevayà, ne kinahanglan daan he edtuuwen din he edtuvazan te Megbevayà te meupiya is minsan hentei he edhaǥù he ebpen-ahà te paaǥi wey sikandin mekepekid-emiǥu te Megbevayà.
58011007	Ne zuen daan kedtuu ni Noe su hein midleǥuyan sikandin te Megbevayà te limas he egkehitavù, midtuuwan din, minsan te wazè din pa maahà haazà is limas. Ne mibeelan din is dekelà he avang he egngezanan te arka ne hein midlapey is daǥat, nelibri sikandin wey is pemilya zin ne wazè dan melened. Ne pinaaǥi zutun te kedtuu zin, impesavut din he zait he edlimasen te Megbevayà is tivuuk he mekesesalà he menusiyà. Ne zutun mid-isip sikandin te Megbevayà he metazeng tenged te midtuuwan din is migkaǥi te Megbevayà.
58011008	Ne si Abraham daan, duen kandin he kedtuu. Su neketuu sikandin te Lalag te Megbevayà he ewai zin is inged din ne medhendiyà te selakew en he tanà he impenaad te Megbevayà he ibeǥey ziyà te kandin wey ziyà te menge kevuwazan din. Ne zutun mid-ewaan din is kandin he inged minsan pa te wazè din hanew zutun te tanà he impenaad kandin.
58011009	Ne hein nekeuma sikandin dutun te tanà, midtuuwan din he egkeuma is timpu keuzemà he idata kandin te Megbevayà haazà is tanà. Ne minsan pa zutun, is ed-ubpaan din dutun, ne menge lawig dà he mid-etepan te terapal he henduen te kenà sikandin meǥinged dutun te tanà. Ne iring din ded daan is mid-ulaula zutun te anak din he si Isaak wey is apù din he si Hakub, minsan pa te impenaad daan kandan te Megbevayà he egkeangken dan haazà is tanà.
58011010	Su si Abraham, ne iyan hustu he ebperetengen din he inged sikan is inged diyà te langit he kenà egkezeetan te wazè din pidtemanan. Ne iyan mibpelanu wey mibaal kayi is Megbevayà.
58011011	Ne si Sara zaan is esawa ni Abraham, duen kandin he kedtuu su minsan te wazà sikandin mekeanak wey utew en sikandin meǥurang, mibmeǥingey ǥihapun tenged te kedtuu zin te Megbevayà. Umba mibmeǥingey sikandin su midtuuwan din is penaad kandin te Megbevayà he egkeuma is timpu he ed-anak sikandin.
58011012	Ne is esawa zin he si Abraham he utew en meǥurang daan he kenè en pezem egkehimu he ebmeǥingey si Sara pinaaǥi kandin, nevuwad gihapun ne nehimu sikandin he kepuun te utew mezakel he menge etew. Iring sikandan te pantad diyà te zaǥat wey te menge vituen diyà te langit su kenè en egkengevilang.
58011013	Ne heini sikandan he neketuu te Megbevayà, pudu zan minatey te wazè dan pa mezawat haazà is impenaad kandan te Megbevayà he egkeangken dan haazà is tanà. Ne minsan pa zutun te wazè dan pa mezawat haazà is impenaad te Megbevayà, wazè dan engkezi is kedtuu zan su netuenan dan he egkeuǥet pa zutun egkezawat dan is ebperetengen dan he impenaad te Megbevayà. Ne ingkepesavut dan he kenà sikandan hustu he meǥinged dini te kelibutan su iyan hustu he inged dan is langit.
58011014	Ne is menge etew he iring kayi ǥuntaan, kenè dan ed-isipen he iyan hustu he inged dan heini is kelibutan, kekenà, ebperetengen dan he zuen selakew he inged he iyan hustu he inged dan.
58011015	Ensi Abraham, wazè dan daan isipa he iyan hustu he inged dan haazà is mid-ewaan dan su emun iyan haazà, egkehimu he ed-ulì dan dutun.
58011016	Su ebpen-ahaan dan is inged he utew pa meupiya, kenà haazà is mid-ewaan dan su iyan ebperetengen dan is egkeubpaan dan he inged diyà te langit. Ne ǥeina te iyan haazà, ne mid-angken sikandan te Megbevayà ne netuenan ta he kenè din igkeeled is kegngezani zan kandin he Megbevayà dan su mid-andam din en is inged he egkeubpaan dan.
58011017	Netuenan ta he impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham he pinaaǥi te anak din he si Isaak egkehimu he utew mezakel is kevuwazan din. Ne hein migezaman te Megbevayà is kedtuu ni Abraham, migkeǥiyan din si Abraham he ipemuhat din si Isaak. Iyan, utew zekelà is kedtuu ni Abraham te penaad te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun wazè din isipa he kenà egkehimu he kenè din ibpemuhat si Isaak.
58011019	Su neisip ni Abraham he ke ebpatey si Isaak, egkehimu he ebenhawen te Megbevayà. Ne henduen be te nevanhew iyan si Isaak dutun su neisip ni Abraham he kenè en ebperis he ebpatey sikandin.
58011020	Ne si Isaak daan, midtuu sikandin te penaad kandin te Megbevayà su mibpenubtuvazan din is menge anak din si Hakub wey si Esau.
58011021	Ne si Hakub, midtuu zaan sikandin te Megbevayà su zutun te meǥaan din en kebpatey, mibpenubtuvazan din is menge apù din he menge anak ni Jose ne zutun mid-usazey ziyà te tuked din ne mid-azap din is Megbevayà.
58011022	Ne si Jose zaan tenged te kedtuu zin, dutun te meǥaan din en kebpatey, netagnè din is ked-awà te langun he menge kevuwazan te lukes din he si Israyil ziyà te tanà te Ihiptu. Ne intelaan din daan dutun he ke egenat dan en, uwita zan daan is lawa zin te minatey.
58011023	Ne sikan daan is menge ǥinikanan ni Moises, ne zekelà is kedtuu zan te Megbevayà. Su minsan pa te insuǥù te hadì he edhimatayan is langun he menge vatà he maama te menge Hudiyu, wazè dan mahandek ne zutun te ked-enaka ki Moises in-eles dan sikandin seled te tetelu he vulan su wey kenà sikandin mehimetayi su neehè dan he utew mekempet sikandin he vatà.
58011024	Ne si Moises, duen daan kedtuu zin te Megbevayà, su hein meǥurang en sikandin, mid-ewaan din is meupiya he kebpekesavuk din diyà te valey te anak te hadì te Ihiptu, ne wazà sikandin mesuat he ed-umawen he anak te anak he vahi te hadì.
58011025	Su iyan din midtumù he merasey sikandin duma te menge etew he sakup te Megbevayà, kenà te kedlipey pinaaǥi te menge salà dini te kelibutan he egkehitavù te mevavè dà he timpu.
58011026	Neisip din he tuwas pa he meupiya is ked-entusa zin te kedlupiǥi kandin tenged te kedsarig din te mibpilì he hadì he ibpevulus te Megbevayà keuzemà, kenà is dekelà he ketiǥeyunan he egkekuwa zin diyà te Ihiptu. Su iyan hustu he edteǥazan din is langun he meupiya he ibeǥey kandin te Megbevayà keuzemà.
58011027	Ne tenged te kedtuu zin mid-awà sikandin dutun te Ihiptu su wazè din ikehandek is kepauk te hadì te Ihiptu. Ne minsan pa te utew mereǥen is egkengeseǥazan din wazà sikandin medlikù su henduen be te egkeehè din he eduma kandin is Megbevayà he kenà egkeahà.
58011028	Ne tenged te kedtuu zin midtuman din is Pista te Kedlevayi ne insuǥù din he ebpelisan te lengesa te nati he kerehidu is gemawan te menge valey te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Umba midhimu zin heini su wey kenà mehimetayi is menge penganey he anak dan te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ibpepenhimatey te langun he menge penganey he anak te menge etew ziyà te Ihiptu.
58011029	Ne is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, pinaaǥi te kedtuu zan te Megbevayà, nekerapas dan te zaǥat he egngezanan te Meriǥà he impedsuwey te Megbevayà, ne neiring te tanà he memazà haazà is imbayè dan. Iyan, is menge tig-Ihiptu he edal-as kandan, ne nengelened dan pudu su imped-uliey te Megbevayà haazà is daǥat he impedsuwey zin.
58011030	Ne zuen daan kedtuu te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, su hein nemekeuma zan dutun te ingkutà te inged he Hiriku ne kada andew seled te pitu he andew ed-elingkus dan dutun te kutà, ne zutun migevà te Megbevayà haazà is kutà.
58011031	Duen dutun te inged he Hiriku bahi he meremerik is ulaula zin he egngezanan ki Rahab. Ne minsan pa zutun, hein nekeuma is ed-eles-eles he menge suǥù ni Moises he edsusi te kelig-en dutun te inged, midtuu si Rahab te Megbevayà ne midtevangan din haazà is menge etew. Ne neuǥet pa zutun hein migerà is menge zuma zin he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà, wazà sikandin iragkes tenged te kedtuu zin te Megbevayà.
58011032	Kayi ku zà edtemana heini is guǥud su emun ibpelaus ku pa kenè en egkampet is timpu emun eguǥuzen ku pa keniyu is kedtuu te menge zuma pa he menge etew iring ki Gidyun, si Barak, si Samsun, si Hipti, si David, si Samuel wey is ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà.
58011033	Su pinaaǥi te kedtuu zan te Megbevayà nengezaag te zuma kandan is menge sundaru te menge zekelà he inged. Ne is menge zuma pa, metazeng is kedhedii zan te menge sakup dan, ne is duma pa, nezawat dan is impenaad kandan te Megbevayà, ne is duma, nezaag dan is ebpekekaid he erimaung ne wazè dan mekaǥat.
58011034	Ne is duma pa, tenged te kedtuu zan, wazè dan metutung te utew meinit he hapuy, ne is duma pa, wazà sikandan mehimetayi te menge kuntada zan. Ne is duma he utew meǥuyà, nehimu sikandan he utew mezesen pinaaǥi te kedtuu zan. Nehimu zan he utew mevurut te kebpekidtebek ne nengezaag dan is menge sundaru te menge kuntada zan.
58011035	Ne zuen daan menge vahi zengan he zekelà is kedtuu zan ne pinaaǥi kayi nevanhew is menge anak dan he minatey en. Ne zuen pa zaan menge tumutuu zengan te Megbevayà he midakep, ne minsan pa te midrasey sikandan taman te kebpatey, wazè dan medlekà te kedtuu zan su wey sikandan keuzemà egkevanhew zutun te tuwas pa he meupiya he untung.
58011036	Duen pa tumutuu zengan he utew mid-eled-eled ne mibuǥel, ne is duma pa ne midhiketan ne mibpirisu.
58011037	Duen daan mibpenhimetayan pinaaǥi te kedtulenga te vatu. Ne zuen pa zaan midliwazà tempeza, ne zuen pa zaan mibpenhimetayan pinaaǥi te tibas. Ne is duma pa, ne tenged te kenè dan ked-engkezi te kedtuu zan, ne iyan dà ugelingen dan is lundis te kerehidu wey kambing. Utew zan nengeayuayu. Mibpemesipelahan wey midlupiǥan sikandan te menge etew.
58011038	Is menge mezaat he etew zini te kelibutan, kenè dan dait he ebpekiduma kayi te menge utew metazeng he etew! Ne is duma kayi te menge etew he tumutuu, ne nengeewaan dan is baley zan ne ziyè dan mengetazintazin te tanà he wazà ubpai te etew, wey ziyà te menge vuntud. Ne ziyè dan mekeubpà te menge surung diyà te menge pangpang wey te menge vudsi te tanà.
58011039	Ne utew igkelipey te Megbevayà is menge etew he iring kayi, iyan, minsan pa zutun wazè dan pa zutun mezawat is penaad kandan te Megbevayà.
58011040	Su zuen meupiya pa utew he paaǥi he mid-isip te Megbevayà su mid-isip din he wey zin edtumana haazà is menge penaad din kandan ke ebpekeragkes kiw zutun te menge etew he edawat te menge penaad din.
58012001	Ne sikitew zaan, menge suled, kayi te kedtuu tew te Megbevayà, ne iring kiw te ebpelumlumbeey. Ne ǥeina te utew mezakel is menge tumutuu zengan he nekepaahà kenitew he metinumanen is Megbevayà, kinahanglan he ed-engkezan tew en is minsan hengkey he ebpekesanggen kenitew te edlumbà wey is kenà hustu he ulaula he henduen be te layun tew egkeulaula, ne ebpekezesen kiw te ebpelelaǥuy taman te ebpekeuma kiw ziyà te edungguan tew.
58012002	Edhemenan ta is kedsarig ta ki Jesus su iyan sikandin puunà te kedtuu ta ne pinaaǥi zaan kandin egkeheǥet is kedtuu ta. Mid-antus din is kedrensanga kandin dutun te krus. Ne wazè din ikeeled haazà is kedhimetayi kandin, kekenà, mid-isip din he utew zin igkelipey is egkeulaula zin emun egkeipus haazà is ked-antus din. Ne ǥuntaan mibpinuu en sikandin dutun te utew lavew he pinuuwà su ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.
58012003	Ne si Jesus, ne utew merasey is impeseǥazan kandin tenged te kebpesipelahi kandin te menge lalung he etew. Tenged kayi isipa niw layun sikandin su wey kenà maawà is kedhamen niw te kedsarig niw, ne kenè kew edtepulen te ked-ulaula te meupiya.
58012004	Su netuenan niw he zutun te kedsukuli niw te mezaat he ulaula, wazà minsan hentei keniyu he midhimetayan tenged te kedtuu zin.
58012005	Kela ke nelipatan niw en is sambag te Megbevayà diyà te keniyu te menge anak din su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Sikew, anak ku, emun edsewayen ku sikew, purungi nu susiya is menge ulaula nu. Ne emun ebmensuwen ku sikew kinahanglan he kenà heini igkeawà te kedhamen nu kedsarig kediey.
58012006	Su is minsan hentei he mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku, edsewayen ku, ne is minsan hentei he ed-engkenen ku he anak ku, ebpenuruen ku pinaaǥi te merasey wey sikandin memansu, ke sikandin.
58012007	Umba, ke minsan hengkey is mereǥen he egkeulaula niw ǥuntaan, entusa niw, su pinaaǥi kayi ebpenuruen kew te Megbevayà su menge anak kew zin. Ne wazà anak he kenà ebmensuwen te amey zin.
58012008	Emun kenè kew ebmensuwen te Megbevayà kenè kew tutuu he menge anak din, kekenà, iring kew te ingkeǥingey zà.
58012009	Su minsan is amey ta zini te kelibutan, emun ebmensuwen ki zin ne ebpekepevayàbayè ki ǥihapun kandin, wey pe be kenà mehimu he ebpekepevayàbayè ki zaan te Amey ta ziyà te langit? Su pinaaǥi kayi egkeangken ta is untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
58012010	Is amey ta zini te kelibutan, ne seled te mevavè dà he timpu is kebmensuwa zin kenita sumalà is neisip din he meupiya. Ne, is Amey ta ziyà te langit, iyan ibmensuwa zin kenita su wey ki metevangi ne wey ki zaan mehimu he mebmetazeng he iring kandin.
58012011	Ne emun ebmensuwen ki te Megbevayà, kenè ta egkesuatan su merasey is egkeulaula ta. Iyan, emun egkepasad haazà is kebmensuwa zin kenita, ne pinaaǥi kayi nemansu ki en te Megbevayà, ne metazeng en is menge ulaula ta, ne zutun utew melinew is kebpekesavuk ta.
58012012	Umba, menge suled, heǥeta niw is kedsarig niw, ne hemeni niw en is kedtuu niw.
58012013	Peniguduwi niw te ed-ikul is hustu he ibayà su wey kenà luyahi is menge zuma niw he mehugkà is kedtuu zan, kekenà, melig-eni is kedtuu zan.
58012014	Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw su wey melinew is kebpekidepitè niw te minsan hentei ne wey niw metuman is metazeng he ulaula su emun kenè ki metazeng kenè ta is Megbevayà egkeahà keuzemà.
58012015	Bantey kew su kela ke zuen duma keniyu he kenà edawat te ǥaǥew te Megbevayà. Su is iring kayi he etew, ne ebpekeiring te sagbet he ebpemeǥas te mepait he ebpekehilu. Ebpekesamuk sikandin te menge tumutuu ne mezakel he etew is ebpekeiring kandin te ed-ulaula te mezaat.
58012016	Bantey kew su wey wazà minsan sevaha keniyu he meremerik is ulaula zin wey ke ed-iniyuǥan din be is Megbevayà su iring kayi si Esau zengan. Is ketenged din te kegkekakey he anak, inliwè din te keenen he sengepegkaan dà.
58012017	Ne neuǥet dutun neisip din he meupiya ke iyan sikandin is kakey penubtuvazi te amey zin wey metuvazi sikandin te Megbevayà, iyan, wazà mehimu su kenè en egkehimu he edhewien din pa maan is inliwè din en, minsan pa te nekesineǥew sikandin is edhangyù.
58012018	Is paaǥi te ked-uvey ziyà te Megvevayà he impenurù kenitew, ne kenè en iring te paaǥi te menge kevuwazan dengan ni Israyil. Su iyan mid-uvayan dan is egkeehè dan su ziyà te vuntud he Siney he utew meregreg. Merusirem dutun tenged te kivel ne utew mevendes is keramag.
58012019	Egkezineg dan is budyung wey is mezaǥing he laǥeng te Megbevayà. Ne hein nezineg te menge etew haazà is laǥeng, midhangyù dan he med-engked haazà is egkaǥi su utew mekehandekhandek.
58012020	Su utew zan ingkehandek is migkaǥi zin he ke sikandin te, Ke zuen minsan hentei, minsan is ayam niw he ed-uvey pa kayi te vuntud, ne kinahanglan he edhimetayan pinaaǥi te kedtulenga te vatu.
58012021	Ne haazà is neehè dan dutun, ne utew mekehandekhandek ne minsan si Moises, nekaǥi zin he migkerker sikandin tenged te kegkehandek din.
58012022	Iyan, sikitew mulà, kenà iring dutun is ked-uvey tew te Megbevayà su iring te ed-uvayan tew is buntud he Siyun he zutun is inged te Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen. Iyan haazà kes inged he Hiruselim diyà te langit he zutun nengetiǥum is egkengelipey he edliblibuwen he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.
58012023	Iring te mid-uvayan tew en is pengenayan he menge anak te Megbevayà he inlista is menge ngazan dan diyà te langit. Ne mid-uvayan tew en is Megbevayà he iyan edsusi te menge ulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà. Mid-uvayan tew zaan is gimukud te langun he menge etew he menge metazeng he minatey en he netapus en is kedlibriya kandan te mezaat he ulaula.
58012024	Mid-uvayan tew zaan si Jesus he iyan datù tew he midhimu te veǥu en he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew te Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi te lengesa zin nengepelisan is menge salè tew. Tuus is lengesa zin te ǥaǥew kenitew te Megbevayà he utew haazà meupiya kenà te lengesa ni Abel zengan su is lengesa ni Abel, iyan tuus te silut te Megbevayà .
58012025	Umba, purung kew pemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenè kew sukul. Su is menge etew zengan he wazè dan pemineǥa is Lalag te Megbevayà he insuǥù kandan ni Moises dini te kelibutan, emun wazà sikandan mekelikey te silut te Megbevayà, iyan kew pe be mekelikey te silut emun kenè niw ebpemineǥen is egkeǥiyen din te ebpuun te langit.
58012026	Dengan, migkerker is tanà tenged te utew mezaǥing he laǥeng te Megbevayà; iyan, migkaǥi zin he zuen timpu keuzemà he ed-umanan din ibpekerker, kenà iyan dà is tanà, kekenà, ragkes is langit.
58012027	Ne iyan kehuluǥan kayi te menge lalag he edhenduen te, ed-umanan din ibpekerker is: id-awè din is minsan hengkey he egkewaleng su wey iyan dà metaǥak is minsan hengkey he kenà egkewaleng.
58012028	Umba, kinahanglan he zekelà is kebpeselemati tew kandin su iyan kiw menge sakup te ǥinhedian din he kenà egkehanew te wazè din pidtemanan. Kinahanglan he ed-azap kiw kandin te paaǥi he iyan egkesuatan din. Ne edtehuzan tew sikandin duma is kegkehandek;
58012029	su is Megbevayè tew, iring te utew meinit he hapuy is kedsilut din.
58013001	Kinahanglan he peniguduwi niw is kebmahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw te menge zuma niw he tumutuu.
58013002	Kenè niw lipati he kinahanglan he ibpeehè niw is gaǥew niw ziyà te menge etew he kenè niw kilala. Gelǥelawa niw ziyà te valey niw su zuen dengan menge etew he zuen menge meǥeliyug dan, iyan, wazè dan metueni he menge velinsuǥuen bes haazà te Megbevayà he ebpuun diyà te langit.
58013003	Kenè niw lipati is kedtavang niw te menge tumutuu he pirisu. Purungi niw sikandan he iring te iyan kew nepirisu. Tevangi niw zaan is menge tumutuu he ebpesipelahan he iring te iyan is keugelingen niw he lawa nepesipelahan.
58013004	Kinahanglan he tehuza niw te langun is ked-es-esawa niw. Kinahanglan he wazà minsan hentei he edselselaan din is esawa zin. Edsilutan te Megbevayà is etew he meremerik is ulaula zin wey is etew he edselselaan din is esawa zin.
58013005	Bantey kew su kela ke utew subra is suat niw te selapì. Kinahanglan he imeupiye en te ǥehinawa niw is naazen niw, su migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Kenè ku sikiyu ed-ewaan ne kenè ku sikiyu ed-engkezan.
58013006	Umba, menge suled, dekelà is kedsarig ta te Megbevayà ne ebpekekaǥi ki te, Iyan edtavang kedì is Megbevayà, umba kenà a egkehandek te minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan te etew zà duen dini te kediey.
58013007	Kenè niw lipati is menge egalen niw te nengehuna he timpu he nekepenurù keniyu te Lalag te Megbevayà. Isipa niw is meupiya he nehimu pinaaǥi te menge ulaula zan ne iring kandan hemeni niw is kedtuu niw ki Jesu Kristu.
58013008	Su si Jesu Kristu, ne kenà egkehalin. Iyan ded sikandin gihapun dengan, wey ǥuntaan, wey keuzemà te wazè din pidtemanan.
58013009	Umba, kenè niw tuuwi is menge selakew he tuluuwen he kenà iyan kes tutuu he impenurù keniyu. Iyan hustu he ibmelig-en te kedtuu tew is kedtevangi kenitew te Megbevayà, ne kenà iyan is kedlikayi te menge egkeenen he indawey te kesuǥuan su wazà heini ikezeyzey te menge etew he ebantey kayi.
58013010	Sikitew is menge tumutuu ki Kristu, duen tew en ingkepemuhat, iyan, haazà is menge memumuhat he Hudiyu he ziyà ebpemuhat te simbahan he ziyà te Hiruselim, wazè dan ketenged te kegkaan kayi.
58013011	Netuenan niw he emun duen ibpemuhat te menge Hudiyu su ebpelisan dan is menge salè dan, ne is lengesa te ibpemuhat, ed-uwiten te lavew he memumuhat diyà te seled te utew mahal he ruǥu zutun te simbahan, iyan, is lawa te ibpemuhat ne ed-uwiten dan pehendiyà te ǥawas te inged ne zutun dan edtutunga.
58013012	Iring din ded daan is neulaula ki Jesus su midhimetayan sikandin diyà te ǥawas te inged ne nehimu is lengesa zin he ibpalis te menge salè tew te menusiyà.
58013013	Umba, menge suled, egawas kiw zaan te inged ne edhendiyè kiw en te kandin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenè tew en edseriǥan is kedtumana te menge tuluuwen te menge Hudiyu, kekenà, iyan dà edseriǥan tew si Jesus . Edsundanan tew sikandin ne kenè tew igkehandek is ked-entusa tew te kedsudia kenitew tenged te kedtuu tew kandin.
58013014	Su kenà ebpedayun is kebpekeubpè tew kayi te kelibutan, kekenà, ebperetengen tew pa is tutuu he inged tew keuzemà he iyan ed-ubpaan tew te wazè din pidtemanan.
58013015	Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he pinaaǥi ki Jesus he memumuhat tew, iyan tew layun ibpemuhat diyà te Megbevayà is kedeliǥa tew kandin. Layun tew ibpaahà diyà te Megbevayà is kebpeselamati tew kandin.
58013016	Kenè niw lipati is kebpurung niw te minsan hentei he zuma niw, ne mebpetebtevangè kew su is ulaula he iring kayi, ne iring te pemuhat he egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
58013017	Tumana niw is suǥù te menge egalen niw te menge tumutuu ne ipeehè niw is kedtehuza niw kandan su iyan sikandan ed-elima keniyu te edtuu, ne zuen timpu keuzemà he edsusiyen te Megbevayà ke metinumanen dan be is ed-elima keniyu. Emun ebpemineǥen niw is suǥù dan, utew ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa zan is baal zan. Ne emun kenè kew ebpemineg, utew mereǥen is baal zan ne egkehimu zaan heini he idlised niw.
58013018	Menge suled, iampù key layun keniyu. Netuenan dey he wazà igkesawey te menge ulaula zey su iyan dà egkesuatan dey he meveeli zey is layun meupiya.
58013019	Ne iampù a zaan keniyu wey a meǥaan ipeulì te Megbevayà diyan te keniyu.
58013020	Is Megbevayà, mibanhew zin is Nengazen tew he si Jesus. Midtiǥis is lengesa zin he iyan tuus te veǥu wey wazà pidtemanan he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun nehimu si Jesus he mekeǥeǥehem he ed-elima kenitew te menge kerehidu zin.
58013021	Berakat he pinaaǥi ki Jesu Kristu, is Megbevayà he ebeǥey te kelinew, beǥayi kew zin te minsan hengkey he tavang wey niw tumana is egkesuatan din. Berakat daan he himuwa kiw zin he menge etew he utew zin egkesuati is menge ulaula. Edeliǥen tew si Jesu Kristu te wazà pidtemanan.
58013022	Menge suled, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he entusa niw is kebpemineg kayi te langun he menge lalag ku keniyu su kenà utew meluǥayad heini is insurat ku.
58013023	Iyan daan tudtul ku keniyu is: impeǥawas en te pirisuwan is suled tew he si Timoteo. Emun petuluy ebpekeuma sikandin dini edumahan ku ke ebpekehendiyan a.
58013024	Ipengemusta a keniyu te langun he menge egalen niw wey te langun he menge sakup te Megbevayà diyan. Is menge suled tew zini te Italya, ne ebpengemusta zaan sikandan keniyu.
58013025	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew is langun te Megbevayà.
59001001	Iyan a si Santiago is teǥisurat kayi. Suluǥuen a te Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Kemusta kew is langun he menge ǥaked te Megbevayà he nekedsusuwey zini te tungkup te kelibutan.
59001002	Menge suled, mebmelipayen kew emun merasey is egkeulaula niw tenged te idtuǥut te Megbevayà he zuen ebarangbarang he penggezam te kedtuu niw kandin.
59001003	Su nesavut niw en he emun egkeantus niw is penggezam, egkeviǥeran is ked-antus niw.
59001004	Ne utew zaan kinahanglan he kenà mehugkà is kebpurung niw ked-antus su emun ebpurung ki ed-antus te merasey egkehimu ki he metau wey wazà igkesewayi kenita wey wazà kurang te kedtuu ta te Megbevayà.
59001005	Ne ke zuen minsan hentei keniyu he egkereǥenan su kenè din egketuenan ke hengkey is meupiya he paaǥi, mebuyù te ketau ziyà te Megbevayà, ne ebeǥayan sikandin su metulanged sikandin ne kenè ki zin edewayen ke ebuyù ki.
59001006	Ne emun ebuyù kew te ketau ziyà te kandin kinahanglan he edtuu kew he egkezawat niw te wazà duwazuwa. Su is etew he eduwazuwa, egkehalinhalin layun is isip din. Iring sikandin te vaǥel ziyà te zaǥat he minsan hendei zà duen hiyupa te keramag.
59001007	Is etew he iring kayi, kinahanglan he kenè din isipa he ibeǥey kandin te Megbevayà is ebuyuen din
59001008	su zuwazuwa is ed-isipen din; kenè din edseriǥan is Megbevayà, ne kenà daan egkeseriǥan is minsan hengkey he ulaula zin.
59001009	Kinahanglan he mebmelipayen is egkeayuayu he tumutuu emun ibpelavew sikandin te Megbevayà.
59001010	Kinahanglan he mebmelipayen daan is sepian he tumutuu emun ibpekevavà sikandin te Megbevayà; su is sepian, egkeawà daan sikandin keuzemà iring te kevukad te sagbet.
59001011	Edsilaan is sagbet te andew he utew meinit, ne egkelay-ub, ne egkeǥangu is kevukad din, ne kenè en maan dutun meupiya he ed-ahaan. Ne iring din ded daan is sepian he etew su egketik-ew sikandin ebpatey ne egkeengkezan din is kebpen-ehè din te ketiǥeyunan.
59001012	Utew zeyzey is etew he ebpurung ed-antus te penggezam kandin su emun egkeahà he hustu is kedtuu zin, ebeǥayan sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan he iyan impenaad te Megbevayà diyà te langun he ebmahalen dan sikandin diyà te ǥehinawa zan.
59001013	Emun egkepenulayan is minsan hentei kenitew, kenè tew ed-isipen he iyan nekepenuley kenitew is Megbevayà, su kenà egkepenulayan is Megbevayà, ne kenè din daan ebpenulayen is minsan hentei.
59001014	Egkepenulayan is etew emun ed-eǥaken sikandin te mezaat he kebayè din.
59001015	Ne emun edtumanen din is suat din, ebpekesalà sikandin. Ne iyan dutun pangkus te etew ke ebpeniguduwan din is ked-ulaula te mezaat is kemetayen.
59001016	Menge minahal ku he suled, kenè niw tuuwi is kenà tutuu. Kenà ebpenuley is Megbevayà.
59001017	Is minsan hengkey he ibeǥey kenitew he meupiya he wazè din kurang, ne ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà he iyan nenlimbag te langun he edsiǥa ziyà te langit. Egkengehalinhalin heini, iyan, is Megbevayà, kenà mulà sikandin edhalin, ne kenà egkehalin te minsan hengkey.
59001018	Tenged te iyan egkesuatan din midhimu kiw zin he menge anak din pinaaǥi te kebpesevuta zin kenitew te tutuu he tuluuwen. Egkesuatan din he iyan kiw edhimuwen din he lavew te langun he menge linimbag.
59001019	Kenè niw lipati, menge minahal ku he suled, he is minsan hentei kenitew, kinahanglan he layun andam he ebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenè ta ipetuwas is kenita zà he lalag ne kenè ki zaan melemu he egkepauk.
59001020	Su emun egkepauk ki kenè ta zutun egketuman is egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
59001021	Engkezi niw en is minsan hengkey he meremerik he ulaula wey is kelelalung. Pesakup kew te Megbevayà; hemeni niw is lalag din he impesavut en keniyu su iyan ebpekelibri keniyu te silut.
59001022	Kinahanglan he edtumanen niw is Lalag te Megbevayà. Emun ebpemineǥen niw zà is lalag din ne kenè niw edtumanen, henduen be te edterteruen niw is gehinawa niw.
59001023	Su ke zuen minsan hentei he taman dà te kebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè din edtumanen, iring sikandin te etew he ed-alung diyà te peǥelungan.
59001024	Egkeehè din is dagwey zin, iyan, meǥaan dà. Ne egkelipatan din dutun ke hengkey is neehè din.
59001025	Iyan, ke zuen etew he ebpurungan din ed-istudyuwi is kesuǥuan he wazè din kurang he iyan ebpekelibri kenitew, ne kenè din edlipatan, kekenà, edtumanen din, edtuvazan te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan din.
59001026	Emun iyan isip te etew is hustu is ked-ezapa zin te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè din edtengkaan is kegkaǥikaǥi zin, wazà pulus te ked-azap din su neterteruan din dà is gehinawa zin.
59001027	Is etew he hustu is ked-azap din te Megbevayà, edlikayan din is menge mezaat he ulaula he iyan ed-ul-ulahan te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà. Meupiya mulà is ulaula zin. Ebpurungan din is menge edlised he menge ilu he vatà wey menge valu he vahi. Iyan heini egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà he paaǥi te ked-ezapa tew kandin.
59002001	Menge suled, geina te menge tumutuu ki ki Jesu Kristu, is mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen, kinahanglan he pedrerepenga ta is kedtehuza ta te langun he menge etew.
59002002	Penenglitan duen edseled diyà te simbahan niw he sepian he edsisising te vulawan ne utew mahal is bisti zin. Ne zuen daan edtampu he egkeayuayu ne nenggeremisey is kandin he bisti.
59002003	Ne edtehuzan niw heeyan is meupiya is bisti zin ne ke sikiyu te, Kayi ka te meupiya he vangkù. Iyan, haazà mulà is egkeayuayu, egkeǥiyan niw zà te, Kayi ka hitindeg, wey ke, Dini ka pinuu te saag uvey te kedì he vangkù.
59002004	Kenè be mezaat heeyan he ulaula su kenè niw ebpedrerepengen is kedtahud niw te menge zuma niw he tumutuu su kunaan niw ke hustu ke ebmahalen ta is sepian ne kenà is egkeayuayu.
59002005	Pemineǥa niw, menge minahal ku he suled, is ibpesavut ku keniyu. Duen mibpilì te Megbevayà he egkengeayuayu. Ne minsan deisek is ketiǥeyunan dan midhimu te Megbevayà he zekelà mulà is kedsarig dan kandin ne iyan sikandan edtuvazan din pinaaǥi te kedhadì din sumalà is penaad din diyà te langun he ebmahalen dan sikandin diyà te ǥehinawa zan.
59002006	Iyan, sikiyu mulà, wazè niw kedtahud dutun te egkengeayuayu. Hentei is ebpenlupig keniyu? Iyan is menge sepian. Ne hentei is edsumbung keniyu ziyà te etuvangan te huwis?
59002007	Hentei is edsumpalit te mahal he ngazan ni Jesus he iyan teǥiǥaked kenitew? Iyan is menge sepian.
59002008	Utew meupiya is ed-ul-ulahan niw emun edtumanen niw is lavew he suǥù te Nengazen he egkevasa niw ziyà te insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Kinahanglan he mahala nu is duma nu; isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he ǥehinawa.
59002009	Iyan, emun duen niw ibpelavi, ebpekesalè kew. Ne sumalà is impenurù dutun te kesuǥuan te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin ni Moises, mesinupaken kew.
59002010	Su minsan ke sevaha zà duen te menge suǥù te kesuǥuan is egkesupak te etew, ed-isipen gihapun te Megbevayà he mesinupaken sikandin he iring te nesupak din is langun he menge suǥù.
59002011	Su is migkaǥi te, Kenè nu selselai is esawa nu, ne iyan daan migkaǥi te, Kenè ka pemumunù. Ne minsan wazè nu selselai is esawa nu, ke nekevunù ka nesupak nu en is tivuuk he kesuǥuan su sebsevaha zà is teǥisuǥù dutun te langun he menge suǥù.
59002012	Duen selakew en he kesuǥuan he ebpekelibri kenita wey ki kenà mekesalà ne iyan heini kesuǥuan he idhukum kenita keuzemà te Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he ebpurungan ta is menge lalag ta wey ulaula ta su wey kenè ta mesupak haazà is kesuǥuan.
59002013	Su is Megbevayà, kenè din keuzemà egkehizuwan is etew he wazè din hizu te zuma zin. Iyan, is etew mulà he hihizuwen, wazà kinahanglan he egkehandek sikandin su kenà sikandin edsilutan te Megbevayà.
59002014	Menge suled, wazà pulus te kedtuu te minsan hentei ziyà te Megbevayà emun kenà egketuusan is kedtuu zin pinaaǥi te menge ulaula he meupiya. Is kedtuu he iring dutun, ne kenà tutuu, ne kenà din igkelibri te silut.
59002015	Su penenglitan duen menge suled tew he tumutuu ne edlised sikandan tenged te wazè dan igkekuwa te bisti wey egkekaan.
59002016	Ne emun egkeǥiyan tew zà sikandan te, Ehè kew zà. Berakat he mekekuwa kew te egkeenen niw wey igkebisti niw, iyan, kenè tew sikandan edtevangan, wazà pulus te migkaǥi tew.
59002017	Iring din ded daan is etew he egkeǥiyen din he edtuu sikandin, iyan, kenà meupiya is menge ulaula zin. Egkesavut ta zutun he kenè bes tutuu is kedtuu zin.
59002018	Ne ke zuen egkaǥi te, Edtuu zà is sevaha te Megbevayà wey melibri sikandin te silut ne is duma, ne ed-ulaula te meupiya wey sikandin melibri, ne pudu hustu. Iyan, iyan tavak ku zutun te zezuwa is: kinahanglan he edtuu ki, iyan, kenà egkehimu he tutuu is kedtuu ta te Megbevayà ke kenà egketuusan haazà is kedtuu ta pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta he meupiya. Kinahanglan he ibpeehè ta is kedtuu ta pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta.
59002019	Emun midtuu ki he sebsevaha zà is Megbevayà utew meupiya heeyan, iyan, kenè pa hustu su minsan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, midtuu zan daan te iring keniyan, iyan, egkerkeren dan te kegkehandek su netuenan dan he edsilutan sikandan keuzemà.
59002020	Utew kenà metau he ed-isip is etew he iring dutun. Ebpenuruen ku sikiyu he is kedtuu ta, emun kenà egketuusan pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta he meupiya, ne kenà ebpekelibri kenita te silut.
59002021	Hengkey is paaǥi he impetimaan te kepuun tew he si Abraham he iyan impeketezenga kandin te Megbevayà? Iyan is menge ulaula zin dutun te kedtumana zin te insuǥù kandin te Megbevayà te kebpemuhata zin pezem te anak din he si Isaak.
59002022	Netuenan ta he pinaaǥi te kedtuu zin, midtuman din is insuǥù kandin ne pinaaǥi zaan te kedtumana zin kayi, neheǥet is kedtuu zin te Megbevayà.
59002023	Ne tenged dutun egkesavut ta he utew tutuu sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Midtuu si Abraham te Megbevayà, ne tenged dutun te kedtuu zin, mid-isip sikandin te Megbevayà he metazeng. Ne migeraran sikandin he Emiǥu te Megbevayà.
59002024	Ne tenged dutun egkesavut ta he ed-isipen ki he metazeng te Megbevayà ke zuen menge ulaula ta he meupiya he tuus te kedtuu ta ne kenà tenged te kedtuu zà he wazè din tuus.
59002025	Ne iring dutun daan is kedtuu ni Rahab, is bahi zengan he mezaat is dengeg din. Umba mid-isip sikandin he metazeng te Megbevayà su zuen meupiya he mid-ulaula zin su impeseled din te valey zin is menge suǥù ni Josue, ne midtevangan din sikandan wey zan mekepelaǥuy pinaaǥi te selakew en he ibayà.
59002026	Is lawa te etew, emun wazè din en gehinawa, egketuusan ta he minatey en ne wazè din en pulus. Ne iring din ded daan is kedtuu te minsan hentei su emun kenè egkezumahan haazà is kedtuu te menge ulaula he meupiya, wazà daan pulus dutun te kedtuu zin.
59003001	Menge suled, deyzey ke kenà mezakel keniyu is egkesuat he ebpenurù, su sikami is ebpenurù, utew meheǥet keuzemà is kedsusiya kenami te Megbevayà, kenà te ebpepenurù kenami.
59003002	Sikitew is menusiyà, layun kiw egkesayep te mezakel he paaǥi. Ne ke zuen etew he kenà egkesayep pinaaǥi te kegkaǥi zin, wazè en igkesewayi kandin. Egkeveyveyaan din is tivuuk he lawa zin wey kenà mekeulaula te mezaat.
59003003	Egkekangan ta is kudà su wey ta meveyveyai ke hendei ta ibpepevayà.
59003004	Ne minsan is utew zekelà he barku he egkeuwit te mevendes he keramag, egketandang ta is ibayè din pinaaǥi te utew zeisek he pengawid din.
59003005	Ne iring din ded daan is dilà te etew su minsan pa te utew zeisey egkeǥamit gihapun te kedentala te zekelà he ibpezalig. Ne iring daan dutun is ketelunan su minsan pa te utew meluag egkevinsulan gihapun te zeisek he hapuy.
59003006	Ne iring daan te hapuy is dilà te etew su ebpekezezaat ne iyan puunà te minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula. Pinaaǥi te zilà egkeeneb te mezaat is tivuuk he isip ta wey ǥehinawa ta. Iyan ebpekerasey kenita te tivuuk he untung ta; iring te hapuy he ziyà ebpuun te Impirnu.
59003007	Netuenan ta he egkeveyveyaan te etew is minsan hengkey he linimbag su zuen nelayam he menge langgam, menge tagbis, menge pait, wey minsan menge uled.
59003008	Iyan, wazè pa etew he nekevayàbayà te zilè din. Utew lalung is dilè ta ne kenà egkeeǥen. Iring te hilu su ebpekezezaat.
59003009	Egemiten ta is dilè ta emun ebpeselematan ta is Amey tew he Nengazen, ne nasì ta zaan egemita ke ebpenrewakan ta is menge zuma ta he midlimbag te Megbevayà he iring te zagwey zin.
59003010	Utew heini igkeinuinu su sebsevaha zà is puunà te kedrawak wey kebpeselamat! Menge suled, kenà heini meupiya.
59003011	Emun penenglitan duen kalut, kenà egkehimu he zutun ebpuun is wahig he meupiya wey is wahig he mepait.
59003012	Menge suled, emun ebeǥas is kayu he igira kenà egkehimu he ulivu is beǥas din. Ne emun ebeǥas is gawed he paras kenà egkehimu he igira is beǥas din. Ke zuen kalut he zutun ebpuun is wahig he mepait, kenà egkehimu he zutun ebpuun is wahig he kenà mepait.
59003013	Is minsan hentei keniyu he metau wey zekelà is selevutan, ipeehè din pinaaǥi te meupiya he ulaula zin. Kinahanglan he kenà sikandin mepelevawen dutun te kebpaahaa zin te ketau zin pinaaǥi te menge meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan din.
59003014	Iyan, emun egkesina sikandin wey mepelevawen, kinahanglan he kenè din izantal is ketau zin wey is meupiya he ulaula zin su tarù is ketau he iring dutun ne ebpekesupak te tutuu he tuluuwen.
59003015	Kenà haazà sikan is ketau he ebpuun te Megbevayà, kekenà, dini zà ebpuun te kelibutan. Kenà iyan is ketau he ibeǥey te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kekenà, ebpuun te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
59003016	Ke zuen menge etew he egkesina wey mepelevawen, utew zan egkesemuki ne ed-ul-ulahan dan is minsan hengkey he mezaat.
59003017	Is etew he ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà is ketau zin, wazà igkesewayi kandin. Melinew is kedepitè din te zuma he etew, ebpurungan din is menge zuma zin; kenà sikandin mevurut, kekenà, mepezumdumahan. Hihizuwen wey metulanged sikandin; wazè din ibpelavi he minsan hentei ne kenà uvag dà is kedtuu zin.
59003018	Iring te venì is kelinew. Ibpemula te menge menhuhusey ne iyan egkeraǥun dutun is metazeng he menge ulaula.
59004001	Hengkey is puunà te menge kesevaan wey tebek diyan te keniyu? Iyan is menge mezaat he kebayè niw he ebpekigkuntada te meupiya he ulaula.
59004002	Duen egkesuatan niw he kenè niw egkekuwa ne tenged dutun ebpekeisip kew te kebpemumunù. Duen egkeimahan niw, iyan, kenè niw egkeangken ne tenged dutun ebpekidsavè kew wey ebpekidtebek kew. Umba kenè niw egkekuwa is egkesuatan niw su kenè niw ebuyuen diyà te Megbevayà.
59004003	Ne minsan ke ebuyuen niw ziyà te kandin, kenè din ibeǥey su mezaat is tuyù niw te kebuyua niw kayi. Iyan ketezengan te kebuyù niw is wey niw metuman is mezaat he kebayè niw.
59004004	Kenè kew metinumanen te pesarig niw ziyà te Megbevayà. Wazè niw ves metueni he emun iyan niw egkesuatan is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan te menge kuntada te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan, ne menge kuntada kew zaan te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei he iyan egkesuatan din is mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan, mibpekigkuntada sikandin te Megbevayà.
59004005	Kenè niw isipa he kenà tutuu sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is gehinawa he imbeǥey kenita te Megbevayà, nehimu he mezesen is kegkesuati zin te mezaat he ulaula,
59004006	iyan, mezesen pa utew is tavang kenita te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun duen insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Egkuntedahan te Megbevayà is mepelevawen, iyan, edtevangan din mulà is ebpesakup kandin.
59004007	Ne tenged dutun, pesakup kew te Megbevayà. Sukuli niw si Setanas ne ebpelaǥuy keniyu.
59004008	Aput kew ziyà te Megbevayà ne ed-uvayan kew zin. Sikiyu is mekesesalà, engkezi niw is menge ulaula niw he mezaat. Sikiyu is uvag dà is kedtuu zan, pelumpiyuwi niw te Megbevayà is isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw.
59004009	Meseeng kew tenged te menge ulaula niw he mezaat; medluǥib kew wey medsineǥew kew; kenè kew engit, kekenà, erang kew; kenè kew medlipey, kekenà, mebmezaat is gehinawa niw.
59004010	Pesakup kew te Megbevayà, ne ibpelavew kew zin.
59004011	Menge suled, kenè kew mebpesudsudiey wey mebpesewsewayà su is edsudì wey edsawey te zuma zin he tumutuu, ne iring te edsudien din wey edsewayen din is lavew he suǥù. Ne emun edsewayen ta haazà is suǥù, kenè ta edtumanen, kekenà, edsumpeliten ta.
59004012	Sebsevaha zà is ebpuunan te kesuǥuan he iyan is Megbevayà ne sebsevaha zà daan is duen din keǥehem te kedhukum te menge ulaula te menusiyà ne iyan ded daan is Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin edsilut ne iyan daan ebpekelibri te silut. Iyan, sikita mulà, wazè ta keǥehem te kedhukum te minsan hentei.
59004013	Pemineg kew, sikiyu is egkaǥi te, Guntaan ne emun kenà ne keeselem, edhendiyè ki te sevaha he inged. Ne zutun ki ebpetiǥayun taman te sengetuig wey ki mekemanggad.
59004014	Turebung kew su minsan is keeselem dà he hitavù, kenè ta egketuenan. Is untung ta zini te kelibutan, ne utew mevavà ne iring te menipis he ǥapun he egketik-ew egkeahà ne egketik-ew zaan egkeawà.
59004015	Meupiya pa ke egkaǥi ki te, Emun idtuǥut kenita te Nengazen he kenè ki pa ebpatey, ebeelan ta is iring dutun.
59004016	Iyan, sikiyu mulà, memepedeliǥen su idantal niw is ed-ul-ulahan niw, ne mezaat is iring dutun.
59004017	Tentenuzi niw he ke netuenan te minsan hentei kenitew ke hengkey is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan ne kenè din ed-ul-ulahan, nekesalà sikandin diyà te Megbevayà.
59005001	Pemineg kew zaan, sikiyu is sepian. Sineǥew kew; erang kew, su utew merasey is egkeulaula niw keuzemà.
59005002	Egkeredak en is menge ketiǥeyunan niw. Egketketen te ipes is manggad niw.
59005003	Midtangis is menge selapì niw wey vulawan su wazè niw ǥemita he idtavang. Ne is tangis, iyan tuus te keleleǥed niw ne tenged dutun utew mepait is silut keniyu keuzemà te andew te kedlimasa te menusiyà; su midtipiǥan niw is dekelà he kewasa kayi te menge ketepusan he andew.
59005004	Is selapì he wazè niw isuhul te edterebahu ziyà te menge tanè niw, ne iyan idsumbunga zan keniyu ziyà te Megbevayà. Is sumbung keniyu te nemenlegtey ziyà te menge luti niw, nezineg en te utew mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen.
59005005	Dini te kelibutan utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk niw ne edlipey kew layun, iyan, iring kew ǥuntaan te nati he ibpelambù he edlepaan su kunaan niw ke kenè kew egkesaut te andew te kedsilut.
59005006	Su impesilutan niw wey mibunù niw is menge metazeng he etew, minsan pa te wazè dan medsukul keniyu.
59005007	Ne sikiyu is menge zuma ku he tumutuu, kinahanglan he meinentusen kew taman te kedlikù te Nengazen. Su is ebasuk, ebpekeantus te kedtaǥad din taman te edsebpet en is impemula zin diyà te tanè din. Edteǥazan din is uzan he ebpetuvù te pinemula zin wey is ebpeketesan te pinemula zin.
59005008	Ne sikitew zaan, kinahanglan he ed-entusen tew is kebpeketaǥad tew. Edheǥeten tew is kedsarig tew su meǥaan en is andew te kedlikù te Nengazen.
59005009	Kenè kew, menge suled, meked-eepesà su wey kenè kew mesiluti te Megbevayà. Meǥaan en ebpekeuma is edsusi te menge ulaula ta; iring te ziyè en te ǥemawan.
59005010	Menge suled, ed-iringan ta is kebmeinentusen te menge ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà su zutun te kebpesevuta zan te Lalag te Nengazen nekeantus dan te kemeresayan.
59005011	Netuenan ta he utew sikandan deyzey su nekeantus dan te merasey. Netuenan niw en is kebmeinentusen dengan ni Hob wey is kedtuvazi kandin te Megbevayà dutun te nepasad en is penggezam kandin. Hihizuwen wey veliǥeǥawen is Nengazen.
59005012	Menge suled, ebeleuzan ku sikiyu he emun duen ibpesarig niw kenè niw heǥeta pinaaǥi te kebpengulivet wey kedsesapà. Kenè kew medsesapà pinaaǥi te kegemita niw te minsan hengkey ziyà te langit wey zini te tanà te kebenara niw te menge lalag niw. Uya zà wey wazà is gemita niw su wey kenè kew mesiluti te Megbevayà.
59005013	Ke zuen minsan hentei keniyu he egkeseeng, kinahanglan he med-ampù. Ke zuen egkelipey, megkanta sikandin te kedalig te Megbevayà.
59005014	Ke zuen egkezeruwan, kinahanglan he tewaǥa zin is menge ebmeǥurangen te menge tumutuu wey zan ikeampù wey meitisi sikandin te lana he ebpengumawen dan is ngazan te Nengazen.
59005015	Is ked-ampù dan, emun hustu is kedsarig dan te Megbevayà, ne iyan igkeulii te egkezeruwan su ebewian sikandin te Nengazen, ne egkepesaylu sikandin te menge salè din.
59005016	Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he petudtudtulè kew te menge salè niw su wey iampù te kada sevaha is duma zin ne wey meulii is egkengezeruwan. Utew mekeǥeǥehem is ked-ampù te metazeng he etew.
59005017	Si Elias dengan, etew zà sikandin he iring kenitew. Ne minsan pa zutun mezesen is ked-ampù din he kenà med-uzan ne wazà iyan mekeuzan taman te tetelu he tuig wey tengà.
59005018	Ne mid-ampù en maan, ne mid-uzan te mereǥes ne human meketuvù is menge pinemula.
59005019	Menge suled, ke zuen sevaha keniyu he egkesuwey zin wey egkelipatan din is tutuu he tuluuwen ne zuen ebpeketavang kandin wey mekelikù,
59005020	tentenuzi niw he is neketavang kandin, nehimu en he paaǥi wey melibri sikandin te silut. Ne pinaaǥi zutun egkepesaylu is utew mezakel he menge salà dutun he etew.
60001001	Iyan a si Pedro is teǥisurat kayi. Epustul a ni Jesu Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, suǥù din . Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu is nengaaram te Megbevayà he nemekedsuwey ziyà te ǥawas te inged niw. Is duma keniyu, ne ziyà mekepelaǥuy te prubinsya he Puntu, is duma, ne ziyà te menge prubinsya he Gelasya wey Kepedusya, wey Asya, wey Bitinya.
60001002	Nengaaram kew te Megbevayà he Amey tew sumalà is kebayè din dengan he iyan is: edhimuwen kew zin he metazeng pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin wey kew mehimu he menge sakup ni Jesu Kristu ne wey kew zaan mepesaylu tenged te kebpelisi keniyu te lengesa ni Jesus. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew zin wey mebmelinawen kew utew.
60001003	Utew zekelà is kebpeselemati tew te Megbevayà he iyan Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Su tenged te zekelà is hizu zin kenitew, mibeǥayan kiw zin te veǥu en he untung. Ne ǥuntaan ebpekeperateng kiw he egkevanhew kiw keuzemà su mibanhew zin si Jesu Kristu.
60001004	Ne elin daan egkeperateng tew is utew meupiya he idtuvad din kenitew. Inteǥana zin en heini ziyà te langit ne zutun kenà egkeredak, kenà egkezeetan, ne kenà daan egkehanew.
60001005	Kenitew en haazà is inteǥana zin. Tenged te nekesarig kiw kandin, nelig-enan kiw te ǥehem te Megbevayà te kemulu kiw pa edtaǥad te kedtulusa zin kenitew keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu.
60001006	Ne tenged dutun ebpekelipey kew en minsan pa te egkeseeng kew zè pa ǥuntaan tenged te mezakel he menge kemeresayan he egkeantus niw.
60001007	Is kedtuu niw, ne iring te vulawan su egezaman is bulawan pinaaǥi te hapuy su wey ikepaahà ke tutuu ve. Umba idtuǥut te Megbevayà he mekeantus kew te merasey su wey pinaaǥi te kemeresayan meǥezami is kedtuu niw ke tutuu ve wey ke kenà. Mahal pa is kedtuu niw kenà is bulawan su melemu egkezeeti is bulawan. Ne emun tutuu is kedtuu niw, edeliǥen kew, ebentuǥen kew, wey edtehuzen kew keuzemà emun ibpeǥawaǥawa en si Jesu Kristu.
60001008	Utew mahal sikandin diyan te ǥehinawa niw minsan wazè niw pa maahà. Ne edsarig kew kandin minsan pa te kenè niw en sikandin egkeahà guntaan. Ne utew man dekelà is kelipey niw he kenà igkeseysey
60001009	su egkezawat niw en guntaan is kedlibriya keniyu te silut he iyan ebperetengan niw tenged te midtuu kew kandin.
60001010	Is ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, mibpurungan dan istudyuwi is kedlibriya zin kenita te silut wey netagnè dan heini is kedtuvazi zin kenita.
60001011	Mid-istudyuwan dan ke keenu wey ke egkemenumenu is kegketuman kayi, su in-ulin heini kandan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ebpuun diyà te ki Kristu. Impesavut din kandan he zuen menge kemeresayan he egkeantus ni Kristu zini te kelibutan ne emun egketapus haazà edhimuwen sikandin he utew lavew.
60001012	Impezayag kandan te Megbevayà he kenà kandan he ibmeupiya haazà is netagnè dan dutun, kekenà, kenitew ǥuntaan. Ne ǥuntaan impesavut en keniyu is tutuu mehitenged dutun te netagnè dan.
