Duen menge etew he midsuǥù te Megbevayà su wey zan metudtul keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Mid-ulinan sikandan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he midsuǥù te Megbevayà. Ne heini is impesavut dan keniyu, minsan is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ziyà te langit, egkesuatan dan he mesavut dan heini.
60001013	Ne ǥeina te iyan haazà, kinahanglan he ed-andam ki wey ki mekepurung mekeisip-isip su wey ta layun mepurungi is kedsunud ta te Nengazen. Kinahanglan he iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa ta is kebperateng ta te utew meupiya he ibeǥey te Megbevayà kenita keuzemà dutun te andew te kebpeǥawaǥawa ni Jesu Kristu.
60001014	Geina te menge anak ki te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he edtumanen ta is menge suǥù din; kenè ta iyan ebpezumdumahan is mezaat he kebayè ta he edtumanen ta layun dengan hein wazè te pa metueni is tutuu he tuluuwen.
60001015	Ne ǥuntaan kinahanglan he wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula tew iring te wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula te Megbevayà he iyan nengelintau wey kiw meketuu.
60001016	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Kinahanglan he wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula niw su wazà igkesewayi te kedì he menge ulaula.
60001017	Ne ǥeina te mibpetavang ki te Amey ta he Megbevayà kinahanglan he utew meheǥet is kedtehuza ta kandin te zini ki pa ed-ubpà te kelibutan. Iyan sikandin edsusi te menge ulaula te menusiyà sumalà is mid-ulaula te kada sevaha ne wazè din ibpelavi he minsan hentei.
60001018	Netuenan ta he utew mahal is imbelukas din kenita. Su nengeuripen ki zengan te menge ulaula he wazà pulus he imbilinbilin kenita te menge kepuun ta. Sikan is imbelukas din kenita, ne kenà iring te selapì wey vulawan he egkeawà is bali zin.
60001019	Iyan imbelukas din si Kristu he impelengesa he utew mevali. Iring sikandin te nati he kerehidu he wazà igkesawey zuen he impemuhat.
60001020	Te wazè pa limbaǥa is kelibutan, daan en si Kristu he intezù te Megbevayà wey mehimu he Menluluwas tew. Ne kayi te timpu ǥuntaan, impezayag sikandin wey kiw mevelukasi.
60001021	Pinaaǥi kandin neketuu kiw te Megbevayà. Mibanhew sikandin te Megbevayà ne midhimu zin sikandin he utew lavew. Ne tenged kayi iyan edseriǥan tew ǥuntaan is Megbevayà ne ebpekeperateng kiw he edhimuwen kiw zin daan he utew lavew.
60001022	Ne ǥeina te nemeketuu kew en te tutuu he tuluuwen nengelumpiyuwan kew en te mezaat he ulaula ne kenà tarù is kebmahala niw te menge zuma niw he tumutuu. Minsan pa zutun, heǥeta niw pa is kebmahala niw ziyan te ǥehinawa niw te kada sevaha te menge zuma niw.
60001023	Su mid-umanan ki limbaǥa te Megbevayà ne veǥu ki en maan he etew pinaaǥi te wazà pidtemanan he Lalag te Megbevayà he iyan ebpekeveǥey te untung.
60001024	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is menusiyà, geina te mevavè dà utew is untung din, iring sikandin te sagbet. Su is kempet din, ne iring te kevukad te sagbet. Meǥaan egkeǥangu is sagbet, ne egkengeulug is kevukazan din.
60001025	Iyan, is Lalag te Megbevayà, kenà mulà egkehanew te wazà pidtemanan. Ne is Lalag te Megbevayà, ne iyan impesavut keniyu
60002001	Ne ǥeina te veǥu ki en he etew, ed-iniyuǥan te en is minsan hengkey he kebpesipala wey is kedtarùtarù. Kinahanglan he kenà tarù is kedsundan ta te Megbevayà; kenè ki egkesina ne kenè ki ebpemenulà.
60002002	Ed-iring ki zuen te vatà he kemulu pa edsusu he layun egkesuat te ǥatas. Kinahanglan he layun ki ed-inum te ǥatas he iyan is waǥas he Lalag te Megbevayà su wey layun mebmezesen is kedtuu ta taman te timpu keuzemà he edtulusen ki te Megbevayà.
60002003	Su neǥezaman niw en he utew veliǥeǥawen keniyu is Nengazen tew.
60002004	Pevayàbayè kew en te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he iyan ebeǥey te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Iring sikandin te vatu he pengawid te valey he kenà edewaten te menge pandey. Wazà sikandin dewata te menge etew, iyan, iyan sikandin mibpilì te Megbevayà su utew sikandin mahal.
60002005	Ne sikitew zaan is mibeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan, ebpevayàbayè kiw kandin wey kiw zaan mehimu he iring te menge vatu he pengawid te valey he zutun ed-ezapa is Megbevayà. Ne zutun te valey zin edhimuwen kiw zin en he menge memumuhat he mibpilì din. Ne zutun, pinaaǥi te kedtavang ni Jesu Kristu, ebpekepemuhat kiw ne iyan pemuhat he egkesuatan din is: ed-ezapen tew sikandin pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
60002006	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Duen mibpilì ku he hadì he iring sikandin te vatu he mahal utew. Idsavuk ku sikandin diyà te inged he Siyun. Iring sikandin te melig-en he vatu he ebpeuntuzan te valey. Is minsan hentei he edsarig kandin, kenè en egkeanggà, su iyan sikandin sikan is tutuu he edseriǥan. Iyan heini insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.
60002007	Ne heini is hadì he iring te vatu, mahal utew sikandin dini te kenita te nekesarig en kandin, iyan, is langun he kenà edtuu, netuman pinaaǥi kandan is insurat he tagnà he edhenduen te, Sikan is batu he pengawid te valey, mid-engkezan te menge pandey. Ne heini, nehimu en guntaan he vatu he iyan dà ebpekepurung te valey.
60002008	Ne zuen daan tagnà he netuman he edhenduen te, Iyan haazà sikan is batu he nesipà te menge etew; iyan haazà nekeseligkat kandan. Wazè dan medtuu te Lalag te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun, sumalà is netagnà, nekeurambak sikandan su iyan imbanglis te Megbevayà dutun te kenà edtuu.
60002009	Iyan, sikitew mulà, pinilì kiw zin. Menge memumuhat kiw te mibpilì he hadì he iyan si Kristu. Iyan kiw menge sakup din; iyan kiw menge ǥaked din he etew. Umba mibpilì kiw zin su wey tew mesangyew is tudtul te utew egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin. Iyan sikandin nengelintau wey kiw meketuu wey kiw maawà dutun te kerusireman. Ne ǥuntaan edteyawan kiw zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, utew en meupiya is kedtuvazi zin kenitew .
60002010	Su zengan kenè kiw menge sakup te Megbevayà ne ǥuntaan menge sakup kiw zin en. Dengan wazè tew hanew zutun te hizu te Megbevayà, iyan, guntaan impezayag din en kenitew.
60002011	Menge minahal ku he suled, kenè en hustu he inged tew heini is kelibutan su menge humuhulevungà kiw zà dini. Ne tenged dutun edhengyuan ku sikiyu he kenè niw pezumdumahi is menge mezaat he kebayè niw su ebpekesanggen heini te kedsundan niw te Megbevayà.
60002012	Kinahanglan he utew metazeng is menge ulaula niw su wey maahà te menge etew he kenà tumutuu. Su minsan ke egkeǥiyen dan he mezaat is ulaula niw, egketuenan dan gihapun he meupiya is ed-ul-ulahan niw ne ebpekezalig dan te Megbevayà keuzemà te andew te kebulusi zin te menusiyà.
60002013	Kinahanglan he edtumanen niw is midtukud he velaud diyan te inged niw su iyan heini egkesuatan te Nengazen. Ebpesakup ki te lavew he hadì su iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te langun.
60002014	Ebpesakup ki zaan te gubirnedur su iyan midsuǥù te lavew he hadì wey zin siluti is menge mesinupaken ne wey zin daan deliǥa is menge metazeng.
60002015	Umba edhengyuen ku heini su egkesuatan te Megbevayà he is menge mepedeligen he wazà mekesavut te hustu, meehè dan is menge metazeng he ulaula tew. Ne pinaaǥi kayi ebpekeengked dan is edsudì kenitew.
60002016	Ne ǥeina te nelibri kiw en te Megbevayà, egkehimu he iyan kiw en ebayàbayà te ed-ul-ulahan tew, iyan, kinahanglan he kenè tew edhimuwen is kelibriyanan tew he pesangil wey kiw mekeulaula te mezaat. Su minsan pa te nelibri kiw en, kinahanglan he menge suluǥuen kiw ǥihapun te Megbevayà.
60002017	Edtehuzen tew is langun he menge etew; ebmahalen tew is langun he menge suled tew te kedtuu. Igkehandek ta is ked-ulaula te kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà; edtehuzen ta is keǥehem te lavew he hadì.
60002018	Sikita is suluǥuen, ebpesakup ki te egalen ta ne hustu is kedtehuza ta kandin. Kenè ta iyan dà ebpezumdumahan is egalen he metulanged wey meupiya is ulaula zin, kekenà, ebpezumdumahan ta zaan is melemu he egkepauk.
60002019	Su edtuvazan ki te Megbevayà emun tenged te kedtumana ta te egkesuatan din, egkeantus ta is kedresaya kenita te egalen ta minsan pa te wazè ki mekesalà.
60002020	Iyan, kenè ki zait he edtuvazan te meupiya emun iyan igkeentusa ta te kedsiluti kenita is mezaat he ulaula ta. Iyan, ke ebpekeantus ki te merasey te wazà mezaat he mid-ulaula ta, edtuvazan ki te Megbevayà.
60002021	Nekeantus si Kristu te merasey wey ki melibri te silut. Ne nehimu sikandin he petug-iringan he kinahanglan he edsunuzen ta. Umba mibpetuu kenitew is Megbevayà su wey tew si Kristu meiringi.
60002022	Wazà minsan hengkey he salà he neveelan ni Kristu. Wazà minsan hengkey he tarù he migkaǥi zin.
60002023	Hein edsumpeliten sikandin duen te kedrensanga kandin wazà sikandin medtavak te mezaat; wazà sikandin mebpenrawak. Is kebelesi zutun te edrasey kandin, insarig din diyà te Megbevayà he iyan kes metazeng is kedhukum din.
60002024	Iyan si Kristu midsilutan tenged te menge salè tew zutun te kedrensanga kandin diyà te krus. Umba iyan sikandin midsilutan su wey tew meengkezi is menge mezaat he ulaula ne wey tew iyan meulaula is metazeng. Is menge palì din dutun, ne iyan nekevawì kenitew.
60002025	Iring kiw zengan te menge ayam he kerehidu he nengetazin, iyan, guntaan impeulì kiw en diyà te Megbevayà he iyan bekidu he metau he ebantey kenitew.
60003001	Sikiyu zaan is menge vahi, kinahanglan he pesakup kew te esawa niw ne zutun minsan ke kenè dan edtuu te Lalag te Megbevayà kela ke ebpeketuu zan ded ke egkeehè dan is menge ulaula niw he memeupiya. Su iyan heini egkehimu he wali niw kandan.
60003002	su egkeehè dan is kedtahud niw te Megbevayà wey is ulaula niw he wazà igkesewayi zuen.
60003003	Sikiyu is menge vahi, kenè niw isipa he iyan ibmekempet niw is pinaaǥi te utew subra he kedeyzeyani niw te vulvul niw wey te kedsul-uva niw te menge mahal he vutang iring te vulawan wey mahal he bisti.
60003004	Su kinahanglan he iyan ibmekempet niw is meupiya he ulaula he ebpuun te ǥehinawa niw he iring te menayù he kegkaǥi, wey is melinawen he ulaula su is kekempet he iring kayi, ne kenà mulà egkeawà, ne utew mahal ziyà te Megbevayà.
60003005	Is menge vahi zengan he midsarig te Megbevayà, iyan heini kandan he inmekempet. Mibpesakup sikandan te menge esawa zan
60003006	he iring ki Sara he mibpesakup daan te esawa zin he si Abraham. Neisip din he egalen din si Abraham. Ne sikiyu is menge vahi ǥuntaan, egkehimu kew he iring te menge anak ni Sara emun ed-iringan niw is ulaula zin he metazeng wey ke kenè niw idtuǥut he egkesamuk is isip niw te kegkehandek.
60003007	Sikita zaan is maama, kinahanglan he ebpurungan ta wey edtehuzen ta is esawa ta. Su minsan pa te meluya is lawa zan kenà is kenita, iring sikandan kenita su imbeǥey zaan kandan te Megbevayà is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he edtehuzen ta sikandan su wey pemineǥa te Megbevayà is kebpengampù ta.
60003008	Duen pa egkeǥiyen ku keniyu te langun ne iyan is: kinahanglan he mesevaha is isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw. Mebpepurpurungè kew wey megiǥineǥawè kew su iring kew en te teltelesuled. Kinahanglan he memetulanged kew wey kenè kew menge mepelevawen.
60003009	Ke zuen ebpesipala keniyu kenè niw velesi te mezaat. Ke zuen edrawak keniyu kenè niw zaan penrewaki, kekenà, belesi niw te meupiya. Su umba midhimu kew te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu su wey kew zin metuvazi te meupiya.
60003010	Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Sikan is egkesuat he meupiya is ked-ubpè din dini te kelibutan wey layun melipey, kinahanglan he kenà mezaat is kebpemèbè din ne kenà edtarùtarù.
60003011	Engkezi zin en is memezaat he ulaula ne layun meupiya is menge ulaula zin. Layun din pen-ahaa is melinawen he kedepitè dan te menge zuma zin.
60003012	Su iyan ebentayan te Megbevayà is memetazeng he etew; ebpemineǥen din is ked-ampù dan. Iyan, egkuntedahan din mulà is ed-ulaula te mezaat.
60003013	Wazà edhilavet keniyu ke edhamen kew te ked-ulaula te meupiya.
60003014	Iyan, minsan ke ebpekeantus kew te kebpesipala tenged te metazeng is ed-ul-ulahan niw, medlipey kew. Kenè kew mahandek te etew zà duen ne kenè kew meseeng.
60003015	Layun niw isipa he iyan egalen niw si Kristu. Layun niw endama is tavak ke zuen ed-insà keniyu ke maan is ebpekesarig kew te Megbevayà.
60003016	Mebmetinehuzen kew is edtavak wey menayù is kegkaǥi niw. Kinahanglan he wazà salà he netaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa niw te menge sumusundan ni Kristu su emun wazà ulaula niw he mezaat egkeeled is edsudì keniyu tenged te egkeǥiyen dan.
60003017	Deyzey ke ebpekeantus ki te merasey tenged te metazeng is ulaula ta, ke iyan intuvad kenita te Megbevayà, kenà ke ebpekeantus ki te merasey tenged te mezaat is ulaula ta.
60003018	Kesevaha zà is kebpehimatey ni Kristu wey mepesaylu is menge salè tew. Mibpehimatey su wey mehimu sikandin is metazeng he elili tew te kenà memetazeng wey kiw mehimu he menge ǥaked te Megbevayà. Nepatey is lawa zin, iyan, nevanhew sikandin
60003019	ne mibeyaan din minsan is nengepirisu he ǥimukud te nemematey zengan ne midweliyan din sikandan.
60003020	Iyan heini menge etew zengan he wazà mebpemineg te Megbevayà dutun te timpu zengan hein ebpelevayen din dà is memezaat he ulaula zan taman te nepasad ni Noe is kebeeli zin te arka. Walu zà he etew is nekeseled dutun te arka wey zan melibri te wahig.
60003021	Ne iyan teǥialung kayi te wahig is kebewtismu he ebpekelibri kenitew te silut. Ne haazà is kebewtismu, ne kenà iyan is kedlumpiyuwi te lawa tew ziyà te wahig, kekenà, iyan is kedhengyui tew te Megbevayà he maawè din is menge salè tew. Egkehimu heini tenged te mibanhew zin si Jesu Kristu.
60003022	Diyà si Jesus med-ulì te langit ne ǥuntaan diyà sikandin ebpimpinuu te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà tuus te utew lavew sikandin. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te langun he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà wey te menge kedesenan wey te minsan hentei ziyà te langit he zuen din gehem.
60004001	Ne netuenan ta he si Kristu, hein dini pa te kelibutan, nekeantus sikandin te merasey. Tenged dutun kinahanglan he andam kew zaan te ked-antus te merasey su is etew he ebpekeantus te merasey, egkeawè en diyà te kandin is suat din te ked-ulaula te mezaat.
60004002	Ne tenged kayi, puun dutun taman te kebpatey zin egkehimu he kenè din en human edtumanen is mezaat he kebayà te lawa zin, kekenà, iyan din edtumanen is egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
60004003	Su kinahanglan he kenè niw en maan ul-ulaha sikan is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan he egkesuatan te menge etew he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà. Su zengan meremerik is ulaula niw; mezaat is egkesuatan te lawa niw; lelenguten kew ne mezaat is kelenganan he ibpelepew niw ziyà te menge keemuran he zutun kew ebpenginum. Utew kew egkeepesi te Megbevayà su kenà tutuu he megbevayà is ed-ezapen niw.
60004004	Iyan, guntaan, is menge etew he kenà edtuu te Megbevayà, utew zan egkeinuinu su maan is kenè kew en edtampu kandan te ed-ulaula te utew memezaat wey memahawag ne tenged dutun edsumpeliten kew zan.
60004005	Keuzemà ke ziyà sikandan ibpeetuvang te Megbevayà ed-insaan din sikandan ke maan is mid-ulaula zan te mezaat. Andam en sikandin te kedsusi te nengeulaula te nemematey en wey te menge uuyag pa.
60004006	Sikan is menge etew he nemematey en, impesavut en kandan dengan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun diyà te Megbevayà su wey meveǥayi sikandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan minsan pa te kenè dan egkelikayan is kebpatey te lawa zan su iyan silut te Megbevayà diyà te tivuuk he menusiyà.
60004007	Kenè en utew egkeuǥet is ketepusan te kelibutan. Ne tenged dutun, kinahanglan he hustu is ked-isip-isip niw. Kinahanglan daan he purungi niw is menge ulaula niw su wey mehustu is ked-ampù niw ziyà te Megbevayà.
60004008	Kinahanglan he iyan lavew he edhemenan niw is kebmahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw te minsan hentei he zuma niw he tumutuu su emun ebmahalen ta is menge zuma ta melemu ki zà ebpekepesaylu te menge salè dan kenita.
60004009	Kinahanglan he utew kew metulanged is ebpepemenahik te menge humehulevungà diyan te valey niw.
60004010	Is minsan hengkey he ketau he imbeǥey te Megbevayà diyà te kada sevaha keniyu, kinahanglan he ǥemita zin wey metevangi is menge zuma zin he tumutuu su wey hustu is kegemita niw te minsan hengkey he intavang keniyu te Megbevayà.
60004011	Sikita is edwali, kinahanglan he is kedwali ta, ne utew hustu he iring te iyan en edwali is Megbevayà. Sikita is edtavang, ne kinahanglan he kenè ta edlipatan he is idtavang ta, ne ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà su wey pinaaǥi te ǥehem ni Jesu Kristu iyan mevantug is Megbevayà te minsan keenu su iyan dait he edeliǥen wey zait he ebayàbayà te wazà pidtemanan.
60004012	Minahal ku he menge suled, kenè kew meinuinu tenged te utew merasey he penggezam he egkeantus niw en tenged te kedtuu niw. Su emun tumutuu ki, ebpekeantus ki layun te merasey.
60004013	Kenè kew meinuinu, kekenà, lipey kew utew su pinaaǥi kayi ebpekeambit kew te menge kemeresayan he naantus ni Kristu ne tenged dutun utew kew zaan egkelipey keuzemà ke ibpezayag din kenitew haazà is bulawan he ed-ulian.
60004014	Utew kew zeyzey ke edsudien kew tenged te menge sumusundan kew ni Kristu su tuus heini he mid-ulinan kew te mekeǥeǥehem he Mulin-ulin he iyan is Megbevayà.
60004015	Kinahanglan he kenè niw iyan igkerasey is kedsiluti keniyu tenged te kebpemumunù, kebpemenakew, ked-ulaula te minsan hengkey he mezaat, wey te kebpenhilavet dutun te wazè niw ketenged.
60004016	Iyan, ke iyan niw ibpekeantus te merasey is tenged te neketuu kew ki Kristu, kenè niw haazà ikeeled, kekenà, utew zekelà is kebpeselemati niw te Megbevayà su neǥaked kew ni Kristu.
60004017	Iyan heini, menge suled, timpu he pinaaǥi te merasey he egkeulaula ebpuunan te Megbevayà is kedsusiya zin te menge ulaula te menusiyà. Edhunaan din edsusiya is menge sakup din. Ne emun iyan kiw zin is menge tumutuu edhunaan din, utew pa merasey is egketemanan te menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te Meupiya he Tudtulanen he impesavut kandan te Megbevayà.
60004018	Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Emun mereǥen he edlibriyen te silut is menge metazeng he etew, iyan pe be melibri sikan is menge etew he edsukul te Megbevayà wey memezaat is ulaula!
60004019	Ne tenged dutun, menge suled, ke ebpekeantus kew en te merasey su iyan intuvad keniyu te Megbevayà, isarig niw is gehinawa niw ziyà te kandin he iyan metinumanen he nenlimbag wey hemeni niw is memeupiya he ulaula.
60005001	Sikiyu is ebmeǥurangen te menge tumutuu, duen idhangyù ku keniyu su ebmeǥurangen a zaan. Nekevantey a te kedresaya zengan ki Kristu ne iring keniyu, ebpekeseled a zaan te vulawan he ed-ulian he ibpeǥawaǥawa keuzemà.
60005002	Ne iyan idhangyù ku keniyu is: purungi niw elimahi is menge tumutuu he insarig keniyu te Megbevayà. Iring sikandan te menge kerehidu zin. Iyan kew edumala kandan, kenà iring te ebpeǥesen kew, kekenà, kinahanglan he ebpuun te meliwanag he ǥehinawa niw su iyan haazà egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Kinahanglan he kenà iyan dà id-elimahi niw kandan is tenged te edsuhulan kew zan, kekenà, tenged te egkesuat kew he edtavang kandan.
60005003	Kenè kew medhadìhadì kandan te insarig keniyu, kekenà, eǥaka niw sikandan su wey iyan kew zan edsunuzen te menge meupiya he ulaula.
60005004	Ne emun edlikù si Jesus, sikan is lavew he ed-elima te menge kerehidu te Megbevayà, duen idsuhul zin keniyu he iyan is kebpekeambit niw te utew zin kegkelavew he kenà egkehanew.
60005005	Sikiyu menge menguhed, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he pevayàbayè kew te menge ebmeǥurangen. Kinahanglan he kenè kew mepelevawen, kekenà, mebpetebtevangè kew su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Kuntada te Megbevayà is mepelevawen, iyan, igkehizu zin is kenà ebpelavew.
60005006	Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he kenè kew mepelevawen, kekenà, pevayàbayè kew te Megbevayà he mekeǥeǥehem ne edhimuwen kew zin he utew lavew keuzemà te hustu he timpu.
60005007	Isarig niw ziyà te kandin is minsan hengkey he seeng niw su iyan sikandin ed-elima keniyu.
60005008	Med-andam kew, mebantey kew su is kuntada tew he si Setanas, edriǥuriǥu en he iring te erimaung he edhiniǥer su ebpen-ahà te edewiyen din.
60005009	Sukuli niw sikandin, ne hamen kew sarig te Megbevayà su netuenan niw he is menge zuma niw he tumutuu zini te tivuuk he kelibutan, ebpekeantus dan daan te merasey he iring te egkeantus niw.
60005010	Mevavè dà is ked-antus niw ne edheǥeten te Megbevayà is kedsarig niw kandin. Ebiǥeran kew zin, edlig-enan kew zin wey ebeǥayan kew zin te zesen. Iyan sikandin puunà te minsan hengkey he tavang kenitew. Midhimu kiw zin he tumutuu su wey pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu mekeambit kiw te wazà pidtemanan he utew kegkelavew zin.
60005011	Berakat he zeliǥa sikandin te wazà pidtemanan su iyan sikandin mekeǥeǥehem.
60005012	Mid-uǥupan a ni Silvanu te edsurat kayi. Suled tew sikandin he utew egkeseriǥi. Iyan insurati ku keniyu kayi su wey ku meheǥet is kedtuu niw. Ibpesavut ku keniyu he impenurù ku en keniyu he tutuu is gaǥew te Megbevayà keniyu. Ne kenè niw heini lipati.
60005013	Ebpengemusta keniyu is menge tumutuu zini te inged he Bebilunya. Pinilì sikandan te Megbevayà iring te pinilì kew zin daan. Ebpengemusta zaan keniyu si Marcos he iyan iring te tutuu he anak ku.
60005014	Mebpelimlimuey kew. Mebmelinawen is gehinawa te uman sevaha keniyu he nekidsevaha ki Kristu.
61001001	Iyan a si Simon Pedro is teǥisurat kayi. Suluǥuen a ni Jesu Kristu wey epustul zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, midsuǥù e zin . Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu is langun he neketuu ki Jesu Kristu. Megbevayà he Menluluwas tew sikandin. Geina te wazè din ibpelavi he minsan hentei, midhimu kew zin he tumutuu kandin iring te midhimu key zin daan he tumutuu.
61001002	Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew utew te Megbevayà wey mebmelinawen is gehinawa niw pinaaǥi te kegkesevuta niw te Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
61001003	Pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Megbevayà edtevangan kiw zin te mezakel he paaǥi wey kiw meketuman te menge suǥù din kayi te ked-ubpè tew zini te kelibutan. Umba egkehimu heini su impekilala en kenitew si Jesu Kristu he iyan mibpetuu kenitew wey kiw mekeambit te ketazeng din wey te utew zin kegkelavew.
61001004	Iyan heini kedtumana zin te penaad din he utew zekelà wey mahal is idtuvad din kenitew. Umba impenaad din heini su wey mekeiring is menge ulaula tew te menge ulaula te Megbevayà ne mekelikey kiw zini te kelibutan te kedtumana te menge mezaat he kebayè tew su ebpekezezaat heini kenitew.
61001005	Ne ǥeina te iyan heini intavang din kenitew kinahanglan he edhimuwen ta is taman te egkehimu ta su wey meheǥeti is kedtuu ta kandin te menge meupiya he ulaula. Ne is menge meupiya he ulaula, kinahanglan he edheǥetan ta te kegkesevuta te hustu.
61001006	Ne is kedsavut, edheǥetan ta te edtengkaan he ed-ul-ulahan. Ne haazà daan, edheǥetan ta te kebmeinentusen. Ne is kebmeinentusen, edheǥetan ta te kebpevayàbayè ta te Megbevayà.
61001007	Ne haazà daan, edheǥetan ta te kegiǥineǥawè tew ne is kegiǥineǥawè tew, edheǥetan ta zaan te kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta.
61001008	Ne emun ed-iseg layun is ked-ul-ulaha niw kayi te langun, kenà egkehimu he kenà utew zekelà is pulus te kedtuuwi niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
61001009	Iyan, ke zuen tumutuu he kenà ed-ulaula kayi, henduen be te nelakap is isip din su kenè din egkesavut is hustu. Nelipatan din en buwa he nepelisan en sikandin te menge zaan he ulaula zin he mezaat.
61001010	Menge suled, geina te mibpilì kiw ne midhimu kiw te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu kandin, edhimuwen tew is taman te egkehimu tew wey maahà he tutuu iyan is kebpilia zin kenitew wey is kedhimuwa zin kenitew he menge tumutuu zin. Su emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan tew kenè kiw ebpekesuwey te hustu he ibayà,
61001011	ne zekelà is kelipey tew keuzemà su egkeǥalew is Megbevayà kenitew zutun te kebpeseleza zin kenitew zutun te wazà pidtemanan he ǥinhedian te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he iyan Menluluwas tew.
61001012	Minsan pa te nesavut niw en heini is langun wey meheǥet en is kedtuu niw te tutuu he tuluuwen, kinahanglan he layun ku heini ibpezineg keniyu.
61001013	Su taman te kemulu e pa zini te kelibutan meupiya ke igkepezineg ku keniyu heini su wey kenè niw melipati.
61001014	Netuenan ku he meǥaan e en egkeumuri sumalà is impesavut kedì te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
61001015	Ne tenged kayi edhimuwen ku is taman te egkehimu ku su wey kenè niw melipati is impenurù ku.
61001016	Sikan is impenurù dey keniyu mehitenged te egkeulaula keuzemà ke edlikù is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he utew zekelà is gehem din, ne kenà heini tetezemen dà he midhimu te etew zà duen. Netuenan dey su nemesahan dey en is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag din.
61001017	Duma key zin dengan hein impaahà te Amey tew he Megbevayà is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag din wey is utew zin kegkelavew. Nezineg dey is lalag te mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà he migkaǥi te, Iyan heini sikan is Anak ku he utew ku minahal; ingkesuat ku utew sikandin, ke sikandin.
61001018	Nezineg dey is laǥeng te Megbevayà he ziyà ebpuun te langit hein miduma key zengan ni Jesus pehendiyà te vuntud he mibulusan te Megbevayà.
61001019	Ne utew zutun neheǥet is kedtuu zey te nengetagnà dengan te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà mehitenged ki Jesus ne kinahanglan he purungi niw zaan tuuwi. Su is impenurù dan, ne iring te sulù he ebpenganlag diyà te merusirem taman te kenè pa egkeriwaswas. Ne emun egkeriwaswas en, egketeyawan kiw te mekevugwas, he ke và dà egkeǥiya egkeuma is kegketuman te kedlikù ni Jesus .
61001020	Ne kinahanglan utew he sevuta niw he wazà etew he hustu is kedseysey zin te penurù he insurat te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà emun wazà ipesavut kandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
61001021	Su heini is penurù, wazà diyà dà mebpuun te isip te etew zà duen, kekenà, impinted te Megbevayà. Mid-ulinan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin is ebpemeneuven dengan, ne is menge lalag dan, iyan impekaǥi kandan te Megbevayà.
61002001	Duen dengan menge teruen he etew he uvag kun ebpeneuven te Megbevayà ne iring din ded daan, duen menge etew he edlepew ǥuntaan he ebpenurù te tarù diyan te keniyu. Sayep is ibpenurù dan te meeles ne ebpekezezaat heini te upakat niw te menge tumutuu. Ibpenurù dan he kenà Nengazen tew si Jesus he iyan pezem mibelukas kandan ne tenged dutun egketik-awan sikandan ke edsilutan dan.
61002002	Ne minsan pa zutun mezakel is edsunud te meremerik he menge ulaula zan, ne pinaaǥi zutun egkesawey kiw is edsunud te tutuu he tuluuwen su kunaan te menge etew ke zuma tew sikandan.
61002003	Tenged te suat dan te selapì, ebpenepian kew zan pinaaǥi te penurù dan he tarù. Daan en he midteǥana is silut kandan; andam en is Megbevayà te kedsilut kandan.
61002004	Su wazà pesegdana te Megbevayà minsan is menge velinsuǥuen din dengan he nekesalà, kekenà, intimbag din diyà te Iveyaan. Ne ziyè dan pa te utew merusirem he mibakus te kedina su idtaǥad sikandan taman te andew te kedsilut.
61002005	Wazà daan pesegdana te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà dengan su impelapey zin is daǥat ne nengelened is langun he wazè dan kedtahud kandin. Iyan dà midlibri zin si Noe he nekepenurù te metazeng he ulaula wey zuen pa pitu he etew he midlibri zin daan.
61002006	Elin daan midsilutan dengan te Megbevayà is menge etew ziyà te menge inged he Suduma wey Gumura. Iyan dà meǥinged dutun he midlibri zin ensi Lut su metazeng mulà si Lut. Nerasey si Lut he ed-isip-isip te meremerik he ulaula te menge mesinupaken he zuma zin. Andew-andew utew mezaat he ulaula is egkengezineg din wey egkengeehè din ne zutun utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin. Ne tenged dutun te utew menge lalung mibinsulan te Megbevayà is inged dan su wey mesavut te minsan hentei ke hengkey is kedsiluti zin keuzemà dutun te menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te menge suǥù din.
61002009	Iyan, is menge etew mulà he ed-azap te Nengazen, metau sikandin he edtavang kandan wey kenè dan mekesalà ke ebpenulayen sikandan. Metau zaan sikandin he ebakus te menge nemematey he lalung su wey itaǥad sikandan taman te andew te kedsiluti zin kandan.
61002010	Utew meveǥat keuzemà is kedsiluti zin dutun te menge etew he ebpeniguduwan dan te edtuman is menge meremerik he kebayà te lawa zan wey edsumpeliten dan is minsan hentei he zuen din keǥehem. Ne heini is migkaǥi ku he menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù, utew zan memevurut wey memepelevawen. Kenè dan edtehuzen is menge kedesenan diyà te langit, kekenà, edsumpeliten dan.
61002011	Ne minsan is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he lavew pa is gehem dan kenà dutun te menge teruen he menunudlù, kenè dan mulà ebpekeaku he edsudì te menge kedesenan emun idsumbung dan is menge kedesenan diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.
61002012	Iyan, heini is menge teruen he menunudlù, kenè dan egkeisip he igkehandek heini su zaan he ulaula zan is kedsudì. Iring sikandan te menge langgam he wazà keeled he iyan intuvad kandan is kedekepa wey kedhimetayi kandan. Edsumpeliten dan is kenè dan egkesavut. Ne iyan egkezungguan dan is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan.
61002013	Utew merasey is silut he egkeantus dan keuzemà iring te merasey zaan is ibpeantus dan te menge etew. Iyan kelenganan he egkesuatan dan is kedtumana zan te minsan maandew pa te minsan hengkey he meremerik he kebayà te lawa zan. Igkeeled niw wey igkesudii sikandan keniyu su minsan ke ebpekidtuǥen dan keniyu ziyà te menge keemuran niw utew zan egkesuati is kedtarùtarù keniyu.
61002014	Egkeeriǥan dan te minsan hentei he vahi; kenà egkepenù is suat dan te mezaat he ulaula. Ebpeeyatan dan is menge etew he kenè pa ebpekesavut te hustu. Utew zan leǥezen, iyan, kenà egkehimu he kenà sikandan egkesilutan te Megbevayà.
61002015	Nengetazin en is isip dan su midsuwey zan en te tutuu he ibayà. Iyan ibayà he ed-ikulen dan is mezaat he paaǥi zengan ni Belaam he anak ni Busur. Iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa ni Belaam is selapì he idsuhul kandin ke mezaat is ed-ul-ulahan din.
61002016	Duen kudè din he asnu he kenà pezem ebpekekaǥi, iyan, impekaǥi te Megbevayà ne indawey zin ki Belaam haazà is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan ne tenged dutun wazà melaus ni Belaam is ketuturebungi zin.
61002017	Ne haazà is menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù, iring sikandan te kalut he nemezahan. Iring sikandan te ǥapun he ebpegwisen te keramag su wazè dan menge pulus. Inteǥana te Megbevayà is egkeubpaan dan diyà te Impirnu he utew merusirem.
61002018	Uvag mezalem is menge lalag dan, iyan, wazà pulus te egkeǥiyen dan. Duen menge etew he ed-engkezan dan pezem is menge zaan he zuma zan he ed-ulaula te sayep, iyan, ebpenulayen sikandan dutun te menge menunudlù pinaaǥi te meremerik he kebayà te lawa zan.
61002019	Egkeǥiyen dutun te menge menunudlù he egkelibri ki pinaaǥi te kedsunuza kandan su idtuǥut kun kenita is minsan hengkey he ulaula, iyan, nasì nengeuripen pa sikandan te menge ulaula he ebpekezezaat su netuenan ta he uripen is etew te minsan hengkey he ebpekevayàbayà kandin.
61002020	Ke zuen menge etew he nekesavut en mehitenged te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, egkelibri zan en pezem te mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan he ebpekezezaat kandan. Iyan, ke egkepenulayan sikandan ne edlikuan dan en maan haazà is daan he kegkeuripena kandan te mezaat he ulaula, tuwas pa he merasey is egketemanan dan.
61002021	Meupiya pa ke wazè dan meturedu is paaǥi te kegkehimu kandan he metazeng, kenà te neturedu zan ne mid-iniyuǥan dan ne wazè dan medtuman te suǥù kandan te Megbevayà he impesavut kandan.
61002022	Netuman en pinaaǥi kandan sikan is erubasa he edhenduen te, Migkaan te asu is in-utè din ne sikan is neziǥù he vavuy, midtunè en maan.
61003001	Minahal he menge suled ku, ikezuwa en heini te kebpesurati ku keniyu. Iyan tuyù ku kayi te kezezuwa ku kebpesurati keniyu is: wey kew mekeisip te hustu pinaaǥi kayi te menge sambag ku keniyu.
61003002	Egkesuatan ku he meisip-isip niw is menge lalag he insurat dengan te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà wey is suǥù te Nengazen tew he Menluluwas tew he imbeǥey zin kenitew pinaaǥi kenami te menge epustul.
61003003	Idhuna ku keniyu ibpesavut he keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu duen ebpemenlepew he menge etew he iyan ebayàbayà kandan is menge mezaat he kebayè dan. Edsumpeliten kew zan he egkaǥi te,
61003004	Hendei vuwa si Kristu su impenaad din dengan he edlikù dini te kelibutan, iyan, kenè key ebpeketuu te iring dutun su puun pa te timpu zengan te kebpatey te menge tipehuna he kepuun tew taman en guntaan, wazà mahalin is minsan hengkey; iyan ded gihapun genat dà te kedtukuza te kelibutan taman en guntaan.
61003005	Is egkaǥi te iring kayi, iyan edlipatan dan is: dengan midlimbag te Megbevayà is langit pinaaǥi zà te lalag din, ne is tanà daan, midlimbag din pinaaǥi te wahig ne impelepew zin is tanà puun dutun te wahig.
61003006	Ne pinaaǥi zaan te wahig, midlimas dengan te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà dini te lumpad.
61003007	Ne haazà is Lalag te Megbevayà he iyan inlimbag din dengan, pinaaǥi zutun midteǥenahan din en is langit wey tanà su wey melimas din te hapuy keuzemà dutun te andew te kedsusiya zin wey kedsiluti zin te menge etew he wazè dan kedtahud kandin.
61003008	Minahal ku he menge suled, tentenuzi niw he ziyà te Megbevayà, neked-iring is sengeandew zà wey is nengkelibu he tuig su ziyà te kandin meǥaan dà utew haazà is dezuwa.
61003009	Kunaan te zuma ke edlanganlangan is Nengazen su maan is kenè din edtumanen is pesarig din he edlikù sikandin. Kenà sikandin edlanganlangan, kekenà, utew sikandin mepelevayen keniyu su kenè din egkesuatan he zuen minsan sevaha he kenà egkelibri te silut. Egkesuatan din he meiniyuǥi te langun is menge ulaula zan he mezaat.
61003010	Ne minsan pa zutun, edtumanen gihapun te Megbevayà is kedlimasa zin te kelibutan. Egketik-awan is menusiyà he iring te kegketik-awi kandan te tekawen. Dutun he andew egkezineg is kerekatak ne egkehanew is langit. Egkeǥevà ne egkeamin egketutung is minsan hengkey. Egkevinsulan is tivuuk he kelibutan wey is langun he taǥù din.
61003011	Ne ǥeina te zuen andew keuzemà he zutun egkehanew is langun te iring kayi, kinahanglan he ebpurungan tew is kedsunud tew te Megbevayà para wazà igkesewayi kenitew.
61003012	Su edteǥazan ta is andew te kedlimasa te Megbevayà te kelibutan. Edhimuwen ta is taman te egkehimu ta su wey meǥaan metuman. Dutun he andew egkeamin egketutung is langit, wey egkengetunew is langun te utew meinit.
61003013	Iyan, sikitew mulà, ebperetengen ta is beǥu en he tanà wey langit he impenaad kenitew te Megbevayà. Iyan dà ebpekeubpà dutun is memetazeng is ulaula zan.
61003014	Na menge suled, geina te kemulu tew pa edteǥazi haazà is andew, kinahanglan he ebpurungan tew edtengkai is menge ulaula tew su wey wazà igkesewayi kenitew te Megbevayà ne wey melinew is kedepità te uman sevaha kenitew ziyà te kandin.
61003015	Kenè niw lipati he iyan ibpelevaya te Megbevayà kenitew su wey melibri ki te silut din. Iyan daan heini impesavut keniyu te emiǥu tew he si Pablo zutun te surat he impeuwit din keniyu. Impinted heini kandin te Megbevayà.
61003016	Ibpenurù din layun is andew te kedlimas diyà te langun he menge surat din. Duen daan ibpenurù ni Pablo he mereǥen he edsevuten ne is menge etew he kenà edsavut te hustu wey wazà meheǥet is kedtuu zan, edhelinen dan haazà is memereǥen ne nesayep is kedseysaya zan duen iring te nesayep daan is kedseysaya zan te zuma he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà.
61003017	Minahal ku he menge suled, geina te netuenan niw en heini he zaan, andam kew su wey kenè kew meketuu te menge tarù he ibpenurù te menge lalung he etew ne egkelipatan niw is tutuu he tuluuwen he midtuuwan niw.
61003018	Kinahanglan he pinaaǥi te kegkeǥeǥawi keniyu te Nengazen tew wey Menluluwas tew he si Jesu Kristu, med-iseg is kedsevuta niw te ibpesavut din. Berakat he iyan sikandin edeliǥen guntaan wey te wazà pidtemanan.
62001001	Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu mehitenged ki Kristu. Migeraran sikandin te Lalag he ebpekeveǥey te wazà pidtemanan he untung. Daan en sikandin te wazè pa tukuza is kelibutan. Ne minsan pa zutun neehè dey sikandin ne nekepemineg key te migkaǥi zin. Neehè dey ne neǥewezan dey sikandin.
62001002	Hein mibulus dini te kelibutan heini is puunà te untung, neehè dey ne tenged dutun egkeǥiyen dey keniyu is neehè dey. Edseyseyen dey keniyu is migeraran te untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Daan sikandin he zuma te Amey tew he Megbevayà ne zutun mibpeǥawaǥawa kenami zini te kelibutan.
62001003	Edtudtulen ku en keniyu haazà is neehè dey wey nezineg dey ziyà te kandin su wey kew mebpekid-upakat kenami su nekid-upakat key zaan te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Anak din he si Jesu Kristu.
62001004	Ne tenged dutun ebpesuratan ku sikiyu te iring kayi su wey meheǥet is kelipey tew.
62001005	Ibpesavut ku keniyu is impesavut kenami te Anak te Megbevayà he is Megbevayà, iyan sikandin puunà te kerayag ne wazà minsan hengkey he merusirem diyà te kandin.
62001006	Emun egkaǥi ki he nekid-upakat ki te Megbevayà, iyan, diyè ki pa te kerusireman, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mezaat pa is menge ulaula ta , teruen ki. Teruen ki pinaaǥi te menge lalag ta wey pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta.
62001007	Emun merayag mulà is ibayè tew iring te merayag is Megbevayà, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, emun mibpesakup kiw te Megbevayà, egkeupakat kiw ne layun kiw edlumpiyuwi te minsan hengkey he salè tew pinaaǥi te kebpelisi kenitew te lengesa ni Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà.
62001008	Emun egkaǥi ki he wazè ta salà, tarù is ebpetuuwan ta te ǥehinawa ta ne kenè ki ves edtuman te tutuu he tuluuwen.
62001009	Emun idtug-an ta ziyà te Megbevayà is menge salè ta, kenà egkehimu he kenè ki zin ebpeseyluwen su metazeng sikandin ne metinumanen te pesarig din. Edlumpiyuwan ki zin te langun he menge ulaula ta he kenà metazeng.
62001010	Iyan, ke egkaǥi ki he wazè ki mekesalà, henduen be te migkaǥi ki he teruen is Megbevayà ne wazè ki mebpezumazuma te lalag din.
62002001	Sikiyu is iring te menge anak ku, iyan ibpesurati ku keniyu is: wey meheǥeti is kedtuu niw wey kew kenà mekesalà. Iyan, ke zuen ebpekesalà he minsan hentei kenitew, duen datù tew he edtavang kenitew ziyà te etuvangan te Amey tew he Megbevayà. Iyan datù tew si Jesu Kristu he utew metazeng.
62002002	Iyan sikandin impemuhat tenged kenitew wey mepalis is menge salè tew, ne kenè kenitew zà he salà is egkepalis, kekenà, is menge salà daan te tivuuk he menusiyà.
62002003	Egketuenan tew he emiǥu kiw en te Megbevayà ke edtumanen tew is menge sugù din kenitew.
62002004	Iyan, ke zuen egkaǥi te, Emiǥu e en te Megbevayà, ne haazà is egkaǥi, kenè din edtumanen is menge suǥù te Megbevayà, teruen sikandin. Kenà sikandin ebpezumazuma te tutuu he tuluuwen.
62002005	Ne ke zuen etew he edtumanen din is menge suǥù te Megbevayà, neheǥet en is kebmahala zin te Megbevayà diyà te ǥehinawa zin. Sikan is etew he egkaǥi he nekidsevaha sikandin te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he metazeng is menge ulaula zin iring te metazeng is menge ulaula ni Jesus. Emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan ta, netuenan ta he nekidsevaha ki te Megbevayà.
62002007	Minahal ku he menge suled, kenà beǥu heini is idsuǥù ku keniyu su zengan dà. Ne insuǥù en heini keniyu hein aney kew medtuu. Ne heini he suǥù, ne iyan ded sikan is lalag he impesavut kenitew he mahala tew is minsan hentei he zuma tew.
62002008	Ne minsan pa te zaan heini he suǥù, henduen be te sikan pa isuǥù kenitew su impaahà ni Kristu he tutuu heini is suǥù wey ibpeehè niw zaan ǥuntaan. Egkeawè en kayi te kelibutan is kerusireman ne egketeyawan kiw en te tutuu he tuluuwen.
62002009	Ke zuen etew he egkaǥi he midteyawan te Megbevayà is isip din, iyan, ebpekigkuntada sikandin te zuma zin, kemulu pa sikandin diyà te kerusireman.
62002010	Is etew mulà he ebmahalen din is duma zin, iyan sikandin kes edteyawan is isip din te Megbevayà, ne kenè din ibpekesalà is menge ulaula zin.
62002011	Iyan, is etew he ebpekigkuntada te zuma zin, kemulu pa is isip din diyà te kerusireman ne mezaat pa is menge ulaula zin. Iring sikandin te etew he kenè din egketuenan ke hendei sikandin ebpekepevayà su ziyè pa sikandin te kerusireman.
62002012	Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu, menge anak ku, su nengepesaylu en is menge salè niw tenged ki Kristu.
62002013	Sikiyu is menge meǥurang, umba ebpesuratan ku sikiyu su nehimu kew en he menge emiǥu ni Kristu. Daan en sikandin te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey. Sikiyu is menge menguhed, ebpesuratan ku sikiyu su nezaag niw en si Setanas.
62002014	Sikiyu is menge vatà, ebpesuratan ku sikiyu su menge emiǥu kew en te Amey tew he Megbevayà. Iyan ibpesurati ku keniyu te menge meǥurang is: tenged te emiǥu kew en ni Kristu. Daan en sikandin te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey. Iyan ibpesurati ku keniyu te menge menguhed su meviǥer en is kedtuu niw ne kenà egkeawà diyan te isip niw is Lalag te Megbevayà, wey nezaag niw en si Setanas.
62002015	Kinahanglan he kenà iyan dekelà dini te ǥehinawa ta is menge ulaula te menge etew zini te kelibutan he menge kuntada te Megbevayà, kinahanglan daan he wazà minsan hengkey zini te kelibutan he iyan dekelà dini te ǥehinawa ta. Su ke zuen etew he iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is iring dutun, kenà egkehimu he iyan mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is Amey tew he Megbevayà.
62002016	Su is minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan, iring te menge mezaat he kebayà, is menge mezaat he vutang he egkeahà wey egkesuatan te menge etew wey is kebpezalig dan tenged te menge azen he nekuwa zan, kenè man heini ebpuun te Amey tew he Megbevayà, kekenà, dini zà ebpuun te kelibutan.
62002017	Egkehanew keuzemà is kelibutan wey egkehanew zaan is minsan hengkey he mezaat he egkesuatan te menge etew, iyan, sikan is edtuman te egkesuatan te Megbevayà, kenà mulà egkehanew, kekenà, duen din untung he wazà pidtemanan.
62002018	Menge anak ku, meǥaan en egketapus heini is timpu. Nezineg niw en he keuzemà duen edlepew he egeraran te Kuntada ni Kristu. Guntaan duen en mezakel he menge kuntada ni Kristu ne tenged dutun netuenan ta he meǥaan en iyan egketapus heini is timpu.
62002019	Ne heini is menge kuntada ni Kristu, kenè tew sikandan tutuu he menge zuma su umba mid-ewaan kiw zan. Angin ke tutuu zan he zuma tew su wazè kiw zan geina ewai. Tenged te ked-awè dan egketuenan ta he kenè dan tutuu he menge zuma tew.
62002020	Sikiyu mulà, mibpeulinan kew ni Kristu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne tenged dutun nesavut niw te langun is tutuu he tuluuwen.
62002021	Kenè ku iyan ibpesurati keniyu is tenged te wazè niw mesavut ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, tenged te nesavut niw en wey tenged te wazà minsan hengkey he tarù he ziyà ebpuun te tutuu he tuluuwen.
62002022	Hentei man is teruen? Iyan sikan is egkaǥi he kenà iyan si Jesus mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Is egkaǥi kayi, ne iyan kuntada ni Kristu su egkeǥiyen din he kenà tutuu he ed-ezapen is Amey tew he Megbevayà ne egkeǥiyen din daan he kenà si Kristu Anak te tutuu he Megbevayà.
62002023	Ne ke zuen etew he kenè din edewaten is Anak te Megbevayà, kenè din daan edewaten is Amey tew he Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan ke zuen etew he midawat din en is Anak te Megbevayà, nezawat din en daan is Amey tew he Megbevayà.
62002024	Is tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu hein aney kew medtuu, kinahanglan he edhemenan niw su emun edhemenan niw kenà egkehimu he kenè kew layun egkesevaha te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Anak din he si Jesu Kristu.
62002025	Su iyan impenaad kenitew ni Kristu is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
62002026	Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu wey kew med-andam su zuen menge etew he tarù is ibpetuuwan dan pezem keniyu.
62002027	Iyan, sikiyu, wazà kinahanglan he zuen selakew pa he ebpenurù keniyu su mibpeulinan kew en ni Kristu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Pinaaǥi zutun egkesavut niw is langun he ibpesavut keniyu ni Kristu. Tutuu mulà ne kenà tarù haazà is ibpesavut din keniyu umba kinahanglan he hemeni niw is kebpekidsevaha niw kandin sumalà is impenurù en keniyu.
62002028	Ne tenged kayi te langun, menge anak ku, hemeni niw is kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu su wey kenè kew mahandek ne kenè kew egkeeled keuzemà dutun te kedlikù din.
62002029	Netuenan te en he metazeng si Kristu. Netuenan ta zaan he minsan hentei he metazeng is menge ulaula zin, nehimu en sikandin he anak te Megbevayà.
62003001	Utew kiw mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa te Amey tew he Megbevayà su ahaa niw man migngezanan kiw zin en he menge anak din ne menge anak kiw zin en iyan. Is menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà, kenè kiw zan egkekilala he menge anak kiw te Megbevayà su kenè dan daan egkekilala ke hentei sikandin.
62003002	Menge minahal ku he menge emiǥu, menge anak kiw en te Megbevayà ne kenè tew pa egketuenan ke hengkey is egketemanan te kegkeenaka kenitew te Megbevayà. Iyan, netuenan tew he ke edlikù si Kristu, egkehimu zutun is kenitew he zagwey he iring te kandin he zagwey su zutun egkeehè tew human is tutuu he zagwey zin.
62003003	Is minsan hentei he ebperateng te kedlikù ni Kristu, layun din ebpurungi is menge ulaula zin su wey wazà mezaat iring te wazà daan mezaat he ulaula ni Kristu.
62003004	Ke zuen nekesalà, nesupak din is kesuǥuan te Megbevayà su is ulaula he egngezanan te salà ne iyan is minsan hengkey he ulaula he supak te kesuǥuan te Megbevayà.
62003005	Netuenan niw en he umba mibpeetew si Kristu su wey zin maawà is menge salè tew. Ne netuenan niw zaan he wazà minsan sevaha he salà he nehimu zin wey egkehimu zin.
62003006	Ne tenged dutun is minsan hentei he edhemenan din is kebpekidsevaha zin ki Kristu, kenà egkehimu he layun sikandin ed-ulaula te mezaat. Sikan is etew he layun ed-ulaula te mezaat, wazè din metueni ke hentei si Kristu ne wazè din tuuwi sikandin.
62003007	Menge anak ku, kinahanglan he kenè niw pemineǥa is minsan hentei he teruen he ebpenurù pezem keniyu. Iyan tutuu is: ke zuen etew he ed-ulaula te hustu ne iyan sikandin metazeng he etew iring te metazeng si Kristu.
62003008	Ke zuen etew he layun ed-ulaula te mezaat ne sakup sikandin ni Setanas su layun daan si Setanas ed-ulaula te mezaat puun pa te kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan. Umba midhendini te kelibutan is Anak te Megbevayà su wey zin ikeawà is gehem te menge ulaula ni Setanas.
62003009	Is minsan hentei he nehimu en he anak te Megbevayà, kenè en sikandin egkesuat he ed-ulaula te mezaat su midsempù en man te Megbevayà. Geina te iyan Amey zin is Megbevayà kenà egkehimu he layun sikandin ed-ulaula te mezaat.
62003010	Ne ke zuen etew he kenà metazeng is menge ulaula zin, tuus heini he kenà sikandin anak te Megbevayà. Ne kenà daan anak te Megbevayà is minsan hentei he kenè din ebmahalen is duma zin. Pinaaǥi kayi egketuusan ta ke hentei is menge anak te Megbevayà wey ke hentei is menge sakup ni Setanas.
62003011	Kinahanglan he ebmahalen tew te kada sevaha is menge zuma tew. Iyan heini impenurù kenitew hein aney kiw meketuu.
62003012	Kenè tew ed-iringan si Kain su sakup sikandin ni Setanas ne mibunù din is hazi zin. Umba mibunù din su mezaat is kandin he ulaula ne metazeng mulà is menge ulaula te hazi zin.
62003013	Menge suled, kenè kew meinuinu emun ebpekigkuntada keniyu is menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà.
62003014	Netuenan tew he zengan iyan egkeperateng tew is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan. Ne netuenan tew zaan he ǥuntaan duen tew en untung he wazà pidtemanan. Umba netuenan tew heini su utew en mahal zini te ǥehinawa tew is menge zuma tew. Is minsan hentei he kenà mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is menge zuma zin, kemulu pa sikandin ebpekeperateng te kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan.
62003015	Is minsan hentei he ebpekigkuntada te zuma zin, mid-isip sikandin te Megbevayà he iring te teremunù; ne netuenan ta he ke zuen etew he egkesuat he ebunù wazè pa sikandin mekeangken te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
62003016	Umba netuenan tew en he utew zekelà is kebmahala kenitew te Megbevayà diyà te ǥehinawa zin su mibpehimatey si Jesu Kristu he elili kenitew. Ne sikitew zaan, kinahanglan he edtevangan tew is menge zuma tew he tumutuu minsan ke ibpatey ta haazà is kedtavang.
62003017	Ke zuen minsan hentei kenitew he egkehimu he edtevangan din is duma zin he edlised, iyan, kenè din edtevangan, kenà egkehimu he mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is Megbevayà.
62003018	Menge mahal ku he anak, kinahanglan he kenà menge lalag dà is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta, kekenà, kinahanglan he ibpeehè ta is kebmahala ta kandan pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta.
62003019	Su emun ed-ul-ulahan tew heini, egketuenan tew he menge anak kiw iyan te tutuu he Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun kenè en kinahanglan he egkeeled ki ziyà te etuvangan din
62003020	minsan pa te iyan diyà te isip ta is: dait ki he edsilutan. Umba kenè ki egkeeled su iyan lavew he egkeseriǥan is hukum te Megbevayà, kenà is hukum te isip ta su netuenan din is minsan hengkey.
62003021	Ne emun netuenan ta he wazè en igkesiluti zin kenita, egkehimu en he zekelà is kedsarig ta ke ed-ampù ki ziyà te kandin.
62003022	Ibeǥey zin kenita is ebuyuen ta su edtumanen ta is menge suǥù din wey ed-ul-ulahan ta is egkesuatan din.
62003023	Ne iyan insuǥù din kenitew is: kinahanglan he edtuuwan tew is Anak din he si Jesu Kristu wey ebmahalen tew te kada sevaha is menge zuma tew sumalà is insuǥù daan dengan ni Jesus.
62003024	Is minsan hentei he edtuman te menge suǥù te Megbevayà, nekidsevaha sikandin te Megbevayà ne ziyà te kandin ed-ubpà is Megbevayà. Egketuenan ta he zini te kenita ed-ubpà is Megbevayà su mid-ulinan ki te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
62004001	Menge minahal ku he suled, kenè niw petuluy tuuwi is etew he egkaǥi he mid-ulinan sikandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Gezami niw zè pa wey niw metueni ke ebpuun be te Megbevayà is ed-ulin kandin. Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su mezakel en is menge ebpenurù te tarù he midlepew zini te kelibutan he mid-ulinan sikandan te teruen he mulin-ulin.
62004002	Is minsan hentei he mulin-ulin he egkaǥi he mibpeetew si Jesus is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, ne ziyà ebpuun haazà is mulin-ulin te Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi kayi egketuusan niw is mulin-ulin he ebpuun te Megbevayà.
62004003	Iyan, ke zuen mulin-ulin he egkaǥi he wazà mebpeetew si Jesus is mibpilì te Megbevayà, ne kenà ebpuun haazà is mulin-ulin diyà te Megbevayà, kekenà, diyà ebpuun te kuntada ni Kristu. Nezineg niw en he zuen edlepew he mulin-ulin he ebpuun te kuntada ni Kristu. Ne egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he zini en guntaan haazà te kelibutan.
62004004	Sikiyu, menge anak ku, gaked kew en te Megbevayà ne nezaag niw en is menge teruen he mulin-ulin su lavew pa he mekeǥeǥehem is Megbevayà he ziyà ed-ubpà te kenitew, kenà si Setanas he ziyà ed-ubpà te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà.
62004005	Haazà is menge etew he mid-ulinan te teruen he menge mulin-ulin, kuntada man sikandan te Megbevayà wey supak te Megbevayà is ibpenurù dan. Ne tenged dutun ebpemineǥen sikandan te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada zaan te Megbevayà.
62004006	Iyan, sikitew mulà, gaked kiw te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun ebpemineg te ibpenurù tew is minsan hentei he emiǥu te Megbevayà. Iyan, is minsan hentei he kenà gaked te Megbevayà, kenà ebpemineg te ibpenurù tew. Pinaaǥi kayi egketuusan tew ke hentei is mid-ulinan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ebpenurù te tutuu wey ke hentei is mid-ulinan te teruen he mulin-ulin.
62004007	Minahal ku he menge suled, kinahanglan he ebpurung kiw egiǥineǥawè su ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà is gaǥew. Is minsan hentei he zekelà is gaǥew zin te menge zuma zin, ne iyan nehimu en he anak te Megbevayà wey emiǥu te Megbevayà.
62004008	Is minsan hentei he wazè din gaǥew te menge zuma zin, wazè din hanew te menge ulaula te Megbevayà su is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà, ne iyan kebpaahaa zin te ǥaǥew zin.
62004009	Impehendini te Megbevayà is sebsevaha zà he Anak din te kelibutan su wey pinaaǥi kandin mekeangken kiw te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Iyan haazà kebpaahaa zin te ǥaǥew zin kenitew.
62004010	Is tutuu he ǥaǥew, kenà iyan is kebmahala tew te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan is kebmahala zin kenitew wey is kebpehendiniya zin te Anak din su wey pinaaǥi te kebpehimatey zin mepesaylu is menge salè tew.
62004011	Menge minahal ku he suled, geina te iring dutun is utew zekelà he ǥaǥew kenitew te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he utew zaan dekelà is gaǥew te kada sevaha kenitew ziyà te menge zuma zin.
62004012	Wazè pa etew he nekeahà te Megbevayà, iyan, emun egiǥineǥawè kiw, ed-ubpà dini te kenitew is Megbevayà, ne egkeheǥet is kebmahala ta te Megbevayà dini te ǥehinawa ta.
62004013	Mibpeulinan ki zin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne tenged dutun egketuusan ta he nekidsevaha ki kandin wey impeubpè din dini te kenita is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
62004014	Sikami is menge epustul, netuenan dey he impehendini te Megbevayà is Anak din su wey melibri is menusiyà te silut. Umba netuenan dey su neehè dey sikandin ne edtudtulen dey is neehè dey.
62004015	Ne ke zuen minsan hentei he egkaǥi he edtuuwan din he Anak te Megbevayà si Jesus, diyà ed-ubpà te kandin is Megbevayà ne nekidsevaha sikandin te Megbevayà.
62004016	Ne tenged dutun nesavut tew en he utew zekelà is gagew kenitew te Megbevayà ne umba ebpekesarig kiw. Is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà, ne iyan kebpaahaa zin te ǥagew zin. Is minsan hentei he layun dekelà is gagew zin te menge zuma zin, meheǥet is kebpekidsevaha zin te Megbevayà, ne ziyà te kandin ed-ubpà is Megbevayà.
62004017	Edheǥetan din is kebmahala tew kandin dini te ǥehinawa tew su wey wazè tew kehandek keuzemà dutun te andew te kedsusiya zin te nengeulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà. Umba kenè kiw egkehandek su iring te metazeng is menge ulaula ni Kristu, metazeng daan is kenitew he ulaula zini te kelibutan.
62004018	Ne is minsan hentei he ebmahalen te Megbevayà, wazà kinahanglan he egkehandek sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne ǥeina te wazà kurang te kebmahala kenitew te Megbevayà in-awè din en is kegkehandek tew kandin. Umba egkehandek is etew su egkeperateng din is silut kandin te Megbevayà, iyan, sikan is etew he egkehandek te Megbevayà, wazè pa meheǥet diyà te isip din is kebmahala kandin te Megbevayà.
62004019	Umba utew en mahal sikandin dini te ǥehinawa tew su nehuna kiw zin he mibmahal ziyà te kandin he ǥehinawa.
62004020	Ke zuen minsan hentei he egkaǥi he utew mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is Megbevayà, iyan, ebpekigkuntada sikandin te zuma zin, teruen sikandin. Su kenà egkehimu he ebmahalen din is Megbevayà he wazè din maahà ke kenè din daan ebmahalen is duma zin he neehè din en mulà.
62004021	Su insuǥù kenitew te Megbevayà he is minsan hentei he tutuu is kebmahala zin te Megbevayà, kinahanglan daan he ebmahalen din is duma zin.
62005001	Anak en te Megbevayà is minsan hentei he edtuu he iyan si Jesus mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Ne emun ebmahalen din diyà te ǥehinawa zin is Amey tew he Megbevayà ebmahalen din daan is menge zuma zin he anak te Megbevayà.
62005002	Emun hustu is kebmahala ta te Megbevayà wey is kedtumana ta te menge suǥù din, egketuenan ta he hustu zaan is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta he anak te Megbevayà.
62005003	Is hustu he kebmahala ta te Megbevayà, ne iyan is kedtumana ta te menge suǥù din. Ne kenà mereǥen he edtumanen is menge suǥù din
62005004	su sikitew is langun he nehimu en he menge anak te Megbevayà, egkezaag tew en si Setanas he iyan ebayàbayà dini te kelibutan; ne iyan ibpekezaag tew kandin is kedtuu tew ki Jesus.
62005005	Hentei is ebpekezaag ki Setanas? Iyan dà sikan is midtuu he Anak te Megbevayà si Jesus.
62005006	Iyan si Jesu Kristu sikan is midsuǥù te Amey zin dini te kelibutan. Egketuusan heini pinaaǥi te wahig wey lengesa. Kenà heini egketuusan pinaaǥi zà te wahig he iyan is kebewtismuwi kandin , kekenà, pinaaǥi zaan te lengesa he iyan is kedtiǥis te lengesa zin dutun te kedrensanga kandin te krus . Iyan ebpenistiǥus kayi zini te kenitew is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, su tutuu layun is egkeǥiyen din.
62005007	Tetelu is ebpenistiǥus mehitenged ki Jesu Kristu.
62005008	Is sevaha, ne iyan is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin; is sevaha pa, ne iyan is kebewtismuwi ki Jesu Kristu, ne is sevaha pa, ne iyan is kedtiǥis te lengesa zin. Ne neuyun is kedtistiǥus kayi te tetelu.
62005009	Egkevenaran ki te kebpenistiǥus te menge etew zà duen, iyan, lavew pa he mezesen is kebpenistiǥus te Megbevayà ne midtistiǥusan din he Anak din si Jesus.
62005010	Is minsan hentei he edtuu he Anak te Megbevayà si Jesus, nevenaran sikandin te kebpenistiǥus te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei he kenà edtuu te kebpenistiǥus te Megbevayà, ed-isipen din he teruen is Megbevayà su wazè din tuuwi is kebpenistiǥus te Megbevayà mehitenged te Anak din he si Jesus.
62005011	Is Megbevayà, imbeǥey zin kenitew is untung he wazà pidtemanan; ne ziyà ebpuun heini is untung te Anak din he si Jesus. Iyan heini sikan is kebpenistiǥus kenitew te Megbevayà.
62005012	Is minsan hentei he nekidsevaha te Anak te Megbevayà, duen din en untung he wazà pidtemanan. Is minsan hentei he wazà mebpekidsevaha te Anak te Megbevayà, wazè din untung he wazà pidtemanan.
62005013	Sikiyu is nemeketuu en te Anak te Megbevayà, ebpesuratan ku sikiyu wey niw metueni he zuen niw en untung he wazà pidtemanan.
62005014	Sikitew is nemeketuu, dekelà is kebpekesarig tew ke ed-ampù kiw ziyà te Megbevayà. Netuenan tew he ke zuen minsan hengkey he ebuyuen tew he kenà supak te egkesuatan din, ibeǥey zin kenitew.
62005015	Layun sikandin ebpemineg kenitew ke ed-ampù kiw ne tenged dutun netuenan tew zaan he ibeǥey zin is ebuyuen tew.
62005016	Ke zuen minsan hentei he neehè din he nekesalà is duma zin, iyan, is rimeǥas dutun te salà, ne kenà kemetayen, ne kinahanglan he iampù din ne is Megbevayà, ibeǥey zin is untung he wazà pidtemanan dutun te nekesalà. Iyan egkeǥiyen ku kayi is etew he nekesalà he kenà kemetayen is rimeǥas dutun te salè din. Duen salà he iyan rimeǥas dutun is kemetayen. Kenè ku iyan egkeǥiyen he id-ampù tew is etew he nekesalà te iring dutun.
62005017	Salà is minsan hengkey he mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan, ne zuen salà he kenà iyan rimeǥas dutun is kemetayen.
62005018	Netuenan tew he wazà minsan hentei he nehimu he anak te Megbevayà he layun ed-ulaula te mezaat su edlig-enan sikandin te Anak te Megbevayà ne kenè en sikandin egkehilevetan ni Setanas.
62005019	Netuenan tew he menge anak kiw te Megbevayà, iyan, is langun he menge kuntada te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan, ebeyveyaan sikandan ni Setanas.
62005020	Netuenan tew zaan he midhendini en te kelibutan is Anak te Megbevayà ne imbeǥey zin kenitew is kedsavut wey kiw mehimu he menge emiǥu te tutuu he Megbevayà. Nekidsevaha kiw te tutuu he Megbevayà su nekidsevaha kiw te Anak din he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan sikandin tutuu he Megbevayà, iyan sikandin puunà te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
62005021	Menge anak ku, likayi niw is ked-ezapa te minsan hengkey he kenà iyan is tutuu he Megbevayà.
63001001	Siak is meǥurang, ebpesuratan ku sikew is bahi he pinilì te Megbevayà wey is menge anak nu. Utew kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku ne kenà dini zà te kedì he ǥehinawa, kekenà, mahal kew zaan diyà te langun he neketuu te tutuu he tuluuwen.
63001002	Umba minahal zey sikiyu su ǥeina te midhamen kiw en te tutuu he tuluuwen ne heini is tutuu he tuluuwen, kenà egkeawà dini te kenitew te wazà pidtemanan.
63001003	Is Amey tew he Megbevayà wey si Jesu Kristu he Anak din, berakat he meǥeǥawi zan kenitew, ikehizu kiw zan, ne veǥayi kiw zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk. Egkehimu heini su midhamen kiw te tutuu he tuluuwen wey ebmahalen tew is menge zuma tew.
63001004	Nelipey ad utew su zuen menge anak nu he edtuman te tutuu he tuluuwen sumalà is insuǥù kenitew te Amey tew he Megbevayà.
63001005	Ne tenged dutun, Bayi, edhengyuen ku he egiǥineǥawè kiw. Kenà beǥu heini he suǥù is idsurat ku kayi, su zaan heini zuen te aney tew en kedtuu.
63001006	Su emun egiǥineǥawè kiw, egketuman tew is menge suǥù te Megbevayà. Su iyan suǥù din kenitew is: kinahanglan he egiǥineǥawè kiw.
63001007	Mezakel is nemenlepew he ebpenurù te tarù dini te kelibutan. Egkeǥiyen dan he si Jesus is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, wazà sikandin mehimu he etew. Is minsan hentei he iyan haazà egkeǥiyen dan, teruen sikandin wey kuntada ni Kristu.
63001008	Andam kew wey kenà maawà diyan te keniyu is midheǥuan niw su wey kenà meterini keuzemà is suhul te Megbevayà keniyu.
63001009	Ke zuen etew he ed-engkezan din is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ni Kristu su iyan edhemenan din is tarù he tuluuwen he in-uman din dutun, wazà sikandin mebpekidsevaha te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei mulà he edhemenan din is tutuu he tuluuwen, iyan sikandin mibpekidsevaha te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey is Anak din.
63001010	Ke zuen ebpekeuma he minsan hentei he ebpenurù te tuluuwen ne kenè din iyan ibpenurù is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ni Kristu, kenè niw ipepemenahik diyan te valey niw. Kenè niw zaan igalewǥalew sikandin.
63001011	Su minsan ke igalewǥalew niw zà sikandin, egketevangan niw sikandin dutun te ulaula zin he mezaat.
63001012	Mezakel pezem is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, iyan, kenè ku egkesuatan te edsurat. Egkesuatan ku he ebpenumbaley a ziyan wey kiw mekedlelalag ne wey meheǥet is kelipey tew.
63001013	Ebpengemusta keniyu is menge anak te suled nu he vahi zini he pinilì daan te Megbevayà.
64001001	Siak is meǥurang, ebpesuratan ku sikew, Gayu, is emiǥu ku he utew ku minahal.
64001002	Minahal ku he suled, id-ampù ku sikew ziyà te Megbevayà he mebmeupiya is kebpekesavuk nu wey iveǥey kenikew is meupiya he lawa iring te imbeǥey zin daan kenikew is mezesen he kedtuu.
64001003	Nelipey a utew zutun te kebpekeuma zini te menge suled tew he ebpuun diyan su midtudtulan e zan he utew meheǥet is kedhemeni nu te tutuu he tuluuwen wey uyun kun daan dutun is menge ulaula nu.
64001004	Iyan utew ku igkelipey is kegkezineg ku te tudtul he edtuman en te tutuu he tuluuwen is menge anak ku te kedtuu.
64001005	Minahal ku he suled, utew ka veliǥeǥawen su mibpurungan nu is menge suled tew he midtuluy ziyan minsan te sikan nu pa sikandan mekilala.
64001006	Mibpenudtul zan te menge tumutuu zini hein midtiǥum key he utew zekelà is gaǥew nu kandan. Emun ed-uman dan edtuluy ziyan tevangi nu en maan sikandan te paaǥi he egkesuatan te Megbevayà wey zan mekelaus dutun te kedhipanew zan.
64001007	Su midhipanew zan wey zan mekesangyew te impenurù ni Kristu, iyan, kenè dan ebpetavang te kenà menge tumutuu.
64001008	Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he iyan ki is tumutuu ebeǥey ziyà te kandan su wey ki meketavang dutun te kedsengyawa zan te tutuu he tuluuwen.
64001009	Mibpesuratan ku is menge tumutuu ziyan, iyan, si Diyutripis, kenè din ebpemineǥen is menge suǥù ku. Iyan egkesuatan din is: iyan dà sikandin ebayàbayà.
64001010	Emun ebpekehendiyan a, edseyseyen ku keniyu is langun he mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan din, su kenà tutuu is menge memezaat he lalag din he ebpemekesuǥat kenami. Ne kenà duen dà taman su kenè din ed-elimahan is menge zuma ta he tumutuu ke ebpekeuma zan. Ne kenè din daan idtuǥut he ed-elimahan sikandan te menge zuma zin he tumutuu ziyan. Is ed-elima mulà kandan, kenè din idtuǥut he edtampu zan te kedsimba niw.
64001011	Minahal ku he suled, kenè ta iyan ed-iringan is mezaat he ulaula he iring dutun, kekenà, iyan ta ed-iringan is meupiya he ulaula. Is minsan hentei he meupiya is menge ulaula zin, neǥaked sikandin te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei mulà he mezaat is ulaula zin, wazà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is Megbevayà.
64001012	Nezeliǥan si Dimitriyu te langun he menge etew. Egkeehè dan pinaaǥi te menge ulaula zin he edtumanen din is tutuu he tuluuwen. Edeliǥen dey zaan sikandin ne netuenan nu he tutuu is egkeǥiyen dey.
64001013	Mezakel pa pezem is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, iyan, kenè ku egkesuatan te edsurat.
64001014	Egkesuatan ku he kenè en utew egkeuǥet edhendiyan a ne human ki ebpekedlalag.
64001015	Berakat he melinawen is kebpekesavuk niw ziyan. Is menge emiǥu nu zini, ebpengemusta zan kenikew. Ipengemusta a zaan te langun he menge emiǥu ta ziyan.
65001001	Siak si Hudas is suled ni Santiago wey is suluǥuen ni Jesu Kristu. Sikiyu is midhimu te Amey tew he Megbevayà he menge tumutuu he menge minahal zin he midlig-enan ni Jesu Kristu, iyan kew ebpesuratan ku.
65001002	Berakat he mehizuwi kew, mebmelinawen kew, wey ikeǥaǥew kew te Megbevayà.
65001003	Minahal ku he menge suled, minsan pa te iyan aney he egkesuatan ku is ebaal a te surat he ibpeuwit ku ziyan wey ku ikeseysey ziyan te keniyu is kedlibriya kenitew te Megbevayà, iyan, utew en guntaan epiki he ebpesuratan ku sikiyu wey ku sikiyu mesembaǥi. Kinahanglan, menge suled, he pekezesen kew sukul te menge etew he edhelinen dan pezem is tutuu he tuluuwen he imbeǥey te Megbevayà. Haazà is tuluuwen, imbeǥey zin kenitew te menge ǥaked din ne kinahanglan he kenè en ed-umanan te minsan hentei.
65001004	Umba kinahanglan he egkeǥiyen ku heini su zuen menge etew he nekeamur keniyu, iyan, id-eles dan he kenà hustu is edtuuwan dan. Wazè dan kedtahud te Megbevayà; edhelinen dan pezem is tutuu he tuluuwen su ibpenurù dan he egkehimu ke ed-ul-ulahan tew is meremerik su utew kun beliǥeǥawen is Megbevayà ne ebpeseyluwen kiw zin gihapun. Kenè dan edtuu he si Jesu Kristu, iyan dà egalen tew wey Nengazen tew. Dengan dà isurat te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà ke hengkey is silut kandan.
65001005	Netuenan niw en is egkeǥiyen ku, iyan, ed-umanan ku pa egkeǥiya ziyan te keniyu wey niw kenà melipati. Dengan midlibri te Megbevayà is menge pinilì din he etew ne impeǥuwè din sikandan diyà te ǥinhedian he Ihiptu, iyan, dutun te nekeǥuwè dan en, mibpenhimetayan din is duma kandan he wazà medsarig kandin.
65001006	Isipa niw zaan is menge velinsuǥuen din dengan diyà te langit. Mid-engkezan dan is ketengdanan he imbeǥey zin kandan ne mid-ewaan dan is hustu he ed-ubpaan dan. Tenged dutun mibpirisu zin sikandan diyà te utew merusirem. Mibakus din te kedina he kenà egkezeetan te wazà pidtemanan su idtaǥad sikandan taman te kenè pa egkeuma is andew keuzemà te kedsiluti zin kandan.
65001007	Isipa niw zaan is menge meǥinged dutun te menge inged he Suduma wey Gumura wey is menge inged he uvey zutun. Neiringan dan haazà is menge velinsuǥuen su utew subra is mezaat he menge ulaula zan. Is menge maama zutun, ne kenà iyan dà is menge vahi midhilevetan dan, kekenà, neked-eeriǥè dan is pudu menge maama ne tenged dutun midsilutan sikandan te hapuy ne nehimu haazà he petizaan te Megbevayà te langun keuzemà he edsilutan din te hapuy he kenà egkeevukan.
65001008	Ne iring din ded daan haazà is menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù diyan te keniyu. Edtumanen dan is meremerik he ulaula he egkeǥiyen dan he impenurù kandan pinaaǥi te teǥeinep. Kenè dan ebpesakup te Megbevayà ne edsumpeliten dan is menge kedesenan diyà te langit.
65001009	Ne minsan si Miguel, sikan is lavew he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà, kenà sikandin ed-ulaula te iring dutun su hein minatey zengan si Moises, mibpelewanà si Miguel wey si Setanas ke hentei is ebpekeangken te lawa ni Moises. Ne wazà mekeǥehem si Miguel he edsulà ki Setanas. Iyan dà lalag din kandin is: Iyan edsawey kenikew is Megbevayà.
65001010	Iyan, haazà is menge etew mulà he ebpenurù te tarù, edsumpeliten dan is kenè dan egkesavut. Iring sikandan te menge leew he langgam he kenà ebpekeisip-isip su is ulaula he egkesuatan te lawa zan, iyan edtumanen dan ne iyan haazà ebpekezezaat kandan.
65001011	Kehizu zan! Mid-iringan dan is mid-ulaula zengan ni Kain. Mid-iringan dan is paaǥi ni Belaam he utew sayep su minsan netuenan dan he mezaat is ed-ul-ulahan dan, ed-ul-ulahan dan gihapun su susuaten sikandan te selapì. Iring te midsukul si Kuri te Mebevayà, midsukul zan daan ne edsilutan sikandan iring te midsilutan daan si Kuri.
65001012	Ebpekezezaat sikandan te zengeg niw ke edtampu zan te keemuran niw su kenè dan mulà egkeeled dutun te kedtumana zan te mezaat he kebayè dan ke ebpekidtuǥen dan keniyu. Iyan dà egkeisip dan is kandan dà he egkesuatan. Wazè dan menge pulus; iring sikandan te menge ǥapun he wazà duen uzan he mibpagwis te keramag. Iring sikandan te menge kayu he kenà ebpemeǥas minsan pa te iyan en pezem timpu te kebpemeǥas. Ne umba kenà ebpekepemeǥas su nepiley en ne neǥangu.
65001013	Iring daan sikandan te utew zezekelà he vaǥel ziyà te zaǥat ke zuen bagyu su iring is menge mekeeled-eled he ulaula zan te meremerik he vuràburà he ebpenlepew ziyà te veyvey. Iring sikandan te menge vituen he nekesuwey te hustu he nesevukan dan su kenè en egkeseriǥan is ibpenurù dan. Midteǥana te Megbevayà is utew merusirem he egkeubpaan dan te wazà pidtemanan.
65001014	Si Inuk, sikan is ikepitu he lapis he kevuwazan ni Adan, netagnè din dengan haazà is menge etew su migkaǥi sikandin te, Keuzemà ebpekeuma is Nengazen he edumahan te liblibuwen he menge velinsuǥuen din
65001015	su edsusiyen din is nengeulaula te minsan hentei he etew. Edsilutan din is minsan hentei he lalung he wazè dan kedtahud te Megbevayà tenged te menge kelelalung he mid-ulaula zan wey tenged te kedsumpelita zan te Megbevayà.
65001016	Ne haazà is menge etew he netagnà ni Inuk, menge perelivak wey perevasul sikandan. Iyan dan edtumanen is menge memezaat he kebayè dan. Memepelevawen dan, iyan, edigdiǥen dan is menge zuma he etew su wey zan melimbungi.
65001017	Tentenuzi niw, menge suled, is netagnà dengan te menge epustul he midsuǥù te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
65001018	Ke sikandan te, Keuzemà te ketepusan he menge andew ebpenlepew is menge etew he edsumpalit keniyu. Iyan edtumanen dan is menge kebayè dan he supak te Megbevayà.
65001019	Ne haazà is menge etew he netagnè dan, iyan igkevahinbahin niw te menge tumutuu. Iyan dà egkeisip dan is egkesuatan dan dini te kelibutan ne wazà diyà te kandan is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
65001020	Ne sikiyu mulà, menge minahal ku he suled, peniguduwi niw is kebpetebtevangè niw su wey meheǥet is kedtuu niw te tuluuwen he impetuuwan kenitew te Megbevayà. Pekezesen kew ampù pinaaǥi te ǥehem he ibeǥey te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
65001021	Layun niw isipa is utew zekelà he ǥaǥew keniyu te Megbevayà dutun te kedteǥazi niw te timpu keuzemà he zutun ibpaahà kenitew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu is dekelà he hizu zin su zutun kenè kiw zin edsuwayan te wazà pidtemanan.
65001022	Is menge etew he zuwazuwa pa is kedtuu zan, ipeehè niw kandan is hizu niw kandan.
65001023	Tevangi niw sikandan wey zan melibri te silut, iring te kedsekelawa niw ziyà te hapuy te egketutung. Is menge zuma he utew zekelà is salè dan, ipeehè niw zaan kandan is hizu niw, iyan, andam kew su kela ke mepenulayi kew zaan pinaaǥi te meremerik he ulaula zan.
65001024	Utew zekelà is kebpeselemati tew te Megbevayà. Iyan metau he edtavang kenitew su wey kenè kiw mekesuwey ziyà te kandin. Iyan metau he id-etuvang kiw keuzemà kandin diyà te vulawan he ed-ulian he wazà igkesewayi kenitew he utew zekelà dutun is kelipey tew.
65001025	Edeliǥen tew sikandin su iyan dà sikandin Megbevayà; iyan sikandin Menluluwas tew pinaaǥi te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan sikandin egkevantug; iyan sikandin hadì; iyan sikandin mekeǥeǥehem; iyan sikandin ebayàbayà dengan te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey, wey ǥuntaan, wey keuzemà te wazà pidtemanan.
66001001	Iyan heini kedtudtula te impezayag ni Jesu Kristu. Insarig heini kandin te Megbevayà wey zin daan ikepesavut diyà te menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà ke hengkey is meǥaan en he egkengeulaula. Impesavut heini ni Kristu pinaaǥi te kedsuǥua zin te velinsuǥuen din diyà te kediey te suluǥuen din he si Juan.
66001002	Ne siak, id-amin ku idsurat is langun he neehè ku. Is migkaǥi te Megbevayà wey is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut kediey ni Jesu Kristu, idsurat ku kayi.
66001003	Edtuvazan te Megbevayà is ebasa kayi te libru wey edtuvazan din daan is ebpemineg te kebesaha kayi ne edtuman te insuǥù kayi. Su utew en meǥaan is kegketuman te langun kayi te netagnà.
66001004	Siak si Juan, ne ebpesuratan ku is pitu he gurupu te menge tumutuu he ziyà te prubinsya he Asya. Ibpengumew-umew ku he ikeǥaǥew kew te Megbevayà, wey te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, wey ni Jesu Kristu, ne iveǥey zan daan keniyu is melinawen he kebpekesavuk. Is Megbevayà, daan en sikandin te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey; kemulu pa sikandin guntaan wey kenà sikandin egkehanew te wazà pidtemanan. Is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ziyà ed-ubpà te etuvangan te pinuuwà te Megbevayà, ne pitu is gehem din. Si Jesu Kristu, iyan egkeseriǥan is lalag din. Iyan sikandin kes nehuna he zuen din beǥu en he untung pinaaǥi te kegkevenhawa kandin. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te menge hadì dini te kelibutan. Dekelà is gehinawa zin kenitew. Midlibri kiw zin te silut te menge salè tew pinaaǥi te kebpaaǥas din te lengesa zin.
66001006	Midhimu zin he iyan kiw edhedian din wey iyan kiw memumuhat he iyan kebpemuhat tew is ked-ezapa tew te Megbevayà he Amey zin. Tehuza sikandin wey medhadì sikandin te wazà pidtemanan!
66001007	Ebpekeuma si Jesu Kristu he ziyà egkeahà te menge ǥapun. Egkeahà sikandin te tivuuk he menusiyà ragkes is menge etew he mibpilak kandin dengan. Ne is langun he kelasi te menusiyà dini te kelibutan, ebpekesineǥew zan tenged kandin su egkehandek dan te silut. Metuman heini is langun.
66001008	Is Nengazen tew he Megbevayà he mekeǥeǥehem he zaan en te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey, iyan ded sikandin guntaan wey minsan keuzemà te wazà pidtemanan. Ke sikandin te, Iyan a sikan is alpa wey umiga, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kes puunà wey egkepengkusan te minsan hengkey.
66001009	Iyan a si Juan is sevaha he suled niw tenged te kedtuu ku ki Jesus. Iring keniyu nekeantus a zaan te menge kemeresayan su sakup a zaan te ǥinhedian din. Tenged te ingkepauk te gubirnu is kebpenudtul ku te Lalag te Megbevayà wey is kebpenurù ku te impesavut ni Jesus, impesivey a ne ziyà a ibpeubpà te sengepupulu he egngezanan te Patmus.
66001010	Ne zutun te sevaha he andew he Duminggu, utew mezesen is ked-uwita kedì te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne zuen impeehè din kedì. Diyà te egkeiniyuǥan ku nezineg ku is egkaǥi he iring te vudyung su utew mezaǥing,
66001011	ne ke sikandin te, Is egkeehè nu, isurat nu ne ibpeuwit nu ziyà te pitu he menge gurupu te menge tumutuu he ziyà te menge inged he Ipisu, Ismirna, Pirgemu, Tiyetira, Sardis, Piledilpya, wey ziyà daan te inged he Leudisiya.
66001012	Ne midlilingey ku wey ku maahà ke hentei is egkaǥi ne neehè ku is pitu he sulù he vulawan.
66001013	Ne ziyà te teliwazà dutun te menge sulù, duen neehè ku he henduen be te etew. Meluǥayad is kumbalè din ne mibevanda te vulawan.
66001014	Is ulu zin wey vulvul zin, ne utew meputì su iring te manggad he meputì. Is mata zin, ne henduen be te egkeregreg.
66001015	Ne is menge paa zin, ne henduen be te ǥalang he midlangga he midlimbasan. Ne is laǥeng din, ne henduen be te zeǥurus te utew mezakel he menge wahig.
66001016	Ne ziyà te kewanan din migewezan din is pitu he vituen. Ne edlepew ziyà te vèbè din is sundang he zezuwa is gerangan din he utew meǥarang. Ne is buked din, henduen te edsiǥa he andew he utew merayag.
66001017	Ne hein neehè ku sikandin, nekelangkeb a ziyà te etuvangan din ne henduen a te minatey. Ne indampè din kediey is kewanan he palad din ne ke sikandin te, Kenè ka mahandek su iyan a sikan is puunà wey kes egkepengkusan te langun.
66001018	Iyan a kes Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen. Mibpehimatey a ne ǥuntaan kenà ad maan ebpatey te minsan keenu. Iyan a ebayàbayà te menge minatey, ne zuen ku zaan keǥehem diyà te Iveyaan.
66001019	Isurat nu is ibpeehè ku kenikew, is egkeehè nu he egkeulaula ǥuntaan wey is egkeulaula pa keuzemà.
66001020	Ibpesavut ku kenikew is in-eles dengan he kehuluǥan kayi te pitu he vituen he neehè nu he egewezan ku te kewanan he velad ku wey is kehuluǥan kayi te pitu he sulù he vulawan. Is pitu he vituen, iyan alung te pitu he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey te pitu he gurupu te menge tumutuu. Ne heini is pitu he sulù, ne iyan sikan is pitu he gurupu te menge tumutuu.
66002001	Ne impelaus din is lalag din te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Ipisu, ne isurat nu is menge lalag ku ziyà, ke sikew te, Siak si Jesus is egawed te pitu he vituen diyà te kewanan ku he velad ne iyan a zaan edhipanew kayi te teliwazà te pitu he sulù.
66002002	Netuenan ku is langun he menge ulaula niw; netuenan ku he edhaǥù kew ne meinentusen kew te kemereǥenan tenged te kedtuu niw. Netuenan ku zaan he kenè niw idtuǥut he zuen menge lalung he etew he menge zuma niw, su sikan is menge etew he migkaǥi he menge epustul sikandan ni Jesus, migezaman niw ne zutun netuenan niw he kenà tutuu he menge epustul sikandan.
66002003	Netuenan ku he ed-antus kew te mereǥen tenged te kedtuu niw kediey ne minsan pa zutun kenè niw ed-isipen he ed-engkezan niw is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù ku.
66002004	Iyan, duen netuenan ku he ulaula niw he kenà meupiya su hein aney kew meketuu, dekelà is gehinawa niw kediey, ne ǥuntaan malù en edeisek is gehinawa niw kediey.
66002005	Tentenuzi niw sikan is kedekelaa niw zengan kediey ziyà te ǥehinawa niw; iniyuǥi niw is mezaat he ulaula ne ul-ulaha niw is meupiya he mid-ulaula niw zengan su emun kenà, ebeyaan ku sikiyu. Ne id-awè ku is sulù niw ziyà te selevukè din emun kenè niw edlikuan is daan he ulaula niw.
66002006	Duen daan egkesuatan ku he ulaula niw su igkepauk niw is menge mezaat he ulaula te menge Nikuleyta he igkepauk ku zaan.
66002007	Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu! Is etew he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, edtuǥutan ku he mekekaan sikandin te veǥas te kayu he iyan puunà te untung he wazà pidtemanan he ziyà te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà.
66002008	Ne ke sikandin maan te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Ismirna, ke sikew te, Iyan heini menge lalag ku te puunà te langun ne egkepengkusan daan te langun. Minatey a ne nevanhew.
66002009	Netuenan ku is kegkeantus niw te kemeresayan; netuenan ku he egkengeayuayu kew. Ne minsan pa zutun sepian kew utew pinaaǥi te kedtuu niw. Netuenan ku he kenà benar is id-ituk keniyu te menge etew he egkaǥi he menge Hudiyu zan, iyan, kenà sikandan tutuu he Hudiyu su mibpekid-upakat dan ki Setanas.
66002010	Kenè kew mahandek te meǥaan niw en igkerasey. Si Setanas, meǥaan din en ibpepirisu is duma keniyu su ebpenulayen kew zin. Ne seled te sepulù he andew ebpekeantus kew te kemereǥenan. Mebmetinumanen kew te menge suǥù ku taman te kemetayen su ebeǥayan ku sikiyu te kuruna he iyan is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
66002011	Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu. Is etew he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, kenè en egkeragkes te silut he iyan is ikezuwa he kemetayen.
66002012	Ne ke sikandin maan te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen he impevantey te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Pirgemu, ke sikew te, Siak si Jesus is egkaǥi; iyan a sikan is duen din sundang he zezuwa is gerangan din he meǥarang utew.
66002013	Netuenan ku he sakup ni Setanas is inged niw. Ne minsan pa zutun midhemenan niw is kedtuu niw kedì ne wazè niw engkezi is menge penurù ku minsan dutun te kedhimetayi ki Entipas dengan. Metinumanen sikandin he ebpenudtul te menge lalag ku, ne midhimetayan sikandin diyan te inged niw he nesakup ni Setanas.
66002014	Duen nepipira he menge ulaula niw he kenè ku egkesuatan, su zuen duma keniyu he edsunuzen dan is impenurù dengan ni Belaam. Su si Belaam, impenurù din dengan ki Balak is paaǥi wey mepenulayi is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Iyan is kegkaan te impemuhat diyà te kenà tutuu he megbevayà wey is kedhilavet te kenè dan esawa.
66002015	Ne zuen daan duma keniyu he edtuuwan dan is menge penurù te menge etew he Nikuleyta.
66002016	Iniyuǥi niw heini is mezaat he ulaula su emun kenà, meǥaan ku en sikiyu ebeyai ne edtebeken ku heini is menge etew. Iyan gumaan ku heini is sundang dini te vèbè ku he iyan is lalag ku .
66002017	Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu. Is etew he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, ebeǥayan ku sikandin te in-eles ku pa he egkeenen he mana he ziyà ebpuun te langit. Ne ibeǥey ku zaan kandin is meputì he vatu he insurat dutun is beǥu en he ngazan. Iyan dà egkesayud te ngazan dutun is ebeǥayan.
66002018	Ne ke sikandin maan te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen he impevantey te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Tiyetira. Ke sikew te, Siak is egkaǥi, ne Anak a te Megbevayà; is menge mata ku, ne henduen be te egkeregreg, ne is menge paa ku, ne henduen be te ǥalang he midlimbasan.
66002019	Netuenan ku is menge ulaula niw, dekelà is gehinawa niw kediey. Mezesen is kedtuu niw. Metinumanen kew te menge suǥù ku wey meinentusen kew te mereǥen. Netuenan ku zaan he edhuna he mezakel is menge ulaula niw he meupiya ǥuntaan kenà te mid-ulaula niw he meupiya zengan te aney kew en meketuu.
66002020	Ne minsan pa zutun, duen ulaula niw he kenè ku egkesuatan su sikan is bahi he si Hisibil he egkeǥiyen din he ebpeneuven sikandin te Megbevayà, idtuǥut niw he ibpenurù din is mezaat he ulaula ziyà te menge suluǥuen ku. Egkaǥi sikandin he kenà supak te Megbevayà is kedhilavet te kenè niw esawa wey is kegkaan te impemuhat diyà te menge kenà tutuu he megbevayà.
66002021	Neuǥet en is ked-entusa ku kandin wey zin meiniyuǥi is ulaula zin he mezaat, iyan, kenè din ed-iniyuǥan.
