66021012	Utew metikang is elavat dutun te inged ne sepulù wey zezuwa is pultahan din ne zuen belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey zutun te kada pultahan. Ne midsuratan is menge pultahan te menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he kepuun he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.
66021013	Heepat he pesaǥì is elavat dutun te inged ne ziyà te kada elavat ne zuen tetelu he pultahan. Diyà te zapit te edsilaan ne tetelu he pultahan ne ziyà te zapit te edsenlepan ne tetelu zaan. Diyà te zapit te zivavà ne tetelu zaan ne ziyà te zapit te zizayà ne tetelu zaan he pultahan.
66021014	Ne is elavat dutun te inged, ne sepulù wey zezuwa is impepinuuwan dutun he zekelà he vatu. Ne midsuratan haazà is menge vatu te menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge epustul zuen te nati he kerehidu.
66021015	Ne haazà is belinsuǥuen he ebpekidlalag kedì, egkulang sikandin te vulawan he mitrusan su edsukuzan din haazà is inged wey is elavet dutun wey haazà is menge pultahan.
66021016	Ne haazà is inged, is sukud dutun te velevaǥan din ne iring te sukud te petindeg din su nepesaǥì is kegkeveeli zin. Ne midsukud dutun te velinsuǥuen haazà is inged ne zezuwa he libu wey heepat he ǥatus he kilumitru is petindeg din. Ne iring din ded daan is belevaǥan din wey is ketikang din.
66021017	Ne midsukud din daan is ketikang dutun te elavat ne menge keneman he mitrus is ketikang din sumalà is paaǥi tew te kedsukud su iyan migamit din.
66021018	Ne haazà is elavat ne hinimu te mahal he vatu he haspi. Ne haazà is inged ne hinimu te vulawan he utew waǥas su edlahus is mata ta zutun.
66021019	Is menge vatu he mibpepinuuwan dutun te elavat, ne mideyzeyanan te mezakel he menge memekempet he menge mahal he vatu. Haazà is nehuna he vatu ne haspi, is ikezuwa ne sepiru, is iketelu ne kelsidunya, is ikeepat ne ismiralda,
66021020	is ikelima ne serdunika, is ikeenem ne kurnelina, is ikepitu ne krisulita, is ikewalu ne birilu, is ikesiyam ne tupasyu, is ikesepulù ne krisuprasu, is ikesepulù wey sevaha ne hesintu, ne is ikesepulù wey zezuwa ne emetista.
66021021	Ne haazà is sepulù wey zezuwa he pultahan, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he pirlas su is kada pultahan, ne hinimu te sevaha he pirlas, ne is kersada zutun te inged, ne vulawan he utew waǥas su iring te ispihu he edlahus is mata ta.
66021022	Ne wazè ku naahà he valey he simbahan dutun te inged. Wazà kinahanglan is baley he simbahan dutun su is Megbevayà he mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazan te langun wey is nati he kerehidu, dutun en te kandan edsimba is langun.
66021023	Ne kenè en daan kinahanglan is anlag te andew wey vulan he idtayew zutun su haazà is inged, ed-enlaǥan en te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Megbevayà; sikan is nati he kerehidu ne iyan sulù dutun.
66021024	Ne haazà is inged, ne egketeyawan te anlag din is langun he menge etew zutun he kelibutan. Ne is menge hadì te menge ǥinhedian dutun, ed-uwiten dan dutun te inged is ketiǥeyunan dan.
66021025	Is menge pultahan dutun te inged, ne kenè en edlekevan te minsan keenu he timpu su emun maandew ne ebpuwasan, ne wazà dutun mezukilem.
66021026	Ne ed-uwiten dutun seled te inged is menge mahal he azen wey is menge ketiǥeyunan te langun he menge ǥinhedian.
66021027	Iyan, wazà minsan hengkey he mezaat wey is minsan hentei he ebpenurù te tarù wey is etew he ed-azap te ledawan he ebpekeseled dutun. Iyan dà ebpekeseled dutun is menge etew he inlista is menge ngazan dan dutun te libru te nati he kerehidu he zutun idlista is ebpemeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
66022001	Ne, impaahà kediey zutun te velinsuǥuen is wahig he egngezanan te Wahig he Ebpekeveǥey te Untung. Ne haazà is wahig ne utew metingew iring te ispihu. Ne ziyà ebpuun haazà te pinuuwà te Megbevayà he iyan sikan is pinuuwà te nati he kerehidu.
66022002	Ne haazà is wahig, diyà edtudà te teliwazà te kersada zutun te inged. Ne te pesiziveluyà he veyvey zutun te wahig egkeahà is menge kayu he ebpekeveǥey te untung. Ne haazà is kayu, sepulù wey zezuwa he kelasi is beǥas din ne kada vulan ebpemeǥas te sengekelasi. Ne is dahun dutun, ne vawì he ebpekeulì te menge etew he sakup te menge ǥinhedian dini te lumpad.
66022003	Ne haazà is inged, wazà dutun minsan hengkey he midrewakan te Megbevayà. Ne zutun is pinuuwà te Megbevayà he iyan pinuuwà te nati he kerehidu. Ne ed-ezapen is Megbevayà te menge suluǥuen din.
66022004	Egkeehè dan is paras din ne haazà is menge suluǥuen, edsuratan is menge vuked dan te ngazan din.
66022005	Wazè en dutun mezukilem ne wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa sulù wey silà te andew su iyan sulù dan is Megbevayà he Nengazen te langun, ne edhadì sikandan te wazà pidtemanan.
66022006	Ne migkeǥiyan a zutun te velinsuǥuen, ke sikandin te, Heini is menge lalag he nezineg nu, utew venar ne tutuu he egkengetuman. Is Megbevayè tew he Nengazen te langun, imbeǥey zin is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyà te ebpemeneuven din ne midsuǥù din is belinsuǥuen din wey zan ikepaahà diyà te menge suluǥuen din ke hengkey is meǥaan en he egkeulaula.
66022007	Ne egkaǥi si Jesus te, Meǥaan e en ebpekeuma! Utew egkengelipey is langun he edtuman te menge lalag ku he impezayag keniyu kayi te libru.
66022008	Ne siak si Juan is nekezineg wey nekeahà te langun he insurat ku kayi. Ne hein neipus ku te ed-ahà wey ebpemineg is langun kayi, midlangkeb a zutun te etuvangan te velinsuǥuen he mibpaahà kedì kayi te langun su ed-ezapen ku pezem.
66022009	Iyan, mibensaǥan e zin, ke sikandin te, Kenà a kenikew ezapa su siak wey sikew, wey is menge zuma nu he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà wey is langun he edtuman te menge lalag kayi te libru, neked-iiring kiw zà he menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà. Iyan nu zà ezapa is Megbevayà, ke sikandin.
66022010	Ne impelaus din haazà is lalag din te, Kenè nu ieles heini is impezayag kenikew he menge lalag kayi te libru su meǥaan en egkengetuman heini is langun.
66022011	Ne zutun he timpu, ke sikandin, sikan is mezaat pa is ulaula zin, ipepenigudu en sikandin ibpevaal te mezaat. Ne sikan is meremerik pa is ulaula zin dutun, ipepenigudu en sikandin ibpevaal te meremerik. Ne sikan is metazeng is ulaula zin dutun, ipepenigudu en ibpevaal te metazeng, ne haazà is etew he midhimu te Megbevayà he sakup din, ipepenigudu zutun sikandin te kebpesakup din te Megbevayà.
66022012	Pemineg kew, ke si Jesus, meǥaan e en ebpekeuma ne zutun edsuhulan ku is kada sevaha sumalà is mid-ulaula zin.
66022013	Iyan a sikan is alpa wey umiga, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kes ebpuunan wey kes egkepengkusan te minsan hengkey, ke si Jesus.
66022014	Utew egkengelipey haazà is langun he ebpìpian dan is ugelingen dan, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, ibpepalis dan is menge salè dan su wey utew meputì su emun ebeelan dan haazà, ebeǥayan sikandan te ketenged te kegkaan te veǥas dutun te kayu he ebpekeveǥey te untung wey te kedseled dutun te menge pultahan te inged.
66022015	Iyan, diyè dà te meziyù is mekeeled-eled is baal zin, wey is menge keteuwan, is memeremerik is ulaula, is menge memumunù, is ebpemenimba te menge ledawan wey is langun he menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù wey is etew he limbung is ulaula zin.
66022016	Siak si Jesus, midsuǥù ku ziyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu is belinsuǥuen ku wey zin metudtul heini is langun. Iyan a sikan is kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David. Iyan a sikan is iring te mekevugwas, kes bituen he ed-anlag ke egkepkepawè en , ke si Jesus.
66022017	Ne kes Waǥas he Mulin-ulin wey kes egkeesawa te nati he kerehidu, ed-umew zan is egkaǥi te, Tuu kew en. Ne sikan is nekezineg kayi, ne kinahanglan he med-umew zaan he egkaǥi te, Tuu kew en. Is minsan hentei keniyu he egkemezahan, wey is minsan hentei he egkesuat, dewata zin en he wazà bayad is wahig he ebpekeveǥey te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
66022018	Siak si Juan. Ebpetizeenan ku is minsan hentei he nekezineg kayi te impezayag kediey he ibpesavut kayi te libru. Ke zuen minsan hentei he ed-umanan din te minsan hengkey heini is ibpesavut, id-uman te Megbevayà te silut kandin is menge idrasey he nekaǥi kayi te libru.
66022019	Ne ke zuen minsan hentei he id-awè din kayi te ibpesavut he impezayag kediey is minsan hengkey, id-awà daan te Megbevayà is kandin he vahin dutun te veǥas duen te kayu he ebpekeveǥey te untung he nekaǥi kayi. Ne id-awà daan diyà te kandin is ketenged din te ked-ubpà dutun te inged te Megbevayà he nekaǥi kayi te libru.
66022020	Si Jesus he iyan ebpirma kayi te langun, ke sikandin te, Benar iyan he meǥaan e en ebpekeuma! Ne ke siak te, Uya, Jesus he Nengazen dey, hendini ke en!
66022021	Sikiyu is langun he menge ǥaked te Megbevayà, ikeǥaǥew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesus. ���
